eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to disrupt daily life, many educational institutions are facing prolonged closures. This situation raises concerns about the long-term impact on students' academic engagement and retention.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okutaataaganya obulamu obwa bulijjo, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi gaggalawo okumala ebbanga eddene. Embeera eno ereetawo okweraliikirira ku bikwata ku biseera by'abayizi eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka balo kwo pa dano, gangi kwan mapol kilorogi woko pi kare malac. Lok man kelo lworo I kom adwoki me kare malac I kom kwan pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aitolitol aijar naka nginiparan, ejaasi isomeroi luipu keda agolokinio na apak naepol noi. Eyangauni ejautene lo aiyalongong kanuikamunitos epone loepedoriata esisiak alomar toma aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu o'du driasi 'diyi ezazu risi, angu onita ni karakara eyi opizaru sa'wa ezu. E'yo 'di ni asi otiza eji e'yo sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu sukulu'a sa'wa ezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kutabangura entuura y'abantu, amatendekyero maingi nigakingwa kumara obwire buraingwa. Embeera egi nereetaho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'obwire bureingwa oburikukwata aha kwega kw'abeegi n'okugaruka kwega.

eng_prompt: As the number of confirmed cases continues to rise, health officials are urging caution during community events. They emphasize the importance of maintaining social distance and wearing masks to mitigate risks.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde abakakasiddwa gweyongera okulinnya, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza okwegendereza mu biseera by'emikolo gy'ekitundu. Bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okwewa amabanga n'okwambala masiki okukendeeza ku bulabe.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two tye ka medde ameda, lutic me yot kom tye ka cuku cwiny dano me gwoke ikare me yub mapatpat. Giwaco ni pire tek tutwal me bedo mabor ki dano ki bene ruku labo dog ki um me gengo poto pa two.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekak, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga acoikina kapak naka ipucito luka atutubet. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka alaikina keda ainap aitabalan nuka ekume keda aituk kanu aitidisiar atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba 'bani esu azo be 'diyi ni tutu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi a'i 'ba eyi aa'zu milesi sa'wa 'yeta ongulumu eyini 'diyisi. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani aa'zu esele cozu eyi ma eselea azini afa andreti a'buzu 'diyi osuzu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire oguhamiibwe nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu kwegyendesereza aha mikoro y'abantu. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okureeberera entuura y'abantu hamwe n'okujwara za masiki okubaasa kukyendeeza akabi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost local industries and reduce reliance on foreign goods, the Ugandan government announced new trade policies. As part of these measures, officials decided to restrict certain imports to protect domestic manufacturers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amakolero ga wano n'okukendeeza ku kwesigama ku bintu by'ebweru, gavumenti ya Uganda yalangiridde enkola empya mu by'obusuubuzi. Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa bino, abakungu baasalawo okukugira ebintu ebimu ebiyingizibwa mu ggwanga okusobola okukuuma abakola ebintu mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor tic mapat-pat me lobo Uganda ki dwoko piny rwom me jenge I kom jami ma aa ki lobo mawoko, gamente okatti ki cik manyen me cato wil. Macalo yoo acel me timo man, lutic gumoko tamgi me juku jami mogo ma aa ki lobo mawoko me gwoko jami ma aa ki lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor icuman luka akwapuwok ka aitidisiar agogong naka agwel iboro luka akwapin nukokinga, abu apugan nako Uganda kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nuka agwelanar. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu eswamak itutuboto aitikitik iboro ice lueyangaununete akwapin ace kanu ayuarite iboro luitolomete iboro.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu okalamvu kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini asi'baza afa edele kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri esizu, gamete Uganda niri azi azita o'diru tujari ma dria 'diyi. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, azi'ba 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'bani afa ofule engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi atrizu 'ba afa edepi kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura amakorero g'omwihanga n'okukyendeeza okugyendera aha bintu ebirikuruga aheeru, gavumenti ya Uganda ekarangirira ebiragiro bisya ebirikukwata aha by'obushuubuzi. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, abakuru bakasharamu kuremesa ebintu ebimwe ebirikuruga aheeru y'eihanga, kugira ngu babaase kurinda abarikukora ebintu omwihanga.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with deception and half-truths, it can be tempting to hide behind lies. However, embracing honesty, no matter how difficult, is the first step toward liberation.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obulimba n'ebitundu by'amazima, kisikiriza okwekweka emabega w'obulimba. Newankubadde, okwaniriza obwesimbu, newankubadde nga kizibu, gwe mutendera ogusooka ogutuusa ku ddembe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki goba ki lok ada matye nucu nucu, twero bedo atematema me kane I nge goba. Kadi bed kumeno, jolo lok ada, kadi bed ni tek tutwal, obedo yoo me acel me nongo bedo agonya.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba akiro nuka aisab keda nuka abeit, epedori aitam aingop kau naka aisab. Konye, acamun abeitonut, araida etiono, erai adoketait nasodit naka alakun.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo enzoru azini e'yo ada nusu be 'diyi pie tre, eri eco ovu o'bita ru mi ozizu enzo ma vutia ra. Kani si, e'yo ada a'izu, tro ovuzu ewaru ra ti, eri pari oko driwala vu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburyarya n'amazima agatahikire, nikibaasa kuba eky'okwegyezamu kweshereka enyima y'ebishuba. Kwonka, okwikiriza amazima, n'obu kiraabe kigumire kita, n'omutendera gw'okubanza gw'okuza omu busingye.

eng_prompt: Criminal behavior is a complex issue that often stems from various social, economic, and psychological factors. Understanding the motivations behind such actions is crucial for addressing the root causes of crime.
lug_prompt: Ebikolwa by'obumenyi bw'amateeka kizibu ekiva ku mbeera z'abantu ez'enjawulo, eby'enfuna n'endowooza. Okutegeera ebiviirako ebikolwa ng'ebyo kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola ku nsibuko y'obuzzi bw'emisango.
ach_prompt: Tim me timo bal obedo peko matek tutwal ma pol kare aa ki I kom jami mapol ma kwako kwo pa dano, lim ki tam pa dano. Niang tyen lok ma oweko kit tim enoni obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me lweny i kom jami ma kelo bal.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nuarokok erai ationis na etiono noi na elomunit kanejaas itunga, ikapun keda aomisio. Amisiikin iboro lu isinyikokinitos itunga aswam ngun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemokin iboro lu eyangaununei abilibilio naka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Adriza e'yo onzi 'yezu ri eri e'yo azi kongolokoru ni engapi e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea, e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea, azini e'yo eyi ma egata ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo asisile e'yo 'dile 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obukozi bw'ebibi n'eshonga y'amaani erikukira kurugirira aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe nk'embeera y'abantu, eby'entaasya hamwe n'ebiteekateeko byabo. Okwetegyereza ebirikureeta ebikorwa nk'ebyo n'eky'omugasho omu kurwanisa ebirikureetaho obukozi bw'ebibi.

eng_prompt: In today's world, where health disparities persist, it is crucial to prioritize transparency in healthcare. Ensuring that individuals can easily obtain medical information empowers them to make informed decisions about their health.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, obutali bwenkanya mu byobulamu gye bukyali, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obwerufu mu byobulamu. Okukakasa nti abantu bafuna mangu amawulire agakwata ku byobulamu kibasobozesa okusalawo obulungi ku bikwata ku bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kare-ni, kama apoka-poka me yot-kom pud tye, pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng tye ki ada I lok me yot-kom. Neno ni dano acel-acel twero nongo ngec ma lubbe ki yotkom weko gi moko tam maber i kom yotkom gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ne ejai atiakatiaka kotoma amukian, ejokuna noi aisingarenit nuka aica kotoma amukian. Aanyun ebe epatanikit itunga adumunun akiro nuka amukian einakini kesi apedor aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo esele coza e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ni nga kiri ovuzu ci, eri orodriru e'yo ada 'diyi 'bazu okporu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi eyini ecozu o'dukoti arojo ni 'diyi esuzu ewakokoru ri ni fe eyini okpo e'yo eyi 'duzu kililiru eyi ma rua ala ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ahu obutakwatanisa omu by'amagara bukiriho, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza amazima omu by'amagara. Okureeba ngu abantu banguhi kutunga amakuru agarikukwata ahaby'amagara, nikibaha amaani g'okucwamu gye aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, maintaining our health can often feel overwhelming. Seeking guidance from professionals can help us navigate the complexities of wellness.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ejjudde eby'okukola, okukuuma obulamu bwaffe kiyinza okuwulikika ng'ekizibu ennyo. Okunoonya okulambikibwa okuva mu bakugu kisobola okutuyamba okutambula mu bizibu by'obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, gwoko yot komwa twero bedo tek tutwal. Nongo tira kibot ludiro twero konyo wa me kato ki I peko mapat-pat me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naepatana aswam, epol noi aidar angaleu wok. Aingitun aicoreta kanejaas ipirioitin ingarakini oni aitodolikin atiokisio nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo ama ma rua ma ta mbazuri eco sawa driasi e'da ewaru tu. Imbata esuzu engazu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu ri eco ama aza ko e'yo ewaru rua ala ma dria 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani, okurinda amagara gaitu nikibaasa kureebeka nk'ekintu ky'amaani munonga. Okushaba obuhabuzi kuruga omu bakugu, nikibaasa kutuhwera kurabira omu buremeezi bw'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: I've noticed you've been feeling stressed with the daily commute. Have you considered a more flexible work arrangement?
lug_prompt: Nkirabye nti obadde owulira ng'oli ku situleesi olw'okutambula buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Aneno ni itye ka winyo lyeto pi wot matye ka timme nino ki nino.
teo_prompt: Abu eong aany ebe ipupi jo aiyalongong noi kanu alosit kangipaaran.
lgg_prompt: Ma ndre ra kini mi e'bi ovu asi omiza be acita o'du driasi ri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ndebire ngu otwire nohurira oine oburemeezi ahabw'okutambura buriizooba.

eng_prompt: As the situation with the pandemic continues to evolve, many businesses are reevaluating their workforce needs. Consequently, decisions are being made regarding which employees are critical to operations during this challenging time.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ekirwadde bbunansi yeeyongera okukyuka, bizinensi nnyingi zikyekenneenya ebyetaago by'abakozi baazo. N'olw'ekyo, okusalawo kukolebwa ku bakozi ki abakulu mu mirimu mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma peko me two korona tye ka mede kwede, biacara mapol tye ka ngiyo tic pa luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka moko tam i kom lutic mene ma pigi tego tutwal I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejai ejautene loka adeka naka ekorona, eutasi ibiasaran luipu airereor eipud loka eswamakakec. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos eswamak lu epol ajokis kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile yi ojazurisi, tujari karakara yi e'yo yini le azi ngazu 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. Ka'dini, 'ba e'yo 'du azi'ba orodriru azi ngazu sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'endwara ruranda nsi ku erikugumizamu nehinduka, bizinesi nyingi ziriyo nizetegyereza ebyetengo by'abakozi baazo. N'ahabw'ekyo, okusharamu kuriyo nikukorwa aha bikwatiraine n'abakozi ab'omugasho omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: To ensure a healthy work-life balance, the company has implemented a strict policy regarding time off. As a result, employees will not work during leave periods.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa enzikiriziganya ennungi wakati w'emirimu n'obulamu, kampuni etaddewo enkola enkakali ku bikwata ku biseera by'okuwummula. N'ekivuddemu, abakozi tebajja kukola mu biseera by'oluwummula.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic ki kwo tye marom, dul ne oketo cik matek tutwal I kom yweyo. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic pe gubi tic ikare me yweyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aswam keda aijar, etolomu ekampuni ainapeta nuikamunitos apak naka aiyengun. Kanuka ngun, mam eswamak iswamaete kapak naka aiyeng.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza kililiru ri ma tambazu, amuti 'da 'ba azita okporu sa'wa 'bani azi kuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi ngani azi sa'wa lifu nirisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho oburingaaniza omu mirimo n'amagara gaabo, kampuni eteireho ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikukwata aha bwire bw'okuhuumura. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi tibarikwija kukora omu bwire bw'ekihuumuro.

eng_prompt: I've been thinking a lot about my career lately. Have you given any thought to your future plans?
lug_prompt: Mbadde ndowooza nnyo ku mulimu gwange ennaku zino.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka tam tutwal I kom ticca I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aomoom noi nuikamunitos aswamuka apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi e'yo ega e'yo ma vile azi ma dria saaru.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninteekateeka munonga aha murimo gwangye ebiro ebi.

eng_prompt: In order to promote a healthy work environment and support employee well-being, the company has established a comprehensive benefits policy. This policy includes various provisions to ensure that employees can take care of their health without financial strain.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula embeera y'emirimu ennungi n'okutumbula obulamu bw'abakozi, kkampuni etaddewo enkola y'obuyambi. Enkola eno erimu ebiragiro eby'enjawulo okukakasa nti abakozi basobola okulabirira obulamu bwabwe awatali kunyigirizibwa mu by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me kwo ki ber bedo pa lutic, dul ne okatti ki cik me nongo kony. Cik man tye ki jami mapol me neno ni lutic gwoko yot komgi labongo peko me lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor eswamae loajokan ka aigang eswamak, etolomu ekampuni ainapeta nuikamunitos ameda. Ejaasi ainapeta ngun keda iboro luegelegela kanu awanyun ebe epedorete eswamak aidar angaleukec komam itereikina keda ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi ma aa'ta muke ri otuzu tualu azi'ba eyi ma aa'ta muke ri pie, amuti 'da e'do azita orodri fezu 'diyi ma dria dria. Azita 'di ma alia e'yo ndundu 'diyi lezu nezu ra kini azi'ba eyi eco eyi ma rua ala ma ta mba e'yo robia ni 'diyi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho embeera nungi aha mirimo hamwe n'okureeberera abakozi, kampuni etandikireho ebiragiro by'emigasho. Enkora egi erimu ebiragiro bitari bimwe na bimwe okureeba ngu abakozi babaasa kureeberera amagara gaabo bataine buremeezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: As workplace policies continue to evolve, it's essential for both parties to understand their rights and responsibilities regarding time off. Open communication can help clarify expectations and foster a supportive work environment.
lug_prompt: Nga enkola y'emirimu egenda mu maaso okukyuka, kya mugaso eri enjuyi zombi okutegeera eddembe n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwazo ku bikwata ku budde bw'okuwummula. Empuliziganya ennambulukufu esobola okuyamba okulambika ebisuubirwa n'okutumbula embeera y'emirimu ey'obuwagizi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma cik me gang tic tye ka lokke kwede, pire tek tutwal pi dano weng me niang twero gi ki tic gi malube ki kare me yweyo. Lok ma ayaba twero konyo me niang ngo ma omyero itim ki bene kelo kuc i gang tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos ainapeta nuka aiboisio nuka aswam aijulanakin, ejokuna noi itunga kere amisikin apedorosiokec keda aswamukec nuikamunitos apak naka aiyengun. Einer loepukora ingarakini aitemokin aomisio ka aitolomun ejautene loajokan loka aswam.
lgg_prompt: Azita pari azini ma alia 'diyi ni mu drile yi ojazurisi, eri orodriru 'ba iri 'diyi ni yi ma drilemgbo azini azi yini sawa lizaruri ma dria 'diyi vazu. E'yo nzeza ngmboru ri eco azakoma fe e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu dika eri eco fe angu azi ngazu 'ba eyi atizu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ebiragiro by'emirimo birikugumizamu nibihinduka, n'eky'omugasho abantu boona kwetegyereza obugabe bwabo n'obujunaanizibwa bwabo aha bikwatiraine n'obwiire bw'okuhuumura. Okugamba kurungi nikibaasa kuhwera omu kushoboorora ebirikuteekateekwaho n'okureetaho obusingye burungi aha mirimo.

eng_prompt: As tensions rise across the globe and uncertainty looms over our future, many are beginning to feel the weight of impending crises. The signs of unrest and instability are becoming increasingly hard to ignore.
lug_prompt: Ng'obunkenke bweyongera okwetooloola ensi yonna n'obutali bukakafu ku biseera byaffe eby'omu maaso, bangi batandise okuwulira obuzito bw'ebizibu ebigenda okujja. Obubonero bw'obutabanguko n'obutali butebenkevu bweyongera okuba obuzibu okububuusa amaaso.
ach_prompt: Kit ma telle tye ka medde I wilobo lung ki bedo ki akala-kala I kom anyim wa, dano mapol tye ka winyo peko matye kabino ni. Lanyut me lweny ki lweny tye ka doko tek tutwal me cayo ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata aiyalongong kotoma akwap kere keda amamus aijen nuikamunitos oingaren, eutasi itunga luipu apupokin ationis naebunit. Ijenuneta luka amumu keda amamus na ainapakina etionikinit apalunit.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu wudrikuru ma kalasi dria azini e'yo ama vile ewu drialeri ma dria 'diyi e'doria, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ewaru ecapi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo ega. Eceta e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi eca curu'do ewaru 'bani ani egazu ku.
nyn_prompt: Obu obunkenke burikweyongyera omunsi yoona hamwe n'obutegyendesereza oburikukwata aha biro byaitu by'omumaisho, baingi batandikire kwehurira oburemeezi bw'oburemeezi oburi haihi kubaho. Obubonero bw'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko bweyongyeire kugumira.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing pandemic and the extended restrictions, management held a meeting to discuss employee well-being. They emphasized the importance of taking time off to recharge during these challenging times.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso n'obukwakkulizo obwongezeddwayo, abaddukanya emirimu baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbeera y'abakozi. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okutwala akadde okuzzaamu amaanyi mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim kacel ki kigeng ma kimedo, ludito tic gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom kwo pa lutic. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa kwanyo kare me nongo kero I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Katupitos adeka naka ekorona keda ikisila lu iyatakitai, abu eyaitene kitolomu airiamun kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aijar naka eswamak. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka ayangar apak kanu aisiteteun kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni muzu drile azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria, driceza 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu azi'ba eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani sa'wa 'duzu ava liza ma dria ecozu eyi ma okpo otuzu sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ebiragiro ebirikwongyerwayo, abarikukurira ekitongore bakakora orukiiko kuhanuura aha magara g'abakozi. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okutwara akahuumuro kwombeka omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: When considering employee benefits, it is essential to establish clear guidelines for various types of leave. This ensures that both the employer and employee understand the expectations and responsibilities involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kulowooza ku miganyulo gy'abakozi, kya mugaso okuteekawo ebiragiro ebitegeerekeka ku bika by'oluwummula eby'enjawulo. Kino kikakasa nti omukozesa n'omukozi bombi bategeera ebisuubirwa n'obuvunaanyizibwa obuzingirwamu.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka tamo I kom kony ma lutic nongo, pire tek tutwal me keto cik matye maleng I kom kwai yweyo mapat-pat. Man weko wegi tic ki lutic weng niang ngo ma mite ki ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Arai iwomomoom nuikamunitos ameda naka eswamak, ejokuna aitolomun ainapeta nu ecai nuikamunitos iponesio luegelegela luka aiyeng. Einakini ngin aanyun ebe ejenete eswaman keda akeswam nu ekoto kesi keda nu ebeit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyini robia esuzu ri ma dria, eri orodriru azita kililiru 'diyi sizu lifu wura ndundu 'diyi ma dria. Diri ne ra kini ꞌba azi fepi azini ꞌba azi ngapi ꞌdiyi eꞌyo ꞌbani ega yi ma dria azini eꞌyo ꞌbani le yi ma ꞌye ꞌdiyi va.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka aha nshohoza y'abakozi, ni kikuru kutaho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa aha bika by'akahuumuro ebitarikushushana. Eki nikihamya ngu omukozesa hamwe n'omukozi boona nibamanya ebirikuteekateekwaho n'obujunaanizibwa oburimu.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced work environment, maintaining employee morale and well-being is crucial for productivity. Therefore, companies must consider the impact of mandatory leave policies on their workforce.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'emirimu ey'amangu, okukuuma empisa z'abakozi n'obulamu obulungi kikulu nnyo mu kukola obulungi emirimu. N'olw'ekyo, amakampuni galina okulowooza ku ngeri enkola y'okubawa oluwummula mu mirimu gy'ekosaamu abakozi baago.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tic tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, gwoko cwiny ki ber bedo pa lutic pire tek tutwal pi tic maber. Pi meno, dul mapat-pat omyero otam I kom adwoki pa cik me gengo tic I kom luticgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka aswam loka lolo, aidar eswamak ejok ka aijar ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aswam ejok. Kanuka ngun, ekot ikampunin aomoom nuepedorete ainapeta nuka aiyengun mama ejaasi eswamak kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ewu andruri ma alea, azi'ba eyi ma adriza kililiru ri ma tambaza eri orodriru azi ngazu. Ka'dini, le amuti eyi ma ega e'yo 'bani azi'ba eyini lifu 'duzu okpo alea ri ma 'yeta eyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'emirimo ey'erizooba, okureeberera emicwe n'amagara marungi g'abakozi n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'okukora gye emirimo yaabo. N'ahabw'ekyo, kampuni zishemereire kuteekateeka aha mugasho gw'ebiragiro by'ekihuumuro aha bakozi baabo.

eng_prompt: To ensure smooth operations and adequate staffing, it is essential for employees to communicate their time off in advance. This policy helps the management plan accordingly and maintain productivity.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti emirimu gitambula bulungi n'abakozi abamala, kya mugaso nnyo eri abakozi okutegeeza obudde bwabwe obw'okuwummula nga bukyali. Enkola eno eyamba abaddukanya emirimu okuteekateeka n'okukuuma ebivaamu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic tye maber ki lutic ma oromo, pire tek tutwal pi lutic me niango gi con i kom kare gi me yweyo. Cik man konyo ludito tic me yube pi tic gi wek tic owot maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aswam keda eswamak lu edolitos, ejokuna eswamak aitijenar apak kec na aiyengun sek. Ingarakinit ainapeta ngun eyaitene aitemonokin ka aidar aswam.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza kililiru azini azi'ba eyini aa'zu angiri, eri orodriru azi'ba eyini sa'wa eyini azi kuzu ri oluzu drioru. Azita 'di ni drice'ba eyi ma aza ko otita eyi 'yezu kililiru dika eyi ma orodri eyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu emirimo neekora kurungi n'abakozi abarikumara, n'eky'omugasho abakozi kugamba obwire bwabo bw'okuhuumura bukiri kare. Enkora egi neehwera abarikukurira eby'obushubuzi kukora enteekateeka n'okurinda emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote work-life balance, companies are implementing new policies regarding employee leave. These policies allow for greater flexibility in how leave is managed and taken.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enzikiriziganya wakati w'emirimu n'obulamu, kampuni ziteeka mu nkola amateeka amapya agakwata ku luwummula lw'abakozi. Enkola zino zisobozesa okukyusakyusa mu ngeri oluwummula gye lukuumibwamu n'okutwalibwamu.
ach_prompt: I tute gi me neno ni tic ki kwo gi tye marom, dul mapat-pat tye ka kati ki cik manyen ma mako yweyo pa lutic. Cik magi weko dano timo jami mapat-pat malube ki kit ma yweyo tiyo kwede ki kit me kwanyo yweyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong aswam keda aijar, eutasi ikampunin aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuikamunitos aiyeng naka eswamak. Ingarakinete ainapeta nu aijulakin epone lo itolosere aiyeng keda aiyengun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo azi ni azini idri ni 'diyi ma esele cozu, amuti eyi azita o'diru 'diyi 'ba azi'ba eyini lifu esuzu ri ma dria. Azita 'diyi fe ojata angiri geri 'bani lifu 'duzu azini ayuzuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza omu mirimo n'amagara gaabo, kampuni ziriyo nizitandikaho ebiragiro ebisya ebirikukwata aha kihuumuro ky'abakozi. Ebiragiro ebi nibyoreka oburyo bw'okukoresa ekihuumuro n'okukitwara.

eng_prompt: After reviewing our budget and projected expenses, it has become clear that we are facing significant limitations. As a result, we are unable to pursue additional projects at this time.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira yaffe n'ensaasaanya eteeberezebwa, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twolekaganye n'obuzibu obw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, tetusobola kukola pulojekiti ndala mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor byek me lim ki byek me tic, nen atyer kamaleng ni watye ki peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, pe watwero timo tic mukene I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ebajet wok keda aitosom ikapun, ecai cut ebe itereikina oni keda atiokisio nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, mam oni ipedori aitolot ipurojektin ice kotoma apak kana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile otita ajeni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri e'da kililiru kini ama e'yo ewaru 'diyi isu ra. E'yo 'disi, ama econi otita azi eyi 'ye sa'wa 'di ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra yaitu hamwe n'enshohoza erikuteekateekwaho, nikyerekwa butunu ngu twine oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, titurikubaasa kukora purogyekiti ezindi obwahati.

eng_prompt: As remote work becomes increasingly popular, many companies are reevaluating their policies. This shift has led to a more flexible approach to employee work environments.
lug_prompt: Okukola okuva ewala bwe kweyongera okumanyika, amakampuni mangi gaddamu okwekenneenya enkola zaago. Enkyukakyuka eno ereeseewo enkyukakyuka mu ngeri abakozi gye bakolamu emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tic ki kama bor tye ka nyaa kwede, dul mapat-pat tye ka ngiyo kit ma tic gi tye ka wot kwede. Aloka-loka man okelo aloka-loka ikit ma lutic tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejenara noi aswam kokinga, eutasi ikampunin luipu airereor ainapeta kec. Eyangau aijulanakineta ngun aijulakin epone loiswamaere eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza angu zozu ri ni ecazu e'yo ru, amuti karakara eyi geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. Ojata 'di fe geri azi'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukorera hare nikweyongyera kumanywa, kampuni nyingi ziriyo nizitereeza ebiragiro byazo. Empindahinduka egi ereesireho enkora nungi aha mirimo y'abakozi.

eng_prompt: In our company, we have implemented a flexible compensation structure to accommodate various job roles. This approach allows for different payment methods depending on the nature of the work performed.
lug_prompt: Mu kkampuni yaffe, tutaddewo enkola y'okuliyirira abantu ku mirimu egy'enjawulo. Enkola eno ekkiriza engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okusasula okusinziira ku kika ky'omulimu ogukoleddwa.
ach_prompt: I dul megwa, watye ki yub me culo dano pi tic mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat. Yoo man weko kitwero culu pi tic mapat-pat malubbe ki kit tic ma kitimo.
teo_prompt: Kokampunikosi, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuka atacio kanu aswamisinei nuegelegela. Ecamakinit epone lo loka aitac iponesio luegelegela kotupitete epone loka aswam.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ma alea, ama 'ba geri 'bani 'ba eyi ofezu azi ndundu eyi 'yezu. Geri 'di fe geri ofeta ndundu eyini ecozu azi 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma wura vusi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyaitu, tutaireho enkora y'okushashura abantu omu mirimo etari emwe n'emwe. Enkora egi neebaasisa emiringo y'okushashura etarikushushana kurugiirira aha mirimo erikukorwa.

eng_prompt: The hospital administration has announced a series of changes to its visitor policies. As a result, patients visitors' are going to be affected by the new guidelines.
lug_prompt: Abaddukanya eddwaliro balangiridde enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'abagenyi. N'ekyavaamu, abagenda okukyalira abalwadde bajja kukosebwa ebiragiro ebipya.
ach_prompt: Ludito me ot yat gutito aloka-loka mapol I cik ma doro lok kom welo. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma limo lutwo gubi nongo peko malube ki cik manyen.
teo_prompt: Alimo eyaitene lo adekis aijulanakineta nuipu toma ainapeta nuka ipejok. Kanuka ngun, epote aicoreta nuitetiak aitolitol ipejok lu adekak.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba arojo ni 'diyi azi ojata karakara eyi azita eyini 'ba emupi arojoa 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azita o'diru 'diyi nga mu 'ba omuru 'ba azoru 'diyi vu 'diyi bii ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'eirwariro, barangirire empindahinduka nyingi omu biragiro by'abagyenyi. N'ekyarugiremu, abagyenyi b'abarwaire nibaza kuteganisibwa ebiragiro ebisya.

eng_prompt: After months of freelancing and uncertainty, I've realized that I crave stability in my financial situation. It's become clear to me that I need a job that pays me a monthly salary.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga nkola nga nnakyewa era nga sirina bukakafu, nkitegedde nti nneegomba obutebenkevu mu mbeera yange ey'ebyensimbi. Kyantegeerekeka bulungi nti nneetaaga omulimu ogunsasula omusaala gwa buli mwezi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe ma abedo labongo lageng, aniang ni amito bedo ki kuc I lok me lim. Dong onen atyer kamaleng ni amito tic ma culu mucara me dwe ki dwe.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aswam bon keda amamus acamanar, ajeni eong ebe akoto eong ainapakina kotoma ojautene ka loka ikapun. Acamunit eong ebe akoto eong aswam na etaci eong eropit kangolilap.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza pirini azini e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma vutia, ma esu ra kini ale e'yo ma vile lonyi ma alia 'diyi ma ovu kililiru. Eri eca mani e'dazaru kini le ma ma esu azi 'bani ma ofele musara mba vusiri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okukora nk'ow'obusingye kandi ntarikuhamya,nyetegyereize ngu ninyenda obusingye omu by'entaasya yangye. Kinyetegyerezeire gye ngu ninyetenga omurimo ogurikumpa omushaara gwa buri kwezi.

eng_prompt: The company has decided to expand its team to meet growing demands. As a result, we need to carefully evaluate potential candidates for the position.
lug_prompt: Kampuni esazeewo okugaziya ttiimu yaayo okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera. N'ekivuddemu, twetaaga okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza abo abayinza okwesimbawo ku kifo ekyo.
ach_prompt: Dul ne omoko tamgi me medo luticgi wek ocob miti ma tye kamedde. Macalo adwogi ne, omyero wanen maber joo ma twero cung pi tic eni.
teo_prompt: Aseu ekampuni aiyatakin etimu ke kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo iyatasi. Kanuka ngun, ekot oni airereor ejok itunga luepedorete aibwo kanu adoketait kangin.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'di asi e'yo 'du 'ba erini azi ngazu 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, le ama ma one 'ba ecopi pa tupi pari 'da ma alea ra 'diyi geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni eshaziremu kwongyera aha tiimu yaayo okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo ebirikweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, twine kushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza abarikwenda kwesimbaho aha ntebe egyo.

eng_prompt: After receiving the notice of termination, I carefully reviewed the justification provided by my employer. I believe that the grounds cited do not adequately support their decision to end my contract.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna ekiwandiiko eky'okunzigya ku mulimu, nnasoma n'obwegendereza ensonga ezaaweebwa mukama wange. Nzikiriza nti ensonga eziweereddwa teziwagira bulungi kusalawo kwabwe okusazaamu endagaano yange.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo waraga me juko tic, aneno ki diro tyen lok ma ladit tica omiya. Atye ki niyee ni tyen lok ma kimiyo pe cwako moko tamgi me juko tic mega.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun alimoret naka alemario ka aswam, abu eong airereor akirot na ijaikini eong lokapolon aswam. Aomit eong ebe akiro nuelimoritai mam igangitos aseunetekec naka aitanang ekonturakit.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'bani ma drozu aziarisi ri esuzu 'bori ma vutia, ma la e'yo azi 'bapi mavileri ni fe 'diyi ma ale geri kililiru si. Ma a'ira kini e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi atini e'yo yini lezu ma vile otita aziniri atrizu ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga ekihandiiko ky'okubingwa, nkashwijuma n'obwegyendesereza enshonga ezi mukama wangye yaampaire. Ninyikiriza ngu enshonga ezirikugambwaho tizirikushagika kurungi encwamu yaabo y'okumaraho endagaano yangye.

eng_prompt: The economic impact of the pandemic has been felt across all sectors. As a result, many companies are facing unprecedented challenges.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna ebikoseddwa ekirwadde bbunansi biwuliddwa mu bitongole byonna. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni nnyingi zisanga okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma poto pa gemo eni okelo I tenge me lim I tenge weng. Macalo adwogi ne, kampuni mapol tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nuka adeka naka ekorona etereikina keda ikapun luka akwapin kere. Kanuka ngun, etereikina ikampunin luipu keda atiokisio nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo azo 'dezaniri 'yepi e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'ye i esele dria yi ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi omu by'entaasya bw'endwara ruranda nsi buhurirwe omu bitongore byona. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi nizitunga oburemeezi obutarabaireho.

eng_prompt: When making decisions about personnel changes, it's essential to consider the circumstances surrounding both hiring and firing. Fairness and transparency should guide the process to ensure that all employees are treated justly.
lug_prompt: Mu kukola okusalawo ku nkyukakyuka mu bakozi, kya mugaso okulowooza ku mbeera ezeetoolodde okupangisa n'okugoba. Obwenkanya n'obwerufu birina okulungamya enkola okulaba ng'abakozi bonna bayisibwa mu bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka moko tam I kom aloka loka pa lutic, pire tek tutwal me neno ngo matye katime ikare me coyo ki ryemo lutic. Tim matir ki ada omyero odor yoo me neno ni lutic weng kitero gi marom.
teo_prompt: Neiswamaunere aseununeta nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka eswamak, ejokuna aomoom nuikamunitos aitwasam keda airenge. Ibusakinit aica ka aica aitodun ebe eponio ayait eswamak kere ejok.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌduzu ꞌba yi ma ti ojazu, eri orodriru eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba yi sizu azini yi ofuzu ꞌdiyi ma dria. Le e'yo ada azini e'yo ada ma ce geri 'bani azi'ba dria eyi 'yezu trotro ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nookora encwamu y'okuhindura abakozi, n'eky'omugasho okureeba enshonga ezirikukwata aha kukora n'okubinga. Oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza bishemereire kwebembera enkora, okureeba ngu abakozi boona nibatwarwa omu muringo ogurikworeka oburinganiza.

eng_prompt: When managing a workforce, it's essential to maintain a fair and transparent process. Ensuring that all actions taken regarding employee performance are well-founded is crucial for organizational integrity.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oddukanya abakozi, kikulu okukuuma enkola ey'obwenkanya n'obwerufu. Okukakasa nti ebikolebwa byonna ebikwata ku nkola y'abakozi biba n'omusingi omulungi kya mugaso nnyo eri obwesimbu bw'ekitongole.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka doro lutic, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki yoo me tic matye atir. Neno ni jami weng ma kitimo malube ki tic pa lutic tye ki tyen lok matir obedo gin ma pire tek pi ber bedo pa dul.
teo_prompt: Neipugatere eswamak, ejok aidar ainapeta nu abeit. Aanyun ebe iboro kere lu iswamao kanu eswamae lo eswamak iswamaete ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ajokis naka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi ma driceza ma alea, eri orodriru geri kililiru azini e'yo ada be 'diyi ma tambazu. Nezu ra kini e'yo dria 'bani 'ye azi'ba eyi ma agata ma dria 'diyi e'yo kililiru 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru amuti eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Waaba noreberera abakozi, ni kikuru okukuratira engyenderwaho y'oburingaaniza n'oburingaaniza. Okureeba ngu ebikorwa byona ebirikukorwa aha bikwatireine n'okukora kurungi kw'abakozi, n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'obwesigwa bw'ekitongore.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the COVID-19 crisis, many businesses are reevaluating their workforce needs. As financial pressures mount, some employers are making difficult decisions regarding staffing levels.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bwa ssenyiga omukambwe, bizinensi nnyingi zikyekenneenya ebyetaago by'abakozi baazo. Ng'okunyigirizibwa kw'ebyensimbi kweyongera, abakozesa abamu bakola okusalawo okukaluba ku bikwata ku muwendo gw'abakozi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona, biacara mapol tye ka ngiyo tic pa luticgi. Kit ma can lim tye kamede kwede, wegi tic mukene tye ka moko tam matek I kom wel lutic.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adeka naka COVID-19, eutasi ibiasaran luipu airereor eipud loka eswamakakec. Kwape iyata ationis na ikapun, eutasi ikulepek aswam aiswamaun aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos adoketait na eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru COVID-19 niri ma e'yosi, tujari karakara eyi azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma ale andri dika. E'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, 'ba azi fe'baa 'diyi ma azi yi e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'du azi'ba eyi ma kalafe ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwa COVID-19, bizinesi nyingi ziriyo nizitereeza ebyetengo by'abakozi baazo. Obu oburemeezi bw'esente burikweyongyera, abakozesa abamwe bariyo nibakora encwamu egumire aha bikwatiraine n'omuhendo gw'abakozi.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the pandemic, many businesses have faced significant financial challenges. As a result, some employers are looking for ways to cut costs, leading to difficult decisions regarding their workforce.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi, bizinensi nnyingi zisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, abakozesa abamu banoonya engeri y'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya, ekivaako okusalawo okukaluba ku bakozi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona, biacara mapol gunongo peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, wegi tic mukene tye ka yenyo yoo me dwoko piny wel cente ma mite, ma oweko moko tam tek tutwal I kom luticgi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adeka naka ekorona, etereikina ibiasaran luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, emoete ikulepek aswam iponesio luka aitidisiar etiai loka ikapun lu itwasamao, ido eyangauni aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos eswamakakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, tujari karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ma azi yi geri ꞌbani ecozu aje ma omgbo esizu ꞌdiyi ndaria, ꞌdi fe yini eꞌyo ꞌduzu ewaru ꞌba yini azi ngazu ꞌdiyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi, bizinesi nyingi zitungire oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozesa abamwe nibaronda oburyo bw'okusharamu aha nshohoza, ekirikubareetera okusharamu kubi aha bikwatiraine n'abakozi baabo.

eng_prompt: The ongoing economic downturn has put immense pressure on many companies, leading to significant losses and uncertainty. As a result, businesses need some financial support from the government to survive this period.
lug_prompt: Okukendeera kw'ebyenfuna kugenda mu maaso kuteeka akazito ku kampuni nnyingi, ekiviiriddeko okufiirwa okw'amaanyi n'obutali bukakafu. N'ekivuddemu, bizinensi zeetaaga obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu gavumenti okusobola okuwangaala mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: Can lim ma tye kawot anyim oketo lyeto madit tutwal I kom dul mapat-pat ma oweko gurwenyo lim madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, biacara mito kony me lim kibot gamente me cung I kare man.
teo_prompt: Ationis na ikapun na elosi akonye einakinit ikampunin luipu aiyalongong naepol noi, ido eyangauni aibiror naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi ibiasaran agangat na ikapun kanejai apugan kanu angetakin apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni mupi drile ri 'ba okpo okporu amuti karakara eyi ma dria, e'yo fepi e'yo afa avizu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tualu e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, le tujari eyi ma esu atita robia ni engazu gamete vu eyini ani ecozu aa'zu ewu 'di ma alea ra beni.

eng_prompt: It's essential to create a supportive work environment that prioritizes well-being. After all, a healthy workforce is crucial for productivity and morale.

teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenejok aitolomun aiboisit na igangit aswam na isingarenit aijar najokan. Kabeit, eswamak lu engalete ejokuka kanu aswam ejok ka ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'bani angu azi ngazu atita fepi e'yo muke 'diyi 'bazu okporu ri edezu. E'yo dria si, azi'ba rua ala be 'diyi orodriru e'yo 'yezu azini adriza muke ri ni.

eng_prompt: After much consideration and weighing my options, I've realized that continuing operations is no longer viable. The challenges we've faced have made it clear that it's time for a change.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom noi keda aomoom nuipedori eong aswam, ajeni eong ebe mam bobo eong apedori ainyikokin aswam. Atiokisio nu itereikina oni kes itodunit ebe erai apak na aijulakin.

lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya omuwendo gwa ttiimu yo n'engeri gy'okwatamu abakozi bo.

eng_prompt: As the number of reported cases continues to rise, health officials are urging immediate action to protect public safety. One of the most effective measures is to limit large gatherings where the virus can easily spread.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde abaloopebwa gweyongera okulinnya, abakungu b'ebyobulamu basaba wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu okukuuma obukuumi bw'abantu. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okukola obulungi kwe kukendeeza ku nkungaana z'abantu mu bifo akawuka we kasobola okusaasaana amangu.

lgg_prompt: Mba otuza azini e'yo egaza ma vutia, eri a'i asizu i vile odekuari wudrikuru ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, eri lifu okporovururi ma alia kpere eli drusirisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera n'okutegyereza, ahamuheru akaakiira omwana we omu nsi. N'ekyarugiremu, ari omu kihuumuro ky'okuzaara mpaka omwaka ogurikwija.

lug_prompt: Ng'ennaku enkulu zisemberera, ssente ze nnatereka zikendeera mangu okusinga bwe nnali nsuubira. Kyeyongera okuba eky'amangu gye ndi okufuna omulimu.

lgg_prompt: O'du lifu eyini ecazu ogogo risi, robia mani 'ba 'diyi ma omgbo esi mbeleru aga mani ega ri ra. Eri eca curu'do mbeleru mani azi esuzu.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, I've finally proven my value to the team. The opportunity to continue my journey here is incredibly exciting!
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga nkola nnyo era nga nneewaayo, nkakasizza nti ndi wa mugaso eri ttiimu. Omukisa gw'okugenda mu maaso n'olugendo lwange wano gunyuma nnyo!

lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza mavileri ma vutia, ma ece asizu kini ma orodri amuti nde dri ci. Drileba mani ecozu aci mavileri muzu drile 'dia ri eri ayikoru tu
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, mperize kworeka omugasho gwangye omu tiimu. Omugisha gw'okugumizamu n'orugyendo rwangye aha nigushemeza munonga

eng_prompt: Understanding the legal framework surrounding employment is crucial for maintaining a fair workplace. Clear guidelines are essential for both parties to ensure compliance and mutual respect.

eng_prompt: To ensure compliance with company policies and legal standards, it is crucial for employers to have a clear understanding of their obligations. This understanding can be achieved by reviewing the relevant documentation related to each employee's role.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okugoberera amateeka ga kampuni n'omutindo gw'amateeka, kya mugaso nnyo eri abakozesa okutegeera obulungi obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe. Okutegeera kuno kusobola okutuukibwako nga twekenneenya ebiwandiiko ebikwatagana ebikwata ku mulimu gwa buli mukozi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutic tye ka lubu cik me kampuni ki rwom me cik, pire tek tutwal ni wegi tic omyero guniang tic gi maber. Niang man kitwero nongo ki ngiyo coc ma kwako tic pa lutic acel acel.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions, many industry leaders expressed their concerns about the government's latest economic policies. One major point of contention has been the newly implemented tax on imports.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakaggwa, abakulembeze b'amakolero bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku nkola za gavumenti ezisembyeyo mu by'enfuna. Ensonga emu enkulu ey'okusika omuguwa ebadde omusolo omupya oguteekebwa mu nkola ku bintu ebiyingizibwa mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela me biacara mapol gunyutu lworo gi I kom cik me lim ma gamente okatti kwede. Lok acel madit ma kelo apoka-poka obedo mucoro manyen ma kiketo iwi jami acata ma aa ki lobo ma woko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei pac, apotu engarenok luka ikampunin itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ikisila luitetiak luka apugan luka ikapun. Akirot adiope naepol noi naepeget ngesi esolo loitetet lo itegearitai kanu agwel iboro lu okinga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba okalamvu ni karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo gamete ni o'diru e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu agata gazu ri eri musoro o'diru 'bani 'ba afa engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho, abeebembezi b'amakorero bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'ebiragiro bya gavumenti ebirikukwata ahaby'entaasya. Ekintu kimwe ekirikukirayo kureetaho obutaikirizana, n'omushoro gw'ebintu ebirikuruga aheeru y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The choices made by management play a crucial role in shaping the workplace environment. As a result, every employee will feel the impact of these decisions.
lug_prompt: Okusalawo okukolebwa abaddukanya emirimu kukola kinene nnyo mu kukola embeera y'emirimu. N'ekinaavaamu, buli mukozi ajja kuwulira ebiva mu kusalawo kuno.
ach_prompt: Tam ma ludito tic gimoko konyo totwal I yubu kabedo me tic. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic weng biwinyo adwogi pa moko tam magi.
teo_prompt: Aseununeta nu iswamaete eyaitene iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun ejautene lo aswam. Kanuka ngun, epote eswamak kere apupokin atiokisio nuka aseununeta nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo driceza ni 'diyi pe 'diyi azi okporu nga angu azi ngazu 'diyi ma edeta ma alia. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba dria eyi nga e'yo peta 'dayi ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esu ra.

eng_prompt: Organizations must carefully consider their policies and practices regarding employee management. Any actions taken in the workplace can lead to potential legal challenges if not handled appropriately.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole birina okulowooza n'obwegendereza ku mateeka gaabyo n'enkola ezikwata ku nzirukanya y'abakozi. Ebikolwa byonna ebikolebwa mu bifo by'emirimu bisobola okuleetawo okusoomoozebwa mu mateeka singa tebikwatibwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Dule omyero gutam matut i kom cik gi malube ki doro tic pa lutic gi. Tic mo keken ma kitimo I gang tic twero kelo peko me cik ka pe kitimo maber.
teo_prompt: Ekot iriongeta aomoom ejok nuka ainapeta kec keda iponesiokec nuikamunitos eyaitene lo eswamak. Adio aswamisio nu iswamao kotoma aiboisit na aswam epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuka ikisila arai mam itemokinitai ejok.
lgg_prompt: Le amuti eyi ma ega e'yo azita eyini 'diyi ma dria geri eyini azi'ba eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ci 'bani 'ye pari azia 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco fe e'yo ewaru azita palaa 'diyi ma alia ra 'ba ka eyi 'ye geri kililiru si ku ria.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore bishemereire kuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza ahabirikukwata aha bakozi. Ekikorwa kyona ekirikukorwa aha mirimo nikibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu biragiro kyaba kitakozirweho kurungi.

eng_prompt: As businesses faced unprecedented challenges due to widespread lockdowns and reduced consumer demand, many were left with no choice but to reevaluate their financial strategies. In an effort to stay afloat, companies began implementing drastic measures to manage their operating costs.
lug_prompt: Nga bizinensi zisanga okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo olw'omuggalo n'obwetaavu bw'abaguzi okukendeera, bangi baalekebwa nga tebalina kyakukola okuggyako okuddamu okwetegereza enkola zaabwe ez'ensimbi. Mu kaweefube w'okusigala ku mutindo, amakampuni gaatandika okussa mu nkola enkola ez'amaanyi okusobola okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya yaago.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacara tye ka nongo peko mapol ma peya otimme pi loro piny ki dwoko piny miti pa luwil, polgi odong labongo gin mo me atima mapat ki ngiyo kit me tic ki limgi. I tute matek me medde anyim, dul mapat-pat gucako tic ki yoo mapat-pat me doro wel cente ma gitiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina ibiasaran keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kanuka agolokinio naka akwap keda aitidisiar eipuda loka agwelak, aponi kojalakinai luipu komamete keda aseunet kilema airereor iponesiokec luka ikapun. Okpo 'bazu yi ma dria, amuti e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye robia yini azi ngazuri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obu bizinesi zaabaire nizitunga oburemeezi obutarikubaho ahabw'okukumiirirwa hamwe n'okukyendera kw'ebyetaago by'abaguzi, baingi bakasigara bataine ky'okukora, okwihaho okushwijuma oburyo bwabo bw'esente. Omu kaweefube w'okugumizamu, kampuni zikatandika kutaho oburyo bw'amaani bw'okureeberera enshohoza yaazo.

eng_prompt: As communities prepared for their annual festivals and markets, excitement filled the air. However, unforeseen challenges loomed on the horizon.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu byetegekera ebikujjuko byabwe eby'omwaka n'obutale, essanyu lyajjula empewo. Newankubadde, okusoomoozebwa okuteeberezebwa kwajja mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka yubbe pi kwer ki cuk ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, yomcwiny obedo tye. Kadi bed kumeno, peko mapol obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neautatar itunga aitemonokin kanuka ipucito kec luka ekaru keda isokonin, apol noi aiyalama. Konye, apotu atiokisio nu mam ewanyunitai kopotu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini otuta 'yeria omu eyini azini cu eyini eli vusi 'diyini, ayiko ga angu eyi ma alea tre. Kani si, e'yo ewaru 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi emu drile.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu baabaire nibeteekateekyera emikoro yaabo eya buri mwaka hamwe n'obutare, abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga. Kwonka, hariho oburemeezi obubaire butarikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: Health officials are urging the public to take precautions as the virus continues to spread rapidly. In light of the increasing number of cases, safety measures have been put in place.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abantu okwegendereza kubanga akawuka kasigala kasaasaana mangu. Okusinziira ku muwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera, enkola z'obukuumi ziteekeddwawo.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka lego lwak me gwoke pien kwidi tye ka nya oyot-oyot tutwal. Pi wel dano matye ka nongo two matye kamede, kiketo yoo me gwokke.
teo_prompt: Isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga aidar acoa naarai euta adeka aisiarakin katipet. Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luedekasi ekorona, aponi ibwaikinai iwaitin lu ayuara.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ai e'yo eyi ma tambazu a'dusikuni azo korona niri ni i ere i okposi. Kalafe 'ba azo be 'diyi ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba o'ba e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu okwerinda ahabwokuba akakooko nikagumizamu kujanjaara juba. Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire, hatirweho oburyo bw'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, maintaining customer trust is essential for long-term success. Therefore, businesses must implement fair pricing strategies to ensure consumer confidence.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akalimu okuvuganya, okukuuma obwesige bwa bakasitoma kya mugaso mu buwanguzi obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu. N'olw'ekyo, bizinensi zirina okussa mu nkola enkola z'ebbeeyi ey'obwenkanya okusobola okukakasa obwesige bw'abaguzi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, gwoko gen pa luwil pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc pi kare malac. Pi meno, biacara omyero guket yub me wilo jami i wel matir wek luwil gubed ki tek cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kosokoni loka lolo loepol abolobol, aidar amunokina naka agwelak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka apak naepol. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit ibiasaran aitegear ainapeta nuka etiai loajokan kanu awanyun ebe emunokina agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Cuu andruri ma alia baka seza ma alia, asi'baza 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria ri ma tambaza eri orodriru drile suza sawa ezu ri ni. Ka'dini, le tujari eyi ma 'ba geri kililiru eyini ecozu aje jezu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma asi 'bazu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, okurinda obwesigye bwa bakasitoma n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'obwire bureingwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, abashuubuzi bashemereire kuta omu nkora enkora nungi y'okushorooza emihendo, kugira ngu abaguzi bagire obwesigye.

eng_prompt: In today's digital landscape, the protection of sensitive information has become increasingly critical. Organizations must prioritize safeguarding their data to prevent unauthorized access and potential breaches.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, okukuuma obubaka obw'ekyama kyeyongedde okuba eky'omugaso. Ebitongole birina okukulembeza okukuuma obubaka bwabyo okutangira okuyingira okutali kukkirizibwa n'okumenya amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, gwoko ngec ma pire tek dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Dule omyero guket gwoko tic gi obed gin ma pire tek tutwal pi gengo donyo pa dano ma pe ki twero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak kana naka elago, ejokuna noi ayuwar akiro nuka aiyeyea. Ekot iriongeta aisingarenit ayuwar akiro kec tetere mam itunga lu mam ecamakitai epedorete adolokin.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo 'bani 'ba ma dria 'diyi ma tambazu ri eca curu'do orodriru tu. Le amuti eyi ma 'ba e'yo eyi ma e'yo eyi ma tambazu ri okporu eyini ani e'yo 'ba eyini ani eyi esuzu ku 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'eby'empurizagana, okurinda amakuru g'ekihama nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Ebitongore bishemereire kwebembeza okurinda ebihandiiko byabyo, okubaasa kuzibira abantu abatarikwikirizibwa kubitunga n'okubihenda.

eng_prompt: Before initiating any research project, it is crucial to establish ethical guidelines to protect participants' rights. One of the fundamental principles in this process is ensuring that individuals are fully informed and agree to share their information.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika pulojekiti yonna ey'okunoonyereza, kya mugaso okuteekawo ebiragiro by'empisa okukuuma eddembe ly'abeetabamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno kwe kukakasa nti abantu bamanyisibwa mu bujjuvu era bakkiriziganya okugabana obubaka bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icako yub me kwed mo keken, pire tek tutwal me keto cik me gwoko twero pa dano. Cik acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo neno ni dano weng tye ki ngec muromo dok giye poko ngec gi.
teo_prompt: Erongo egeuna aitolot adiopurojekt loka aingic, ejokuna aitolomun ainapeta nuka ayuarite apedorosio nuka itunga. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga keda akiro ka acamanar aimor akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di e'doni otita e'yo vuti ondazani 'diyi e'do ku, eri orodriru e'yo azita ni 'diyi sizu drilemgbo 'ba fi'ba 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba eyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma dria ci dika eyi a'i e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire purogyekiti y'okucondooza yoona, n'eky'omugasho okutaho engyenderwaho y'okurinda obugabe bw'abagiiremu. Emwe aha misingye y'omugasho omu nkora egi n'okureeba ngu abantu boona bamanyisibwa kandi bakaikiriza kugabana amakuru gaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health crises and the growing burden of preventable diseases, it has become increasingly clear that a strong focus on health initiatives is essential. Ensuring the well-being of citizens not only improves quality of life but also strengthens the economy and social stability.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bizibu by'ebyobulamu ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'omugugu ogweyongera ogw'endwadde eziziyizibwa, kyeyoleka bulungi nti okufaayo ennyo ku nteekateeka z'ebyobulamu kya mugaso. Okukakasa obulungi bwa bannansi tekikoma ku kutumbula mutindo gw'obulamu naye era kinyweza ebyenfuna n'obutebenkevu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom ma otimme cokcok-ki ki peko me two mapat-pat matwero gengo, nen atyer kamaleng ni keto cwiny I kom yub me yot-kom pire tek tutwal. Neno ni kwo pa anywali tye maber pe ilo malo rwom me kwo keken ento bene ilo malo rwom me lim ki ber bedo ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka angaleu keda aiyatakin naka adekasinei nuepedorio aitikitik, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit apodokinit noi nuka angaleu. Aitogogong aijar naka itunga mam itojokari aijar naka itunga bon konye itojokari eiriago keda ainapakina naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yo si, eca e'da kini e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu okporu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru. Afa kari anzi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma tambazu ri ni lu geri eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu tualu e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiho obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'endwara ezirikubaasa kwetantarwa, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu okuta amaani omu mirimo y'eby'amagara n'eky'omugasho. Okureeba ngu abatuuragye nibatuura gye tikirikumaraho kutunguura omutindo gw'emituurire yaabo, kureka nikongyera ahaby'entaasya n'obutebekana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In the healthcare industry, maintaining trust is essential for effective patient care. Therefore, strict protocols are in place to ensure that sensitive information is protected.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu, okukuuma obwesige kya mugaso mu kulabirira abalwadde obulungi. N'olw'ekyo, amateeka amakakali gateekeddwawo okukakasa nti obubaka obw'ekyama bukuumibwa.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, gwoko gen pire tek tutwal pi gwoko lutwo maber. Pi meno, ki keto cik matek tutwal me neno ni ki gwoko ngec ma mite pi dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okampuni loka angaleu, ejok aidar amuno kanu aidar adekak ejok. Kanuka ngun, ejai ainapeta nuepolok kanu awanyun ebe eyuwaritai akiro nu aiyeyea.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu alataniri ma alia, asi'baza ma ta mbaza eri orodriru 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru. Ka'dini, 'ba o'ba azita okporu 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba o'duko azi okporu 'diyi ma ta mba.

eng_prompt: The community has been buzzing with discussions about potential changes to land ownership regulations. Many residents are anxious to learn more about the implications of these upcoming developments.
lug_prompt: Abantu babadde bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkyukakyuka eziyinza okukolebwa mu mateeka g'obwannannyini ku ttaka. Abatuuze bangi beesunga okumanya ebisingawo ku biki ebiyinza okuva mu nkulaakulana zino ezigenda okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lok I kom aloka-loka matye I cik makwako ngom. Lutedero mapol tye ki miti me pwonyo jami mapol I kom adwogi me dongo lobo matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga aineranar nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuikamunitos alupok. Ekotosi itunga luipu noi aisisia nuipu nuikamunitos atiokisio nu ebeit atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi ebi e'yo nze e'yo ojata ecopi 'yepi azita nyaku ma e'ipi eyini 'diyi ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi le saaru e'yo onizu e'yo angu ezoma ni emupi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibagamba aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho omu biragiro by'obwannannyini ahaitaka. Abatuuragye baingi baine ekihika ky'okumanya ebirikukwata aha ntunguuka ezirikwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: Due to the nature of the situation, we must handle all communications with the utmost care. Any disclosure could have serious implications for those involved.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera eriwo, tulina okukwata ebyempuliziganya byonna n'obwegendereza. Okubikkula kwonna kuyinza okuba n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Pi kit ma jami tye kwede, omyero water lok weng ki gwok madit tutwal. Nyuto lok mo keken twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom joo matye I lok ne.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lo ejaas, ekot oni aitikitik einer keda acoa naepol noi. Aitijenaret adio epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di ma wura vurisi, le ama ma 'ye e'yo nzeza dria 'diyi ma aza kililiru. E'yo azi 'bani e'dazuri eco e'yo onzi eji 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera eriho, twine kukora aha by'empurizagana n'obwegyendesereza. Okushoborora kwona nikubaasa kureetaho ebizibu by'amaani ahari abo abarikukwejumbamu.

eng_prompt: In the current rental market, many tenants are facing financial challenges and uncertainties. Understanding their situation can foster a more positive landlord-tenant relationship.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'okupangisa akaliwo kati, abapangisa bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa mu by'ensimbi n'obutali bukakafu. Okutegeera embeera yaabwe kisobola okutumbula enkolagana ennungi wakati w'abapangisa ne bannannyini mayumba.
ach_prompt: I cuk me pango ot matye kombedi, lupang ot mapol gitye ka nongo peko me lim. Niang peko gi twero weko winye ikin wegi odi ki lupang ot bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osokoni loka aipagis itogoi, ejaasi epagisak luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Ajenun ejautene kec epedori aitopolor eidicane loajokan kiding ikulepek itogoi keda epagisak.
lgg_prompt: Cuu 'di ma alea, 'ba pangisa ru 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi be. E'yo yini 'diyi vazu ri eco fe 'ba angu e'ipiru 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea aa'ta kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'obwahati k'okupangisa, abapangisa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente. Okwetegyereza embeera yaabo nikibaasa kureetaho enkoragana nungi ahagati yaabo n'abapangisa.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain a positive relationship and avoid potential disputes, it is crucial for tenants to understand their financial responsibilities. Timely payments are essential for ensuring that both parties fulfill their obligations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma enkolagana ennungi n'okwewala enkaayana eziyinza okubaawo, kya mugaso abapangisa okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'ensimbi. Okusasula mu budde kya mugaso okukakasa nti enjuyi zombi zituukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwazo.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko wat maber ki gengo tele matwero bedo tye, pire tek tutwal ki lupang ot me niang tic gi me lim. Culu cente ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal me neno ni joo aryo weng gucobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar eidicane loajokan kosodete aitikitik ingungeta, ejokuna noi itunga lu epagisak amisiikin nuka ikapun kec. Atacio kotoma apak ejok kanu awanyun ebe itunga kere itodolikinete aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu aa'ta muke ri ma ta mbazu azini ngiringiri ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi atrizu, eri orodriru 'ba pangisa ru 'diyi ni eyi ma e'yo robia ma dria 'diyi vazu. Ofeta sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba iri 'diyi nga azi yini 'diyi 'ye ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omukago murungi n'okwetantara entongane ezirikubaasa kubaho, nikirungi abapangisa kwetegyereza obujunanizibwa bwabo omu by'esente. Okushashura omu bwire n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu enjuyi zombi zihikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwazo.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are facing financial hardships due to job losses and reduced income caused by the coronavirus pandemic. As a result, the ability of tenants to meet their rental obligations has been significantly impacted.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi boolekaganye n'ebizibu by'ensimbi olw'okufiirwa emirimu n'okukendeera kw'enyingiza olw'ekirwadde bbunansi eky'akawuka ka kolona. N'ekivuddemu, obusobozi bw'abapangisa okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'obupangisa bukoseddwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ka nongo peko me lim pi rwenyo ticgi ki dwogo piny pa limgi pi peko me two korona. Macalo adwogi ne, kero pa lupang ot me cobo miti gi me pango ot oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaas itunga luipu keda atiokisio nu ikapun kanu atwaniar aswamisinei keda ikapun lu ikidioko kanuka adeka naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, abu apedor naka epagisak aitodolikin ikapunukec luka aipagisa itolitol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu e'yo eyini azi avizu azini robia esuza ma omgbo esizu azo korona niri ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba pangisa ru 'diyi ma okpo ecozu e'yo yini 'ba pangisa ru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu ri eza i ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi baine oburemeezi bw'esente ahabw'okufeerwa emirimo yaabo hamwe n'okutuubya aha ntaatsya yaabo ahabw'oburwaire bwa korona. N'ekyarugiremu, obushoboorozi bw'abapangisa kuhikiiriza obujunaanizibwa bwabo bw'okupangisa, bukosebwa munonga.

eng_prompt: As the administration prepares for the upcoming press conference, officials are focusing on more pressing matters. Given the current political climate, certain topics are being prioritized over others.
lug_prompt: Nga abakulembeze beetegekera olukungaana lwa bannamawulire olujja, abakungu beemalira ku nsonga endala ez'amangu. Okusinziira ku mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eriwo kati, ensonga ezimu zikulemberwa okusinga endala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lutela tye ka yubbe pi lok ki luco lok angeya matye kabino anyim, lutic tye ka keto cwinygi I kom jami mapigi tego. Ma lubbe ki kit ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye kwede kombedi, lok mukene kitye kaketo gi macalo gin ma pire tek loyo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekapakina eyaitene kanuka airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto, eutasi eswamak aswam akiro nuepolok noi. Katupitos ejautene loka epolitikis loakwana, ejai akiro ace nuepolok noi adepar ace.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba eyi oturia otita imbatani 'ba osisia ni 'diyi ni emuzu ri ni otuzu, azi'ba eyi asi 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo politiki ni curu'do 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba e'yo azi 'diyi 'du okporu aga azi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi ku barikweteekateekyera orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru orurikwija, abakuru nibata omutima aha nshonga z'amaani. Ahabw'embeera y'eby'obutegyeki eriho hati, enshonga ezimwe nizitwarwa nka nkuru kukira ezindi.

eng_prompt: In many rental markets, tenants often find themselves at a disadvantage due to unfair practices. As a result, it is crucial to establish safeguards that ensure their rights are upheld.
lug_prompt: Mu butale bw'okupangisa bungi, abapangisa batera okwesanga mu buzibu olw'ebikolwa ebitali bya bwenkanya. N'ekivuddemu, kya mugaso okuteekawo obukuumi okukakasa nti eddembe lyabwe likuumibwa.
ach_prompt: I cuk mapol me pango ot, lupang ot ipol kare nongo peko pi tim ma pe ber. Macalo adwogi ne, pire tek tutwal me keto yoo me gwoko twero gi.
