ach_prompt: Two ma opoto ni obalo kwo pa dano mapol tutwalle jo ma gibedo iteng gudi. Ikare ma citi tye ka loro piny, pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lutino ma gibedo iteng gudi ma pe gitwero nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Eyataki adeka naka ekorona atiokisio nu ejaas igurupun lu mam epedoritos aswam kacut ngul lu iboyete korotin. Kwape ibwaikinete isitei agolokinio naka akwap, epolok noi aitemokin atiokisio nuka idwe lu orotin lumam edumunenete iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri fe e'yo ewaru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea ku 'diyini esu tualu 'ba aa'pi nzila dria 'diyi pie. Aku ambo eyini e'yo angu ti opiza ni 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea risi, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani le mbeleru anzi nyiri nzila dria 'diyi ma aza kozu eyini ani afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu ku 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi eyongyeire kureetaho oburemeezi omu bantu abatarikwebaasa na munonga abo abarikutuura aha nguuto. Obu endembo zirikureetaho emihingo, n'eky'omugasho kukora ahabyetaago by'abaana b'ahanguuto abatarikuhikwaho ebintu by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: It's important for companies to establish clear policies regarding employee health and well-being. Understanding employee rights can help maintain a productive and supportive work environment.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso kkampuni okuteekawo amateeka amategeerekeka ku byobulamu n'obulamu bw'abakozi. Okutegeera eddembe ly'abakozi kiyinza okuyamba okukuuma embeera y'emirimu ennungi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki dul mapat-pat me keto cik matye malubbe ki yot-kom pa luticgi. Niang twero pa lutic twero weko tic bedo maber dok ma yomo cwiny lutic.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi ikampunin aitolomun ainapeta nuikamunitos angaleu keda aijar naka eswamak. Amisiikin apedorosio nuka eswamak ingarakini aidar aiboisit na iswamai ejok.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru amuti eyini azita kililiru 'diyi sizu azi'ba eyi ma rua ala azini aa'ta muke ri ma dria. E'yo drilemgbo 'ba azia 'diyiniri vazu ri eco fe angu azi ngazu orodriru azini atita fepi 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kampuni kutaho ebiragiro ebirikwetegyerezibwa kurungi ebirikukwata aha magara g'abakozi. Okwetegyereza obugabe bw'abakozi nikibaasa kuhwera omukureetaho embeera nungi aha mirimo.

eng_prompt: In today's challenging economic climate, many entrepreneurs are struggling to keep their operations afloat. Access to funding can be crucial for their survival and growth.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna enzibu leero, abasuubuzi bangi balwana okukuuma emirimu gyabwe nga gitambula. Okufuna ensimbi kiyinza okuba eky'omugaso eri okuwangaala kwabwe n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim me kare-ni, lutim biacara mapol tye ka tute matek me medde ki ticgi. Nongo kony me lim twero bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi kwo gi ki dongo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun, eutasi agwelanarak luipu ainingosit aidar aswamukec. Adumunun ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar kec keda apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ma alia, 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri ci azi yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu drile. E'yo robia esuzu ri eri orodriru eyini aa'zu edriru azini zozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera y'eby'entaasya erizooba erimu oburemeezi, abashubuzi baingi nibarwana kurinda emirimo yaabo. Okutunga esente nikibaasa kuba eky'omugasho aha magara gaabo n'entunguuka yaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health guidelines, employees who are required to quarantine must inform their supervisors of their situation. This ensures that proper protocols are followed regarding their absence.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mateeka g'ebyobulamu agaakateekebwawo, abakozi abeetaagibwa okubeera mu kalantiini bateekeddwa okutegeeza abakulira emirimu gyabwe ku mbeera yaabwe. Kino kikakasa nti emitendera emituufu gigobererwa ku bikwata ku butabaawo bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki cik me yot kom ma okatti cokcok-ki, lutic ma omyero gubed kengi omyero gu niang ludito ticgi i kom ngo matye katimme. Man weko ki lubu cik makwako bedo peke gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aicoreta nuitetiak nuka angaleu, ibusakinit eswamak lu ekotoi ajaut okalitini aitijenikin lukapolok kec nuikamunitos ejautenekec. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe etupakinio ainapeta nuikamunitos amamut kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, le azi'ba 'bani lele aa'zu a'dule 'diyi ma lu 'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi dri e'yo eyi ma dria ra. Diri ne ra kini 'ba azita kililiru 'diyi ma vuti obi e'yo eyini aa'zu yo ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira ahabiragiro by'ebyamagara, abakozi abarikwetengwa omu karantiini, bashemereire kumanyisa abarikubareeberera embeera yaabo. Eki nikyoreka ngu engyenderwaho nungi nizikuratirwa aha bikwatiraine n'obutabaho bwabo.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent health guidelines, companies are encouraged to implement remote work policies. This approach ensures that business operations continue smoothly during the quarantine period.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ndagiriro z'ebyobulamu ezaakaggwa, amakampuni gakubirizibwa okussa mu nkola enkola z'okukolera ewala. Enkola eno ekakasa nti emirimu gya bizinensi gigenda mu maaso bulungi mu kiseera kya kalantiini.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki cik me yot kom ma okatti cokcok-ki, kicuku cwiny dul mapat-pat me keto cik me tic ki kama bor itic. Yoo man weko biacara woto maber ikare me two korona.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aicoreta nuitetiak nuka angeleu, isinyikokitai ikampunin aitegear ainapeta nuka aswam kokinga. Ewai lo ijaikit agwelanar aswam ejok kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azita o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, 'ba eka amuti yi azita azi ngazu angu zozu 'diyi 'bazu. Geri 'di ni ne ra kini tujari eyi mu drile kililiru sa'wa 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu a'dule ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira ahabiragiro by'ebyamagara ebyahwireho, kampuni nizihigwa kuta omu nkora engyenderwaho y'okukorera hare. Enkora egi nereeba ngu eby'obushubuzi bigumizamu kurungi omu bwire bwa karantiini.

eng_prompt: In many jurisdictions, labor laws mandate that employees must be compensated for their time, regardless of the availability of work. This ensures that workers are protected from sudden income loss due to unforeseen circumstances.
lug_prompt: Mu buyinza bungi, amateeka g'abakozi galagira nti abakozi balina okuliyirirwa obudde bwabwe, awatali kufaayo ku kubeerawo kw'emirimu. Kino kikakasa nti abakozi bakuumibwa okuva ku kufiirwa ensimbi olw'embeera etasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: I twero mapol, cik me tic mito ni myero ki cul lutic pi kare gi, labongo paro pi tic matye. Man weko lutic bedo agwoka i kom rweny pa limgi pi peko ma poto atura.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, ekotosi ikisila luka eswamak ebe ibusakinit aitac eswamak kanuka apak kec, araida ejaasi kesi keda aswam. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe eyuaritai eswamak kotoma atwaniar ikapunukec kanuka iboro lumam kesi ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, azita azi'ba eyini 'diyi le 'ba ma ofe azi'ba eyi sa'wa eyini 'diyi si, azi eyini aa'zu ci ri ma talasi. Di ni fe azi'ba eyini aa'zu ageitema be e'yo eyini robia avizu mbeleru e'yo eyini nile ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu matware maingi, ebiragiro by'abakozi nibiragiira ngu abakozi bashemereire kushashurirwa ahabw'obwire bwabo, oihireho ngu hariho omurimo. Eki nikyoreka ngu abakozi nibarindwa okufeerwa entaasya yaabo ahabw'ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: A productive workplace relies on clear expectations and responsibilities for each team member. To achieve this, employers must actively manage workloads and assignments.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ky'emirimu ekirungi kyesigama ku biruubirwa n'obuvunaanyizibwa obutangaavu eri buli mmemba wa ttiimu. Okutuukiriza kino, abakozesa bateekeddwa okuddukanya obulungi emirimu n'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Kabedo me tic maber jenge I kom jami ma mite ki tic pa lamemba acel-acel me dul tic. Me cobo man, wegi tic omyero gutii matek me doro tic gi.
teo_prompt: Aiboisit na eswamae lo ejok erai na ebeitor itunga kere luka etimu aswam. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekot ikulepek aswam apodokinit aswam keda aswam.
lgg_prompt: Pari azi ngazu orodriru ri ni asi'ba e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria kililiru 'diyi ma dria azini azi 'ba dria amuti 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ma nga azi ꞌba yini ꞌdiyi ma dria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'okukoreramu ogurikukora gye nigwegamira aha bigyendererwa ebirikwetegyerezibwa hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa bwa buri memba wa tiimu. Okuhikiiriza eki, abakozesa bashemereire kukora kurungi emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy discussion about work-life balance and personal circumstances, the team gathered to address their concerns. They weighed the pros and cons of implementing a policy for unpaid leave.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala ebbanga eddene ku ngeri y'okutebenkezaamu obulamu n'emirimu n'embeera z'omuntu ku bubwe, ttiimu yakungaana okukola ku nsonga zaabwe. Baapima ebirungi n'ebibi by'okussa mu nkola enkola y'oluwummula olutasasulwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok pi kare malac I kom rwate I kin tic ki kwo ki kwo pa dano, joo ne gugure me lok I kom peko gi. Gupimo ber ki marac me keto cik me yweyo labongo cul I tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi nuikamunitos aswam keda aijar keda ejautene lo itunganan, apotu itunga lu atukokinos kanu aitemitem atiokisio kec. Apotu kesi ipikakisi ajokis keda nuarokok nuka aitegear ainapeta nuka aiyeng na mam etacio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza ezu 'bori ma vutia e'yo aa'zu azi be, aa'zu idri be, dika e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie, amuti 'da tra eyi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi ega e'yo kililiru azini onzi 'bani lezu 'ba ma 'du lifu musara kokoru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura kumara obwire buraingwa aha nshonga y'okukoresa gye amagara gaabo n'emirimo yaabo hamwe n'embeera yaabo, tiimu ekateerana kukora aha nshonga zaabo. Bakacondooza aha birungi n'ebibi by'okutaho ebiragiro by'ekihuumuro ekitarikushashurwa.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, companies must prioritize fair treatment of their workforce. Ensuring that employees receive proper compensation is essential for maintaining a positive reputation and fostering goodwill.
lug_prompt: Mu kuvuganya kw'omulembe guno ku mirimu, amakampuni galina okukulembeza okuyisa abakozi baago mu ngeri ey'obwenkanya. Okukakasa nti abakozi bafuna empeera entuufu kya mugaso mu kukuuma erinnya eddungi n'okutumbula erinnya eddungi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek pi nongo tic, dul mapat-pat omyero gubed ki miti me tero luticgi i yo maber. Neno ni lutic nongo cul maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko nying maber ki dongo cwiny me ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka aswamisinei, ekot ikampunin aitapatan eswamakakec ejok. Aanyun ebe edumunenete eswamak ikapun luedolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ekiror loajokan ka aitopolorite eswamae loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni curu'do azi tia 'diyi ma alia, le amuti eyi ma 'du e'yo 'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi 'yezu kililiru ri oko. E'yo 'bani azi'ba eyi ma arioti ofezu kililiru ri eri orodriru eyi ma ru ma ta mbazu azini eyi ma eselea 'ba eyini aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'empaka z'emirimo, kampuni zishemereire kutwara abakozi baabo omu muringo ogurikworeka oburinganiza. Okureeba ngu abakozi bashashurwa kurungi, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eiziina ryabo n'okureetaho emicwe mirungi.

eng_prompt: It is essential to maintain transparency and open communication within the workplace. To ensure fairness and allow for proper planning, employees should be notified before the termination of their contracts.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okukuuma obwerufu n'empuliziganya ennungi mu bifo by'emirimu. Okukakasa obwenkanya n'okusobozesa enteekateeka ennungi, abakozi balina okutegeezebwa nga endagaano zaabwe tezinnasazibwamu.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me bedo ki ada ki lok maber ikin lutic. Me neno ni jami weng tye marom dok kiyubu maber, omyero ki niang lutic mapwod pe ki juko ticgi.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar aica ka einer kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ka aitemonokin ejok, ekot aitijenikino eswamak eringa elemar aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo nzeza kililiru azini ngmboru ri ma ta mbazu pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alia. Le 'ba ma lu azi'ba eyini e'yo kililiru azini otuta kililiru 'yezu, 'ba ma lu eyidri e'yo de nga po'di 'ba atri eyi ma kontrakiti ku.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okugira amazima n'empurizagana nungi aha mirimo. Okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza n'okuteekateekyera kurungi, abakozi bashemereire kumanyisibwa batakabemereize emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In times of financial distress, companies must carefully evaluate their options to ensure survival. One critical consideration is whether to retain employees or proceed with layoffs.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu bw'ensimbi, amakampuni galina okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza eby'okukola okusobola okuwonawo. Ekintu ekikulu eky'okulowoozaako kwe kusigaza abakozi oba okugenda mu maaso n'okubagoba.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me lim, dul mapat-pat omyero otam matut i kom ngo ma omyero gutim wek gubed tye. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal ma omyero watam iye en aye kace omyero wagwok lutic onyo wa ryem gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko nuka ikapun, ekot ikampunin airereor nu ekotosi kesi aswam kanu awanyun ebe epedorete kesi aijar. Ibore yenibusakinit aomoom ngesi ainyikokin eswamak arai bo alemar kes.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyisi, le amuti eyi ma ega e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria kililiru eyini ani aa'zu edriru beni. E'yo azi okporu 'bani ega ri azi'ba eyi ma ta mbazu kani ku eyi drozu azi ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'esente, kampuni zishemereire kushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebirikubaasa kubaho. Ekikuru munonga n'okureeba ngu abakozi bagumeho nainga bagume nibabingwa.

eng_prompt: The economic impact of the pandemic has been devastating for many industries. As a result, numerous companies have struggled to stay afloat amidst the ongoing challenges.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna ebikoseddwa ekirwadde bbunansi bikosezza nnyo amakolero mangi. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni nnyingi zifunye obuzibu okusigala ku mutindo wakati mu kusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma two korona okelo I kom biacara mapol okelo peko madit tutwal I tenge me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, kampuni mapol tye ka tute matek me medde ki tic kadi bed ni peko tye ka time.
teo_prompt: Ationis na ikapun na adeka erai naepol noi kama ejaasi ikampunin luipu. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit ikampunin luipu asalakite aijar kotoma atiokisio nu elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo azo 'dezaniri bipi e'yo robiani 'diyi eza okalamvu karakara yi ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi e'bi dri ci aa'zu e'yo ewaru mupi drile 'diyi ma talasi.

eng_prompt: During challenging times, the well-being of employees should be a top priority for companies. One way to support their workforce is by offering flexible leave options.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, obulamu obulungi bw'abakozi bulina okubeera ekintu ekikulu mu kampuni. Engeri emu ey'okuyambamu abakozi baabwe kwe kubawa oluwummula olukyusakyusa.

lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, le azi'ba eyi ma aa muke ri ma aa e'yo okporu amuti eyini. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu atita fezu 'ba yini azi ngazu 'diyi dri ri lezu drileba lifu ni 'diyi fezu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent proposal by management, the union representatives gathered to discuss their concerns. They emphasized the importance of protecting workers' rights and maintaining fair compensation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekiteeso ky'abaddukanya emirimu gyebuvuddeko awo, abakiise b'ekibiina baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga zaabwe. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukuuma eddembe ly'abakozi n'okusigala nga baliyirirwa mu bwenkanya.

teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin aomisioit naka eyaitene, apotu abwoikinitok luka atukot ngin kiriamunos kanu aitemitem akiro kec. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka ayuarite apedorosio nuka eswamak keda aitac kes ejok.

nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu ekiteeso ky'abebembezi, abajwekyerwa b'ekibiina bakateerana kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda obugabe bw'abakozi n'okureeba ngu bashashurwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In today's global workforce, it's essential to promote fairness and equality among all employees. Disparities in pay based on geographic origin can lead to dissatisfaction and hinder collaboration.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'abakozi eya leero, kikulu nnyo okutumbula obwenkanya n'okwenkanankana mu bakozi bonna. Enjawulo mu kusasulwa okusinziira ku nsi omuntu gy'ava eyinza okuleetawo obutali bumativu n'okulemesa enkolagana.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me tic me wilobo ma ite kare ni, pire tek tutwal me neno ni lutic weng tye marom. Apoka-poka me mucara malubbe ki kabedo ma aa ki iye twero kelo cwer cwiny ki gengo winye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam naka akwap kere, ejok aitopolorite nuka asipokina keda apedorosio nuka eswamak kere. Atiaketait na atacio kotupitete aiboisit na elomunit epedori ayangaun amamut aiyalama ka aitikitik aiswamanara.

eng_prompt: Effective water management is crucial for crop growth and sustainability. One of the key methods to ensure plants receive adequate moisture is through irrigation.
lug_prompt: Enkwata y'amazzi ennungi ya mugaso nnyo eri okukula kw'ebirime n'okuwangaala. Engeri emu enkulu ey'okukakasa nti ebimera bifuna ennyonta emala kwe kufukirira.
ach_prompt: Tic ki pii maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa cam ki dongo pa jami apita. Yo acel ma pire tek me neno ni kodi tye ka nongo pii ma oromo en aye me kiro pii.
teo_prompt: Aidar akipi ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka iraan. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin luepedorete aanyun ebe edumunenete iraan akipi ejok erai aicokicok akipi.

nyn_prompt: Okukoresa gye amaizi n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kw'ebihingirwe. Omuringo gumwe omukuru gw'okureeba ngu ebihingirwe bitunga amaizi agarikumara, n'okwitirira.

eng_prompt: Investing in agricultural practices and technologies can lead to increased food production and economic growth. As communities become more self-sufficient, they can experience a boost in overall well-being and prosperity.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu byobulimi ne tekinologiya kiyinza okuviirako okweyongera mu kufulumya emmere n'okukulaakulana mu byenfuna. Nga ebitundu byeyongera okweyimirizaawo, bisobola okufuna enkulaakulana mu bulamu obulungi n'okukulaakulana okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I pur ki diro me pur twero medo rwom me cam ki dongo lobo I tenge me lim. Ka lwak tye ka nongo jami ma mite pigi kengi, rwom me kwo gi kacel ki lonyo gi bimedde.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma akoru ka etatai loakwana epedori ayangaun aitolomunio na inyamat ka apol naka ikapun. Neipedoria itunga aijar bon, epedorete kesi aitojokar aijar kec keda abar.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza geri agirikica ni 'diyi ma alia ri eco fe nyaka ma edeta ma omgbo tuzu tualu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi pie. Ongulumu eyini ecazu eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ra risi, eyi eco angu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe na tekinorogye nikibaasa kwongyera ahaby'okurya n'entunguuka omu by'entaasya. Abantu kubarikweyongyera kwebaisaho, nibabaasa kwongyera aha mutindo gwabo n'entunguuka yaabo.

eng_prompt: When planning any initiative, it's essential to consider the resources and time available. Ensuring that the goals are realistic is crucial for successful implementation.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oteekateeka ekintu kyonna, kikulu okulowooza ku bintu n'obudde obuliwo. Okukakasa nti ebiruubirirwa bituufu kya mugaso nnyo mu kubiteeka mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubu yub mo keken, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom jami ki cawa matye. Neno ni miti ne tye maber pire tek tutwal pi keto itic maber.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokini ijo aswamisioit adio, ibusakinit ijo aomoom nuka iboro keda apak na ejai. Aanyun ebe epedorio aitodolikin alosikineta erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ma otuta 'yeria, eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria tualu sawa ci 'diyi pie. Le 'ba ma ne ra kini e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ecopi ra 'diyi orodriru e'yo 'bani lezu 'diyi 'yezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka omurimo gwona, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha bintu n'obwire oburiho. Okureeba ngu ebigyendererwa nibihikiirira n'eky'omugasho omukubita omu nkora kurungi.

eng_prompt: Farmers have long sought effective methods to enhance soil fertility and boost agricultural productivity. One such method that has gained popularity is the practice of crop rotation.
lug_prompt: Abalimi baludde nga banoonya engeri ennungi ey'okwongera ku bugimu bw'ettaka n'okutumbula amakungula g'ebyobulimi. Engeri emu ng'eyo emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kukyusa ebirime.
ach_prompt: Lupur gubedo ka yenyo yoo maber me medo moc ngom ki medo rwom me kac. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye me loko cam ikare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Angicete akoriok iwaitin lu itojokarere alupok kec ka aiyatakin eswamae kec. Adiopet ewai lo ejenara noi ngesi aijulakin iraan.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBa amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ebi geri onyiru ꞌdiyi nda nyaku ma ori ma omgbo otuzu azini afa ofule amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi alu 'dile 'bani esu 'ba eyi ma eselea sa'wa driasi ri eri geri 'bani ori eyi ojazu eyi ma eselea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa batwire nibasherura oburyo burungi bw'okwongyera obugimu bw'eitaka n'ebihingirwe. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga n'okuhindura ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: Implementing advanced agricultural techniques and providing access to modern tools will significantly enhance crop yields. As a result, this will raise the productivity of farmers.
lug_prompt: Okussa mu nkola obukodyo bw'okulima obw'omulembe n'okuwa abantu ebikozesebwa eby'omulembe kijja kwongera nnyo ku makungula. N'ekinaavaamu, kino kijja kwongera ku bibala by'abalimi.
ach_prompt: Keto diro me pur ma ite kare ni itic kacel ki nongo jami tic ma ite kare ni obi medo kac pa cam. Macalo adwogi ne, man bimedo rwom me pur pa lupur.
teo_prompt: Aitwasam iponesio luka akor luegelegela ka adumun iboro lu egelegela epote aiyatakin aswam na iraan. Kanuka ngun, ebuni ngin aiyatakin eswamae loka akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Geri agirikica ni ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi 'bazu azini afa ayuzaru ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi fezu ri ni mu nyaka ofuza ma omgbo otu. E'yo 'disi, 'di ni mu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma orodri otu.
nyn_prompt: Okutandika kukoresa emiringo y'eby'obuhingi ey'omurembe n'okutunga ebikwato by'omurembe, nikiija kwongyera aha buhingi n'oburiisa bw'ebihingirwe. Ekyarugiremu, eki nikiija kwongyera aha buhingi n'oburiisa bw'abahingi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve food security and support local farmers, the government has initiated several programs. These initiatives aim to provide resources and education to rural communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula emmere n'okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu, gavumenti etandiseewo pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera okuwa ebyetaago n'okusomesa abantu b'omu byalo.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me cam ki konyo lupur me tedero, gamente okatti ki yub mapol. Yub magi tye ki miti me miyo kony ki pwony bot lwak me caro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar akor naka inyamat ka aigang akoriok luka atutubet, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aijanakin iboro keda asioman mama ejaasi itunga luka ocaloi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu nyaka ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri, gamete e'do otita karakara eyi. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu azini onita fezu ongulumu calo ru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'okurya n'okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro, gavumenti etandikireho puroguraamu nyingi. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abantu b'omubyaro eby'okukoresa n'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of sustainable farming practices. As a result, various initiatives have been launched to enhance public awareness and knowledge in this vital sector.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'ennima ez'obuwangaazi. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwa okwongera okumanyisa abantu n'obumanyirivu mu kitongole kino ekikulu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa pur matye ka mede anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, kicako yub mapat-pat me miyo ngec ki ngec bot lwak I tenge man ma pire tek eni.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenuna noi ajokis naka akoru na ejok. Kanuka ngun, aitegear iboro luegelegela kanu aisisianakin itunga akiro nuikamunitos erionget lo lo epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodriru geri ori ezoza eyini aa'zu ewule ewule 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi o'bi eyini imbata fezu azini imbata fezu esele orodriru 'di ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho okumanyisa abantu n'okumanya omuby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about the importance of animal welfare has become a priority in many communities. As a result, educational programs and campaigns are being implemented to inform the public about the significance of animal health.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku bukulu bw'okukuuma obulungi bw'ebisolo kifuuse ekintu ekikulu mu bitundu bingi. N'ekivuddemu, pulogulaamu z'okusomesa ne kampeyini ziteekebwa mu nkola okumanyisa abantu ku mugaso gw'obulamu bw'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom ber pa gwoko lee dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me pwonyo dano ki yub mapat-pat tye kawot anyim me miyo ngec bot lwak i kom ber pa gwoko lee.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakino nuikamunitos ajokis na aijar na itiang erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma atutubena nuipu. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitolot ainapeta nuka aisisianakino ka ikampeins kanu aitijenikin itunga ajokis naka angaleu naka itiang.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma mile oziza orodri anyapa eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria ri eca e'yo okporu ni ru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba otita imbatani 'diyi 'ye o'bi eyini imbata fezu orodri anyapa eyini aa'zu edriru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu omugasho gw'okureeberera gye enyamaishwa kihindukire eky'omugasho omu bantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka z'okwegyesa n'ehururu ziriyo nizikorwa okumanyisa abantu omugasho gw'amagara g'amatungo.

eng_prompt: In rural areas, self-sufficiency is often a key goal for families. As a result, cultivating fresh produce has become a common practice.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, okweyimirizaawo bulijjo kiruubirirwa kikulu eri amaka. N'ekivuddemu, okulima ebirime ebibisi kifuuse kya bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I caro, bedo ki jami weng ma mite ikwo obedo miti pa gangi. Macalo adwogi ne, puru cam manyen dong odoko gin ma dano mapol timo.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi, aitodolikin ikulepek bon erai alosikinet naepol noi naka ikalia. Kanuka ngun, erai akoru iraan ibore yenetapit aswam.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru 'diyi ma alea, familia eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri eri e'yo azi okporu eyini le familia eyi ma esu ni i. E'yo 'disi, ori ezoza eca curu'do 'yeta 'bani 'ye sa'wa driasi ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro, okwetunguura nikyo kigyendererwa kikuru ky'amaka. N'ekyarugiremu, okuhinga ebihingirwe ebitsya kihindukire ekikorwa kya buriijo.

eng_prompt: As the demand for healthier cooking options rises, more individuals are turning to home gardening. This shift in lifestyle has led to a significant increase in the cultivation of various vegetables.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'okufumba okulungi bweyongera, abantu bangi baddukira mu kulima ennimiro awaka. Enkyukakyuka eno mu mbeera y'obulamu ereetedde okweyongera mu kulima enva endiirwa ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me tedo cam mabeco tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ka cako pur. Alokaloka man ma otimme I kwo pa dano okelo medde pa pur me pot dek mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo aipo inyamat lu ejokuka, eutasi itunga luipu alosit amisirin nu ore. Aijulakinio naka aijar naka itunga ayangau apol naka akoru idiasio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nyaka a'dizu muke ndeni 'diyi ma dria ri ni turia, 'ba karakara eyi curu'do amvu 'ya akua. Ojata geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri fe 'ba eyi ma tibi ini eyi ma ezoza ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ebyetaago by'okuteeka eby'amagara marungi birikweyongyera, abantu baingi nibaza omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Empindahinduka omu mitwarize y'abantu ereesire okweyongyera kw'obuhingi bw'emboga nyingi.

eng_prompt: As the global population continues to rise, the demand for sustainable agricultural practices becomes increasingly critical. Implementing effective measures to safeguard crops from pests and diseases is essential for ensuring a stable food supply.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu nsi yonna gweyongera okulinnya, obwetaavu bw'enkola z'obulimi ez'olubeerera bweyongera. Okuteeka mu nkola enkola ennungi okukuuma ebirime okuva ku biwuka n'endwadde kya mugaso nnyo okusobola okulaba ng'emmere ebeerawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde I wilobo, miti me tic ki diro me pur ma gwoko kwo pa dano tye kamede. Keto itic yoo maber me gwoko cam ki i kom anyai ki two obedo gin ma pire tek me neno ni cam tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma akwap kere, epol noi eipuda lo akoru. Aitolomun iwaitin lu eyuwarere iraan kama ejaasi ikur keda adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejai inyamat luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe wudrikurusiri ni mu drile turia, e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma 'ye agirikica geri kililiru 'diyi ma dria ri eca curu'do orodriru. Geri kililiru 'bani ecozu ori yi ma ta mbazu afa ori eza'ba azini azo yi vurisi 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu ri eri orodriru nyaka ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu nsi yoona nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, ekyetengo ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikugumizamu nikyeyongyera. Okuta omu nkora oburyo burungi bw'okurinda ebihingirwe okurwanisa obukooko n'endwara, n'eky'omugasho, okureeba ngu eby'okurya bigumaho.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing challenges posed by climate change and food insecurity, it is essential to promote sustainable agricultural practices. Engaging communities and stakeholders in awareness initiatives can significantly enhance support for local farming efforts.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa okweyongera okuva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'ebbula ly'emmere, kikulu nnyo okutumbula enkola z'obulimi eziwangaala. Okukwataganya ebitundu n'abakwatibwako mu nteekateeka z'okumanyisa abantu kisobola okutumbula ennyo obuyambi eri abalimi n'abalunzi b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma tye ka mede macalo adwogi me alokaloka pa piny ki can cam, pire tek tutwal me tyelo kor yub me pur matye anyim. Kelo lwak kacel ki joo ma timo tic mapat-pat I yub me rweyo lwak I kom pur twero medo cwak I kom pur I tedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nu iyatakinete kanuka aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda ekadakada loka inyamat, ejok aitopolor iponesio luka akor lu itojokaritai. Aimorikikin itunga keda itunga luka atutubet toma aisisianakino naka akoru epedori aitopolor agangat na akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu mile ma ojata ni tupi tualu nyaka ako be 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'ba ambo eyi pie imbata fezu eyi ma eselea ri eco atita fe okpo 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyini angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire kuruga omu mpindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'eibura ry'eby'okurya, nikikuru kutunguura enkora y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumaho. Okwejumba omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa by'abantu b'omubyaro, nikibaasa kwongyera amaani omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Agricultural products often undergo various processes to enhance their market value and usability. One such process involves transforming raw crops into more refined products, such as oils.
lug_prompt: Ebintu by'obulimi bitera okuyita mu mitendera egy'enjawulo okutumbula omuwendo gwaabyo ku katale n'obwangu bw'okubikozesa. Emu ku nkola ng'ezo ezingiramu okukyusa ebirime ebikalu mu bintu ebirongooseddwa, gamba ng'amafuta.
ach_prompt: Jami apura ipol kare ki yubu gi i yoo mapat-pat me medo rwom me catgi ki ber pa tic kwedgi. Yoo acel ma kit meno obedo loko cam ma numu odoko jami mabeco tutwal calo moo.
teo_prompt: Iboro lu akoru etapit aitodolikin iponesio luegelegela kanu aitopolor esokoni ka aitwasam. Adiopet kotoma ainapeta ngun imoriarit aijulakin iraan luka iraan araun iboro luajokak kwape nat akinyet.
lgg_prompt: Afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi sawa driasi geri ndundu eyi 'ye eyini ani ecozu eyi ma aje cuu ni ri ma omgbo otuzu azini eyi ma ayuta ma omgbo otuzu. Geri 'dile 'diyi ma azi alu ri ma alea ori efi koko 'diyi ojazu afa edele kililiru 'diyi ru ekile odu le 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Ebintu ebirikuruga omu buhingi n'oburiisa, buriijo nibikorwa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe kwenda kwongyera omuhendo gwabyo omu katare hamwe n'oburungi bwabyo. Enkora emwe nk'egyo neetwariramu okuhindura ebihingirwe ebitarikushemeza, nk'amajuta.

eng_prompt: The farm specializes in sustainable agriculture practices. As a result, a variety of produce is cultivated to meet local demand.
lug_prompt: Faamu yeesigamye ku nnima ey'obuwangaazi. N'ekivuddemu, ebirime eby'enjawulo birimibwa okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Farm eni tye ki diro me pur matye kamede anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, ki puru cam mapat-pat me cobo miti pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Erai efaamu ngol epone loka akoru loejok noi. Kanuka ngun, ekorio ikorion luegelegela kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Angu ori ezozaniri 'ba e'yo amvu 'yaza ni 'diyi ma dria sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ori ndundu eyi ezo e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi esuzu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Faamu neekoresa emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumizamu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebihingirwe bitari bimwe na bimwe nibihingwa kuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure long-term sustainability and food security, it is essential to prioritize key sectors of the economy. One of the most critical areas that requires immediate attention is agriculture.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obuwangaazi n'obutebenkevu bw'emmere, kyetaagisa okukulembeza ebitundu by'ebyenfuna ebikulu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo ebyetaaga okufaayo amangu bye byobulimi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kwo tye maber pi kare malac ki bedo ki cam ma oromo, pire tek tutwal me keto tenge mapigi tego I tenge me lim. Tenge acel ma pire tek tutwal ma omyero ki tii iye oyot oyot obedo lok me pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai inyamat luedolete apak naepol, ibusakinit aisingarenit iriongeta luepolok luka edumune loka ikapun. Adiopet kotoma aiboisio nuepolok noi nuibusakinit apodokinit ngesi akor.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu ezu 'diyi ma alea dika nyaka eyi ma tambazu, eri orodriru esele orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi 'bazu okporu. Angu azi okporu lepi 'bani asi 'bazu drinia mbeleru 'diyi ma azi agirikica ni.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'okurya bigumireho kumara obwire buraingwa, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza ebintu ebikuru omu by'entaasya. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikwetenga kutaho amaani n'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: As we face increasing challenges related to food security and environmental sustainability, it is crucial to recognize the vital role that agriculture plays in our economy and daily lives. Educating the public on this matter can foster a greater appreciation for our farmers and the agricultural sector.
lug_prompt: Nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okweyongera okukwatagana n'obukuumi bw'emmere n'obutonde bw'ensi, kikulu nnyo okutegeera omulimu omukulu ennyo ebyobulimi n'obulunzi gwe bikola mu byenfuna byaffe ne mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo. Okusomesa abantu ku nsonga eno kisobola okuleetawo okusiima okusingawo eri abalimi baffe n'ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka nongo peko matye kamede ma lubbe ki gwoko cam ki cwec ma orumuwa, pire tek tutwal me niang tic mapire tek ma pur timo I biacarawa ki kwowa me nino ducu. Pwonyo lwak i kom lok man twero medo pwoc pi lupur wa ki tenge me pur.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina oni keda atiokisio nu iyatasi nuikamunitos inyamat keda ejautene lo akwap, ejokuna noi ajenun epone loepol noi loka akor kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan. Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos akiro nu epedori aitopolor aisiyalamikinet mama ejaasi akoriok wok keda erionget loka akor.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo ewaru e'yo nyaka ako ni azini angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo orodriru e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi 'yezu e'yo robiani azini idri amani o'du driasi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi onizu. O'bi eyini imbata fezu e'yo 'di ma dria ri ni fe 'ba eyini aa'zu awa'difo be 'ba ama vile 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma dria tualu esele agirikica niri be.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikureeba oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu by'okurya hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi, ni kikuru kumanya omugasho gw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu by'entaasya n'omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba. Okwegyesa abantu aha nshonga egi nikibaasa kureetaho okusiima kw'abahingi n'abariisa baitu hamwe n'ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance agricultural practices, the government has launched a new initiative. This program aims to provide essential resources and training to local farmers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi, gavumenti etongozza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abalimi b'omu kitundu ebyetaago n'okutendekebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me pur, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo kony ki pwonye bot lupur me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar akoru, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aijaikin akoriok lu ocaalo iboro ka aitutuoro.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu geri agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile afa orodriru 'diyi fezu azini imbata fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuheereza abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro eby'okukoresa n'okutendeka.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing movement among agricultural producers to advocate for changes in legislation that affect their industry. By banding together, these farmers aim to strengthen their voices and influence policy decisions.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu balimi n'abalunzi okulwanirira enkyukakyuka mu mateeka agakosa amakolero gaabwe. Mu kwegatta awamu, abalimi bano baluubirira okunyweza amaloboozi gaabwe n'okufuga okusalawo kw'enkola.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dul pa lupur tye ka lweny matek me kelo aloka-loka I cik ma gudo ticgi. Ki ribbe kacel, lupur eni tye ki miti me jingo dwon gi ki kelo alokaloka I kom tam ma gimoko.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai epugae loepol noi kama ejaasi akoriok luekotosi aijulakin ikisila luetiroritos ikampunin kec. Kowai lo aimorikikin nepepe, ekotosi akoriok lu aitogogong iporotokec ka aitolomun aseununeta nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ni lezu a'di 'dizu e'yo ojata ni 'diyi ejizu okalamvu yini 'diyi ma dria. Amuti ti ecita si, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi le yi ma o'duko okpo fe azini le yi ma e'yo 'du e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho enteekateeka erikweyongyera omu bahingi n'abariisa kurwanirira empinduka omu biragiro ebirikuteganisa eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwabo. Ahabw'okukorera hamwe, abahingi aba nibenda kuhamya eiraka ryabo n'okuhindura ebiteiso.

eng_prompt: Farmers often seek ways to enhance the reliability and effectiveness of the products and services they use. One approach that has gained traction is the formation of cooperatives, which can lead to improved standards and accountability.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okunoonya engeri y'okwongera ku bwesigwa n'obwangu bw'ebintu n'obuweereza bye bakozesa. Emu ku ngeri abantu gye beeyisaamu kwe kutandikawo ebibiina by'obwegassi ebiyinza okutumbula omutindo n'embalirira y'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Lupur ipol kare gi yenyo yoo me medo ber pa jami ki kony ma gitiyo kwede. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal obedo cako dul me ribbe, ma twero kelo dongo rwom me tic ki kor tic.
teo_prompt: Etapit akoriok aimo iponesio luka aitogogong aitogogongio keda eswamae loajokan loka iboro keda iboro luitosomaete kesi. Adioponesio naepol noi nes aitolomun asusaitin, naepedori ayangaun adoketait naejok ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tutuni geri nda ecozu afa yini ayu 'diyi ma e'yo a'dazu azini azi ngazu kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi alu 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri eri amuti eyi ma e'dota, ecopi fepi 'ba eyini aa'zu geri kililiru 'diyisi azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa nibakira kuronda oburyo bw'okwongyera aha bwesigwa n'oburungi bw'ebintu n'obuheereza ebi barikukozesa. Omuringo gumwe oguretsireho amaani n'okutandikaho ebibiina by'okweteerana, ekirikubaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu mutindo hamwe n'embaririra.

eng_prompt: In rural communities, agricultural practices are constantly evolving, and farmers often seek ways to improve their yields and sustainability. To navigate these changes effectively, many turn to organized groups for support and expertise.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, enkola z'obulimi zikyuka buli kaseera era abalimi banoonya engeri y'okutumbula amakungula gaabwe n'okuwangaala. Okutambuza enkyukakyuka zino obulungi, bangi baddukira mu bibiina ebitegekeddwa okufuna obuyambi n'obukugu.
ach_prompt: I caro, yub me pur tye ka loke dok lupur ipol kare gi yenyo yoo me medo kac gi. Me loyo aloka-loka magi maber, dano mapol gidok bot dule ma oyubbe me nongo kony ki ngec.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi, eutasi iponesio luka akor aijulanakin, ido etapit akoriok aimo iwaitin lu itojokarere esakec keda aijarakec. Kanu aitodolikin aijulanakineta nu ejok, itunga luipu elosenenete igurupun lu itemonokinitai kanu agangat keda acoa.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi curu'do yi oja, dika 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tutuni geri nda eyini ani afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea. Ojata 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, 'ba karakara yi yi oja amuti otule 'diyi vu atita azini ondua esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro, enkora y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa neeguma neehinduka, kandi abahingi n'abariisa nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura amasharuura gaabo. Okugyenda kurungi omu mpindahinduka ezi, baingi nibaza omu bibiina ebitebekanisiibwe kutunga obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: By pooling resources and sharing knowledge, local farmers can enhance their production capabilities. This collaborative approach not only boosts efficiency but also strengthens their market presence.
lug_prompt: Mu kukungaanya ebintu n'okugabana amagezi, abalimi b'omu kitundu basobola okutumbula obusobozi bwabwe obw'okufulumya ebintu. Enkola eno ey'okukolera awamu tekoma ku kwongera ku buwanguzi wabula n'okunyweza okubeerawo kwabwe mu katale.
ach_prompt: I yo me ribo jami ki poko ngec, lupur me tedero twero medo rwom me pur gi. Yoo me winye man pe medo rwom me tic keken ento bene tyelo kor bedo tye gi icuk.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aimorikikin iboro keda aimor acoa, epedorete akoriok luka atutubet aitojokar iboro lu itolomete kesi. Ewai lo lo aiswamanara mam itopolori aswam kec bon konye itopolori esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Afa ndundu eyi trazu tualu ondua awazu risi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eco afa eyini ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra. Geri azi ngazu tualu 'diri ngani lu azi ngaza ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini e'yo yini cuu ma alia 'diyi ma okpo otu indi.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro nibabaasa kwongyera aha buhingi bwabo, barikukoresa eby'obugaiga byabo hamwe n'obwengye bwabo. Enkora egi ey'okukorera hamwe terikwongyera aha nkora yaabo yonka, kureka neeyongyera n'amaani omu butare.

eng_prompt: In rural communities, small-scale farmers often face challenges in accessing larger markets for their goods. To overcome these obstacles, many farmers band together to form cooperatives.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo, abalimi abatono batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna obutale obunene obw'ebyamaguzi byabwe. Okusobola okuvvuunuka ebizibu bino, abalimi bangi beegatta wamu ne bakola ebibiina by'obwegassi.
ach_prompt: I caro, lupur matino-tino ipol kare ginongo peko me nongo cuk madongo pi jami gi. Me lweny i kom peko magi, lupur mapol guribbe kacel me cako dul ma ribo lupur.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi, ejaas akoriok ludidik keda atiokisio nuka adumun isokonin luapolok luka iboro kec. Kanu aitelekaar atiokisio nu, imorikikinos akoriok luipu aiswamaun asusaitin.
lgg_prompt: Angu calo ru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba ori ezo'ba werea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini ani cu ambo 'diyi esuzu eyi ma afa ozizu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ndezu, 'ba karakara amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi eyi tra tualu amuti eyi e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro, abahingi n'abariisa bakye nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okutunga obutare bw'ebintu byabo. Okubaasa kusingura oburemeezi obu, abahingi n'abariisa baingi nibegaita hamwe bakakora ebibiina by'okweteerana.

eng_prompt: Many farmers seek guidance to improve their practices and increase their yields. One valuable resource for this information is local agricultural cooperatives.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi banoonya okulambikibwa okulongoosa enkola zaabwe n'okwongera ku makungula gaabwe. Ekimu ku bifo eby'omugaso eby'okufunamu obubaka buno bye bibiina by'obwegassi eby'abalimi n'abalunzi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lupur mapol giyenyo kony me yubu jami gi ki medo kac gi. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal me nongo ngec man obedo dule pa lupur.
teo_prompt: Akoriok luipu emoete aicoreta kanu aitojokar iponesio kec ka aiyatakin esakec. Adiopebon loejok noi kanu akiro nu eraasi asusaitin nuka akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ma karakara eyi imbata nda geri eyini ori ezozu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini nyaka eyini ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Angu azi orodriru 'bani ecozu o'duko 'di esuzu ri amuti agirikica ni ogogo 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa baingi nibaronda obuhabuzi bw'okutunguura emiringo yaabo n'okwongyera aha buhingi bwabo. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho gw'okutunga amakuru aga, n'ebibiina by'okweteerana eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Many small-scale farmers struggle to afford essential services on their own. By banding together in a cooperative, they can leverage collective purchasing power to reduce costs.
lug_prompt: Abalimi b'ebirime abatonotono balwana okwetuusaako ebintu bye beetaaga ku lwabwe. Nga beegatta wamu mu bibiina by'obwegassi, basobola okukozesa obusobozi bwabwe obw'okugula ebintu okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya.
ach_prompt: Lupur matino-tino mapol gi nongo peko me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi kengi. Ka guribbe kacel macalo dul me ribbe, gitwero tic ki kero me wilo jami kacel me dwoko piny wel cente ma mite.
teo_prompt: Akoriok luipu lukatutubet etionikinit adumun iboro lu itwasamao kes ikulepek bon. Kowai lo aimorikikin nepepe kotoma asusaitin, epedorete kesi aitwasam agwelanar kec kanu aitidisiar itiaisinei.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba kalafe weresi 'diyi dri ci robia esuzu azakoma orodriru 'diyi esuzu eyi ma ngulupi si. E'yo ti ecizu tualu amuti ti icita ni 'diyi ma alia risi, eyi eco okpo afa jezu tualu ri ayu aje ma omgbo esizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa bakye nibarwana kugira ngu babaase kwehisyaho obuheereza ahabwaabo. Barikwegaita omu bibiina by'okweteerana, nibabaasa kukoresa obushoborozi bw'okugura ebintu okukyendeeza aha nshohoza.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected economy, it's essential for agricultural producers to broaden their horizons. Expanding their focus beyond local markets can open up new opportunities for growth and sustainability.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikwatagana, kya mugaso nnyo eri abalimi okugaziya ebirowoozo byabwe. Okugaziya essira lyabwe okusukka obutale bw'omu kitundu kiyinza okuggulawo emikisa emipya egy'okukulaakulana n'okuyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I tenge me lim me kare-ni, pire tek tutwal ki lupur me yabo wang gi. Medo rwom me cat gi ma kato I cuk me tedero twero yabo yoo manyen me dongo lobo ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loakwana, ejokuna noi akoriok aisiekikin aswamukec. Aisiekikin agwelanar kec kotoma osokonin luka akwapuwok epedori ayangaun apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu ewu andruri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi dri e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo edrizu. Asi 'baza yiniri edrizu aga cuu ogogo 'diyi ma dria ri eco drileba o'diru zota ni azini ewu drile ri ni 'diyi ma ti zizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirikukwatanisa, n'eky'omugasho aha bahingi n'abariisa okwongyera aha mirimo yaabo. Okwongyera amaani omu by'obushuubuzi, nikibaasa kwiguraho emigisha misya y'okutunguuka n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Many financial institutions are increasingly recognizing the benefits of supporting agricultural cooperatives. These organizations often demonstrate strong community ties and collective bargaining power, making them attractive candidates for funding.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ensimbi bingi byeyongedde okutegeera emigaso gy'okuwagira ebibiina by'obwegassi eby'abalimi. Ebitongole bino bitera okulaga enkolagana ey'amaanyi mu kitundu n'obusobozi bw'okuteesa awamu, ekibireetera okusikiriza abeesimbyewo okufuna ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom lim tye ka niang ber pa cwako dule pa lupur. Dule magi ipol kare ginyuto wat matek ikin lwak kacel ki kero me winye, ma weko gi bedo ki miti me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu luka ikapun ejenete ajokis naka aigang asusaitin nuka akor. Etapit iriongeta lu aitodun eidicane loajokan keda itunga lu atutubet keda apedor naka acamanar, ijaikini kesi araut lu ekotosi agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti robia trapi karakara 'diyi curu'do orodri amuti agirikica ni 'diyi atizu 'diyi ma e'yo ega. Amuti 'diyi e'da tutuni ti ecita ongulumu eyi ma eselea okporu tualu okpo e'yo otuzu tualu 'diyi pie, e'yo fepi eyini aa'zu 'ba e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'empiiha bingi nibyongyera kumanya emigasho y'okushagika ebibiina by'okweteerana omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Ebitongore ebi buriijo nibyoreka enkwatanisa y'amaani omu bantu n'obushoboorozi bw'okuteesa, ekirikubareetera okwetenga esente.

eng_prompt: By pooling their resources and sharing knowledge, farmers can enhance their productivity and reduce costs. This collaborative approach fosters a sense of community and strengthens their bargaining power in the market.
lug_prompt: Mu kukungaanya ebintu byabwe n'okugabana amagezi, abalimi basobola okwongera ku bibala byabwe n'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya. Enkola eno ey'okukolagana ekuza enneewulira y'ekyalo n'okunyweza obusobozi bwabwe obw'okuteesa mu katale.
ach_prompt: Lupur twero medo rwom me camgi ki dwoko piny wel cente ma gitiyo kwede ka guribbe kacel ki ngec ma gitye kwede. Yub me ribbe eni weko dano bedo ki winye ikin gi dok weko gi bedo ki kero me winye I cuk.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aimorikikin iboro kec keda aimor acoa, epedorete akoriok aiyatakin eswamae kec ka aitidisiar etiai loka ikapun. Ewai lo lo aiswamanara eyangauni aimorikikina kosodi aitogogong apedorosiokec nuka acamanar kosokoni.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ka afa yini 'diyi tra azini ondua awa eyi ma eselea, eyi eco afa eyini ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma aje esi ra. Geri 'bani ti ecizu tualuri ni fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu dika eri okpo fe eyini e'yo otuzu cuu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa ku barikugaita eby'obugaiga byabo n'obwengye bwabo, nibabaasa kwongyera ahaby'amasharuura gaabo n'okutuubya aha nshohoza yaabo. Enkora egi ey'okukorera hamwe, neeyongyera amaani omu by'obushuubuzi.

eng_prompt: In today's agricultural landscape, small-scale farmers often face significant challenges in reaching broader markets. By banding together, they can leverage their collective strength to enhance their visibility and sales opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulimi ey'ennaku zino, abalimi abatono batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kutuuka ku butale obugazi. Mu kukolera awamu, basobola okukozesa amaanyi gaabwe ag'awamu okwongera okumanyika n'emikisa gyabwe egy'okutunda.
ach_prompt: I tenge me pur me kare-ni, lupur matino-tino ipol kare ginongo peko madit tutwal me nongo cuk ma lac. Ka guribbe kacel, gitwero tic ki kero gi me medo rwom me neno ki cato jami gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akoru na ilolo, ejaas akoriok ludidik keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kanu adolokin esokoni loalalan. Kowai lo aimorikikin nepepe, epedorete kesi aitwasam agogongukec kanu aitojokar ajenara kec keda agwelanar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica ni ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba ori ezo'ba were 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini ani ecozu cazu cuu angiri 'diyi ma alea. E'yo ti ecizu tualu risi, eyi eco okpo eyini 'diyi ayu e'da eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu azini drileba eyini afa ozizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'erizooba, abahingi n'abariisa bakye nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kuhika aha butare. Barikwegaita hamwe, nibabaasa kukoresa amaani gaabo, okwongyera aha burungi bwabo n'oburungi bwabo bw'okuguza ebintu.

eng_prompt: The region is known for its fertile land and abundant resources, attracting many people to settle there. As a result, the area has experienced significant demographic growth over the years.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kimanyiddwa olw'ettaka lyakyo eggimu n'eby'obugagga ebingi, ekisikiriza abantu bangi okusengayo. N'ekivuddemu, ekitundu kibaddemu okweyongerayongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu okumala emyaka.
ach_prompt: Kabedo eni ngene pi ngom ma moc ki lonyo ma dwong ma oweko dano mapol gibedo kunu. Macalo adwogi ne, wel dano me kabedo eni omede tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Ejenara aiboisit ngin kanu alupok ke nu ekorete keda iboro luipu, ido ingalauni itunga luipu aiboi ngina. Kanuka ngun, apolor noi enaaba loka itunga kotoma aiboisit kangin kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni angu 'di nyaku onyiru azini lonyi be tre 'diyisi, e'yo 'di ni fe 'ba karakara eyini muzu angu 'da ma alea. E'yo 'disi, angu 'da esu zota ongmbo angiri si eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ekicweka nikimanywa ahabw'eitaka ryaryo eririmu amasharuura n'eby'obugaiga bingi, ekirikureeta abantu baingi kutuura omwo. N'ekyarugiremu,omuhendo gw'abantu omu kicweka ekyo gweyongyeire kumara emyaka mingi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, simply growing crops is not enough for success. To maximize profits and stand out, farmers must find innovative ways to enhance their products.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akalimu okuvuganya, okulima ebirime si kimala okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okusobola okufuna amagoba amangi n'okweyawula ku balala, abalimi n'abalunzi balina okunoonya engeri z'okwongera ku mutindo gw'ebirime byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, puru cam keken pe romo kelo loc. Pi medo magoba ki bedo pat ki lupur mukene, lupur omyero gunong yoo manyen me medo rwom me cam gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka lolo, mam akoru iraan bon edolit kanu akerianut. Kanu aiyatakin ameda ka ajenun, ekot akoriok adumun iponesio luitetiak luka aitojokar iboro kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alia, lu ori ezoza cani drile suza ni ku. Orodri esuzu tualu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi pie, le 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma esu geri o'diru eyini ecozu afa eyini ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, okuhinga eby'okurya byonka tikirikumara kubaasa kuba omusinguzi. Abahingi n'abariisa, okubaasa kwongyera amagoba, bashemereire kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwabo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing consumer demand for sustainable practices, industry leaders are exploring innovative solutions. These efforts aim to improve production efficiency and animal welfare standards.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'abaguzi obweyongera obw'enkola eziwangaala, abakulembeze b'amakolero banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya. Kaweefube ono agendererwamu okutumbula omutindo gw'ebirime n'obulungi bw'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti pa luwil matye kamede I kom yoo me tic matye kamede anyim, lutela me biacara tye ka yenyo yoo me tic manyen. Yub eni tye pi ilo malo rwom me pur ki gwoko lee.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol lo itwasamaete itunga kanu aswam iboro lu ejokuka, eutasi engarenok luka ikampunin aimo iwaitin lu itolomunete iboro luitetiak. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitojokar eswamae loajokan keda ejautene loajokan loka itiang.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ni lezu e'yo yi 'yepi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba okalamvu ni 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi onda. Okpo 'dayi lezu afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini geri anyapa eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'amakorero bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'obushuubuzi ahabw'okwenda kw'abaguzi kweyongyera. Ebi bigyendereire kutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'okureeberera gye amatungo.

eng_prompt: Recent investments in irrigation infrastructure and water management systems have significantly improved agricultural practices. As a result, farmers are experiencing enhanced access to essential water resources.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko mu by'okufukirira n'enkola y'okuddukanya amazzi kyongedde nnyo ku nkola y'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi beeyongera okufuna amazzi.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I tenge me pur ki pur I kare-ni okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I tic me pur. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur tye ka nongo pii maber.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun mama ejaasi acuman nuicokicokicok nuka aicokicok akipi keda aitwasam akipi ejokuna noi nuka akor. Kanuka ngun, epatana akoriok adumunun akipi.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza o'diru 'bani 'ba ori eyi ma ta mbazu yi ma dria azini geri yi ma tambazu 'diyi otu geri agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi yi esu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho emirimo y'okwitirira n'okureeberera amaizi, kyongyeire amaani omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi n'abariisa nibatunga amaizi g'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As the agricultural sector continues to grow, many farmers are facing challenges in managing their harvests. This has led to concerns about spoilage and waste, highlighting the importance of adequate storage solutions.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi byeyongera okukula, abalimi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa mu kulabirira amakungula gaabwe. Kino kiviiriddeko okweraliikirira ku kwonooneka ne kasasiro, ekiraga obukulu bw'okutereka obulungi ebintu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tenge me pur tye ka dongo kwede, lupur mapol gitye ka nongo peko me gwoko kac gi. Man okelo lworo I kom bale pa jami ki yugi, ma nyutu ber pa gwoko jami maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit erionget loka akor apoloun, eutasi akoriok luipu adumun atiokisio nuka aidar iraanakec. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongongo kanu amunar keda agasia, itodunit ajokis naka aidar iboro luedolitos.
lgg_prompt: Esele agirikica niri ni mu drile tuzu, 'ba karakara amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu ori eyivile 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza e'yo ezaza azini okurunya ma dria, ece orodri geri 'bani afa eyi ma tambazu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ku birikugumizamu nibikura, abahingi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera amasharuura gaabo. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha nshonga y'okusiisikara n'okusiiga kasasiro, ekirikworeka omugasho gw'okurinda kurungi ebintu.

eng_prompt: After a bountiful growing season, many farmers find themselves with an abundance of crops. To ensure their produce remains safe and usable throughout the year, they carefully store the extra harvest in granaries.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera ky'okulima ekijjudde, abalimi bangi beesanga nga balina ebirime bingi. Okukakasa nti amakungula gaabwe gasigala nga malungi era nga gasobola okukozesebwa omwaka gwonna, bakweka n'obwegendereza amakungula agasukkiridde mu sitoowa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me pur maber, lupur mapol nongo gitye ki cam madwong tutwal. Me neno ni camgi tye maber dok gitiyo kwede I kare weng me mwaka, gi gwoko cam ma odong I odi cam.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naka akoru naepol noi, edumunenete akoriok luipu iraan luipu noi. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuara iraanakec kosodete aitwasam ekaru kere, ingadete kesi ikorion luideuna koingada.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ori ezozaniri ma vutia, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi yi esu yi ma nyaka be angiri. O'bu yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu aa'zu muke azini ayuzaru eli ma alia dria, yi nyaka acepi 'diyi ma ta mba angu ori eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bwingi bw'okuhinga, abahingi baingi nibeeshanga baine ebihingirwe bingi. Okureeba ngu ebihingirwe byabo bigumire biri birungi kandi birikubaasa kukoresibwa omwaka gwona, nibabika n'obwegyendesereza ebihingirwe ebindi omu bihumi.

eng_prompt: To enhance food security and promote sustainable farming, the organization has developed a comprehensive plan. This initiative aims to educate local farmers on effective techniques and methods.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwongera ku bungi bw'emmere n'okutumbula ebyobulimi n'obulunzi obuwangaazi, ekitongole kikoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okusomesa abalimi b'omu kitundu ku bukodyo n'enkola ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me cam ki pur, dul ne okatti ki yub maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me pwonyo lupur me tedero i kom diro ki yoo me pur ma tiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong akor naka inyamat ka aitopolor akoru na ejok, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet na erai aisisianakin akoriok luka atutubet iwaitin lu iswamaere.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka ma omgbo otuzu azini amvu 'yaza ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da e'do otita eyi dria. E'yo 'di lezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri onita fezu geri 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'okurya n'obuhingi n'oburiisa, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka. Ekigyendererwa n'okwegyesa abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro obukoryo burungi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing agricultural landscape, many farmers face a variety of challenges that can impact their productivity and sustainability. To navigate these issues effectively, it is crucial for them to seek guidance from knowledgeable professionals.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulimi ey'ennaku zino ekyuka mangu, abalimi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo okusobola okukosa ebibala byabwe n'okuyimirizaawo. Okutambuza ensonga zino obulungi, kya mugaso nnyo gye bali okufuna okulambikibwa okuva mu bakugu abamanyi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pur tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, lupur mapol gitye ka nongo peko mapol ma twero balo ticgi. Pi tyeko lok magi maber, pire tek tutwal ni guyeny kony kibot ludiro ma gitye ki ngec.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka akoru loka lolo, etereikina akoriok keda atiokisio nuegelegela nuepedorete aitolitol eswamae kec keda aijarakec. Kanu aitemonokin akiro nu ejok, ejokuna kesi adumun aicoreta kanejaas ipirioitin lu ejenete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica ni curu'do oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu ecopi afa eyini ofule 'diyi ezapi ra 'diyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru eyini imbata esuzu engazu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikuhinduka juba, abahingi n'abariisa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi oburikubaasa kuteganisa eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwabo. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, n'eky'omugasho okuronda obuhabuzi kuruga omu bakugu.

eng_prompt: Farmers need guidance on optimizing their production strategies to enhance profitability. To achieve this, they should receive information on current agricultural trends and consumer preferences.
lug_prompt: Abalimi beetaaga okulambikibwa ku ngeri y'okulongoosaamu enkola zaabwe ez'okulima okusobola okwongera ku magoba. Kino okusobola okukituukako, balina okufuna obubaka obukwata ku byobulimi ebiriwo n'ebyo abaguzi bye baagala.
ach_prompt: Lupur omyero gunong kony me yubu jami gi wek okony gi nongo magoba. Me cobo man, omyero gunong ngec I kom jami matye katime kombedi I tenge me pur ki jami ma luwil maro.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi akoriok aicoreta nu aitojokar iponesio kec luka akoru kanu aiyatakin ameda. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekot kes adumun akiro nuikamunitos iponesio lu akoru ka iboro lu ekotosi agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Le ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma esu imbata geri yini afa ofule ꞌdiyi ma omgbo otuzu orodri esuzu ꞌdiyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le yi ma esu o'dukoti e'yo agirikica ni curu'do 'diyi ma dria azini afa 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi le 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa nibetenga okuhaburwa oku bashemereire kukoresa oburyo bwabo bw'okuhinga kugira ngu bongyere amagoba. Okuhikiiriza eki, bashemereire kutunga amakuru agarikukwata aha by'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ebi abaguzi barikukunda.

eng_prompt: To maximize crop yield and ensure sustainability, it is essential for farmers to understand the seasonal variations in plant growth. Proper guidance on suitable crops can significantly impact their productivity and profitability.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula amakungula n'okukakasa obuwangaazi, kyetaagisa abalimi okutegeera enjawulo mu nkulaakulana y'ebimera mu sizoni. Okulambikibwa okulungi ku birime ebisaanira kusobola okukyusa ennyo amakungula n'amagoba gaabyo.
ach_prompt: Pi medo rwom me kac ki dongo pa cam, pire tek tutwal ki lupur me niang aloka-loka matye ikit ma cam dongo kwede ikare ki kare. Miyo tira maber i kom cam ma ber twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom kac ki magoba.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor esake ka aanyun ebe ejarete, ejokuka noi akoriok amisiikin aijulanakineta nuka apakio nuka apol naka iraan. Aicoreta nuikamunitos iraan lu ejokuka epedorete aitojokar eswamae kec keda ameda.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive agricultural landscape, farmers are increasingly recognizing the importance of diversifying their income sources. By adopting innovative business practices, they can enhance their financial stability and growth potential.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulimi ey'ennaku zino ey'okuvuganya, abalimi beeyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'okugaziya ensibuko z'ensimbi zaabwe. Nga beettanira enkola z'obusuubuzi ez'obuyiiya, basobola okutumbula obutebenkevu bwabwe mu byenfuna n'okukulaakulana kwabwe.

lug_prompt: Obulwadde bw'akafuba bulwadde obusiigibwa akawuka obusinga okusaasaana okuyita mu kuluma kw'ebisolo ebirwadde. Okutegeera engeri gye kikosaamu ebisolo by'omu nsiko n'obulamu bw'abantu kya mugaso nnyo mu kaweefube w'okuziyiza n'okuziyiza.

eng_prompt: Many countries rely on agriculture as a key component of their economies. As a result, various crops and livestock are cultivated not only for domestic consumption but also for international trade.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost the economy and support local farmers, the government implemented a series of financial incentives. These measures aimed to enhance crop yields and encourage sustainable farming practices.

ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor tic me lim ki konyo lupur me tedero, gamente oketo yub mapol me miyo kony me lim. Yub magi obedo ki miti me medo rwom me kac ki cuku cwiny lupur me timo pur maber.

eng_prompt: As the global population continues to rise, the demand for food is becoming increasingly urgent. To address this challenge, innovative approaches to agriculture must be explored.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu nsi yonna gweyongera okulinnya, obwetaavu bw'emmere bweyongera. Okusobola okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, enkola empya mu byobulimi n'obulunzi zirina okunoonyezebwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano tye kamede kwede I wilobo, miti me cam bene tye ka mede oyot-oyot tutwal. Me tyeko peko man, omyero ki nen yoo manyen me pur.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma akwap kere, ejai eipuda loka inyamat noi. Kanu aitemokin ainingosit na, ekot airereonor iponesio luitetiak luka akor.

eng_prompt: Rising rates of obesity and diet-related diseases highlight the urgent need for better dietary knowledge. By understanding the importance of nutrition, individuals can make healthier choices for themselves and their families.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'obuzito n'endwadde ezikwatagana n'endya biraga obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okufuna amagezi ku by'endya. Mu kutegeera omugaso gw'endya, abantu basobola okukola okusalawo okulungi eri bo bennyini n'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Rwom me dwong pa wel dano matye ka dwong ki two ma bino macalo adwogi me cam nyutu ni mite tutwal ni dano omyero gubed ki ngec matut i kom cam. Ka dano guniang ber pa cam maber, gitwero yero cam mabeco pi komgi ki gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nuikamunitos aijul eode keda aijul eode itodunit eipuda loepol noi loka aijen nuikamunitos aijul eode. Kowai lo amisikin ajokis naka ainyam, epedorete itunga aiswamaun aseununeta nu engalete kanukec keda ikalia kec.

Bani orodri nyaka nyazani 'diyi vazu risi, 'ba alu alu eco peta muke ndeni 'diyi 'du eyi ma ngulupi ni azini familia eyivile 'diyi pie ra.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the students focused on their passion for farming and sustainable practices. Their commitment to understanding the complexities of food production led them to pursue a degree in agriculture.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, abayizi essira baalitadde ku kwagala kwe balina eri ebyobulimi n'obulunzi. Obumalirivu bwabwe okutegeera obuzibu obuli mu kukola emmere bwabaleetera okusoma diguli mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, lutino kwan gucako keto cwinygi I kom miti gi I kom pur ki diro me gwoko kwo pa dano. Keto cwinygi me niang kit ma yubu cam tek kwede oweko gukwano digiri I lok kom pur.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu esisiak opodokinit akiro nu akoru ka iponesio luajokak. Apodokinit kec ajenun eipone lo etiono aitolom inyamat abu koyangau kesi aisisia ediguri kotoma akor.

eng_prompt: Understanding the impact of food choices on health is crucial in today's society. By raising awareness about nutrition, individuals can make informed decisions that benefit their well-being.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera engeri emmere gy'olonda gy'ekosaamu obulamu kya mugaso nnyo mu bantu b'ennaku zino. Mu kumanyisa abantu ku by'endya, abantu basobola okusalawo obulungi ebibaganyula.
ach_prompt: Niang adwoki pa cam ma iyero I kom yotkom pire tek tutwal I kare-ni. I yoo me rweyo lwak i kom cam maber, dano acel acel twero moko tam mabeco pi ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin epone loepedoria jo ainyam inyamat lu itojokarete angeleu erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma akwap lolo. Kowai lo aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos enyame, epedorete kesi aiswamaun aseununeta nuejokuka kanu aijar kec.

eng_prompt: As consumer demand for protein continues to rise, many companies in the agriculture sector are adapting to meet this need. Recent market trends indicate a significant increase in meat consumption across various demographics.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'abaguzi bw'ebirungo ebizimba omubiri bweyongera okulinnya, amakampuni mangi mu by'obulimi n'obulunzi gakyusakyusa okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu buno. Ebintu ebibaddewo mu katale gye buvuddeko biraga nti abantu bangi beeyongedde okulya ennyama.
ach_prompt: Kit macalo miti pa luwil i kom moc cam me protein tye ka medde, dul mapat-pat me tenge me pur tye ka timo jami mapat-pat me cobo miti eni. Jami ma otimme I cuk cokcok-ki nyutu ni dano mapol tye ka camo ringo.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipud loka itunga luitosomaete iboro luidarete akwan, eutasi ikampunin luipu luka akor aitodolikin eipud lo. Apol naka esokoni itodunit ebe eyatakinos itunga luipu ainyam akiring.

Ebyarugire omu butare obwahati, nibyoreka okweyongyera kw'abantu abarikurya enyama omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe na emwe.

eng_prompt: One effective way for governments to support the agricultural sector is by promoting collaborative efforts among farmers. This can enhance productivity and ensure fair pricing in the market.

eng_prompt: Farmers in the region have expressed a need for more information on sustainable agriculture. As a result, local organizations are implementing educational programs to address these concerns.

eng_prompt: Understanding the timing of planting and harvesting is crucial for maximizing crop yields. Therefore, it is essential to educate farmers on the importance of agricultural seasons.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebiseera by'okusimba n'okukungula kya mugaso nnyo mu kwongera ku makungula g'ebirime. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okusomesa abalimi ku mugaso gw'ebiseera by'okulima.
ach_prompt: Niang kare me pito ki kac pire tek tutwal pi medo kac pa cam. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lupur i kom ber pa kare me pur.
teo_prompt: Ajenun apak naka aira ka aisak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor akoru na iraan. Kanuka ngun, ejok aisisianakin akoriok ajokis naka apakio nu akoru.
