eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for natural flavorings has surged, leading to increased interest in various agricultural products. Among these, vanilla stands out as a largely grown cash crop due to its unique flavor profile and culinary versatility.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'ebirungo eby'obutonde bweyongedde, ekiviiriddeko obwetaavu bw'ebirime eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, vanilla asibuka nga ekirime ekilimibwa ennyo olw'obuwoomi bwakyo obw'enjawulo n'okufumba.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti me jami ma kiyubu ki cwec ma orumuwa omede tutwal, ma oweko miti me jami mapat-pat me pur omede tutwal. I kin magi, vanilla tye macalo cam ma pol pa dano pito macalo adwogi me cam ma pat-pat ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor eipuda lo iboro lu inumunumete akinyeta, ido ayangau eipud loka iboro lu akoru luegelegela. Kanejaas nu, erai vanilla iraan lo ekorio noi kanu ajonike keda iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesio lu iponesi
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, afa nyakuni 'diyi ma cu tu ra, e'yo fepi 'ba eyini ava 'bazu afa agirikica ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo tu ra. Afa 'diyi ma eselea, vanilla ni e'da ekile ori 'bani ezo tujari 'yezu 'diyi ru a'disiku eri ma nyaka wura ndusi azini nyaka a'dizu 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ebyetengo by'ebirungo eby'obuhangwa byeyongyeire, ekirikureetera abantu kukunda ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikuruga omu buhingi n'oburiisa. Omuri ebi, vanilla niyo erikukirayo kurimwa nk'ebihingirwe ebirikuguzibwa ahabw'oburungi bwayo n'oburungi bwayo omu by'okuteeka.

eng_prompt: To ensure a successful growing season, it is essential for farmers to prioritize their planting strategies. One of the most critical factors in achieving a bountiful yield is the selection of high-quality seeds.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa sizoni y'okulima ennungi, kya mugaso abalimi okukulembeza obukodyo bwabwe obw'okusimba. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo mu kufuna amakungula amangi kwe kulonda ensigo ez'omutindo ogwa waggulu.
ach_prompt: Pi neno ni kare me pur tye maber, pire tek tutwal ki lupur me keto yub me pur gi obed mukwongo. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal me nongo kac madit en aye yero kodi ma rwom gi malo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna apak naka akoru, ejokuka akoriok aisingarenit iwaitin kec luka aira. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi kanu aitolomun esake loejok ngesi aseun ikinyom lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti 'bani ori ezozuri ni aa'zu muke, eri orodriru 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini geri eyini ori sazu 'diyi 'duzu okporu. E'yo azi okporu 'bani ecozu afa ofule angiri 'diyi esuzu ri eri ori wura muke 'diyi opezu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu obwire bw'okuhinga nibubaho kurungi, n'eky'omugasho abahingi n'abariisa kwebembeza emiringo yaabo y'okubyara. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikureeta amasharuura maingi n'okutoorana embibo y'omutindo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: In agriculture, the choices made during planting season can significantly impact the harvest. Understanding the consequences of their actions is crucial for farmers to achieve a successful yield.
lug_prompt: Mu byobulimi, okusalawo okukolebwa mu biseera by'okusimba kusobola okukosa ennyo amakungula. Okutegeera ebiva mu bikolwa byabwe kikulu nnyo eri abalimi okufuna amakungula amalungi.
ach_prompt: I pur, tam ma kimoko ikare me pur twero kelo adwoki marac i kom kac. Niang adwoki me timgi pire tek tutwal pi lupur me nongo kac maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akoru, aseununeta nu iswamao kapak naka aira epedorete aitolitol esake. Amisiikin nuelomunete kotoma aswamisiokec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akoriok adumun esake loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Agrikica ma alia, e'yo 'bani pe sa'wa ori sazaniri ma alia 'diyi eco e'yo 'ye orodri yini 'diyi ma dria ra. Eꞌyo ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyosi ꞌdiyi ma vata eri orodriru ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi dri nyaka esuzu onyiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, okusharamu okukozirwe omu bwire bw'okubyara nikubaasa kukora kihango ahamikorero y'ebihingirwe. Okwetegyereza ebireije kuruga omu bikorwa byabo n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'abahingi n'abariisa kutunga amasharuura marungi.

eng_prompt: The increasing prevalence of waterborne diseases in the surrounding communities has raised significant concerns among health officials. In response to these challenges, local organizations and government agencies are collaborating on various initiatives.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'obulwadde obuva mu mazzi mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo kireeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu. Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kuno, ebitongole by'ebitundu n'ebitongole bya gavumenti bikolera wamu ku nteekateeka ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Nya pa two ma aa ki I pii I kabedo ma orumuwa okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin lutic me yot kom. Me cobo peko magi, dule me tedero kacel ki dule pa gamente gitye ka tic kacelo I yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Apol naka adekasinei nu eyangaununete akipi kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, iriamunos iriongeta luka atutubet keda lu apugan kanu aswam iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma agei 'diyi ma alea ri eji asi otiza amboru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu amuti gamete ni 'diyi pie azi nga tualu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'endwara ezirikuruga omu maizi omu byaro, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bakuru b'ebyamagara. Omu kugarukamu oburemeezi obu,ebitongore by'ebyaro hamwe n'ebitongore bya gavumenti nibikorera hamwe omu mirimo etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: The region's diverse ecosystems and abundant natural resources play a crucial role in supporting local communities. Among these resources, Lake Victoria stands out as a vital asset for trade and livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Eby'obutonde eby'enjawulo mu kitundu n'obugagga bw'obutonde bungi bikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuwagira ebitundu. Mu by'obugagga bino byonna, ennyanja Nalubaale yeeyolekera ng'ekintu eky'omugaso ennyo mu by'obusuubuzi ne mu by'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Jami ma orumuwa ki jami ma orumuwa konyo tutwal me konyo lwak ma ikabedo wa. I kin lonyo magi, Lake Victoria obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi biacara ki kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi aiboisio nuegelegela nuka aijar keda isuban luka Edeke keda iboro luipu luepedorete aigang itunga luka atutubet. Kotoma iboro lu, erai ecor loka Victoria ibore yenepol noi kanuka agwelanar keda aijar.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ma alea afa idri ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea afa nyakuni 'diyi pie 'diyi azi okporu nga ongulumu eyi ma aza kozu. Afa orodriru 'diyi ma eselea, yi alio Victoria niri e'da kililiru ekile afa orodriru tujari ni azini geri 'bani aa'zu edriru 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa eby'omutaano omu kyanga hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa bingi nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhwera abantu b'omubyaro. Omu bintu ebi byona, enyanja Nalubaale neeyetegyerezibwa nk'ekintu ky'omugasho omu by'obushubuzi hamwe n'okutunguura abantu.

eng_prompt: One of Africa's most significant bodies of water, Lake Victoria spans multiple countries. Its vast expanse makes it a crucial resource for millions of people in the region.
lug_prompt: Erimu ku mazzi agasinga obukulu mu Afirika, ennyanja Nalubaale esaasaanidde mu mawanga mangi. Obunene bw'ettaka lino likifuula eky'omugaso eri obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lake Victoria obedo pii acel ma pire tek tutwal I lobo Afrika dok tye I lobe mapol. Dit pa ngom eni weko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dano milion mapol I but lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ediopet kotoma aiboisio nuepolok noi nuka akipi koAfrica, ejai ecor loka Victoria toma akwapin nuipu. Aiboisit ke naepol noi einakinit ngesi araun ibore yenepol noi kanuka imilionin luka itunga lu atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Yi alio Victorianiri ma azi angu Africaa okporu ndeni 'diyi ma azi, yi alio Victorianiri ali kari karakara yi ma alia. Angu erini zozuri fe erini ovuzu orodriru 'ba milioni angu 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omwe aha myanya y'amaizi erikukirayo omuri Afirika, enyanja Nalubaale neegwera amahanga maingi. Obuhango bwakyo nibukikora eky'omugasho munonga aha bantu baingi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: The region surrounding Lake Victoria is rich in natural resources and biodiversity, making it a vital area for agriculture and fishing. Additionally, the lake serves as a crucial transportation route, facilitating trade and cultural exchange among the countries that border it.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu ekyetoolodde ennyanja Nalubaale kijjudde eby'obugagga eby'obutonde n'ebiramu ebyenjawulo, ekikifuula ekitundu ekikulu eri ebyobulimi n'obuvubi. Okwongerako, ennyanja ekola nga ekkubo ly'entambula ekkulu, ekyanguya eby'obusuubuzi n'okuwanyisiganya ebyobuwangwa mu mawanga agali ku nsalo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma orumu Lake Victoria tye ki lonyo me cwec ma orumuwa ki jami makwo mapat-pat ma weko obedo kabedo maber tutwal pi pur ki mako rec. Medo i kom meno, nam eni tiyo macalo yoo me wot ma pire tek tutwal, weko cato wil ki lok me tekwaro bedo yot ikin lobe matye I wang lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Aiboisit na elukunit ecor loka Victoria ebarit noi keda iboro lu isuban luka Edeke, ido ijaikini ngesi aiboisit naejok noi naka akor keda aikam agaria. Kilema, iswamai ecor ngol kwape erot loepol noi lo elose, ingarakinit agwelanar keda aijulakin inonosio kotoma akwapin nuejaasi toma oikoru.
lgg_prompt: Angu angu yi alio Victorianiri ma ageia 'diyi ma alia lonyi nyakuni 'diyi be angiri tualu afa nyakuni 'diyi pie, e'yoni fe angu 'di ni ovuzu orodriru agirikica azini e'bi 'beza ni. Azi dika, yi alio 'di ni azi nga geri acizu okporu ni ru, e'yo tujari ni azini e'yo suruni 'diyi awazu kari eri ma agei 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ekicweka ekirikwetorwaire enyanja Nalubaale kiine eby'obuhangwa bingi, ekirikukihindura omwanya murungi gw'obuhingi n'obushohi. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, enyanja neekora nk'omuhanda gw'eby'engyenda ogw'omugasho, ogurikworeka eby'obushubuzi n'eby'obuhangwa ahagati y'amahanga agari aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: One of the largest freshwater lakes in the world, Lake Victoria is a vital resource for the surrounding communities. Its vast waters are shared by multiple nations, highlighting the importance of regional cooperation.
lug_prompt: Erimu ku nnyanja z'amazzi amayonjo ezisinga obunene mu nsi, ennyanja Nalubaale kya mugaso nnyo eri ebitundu ebiriraanyewo. Amazzi gaayo amanene gagabanyizibwako amawanga mangi, ekiraga obukulu bw'enkolagana mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Lake Victoria obedo nam acel me kin nam matye ki pii maleng madwong loyo weng I wilobo. Lobo mapol gipoko pii ne, man nyutu ber pa winye ikin lobe mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Ediopet kotoma oicorin luapolok noi luka akipi nu elaete kotoma akwap kere, erai ecor loka Victoria ibore yenepol noi kanuka itunga lu idunyasi. Akipi ke nuipu emorete akwapin nuipu, itodunit ajokis naka aimorikikina kotoma aiboisio.
lgg_prompt: Yi alio ndrizaru wudrikuru ma alia 'diyi ma azi, yi alio Victorianiri orodriru ongulumu eri ma ageia 'diyi dri. Kari karakara eyi yi erini 'diyi awa eyi ma eselea, e'yo 'di ece orodri ti icita angu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri niri.
nyn_prompt: Emwe aha nyanja z'amaizi marungi ezirikukirayo obuhango omunsi yoona, enyanja Nalubaale n'ey'omugasho munonga omu byaro. Amaizi gaayo amahango nigabanibwa amahanga maingi, ekirikworeka omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu byanga.

eng_prompt: As the agricultural sector continues to evolve, it is essential to understand the unique obstacles that young entrepreneurs encounter. This discussion will shed light on the various factors impacting youth engagement in agribusiness.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi kigenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, kya mugaso okutegeera ebizibu eby'enjawulo abavubuka abasuubuzi bye basanga. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno kujja kussa ekitangaala ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ezikosa abavubuka okwenyigira mu bulimi n'obulunzi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tenge me pur tye ka dongo kwede, pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma lutim biacara matino nongo. Nywako lok man binyuto jami mapat-pat matye ka weko bulu donyo ilok me pur.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi erionget loka akor aijulanakin, ejokuna noi amisiikin atiokisio nuetereikina keda atumunak luitolosete ibiasaran. Ebuni aitemitem akiro nuikamunitos iboro luegelegela luepedorete atumunak ajaut akoru.
lgg_prompt: Esele agrikica niri ni mu drile zozu, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru 'ba ode tujari 'yepi 'diyini esu 'diyi vazu. E'yo onzeza 'diri nga e'yo ndundu 'ba ode yini fizu tujara agirikicaniri ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nikigumizamu n'okutunguuka, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'omutaano obu abashuubuzi bato barikushanga. Okuhanuura oku nikwija kworeka enshonga nyingi ezirikureetera eminyeeto kwejumba omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing economy, it is essential for young people to develop practical skills that align with market demands. One promising area for growth and innovation is the agricultural sector, which offers numerous opportunities for entrepreneurship.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikyuka amangu, kya mugaso nnyo abavubuka okukulaakulanya obukugu obukwatagana n'obwetaavu bw'akatale. Ekimu ku bintu ebisobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana n'obuyiiya bwe bulimi n'obulunzi, obuwa abantu emikisa mingi okutandikawo bizineesi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lim tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal pi bulu me dongo diro me tic ma rwate ki miti pa lucat. Kabedo acel matye ki gen me dongo lobo ki dongo lobo en aye tenge me pur, ma miyo gum mapol me timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, ejokuna noi atumunak adumun acoa na itwasamao kosokoni. Aiboisit adiope naejok noi naka apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak ngesi erionget loka akor, lo ijaikini arerengesio nuipu nuka agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba oderu 'diyini ondua afa edele drisi 'diyi ezozu e'yo cu ni lelerile. Angu azi alu drileba fepi zota azini e'yo ndundu eyi edezu ri eri esele agirikica niri, drileba karakara eyi fepi tujari 'yezu ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirikuhinduka juba, n'eky'omugasho munonga eminyeeto okutunga emyoga erikuhikaana n'ebyetengo by'akatare. Omwanya gumwe ogurikworeka entunguuka n'okujumbura n'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, ogurikworeka emigisha mingi y'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: To ensure the health and productivity of their livestock, farmers must stay informed about potential threats to their animals. Implementing effective disease prevention strategies is crucial for maintaining a thriving farm.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulamu n'ebibala by'ebisolo byabwe, abalimi balina okumanyisibwa ku bintu ebiyinza okutiisa ebisolo byabwe. Okuteeka mu nkola enkola ennungi ez'okwetangira endwadde kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma ffaamu nga ekulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni dyangi gi tye ma komgi yot, lupur omyero gubed ki ngec i kom jami ma twero balo kwo pa dyangi gi. Keto yoo me gengo two I tic pire tek tutwal pi gwoko poto ma dongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun angaleu keda eswamae loajokan loka ibaren kec, ekot akoriok aijen nuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete aimusung itiang kec. Aitodolikin iwaitin lu itikitikere adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar amisirin nu ekoriete.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma ni e'yo afa ecopi anyapa eyivile 'diyi 'yepi onzi 'diyi ma dria ra eyini ani anyapa eyivile 'diyi ma rua ala azini afa eyini ezole 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Geri 'bani azo eyi atrizu kililiru 'diyi ma vuti obiza eri orodriru ori ezoza ni zozu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu amatungo gaabo gaine amagara marungi, abahingi n'abariisa bashemereire kumanya ebirikubaasa kutiinisa amatungo gaabo. Okuta omu nkora oburyo burungi bw'okuzibira endwara n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda faamu okukura.

eng_prompt: Farmers face numerous challenges in maintaining healthy livestock and crops. One significant issue they encounter is the prevalence of animal diseases, which can severely impact agricultural productivity.
lug_prompt: Abalimi basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kukuuma obulamu bw'ebisolo n'ebirime. Ensonga emu enkulu gye basanga kwe kubuna kw'endwadde z'ebisolo, ekiyinza okukosa ennyo amakungula g'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Lupur nongo peko mapol ikare me gwoko lee ki cam ma komgi yot. Peko acel ma pire tek ma ginongo obedo nyaa pa two ma mako lee, ma twero balo jami apita.
teo_prompt: Etereikina akoriok keda atiokisio nuipu kanu aidar ibaren keda iraan lu engalete. Ationis adiope naepol noi naetereikina keda kesi ngesi adeka na itiang, naepedori aitolitol akoru na akoru.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyi ma anyapa eyi ma ta mbazu azini ori eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu. E'yo azi okporu eyini esu ri azo anyapa eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni, e'yo ecopi afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ezazuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu kurinda amatungo n'ebihingirwe byabo kugira amagara marungi. Ekizibu kimwe ekikuru ekibarikushanga, n'oburwaire bw'amatungo, oburikubaasa kuteganisa munonga eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: While many infectious diseases can spread easily from person to person, some, like anthrax, have different modes of transmission. Understanding how anthrax is transmitted is crucial for public health and safety.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde endwadde nnyingi ezisiigibwa zisobola okusaasaana mangu okuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala, ezimu, nga anthrax, zirina engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okusaasaanyizibwa. Okutegeera engeri obulwadde bwa kalusu gye busaasaanamu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni two mapol ma kobo twero kobo oyot kibot ngat acel me cito bot ngat mukene, mukene calo anthrax, tye ki yoo mapat-pat me kobo. Niang kit ma two anthrax kobo kwede pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekorete adekasinei nu ikopas noi kanejaas itunga, icie kwape nat anthrax, ejaasi keda iponesio luegelegela luka aikopakin. Amisikin epone loekorere adeka naka anthrax erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azo karakara eyi ka tro eyi ere ewakokoru engazu 'ba alu alu vu, azi 'diyi ekile azo anthrax niri le, eyi ma geri eyi 'bani eyi erezu 'diyi ndundu. E'yo vata ni azo anthrax niri ma ereta ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo alataa ni azini ageitema ni o'bi eyini ri ni.
nyn_prompt: N'obu endwara nyingi ezirikuturira nizibaasa kujanjaara kurungi kuruga aha muntu kuza aha mugyenzi, ezimwe nka anthrax, ziine emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okujanjaara. Okwetegyereza oku oburwaire bwa anthrax burikuturira n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu n'ebyokwerinda.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, various zoonotic diseases pose significant risks to both livestock and human populations. Among these, anthrax has been identified as a notable concern, particularly affecting animal health.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, endwadde ez'enjawulo eziva mu bisolo ziteeka obulamu bw'ebisolo n'abantu mu matigga. Mu bino, obulwadde bwa anthrax buzuuliddwa nga obweraliikiriza naddala obukosa obulamu bw'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, two ma aa ki bot lee kelo peko madit tutwal I kom dyangi ki dano. I kin magi, two anthrax kinongo ni obedo peko madit tutwalle balo yotkom pa lee.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, adekasinei nu ikopas kanejaas itiang eyangaunete atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi ibaren keda itunga. Kanejaas nu, adeka naka anthrax nes ationis naepol noi, kacut aitolitol angaleu naka itiang.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, azo ndundu anyapa eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo onzi eyi eji anyapa eyi ma rua tualu 'ba eyi pie. Diyi ma eselea, 'ba esu azo anthrax niri e'yo azi okporu ni ru, tutuni anyapa eyi ma rua ala eza.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, endwara ezitarikushushana ezirikuruga omu nyamaishwa, niziteganisa amatungo n'abantu. Omuri ebi, oburwaire bwa anthrax butungirwe nk'oburikutiinisa munonga, okukira munonga oburikukwata aha magara g'amatungo.

eng_prompt: The spread of anthrax poses significant risks to both human and animal populations. Effective management strategies are essential to mitigate its impact on public health and agriculture.
lug_prompt: Okusaasaana kw'obulwadde bwa kalusu kuleeta akabi ak'amaanyi eri abantu n'ebisolo. Enkola ennungi ez'okuddukanya ebintu za mugaso nnyo mu kukendeeza ku buzibu obuli mu byobulamu by'abantu n'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Nya pa two anthrax kelo peko madit tutwal I kom dano ki lee. Yub me tic maber pire tek tutwal me dwoko piny adwogi ne I kom yot kom pa lwak ki pur.
teo_prompt: Awea naka adeka naka anthrax erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas itunga keda itiang. Iwaitin lu itikitikere ejok ejok kanu aitidisiar atiokisio ke nuka angaleu naka itunga keda akoru.
lgg_prompt: Azo anthrax niri ma ereta ni e'yo onzi eji 'ba eyi ma rua tualu anyapa eyi pie. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru 'diyi orodriru ecozu e'yo erini 'ye o'bi yi ma rua ala ma dria azini agirikica ma dria ri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okujanjaara kw'oburwaire bwa anthrax nikureeta akabi kahango aha bantu n'enyamaishwa. Enkora nungi y'okureeberera eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'oburiisa, n'ey'omugasho munonga, okubaasa kukyendeeza aha kabi kyarugiremu aha magara g'abantu hamwe n'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Anthrax is a serious infectious disease caused by the bacterium Bacillus anthracis, primarily affecting livestock and wild animals. While it is most commonly associated with animals, there are specific circumstances under which humans can become infected.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bwa Anthrax bulwadde obusiigibwa akawuka akayitibwa Bacillus anthracis, okusinga bukosa ebisolo by'omu nsiko n'ebisolo by'omu nsiko. Wadde nga kisinga kukwatagana n'ebisolo, waliwo embeera ez'enjawulo abantu mwe bayinza okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Anthrax obedo two ma kobo tutwal ma bakitiria Bacillus anthracis aye kelo, tutwalle balo dyangi ki lee lum. Kadi bed ni pol kare ki kubu ki lee, tye jami mogo ma dano twero nongo iye two.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka anthrax adekasinei nuikopasi noi nuikamunitos adeka naka Bacillus anthracis, nuetapit noi aimusung ibaren keda itiang lukokutwi. Karaida etapit duc aimorikikin keda itiang, ejaasi ejautene loepedoriata itunga adumun adeka.
lgg_prompt: Azo anthrax niri eri azo azi onzi 'ba eyi erepi omvele bacterium Bacillus anthracis niri ni fe ni, tutuni anyapa eyi eza tualu anyapa asea 'diyi pie. Erini tro ovuzu tualu anyapa yi be ra ti, e'yo azi 'ba ada yini ecozu ecazu azo be ra 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Anthrax n'endwara y'amaani erikuturira erikureetwa bakitiria ya Bacillus anthracis, erikukira kuteganisa amatungo n'amatungo g'omu kishaka. N'obu kiraabe nikikira kukwatanisa n'enyamaishwa, hariho embeera ezi abantu barikubaasa kukwatwa.

eng_prompt: Many infectious diseases can be transmitted from animals to humans, posing significant health risks. Among these, anthrax stands out as a particularly dangerous pathogen.
lug_prompt: Endwadde nnyingi ezisiigibwa zisobola okusaasaanyizibwa okuva mu bisolo okudda mu bantu, ekireeta akabi ak'amaanyi eri obulamu. Mu bino, obulwadde bwa kalusu bwe businga okuba obw'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Two mapol ma kobo twero kobo ki I kom lee me dok I kom dano, man kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom pa dano. I kin magi, two anthrax obedo two marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adekasinei nuipu nu ikopas epedorio aikopar kanejaas itiang itoni itunga, ido eyangaunete atiokisio nu angaleu. Kotoma ngul, ejenuna adeka naka anthrax kwape adeka naronon noi.
lgg_prompt: Azo karakara eyi eco eyi ere engazu anyapa eyi vu ecazu 'ba eyivu ra, eyini ani ecozu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ejizu ra. Diyi ma eselea, azo omvele anthrax ru ri e'da i ekile azo azi onzi tu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Endwara nyingi ezirikuturira nizibaasa kuruga omu nyamaishwa kuza omu bantu, ekirikureeta akabi kahango aha magara. Omuri ebi, oburwaire bwa anthrax nibwo burikukirayo kuba obw'akabi munonga.

eng_prompt: In the field of medicine, understanding the various types of diseases is crucial for effective treatment and prevention. Researchers often analyze these conditions to identify patterns and classifications.
lug_prompt: Mu by'obusawo, okutegeera endwadde ez'enjawulo kya mugaso nnyo mu bujjanjabi obulungi n'okuziyiza. Abanoonyereza batera okwekenneenya embeera zino okuzuula enkola n'ebika.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom, niang kit two mapatpat pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat ki gengo maber. Lutim kwed ipol kare gi ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede me niang kit ma jami tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo ikee, amisiikin iponesio lu adekasinei luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian ka aitikitik. Etapit duc angicak airereonor ejautene lo kanu ajenun iponesio ka atutubena.

eng_prompt: The health of wildlife and livestock is a growing concern for farmers and conservationists alike. Understanding the prevalence and impact of various animal diseases is crucial for maintaining biodiversity and food security.
lug_prompt: Ebyobulamu by'ebisolo by'omu nsiko n'ebisolo byeyongedde okweraliikiriza abalimi n'abakuuma obutonde bw'ensi. Okutegeera omuwendo n'ebikosa endwadde z'ebisolo ez'enjawulo kya mugaso mu kukuuma obutonde n'emmere.
ach_prompt: Kwo pa lee lum ki dyangi tye peko madit tutwal bot lupur ki joo ma gwoko jami ma orumuwa. Niang kit ma two mapat-pat tye kwede ki adwogi ne I kom lee pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo pa jami makwo mapat-pat ki cam.
teo_prompt: Angaleu na itiang lukokutwi ka ibaren erai aiyalongong naepol noi kanejaas akoriok keda ngul luidarete isuban. Amisiikin nuikamunitos adekasinei nu itiang luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iboro luipu ka inyamat.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, agriculture plays a crucial role in the economy, with many families relying on livestock for their livelihoods. As a result, animal husbandry has become an integral part of rural life.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikola kinene nnyo mu by'enfuna, era amaka mangi geesigama ku bisolo okusobola okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, obulunzi bw'ebisolo bufuuse ekitundu ekikulu mu bulamu bw'omu byalo.

teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaasi akoru keda aswam naepol noi kotoma akwap, ido ikalia luipu ejarete keda ibaren. Kanuka ngun, erai aipit ibaren ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijar naka icaloi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the agricultural industry has faced numerous challenges, including climate change and food security concerns. As a result, innovative solutions have become essential to enhance productivity and sustainability in farming practices.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, eby'obulimi n'obulunzi bisanga okusoomoozebwa kungi, omuli enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'eby'emmere. N'ekivuddemu, obuyiiya bufuuse bukulu okutumbula ebivaamu n'obuwangaazi mu nnima n'obulunzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, tic me pur ki gwoko lee orwatte ki peko mapol, ma I kingi obedo alokaloka me piny ki peko me nok pa cam. Macalo adwogi ne, diro manyen me yubu jami dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal me medo rwom me pur ki gwoko kwo pa lupur.

ach_prompt: I kare ma miti me mac tye ka medde, but lobo mapol tye ka tute matek me bedo ki mac ma oromo. Ludiro gi yee ni yoo manyen mite me tyeko peko me rweny pa mac matye kawot anyim.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, it's easy to become overly reliant on technology, even during our downtime. To ensure a restful night's sleep, I recommend minimizing distractions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero etambula amangu, kyangu okwesigama ennyo ku tekinologiya, ne mu biseera byaffe eby'ebbula ly'emirimu. Okusobola okwebaka obulungi ekiro, nkubiriza okukendeeza ku bintu ebiwugulaza.

lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini bongo wura o'diru 'diyi le bongo ajeru 'diyi azini bongo onyiru 'diyi. Kani si, wura adari ni tutuni enga e'yo ewakokoru azini e'yo eceza ma dria.

eng_prompt: Every morning, I look forward to the challenges and interactions that await me at the office. There's a sense of fulfillment that comes from being part of a team and contributing to our shared goals.
lug_prompt: Buli ku makya, nneesunga okusoomoozebwa n'okukolagana okundindiridde mu woofiisi. Waliwo obumativu obuva mu kubeera ekitundu kya ttiimu n'okuyambako mu bigendererwa byaffe eby'awamu.

teo_prompt: Kanginitupuruc, amina eong aingic atiokisio keda aineranara naejaatar eong koyapiesi. Ejai aiyalama na elomunit kotoma ajaut keda etimu ka aitodolikin alosikinetekosi.

eng_prompt: After a long battle with illness, our family has gathered to reflect on the life of a remarkable man. We are heartbroken to share the news that he has passed away.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana n'obulwadde okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'omu maka gaffe bakungaanye okufumiitiriza ku bulamu bw'omusajja ow'ekitalo. Tulina omutima ogumenyese okugabana amawulire nti afudde.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi keda adeka, atukonokin ekale wok aomoom nuikamunitos aijar naka etunganan loitegelikina. Itakadikit sio noi aimor keda yesi iyemuto ebe atwana ngesi.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'dizu azo be sa'wa ezu ma vutia, familia amavileri tra yi tualu e'yo egazu 'ba azi onyiru 'di ma idri ma dria. Ama asi nyoza be o'duko ecezu kini eri dra 'bo.

eng_prompt: I understand that this may be difficult to accept, but I must be honest with you. After careful consideration, I can no longer keep this information to myself.
lug_prompt: Ntegedde nti kino kiyinza okuba ekizibu okukkiriza naye nnina okuba omwesimbu gy'oli. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku nsonga eno, sikyayinza kukweka bubaka buno.

eng_prompt: Every day, he woke up with a single goal in mind: to bring joy to the love of his life. Despite the challenges they faced, he remained determined to make her smile.

eng_prompt: As we wrapped up our discussions, I couldn't help but reflect on the various experiences we encountered. It made me curious about the specific hurdles that arose throughout the conference.

eng_prompt: In many parts of the world, access to food remains a significant challenge. In Uganda, the struggle for basic sustenance is a harsh reality for numerous families.

lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga kwa maanyi nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Okutambuza obuzibu buno obulungi, okulambikibwa okuva mu bazadde n'abakuza kwa mugaso.

eng_prompt: To ensure that financial resources are allocated effectively, it is crucial to establish clear guidelines for accountability. Organizations seeking support must demonstrate their commitment to transparency and responsible management of funds.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti ensimbi zigabanyizibwa bulungi, kikulu nnyo okuteekawo enkola ennambulukufu ku mbalirira. Ebitongole ebinoonya obuyambi birina okulaga obwesimbu n'okukozesa obulungi ensimbi.

eng_prompt: Many employees are facing increasing levels of stress and burnout in their jobs. To promote a healthier work-life balance, the government should consider adjusting policies related to retirement.
lug_prompt: Abakozi bangi boolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa n'okukoowa mu mirimu gyabwe. Okutumbula enzikiriziganya ennungi wakati w'emirimu n'obulamu, gavumenti erina okulowooza ku ky'okukyusa enkola ezikwatagana n'okuwummula.

lug_prompt: Okuvuganya kw'abooluganda kubadde nsonga ya kukubaganya birowoozo wakati w'abazadde n'abasomesa okumala emyaka. Amaka mangi geesanga mu kusoomoozebwa kw'obukuubagano wakati w'abaana baago.

lug_prompt: Twetaaga okumaliriza enteekateeka y'olunaku lw'embaga. Kikulu nnyo buli kimu okutambula obulungi, n'olwekyo kakasa nti omugole omusajja n'omukazi batuuka mangu mu kkanisa ku lwomukaaga luno.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted the disparities in compensation across various public service roles. As a result, attention has turned to the financial benefits received by elected officials.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu nsasula mu mirimu gya gavumenti egy'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, okufaayo kukyusiddwa ku miganyulo gy'ensimbi abakungu abalonde gye bafuna.

lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kisembera, embeera ejjudde okweraliikirira n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Bannansi okwetooloola eggwanga beetegekera okukuba obululu mu kaseera akakulu ennyo eri demokulasiya waabwe.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me yer tye cok, dano mapol gitye ki miti matek tutwal dok bene gitye ka laro lok. Anywali me lobo man tye ka yubbe me bolo kwir I kare ma loc alwak pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, epol noi aomisio keda ipegeta. Itunga luka akwap kere eutasi aitemonokin aicak abootin kotoma apak naepol noi naka aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo ri si, e'yo 'ba eyini ega 'diyi ma omgbo ni tualu e'yo agbatara ni 'diyi pie. Kari anzi kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi otuta 'ye voti 'bezu sa'wa okporu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, abantu baingi nibateekateeka kandi bakahanuura. Abatuuragye okwetorora eihanga bariyo nibeteekateekyera kuteera akaruuru k'abo omu bwire bukuru munonga omu by'obutegyeki bwabo.

eng_prompt: In many political systems, candidates have the option to enter primaries without facing any challengers. This often leads to situations where individuals can secure their party's nomination without competition.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola z'ebyobufuzi nnyingi, abeesimbyewo balina eky'okukola okuyingira akalulu k'okusunsulamu awatali kuvuganya. Kino kitera okuviirako embeera abantu kinnoomu gye basobola okufuna okusunsulwa kw'ekibiina kyabwe awatali kuvuganya.
ach_prompt: I yub me cungu iwi bye mapol, lucungu tye ki gum me donyo I yer me tedero labongo ngat mo keken ma pyem kwedgi. Man ipol kare kelo peko ma ngat acel acel twero nongo kwir pa dul me cungu iwi bye meggi labongo pyem.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuipu nuka epolitikis, ejaasi abwoak keda aseunet naka alomar toma aseo naka puraimare komam etereikina keda itunganan. Eyangauni ngin duc ejautene loepedoriata itunga adumun abwoetait naka epate kec komam abolobol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni karakara 'diyi ma alea, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma opeta eyi fizu opeta eyi ma eselea 'ba ageti otipi 'diyi kokoru ci. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi ni ecozu pa sozu amuti yini 'diyi vu a'bala kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora nyingi y'eby'obutegyeki, abesimbireho baine obushoboorozi bw'okuza omu karuuru k'okubanza bataine orikubahakanisa. Eki nikikira kureetaho oburemeezi obu abantu barikubaasa kwebembera ekibiina kyabo bateine kuhakanisa.

eng_prompt: Candidates often invest significant time and resources into their campaigns, knowing that the outcome can shape their political future. As the election approaches, the stakes become increasingly clear.
lug_prompt: Abeesimbyewo batera okuteeka ebiseera bingi n'eby'obugagga mu kampeyini zaabwe, nga bakimanyi nti ebivaamu bisobola okukwata ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso eby'ebyobufuzi. Okulonda bwe kugenda kusembera, ebizibu byeyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Lucungu ipol kare giketo kare ki lim madit tutwal I yub me bito kwirgi, kun gingeyo ni adwogi me bito kwirgi twero yubu kwo gi me anyim. Ka yer tye ka cok, jami ma tye ka time tye ka nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Etapit abwaak aipikakin apak naepol noi keda iboro toma okampeinikec, ejenete ebe epedori akiro nuelomunete aitolomun koingarenikec naka epolitikis. Neyapiete aseo, ejenete akiro nuepedorete atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Ba pa tupi 'diyi sa'wa angiri 'diyi 'ba sa'wa angiri azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ti odaza eyivile 'diyi ma alea, eyini nii ra kini e'yo efupi 'diyi eco eyi ma ewu drialeri 'ba ra. E'yo opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi eca e'da sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Abeesimbireho nibatamu esente n'obwire bwingi omu kampiini zaabo, barikumanya ngu ebirikuruga omu kampiini nibiteganisa ebiro byabo by'omumaisho omu by'obutegyeki. Oburuuru ku burikuhika haihi, ebirikukwataho nibyeyongyera kwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: After years of political turmoil and civil unrest, he emerged as a dominant figure in Ugandan politics. His leadership has significantly shaped the country's trajectory over the decades.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'obutabanguko mu by'obufuzi n'obutabanguko mu bantu, yafuuka omuntu ow'amaanyi mu by'obufuzi bwa Uganda. Obukulembeze bwe bukyusizza nnyo eggwanga okumala emyaka mingi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki lweny, en odoko dano ma oywek tutwal I lok me cungu iwi bye me lobo Uganda. Tela mege okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa lobo man I mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka amumu keda akiro nuka politikis, abu ngesi kotakanu kwape itunganan yenepol noi kotoma akiro nuka politikis nako Uganda. Ejulaki engarenone ke noi akiro nuka akwapuwok kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Eli ngiringiri politiki ni azini ngiringiri kari ma eselea 'diyiniri ma vutia, efu 'ba okporu e'yo politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ru. Eri ma driceza oja kari 'di ma e'yo eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka y'obutabanguko omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'obutabanguko, akarugaho nk'omuntu w'amaani omu by'obutegyeki bwa Uganda. Obwebembezi bwe bukozire kihango aha ntwaza y'eihanga okumara emyaka mingi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in political engagement among young people. This shift in interest is reflected in the growing number of youths who are joining political parties.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu kwenyigira mu byobufuzi mu bavubuka. Enkyukakyuka eno yeeyolekera mu muwendo gw'abavubuka abeegatta ku bibiina by'obufuzi ogweyongera buli lukya.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me donyo I lok me cungu iwi-bye I kin bulu omede tutwal. Alokaloka man nen I wel bulu matye kadonyo I dul me cungu iwi bye matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi alomar toma akiro nuka politikis kanejaas atumunak. Aijulanakineta nuka eipud itodunit ebe iyata atumunak luipu alomar toma opatei.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba ode eyini fizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'di e'da kalafe 'ba ode yini fizu amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alia ri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hatwireho okweyongyera omu kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki omu minyeeto. Okuhinduka kw'ekyetengo nikweyorekyera omu kweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'eminyeeto eyegaitsire aha bibiina by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive political landscape, candidates must demonstrate their capabilities and effectiveness to gain the trust of voters. As public scrutiny intensifies, the ability to deliver results becomes increasingly crucial for those seeking office.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi ey'ennaku zino ey'okuvuganya, abeesimbyewo balina okulaga obusobozi bwabwe n'obwangu okufuna obwesige bw'abalonzi. Ng'okukebera kw'abantu kweyongera, obusobozi bw'okutuusa ebivuddemu bweyongera okuba obw'omugaso eri abo abanoonya woofiisi.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem me cungu iwi bye ma ite kare ni, lucungu omyero gunyut kero gi me nongo gen pa lubol kwir. Ka lwak tye ka ngiyo kit ma tic tye ka wot kwede, kero me kelo adwogi ne doko gin ma pire tek tutwal pi joo matye ka yenyo tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka politikis ilolo, ekot abwoak aitodun ebe epedorete kesi aswam ejok kanu adumun amunokina naka aseak. Kwape eyatakinor aingic naka itunga, epol noi apedor naka aitodolikin akiro kanu ngul luekotosi aiboisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala politiki ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma e'da eyi ma okpo azini e'yo eyini 'ye kililiru 'diyi eyini ani 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma asi 'bazu eyi ma dria beni. O'bi eyini e'yo eyi ma pamvu onezu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, geri eyini ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu ri eca orodriru 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki by'erizooba eby'okuhayahayana, abesimbireho bashemereire kworeka obushoboorozi bwabo n'obuhangu bwabo, kugira ngu batungye obwesigye bw'abateezi b'akaruuru. Okukyebera abantu nikweyongyera, okubaasa kw'okureeta ebirugiremu nikweyongyera kuba okw'omugasho ahari abo abarikuronda ofiisi.

eng_prompt: In the unpredictable landscape of politics, candidates must prepare for various outcomes. A wise contender understands that setbacks can be valuable learning experiences.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi etategeerekeka, abeesimbyewo balina okwetegekera ebivaamu eby'enjawulo. Omuvuganya omugezigezi ategeera nti okugwa emabega kuyinza okuba eby'omuwendo eby'okuyiga.
ach_prompt: I lok me cungu iwi bye ma pe ngenne, lucungu omyero guyubbe pi adwogi ma pat pat. Lweny maryek niang ni peko twero bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me pwonyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka politikis numam ejena, ekot abwaak akapanakin kanuka akiro nuegelegela. Itunganan yen acobeu ejeni ebe atiokisio eraas nu isisiaunete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma otu eyi e'yo ndundu eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyisi. Ba onduaru a'bala 'yepi 'diyi nii ra kini e'yo ewaru 'diyi eco ovu e'yo onitani orodriruni'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebitarikwetegyerezibwa, abesimbireho bashemereire kweteekateekyera ebirikubaasa kuruga omu by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana. Omurwanirizi omunyabwengye naayetegyereza ngu oburemeezi nibubaasa kuba eky'omugasho omu kwega.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the power to choose leaders lies in the hands of the people. With the right message and determination, individuals from all walks of life can rise to the challenge.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obuyinza okulonda abakulembeze buli mu mikono gy'abantu. N'obubaka obutuufu n'obumalirivu, abantu okuva mu mbeera z'obulamu zonna basobola okwanganga okusoomoozebwa.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, twero me yero lutela tye I cing lwak. Ki kwena matir ki tek cwiny, dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat twero cobo peko ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, apedor na aseun engarenok ejaas akanin itunga. Keda akiro nu abeit ka amunokina, epedorete itunga luka aiboisio kere aitodolikin ainingosit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, okpo drice'ba eyi opezu ri o'bi eyi ma dria. O'dukoti kililiru be azini asi 'baza be, 'ba alu alu engazu pari dria ma alia 'diyi eco e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dri fu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, abantu nibo baine obushoborozi bw'okutoorana abebembezi. N'obutumwa obuhikire hamwe n'okumariirira, abantu b'emiringo yoona nibabaasa kusingura oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Many candidates pour their hearts and souls into their campaigns, hoping to connect with voters and make a difference. When the results come in, the disappointment can be overwhelming for those who invested so much effort.
lug_prompt: Abeesimbyewo bangi bawaayo emitima gyabwe n'emyoyo gyabwe mu kampeyini zaabwe, nga basuubira okukwatagana n'abalonzi n'okukola enjawulo. Ebivuddemu bwe bijja, obwennyamivu buyinza okuba obw'amaanyi eri abo abaassaamu amaanyi mangi.
ach_prompt: Lucungu mapol giketo cwinygi kacel ki cwinygi I yubgi me bito kwir, ki gen me kube ki lubol kwir ki kelo alokaloka. Ka adwogi ne obino, cwer cwiny twero bedo lamal tutwal pi joo ma guketo kero gi weng I tic ne.
teo_prompt: Eswamak luipu lu ekotosi aibwo kotoma okampeinikec, emuno ebe epedorete kesi arucokina keda aseak kosodete aitolomun aijulanakineta. Arai elomunete akiro, epol noi amamut aiyalama kanejaas ngul luiswamaete kagogongu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara pa tupi 'diyi yi ma asi azini yi ma orindi 'ba ti odaza ma alia asi 'baza be yi ecizu 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi be azini yi ma esele cozu. O'duko efupi 'diyi ka emu 'bo, 'ba okpo 'bapi angiri 'diyi ma asi nyoza ni eca okporu tu.
nyn_prompt: Abeesimbireho baingi nibahayo emitima yaabo n'emyoyo yaabo omu kampiini zaabo, baine amatsiko g'okuhikaana n'abateezi b'akaruuru n'okukora empindahinduka. Ebyarugiremu ku birikubaho, okushemererwa nikubaasa kuba kw'amaani ahari abo ababaire bateiremu amaani maingi.

eng_prompt: The integrity of our democratic process is at stake, and the trust of the citizens is eroding. We must take decisive action to ensure fair and transparent elections.
lug_prompt: Obulambulukufu bw'enkola yaffe eya demokulasiya buli mu kabi, era obwesige bwa bannansi bukendeera. Tulina okubaako kye tukolawo okulaba nga wabaawo okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa tela pa lwak tye kama rac, ki gen pa anywali tye ka rweny. Omyero wamok tamwa matek me neno ni yer tye maber labongo ayela.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ainapakina naka aseo naka itunga toma ationis, ido ekidiokoto amunokina naka itunga. Ekot oni aswam kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe ejai aseo najokan.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma e'yo adasi, azini asi'baza kari anzi yini 'diyi niri ni esi esi esi. Le ama ma 'ye e'yo okporu eyini ani opeta kililiru azini e'yo ada be 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora ya demokurasiya yaitu eri omu kabi, n'obwesigye bw'abantu buriyo nibuhwaho. Twine kukora kyona ekirikwetengyesa kureeba ngu akaruuru kabaho omu buringaaniza n'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: Ensuring fair and transparent elections is essential for the integrity of our democracy. Any attempt to manipulate the voting process undermines the trust and values we hold as a community.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okulonda okw'amazima n'obwerufu kya mugaso nnyo eri demokulasiya waffe. Okugezaako kwonna okukyusakyusa mu kulonda kutyoboola obwesige n'empisa ze tulina ng'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Neno ni yer obedo maber dok atir pire tek tutwal I tela pa lwak. Tem mo keken me nywaro tic ki yoo me bolo kwir balo gen ki ber bedo ma watye kwede macalo lwak.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong aseo na ejok ka na ecai erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ajokis naka aseo naka itunga. Adiogogongu kere naka aitolitol ainapeta nuka aseo itolitoli amunokina keda iponesio luibusakinit oni ajaut keda kwape itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa kililiru azini e'yo ada be 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo ci 'bani lezu e'yo voti 'bezuri ojazu ri ni asi'baza azini orodri amani aa'zu ongulumu ru 'diyi ezazu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu akaruuru karimu amazima n'oburingaaniza n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburingaaniza bwa demokurasiya yaitu. Okugyezaho kwona okubuzabuza omuringo gw'okuteera akaruuru nikushiisha obwesigye n'emitwarize ei twine nk'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of the electoral process is paramount. Candidates eagerly anticipate the opportunity to present their visions and connect with voters.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwesimbu mu nkola y'okulonda bwe businga obukulu. Abeesimbyewo beesunga omukisa okuwaayo ebirooto byabwe n'okukwatagana n'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal. Lucungu tye ki miti madit tutwal me nongo gum me nyutu tam gi ki kubbe ki lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo, ejokuna noi ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo. Ekotosi abwoak arereng naka aitodiar aomisiokec ka arucokina keda aseak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri eri orodriru ndeni. Ba pa tupi pa so'baa 'diyi asi driasi drileba esu e'yo yini 'diyi ecezu azini yi ecizu 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru n'obw'omugasho munonga. Abeesimbireho nibateganisa omugisha gw'okworeka ebiteekateeko byabo n'okukwatanisa n'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: The integrity of our democratic process is at stake, and the safety of voters should be our top priority. We cannot allow fear and intimidation to overshadow the fundamental right to participate in elections.
lug_prompt: Obulambulukufu bw'enkola yaffe eya demokulasiya buli mu kabi, era obukuumi bw'abalonzi bulina okubeera ekintu kyaffe ekikulu. Tetusobola kukkiriza kutya na kutiisibwatiisibwa kufiiriza ddembe lyaffe ery'okwenyigira mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa tela pa lwak tye kama rac dok ber bedo pa lubol kwir omyero obed gin ma pire tek botwa. Pe watwero weko lworo ki buru dano balo twero me bedo tye I yer.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ainapakina naka aseo kosi toma ationis, ido ibusakinit oni aisingarenit ayuwara naka aseak. Mam oni ipedori acamakin akuriau keda aitukurian apedorosio nuka itunga ajaikin toma aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile democratia ma e'yo adasi ri eri e'yo ewaru ma alia, dika 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma ageitema ma ovu e'yo ama ni okporu ndeni ri'I. Ama econi fe uri azini ori gbaza ma 'du okpo drilemgbo 'bani fizu opeta eyi ma alea ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Obusingye bwa demokurasiya yaitu buri omu kabi, kandi eby'okwerinda by'abateezi b'akaruuru bishemereire kwebembera. Titurikubaasa kwikiriza okutiina n'okutinatinisa kurekyeraho obugabe bw'okwejumba omu karuuru.

eng_prompt: Participating in the democratic process requires a commitment to understanding the issues at hand. Many citizens find that staying informed and involved demands significant effort and dedication.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu nkola ya demokulasiya kyetaagisa okwewaayo okutegeera ensonga eziriwo. Bannansi bangi bakizuula nti okubeera abamanyifu n'okwenyigiramu kyetaagisa okufuba n'okwewaayo.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak mito keto cwiny I niang lok matye. Anywali mapol nongo ni bedo ki ngec ki timo jami mito tute ki keto cwiny.
teo_prompt: Ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aseo naka itunga ekoto ainakina amisiikin akiro nu ejaas. Itunga luipu ejenete ebe ajaut keda akiro ka ajaut keda akiro ekot agogongu ka ainakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia niri ma alea pa tuzu ri le asi 'baza e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi vazu. Kari anzi karakara eyi esu kini aa'zu o'dukoti be azini aa'zu e'yo eyi ma alea 'diyi le okpo azini ava angiri.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu nkora ya demokurasiya nikyetenga okwehayo kwetegyereza enshonga eziriho. Abatuuragye baingi nibashanga ngu okuguma nibamanya kandi baketabamu nikyetenga okukoresa amaani n'okwehayo.

eng_prompt: Many countries have successfully transitioned to democratic governance, demonstrating that change is achievable. With the right measures in place, societies can foster an environment conducive to peaceful political processes.
lug_prompt: Ensi nnyingi zisobodde okudda ku demokulasiya, ekiraga nti enkyukakyuka esoboka. Nga waliwo enkola entuufu, ebitundu bisobola okuleetawo embeera ewagira enkola z'ebyobufuzi ez'emirembe.
ach_prompt: Lobe mapol guloke me doko tela pa lwak, ma nyutu ni aloka-loka twero time. Ki yoo matir, kabedo mapat-pat twero yubu kabedo ma kelo kuc I lok me cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Apedo akwapin nuipu aijulakin toma apugan naka itunga, itodunit ebe epedorio aitodolikin aijulakineta. Keda aitemonokineta nuajokak, epedorete itunga aitolomun ejautene loajokan kanu ainapakina kotoma politikis.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi oja eyi drile suzaru e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea, e'dazu kini 'ba eco ojata 'ye ra. Geri kililiru 'diyisi, ongulumu eyi eco angu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi 'yezu asianzu si ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga maingi gasingwire okuhika aha bwebembezi bwa demokurasiya, ekirikworeka ngu empindahinduka neebaasa kubaho. Ebyanga nibibaasa kureetaho embeera nungi erikureetaho obusingye omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about democratic processes, many experts have raised concerns about the integrity of various voting systems. As a result, it has become increasingly clear that some election methods are not fair.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku nkola ya demokulasiya, abakugu bangi baleese okweraliikirira ku bwesimbu bw'enkola z'okulonda ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola z'okulonda ezimu si za bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom yub me tela pa lwak, ludiro mapol guwaco ni gi tye ki lworo I kom kit ma yub mapat-pat me bolo kwir tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, tye ka nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me yer mukene pe tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aseo, apotu ipirioitin luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos ainapakina naka aseo. Kanuka ngun, ejenuna noi ebe mam iponesio ice luka aseo ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alia e'yo otita o'bi yini 'diyi ma driari ma dria, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi ece asi otiza e'yo onyiru geri voti 'bezuri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, eca curu'do e'da kini geri opetaa ni 'diyi ma azi ovuni e'yo adaru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha nkora ya demokurasiya, abakugu baingi boorekire okwerarikirira aha buringaaniza bw'enkora y'okuteera akaruuru etari emwe. N'ekyarugiremu, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu emiringo y'okuteera akaruuru terimu buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: In a competitive environment where every decision counts, the stakes are higher than ever. One misstep could lead to significant consequences for those in power.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'okuvuganya nga buli kusalawo kukulu, emigabo giri waggulu okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Ensobi emu eyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri abo abali mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me pyem matye kama tam weng pire tek, peko tye malo tutwal. Bal acel twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom joo matye I loc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naepol noi naepol noi aomisio kere. Adiakaret adiope epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok mama ejaasi ngul luejaasi toma apugan.
lgg_prompt: Angu a'bala ni 'di ma alea e'yo dria 'bani pe 'diyi ma orodri ni, e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi uru ndeni aga oku driorisi. E'yo onzi alu ni eco fe 'ba opi dria 'diyi dri e'yo onzi eyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuhayahayana ahu buri kiteiso kiri eky'omugasho, ebigyendererwa biri ahaiguru munonga. Enshobi emwe neebaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi by'amaani ahari abo abari omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In today's society, many people are questioning the effectiveness of traditional forms of protest. As movements gain momentum, the role of public gatherings in advocating for change comes into focus.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, abantu bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'engeri z'obuwangwa ez'okwekalakaasa. Ng'ebibiina by'obwannakyewa byeyongera amaanyi, omulimu gw'enkungaana z'olukale mu kulwanirira enkyukakyuka gujja mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom kit ma tim me jemo macon tiyo kwede. Ka dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka nongo kero, tic pa gure pa lwak me lweny pi aloka-loka bene tye kamedde anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka iponesio luka aidiya lu atekerin. Kwape eyatakinos apugan, epolor noi aswam naka atukonokin naka itunga kanu aitopoloor aijulakineta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo aoko e'dazu 'diyi ma orodri si. Ongulumu eyini okpo esuzu risi, azi okuta o'bi eyini 'diyi ni e'yo otuzu ojata ejizu ri ma dria ri eca e'yo okporu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, abantu baingi nibabangaanisa omugasho gw'emihanda y'obuhangwa ey'okwesharinga. Obwegyendesereza ku burikweyongyera, omugasho gw'enteerane z'abantu baingi omu kurwanirira empinduka nigweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In today's diverse political landscape, many individuals find themselves disillusioned with traditional party affiliations. Embracing a unique perspective can lead to a more nuanced understanding of complex issues.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi ey'enjawulo eya leero, abantu bangi beesanga nga baggwaamu essuubi olw'ebibiina by'obufuzi eby'ennono. Okukkiriza endowooza ey'enjawulo kisobola okukuyamba okutegeera obulungi ensonga enzibu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapat-pat me tela me cungu iwi-bye me kare-ni, dano mapol tye ki cwer cwiny I kom dul me cungu iwi-bye macon. Bedo ki tam mapat twero weko waniang lok mapigi tego tutwal.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo egelegela loka epolitikis loka lolo, mam itunga luipu epodokinitos nuikamunitos ipatei lumojong. Aingarakin aomisioit na itegelikina epedori ayangaun amisiikin na abeit naka akiro nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni ewu andruri ma alea ndu ndu 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi ma asi eza e'yo amuti eyini oku 'diyi ni 'diyisi. E'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi vazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana ebiro ebi, abantu baingi bakahwamu amaani ebibiina by'obutegyeki eby'obuhangwa. Okwikiriza enteekateeka y'omutaano, nikibaasa kureetaho okwetegyereza gye enshonga ezigumire.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the participation of citizens in the electoral process is crucial for ensuring fair representation. To facilitate this, it is essential that voters have access to accurate and comprehensive information regarding the elections.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okwetaba kwa bannansi mu nkola y'okulonda kwa mugaso nnyo okulaba nga bakiikirirwa mu bwenkanya. Kino okusobola okukolebwa, kyetaagisa nnyo abalonzi okufuna obubaka obutuufu era obujjuvu obukwata ku kulonda.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo tye pa anywali I yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal me neno ni lucungu pi lwak tye maber. Me konyo eni, pire tek tutwal ni lubol kwir gubed ki ngec matir dok matut I kom yer.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka aseo, ajaut naka itunga kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ebwoikitai kes ejok. Kanu aitapatan ngun, ejokuna noi aseak adumunun akiro nuka abeit nuikamunitos aseo.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, kari anzi eyi ma pa tuzu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru eyini ani ecozu pa tuzu eyi ma paria kililiru beni. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eri orodriru kini 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma esu o'dukoti kililiru azini dria opeta ma dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, okwejumba kw'abantu omu by'okuteera akaruuru n'eky'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu hariho oburingaaniza omu kuteera akaruuru. Okuhwera eki, n'eky'omugasho abateezi b'akaruuru kutunga amakuru agahikire agarikukwata aha buruuru.

eng_prompt: To ensure a smooth and efficient community engagement process, careful planning is essential. As part of this strategy, village mobilisers are recruited ahead of time.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba ng'abantu b'omu kitundu bakwatibwako bulungi, kyetaagisa okuteekateeka obulungi. Ng'omu ku bukodyo buno, abakunga abantu mu byalo bayingizibwa nga bukyali.
ach_prompt: Pi neno ni tic pa lwak owoto maber, yub maber pire tek tutwal. Macalo but yub man, lutic me caro ki coyo gi con.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapeta nuka aiswamanar itunga ejok, ibusakinit aitemonokin ejok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, itolomio itunga luka ocaloi eringa apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu o'bi eyi ma eselea kililiru, otuta kililiru ri eri orodriru. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ba trapi caloa 'diyi si drioru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu bakwatanisa kurungi, okuteekateekyera kurungi n'eky'omugasho. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, abarikurundana abantu omu byaro, nibaheebwa emirimo bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: As we discuss the structure of our government, it's important to understand the various positions within it. For instance, can you tell me what responsibilities a member of parliament typically has?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe twogera ku nsengeka ya gavumenti yaffe, kikulu okutegeera ebifo eby'enjawulo mu yo.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka nyamo kit ma gamente tye kwede, pire tek tutwal me niang kabedo mapat-pat matye ie.
teo_prompt: Kwape iutar oni aitemitem nuka apugan wok, ejokuna noi amisiikin aiboisio nuegelegela nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo onzezu geri ama vile gameteni 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru angu ndundu eri ma alia 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nituhanuura aha nkora ya gavumenti yaitu, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza emyanya etari emwe omuri yo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing interest among young people in civic engagement and leadership roles. This shift has sparked a wave of enthusiasm for political participation in Kampala.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo obwagazi obweyongera mu bavubuka mu kwenyigira mu mirimu gy'obwannakyewa n'obukulembeze. Enkyukakyuka eno ereeseewo obwagazi bw'okwenyigira mu byobufuzi mu Kampala.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, bulu tye ki miti madit tutwal I kom tic pa lwak ki tela. Alokaloka man okelo miti madit tutwal me donyo I lok me cungu iwi bye I Kampala.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai eipud loepol noi kama ejaasi atumunak aitolot aswamisio nuka itunga keda aingarenikin. Eyangau aijulanakineta ngun eipud loka ajaut toma akiro nuka politikis ko Kampala.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ava 'ba ode eyi ma eselea e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu o'bi eyi ma eselea azini azi driceza ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ojata 'di eji ava 'ba eyini fizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo Kampala-a ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu bato beeyongyeire kwenda kwejumba omu mirimo y'obwebembezi. Empindahinduka egi ereesireho omujinya gw'okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki omuri Kampala.

eng_prompt: In order to participate in the upcoming elections, it's essential to have the proper identification. One of the key requirements for voting is possessing a National Identity Card.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwetaba mu kulonda okujja, kikulu nnyo okuba n'endagamuntu entuufu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyetaagisa okulonda kwe kuba n'endagamuntu.
ach_prompt: Me bedo tye I yer matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki lanyut maber. Gin acel ma pire tek ma mite me bolo kwir obedo bedo ki lanyut mamegi nyo ID.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajaikin toma aseo naebunit, ejokuna noi ajaut keda apapula naka aijen naedolit. Adiopet koboro lu ekotoi kanu aseo ngesi ajaut keda akaadi naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru aa'zu kokobi e'dazuri be kililiru. Afa azi okporu 'bani le voti 'bezuri ma azi ovuzu kadi kari ni 'ba e'dazuri be.
nyn_prompt: Okuza kwejumba omu karuuru akarikwiija, n'eky'omugasho kugira endagamuntu nungi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikwetengwa omu kuteera akaruuru n'okugira endanga muntu.

eng_prompt: Understanding the needs and concerns of the people they represent is crucial for effective governance. This requires a deep awareness of the local issues and demographics that shape their community.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebyetaago n'ebiruma abantu be bakiikirira kikulu nnyo mu bukulembeze obulungi. Kino kyetaagisa okumanyisibwa ennyo ku nsonga z'ekitundu n'obungi bw'abantu ebikulaakulanya ekitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Niang miti ki peko pa dano ma gicung pigi obedo gin ma pire tek pi tela maber. Man mito ni dano gubed ki ngec matut I kom lok matye I kabedo gi ki wel dano matye I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin ipudesia keda ipudesia luka itunga lu ebwoikitos kesi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu epugae loajokan. Ekoto ngin aijen naepol noi nuikamunitos akiro nuka atutubet keda itunga luejaasi toma atutubetekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba yini pa sozu yi ma paria 'diyi ma e'yo azini e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru driceza muke ri ni. Diri le onita angiri e'yo angu ma alia 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza ebyetengo n'ebirikuteganisa abantu abu barikujwekyera n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. Eki nikyetengyesa okumanyisibwa munonga aha nshonga z'omubyaro hamwe n'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukoresa ebyanga byabo.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, participation in governance is encouraged and accessible to all citizens. This inclusivity allows for a diverse range of voices and perspectives in the political arena.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okwetaba mu bukulembeze kukubirizibwa era kutuukirirwa bannansi bonna. Okwegatta kuno kusobozesa amaloboozi n'endowooza ez'enjawulo mu kisaawe ky'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, dano weng kicuku cwiny gi me bedo tye I tela. Bedo tye pa dano weng eni weko dwon ki tam mapat-pat bedo tye I tenge me cungu iwi-bye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka aseo, isinyikokitai itunga kere ajaut toma apugan. Aimorikikina ngin ijaikini iporotoi luegelegela keda aomisio nuegelegela kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba le kari anzi dria eyi ma fi e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea indi. E'yo 'bani 'ba dria trazuri ni fe o'duko azini egata ndundu eyini aa'zu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, abantu boona nibashabwa kwejumba omu bwebembezi. Okutwariramu abantu boona nikibaasisa amahurire gatarikushushana n'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In a desperate bid for power, certain individuals resorted to unethical tactics. The integrity of the electoral process was compromised as allegations of manipulation began to surface.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okufuna obuyinza, abantu abamu baddukira mu bukodyo obutali bwa mpisa. Obulambulukufu bw'enkola y'okulonda bwataataaganyizibwa ng'ebigambibwa nti okulonda kwakolebwa mu bukyamu bitandise okulabika.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me nongo twero, dano mukene gucako tic ki diro ma pe ber. Kit ma yub me bolo kwir obedo kwede oballe ikare ma byek me tim me nywaro yer ocake.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo apedor, apotu icetunga kogeutu aitwasam iponesio lumam iswamaete ejok. Aponi itolitoli ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo naarai apotu aitoroneta nuka akoko kogeutu alomun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu okpo esuzuri ma alia, 'ba azi 'diyi e'do geri onzi 'diyi ayu. E'yo onyiru e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri eca ewaru e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini opeta eyi ma alea e'yo onzi 'diyi e'dozu e'dazu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda munonga kwebembera, abantu abamwe bakakoresa obukoryo obutari bw'emitwarize mirungi. Obucureera bw'eby'oburuuru bukateganisibwa ahabw'okugira ngu haabaho okubuzabuza omu by'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to surge, healthcare facilities are facing unprecedented challenges. Many hospitals are struggling to keep up with the overwhelming demand for medical care and support.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, amalwaliro gasanga okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Amalwaliro mangi galwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu obw'amaanyi obw'obujjanjabi n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, odi yadi tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Odi yadi mapol tye ka tute matek me bedo ki miti madit tutwal me kony ki kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, ejaas adekisia keda atiokisio nuipu noi. Eutasi adekisia nuipu ainingosit aitodolikin eipuda loepol noi loka amukian keda agangat.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tutu, angu arojo ni 'diyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. Arojo karakara eyi dri ci aa'zu e'yo 'ba eyini lezu aro esuzu azini atita fezu ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, amarwariro nigatunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Amarwariro maingi nigateganisibwa okuguma nigakora ahabw'obwetaavu bwingi bw'obujanjabi n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: As the campaign season heats up, party officials are rallying supporters and outlining their achievements. Recent polls indicate a favorable shift in public opinion, boosting their confidence.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okunoonya obululu bwe kigenda kyeyongera, abakungu b'ekibiina bakunga abawagizi n'okulaga bye batuuseeko. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enkyukakyuka ennungi mu ndowooza z'abantu, ekitumbula obwesige bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me bito kwi tye ka cako, ludito me dul me cungu iwi-bye ne gitye ka rweyo lucwakgi me nyutu jami ma gutimo. Bolo kwir ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu aloka-loka I tam pa lwak, ma weko gibedo ki tek cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi apakio nuka ikampeins, eutasi eswamak luka epate atukokin egangitokokec kosodete aitetem nu iswamatos kesi. Itodunitos aseeta nuitetiak aijulanakineta kotoma aomisio nuka itunga kanu aitogogong amunokina kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa agbatara ti odazaniri ni ecaria, azi'ba amuti politiki ni 'da ni 'diyi 'ba atita fepi 'diyi tra dika eyi e'da e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Opeta o'diru 'diyi ece ojata kililiru egata o'biyini 'diyi ma alia, yini asi'baza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'ehururu ku burikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru b'ekibiina bariyo nibarundaana abahagizi n'okworeka ebi batungire. Okuteera akaruuru okuhweireho nikworeka empindahinduka omu miteekateekyere y'abantu, ekirikubongyera obwesigye bwabo.

eng_prompt: In a competitive political landscape, candidates are constantly seeking ways to gain an edge over their opponents. One of the most effective strategies they employ is to invest heavily in outreach efforts aimed at potential voters.
lug_prompt: Mu byobufuzi ebirimu okuvuganya, abeesimbyewo buli kaseera banoonya engeri y'okufuna enkizo ku be bavuganya nabo. Emu ku ngeri ezisinga obulungi ze bakozesa kwe kuteeka ssente nnyingi mu kaweefube w'okutuusa obubaka eri abalonzi abasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem I tenge me cungu iwi bye, lucungu I wibye I kare weng gitye ka yenyo yoo me loyo jo ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi. Yo acel maber tutwal ma gitiyo kwede en aye me keto cente madit tutwal I yub me lok ki lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka epolitikis, etapit duc abwoak aimo iponesio luka aitelekaar lueboloboloete keda kes. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu iswamaete kesi ejok ngesi aipikakin ikapun luipu noi toma aitodolikin itunga luepedorete aise.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala politiki ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi sa'wa driasi geri nda eyini ani drileba esuzu 'ba ageti otipi eyi pie 'diyi ma dria. Otita azi alu eyini ayu orodriru ndeni ri eri robia ayuzu okporu e'yo nzezu 'ba ecopi voti 'bepi ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebirimu okuhayahayana, abesimbireho burijo nibasherura oburyo bw'okusingura abarikubesimbaho. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kukora gye, n'okuta esente nyingi omu kuhika abantu abarikubaasa kuba abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Despite extensive campaigning and outreach efforts, the turnout for the youth elections was expected to be high. However, the day of the elections arrived with an unexpected lack of enthusiasm from the community.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo kakuyege ow'amaanyi, abavubuka bangi baali basuubirwa okwetaba mu kulonda okwo. Kyokka, olunaku lw'okulonda lwatuuka n'obutaba na ssanyu okuva mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me bito kwi obedo tye, wel bulu ma obolo kwi obedo pol tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, nino me bolo kwir obino ki cwiny me cwer cwiny I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikampeins luipu, eomitai ebe epote itunga luipu alomar toma aseo naka atumunak. Konye, abu aparan naka aseo kodolu keda amamus na aiyalama kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti odaza ni azini e'yo o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba ega 'ba emu'ba opeta 'ba ode eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ni nga ovu angiri. Kani si, o'du opetaa niri eca ava ako ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'bani ega kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okuronda akaruuru kw'amaani n'okuhutuura abantu, abantu bakaba nibateekateekwa kuba baingi omu karuuru k'eminyeeto. Kwonka, eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru rikaija n'obutagyendera kimwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In their quest for electoral success, candidates often seek to connect with local communities. To gain support, they employ various strategies, including enlisting the help of residents from small towns.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya obuwanguzi mu kulonda, abesimbyewo batera okunoonya okukwatagana n'ebitundu. Okufuna obuyambi, bakozesa obukodyo obw'enjawulo, omuli n'okusaba obuyambi bw'abatuuze okuva mu bubuga obutono.
ach_prompt: I yoo me yenyo loc I yer, lucungu ipol kare gimito kube ki lwak ma ikabedo gi. Me nongo kony, gitiyo ki yoo mapat-pat, ma I kingi obedo penyo kony ki bot lwak me boma matino-tino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aimo akerianut naka aseo, etapit abwoak arucokina keda itunga luka atutubet. Kanu adumun agangat, itwasamaete kesi iponesio luegelegela, aimoriarit ailip agangat kama ejaasi itunga luka otaunin ludidik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini drile suza lezu opetaa ma alia, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi le yi eci o'bi angu ma alia 'diyi pie. Atita esuzu, eyi geri ndundu eyi ayu 'ba aa'pi tawuni werea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuronda obusinguzi omu by'oburuuru, abesimbireho nibaronda okuhikaana n'abantu b'omubyaro. Okutunga obuhwezi, nibakoresa oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe, otwariiremu n'okushaba obuhwezi bw'abatuuragye kuruga omu ndembo nkye.

eng_prompt: As election season approaches, candidates ramp up their rhetoric to win over voters. In their quest for power, many resort to misleading statements and exaggerated claims.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kigenda kisembera, abeesimbyewo bongera amaanyi mu bigambo byabwe okusobola okusikiriza abalonzi. Mu kunoonya obuyinza, bangi baddukira mu bigambo ebibuzaabuza n'okusavuwaza.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye cok, lucungu gi tye ka medo lokgi me nongo lubol kwir. I yenyo twero gi, dano mapol tiyo ki lok ma pe atir.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, iyatakitos abwoak akiro kec kanu aitelekaar aseak. Kotoma aimo apedorosio, itunga luipu itwasamaete akiro nu aisab ka akiro nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecaria, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi e'yo nze eyini ani voti 'bepi 'diyi ma asi esuzu. E'yo yini okpo ndazu 'diyi ma alia, 'ba karakara yi asi e'do e'yo enzoru azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, abesimbireho nibeyongyera kugamba kugira ngu batungure abateezi b'akaruuru. Omu kuronda obutegyeki, baingi nibagarukamu okugamba ebitahikire n'okugamba ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: As the election season heats up, candidates and their teams scramble to gain an edge over their opponents. In the midst of this fierce competition, hidden truths often come to light.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kigenda kyeyongera, abeesimbyewo ne ttiimu zaabwe balwana okufuna enkizo ku be bavuganya nabo. Wakati mu kuvuganya kuno okw'amaanyi, amazima agakwekeddwa gatera okuvaayo.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye kamedde anyim, lucungu kacel ki tim gi tye ka tute matek me loyo jo ma gitye ka pyem kwedgi. Ikare me pyem matek tutwal eni, lok ada ma ki kano ipol kare bino ka maleng.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejai apak naka aseo, eutasi abwoak keda itimun kec ainingosit adumun apedor adepar lueboloboloete keda kes. Kokiding naka abolobol na naepol noi, etapit duc abeit naka aiyeyea ajenun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa nirisi, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi tualu amuti yini 'diyi pie a'di 'di yi 'ba ageti otipi yi be 'diyi ma dria. A'bala okporu 'di ma talasi, e'yo a'da ozizaru 'diyi tuni efu amve.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikweyongyera, abesimbireho hamwe na tiimu zaabo nibarwana kutunga obusinguzi ahari abo abu barikuhajaana nabo. Ahagati y'okuhayahayana oku okw'amaani, amazima agasherekirwe nigakira kumanywa.

eng_prompt: Tensions were already high as the crowd gathered for the highly anticipated election results. Everyone held their breath, hoping for a clear outcome that would unite the community.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali dda waggulu ng'abantu bakungaana olw'ebyava mu kulonda ebisuubirwa ennyo. Buli omu yakwata omukka, ng'asuubira ebinaavaamu ebitangaavu ebijja okugatta ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye ikare ma lwak gugure pi adwoki me yer ma byek tye I komgi tutwal. Dano weng ogwoko yweyo gi, ki gen me nongo adwogi maber ma obi ribo lwak.
teo_prompt: Apol noi aiyalongong naarai apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu akiro nuka aseo nuewomitai ebe elosete. Apotu itunga kere kongetakisi ekwam, aomit ebe ebuni akiro ngun aimorikikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ndra uru tu 'ba eyini eyi trazu agata opetaa ni 'bani ega saaru 'diyi ma e'yosi. Ba dria bi yi ma ava, asi 'baza be e'yo efupi ti ecita ejipi ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru ahabwokuba abantu bakateerana ahabw'ebyarugire omuburuuru ebyabaire nibiteekateekwaho munonga. Buri omwe akakinga omwitsyo, aine amatsiko g'okureeba ebirugyemu ebirikwetegyerezibwa, ebirikugaita abantu.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks as rival factions campaigned fiercely for control. As the crowd gathered, the atmosphere grew increasingly charged, leading to a volatile situation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki eziwera ng'ebiwayi ebivuganya bikola kakuyege ow'amaanyi olw'obuyinza. Abantu bwe beeyongera okukungaana, embeera yeeyongera okuba ey'akajagalalo, ekyaviirako embeera okuba ey'akajagalalo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede pi cabit mapol tutwal I kare ma dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat obedo ka bito kwir matek tutwal pi loc. I kare ma dano mapol gugure, lworo omedde, ma oweko lweny obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu naarai apotu igurupun lueboloboloete kiswamata ikampeins kanu aipuga. Neautar itunga atukokin, abu eidicane kiyatakin, ido abu ijaik ejautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni 'diyi e'bi tu sabiti eyi ma alea amuti a'bala 'yepi 'diyi ni ti odaza okporu 'yezu opi dria. Ongulumu eyini trazu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'da ma omgbo tu ra erini ani fezu e'yo 'da ni ecazu e'yo ewaru ru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi obu ebibiina ebirikuhayahayana byabaire nibiteera akaruuru k'okuronda obutegyeki. Abantu kubarikuteeranira hamwe, embeera neyeyongyera kuba mbi, ekyarugiremu akaimukiriro.

eng_prompt: Despite facing significant challenges and limited resources, various political groups in Uganda are gearing up for the upcoming elections. Among them, the least supported party in Uganda is determined to make its voice heard.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi n'ebikozesebwa ebitono, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo mu Uganda byetegekera okulonda okujja. Mu byo, ekibiina ky'eby'obufuzi ekisinga obuwagizi obutono mu Uganda kimaliridde okuleeta eddoboozi lyakyo okuwulirwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed gurup mapat-pat me cungu iwi-bye tye ka nongo peko mapol ki lim manok, gitye ka yubbe pi yer matye kabino ni. I kingi, dul me cungu iwi bye matye ki cwak manok tutwal I lobo Uganda tye ki miti me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok keda iboro lu ikidioko, eutasi igurupun luka politikis luka Uganda aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit. Kanejaas kesi, epate lo mam igangitai ko Uganda ekapakina aitodiar eporotokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu azini afa ayuzaru were 'diyi be ra ti, amuti politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi eyi otu opeta emupi 'diyi ni. Amuti 'da eyi ma eselea, amuti politiki ni atita esupi were ndeni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri le i ma o'duko ma eri ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi n'eby'obugaiga bikye, ebibiina by'obutegyeki bitari bimwe na bimwe omu Uganda nibyeteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwija. Omuri byo, ekibiina ekitarikushagikwa munonga omu Uganda, kyehaireyo kureeka ngu eiraka ryakyo ririkuhurirwa.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, the political landscape is heating up. Candidates are preparing their campaigns, and the time has come for the members of parliament to officially declare their intentions.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera, embeera y'ebyobufuzi yeeyongera. Abeesimbyewo beetegekera kampeyini zaabwe, era ekiseera kituuse ababaka ba paalamenti okulangirira ebigendererwa byabwe mu butongole.
ach_prompt: Ka nino me yer tye ka nyiko cok, lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka medde anyim. Lucungu gitye ka yubbe me bito kwi, dok kare dong oromo pi lumemba me parliament me tito miti gi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo, euta akiro nuka epolitikis aiyatakin. Eutasi abwoak aitemonokin ikampeins kec, ido adolu kwana apak naka imeeban luka airabet alimor nu ekotos kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri si, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu uru. Ba pa tupi 'diyi ti odaza yini 'diyi oturia, dika sawa ca 'ba memba koloseni ni 'diyi dri e'yo yini le 'ye 'diyi oluzu azita pala.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku riri haihi, eby'obutegyeki biriyo nibyeyongyera. Abeesimbireho bariyo nibatebeekanisa ehururu zaabo, kandi obwire buhikire abakiiki omwishengyero kurangirira ekigyendererwa kyabo omu butongore.

eng_prompt: As the political landscape shifts, party leaders have been strategizing to solidify their support base. With recent polls showing a tight race, the ruling party is gearing up for a vigorous campaign.
