lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyobufuzi ekyukakyuka, abakulembeze b'ebibiina babadde bakola enteekateeka okunyweza obuwagizi bwabwe. Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko awo, ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kyetegekera kakuyege ow'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka loke kwede, lutela me dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat gubedo katic ki yoo mapat-pat me jingo cwakgi. Ki bolo kwir ma okato ma onyuto pyem matek tutwal, dul me cungu iwi bye matye I loc tye ka yubbe me bito kwi matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor akiro nuka epolitikis, eutasi engarenok luka ipatei aitemonokin iwaitin lu aitogogong egangitokokec. Keda aseo napac itodunit ebe ejai abolobol naepol noi, euta epate lo ipugai aitemonokin kanu aisup aseeta naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki niri ni i ojazu risi, drice'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi e'bi otuta eyi 'ye eyini ani atita fezu eyivile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Opetaa o'diru 'diyi ni e'dazu a'bala okporu ni si, amuti politiki ni kari ma dri cepiri ni otuta 'ye e'yo ti odaza okporu ni 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'obutegyeki ku erikuhinduka, abeebembezi b'ebibiina by'obutegyeki batwire nibateekateeka kuhamya obushagiki bwabo. Ahabw'okuteera akaruuru okuhweireho, ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki, nikitebeekanisa ehururu y'amaani.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose among the candidates, supporters began to clash over differing ideologies. The atmosphere was charged with uncertainty as the election day approached.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu beesimbyewo, abawagizi baatandika okulwanagana olw'endowooza ez'enjawulo. Embeera yalimu obutali bukakafu ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera.
ach_prompt: Ka telle omedde ikin lucungu, lucwak gucako lweny pi tam mapat-pat. Lobo ne obedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kare ma nino me bolo kwir tye cok.
teo_prompt: Neapolor atiokisio kiding abwoak, apotu egangitok kogeutu aitepeg kanu aomisio nuegelegela. Apol noi amamus acamunit naarai eyapie apaaran naka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi e'do aco co e'yo egata yini ndundu 'diyisi. Angu 'da ma alea e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma omgbo tu o'du opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo risi.
nyn_prompt: Obu obunkenke bwayeyongyera ahagati y'abeesimbireho, abahagizi bakatandika kurwanagana ahabw'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana. Embeera ekaba etarikwetegyerezibwa ahabwokuba eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru rikaba riri haihi.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the recent party elections have reshaped the political landscape. As a result, many of the current members of parliament lost in their party elections.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, okulonda kw'ebibiina okwaliwo gye buvuddeko kukyusizza embeera y'ebyobufuzi. N'ekyavaamu, bangi ku babaka ba paalamenti abaliwo kati baawangulwa mu kulonda kw'ekibiina kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, yer me dul me cungu iwi-bye ma okato cokcok-ki okelo aloka-loka I lok me cungu iwi-bye. Macalo adwogi ne, lumemba me parliament mapol ma kombedi gurwenyo yer me dul me cungu iwi bye gi.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, apotu aseo naka ipatei kijulakisi akiro nuka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, aponi itelekarai imeeban luka airabet luipu kotoma aseo naka epate kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo osuta ma alia, opeta amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi oja e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, memba koloseni ni curu'do 'diyi ma karakara avi opeta amuti yini 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuteera akaruuru k'ebibiina by'obutegyeki okwabaireho juba, kikareetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu by'obutegyeki. Ekyarugiremu, ba memba baingi b'eishengyero abariho obwahati bakasingwa omu karuuru k'ekibiina kyabo.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have raised concerns about the integrity of the electoral process in that district. Voter suppression tactics and irregularities in ballot counting have become more prevalent, prompting investigations.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumye gye buvuddeko zireeseewo okweraliikirira ku bwenkanya bw'enkola y'okulonda mu disitulikiti eyo. Obukodyo bw'okunyigiriza abalonzi n'obutali bwenkanya mu kubala obululu byeyongedde nnyo, ekireetedde okunoonyereza.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lworo I kom kit ma yer tye kawot kwede I district enoni. Diro me diyo lubol kwir kacel ki tim maraco ikare me kwano kwir tye mapol tutwal ma oweko timo kwed obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itolomutu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos ainapakina naka aseo ko disitrikt kangol. Iwaitin lu itikitikere aseak keda aibucaret kotoma aimar abootin eraas nuepolok noi, ido eyangaunitos aingic.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza geri opetaa ni distrikiti 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ogazu azini e'yo 'bani voti lazu geri kililiru si ku 'diyi curu'do curu'do curu'do curu'do curu'do e'do e'yo vuti ondaza ni 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kubaho zireesireho okwerarikirira aha nkora nungi y'eby'oburuuru omu disiturikiti egyo. Obukodyo bw'okubuzabuza abateezi b'akaruuru hamwe n'obushomankuzi omu kubara oburuuru, byeyongyeire kureetaho okucondooza.

eng_prompt: Tensions rose as the election results were announced, revealing a surprising outcome that left many feeling disillusioned. In response, a large group of supporters gathered to voice their concerns and frustrations.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwajjawo ng'ebyava mu kulonda birangiriddwa, ebyava mu kulonda eby'ekitalo ebyaleka bangi nga baweddemu amaanyi. Mu kwanukula, ekibinja ky'abawagizi ekinene kyakuŋŋaanye okwogera okweraliikirira kwabwe n'okunyiiga.
ach_prompt: Lworo omede ikare ma kicwalo adwogi yer, man onyuto adwogi me ur ma oweko dano mapol pe gubedo ki gen. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa lucwak mapol gugure me nyutu lworo gi ki cwer cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos nalimorere akiro nuka aseo, itodunit akiro nuapotu koinakisi itunga luipu aiyalongong. Kanu abongokin, apotu egurupu loepol loka egangitok kotukokinos kanu aitodun aiyalongongokec keda aiyalongongokec.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza tu uru e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ni e'dazu 'bori ma vutia. E'yo 'di ma omvitaniria, ongulumu 'ba atita fepi 'diyi tra yi ma asi otiza azini candi yini 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukarugaho, ebyarugire omu buruuru ku byarangirwe. Omu kugarukamu, guruupu mpango y'abashagiki baketeeranira hamwe kworeka enshonga zaabo hamwe n'okwerarikirira kwabo.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the city has seen a significant shift in voter demographics. As a result, the upcoming elections are poised to be dominated by a new generation of candidates.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, ekibuga kirabye enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu muwendo gw'abalonzi. N'ekivuddemu, okulonda okujja kujja kufugibwa omulembe omupya ogw'abeesimbyewo.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, city oneno aloka-loka madit tutwal I wel lubol kwir. Macalo adwogi ne, yer matye kabino ni anywali manyen aye obi loyo.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, ewanyunit esite aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma aseo. Kanuka ngun, ebuni aseo na ebunit aitelekaar itunga luitetiak lu ebwoete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo osuta ma alia, aku ambu cityniri ndre ojata angiri 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma kalafe ma alia. E'yo 'disi, opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea 'ba pa tupi o'diru 'diyi nga ovu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, orurembo rureebire empindahinduka y'amaani omubare gw'abateezi b'akaruuru. N'ekyarugiremu, oburuuru oburikwija nibwija kwebemberwa abantu abasya.

eng_prompt: The city has been buzzing with excitement and anticipation as candidates have campaigned vigorously over the past few months. Voters are encouraged to make their voices heard in this crucial decision for the community's future.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kibadde kijjudde essanyu n'okusuubira ng'abeesimbyewo bakoze kakuyege ow'amaanyi mu myezi egiyise. Abalonzi bakubirizibwa okuleka amaloboozi gaabwe okuwulirwa mu kusalawo kuno okukulu ku lw'ebiseera by'ekitundu eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lobo ne obedo ki yom cwiny madit tutwal I kare ma lucungu gubedo ka bito kwi matek tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Kicuku cwiny lubol kwir me winyo dwon gi ikare me moko tam ma pire tek pi anyim pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Ileleba noi esite keda aiyalama naarai apotu abwaak kiswamata ikampeins keda agogongu kotoma ilapio lu atuboros. Isinyikokitai aseak aijaikin iporotoikec aipup kotoma aseunet na naepol noi kanu oingaren naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu city niri ebi ovu ayiko si tualu asi 'baza be 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ni ti odaza 'ye okporu mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. Ba ai 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu e'yo 'duza okporu 'di ma alea ongulumu eyi ma ewu drialeri ni.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rwiine okushemererwa n'okushemererwa ahabw'abeesimbireho kukora kampiini n'amaani omu myezi mikye ehwaire. Abateezi b'akaruuru nibahigwa kuhurikiriza eiraka ryabo omu kusharamu oku okw'omugasho ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya by'abantu.

eng_prompt: The integrity of a democratic system relies heavily on the electoral process. To ensure that citizens can trust their government, it is essential that all elections are conducted without bias or manipulation.
lug_prompt: Obwesimbu mu nkola ya demokulasiya bwesigamye nnyo ku nkola y'okulonda. Okusobola okukakasa nti bannansi basobola okwesiga gavumenti yaabwe, kikulu nnyo okulonda kwonna okukolebwa awatali kusosola oba okukyusakyusa.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye pa loc alwak jenge tutwalle I kom yub me bolo kwir. Me neno ni anywali tye ki gen i kom gamente meggi, pire tek ni yer weng otimme labongo cungu iwi dul mo keken.
teo_prompt: Apedorit naka aseo kotoma apugan naka itunga ejai kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo. Kanu aanyun ebe epedorete itunga amunokin apugan kec, ejokuna noi aitolot aseo komam atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada geri o'bi yini o'bi yini o'bi yini 'diyi ma dria ri yi ati e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria. O'bi eyini ani ecozu asi'bazu eyi ma gamete ma dria ra, eri orodriru 'bani opeta eyi 'yezu opendu kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Obucureera bw'obutegyeki bwa demokurasiya nibugyendera aha nkora y'eby'oburuuru. Okuhamya ngu abatuuragye nibeesiga gavumenti yaabo, n'eky'omugasho ngu oburuuru bwona bukorwe hatariho okushoroora nainga okubuzabuza.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, a local political landscape has been shaken up as family ties are put to the test. With both candidates passionate about their vision for the community, the stakes have never been higher.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu kitundu yakankana ng'enkolagana y'amaka egezeseddwa. Ng'abeesimbyewo bombi baagala nnyo okwolesebwa kwabwe eri ekitundu, emigabo tegibangako waggulu.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ngeng tutwal, lok me cungu iwi-bye me tedero olokke tutwal pien wat ikin jo me ot tye I atematema. Kit ma lucungu aryo weng gitye ki miti madit tutwal I kom neno gi pi lwak, peko ne pud pe obedo lamal tutwal.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, aponi itobwotarai epolitikis loka atutubet naarai ewanyunitai eidicane lo okalia. Keda abwaak ngun kere lu ekotosi aitodolikin aomisioitikec kanuka itunga, mam ationis erai naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi osuta si, e'yo politiki ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi oja eyi e'yo familia eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ni e'dazu. Ba pa tupi iri 'diyi ma ava e'yo yini lezu o'bi yi driri ma dria, e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ovuni nga uru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, eby'obutegyeki by'omukyanga bihindukire ahabw'omukago gw'amaka kugyezibwa. Ahabw'abeesimbireho bombi okukunda munonga enteekateeka yaabo ahabw'abantu, ebigyendererwa tibikabaire biri ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: The integrity of our electoral process is crucial for a functioning democracy. Unfortunately, some individuals resort to unethical practices to influence voter behavior.
lug_prompt: Obulambulukufu bw'enkola yaffe ey'okulonda bukulu nnyo mu demokulasiya akola. Eky'ennaku, abantu abamu baddukira mu bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa okukyusa enneeyisa y'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: Ber pa yub me bolo kwir obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi loc alwak me tic maber. Ki gum marac, dano mukene gidok I tim ma pe ber me doro tim pa lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Acoa naka ainapeta wok nuka aseo erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aseo naka itunga. Nukaiturur, icie itunga itwasamaete iponesio luarokok kanu aitolitol iponesio luka aseak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada ama vile e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo democracia ni azi ngazu ri ni. Drile onziru, 'ba azi 'diyi e'yo onzi 'ye 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma adriza ojazu.
nyn_prompt: Obucureera omu by'oburuuru bwaitu n'obw'omugasho ahabw'obugabe bw'okusharamu oburikukora. Eky'obusaasi, abantu abamwe nibatandika kukora ebitahikire, kugira ngu babaase kukyendeeza aha mitwarize y'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the polls closed and the counting began, anticipation filled the air. Voters eagerly awaited the outcome, hoping for a swift declaration of the results.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwaggalwawo era okubala ne kutandika, abantu baali beesunga nnyo. Abalonzi balindirira n'obwagazi ebyava mu kulonda, nga basuubira okulangirira amangu ebyava mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma bolo kwir ogik ki kwano kwir ocake, dano mapol gubedo ki gen. Lubol kwir gukuru adwogi yer ki miti madit tutwal, kun gitye ki gen ni kibinyuto adwogi yer ne oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neagolokinor aicak abootin kosodi aimar itunga, apotu itunga luipu opotu. Apotu aseak idarakisi akiro nuka aseo, aomitos ebe eponio alimor akiro ngun katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa ni opizu azini 'bani voti lazu ri ni e'doria, asi 'baza ga angu ma alea tre. Ba voti 'bepi 'diyi te e'yo efupi voti 'bezuri avasi asi 'baza be e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu mbeleru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku bwabaire bukingire, okubara kw'oburuuru kukatandika, abantu bakaba nibateekateeka munonga. Abateezi b'akaruuru bakategyereza ebyarugire omu buruuru, barikuteekateeka ngu ebyarugire omu buruuru nibiija kurangirirwa juba.

eng_prompt: To achieve our goals and effectively represent our constituents, we must focus on strengthening our internal relationships. A divided front will only hinder our chances of success in the upcoming election.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe n'okukiikirira obulungi abantu baffe, tulina okussa essira ku kunyweza enkolagana yaffe. Enjawukana zijja kulemesa emikisa gyaffe egy'obuwanguzi mu kulonda okujja.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti wa ki cung maber pi lwak ma I kabedo wa, omyero waket cwiny wa I kom jingo wat I kinwa. Apoka-poka I kin dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat obi balo gum ma watye kwede me loc I yer matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi ka abwoikin abwoikinitokosi ejok, ekot oni aitogogong eidicane wok. Aitiakatiaka naka akwap ebuni aitikitik arerengusiowok nuka akerianut kotoma aseo naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Asisile amani 'diyi esuzu azini pa sozu 'ba angu amani opi nyazu 'diyi ma paria kililiru, le ama ma 'ba asi e'yo ama eselea 'diyi ma okpo otuzu. E'yo esele coza ni nga lu ama ma drileba agata esuzu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea ri atri.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu n'okujwekyera kurungi abantu abu turikujwekyera, twine kuta amaani omu kuhamya enkoragana yaitu. Okwebaganisamu nikwija kuremesa obusinguzi bwaitu omu karuuru akarikwija.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, fresh perspectives can invigorate political discourse and engage a broader electorate. Therefore, embracing new candidates can lead to a more representative and dynamic political landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, endowooza empya zisobola okuzzaamu amaanyi okwogera kw'ebyobufuzi n'okwenyigiramu abalonzi abagazi. N'olw'ekyo, okukkiriza abeesimbyewo abapya kisobola okuleetawo embeera y'ebyobufuzi ennungi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, tam manyen twero weko lok me cungu iwi-bye bedo yot dok weko lubol kwir mapol bedo tye. Pi meno, jolo lucungu manyen twero kelo cungu iwi bye matye ki dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo, epedorete aomisio nuitetiak aitogogong akiro nuka politikis kosodete aibwaikin aseak luipu. Kanuka ngun, aijaun abwaak luitetiak epedori ayangaun abwoikinitok ka ainapeta nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia ni ma alia, egata o'diru 'diyi eco e'yo nzeza politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eyi eco 'ba karakara voti 'bepi 'diyi ma eselea indi. Ka'dini, 'ba pa tupi o'diru 'diyi atizu ri eco fe e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma pa sozu 'ba dria ma paria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora ya demokurasiya, enteekateeka nsya neebaasa kuhwera omu kugamba ahaby'obutegyeki n'okushendashenda abateezi b'akaruuru. N'ahabw'ekyo,okwikiriza abesimbireho abasya, nikibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the political landscape has become increasingly polarized. As a result, debates and disagreements among politicians have intensified.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, embeera y'ebyobufuzi yeeyongedde okwawukana. N'ekivuddemu, okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'obutakkaanya mu bannabyabufuzi kweyongedde.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lok me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat omede ki kelo apoka-poka. Macalo adwogi ne, laro lok ki telle ikin lucungu iwi bye omedde tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol noi atiakatiaka naka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, apol noi epeget keda amamut acamanar kiding ipolitisan.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma esele co tualu. E'yo 'disi, agbatara azini erita ako 'ba politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eby'obutegyeki byeyongyeire kwebaganisamu. N'ekyarugiremu, okuhanuura n'obutakwatanisa ahagati y'ab'eby'obutegyeki kweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: As the election season approached, local political dynamics began to shift dramatically. Community interest surged, leading to a competitive atmosphere among potential candidates.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kyasembera, embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu kitundu yatandika okukyuka. Okwagala kw'abantu kweyongedde, ekyaviiriddeko embeera y'okuvuganya mu abo abeesimbyewo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kare me bolo kwir tye cok, lok me cungu iwi bye me tedero ocako loke tutwal. Miti pa lwak omede, ma oweko pyem obedo tye ikin joo ma mito cung.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, abu epolitikis loka atutubet kogeu aijulakin noi. Abu eipud loka itunga kiyatakin, ido abu koyangau abolobol kama ejaasi ngul luekotosi abwaak.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo risi, e'yo politiki ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do i oja okporu. Ongulumu eyi ma ava tu ra, e'yo 'di fe baka seza ni eca 'ba ecopi pa tupi ra 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku bwahikire, eby'obutegyeki byatandika kuhinduka munonga. Abantu beeyongyeire kukunda, ekyarugiremu okuhayahayana ahagati y'abeesimbireho.

eng_prompt: As we arrived at the polling station, we were hopeful to cast our votes in the upcoming election. However, our excitement quickly turned to frustration when we discovered a significant issue.
lug_prompt: Bwe twatuuka mu kifo we balondera, twali tusuubira okukuba obululu mu kulonda okubindabinda. Kyokka, essanyu lyaffe lyakyuka mangu ne lituleetera okunyiiga bwe twazuula ensonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma wao I kabedo me bolo kwir, wabedo ki gen me bolo kwir I yer matye kabino ni. Kadi bed kumeno, yom cwiny wa olokke odoko cwer cwiny I kare ma waniang lok mo ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Neadolio sio aiboisit naka aicak abootin, amunokina sio aicak abootin kosi kotoma aseo naebunit. Konye, apotu aiyalama kosi kijulakinos atipet nawanyunia sio akirot naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Amani ecazu pari voti 'bezuri ma alia 'boria, ama asi 'baza be ama vile voti 'bezu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alia ra. Kani si, ayiko amavile ri oja i e'yere amani e'yo azi okporu ni esuzu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Ku twahikire aha mwanya gw'okuteera akaruuru, tukaba twine amatsiko g'okuteera akaruuru omu karuuru akarikwija. Kwonka, okushemererwa kwaitu kukarahuka kuhinduka okwerarikirira ku twajumbwire enshonga y'amaani.

eng_prompt: During a heated election night, tensions ran high as the results began to pour in. Supporters gathered anxiously, waiting to hear the final outcome of the closely contested race.
lug_prompt: Mu kiro ky'okulonda eky'ebbugumu, obunkenke bwavaayo ng'ebyava mu kulonda bitandise okufuluma. Abawagizi baakuŋŋaanye n'obweraliikirivu, nga balindirira okuwulira ebyava mu lwokaano.
ach_prompt: I dyewor me bolo kwir ma obedo ki lyeto madit tutwal, lworo obedo tye ikare ma adwogi yer ocako bino. Lucwak gucokke ki miti madit tutwal, kun gitye kakuru adwogi me pyem ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akware naepol noi naka aseo, apol noi aiyalongong naarai egeunos akiro nuelomunitos. Apotu egangitok kotukokinos keda aiyalongong, aidar aipup akiro nuka awasia nuka abolobol.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'bani opetaa 'yezu 'diyi ma alia, asi otiza tu uru e'yo efupi 'diyi ni e'doria. Ba atita fepi 'diyi tra eyi asi driasi, te e'yo asizu abala 'da ma alea 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kiro ky'okuteera akaruuru, obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru ahabw'ebyarugire omu buruuru. Abashagiki baketeeranira hamwe n'okwerarikirira, barinzire kuhurira ebirugyire omu kwiruka okw'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: As I prepared to cast my ballot, I double-checked my registration status online. To my dismay, I discovered that my name did not appear on the voters' register.
lug_prompt: Nga nneetegekera okukuba akalulu kange, nakebera emirundi ebiri embeera yange ey'okwewandiisa ku mutimbagano. Ekyanneeraliikiriza kwe kuzuula nti erinnya lyange teryali ku lukalala lw'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma atye ka yubbe me bolo kwir, aneno kit ma acoya kwede ki intanet. Ki cwer cwiny madit adada, aniang ni nyinga pe tye I buk me nying lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aitemonokin aicak abootin, abu eong aany bobo eipone lo ewadikauna eong kolago. Abu eong anyunyura noi nawanyunia eong ebe mam ekiror ejai toma oitabo loka aseak.
lgg_prompt: Ma otuta 'yeria ma vile voti 'bezu, ma andri ma ru siza geri oli aliasiri pale iri. Ma dri candisi, ma esu kini ma ru awini e'da buku 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma ru si ku.
nyn_prompt: Obu naabaire nintebeekanisa kuteera akaruuru kangye, nkashwijuma emirundi ebiri oku naabaire nyehandikiise aha intaneeti. Ekyangumize munonga, nkashanga ngu eiziina ryangye tirari aha rukarara rw'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Many people are disillusioned with the current state of leadership, feeling that too many politicians prioritize personal gain over the needs of their constituents. It's essential to remember that public service is a noble calling that requires integrity and selflessness.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baggwaamu essuubi olw'embeera y'obukulembeze eriwo kati, nga bawulira nti bannabyabufuzi bangi bakulembeza ebyetaago byabwe okusinga ebyetaago by'abantu baabwe. Kikulu okujjukira nti okuweereza gavumenti mulimu gwa kitiibwa ogwetaagisa obwesimbu n'obuteefaako.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol cwinygi pe yom ki tela matye kombedi, gitye ki tam ni lucung iwi-bye mapol giketo cobo miti gi obed gin ma pire tek loyo miti pa lubol kwir gi. Pire tek tutwal me poo ni tic pi lwak obedo tic ma pire tek ma mito ni dano gubed ki ada ki cwiny me jalle ken.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu iyalamasi keda ejautene loka engarenone loakwana, eomitos kesi ebe ipolisin luipu isingarenitos ameda kec bon adepar ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec. Erai ibore yenepol noi aiitun ebe erai aijanakin apugan aiwororio naejok na ekoto aiyuwara keda amuno.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi aa'ni ayikosi e'yo driceza ni sa'wa 'disi ri si ku, eyini egazu kini 'ba karakara politiki ni 'diyi eyi ma orodri eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo eyini le 'diyi. Eri orodriru e'yo egazu kini azi ngaza o'bi eyini ri eri 'yeta azi okporu lepi 'ba ma aa e'yo ada be azini eyi ma ngulupi si ku ni i.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi tibashemerereirwe obwebembezi oburiho obwahati, nibateekateeka ngu ab'eby'obutegyeki baingi nibakulembeza ebyetengo byabo kukira ebyetaago by'abantu abu barikujwekyera. N'eky'omugasho kwijuka ngu obuheereza bwa gavumenti n'omurimo murungi ogurikwetenga obwesigwa n'okwehayo.

eng_prompt: As I observe the political landscape, it becomes increasingly clear that many leaders seem to favor their friends and family over qualified candidates. This pattern raises questions about the integrity of our political system.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nneetegereza embeera y'ebyobufuzi, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abakulembeze bangi baagala nnyo mikwano gyabwe n'ab'omu maka gaabwe okusinga abo abalina ebisaanyizo. Enkola eno ereetawo ebibuuzo ku bwesimbu bw'enkola yaffe ey'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Ka atye ka neno kit ma jami tye kawot kwede I lok me cungu iwi bye, nen atyer kamaleng ni lutela mapol maro luremgi ki lugangigi loyo lucungu ma gupore. Man kelo lapeny I kom ada pa yub me cungu iwi bye megwa.
teo_prompt: Neasesenenei eong akiro nuka epolitikis, ecai cut ebe esubit bala eminasi engarenok ice ipaperokec keda lukokalekec adepar abwoak luejaasi keda apedor. Eyangauni epone ngol aingiseta nuikamunitos abeit naka epolitikis wok.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ndreria, eri e'da kini drice'ba karakara eyi le eyi ma agyipi azini familia eyivile 'diyi aga 'ba agapi ra 'diyi. E'yo 'di ni zita eji e'yo ama vile politikini 'diyi ma e'yo ada ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ndikureeba eby'obutegyeki, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu abeebembezi baingi nibenda banywani baabo n'ab'omuka yaabo kukira abetsimbireho abashemereire. Enkora egi nereetaho okubanganisa aha buringaaniza bw'enkora yaitu y'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: As the election approached, he gathered us together to discuss his strategy for ensuring a fair voting process. He emphasized the importance of having eyes on the ground to monitor the situation.
lug_prompt: Ng'okulonda kusembera, yatukuŋŋaanyizza wamu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gy'agenda okukakasaamu okulonda okw'obwenkanya. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okubeera n'amaaso ku ttaka okulondoola embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yer tye cok, en olwongo wa kacel me nywako tam ma mege me neno ni yer otimme maber. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki wang matye I kabedo moni me neno ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aseo, abu ngesi kitukok iso nepepe kanu aitemitem epone loebeitor ngesi aitodolikin aseo najokan. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka ajaut keda akonye kwap kanu aanyanar ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ni ecazu ogogo risi, eri tra ama tualu agbatara gbazu geri erini ecozu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi orodri ovuzu mile be angu ma dria e'yo ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku bwahikire, akatuteeranisa hamwe okuhanuura aha muringo gwe gw'okureeba ngu akaruuru kabaho omu buringaaniza. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okureeberera embeera.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the results of the competition were finally announced. The excitement in the air was palpable as everyone eagerly awaited the decision.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, ebyava mu kuvuganya byalangirirwa. Essanyu mu bbanga lyali lirabika nga buli omu alindirira n'obwagazi okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, adwoki me pyem ne dong kicwalo lok angeya. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma dano weng obedo kakuru tam ma kimoko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, aponi kolimorai akiro nuka abolobol. Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama kotoma okwam najaar itunga kere aidar aomisioitikec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, 'ba azi asizu agata abala 'da ni 'diyi ra. Ayiko fu oli alia 'ba dria ni e'yo 'dule ri te avasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, ebyarugire omu mpaka bikarangirirwa. Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga ahabw'okugira ngu buri omwe akaba ategyereize encwamu.

eng_prompt: In the lead-up to the elections, the community came together to discuss the importance of a peaceful voting process. Everyone was committed to ensuring that the election would reflect the will of the people without any disruptions.
lug_prompt: Nga beetegekera okulonda, abantu baakuŋŋaana wamu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okulonda okw'emirembe. Buli omu yali yeewaddeyo okulaba ng'okulonda kwoleka ekiraamo ky'abantu awatali kutaataaganyizibwa kwonna.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi yer, lwak guribe kacel me nywako lok I kom ber pa yub me bolo kwir I kuc. Dano weng guketo cwinygi me neno ni yer eni onyuto miti pa lwak labongo ayela mo keken.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitodolikin aseo, apotu itunga kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aseo nainapakina. Nginitunganan ekapakina awanyun ebe ebuni aseo aitodun nu ekotosi itunga komam aitolitol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa ma drilia, ongulumu emu tualu agbatara gbazu orodri e'yo voti 'bezuri ni aa'zu asianzuru ri ma dria. Ba dria owi eyi nezu ra kini opeta eyi nga e'da e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani eyi ezapiri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutebeekanisa akaruuru, abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okuteera akaruuru k'obusingye. Buri omwe akeehayo kureeba ngu akaruuru karikworeka ebi abantu barikwenda hatariho okutaataaganisibwa.

eng_prompt: As the final whistle blew, the crowd erupted in cheers, celebrating their team's hard-fought victory. In the midst of the excitement, one of the supporters lost his balance and fell into a barricade.
lug_prompt: Nga enfuufu ezisembayo zifuuwa, abantu baakubye enduulu nga bajaguza obuwanguzi bwa ttiimu yaabwe. Wakati mu ssanyu, omu ku bawagizi yalemererwa okutebenkera n'agwa mu bbugwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kibedo ka goyo whistle me agiki, dano gubedo ka goyo cwak, kun gi kwero loc ma dul tuku meggi oloyo ki lweny matek tutwal. Ikare me yom-cwiny, lacwak acel orwenyo cwinye ci opoto I barricade.
teo_prompt: Neautar aiwo na awasia, apotu itunga kilelebunos, inumunumete etimu kec aitelekaar ejie loetiono noi. Kokiding naka aiyalama, abu ediopet kotoma egangitok kibiror kosodi aibiror.
lgg_prompt: O'duko asizuri ni ri ni aviria, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi efu ayiko si, ayiko zu amuti yini a'di 'dizu okposi ndezuri ma e'yosi. Ayiko zuza ma talasi, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma azi avi asi azini e'de angu 'bani eri atrizu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obu efurembe y'ahamuheru yaabaire neefuuhirira, abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'obusinguzi bwa tiimu yaabo. Ahagati y'okushemererwa,omwe aha bashagiki akahwa amaani yaagwa omu kihome.

eng_prompt: Despite extensive efforts to educate the public on the importance of adhering to electoral regulations, some individuals have chosen to disregard these rules. As a result, concerns have arisen regarding the integrity of the upcoming elections.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube ow'amaanyi okusomesa abantu ku bukulu bw'okugoberera amateeka agakwata ku by'okulonda, abantu abamu basazeewo obutafaayo ku mateeka gano. N'ekivuddemu, okweraliikirira kuzzeewo ku bikwata ku bwesimbu bw'okulonda okujja.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki keto tek me pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa lubu cik me bolo kwir, jo mukene guyero me cayo cik magi. Macalo adwogi ne, lworo tye I kom ber bedo pa yer matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogong aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka aitup ikisila luka aseo, apotu icetunga koseutu apalunit ikisila lu. Kanuka ngun, epote aiyalongong nuikamunitos ainapakina naka aseo naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba o'bi eyini imbata fezu orodri azita opetaa ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ma dria ra ti, 'ba azi 'diyi pe e'yo azita 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku. E'yo 'disi, asi otiza efu e'yo opeta emupi 'diyi ma adriza kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani maingi g'okwegyesa abantu omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro by'eby'oburuuru, abantu abamwe bacwiremu kutabigyenderaho. N'ekyarugiremu, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'akaruuru akarikwiija.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising among the candidates as the final vote counts were announced. Many of them have raised concerns about the transparency and fairness of the electoral process.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu beesimbyewo ng'obululu obusembayo bulangirirwa. Bangi ku bo baleese okweraliikirira ku bwerufu n'obwenkanya bw'enkola y'okulonda.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lucungu ikare ma ki kwano wel kwir me agiki. Polgi gukelo lworo I kom ada ki ber bedo I yub me bolo kwir.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kanejaas abwaak nalimorere abootin nuka awasia. Apotu luipu kakesi itodutu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aica ka ailajara naka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma eselea 'bani voti asizu 'diyi lazu 'bori ma vutia. Yi ma karakara eyi e'da asi otiza e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be azini e'yo ada be ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati y'abeesimbireho ahabw'okubarwa kw'oburuuru obw'ahamuheru. Baingi aharibo bo boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza n'oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: With a charismatic personality and a knack for connecting with the public, he quickly gained a loyal following. As he championed issues that resonated with the citizens, his influence began to grow.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuntu bwe obw'amaanyi n'obusobozi bw'okukwatagana n'abantu, yafuna mangu abagoberezi abeesigwa. Bwe yalwanirira ensonga ezaali zikwatagana ne bannansi, obuyinza bwe bwatandika okukula.
ach_prompt: Ki bedo dano ma kite ber tutwal ki diro me kube ki lwak, en onongo lubote ma lugen oyot-oyot tutwal. I kare ma obedo ka lweny pi lok ma oyomo cwiny lwak, en omede ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Keda iponesio luitegelikina keda acoa naka arucokina keda itunga, abu ngesi kodum atupitok luipu. Neigangia ngesi akiro nueminasi itunga, abu ngesi kogeu aiyatakin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini aa'zu onyiru azini ondua erini aa'zu o'bi eyi pie risi, eri isu 'ba eri ma vuti obipi 'diyi mbeleru. Erini e'yo a'di 'dizu e'yo kari anzi eyini lepi saaru 'diyi ma dria, eri ma okpo e'do zo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba aine emicwe mirungi kandi aine n'obushoboorozi bw'okukwatanisa n'abantu, akatunga abantu baingi. Obu yaabaire arwanirira enshonga ezaabaire nizikunda abantu, amaani ge gakatandika kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: After weeks of campaigning and rallying support, he finally received the official endorsement from the party leadership. With a sense of pride and responsibility, he retained the card for the party flag bearer for the upcoming general elections.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'anoonya akalulu n'okukungaanya obuwagizi, kyaddaaki yafuna obuwagizi obutongole okuva mu bukulembeze bw'ekibiina. Nga yeenyumirizaamu era ng'alina obuvunaanyizibwa, yasigala n'akaadi k'okukwatira ekibiina bendera mu kulonda kwa bonna okubindabinda.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me bito kwi ki coko cwak, lacen en onongo cwak ki bot lutela me dul me cungu iwi bye ne. Ki awaka ki tic mapol, en omede ki tic macalo lamak bendera me dul me cungu iwi bye ne I yer matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aisup aseeta keda aituk agangat, abu ngesi kodum agangat kama ejaasi engarenok luka epate. Keda aiyalama keda aswam naepol noi, abu ngesi kodum akaadi naka aibwo epate kotoma aseo naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia ti odaza 'yezu azini atita trazu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu atita engazu driceza amuti niri vu. Erini aa'zu afusi azini asi'baza be, eri 'du kadi 'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma dria opeta emupi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuronda akaruuru n'okurundaana abashagiki, akahendera yaatunga obuhwezi kuruga omu bwebembezi bw'ekibiina. N'ekitiinisa n'obujunaanizibwa, akasigaza kaadi y'okukwatira ekibiina bendera omu karuuru ka boona akarikwija.

eng_prompt: In light of increasing tensions and threats against the media, it is crucial for reporters to uphold their commitment to unbiased reporting. Authorities and advocacy groups are emphasizing the importance of a free press during this critical time.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke n'okutiisibwatiisibwa okweyongera ku mikutu gy'amawulire, kikulu nnyo eri bannamawulire okunywerera ku kwewaayo kwabwe okuwa amawulire agataliiko kyekubiira. Ab'obuyinza n'ebibiina ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu bikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukuuma eddembe ly'amawulire mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle ki bura matye kamede I kom lucoo lok angea, pire tek tutwal ki lucoo lok angea me cung matek i kom miti gi me coyo lok angeya labongo apokapoka. Lutela kacel ki dule ma cwako lok kom gamente gitye ka cuko cwiny dano i kom ber pa bedo agonya pa luco lok angeya ikare man ma kwo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyalongongo keda aitukurianeta mama ejaasi arotak iyemuto, ejokuna noi arotak iyemuto aitogogong ainakina kec naka aikam iyemuto luemamei atiakatiaka. Apedorosio keda igurupun luigangitos itunga kes isinyikokitos ajokis naka ailajara naka airot iyemuto kotoma apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azini ori gbaza o'dukoti edripi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru 'ba osisiani 'diyi ni asi 'bazu asi 'baza yini e'yo o'dukoti edrizu kililiru ri ma dria. Okpo e'ipi azini amuti e'yo o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma dria 'diyi asi 'ba orodri 'ba osisia ni driwalaru 'diyiniri ma dria sawa e'yo ewaru 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana obweyongyeire n'okutiinatiinisa abanyamakuru, n'eky'omugasho munonga abanyamakuru kuguma nibaheereza amahurire gaabo ataine rubaju. Ab'obushoborozi hamwe n'ebibiina ebirikurwanirira oburingaaniza, nibyoreka omugasho gw'amahurire g'obusingye omu bwire obu obw'akabi.

eng_prompt: Despite the importance of local elections, many residents seem disengaged and uninformed about the candidates and issues at stake. This lack of awareness has led to a noticeable decline in voter turnout.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko obukulu bw'okulonda kw'ebitundu, abatuuze bangi balabika nga abatafaayo era nga tebamanyi ku beesimbyewo n'ensonga eziri mu kabi. Obutali bumanyirivu buno buviiriddeko okukendeera kw'obungi bw'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yer me tedero obedo gin ma pire tek, lutedero mapol nen calo pe gitye ki miti dok pe gitye ki ngec i kom lucungu kacel ki peko matye. Bedo peke pa ngec eni oweko wel lubol kwir ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida epol ajokis naka aseo naka atutubena, esubit bala mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos abwoak keda akiro nuiswamauna. Amamus na aisisianakino nes eyaunit aibiror naka enaaba loka aseak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo opeta angu ma alia 'diyiniri ma orodri ni ta tro ra ti, 'ba karakara angu ma alia 'diyi e'da kile yi ma asi ku azini yi nini 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma dria ku azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile ozizu kuri fe 'ba emu'ba voti 'bezu 'diyi ma kalafe esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho omugasho gw'akaruuru k'ebyaro, abatuuragye baingi nibareebeka nk'abatarikumanya abetsimbireho hamwe n'enshonga eziriho. Okubura okumanyisibwa kureesireho okukyendera kw'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: The integrity of the electoral process is crucial for a functioning democracy. However, when individuals or groups resort to intimidation and coercion, it undermines this foundation.
lug_prompt: Obulambulukufu bw'enkola y'okulonda bukulu nnyo mu demokulasiya akola. Kyokka, abantu ssekinnoomu oba ebibinja bwe biddukira mu kutiisatiisa n'okukaka, kityoboola omusingi guno.
ach_prompt: Ber pa yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal I tela pa lwak matye katime maber. Kadi bed kumeno, kace dano acel acel onyo dul mapat-pat ocako miyo bura ki diyo dano, man balo guti man.
teo_prompt: Acoa naka ainapeta nuka aseo erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aseo naka itunga. Konye, arai itunga arai igurupun epeleikinete aitukurian keda abuikin, emunarete kesi atukot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo democracia ni azi ngazu kililiru ri ni. Kani si, 'ba yi ma ngulupisi kani amuti yi ka asi 'du ori feza azini okpo feza ma alia, eri e'yo 'di eza.
nyn_prompt: Obwesigwa omu by'oburuuru n'obw'omugasho ahabw'obugabe bw'okusharamu oburikukora. Kwonka, abantu buntu nainga guruupu zaabo ku zirikukoresa okutiinatiinisa n'okugyemesereza, nikishiisha omusingi ogu.

eng_prompt: In a historic summit, representatives from various countries gathered to address pressing global challenges. Recognizing the need for collaboration, they aimed to forge a united path forward.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana olw'ebyafaayo, abakiise okuva mu mawanga ag'enjawulo baakuŋŋaana okukola ku bizibu ebiri mu nsi yonna. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'okukolagana, baaluubirira okutondawo ekkubo ery'obumu erigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma pire tek tutwal, luwang lobo mapat-pat gugure me lok I kom peko matye I wilobo. Ki niang ni omyero winye obed tye, gubedo ki miti me nongo yoo acel me cito anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamun naejok noi, apotu abwoikinitok akwapin nuegelegela kiriamunos aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok nuka akwap kere. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aiswamanara, apotu kesi kopedosi aitolomun erot loimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi azi adi ni ma alia, 'ba pa tupi engazu kari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi e'yo ewaru wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo lezu ti ecita ma e'yo egazu risi, eyi 'ba asi geri ti ecita ni muzu drile ri sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ebyafaayo, abajwekyerwa kuruga omu mahanga agatari gamwe baketeeranira hamwe kukora aha buremeezi bw'ensi yoona. Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa, bakagyenderera okutandikaho omuhanda ogurikuza omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing political landscape, it is essential for organizations to remain relevant and effective. Self-assessment can provide valuable insights into their strengths and weaknesses.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eky'ennaku zino ekyukakyuka amangu, kya mugaso eri ebitongole okusigala nga bikwatagana era nga bikola. Okwekebera kuyinza okuwa amagezi ag'omugaso ku maanyi n'obunafu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal pi dul mapat-pat me medde ki tic maber. Ngiyo kit ma ngat moni timo kwede twero miyo ngec ma pire tek tutwal I kom kero ki goro pa ngat moni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka epolitikis loka lolo, ejokuna noi kanu iriongeta asalakin epol ajokis. Aanyanar awate itunga epedori aijaikin kesi acoa naepol noi naikamunit agogongu kec keda anonokokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni curu'do i ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru amuti eyini aa'zu orodriru azini azi ngazu kililiru. Mi ma ngulupi ma ale andrita eco mi dri ondua orodriru fe okpo yini azini okpo kokoru 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebirikugyenda omu maisho, niky'omugasho ebitongore kuguma nibikora gye. Okweshwijuma nikibaasa kuba eky'omugasho aha maani n'obweremwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: Many members have expressed their disillusionment with the party's leadership and direction. As a result, public support has dwindled significantly over the years.
lug_prompt: Bammemba bangi balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe eri obukulembeze n'obulagirizi bw'ekibiina. N'ekivuddemu, obuwagizi bw'abantu bukendedde nnyo emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo.
ach_prompt: Lumemba mapol gunyutu cwer cwiny gi I kom tela ki yoo me tic pa dul me cungu iwi bye ne. Macalo adwogi ne, cwak pa lwak odok piny tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Apotu imeban luipu itodutu amamut aiyalama kec keda engarenone lo epate keda epone loebeitor kesi alosit. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto agangat naka itunga noi kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Memba karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku driceza amuti ni 'da ma dria. E'yo 'disi, atita o'bi eyini ri esi eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Ba memba baingi boorekire okwetomboitwa kwabo ahabwebembezi n'obwebembezi bw'ekibiina. N'ekyarugiremu, obushagiki bw'abantu bukyendeire kumara emyaka mingi.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, the atmosphere is charged with anticipation and competition. Candidates are ramping up their efforts to connect with voters and secure their positions.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kisembera, embeera ejjudde okweraliikirira n'okuvuganya. Abeesimbyewo bongedde amaanyi mu kaweefube w'okukwatagana n'abalonzi n'okunyweza ebifo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye cok, dano mapol gitye ki miti ki pyem matek tutwal. Lucungu tye ka medo kero gi me kube ki lubol kwir wek gumed rwom gi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, epol noi aomisio keda abolobol. Eutasi abwaak aiyatakin aswamukec naka arucokina keda aseak kanu aitogogong aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo ri si, angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi asi 'baza be tualu baka seza be. Ba pa tupi 'diyi okpo 'ba eyi ma eselea eyi ecizu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi pie eyini ani eyi ma pari eyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, abantu baingi nibateekateeka n'okuhayahayana. Abesimbireho bariyo nibongyera amaani gaabo okukwatanisa n'abateezi b'akaruuru n'okurinda emyanya yaabo.

eng_prompt: As the nation gears up for a pivotal decision, candidates are making their final appeals to voters. The atmosphere is charged with anticipation and urgency as the election date approaches.
lug_prompt: Nga eggwanga lyetegekera okusalawo okw'amaanyi, abeesimbyewo bakola okwewozaako kwabwe okusembayo eri abalonzi. Embeera ejjudde okusuubira n'obwangu ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka yubbe pi moko tam mapire tek, lucungu tye ka lego lubol kwir me agiki. Dano tye ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma nino me yer tye cok.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekapakina akwap kanu aseunet naepol noi, eutasi abwoak ailip itunga lueseunete kesi. Ejaasi itunga keda aiyalongong naepol noi naarai eyapie apaarasia nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni i otuta 'yezu e'yo okporu ni ma dria, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi eyi ma omveta asizu 'diyi 'ye 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi vu. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi asi 'baza be tualu e'yo mbeleru 'diyi pie o'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo risi.
nyn_prompt: Eihanga ku rikweteekateekyera okusharamu kw'amaani, abesimbireho bariyo nibajurira abateezi b'akaruuru. Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru buri haihi kuhika.

eng_prompt: As the campaign season heats up, tensions rise in the small town of Kasubi. The community is abuzz with speculation about which family will secure the coveted leadership position.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okunoonya akalulu bwe kigenda kyeyongera, obunkenke bweyongera mu kabuga akatono aka Kasubi. Ekitundu kijjudde okuteebereza ku kika ki ekigenda okufuna ekifo ky'obukulembeze ekyegombebwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bito kwi tye ka cako, telle tye kamedde I taun matidi me Kasubi. Lwak tye ka byeko ni gang mene ma obi bedo ki twero me tela.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aisup aseeta, eyatakinos aiyalongong otaun lodidi loka Kasubi. Ejaasi itunga keda aomisio nuikamunitos ekale loebeit adumun aiboisit naka eingarenone.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa agbatara ti odazaniri ni 'yeria, asi otiza ni tu tawuni were Kasubi ni ma alia uru. Ongulumu 'da eyi e'yo ega familia ngo ni nga angu driceza ni 'bani le saaru 'da esu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'ehururu ku burikweyongyera, obunkenke nibweyongyera omu rurembo rwa Kasubi. Abantu baingi nibateebereza ngu ni eka ki erikwija kutunga omwanya gw'obwebembezi ogurikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent political turmoil, the opposition parties have recognized the need for unity. As a result, they are exploring potential alliances to strengthen their chances against the ruling party.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butabanguko mu byobufuzi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, ebibiina by'oludda oluvuganya bikitegedde obwetaavu bw'obumu. N'ekivuddemu, banoonyereza ku mikago egiyinza okunyweza emikisa gyabwe okulwanyisa ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lweny me cungu iwi-bye matye cokcok-ki, dul me cungu iwi-bye ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente guneno ber pa ribe. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yenyo lurem ma twero jingo gumgi me lweny I kom dul me cungu iwi bye matye I loc.
teo_prompt: Katupitos amumu naka epolitikis napac, apotu ipatei luka etepegak kojenutu eipud loka aimorikikina. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aingic aimorikikina kanu aitogogong arerengusio kec mama ejai epate lo ipugai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri politiki ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti ageti otiza ni 'diyi esu e'yo lezu ti ecita ma dria ra. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, yi ti ecita yini okpo fezu amuti politiki ni kari ma dri cepiri be 'diyi ma ale andri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki obwahwireho,ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebirikuhakanisa gavumenti byetegyereize ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibasherura emikago y'okwongyera amaani omu kibiina ekiri omu butegyeki.

eng_prompt: As the election season heats up, tensions rise among candidates and their supporters. Reports of irregularities and misconduct have become alarmingly common in recent years.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kigenda kyeyongera, obunkenke bweyongera wakati w'abeesimbyewo n'abawagizi baabwe. Lipoota ezikwata ku butali bwenkanya n'enneeyisa embi zeeyongedde nnyo mu myaka egiyise.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye ka medde anyim, telle tye kamedde ikin lucungu ki lucwakgi. Adot me turu cik ki tim maraco tye mapol tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakin apak naka aseo, iyata ingungeta kiding abwoak keda egangitokokec. Apolor noi iripotan luka abilibilio naka ikisila keda iponesio luarokok kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu drizaru, asi otiza ni tu 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba atita fepi eyidri 'diyi pie. O'duko e'yo onzi azini adriza onzi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eca curu'do ewaru eli agapi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikweyongyera, obunkenke nibweyongyera ahagati y'abeesimbireho n'abashagiki baabo. Ripoota ezirikukwata aha bikorwa ebitahikire n'emitwarize mibi, zitwire nizikira kubaho omu myaka egi.

eng_prompt: The recent decision by the president to include individuals with questionable backgrounds in key political positions has raised concerns among party members. Many fear that this approach could undermine the party's integrity and stability.
lug_prompt: Okusalawo kwa pulezidenti gye buvuddeko okuteeka abantu abalina ensibuko ebuusibwabuusibwa mu bifo by'ebyobufuzi ebikulu kuleeseewo okweraliikirira mu bammemba b'ekibiina. Bangi batya nti enkola eno eyinza okutyoboola obwesimbu n'obutebenkevu bw'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Moko tam pa ladit lobo cokcok-ki me keto dano ma kwogi pe tye atir I kabedo ma pigi tego me cung iwibye okelo lworo ikin lumemba me dul me cungu iwi-bye ne. Dano mapol tye ki lworo ni yoo man twero balo ber bedo ki ber bedo pa dul me cungu iwi bye ne.
teo_prompt: Aseunet napac naka lokapolon akwap aipikakin itunga lumam ejenasi kotoma aiboisio nuapolok nuka epolitikis eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas imeeban luka epate. Ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe epedori epone lo aibil ajokis naka epate keda ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo purezidenti ni e'yo 'duzu o'diru 'ba engapi e'yo onzi ma alia 'diyi 'bazu pari politiki ni okporu 'diyi ma alia ri fe asi otiza 'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea ra. Ba karakara eyi 'ye orisi kini geri 'di eco amuti politiki ni 'di ma okpo azini asianzu esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okusharamu kw'omwebembezi w'eihanga okukoresa abantu abarikuruga omu myanya y'eby'obutegyeki etarikwetegyerezibwa, kireesireho okwerarikirira omu ba memba b'ekibiina. Baingi nibatiina ngu enkora egi neebaasa kushiisha obusingye n'obutebekana bw'ekibiina.

eng_prompt: As the political landscape shifts, many seasoned politicians are seeking to re-establish their influence. With elections approaching, former members of Cabinet are in the race to become members of parliament.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyobufuzi ekyukakyuka, bannabyabufuzi bangi abalina obumanyirivu banoonya okuzzaawo obuyinza bwabwe. Ng'okulonda kusembera, abaaliko baminisita bali mu kuvuganya okufuuka ababaka ba paalamenti.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka loke, lucungu iwi bye mapol matye ki ngec matut gitye ka yenyo yo me nongo twero gi. Ki cok pa yer, lumemba macon me cabinet gitye ka pyem me doko lumemba me parliament.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor akiro nuka epolitikis, eutasi ipolitisans luipu luemisiaritos aimo aitogogong apedorosiokec. Kwape eyapie aseo, eutasi imeeban lukabinet lukolo abolobol kanu araun imeeban luka airabet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki niri ni i ojazu risi, 'ba karakara politiki ni e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi geri nda eyi ma okpo 'bazu dika. E'yo opetaa ni ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba andra minisita ru 'diyi a'bala 'ye ecazu memba koloseni ni 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'obutegyeki ku erikuhinduka, ab'eby'obutegyeki abakugu nibenda kugaruraho obutegyeki bwabo. Oburuuru ku burikuhika haihi, abaabaireho ba minisita bari omu mpaka z'okuba ba memba b'eishengyero.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges in the classroom, educators remain committed to fostering a dynamic learning environment. They creatively adapt their teaching methods to engage students and enhance their educational experience.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kibiina, abasomesa basigala beewaddeyo okutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi. Bakyusakyusa mu nkola zaabwe ez'okusomesa okusikiriza abayizi n'okwongera ku bumanyirivu bwabwe mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka nongo peko mapol i gang kwan, lupwonye pud tye ki miti me neno ni lutino tye ka pwonyo maber. Gitye ki diro me loko yoo me pwony gi wek okony lutino kwan ki medo rwom me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu kotoma atukot, isisianakinak iswamaete kagogongu kanu aitopoloria eswamae loajokan loka aisisia. Etapit kesi aijulakin iwaitin kec luka aisisianakin esisiak kanu aitojokar asioman kec.

eng_prompt: One of the most significant events in our history is commemorated annually. People around the world come together to honor this special occasion.
lug_prompt: Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo mu byafaayo byaffe kijjukirwa buli mwaka. Abantu okwetooloola ensi yonna bakungaana wamu okussa ekitiibwa mu mukolo guno ogw'enjawulo.

lug_prompt: Buli mwaka ekitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza kitegeka omukolo ogw'enjawulo okussa ekitiibwa mu basomesa ab'enjawulo. Ku mukolo guno, minisita awa ebirabo by'okusiima eri abasomesa abasinga buli mwaka.

lug_prompt: Mu kusiima okwewaayo kwabwe n'okukola ennyo, abakulembeze b'essomero baasalawo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka empya ey'okusikiriza. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okusiima n'okujaguza emirimu egy'enjawulo abasomesa gye bakola mu kutumbula obuwanguzi bw'abayizi.

teo_prompt: Iswamaete ikee luikisere ekato noi kanu aidar angaleu naka itunga. Kowai lo ayuarite itunga kanejaas adekasinei nu ikopas, ipedori oni aitidisiar atiokisio nuka abwangun.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza ni 'diyi azi okporu nga o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu. Ba eyi ma ta mbazu azo eyi erepi ra 'diyi vurisi, ama eco e'yo azo eyini e'dozu 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda amagara g'abantu. Twayetangira endwara ezirikuturira, nitubaasa kukyendeeza munonga akabi k'okubarukaho kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: Research shows that strong literacy skills developed in early childhood are crucial for long-term academic success. Therefore, it is essential for educators to focus on fostering a love for reading among young children.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti obukugu bw'okusoma n'okuwandiika obw'amaanyi obufunibwa mu buto bukulu nnyo mu buwanguzi bw'ebyenjigiriza obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu. N'olwekyo, kyetaagisa abasomesa okussa essira ku kukuza okwagala okusoma mu baana abato.
ach_prompt: Kwed nyutu ni diro me kwan ki kwano ma lutino dongo con pire tek tutwal pi kato maber i gang kwan pi kare malac. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ki lupwonye me keto cwiny gi i kom pwonyo lutino me maro kwan.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe acoa naejok na idwe ludidik erai na epol ajokis kanu akerianut na apak naepol noi kotoma asioman. Kanuka ngun, ejok isisianakinak aisisianakin idwe amin asiom.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini ondua afa siza ni okporu 'bani esu anzi nyiri eyi ma alea 'diyi orodriru agata esuzu sukulu'a sa'wa ezu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru imba'ba eyini asi 'bazu anzi nyiri eyi ma alea leta afa lazu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza nikworeka ngu emyoga y'okushoma n'okuhandiika erikwegyesibwa abaana bato n'ey'omugasho munonga ahabw'obusinguzi bw'obwegyese obwire buraingwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abegyesa kuta amaani omu kutunguura rukundo y'okushoma omu baana bato.

eng_prompt: Educators are constantly seeking innovative methods to enhance student engagement and assessment. Recently, a groundbreaking approach has emerged that promises to transform how we monitor learners' academic progress.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa buli kaseera banoonya engeri ez'obuyiiya okutumbula okwenyigira kw'abayizi n'okukebera. Gye buvuddeko, enkola ey'obuyiiya evuddeyo esuubiza okukyusa engeri gye tutunuuliramu enkulaakulana y'abayizi mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo miti pa lutino kwan. Cokcok-ki, yoo me kwan manyen okatti ma ocikke me loko kit ma waneno kwede rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Eutasi duc isisianakinak aimo iwaitin luitetiak lu itopoloere eswamae lo idwe ka aingic eswamae. Apakio nu, aponi kitolomunai epone loitetet loepedori aijulakin epone loengicet oni eswamae lo idwe kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba eyi sa'wa driasi geri o'diru 'diyi nda sukulu anzi eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu. O'du 'diyi ma alea, geri azi o'diru ni efu ra ecopi geri amani sukulu anzi eyini muzu sukulu'a ri ojazu ra ni.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa buriijo nibasherura oburyo burungi bw'okureetera abeegi kwejumba omu mishomo yaabo n'okushwijuma gye emishomo yaabo. Obwahati, hariho enkora y'omutaano erikureetaho empindahinduka omu muringo ogu turikukuratiramu entunguuka y'abeegi omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the Ugandan national football team finally qualified for the prestigious tournament. The entire nation is celebrating this historic milestone with joy and pride.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere yasobola okugenda mu mpaka ez'ekitiibwa. Eggwanga lyonna lijaguza olunaku luno olw'ebyafaayo n'essanyu n'amalala.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, team odilo me lobo Uganda otyeko kato me cito I pyem tuku ma oywek tutwal. Lobo man weng tye ka kwero nino man ki yomcwiny ki awaka.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu etimu loka emopira loka akwap koUganda kopedo alomar toma abolobol naka angosibib. Euta akwap kere ainumunum akiro ngun keda aiyalama keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, amuti mupira tuzani kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi aga asizu muzu abala okporu 'da ma alea ra. Kari 'di ma alea dria yi e'yo 'di inzi ayiko azini afusi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, tiimu y'omupiira ey'eihanga ekahwaho yaaza omu mpaka z'ekitiinisa. Eihanga ryona nirijaguza omukoro ogu ogw'ebyafaayo n'okushemererwa n'okwehimbisa.

eng_prompt: Recent assessments have revealed significant disparities in the quality of education across public schools. To address these issues, the ministry must take decisive action.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza mu masomero ga gavumenti. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino, minisitule erina okubaako ky'ekolawo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I rwom me kwan I gangi kwan pa gamente mapat-pat. Me tyeko peko magi, gangkal omyero otim gin mo.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit atiakatiaka naepol noi naka adoketait na asioman kosomeroi luka apugan. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, ekot erionget aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza onita ma wura ma alia sukulu o'bi yini 'diyi ma eselea ri ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, le okalamvu ma 'ye e'yo azi okporu ni.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso y'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese omu mashomero ga gavumenti. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, minisiture eshemereire kugira eki ekozire.

eng_prompt: In response to concerns about cleanliness and health among students, the school community has been actively seeking ways to improve sanitation. As part of this initiative, parents have offered five water dispensers to boost hygiene in the school.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira ku buyonjo n'ebyobulamu mu bayizi, abantu b'essomero babadde banoonya engeri z'okutumbula obuyonjo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abazadde bawaddeyo ebyuma ebikuba amazzi bitaano okutumbula obuyonjo mu ssomero.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo I kom lengo ki yot kom ikin lutino kwan, lwak me gang kwan gubedo ka yenyo yoo me ilo malo rwom me lengo. Macalo but yub man, lunyodo gumiyo jami abic me tic ki pii me ilo malo rwom me lengo i gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin nuikamunitos aila keda angaleu kanejaas esisiak, eutasi itunga luka esomero aimo iwaitin lu itojokaret aila. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kana, ejaikisi auriak acuman nu akipi akany kanu aitogogong aila kosomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni e'yo alata ni azini alata ni sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria, ongulumu sukulu ni 'diyi ebi geri nda e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, tipika eyi fe afa yi awazu 'diyi sukulu 'da ma alea towi alata ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira kw'abeegi ahabw'obuyonjo n'eby'amagara, ab'eishomero batwire nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'obuyonjo. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, abazaire bahaireyo ebyoma bitaano by'amaizi kutunguura eby'obuyonjo omu eishomero.

eng_prompt: The anticipation in the air was palpable as educators and administrators gathered at the conference center. After months of planning, the event aimed to address pressing issues in the education sector.
lug_prompt: Obwagazi obwali mu bbanga bwalabika ng'abasomesa n'abakulembeze bakungaanidde mu kifo awategekebwa olukungaana. Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka, omukolo gwali gugendererwamu kukola ku nsonga ez'amangu mu by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Gen obedo tye ikin lupwonye ki ludito gang kwan ma gugure I kabedo me kacoke. Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe, yub eni obedo ki miti me tyeko lok mapigi tego I tenge me pwony.
teo_prompt: Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama naepol noi neiriamunos esisianakinak keda engarenok luka esomero kotoma aiboisit naka airiamunet. Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin, alosikinet naka airiamunet kangin arai aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka erionget loka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza oli alia ri ndra e'dazaru ekile imba'ba azini drice'ba sukulu ni 'diyi tra yi pari okuza ni 'diyi ma alia. Mba otuza ma vutia, otuta 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo okporu esele onitaniri ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakaba nibateekateeka munonga ahabw'abegyesa n'abarikukurira eby'obwegyese okuteeranira omu myanya y'enteerane. Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera, omukoro gukaba nigugyenderera kukora aha nshonga z'amaani omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing job market, employers increasingly seek candidates with hands-on experience and applicable skills. To better prepare students for the workforce, educational institutions must adapt their curricula to focus on real-world applications.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akakyuka amangu, abakozesa beeyongera okunoonya abesimbyewo abalina obumanyirivu n'obukugu obukozesebwa. Okusobola okutegeka obulungi abayizi ku lw'abakozi, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza galina okukyusa ensoma zaago okussa essira ku nkola z'ensi entuufu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tic tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, wegi tic tye ka yenyo lutino kwan matye ki ngec ki diro me tic. Me yubu lutino kwan maber pi tic, gangi kwan omyero gulok yub me kwan gi wek oket cwiny gi i kom jami ma mite pi lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka aswamisinei lolo, ekotosi ikulepek aswamisinei itunga luejaasi keda amisiarit. Kanu aitemonokin esisiak ejok kanu aswam, ekot isomeroi aijulakin aisisiaeta kec kanu aitodolikin iboro luebeit aswam kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ba azi fe'ba 'diyi curu'do 'ba azi ni oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi nda 'ba azi nga'ba 'diyi ma nita azini ondua eyini 'diyi pie. Sukulu anzi eyi otuzu kililiru azi ngazu, le pari onita ni 'diyi ma oja geri eyini imbazu 'diyi eyini ani asi 'bazu e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu katale k'eby'emirimo ak'erizooba akarikuhinduka juba, abakozesa nibeeyongyera kuronda abeegi abaine obukugu n'emyoga erikukoresibwa. Okutebeekanisa kurungi abeegi kukora emirimo, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gashemereire kuhindura engyenderwaho yaabo y'okwegyesa, kugira ngu bagume nibagyendera aha mirimo y'ensi egi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent reports highlighting the declining performance of students, the government has faced increasing pressure to take action. As a result, the minister is determined to improve the education system.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku alipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko awo eziraga nti abayizi tebakola bulungi, gavumenti efunye akazito okweyongera okubaako ky'ekolawo. N'ekivuddemu, minisita mumalirivu okutumbula ebyensoma.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki adwoki me kwed ma okato ma nyutu ni lutino kwan pe tye katimo maber, gamente tye ka nongo lyeto me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, minicta ne omoko tamme me ilo malo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Katupitos iripotan luitetiak lu itodunitos eswamae lo esisiak lo erono, etereikina apugan keda agogongu naepol noi naka aswam ngun. Kanuka ngun, ekapakina eminista aitojokar nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko efupi eturisi sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, gamete esu okpo e'yo 'yezu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, minisita 'da le e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'amahurire agarikukwata aha kukyerererwa kw'emishomo y'abeegi, gavumenti eyeyongyeire kugyemeserezibwa kugira eki ekora. N'ekyarugiremu, minisita ayehaireyo kutunguura eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In light of recent educational reforms, educators and policymakers have emphasized the importance of updating teaching methods. As a result, schools have been urged to put the new curriculum into practice.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka ezikoleddwa mu by'enjigiriza gye buvuddeko, abasomesa n'abakola amateeka bakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuzza obuggya enkola z'okusomesa. N'ekivuddemu, amasomero gasabiddwa okussa mu nkola enteekateeka y'ebisomesebwa empya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka ma otimme I lok kom kwan cokcok-ki, lupwonye ki lutela guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me kelo aloka-loka I yoo me pwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego gangi kwan me keto yub manyen me pwonye itic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka asioman, isisianakinak keda luitolomete ikisila kes etogogongitos ajokis naka aisiteteun iwaitin lu aisisianakin. Kanuka ngun, esinyikokitai isomeroi aitwasam ainapeta nuka aisisiaeta nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru e'yo onita ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, imba'ba eyi tualu 'ba azita sipi 'diyi pie 'ba asi orodri geri onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu o'diru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai sukulu eyi otita onita ni o'diru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha mpindahinduka y'eby'obwegyese eyabaireho juba, abeegyesa hamwe n'abakozi b'ebiragiro bagumire nibahakanisa omugasho gw'okutunguura emiringo y'okwegyesamu. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero gashabirwe kuta omu nkora engyenderwaho y'okwegyesa ensya.

eng_prompt: In a ceremony held at the national conference on education, the minister praised the dedication and hard work of educators across the nation. As a highlight of the event, the minister has awarded the best teachers in the country.
lug_prompt: Ku mukolo ogwabadde mu lukungaana lw'ebyenjigiriza mu ggwanga lyonna, minisita yatendereza okwewaayo n'okufuba kw'abasomesa okwetooloola eggwanga. Ng'ekikulu ku mukolo, minisita awadde abasomesa abasinga mu ggwanga ebirabo.
ach_prompt: I yub ma obedo tye I kacoke madit me lok kom kwan I lobo Uganda, minista opwoyo tic matek pa lupwonye I but lobo man mapat-pat. Macalo gin ma pire tek I yub eni, minista omiyo mic ki lupwonye mabeco loyo weng I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loabu kojaikin toma atukonokin naka asioman naka akwap kere, abu eminista itur asioman keda aswam naepol naka isisianakinak kakwap. Kwape nuapolok noi kotoma opucit kangol, abu eminista orop isisianakinak luajokak kakere kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'bani 'ye otita imbatani onita ma dria kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri ma alea, minisita 'da ecu ava feza azini azi okporu imba'ba kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyini ri ra. E'yo okporu omu 'da ma alea ri ru, minisita 'da fe dria dria imba'ba onyiru ndeni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu mukoro ogwabaire aha rukiiko rw'eihanga ahaby'obwegyese, minisita akasiima okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani kw'abeegyesa okwetoroora eihanga. Ekikuru aha mukoro, minisita akaheereza abegyesa abarikukirayo oburungi omu eihanga ebiconco.

eng_prompt: With a strong track record and a dedicated roster, the Rugby Cranes have consistently demonstrated their skill and teamwork on the field. As the tournament progresses, their performance has only solidified their reputation among the top contenders.
lug_prompt: N'ebyafaayo eby'amaanyi n'abazannyi abeewaddeyo, ttiimu ya Rugby Cranes eraga obukugu bwayo n'okukolera awamu mu kisaawe. Ng'empaka zigenda mu maaso, omutindo gwabwe gwongedde okunyweza erinnya lyabwe mu bavuganya ab'oku ntikko.
ach_prompt: Ki ngec me tic matek tutwal ki lutic mapol, dul tuku me Rugby Cranes kare ki kare nyutu diro gi ki tic kacel I bar tuku. I kare ma pyem tuku tye ka mede anyim, kit ma gutimo kwede ojingo nying gi ikin jo ma gitye ka pyem I rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Keda akiro nuapolok nuiswamata kesi keda itunga lueminasi kesi aswam, itodunit duc Rugby Cranes acoa kec keda aswam naepol noi koisawe. Kwape elosi abolobol, abu eswamae kec kitogogong ekirorikec kanejaas lueboloboloete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye okporu azini 'ba azi ngapi avasi 'diyi pie, amuti avita Rugby Cranes niri e'da eyi ma ondua azini azi ngaza amuti ru ri sa'wa driasi pari avita ni 'diyi ma alea. A'bala 'da ni muzu drile, eyi ma agata otu eyi ma ru 'ba a'bala 'yepi okporu 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyafaayo by'amaani n'abateezi b'ebigyere, tiimu ya Rugby Cranes etwire neyoreka emyoga yaayo n'okukorera hamwe omu kishayi. Empaka ku zirikugyenda omu maisho, enkora yaabo eyongyeire kuhamya eiziina ryabo omu bataahi b'amaani.

eng_prompt: In light of recent studies highlighting the importance of nurturing creativity in youth, local leaders are emphasizing the role of educational institutions. They believe that fostering individual skills can lead to a more vibrant and innovative community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakakolebwa okulaga obukulu bw'okukulaakulanya obuyiiya mu bavubuka, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bassa essira ku mugaso gw'amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza. Balowooza nti okutumbula obukugu bw'omuntu kinnoomu kisobola okuviirako ekitundu okuba eky'amaanyi n'okuyiiya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki ma nyutu ber pa dongo diro manyen ikin bulu, lutela me tedero gitye ka jingo tic pa gangi kwan. Gitye ki niyee ni pwonyo diro pa ngat acel acel twero weko lwak bedo ki kwo maber dok giyubu jami manyen.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuka aisisiaeta nuitodunitos ajokis na aisisianakin atumunak acoasinei nuitetiak, eutasi engarenok luka atutubena aitigogong aswam naka isomeroi. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitopoloun acoa naka itunga epedori ayangaun atutubet naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru ecepi orodri e'yo onduoru 'diyi ezozu 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri ma dria, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma orodri ma dria. Yi a'i ra kini ondua feza 'ba alu alu 'diyi dri eco fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu edriru azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati okurikworeka omugasho gw'okureetaho obuhangahanga omu minyeeto, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibashagika omugasho gw'amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese. Nibarikwikiriza ngu okutunguura emyoga y'omuntu, nikibaasa kureetaho entunguuka n'okujumbura omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of creativity in education. As a result, many educational institutions have started to prioritize and invest in arts programs.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'obuyiiya mu byenjigiriza. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi gatandise okukulembeza n'okusiga ensimbi mu pulogulaamu z'ebyemikono.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa diro manyen I kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mapol gucako keto cente I yub me kwan ma kwako tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenuna noi ajokis naka acoasinei nuitetiak kotoma asioman. Kanuka ngun, ageutu isomeroi luipu aisingarenit ka aipikakin ikapunukec toma ainapeta nuka aputosia.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodri e'yo onduoru 'diyi ni onita ma alea ri ra. E'yo 'disi, pari onita ni karakara 'diyi e'do curu'do e'yo onita ni 'diyi 'du okporu azini sende 'ba otita onita ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okujumbura omu by'obwegyese. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero maingi gatandikire kwebembeza n'okuta esente omu puroguraamu z'eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: The Uganda national football team has a dedicated venue where they host their home matches. This iconic location is known for its vibrant atmosphere and passionate fans.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ya Uganda ey'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere erina ekifo we bazannyira emipiira gyabwe egy'awaka. Ekifo kino ekimanyiddwa ennyo kimanyiddwa olw'embeera yaakyo ennungi n'abawagizi baakyo abanyiikivu.
ach_prompt: Team odilo me lobo Uganda tye ki kabedo ma giyubu iye tuku gi me gang. Kabedo man ma oywek tutwal-li oywek pi yom cwiny ki lucwak ma cwinygi yom.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi etimu loka emopira loka akwap nako Uganda keda aiboisit naecamakinitai kesi ajaut keda aboliasio nuka ore. Ejenara aiboisit na kanu aijarake keda egangitok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti avita mupira tuzani kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma pari avita eyini avizu akua 'diyi ci. Pari 'bani nile tu 'diri ma ru ku e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu tualu 'ba atita fepi eyidri ava be 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'eihanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigyere ey'eihanga eyine emyanya y'okuzaaniramu emizaano yaayo. Omwanya ogu ogurikumanywa munonga nigumanywa ahabw'okushemererwa n'abarikugukunda munonga.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous training and dedication, the players have shown remarkable improvement in their skills. Their hard work has paid off, leading to impressive performances in recent matches.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okwewaayo, abazannyi balaze enkulaakulana mu bukugu bwabwe. Omulimu gwabwe ogw'amaanyi guvuddemu ebibala, ekibaviiriddeko okukola obulungi ennyo mu mipiira egyakaggwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye matek tutwal, lutuku gunyutu dongo pa diro gi. Tic matek meggi okelo adwogi maber tutwal I pyem tuku ma okato ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aituutoonor keda ainakina, apotu aboliak itodutu aitojokaario naejok noi kotoma acoasineikec. Iswamaete kesi kagogongu, ido abu koyangau eswamae loajokan noi kotoma aboliasio nupac.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, 'ba avitani 'diyi e'da e'yo yi ma ondua ma omgbo otuzuri ra. Azi okporu eyini nga ri esu orodri eyini fe eyini avita ndrizaru abala eyi avipi o'diru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okwehayo, abazaani boorekire okutunguuka omu myoga yaabo. Omurimo gwabo gw'amaani, gureesire emizaano mirungi omu mizaano ehwaire.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing population and the need for improved educational facilities, local authorities have been assessing the infrastructure of public schools. As a result, significant investments have been made to enhance the learning environment for students.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa mu masomero okulongooka, ab'obuyinza mu byalo babadde beekenneenya ebizimbe by'amasomero ga gavumenti. N'ekivuddemu, ssente nnyingi ziteekeddwamu okutumbula embeera y'abayizi ey'okusomeramu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ki miti me medo rwom me gangi kwan, lutela me tedero gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma gangi kwan pa gamente tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, kiketo lim madit tutwal I tic me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga keda eipud loka aiboisio nu isomeroi nu itojokaritai, eutasi apedorosio nuka atutubena airereor iboro lu isomeroi luka apugan. Kanuka ngun, etolomun ikapun luipu kanu aitojokar asioman naka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu lezu afa onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ebi afa sukulu o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba lonyi angiri sukulu anzi eyini sukulu lazu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okutunguura eby'obwegyese, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro batwire nibashwijuma ebyombeko by'amashomero ga gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu, entaasya y'amaani ekozirwe kutunguura eby'obwegyese bw'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance student performance and academic achievement, educational institutions have been reevaluating their hiring practices. Recognizing the critical role of effective instruction, they have prioritized the recruitment of skilled educators.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkola y'abayizi n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu byensoma, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gabadde gazzeemu okwekenneenya enkola zaago ez'okupangisa abayizi. Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'okusomesa obulungi, bakulembezza okuwandiika abasomesa abakugu.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan, gangi kwan gubedo ka ngiyo kit me coyo lutino kwan. Pien gingeyo ber pa pwonye maber, guketo cwiny gi me coyo lupwonye ma ludiro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong eswamae lo esisiak keda aitodolikin eswamae lo asioman, eutai isomeroi airereor iponesiokec luka aipagis itunga. Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aisisianakino najokan, apotu kesi kisingarenata aitolom isisianakinak lu emisiaritos.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo otuzu azini eyi ma agata sukulu'a ri ma omgbo otuzu, pari onita ni 'diyi e'bi geri eyini sukulu eyi 'duzu 'diyi ma ale andri dika. E'yo orodri onita kililiru ri niri ma e'yo egazu risi, eyi 'ba e'yo okporu 'ba imba'ba nita be 'diyi ma esuta ma dria.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of continuous learning, the community held a meeting to discuss ways to enhance student engagement outside of regular school hours. After much deliberation, parents have agreed to support schools in nurturing the learners during holidays.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'okusoma obutasalako, ekitundu kyatuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku ngeri y'okutumbula okwegatta kw'abayizi wabweru w'ebiseera by'essomero ebya bulijjo. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, abazadde bakkirizza okuyamba amasomero mu kukuza abayizi mu biseera by'oluwummula.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ber pa mede ki kwan, lwak gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam I kom kit me medo miti pa lutino kwan I ngee cawa me gang kwan. Ingee tam matut, lunyodo guyee me konyo gangi kwan me pwonyo lutino gi ikare me yweyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aisisia, apotu itunga kojaikinos keda airiamun kanu aitemitem eipone lo aitopolor eswamae lo idwe kokinga na isawan lu esomero. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, acamutu auriak aigang isomeroi aitopoloun idwe kotoma apakio nuka aiyeng.
