eng_prompt: In a highly anticipated match, Nigeria faced off against Uganda in the African national championship. Fans filled the stadium, hoping for a thrilling performance from their team.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira ogubadde gusuubirwa ennyo, Nigeria yattunka ne Uganda mu mpaka z'amawanga ga Afirika. Abawagizi bajjuza ekisaawe nga basuubira omuzannyo omulungi okuva mu ttiimu yaabwe.
ach_prompt: I tuku ma byek tye I komgi tutwal, Nigeria orwatte ki Uganda I pyem tuku odilo me lobo Afrika. Lucwak tuku gupongo bar tuku, ki gen me neno kit ma tim meggi bituku kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naewomitai ebe ebuni ajaun, abu Nigeria kitiji keda Uganda kotoma abolobol naka akwapin nuko Africa. Apotu egangitok kilelebunos oisawe, emunoete abolia naejok kanejaas etimu kec.

eng_prompt: The talent and skill displayed by Uganda's football players have caught the attention of scouts and fans worldwide. As a result, many international club players look up to them for inspiration and motivation.

eng_prompt: After a thrilling season filled with intense competition and remarkable performances, the team gathered to celebrate their achievements. In a special ceremony, the football players have awarded the best players for the season.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akaseera ak'essanyu akajjudde okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'okuyimba okw'ekitalo, ttiimu yakungaana okujaguza ebituukiddwaako. Ku mukolo ogw'enjawulo, abazannyi b'omupiira gw'ebigere bawadde abazannyi abasinze mu sizoni eno ebirabo.

eng_prompt: After years of dedication and hard work, our athletes have consistently pushed the limits of speed and endurance. This commitment has led to remarkable achievements on the track.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'obumalirivu n'okukola ennyo, bannabyamizannyo baffe beeyongedde okusika omuguwa ku sipiidi n'obugumiikiriza. Okwewaayo kuno kuleetedde obuwanguzi obw'ekitalo mu by'okudduka.

eng_prompt: The organizers had worked tirelessly to set up the event, and the participants were eager to prove their determination. As dark clouds loomed overhead, they gathered at the starting line, ready to face the elements.
lug_prompt: Abategesi baali bakoze butaweera okutegeka omukolo, era abeetabamu baali beetegefu okulaga obumalirivu bwabwe. Ebire ebiddugavu bwe byajja waggulu, baakuŋŋaanira ku layini y'okutandika, nga beetegefu okwanganga embeera y'obudde.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the players were eager to showcase their skills on the field. The atmosphere was electric as fans filled the stadium, cheering for their favorite team.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, abazannyi baali beetegefu okulaga obukugu bwabwe mu kisaawe. Embeera yabadde ya masannyalaze ng'abawagizi bajjula ekisaawe nga bawagira ttiimu yaabwe gye baagala.

lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, anzi mupira avipi 'diyi ma ava ndra eyi ma ondua e'dazu pari avita ni 'diyi ma alea. Angu 'da ma alea aci ndra ekile 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ni pari avita niri ma alea tre eyini avita 'yezu amuti eyini lele tu 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: Individuals who dedicate their lives to the sport, demonstrating exceptional skill and sportsmanship, often inspire others with their passion and commitment. Their contributions to the game go beyond mere statistics, shaping the culture and future of soccer.
lug_prompt: Abantu abawaayo obulamu bwabwe mu mizannyo, nga balaga obukugu obw'enjawulo n'obuzannyo, batera okusikiriza abalala n'obwagazi bwabwe n'obumalirivu. Ebintu bye bakola mu muzannyo bisukka ku bibalo byokka, bikola obuwangwa n'ebiseera by'omupiira eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Dano ma keto kwogi I kom tuku, nyutu diro ki tuku maber tutwal, ipol kare gi cuku cwiny dano mukene ki miti gi ki keto cwiny gi. Gin ma gutimo I tuku ne okato I kom kwed keken, giyubu tekwaro ki anyim pa tuku odilo.
teo_prompt: Itunga lu ijanakinete aijarakec toma aboliasio, itodunitos acoa na itegelikina keda aboliasio, isinyikokitos duc luce keda amin kec keda ainakina kec. Apotu kesi kiswamata nuikamunitos abolia naka emopira adepar aiwadikaeta, aitolomun inonosio keda ingaren naka abolia naka emopira.
lgg_prompt: Ba yi ma idri owipi avita ma alia 'diyi, e'dapi onduaru azini 'ba avita ni 'diyi, yi 'ba azi 'diyi dri ava fe asi driasi azini asi 'baza yinisi. E'yo eyini 'ye avita 'da ma alea ri aga lu e'yo kalafe ni 'diyi ra, eyi ede e'yo suruni 'diyi tualu ewu drialeri ma alea mupira tuza ni 'diyi pie.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong adoketait na asioman ka ayangaun ipirioitin luka akwap kere, euta apugan aingic iwaitin luitetiak luka aipikakin ikapun toma akwap. Apakio nu, ayangautu ipegeta aijulakin ainapeta nuikamunitos ajaut naka akwapin nukokinga toma osomeroi luka akwapuwok.

Obwahati, okuhanuura kureesireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu biragiro ebikwatiraine n'okwejumba kw'abanyamahanga omu matendekyero g'omwihanga.

eng_prompt: There have been rumors circulating around campus about the recent election. Some students are questioning the integrity of her campaign tactics.
lug_prompt: Wabaddewo olugambo okwetoloola ettendekero ku kulonda okwakaggwa. Abayizi abamu babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'obukodyo bwe obw'okunoonya akalulu.

ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol me yubbe ki cuku cwiny ki bot luremme, nyara dong omoko tamme me cung pi bedo latela. En tye ki niyee ni etwero kelo alokaloka maber I gang kwan mege.

lug_prompt: Nga bwe tulowooza ku mwaka oguwedde, tusiima obuwagizi n'obuyambi bw'abantu bonna abakwatibwako. Okubeerawo kwo kukoze kinene nnyo ku lugendo lwaffe ffembi.

eng_prompt: As I reflect on my roots, I can't help but feel a deep connection to the land that shaped my identity. Its beauty and richness have always been a source of pride for me.
lug_prompt: Bwe ndowooza ku nsibuko yange, siyinza butalowooza ku nsi gye nnava. Obulungi bwaayo n'obugagga bwayo bibadde binsanyusa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom kaka na, pe atwero weko winyo kubbe matek tutwal I kin an ki kabedo ma okelo nyinga. Ber ne ki lonyo ne obedo gin ma awaka I iye I kare weng.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aomoom nuikamunitos iraanaka, mam eong apedori aipup arucokina naepol keda alupok nuapotu itolomutu eong. Ajokis ke keda abar ke duc eraas ibore yeneyangaunit eong aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu ma vile ola ma dria, ma econi ma aza ko e'yo erita ma eselea angu mani ma ngulupi si ri be ku. Eri ma ndriza azini lonyi ma alia 'diyi sawa driasi ma dri afusi.

eng_prompt: Before making any commitments, it's important to carefully assess the situation. We need to consider the potential risks and consequences of our actions.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kweyama, kikulu okwekenneenya embeera n'obwegendereza. Twetaaga okulowooza ku kabi akayinza okuva mu bikolwa byaffe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icikke me timo gin mo, pire tek me niang maber ngo matye katimme. Omyero watam I kom peko ki adwoki pa jami ma watimo.

lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi owi mi e'yo azi 'yezu ku, eri orodriru e'yo nde ma ale andrizu kililiru. Le ama ma ega e'yo ewaru amani eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Otakaikiriize kintu kyona, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma embeera n'obwegyendesereza. Twine kuteekateeka aha kabi n'ebirikubaasa kuruga omu bikorwa byaitu.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming conference, a diverse group of officials was assembled to discuss key issues. Each representative brought unique insights from their respective regions.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukungaana olujja, ekibinja ky'abakungu ab'enjawulo baakuŋŋaanyizibwa okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga enkulu. Buli mukiise yaleese amagezi ag'enjawulo okuva mu bitundu bye.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kacoke matye kabino ni, dul pa lutic ma padi padi gugure me nywako lok I kom lok mapigi tego. Lacungu pi lwak acel-acel okelo tam mapat-pat ma aa ki I but lobo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin airiamun na ebunit, aponi kitukokinai egurupu loka eswamak luegelegela kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok. Kangol abwoikiniton abu koyangau aomisio nuegelegela kotoma aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita imbatani emupi 'diyiniri ma alia, 'ba tra ongulumu azi'ba ndu ndu ni eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria. Ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi eji egata ndundu eyi engazu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza oruteerane orurikwija, guruupu y'abakungu etarikushushana ekateerwaho kuhanuura aha nshonga nkuru. Buri mujwekyerwa akareeta ebiteekateeko by'omutaano kuruga omu byanga bye.

eng_prompt: In a historic session, the court convened to address the critical need for new appointments to the bench. With various candidates under consideration, the chief justice took charge of the proceedings.
lug_prompt: Mu lutuula olw'ebyafaayo, kkooti yatuula okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amaanyi obw'okulonda abapya ku katebe. Olw'abesimbyewo ab'enjawulo abaali balowoozebwako, ssaabalamuzi ye yaddukanya emisango.
ach_prompt: I kare me winyo lok ma pire tek tutwal, kot obedo tye me lok I kom miti madit tutwal me nongo lutela manyen. Kit ma onongo kitye ka tam I kom lucungu mapol, langolkop madit aye obedo ki twero me winyo lok ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apupio naepol noi, abu ekooti iriamunos kanu aitemokin eipud loka aseun itunga luitetiak. Keda abwaak luegelegela lu eutai airereor, abu atubon lokapolon ikamunitos nuikamunitos akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ma alia, koti 'da tra i e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'bani 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma e'yosi, 'ba dwani ma drile ru ri 'du e'yo nde ma drilea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushutama kw'ebyafaayo, kooti ekakora aha nshonga y'okutoorana abantu abasya omu kooti. Ahabw'abantu baingi abeesimbireho, omuramuzi omukuru akatwara omurimo.

eng_prompt: After months of deliberation and discussions among the board members, the organization finally reached a consensus. With the need for direction and vision, a leader was appointed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteesa n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bammemba b'olukiiko olufuzi, ekibiina kyatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Olw'obwetaavu bw'obulagirizi n'okwolesebwa, omukulembeze yalondebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tam ki nywako lok ikin lumemba me dul enoni, dul enoni dong owinye. Pi miti me nongo tira ki neno manyen, kiyero latela.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aomisio keda ipegeta kanejaas imeeban luka atukot, abu erionget kodolok acamanar. Keda eipud loka aicoreta keda aomisio, aponi koseunai engarenon.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini agbatara gbazu memba board ni 'diyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, amuti nde isu asizu ti ecita ma dria ra. Ba pe drice'ba azi e'yo driceza ni azini egata ni 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteesa n'okuhanuura omu bammemba b'akakiiko, ekitongore kikahika aha kwikirizana. Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'obwebembezi n'okworekwa, omwebembezi akatooranwa.

eng_prompt: As the leader of our nation, I must ensure the well-being and progress of our people. It is crucial for me to address the challenges we face and implement effective solutions.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze w'eggwanga lyaffe, nnina okukakasa obulungi n'okukulaakulana kw'abantu baffe. Kikulu nnyo gye ndi okukola ku bizibu bye twolekaganye nabyo n'okuteekawo eby'okugonjoola ebikola.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela me lobo wa, omyero anen ni dano wa tye maber dok tye ka dongo. Pire tek tutwal bota me cobo peko ma watye kwede ki keto yoo me cobo ne itic.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon lo akwap wok, ekot eong awanyun ebe ejai aijar keda apol naka itunga wok. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu eong aitemokin atiokisio nu itereikina keda oni ka aitegear iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba kari amavileri niri ru, le ma ma ne ra kini ama ma 'ba eyi ma aa muke azini eyi zo drile. Eri orodriru ma dri e'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi ma aza kozu azini e'yo otuza kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi w'eihanga ryaitu, nyine kureeba ngu abantu baitu batunguuka. N'eky'omugasho munonga ahariinye okukora aha buremeezi obu turikushanga n'okutaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: To achieve our goals of sustainable growth and stability, collaboration is essential. By fostering strong partnerships, we can leverage the unique strengths of each member state.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe eby'okukulaakulana n'obutebenkevu, okukolera awamu kya mugaso. Nga tukuza enkolagana ey'amaanyi, tusobola okukozesa amaanyi ag'enjawulo aga buli ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi cobo miti wa me dongo lobo ki ber bedo, ribbe obedo gin ma pire tek. Ka wadongo wat matek, watwero tic ki kero pa lobo acel-acel matye I dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi nuka apol keda ainapakina, epolok noi aiswamanara. Kowai lo aitopolor eidicane loegogong, ipedori oni aitwasam agogong naka akwapin nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Asisile amavile zota sawa ezu azini asianzu ni 'diyi esuzu, ti ecita eri orodriru. Amuti okporu 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama eco okpo wura ndu ndu kari memba ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ayu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu by'entunguka n'obutebekana, okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho. Kurabira omu kureetaho enkoragana nungi, nitubaasa kukoresa amaani ga buri eihanga.

eng_prompt: To foster economic growth and stability in the region, it is essential for East African nations to collaborate more closely. This integration will require a strategic framework that outlines specific goals and objectives.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, kyetaagisa amawanga ga East Africa okukolera awamu. Okwegatta kuno kujja kwetaaga enteekateeka eraga ebiruubirirwa n'ebigendererwa eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Me kelo dongo lobo ki ber bedo I but lobo man, pire tek tutwal ni lobe me Afrika kunyango omyero gutii kacelo. Ribe man bimito yoo me tic ma nyutu miti ki miti matye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol keda ainapakina kotoma aiboisit, ejokuka akwapin nuka East Africa aiswamanara. Ibusakinit aimorikikina ngin aitolomun ainapeta nuitodunitos apeleikinata keda apeleikinata.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini asianzu angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru kari Africa ma kala etuni efuria 'diyi ma eci ti tualu. Ti ecita 'di le otita azini otita azini e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'obutebekana omu kyanga, ni kikuru amahanga ga burugwa izooba bwa Africa kukorera hamwe. Okukwatanisa oku nikwija kwetenga enteekateeka erikworeka ebigyendererwa n'ebigyendererwa.

eng_prompt: In these challenging times, the collective efforts of our community have been vital in addressing the ongoing crisis. We are especially grateful to those institutions that have taken proactive steps to support public health initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera bino eby'okusoomoozebwa, amaanyi g'ekitundu kyaffe ag'awamu gabadde ga mugaso mu kukola ku buzibu obugenda mu maaso. Tuli basanyufu nnyo n'okusingira ddala eri ebitongole ebyo ebikoze kyonna ekisoboka okuwagira enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I kare man me peko, tute pa lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko matye kawot anyim. Watye ki pwoc madit tutwalle bot dul mapat-pat matye ka cwako yub me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuetioko, agogong naka itunga luka atutubetekosi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemokin ationis na elosi akonye. Isiyalamikit sio noi iriongeta ngul luiswamaete kagogongu kanu aigangite nuka angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyi ma alea, okpo tualu ongulumu amavile 'diyiniri ebi ovu orodriru e'yo ewaru mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ama aa awa'difo be tuni amuti 'dayi dri 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yepi atita fepi otita e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini 'diyi dri 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi, okukorera hamwe kw'abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu n'eky'omugasho omu kurwanisa oburemeezi oburiho. Nitusiima munonga ebitongore ebikozire ekirikubaasika kushagika enteekateeka y'eby'amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent concerns about product safety, the organization has decided to implement a thorough review process. As part of this initiative, the auditor general will inspect the products distributed to ensure its quality product.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira okwaliwo gyebuvuddeko ku bukuumi bw'ebyamaguzi, ekitongole kisazeewo okuteekawo enkola ey'okwetegereza mu bujjuvu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, omubalirizi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti ajja kwekenneenya ebintu ebigabibwa okukakasa omutindo gwabyo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lworo ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom ber bedo pa jami, dul ne omoko tamme me timo kwed matut. Macalo but yub man, auditor general obi ngiyo jami ma ki poko me neno rwomgi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos ayuwara naka iboro, aseun erionget aitodolikin ainapeta nuka airereonor. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni auditor general aanyanar iboro lu ekorio kanu awanyun adoketait kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi e'yo afa edele 'diyi ma tambaza ma dria, amuti 'di asi e'yo 'du e'yo eti ondazu kililiru. Otita 'di ma azi ru, auditor general ni mu afa 'bani awa 'diyi andri nezu ra kini eyi ma wura muke.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira okwabaireho ebiro ebi ebikwatireine n'oburinzi bw'ebintu, ekitongore kyasharamu kukora enteekateeka y'okushwijuma gye ebintu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, omubazi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti naija kushwijuma ebintu ebirikugabwa, okureeba ngu biri aha mutindo.

eng_prompt: Despite their outward charm and charisma, their true nature reveals itself in their actions. Time and again, they prioritize their own interests over the needs of others.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga balabika bulungi era nga ba kisa, engeri zaabwe ez'amazima zeeyolekera mu bikolwa byabwe. Enfunda n'enfunda, bakulembeza ebyetaago byabwe okusinga ebyetaago by'abalala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ki mit kom ma aa ki woko, kit gi me ada nen I timgi. Kare ki kare, giketo miti gi bedo mukwongo me loyo miti pa joo mukene.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda iponesio luajokak, itodunitos aswamisiokec iponesiokec luka abeit. Apakio nuipu, isingarenitos kesi ipudesiakec adepar ipudesia luka luce.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma e'yo ndrizaru amveleru 'diyi ma talasi, yi ma adriza a'da ri e'da e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma alia. Sa'wa driasi, eyi eyi ma egata eyi 'ba okporu aga 'ba azi 'diyi ma egata eyi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushemeza kwabo okw'aheeru n'okushemererwa kwabo, emicwe yaabo y'amazima neeyoreka omu bikorwa byabo. Obwire n'obwire, nibatwara ebyetengo byabo nka bikuru kukira eby'abandi.

eng_prompt: Investing in our workforce is crucial for long-term success and growth. Recognizing the efforts of those who prioritize their team's development is essential for fostering a positive work environment.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu bakozi baffe kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi n'enkulaakulana ey'ekiseera ekiwanvu. Okusiima kaweefube w'abo abakulembeza enkulaakulana ya ttiimu zaabwe kya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ey'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I kom luticwa pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki cobo mitiwa pi kare malac. Miyo pwoc pi tic pa joo ma keto yub me dongo dul tic gi obed gin ma pire tek tutwal pi yubu kabedo maber me tic.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma eswamak wok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut keda apol naka apak naepol. Aicun aswam naka ngul luingarenikinitos apol naka etimu kec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor eswamae loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu 'ba azi ngapi amavile 'diyi ma alia ri eri orodriru drile suza azini zota ewu ezu ri ni. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba amuti yini ꞌdiyi ma ezota okporu ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo aꞌizuri eri orodriru eꞌyo azi ngazu onyiru ꞌdiyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu bakozi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi n'entunguuka y'obwire bureingwa. Okusiima amaani g'abo abarikwebembeza entunguuka ya tiimu yaabo n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho embeera nungi aha mirimo.

eng_prompt: In times of adversity, it is crucial that we unite our strengths and resources. By combining our talents and determination, we can overcome any obstacle that stands in our way.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, kikulu nnyo okugatta amaanyi gaffe n'ebikozesebwa byaffe. Bwe tukwataganya ebitone byaffe n'obumalirivu, tusobola okuvvuunuka ekizibu kyonna ekiyimiridde mu kkubo lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal me ribo kero wa ki jami ma watye kwede. Ka waribo diro ki miti wa, watwero loyo peko mo keken matye I yoo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, ejokuna aimorikikin agogonguwok keda iboro wok. Kowai lo aimorikikin atalantanakosi keda apodokinitwok, ipedori oni aipikor adio ainingosit na ejai orot wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru amani okpo amavile 'diyi tualu afa amani 'diyi pie. Afa feza amavile 'diyi tualu asi 'baza be, ama eco e'yo ci ecopi ama dri atripi 'diyi aga ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru okukwatanisa amaani gaitu n'ebintu byaitu. Twagaita etaraanta zaitu n'amaani, nitubaasa kusingura oburemeezi bwona oburi omu muhanda gwaitu.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges over the years, the resilience of the Ugandan people shines through in their daily lives. Their ability to overcome adversity is a testament to their strength and determination.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi okumala emyaka, obugumu bw'abantu ba Uganda bweyolekera mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Obusobozi bwabwe okuvvuunuka ebizibu bukakafu ku maanyi gaabwe n'obumalirivu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gukato ki I peko mapol tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec, tek cwiny pa anywali me Uganda tye ka ryeny I kwogi me nino ducu. Twerogi me loyo peko obedo lanyut me tek cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu kokaru lu atuboros, apedorit itunga luko Uganda aitodolikin aijar kec naka nginiparan. Apedorit kec naka aipikor atiokisio erai aitogogongoret na agogongu kec keda apodokinit kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra ti, 'ba Ugandaa 'diyi ma okpo e'da eyi ma edri eyi ma alea o'du driasi. Yi ma okpo e'yo ewaru ndezu ri eceta okpo yini azini asi 'baza yiniri niri'i.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi omu myaka egi yoona, obumanzi bw'abantu ba Uganda nibureebeka omu magara gaabo aga buriizooba. Okubaasa kwabo kusingura oburemeezi n'obuhame bw'amaani gaabo n'okwehayo kwabo.

eng_prompt: In a world driven by materialism, the relentless pursuit of wealth often overshadows the value of human life. Many individuals prioritize financial gain over their well-being and the well-being of others, leading to devastating consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekulemberwa okwagala eby'obugagga, okunoonya eby'obugagga emirundi egisinga kubikka ku muwendo gw'obulamu bw'omuntu. Abantu bangi bakulembeza okufuna ensimbi okusinga obulamu bwabwe n'obw'abalala, ekivaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki miti me nongo jami me kom, yenyo lonyo ipol kare balo rwom me kwo pa dano. Dano mapol gi tero nongo cente calo gin ma pire tek loyo kwo gi ki kwo pa dano mukene, man kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol noi naka aimonor iboro, aimo abar duc itolitoli ajokis naka aijar naka itunga. Itunga luipu isingarenitos ameda naka ikapun adepar aijar kec keda aijar naka luce, ido eyangauni nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea, 'bani lezu lonyi esuzu okposi ri ni tutuni orodri 'ba ada eyini ri ma omgbo esi. Ba karakara eyi e'yo robia esuzu ri 'du okporu ndeni aga eyi ma edri tualu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri, dika e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi onzi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikwebemberwa eby'obutungi, okuronda eby'obugaiga omu bwire butari bwa buriijo nikubinga omugasho gw'amagara g'abantu. Abantu baingi nibatwara eby'esente nka bikuru kukira amagara gaabo n'ag'abandi, ekirikubareetera oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing environment, effective leadership is crucial for organizational success. It is essential for leaders to prioritize the needs of their teams and the communities they serve.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, obukulembeze obulungi bukulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'ebitongole. Kya mugaso nnyo abakulembeze okukulembeza ebyetaago bya ttiimu zaabwe n'ebitundu bye baweereza.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, tela maber pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa dul mo keken. Pire tek tutwal ki lutela me keto miti pa luticgi ki lwak ma gitiyo botgi bedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka lolo lo ijulakina katipet, erai eingarenone loejok noi kanu akerianut naka atukot. Erai ibore yenepol noi engarenok aisingarenit ipudesia luka itimun kec keda itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Angu curu'do ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, driceza muke ri eri orodriru amuti eyi ma drile suza ni. Eri orodriru drice'ba eyini e'yo amuti eyini 'diyini le 'diyi 'bazu okporu tualu ongulumu eyini azi ngazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'ahonaaho, obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'ekitongore. N'eky'omugasho abebembezi kwebembeza ebyetaago bya tiimu zaabo hamwe n'ebyanga ebibarikuheereza.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the safety and integrity of food is essential for public health. Proper handling and distribution practices are crucial to prevent any risk of contamination.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obutebenkevu bw'emmere kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'abantu. Enkola ennungi ey'okukwatamu n'okusaasaanya ebintu ya mugaso nnyo okutangira akabi konna ak'obucaafu.
ach_prompt: Neno ni cam tye maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi yot kom pa lwak. Tic ki jami maber ki poko gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gengo poto pa two.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe eyuara inyamat erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka itunga. Iwaitin lu itwasamao ka aikor ejok eraas lu epolok noi kanu aitikitik abilibilio naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka ma tambaza kililiru ri eri orodriru o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni. Geri 'bani e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru azini eyi awazu kililiru 'diyi orodriru e'yo onzi 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'okurya biba birungi, n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu. Enkora nungi y'okukoresa n'okugabira abantu n'ey'omugasho munonga okurwanisa akabi koona ak'oburofa.

eng_prompt: To ensure a smooth operation and meet the needs of our community, we must establish effective systems for food distribution. This will guarantee that everyone has access to the resources they require.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti emirimu gitambula bulungi n'okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitundu kyaffe, tulina okuteekawo enkola ennungi ey'okugaba emmere. Kino kijja kukakasa nti buli omu afuna ebintu bye yeetaaga.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic owoto maber ki cobo miti pa lwak, omyero waket yub maber me poko cam. Man bi weko dano weng nongo jami ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iswamai ejok ka aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga wok, ekot oni aitolomun iwaitin luepedorete aikor inyamat. Ebuni ngin awanyun ebe epedori nginitunganan adumunun iboro lu ekotos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngazu kililiru azini afa lele ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma aza kozu, le ama ma e'do geri kililiru nyaka awazu 'diyi. Diri nga ne ra kini 'ba dria eco afa eyini le 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu emirimo neekorwa kurungi n'okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu, twine kutaho enkora nungi y'okugaba eby'okurya. Eki nikiija kureeba ngu buri omwe atunga ebintu ebi arikwetenga.

eng_prompt: In times of economic uncertainty, it's crucial to prioritize the well-being of our community. We must ensure that resources are allocated where they can make the most impact, focusing on those who truly need support.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obulungi bw'ekitundu kyaffe. Tulina okukakasa nti eby'obugagga biweebwa mu kifo we bisinga okukosa, nga tussa essira ku abo abeetaaga obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me lim, pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo pa lwak obed gin ma pire tek. Omyero wanen ni kimiyo kony kama twero kelo adwogi maber loyo, kun waketo cwiny wa i kom joo ma mito kony.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko nuka ikapun, ejokuna noi aisingarenit aijar naka itunga wok. Ibusakinit oni awanyun ebe ibwaikitai iboro aiboisio nuepedorete kesi aitodolikin, kosodete aibwaikin agangat mama ejaasi ngul luekotosi agangat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ma alia, eri orodriru 'bazu e'yo onyiru ama vile ongulumu 'diyiniri okporu. Le ama ma ne ra kini 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi awa pari ecopi orodriru ndeni 'diyi ma alea, asi 'bazu 'ba atita lepi saaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu eby'entaasya bitarikwetegyerezibwa, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'amagara marungi g'abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu. Tushemereire kureeba ngu eby'obugaiga biheebwa ahu birikubaasa kukora kihango, turikugyenderera abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Reflecting on my educational journey, I realize how much each school shaped my experiences. Among them, there is one institution that stands out in my memory.
lug_prompt: Bwe ndowooza ku by'enjigiriza byange, nkiraba engeri buli ssomero gye lyannyambamu mu bulamu bwange. Mu byo, waliwo ekitongole kimu kye nzijukira ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom kwan na, aniang kit ma gang kwan acel acel ogudo kwede kwo na. I kingi, tye gang kwan acel ma wiya poo I komgi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aomoom nuikamunitos alositeka naka asioman, ajeni eong epone loabu esomero ngol kiswama eong. Kanejaas kesi, ejai atukot adiope naejok noi kotoma aiitunet ka.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo egazu ma vile aci onitaniri ma dria, ma esu e'yo sukulu alu alu ni ma idri ojazuri ra. Eyi ma eselea, amuti azi alu ma e'yo egapi saaru ni ci.
nyn_prompt: Kubarikuteekateeka aha rugyendo rwangye rw'eby'obwegyese, nindeeba oku buri eishomero ryangye ryampwereire. Omuri byo, hariho eitendekyero rimwe eri nkirikwijuka munonga.

eng_prompt: I often reflect on my past and the experiences that shaped me. It’s important to acknowledge our roots and the journey that led us here.
lug_prompt: Ntera okulowooza ku biseera byange eby'emabega n'ebyo bye nnayitamu ebyanfuula omuntu omulungi. Kikulu okukkiriza ensibuko zaffe n'olugendo olwatutuusa wano.
ach_prompt: Pol kare atamo I kom jami ma otimme I kwona I kare macon ki jami ma okelo alokaloka I kwona. Pire tek tutwal me niang kama wa aa ki iye ki wot ma okelo wa kany.
teo_prompt: Etapit eong aomoom nuikamunitos akekiro nukokau keda akiro nuapotu kiswamautu eong. Erai ibore yenejok aijen iponesio wok keda alosit na ayaunit oni ne.
lgg_prompt: Ma sawa driasi e'yo ega ma vile agapi 'bo 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ndra ma dria 'diyi ma dria. Eri orodriru e'yo amani engazu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu tualu aci amani ijipi 'dia 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ninkira kuteekateeka aha byahingwireho hamwe n'ebi naarabiremu ebyampindwire. N'eky'omugasho kumanya oburugo bwaitu hamwe n'orugyendo orwatureesire aha.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the bustling streets of Ntale, I could feel the palpable tension in the air. The whispers of change and the hope for freedom were everywhere, marking a pivotal moment in our history.
lug_prompt: Bwe natambula mu nguudo z'e Ntale ezaali zijjudde abantu, nnawulira obunkenke mu bbanga. Okuwuubaala kw'enkyukakyuka n'essuubi ly'eddembe byali buli wamu, nga kino kyalaga ekiseera ekikulu mu byafaayo byaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I gudu ma opong ki dano I Ntale, awinyo lworo I yamo. Koko me aloka-loka ki gen me bedo agonya obedo kaweng, man obedo kare ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro wa.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korotin luko Ntale luejaasi keda itunga luipu, apedori eong apupun aiyalongong kotoma okwam. Apotu akiro nuka aijulanakineta keda amuno naka ailajara kojaikinos aiboisio kere, itodunitos apak naepol noi kotoma akiro nukakolowok.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria nzila Ntale ni 'ba eyini aa'zu tu 'diyi ma alea risi, ma eri e'yo asi otiza ni oli ma alea ri ra. O'duko e'yo ojata ni azini asi'baza driwala ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi pari dria, e'dazu sawa okporu ama vile adi ma alia 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto za Ntale ezirimu abantu baingi, nkaba ninyehurira okwerarikirira omu mwanya. Okuhunama kw'empindahinduka hamwe n'amatsiko g'obusingye bikaba biri buri hamwe, ekyaretsireho obwire bukuru omu byafaayo byaitu.

eng_prompt: Through a combination of effective public health measures and widespread vaccination efforts, authorities have successfully mitigated the spread of the virus. As a result, they have been able to control this pandemic.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza basobodde okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka nga bayita mu nkola ennungi ey'ebyobulamu n'okugema. N'ekivuddemu, basobodde okufuga ekirwadde kino.
ach_prompt: I yo me tic ki yoo me yot kom ma tiyo maber kacel ki yub me gwero dano mapol, lutela guloyo lweny i kom nya pa two corona. Macalo adwogi ne, gubedo ki kero me gengo poto pa gemo eni.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aimorikikin nuka angaleu keda aikis ekato, apedorete apedorosio aitikitik awea naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, apedoritos kesi aitikitik adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi 'yezu kililiru tualu okpo 'bani 'ba eyi osozu aro azo atrizurisi 'diyi pie, drice'ba eyi obi e'yo azo korona niri ma ereta ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi o'bi azo 'deza 'di ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi babaasize kukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'akakooko, barikurabira omu kukoresa emiringo y'eby'amagara n'okugyema abantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, babaasize kurwanisa oburwaire obu.

eng_prompt: In our efforts to improve healthcare delivery in Uganda, we recognize the critical roles played by various professionals. Collaboration between medical staff and engineers is essential for developing effective solutions tailored to our local needs.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube waffe ow'okutumbula obujjanjabi mu Uganda, tukimanyi nti abakugu ab'enjawulo bakola emirimu emikulu. Enkolagana wakati w'abasawo ne bayinginiya ya mugaso nnyo mu kukola eby'okugonjoola ebizibu ebituukagana n'ebyetaago byaffe eby'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tutewa me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony me yot kom I lobo Uganda, wangeyo tic mapire tek pa ludiro ma padi padi. Winye ikin lutic yoto kom ki ludiro me engineers pire tek tutwal pi yubu yoo me cobo peko matye i kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam wok naka aitojokar nuka amukian ko Uganda, ijeni oni aswam naepol noi naka ipirioitin luegelegela. Aiswamanara kiding eswamak lu adekis keda engineers erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun iwaitin lu itodolikinete ipudesia luka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo amani 'ba e'yo rua alanisi kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, ama ega azi okporu 'ba onita be angiri 'diyini nga ri ra. Ti ecita azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea inginiya eyi pie ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka yaitu y'okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu Uganda, nitumanya omurimo muhango ogurikukorwa abakugu baingi. Okukwatanisa ahagati y'abashaho hamwe na ba ingyiniya n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura oburyo bw'okukora ahabyetaago byaitu.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of our project needs, we decided to invest in new equipment. The machinery was essential for our upcoming projects.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku byetaago bya pulojekiti yaffe, twasalawo okussa ssente mu kugula ebyuma ebipya. Ebyuma byali bikulu nnyo mu pulojekiti zaffe ez'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom jami ma mite pi yub wa, wamoko tamwa me wilo jami tic manyen. Cuma ne obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi yub wa matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos ipudesia luka epurojekt wok, apotu sio aseutu aipikakin ikapunukec toma acuman nuitetiak. Ajokuka acuman ngun kanu ipurojektin wok lu ebunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile otita 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, ama asi robia 'ba afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Cuma 'da eyi ndra orodriru ama vile otita emupi 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyetengo bya purogyekiti yaitu, tukasharamu kugura ebyoma bisya. Ebyoma bikaba biri eby'omugasho omu purogyekiti zaitu ezirikwija.

eng_prompt: After facing numerous challenges with our outdated equipment, we knew we needed a reliable solution. We decided to invest in advanced technology to improve our operations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusanga okusoomoozebwa kungi n'ebikozesebwa byaffe eby'edda, twakimanya nti twetaaga eky'okugonjoola ekizibu ekyesigika. Twasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu tekinologiya ow'omulembe okulongoosa emirimu gyaffe.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo peko mapol ki jami ticwa macon, wangeo ni wamito yoo me tic ma genne. Wamoko tamwa me keto cente I kom diro me tet manyen me ilo malo rwom me tic wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumun atiokisio nuipu keda iswamasiawok luemojongito, ajeni sio ebe ikoto oni aitemokin ationis. Apotu sio aseutu aipikakin ikapun toma aitwasam etatai loakwana kanu aitojokar eswamaekosi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara ama vile afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, ama nii ra kini ama le geri azi e'yo nde ma aza kozu kililiru ni i. A'du e'yo lonyi vuti aleza 'bazu afa ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma alea azi amavile 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga oburemeezi bwingi n'ebyoma byaitu ebikuru, tukamanya ngu nitwetenga eky'okukora ekirikwesigwa. Tukasharamu kuta esente omu tekinorogye ey'omurembe, okutunguura emirimo yaitu.

eng_prompt: In the face of overwhelming danger, they stood united, driven by a shared purpose that transcended their own safety. Their unwavering commitment to the cause inspired those around them to act with courage and determination.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekedde akabi akasukkiridde, bayimiridde nga bali bumu, nga bakubirizibwa ekigendererwa eky'awamu ekyasukkulumye ku bukuumi bwabwe. Okwewaayo kwabwe okutajjulukuka eri ensonga kwazzaamu abo abaali babeetoolodde amaanyi okukola n'obuvumu n'obumalirivu.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko madit tutwal, gu cung ma guribe, ki miti acel ma okato rwom me gwoko ber bedo gi. Keto cwinygi I kom yub eni okonyo jo ma orumugi me timo jami ki tekcwiny.
teo_prompt: Koingaren naka atiokisio nuepolok, apotu kesi kimorikikinos, apotu kesi kopedosi aimorikikin keda alosikinet naepol noi naka ayuwarakec. Ainakina kec naepol noi mama ejaasi ngun abu isinyikok ngul luejaasi keda kesi aswam keda atiting keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru okporu 'diyi ma drilea, eyi so pa ti ecita si, eyini asi 'bazu e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ma tambaza niri ma dria. Asi 'baza yini e'yo nde ma dria ri fe ava 'ba yi ma ageia 'diyi dri e'yo 'yezu asi mba azini asi 'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'akabi akarikukira obwingi, bakeemereera hamwe, barikugyendera aha kigyendererwa kimwe ekyabaire nikikira eby'okwerinda kwabo. Okwehayo kwabo ahabw'omurimo gukahiga abo ababaherereire kukora n'obumanzi n'obumanzi.

eng_prompt: After years of oppression and struggle, the people finally united to fight for their freedom. Their determination and courage inspired a movement that would change the course of history.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga banyigirizibwa era nga balwana, abantu baasobola okwegatta okulwanirira eddembe lyabwe. Okumalirira kwabwe n'obuvumu byaleetawo enkulaakulana eyaleetawo enkyukakyuka mu byafaayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me diyo dano ki lweny, dano dong guribe kacel me lweny pi bedo agonya gi. Cwinygi kacel ki tek cwinygi okelo yub me kelo aloka loka I kom jami ma otime I kare mukato angec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aiticanio keda ejie, apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu aitiji ailajara kec. Apodokinit kec keda atitingikec abu kisinyikok aswam naepedori aijulakin akiro nukakolo.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani candi fezu azini a'di 'dizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba eyi eci ti asizu a'di 'dizu driwala eyini risi. Asi 'baza azini asi mba yiniri fe ava amuti azi ngapi e'yo adi ni 'diyi ojapi ra ni ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okubonabonesibwa n'okurwana, abantu bakahendera baketeerana kurwanirira obugabe bwabo. Okwehayo kwabo n'obumanzi bwabo bikareetaho ekibiina ekyabaire nikiija kuhindura ebyabaireho omu byafaayo.

eng_prompt: We've done all we can for now, and the situation is out of our hands. It's best to remain patient and observe the developments as they unfold.
lug_prompt: Tukoze kyonna kye tusobola mu kaseera kano, era embeera teri mu mikono gyaffe. Kirungi okusigala ng'ogumiikiriza n'otunuulira enkulaakulana nga bw'egenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Watimo jami weng ma watwero pi kombedi, dok lok ne dong pe I cingwa. Ber tutwal me diyo cwiny ki neno ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Iswamat sio nu ipedori oni, konye mam ejautene ejai akanin wok. Erai ibore yenejok noi asalakin atitingikinit kosodi airereonor akiro nuiswamasi.
lgg_prompt: Ama 'ye e'yo dria amani eco 'ye sawa 'disi ri 'bo, dika e'yo nde fu ama dria ra. Eri muke ndeni aa'zu asi teza be e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Tukozire kyona ekirikubaasika obwahati, kandi embeera eri omu mikono yaitu. Nikirungi okugumisiriza okureeba ebirikubaho nk'oku birikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The company has established strict guidelines to ensure a safe and respectful environment for all employees. Any actions that violate these policies will be met with serious consequences.
lug_prompt: Kampuni etaddewo ebiragiro ebikakali okukakasa embeera ey'obukuumi era ey'ekitiibwa eri abakozi bonna. Ebikolwa byonna ebimenya amateeka gano bijja kufuna ebivaamu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Dul ne oketo cik matek tutwal me neno ni lutic weng tye maber dok giworo luticgi. Tim mo keken ma turu cik man binongo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etolomu ekampuni ainapeta nuegogong kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara ka ayongite eswamak kere. Aswamisio adio nu ebilibilete ainapeta nu eponio aitodolikin keda atiokisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti nderi o'ba azita okporu 'diyi nezu ra kini angu azi'ba dria eyini aa'zu alaru azini inzita be. Yeta ci azita 'diyi onyopi 'diyi nga dri fu e'yo onzi eyi be.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni etandikireho ebiragiro by'amaani okureeba ngu abakozi boona batunga obusingye n'ekitiinisa. Ekikorwa kyona ekirikuhenda ebiragiro ebi, nikiija kurugwamu ebikuru.

eng_prompt: In times of budget constraints, it is crucial for the district to prioritize transparency and responsibility in financial decisions. Unfortunately, some individuals seem more focused on their own interests rather than the community's needs.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu bw'embalirira, kikulu nnyo disitulikiti okukulembeza obwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu kusalawo kw'ebyensimbi. Eky'ennaku, abantu abamu balowooza nnyo ku byabwe ku bwabwe okusinga ebyetaago by'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me byek lim, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi district me keto cwinygi i kom lok ada ki timo tic gi ikare me moko tam me lim. Ki gum marac, dano mukene tamo tutwalle I kom miti gi me kaka miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu ikidioko ebajet, erai ibore yenepol noi edisitrikt aisingarenit nuka aica ka aswam ejok kotoma aseununeta nuka ikapun. Nukaiturur, esubit bala epodokitos itunga ice ipudesia kec bon itia ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sawa e'yo bajeti ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni esizu kurisi, eri orodriru distrikiti ni asi 'bazu e'yo ada ma dria azini e'yo 'yezu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria. Drile onziru, 'ba azi 'diyi asi 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ma dria aga e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra, n'eky'omugasho munonga disiturikiti kwebembeza amazima n'obujunaanizibwa omu kucwamu ahaby'empiiha. Eky'obusaasi, abantu abamwe nibareebeka nk'abarikwefaho, okukira ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in community concerns regarding safety, it is essential to establish a collaborative approach. To effectively address these issues, the task force should work hand in hand with the police.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'okweraliikirira kw'ekitundu ku by'okwerinda, kya mugaso okuteekawo enkola ey'omukago. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, akakiiko akadduukirize kalina okukolera awamu ne poliisi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dongo pa lworo ma lwak tye kwede I kom gwoko kuc, pire tek tutwal me kelo yoo me tic ma ribe. Me tyeko lok magi maber, dul ma doro lok kom two corona omyero gutii kacelo ki abili.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyatakino naka aiyalongongo naka itunga kanu ayuara, ejokuna noi aimorikikin. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, ekot atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce aswam nepepe keda ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini aa'zu ewu agapi 'diyi ma alea e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi e'dozu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, le drice'ba azo korona niri ni 'diyi ma nga azi driadria polisi eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira kw'abantu aha bikwatireine n'eby'okwerinda, n'eky'omugasho kukorera hamwe. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi,akakiiko kashemereire kukorera hamwe na poriisi.

eng_prompt: To ensure an efficient response to the community's needs, a dedicated group must be established. This group will focus on coordinating efforts and managing resources effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti ebyetaago by'abantu bikolebwako bulungi, ekibiina ekyesigamiddwa kirina okuteekebwawo. Ekibinja kino kijja kussa essira ku kukwasaganya emirimu n'okuddukanya obulungi ebintu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kicobo miti pa lwak maber, omyero ki cwal dul mo. Dul man biketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ribo tic ki tic ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aanyun ebe epedorio aitemokin ejok ipudesia luka itunga, ekot aitolomun egurupu. Ebuni egurupu lo apodokinit aimorikikin aswam ka aitwasam iboro ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ma e'do ongulumu azi e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru. Ongulumu 'diri nga asi 'ba okpo 'bazu tualu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebyetaago by'abantu nibihikiirizibwa kurungi, guruupu eshemereire kutandikwaho. Guruupu egi neija kuta amaani omu kukwatanisa n'okureeberera kurungi eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the transaction details and confirming the error, it is clear that the customer is entitled to a reimbursement. Therefore, the finances should be refunded.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okwetegereza ebikwata ku kusuubulagana n'okukakasa ensobi, kyeyoleka bulungi nti kasitoma alina eddembe okuddizibwa ssente ze. N'olwekyo, ssente zirina okuddizibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut me cat ki nongo ni bal ne otime, nen atyer kamaleng ni luwil tye ki twero me nongo culgi. Pi meno, omyero kidwok cene ne cen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuka agwelanar kosodi aitigogongor aibucaret, ecai cut ebe ebeit agwelak adumun ikapunukec. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit ainyakar ikapun ngun.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani eꞌyo tujara ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi ma ale andrizu azini eꞌyo onzi ꞌda esuzu ꞌbori ma vutia, eri eꞌda kililiru kini ajeꞌba ꞌda ma drilemgbo ꞌbani eri ma robia ofezu ꞌi. Ka'dini, le 'ba ma ogo robia 'da ma omvi vile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikukwata ahaby'obushubuzi n'okuhamya enshobi, nikyoreka butunu ngu omuguzi aine obugabe kugarurirwa esente ze. N'ahabw'ekyo, esente zishemereire kugarurwayo.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the terms and conditions, it became clear that the transaction was final and binding. Any attempt to refund the amount would undermine the integrity of the agreement.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza obulungi amateeka n'obukwakkulizo, kyafuuka kyeyoleka bulungi nti endagaano yali ya nkomeredde era nga yeetaagisa. Okugezaako kwonna okuzzaayo ssente kwanditaataaganyizza endagaano.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo ki diro cik, onen atyer kamaleng ni winye ne obedo me agiki. Tem mo keken me dwoko cene enoni twero balo winye matye I winye ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ikisila keda nutupitono, apotu kojenutu ebe erai acamanar ngin nawasia. Adiogwetan kere naka ainyakar ikapun ngun emunarete acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Azita eyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eca kililiru kini e'yo 'di asizuri azini azi ngazaru. E'yo ci 'bani lezu robia 'da ogozu vile ri ni nga e'yo 'bani atile 'diyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebiragiro n'obukwakurizo, kikarebeka butunu ngu endagaano ekaba eri ey'ahamuheru. Okugyezaho kw'okugarurayo esente nikushiisha endagaano.

eng_prompt: We have made significant progress in our efforts to combat the pandemic. It's crucial that we remain vigilant and continue to take necessary precautions.
lug_prompt: Tufunye enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kaweefube waffe ow'okulwanyisa ekirwadde bbunansi. Kya mugaso nnyo okusigala nga tuli bulindaala n'okweyongera okwegendereza.
ach_prompt: Watiyo matek me lweny i kom two korona. Pire tek tutwal ni omyero wabed ma wangwa twolo dok wamedde ki gwoke.
teo_prompt: Iswamat sio noi kotoma aitiji adeka naka ekorona. Erai ibore yenepol noi asalakin oni acoikina ka ainyikokin aitwasam ikisila lu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: Ama esu zota okporu okpo amani 'bale a'di 'dizu azo 'dezaniri be. Eri orodriru amani aa'zu mile be dika ama ma 'du e'yo drinia 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Tutungire entunguuka y'amaani omu kurwanisa oburwaire. N'eky'omugasho ngu tugume twetegyereize kandi tugume nitwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent financial discrepancies reported by the finance department, a thorough review of the budget allocations is necessary. Consequently, the auditor general will have to inspect the expenditures.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ensimbi obubaddewo gyebuvuddeko ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi, kyetaagisa okwekenneenya obulungi embalirira. N'olw'ekyo, omubalirizi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti ajja kuba alina okulondoola ensaasaanya.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok me apoka-poka me lim ma jang gamente ma loyo lok kom lim owaco cokcok-ki, omyero ki nen kit ma ki keto kwede lim I byek me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, langii kor tic ki lim omyero ongii kit ma kitiyo kwede ki cente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuelimoritai erionget loka ikapun, ibusakinit airereor nuka ebajet. Kanuka ngun, ebeit auditor general airereor aitosom ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria, okalamvu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ondrepi ri, le 'ba ma andri geri 'bani robia ayuzu ri ma ale kililiru. Ka'dini, 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andripiri ma andri geri robia ayuzuri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obwakyerereirwe ekitongore ky'eby'empiiha, nikyetengyesa okushwijuma eby'embalirira. N'ahabw'ekyo, omubazi w'ebitabo bya gavumenti naija kushwijuma enshohoza.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a respectful and professional environment is essential for our team's success. Therefore, we must address any issues that arise promptly and decisively.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma embeera ey'ekitiibwa era ey'ekikugu kya mugaso eri obuwanguzi bwa ttiimu yaffe. N'olw'ekyo, tulina okukola ku nsonga zonna ezijja amangu ddala era mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Gwoko rwom me woro ki diro obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti pa dul tuku wa. Pi meno, omyero wa tyek lok mo keken ma obino oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda ejautene lo angosibib ido lo ipirioitin erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka etimukosi. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit oni aitemokin atiokisio kere nuelomunete katipet.
lgg_prompt: Angu inzita fezu azini azi ngazu kililiru ri ma tambaza eri orodriru amuti amavileri ni drile suza esuzu. Ka'dini, le ama ma ko e'yo dria efu'ba 'diyi ma aza mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'embeera y'ekitiinisa n'obwegyendesereza n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi bwa tiimu yaitu. N'ahabw'ekyo, twine kukora aha nshonga zoona ezirikubaho ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: In a world often driven by personal gain, their actions stand out as a beacon of generosity. Their willingness to put others' needs before their own is truly inspiring.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi etera okuvugibwa okwefunira ebyabwe, ebikolwa byabwe bivaayo ng'akabonero k'obugabi. Okwagala kwabwe okukulembeza ebyetaago by'abalala mu kifo ky'ebyabwe kuzzaamu nnyo amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I lobo matye ki miti me nongo magoba pa dano, timgi tye macalo lanyut me bedo jo ma cingi yot. Cwinygi me keto miti pa jo mukene me bedo mukwongo ma ka meggi obedo gin ma yomo cwiny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda ipudesia luka itunga, iswamaete kesi kwape aanyunet naka aikor. Akapakina kec naka aisingarenit ipudesia luka luce erai ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea 'bani e'yo 'ba ma ngulupi ni isuzu ri ma dria, e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi e'da ekile afa feza ma eceta ru. Eyi ma ava 'bazu e'yo 'ba azi 'diyini lele 'diyi 'bazu eyi ma ngulupi ma drilea ri eri ava engapi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikukuratira ebyetengo by'abantu, ebikorwa byabo nibyoreka ngu n'abagabi. Okwenda kwabo kuta ebyetaago by'abandi omu mwanya gw'ebyabo, n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges they faced, the team remained dedicated and focused on their goals. Their unwavering commitment to excellence shone through in every project they undertook.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa, ttiimu yasigala yeewaddeyo era ng'essira balitadde ku biruubirirwa byayo. Obumalirivu bwabwe obutakyukakyuka mu kukola obulungi bweyolekera mu buli pulojekiti gye baakola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gurwatte ki peko mapol, dul tuku ne gubedo ki miti me cobo miti gi. Cwinygi ma pe lokke I kom timo jami maber onen I yub weng ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda atiokisio nuipu, apotu itimun iswamata kagogong ido apodokinit alosikinetekec. Alosikinetekec naka aitodolikin iboro luejokuka abu kojen kotoma opurojektin lu apotu kesi kiswamata.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yini esu 'diyi ma talasi, amuti 'da awi asi 'baza be azini asi 'baza be e'yo yini lele 'diyi ma dria. E'yo yini asi 'bazu e'yo onyiru 'yezu ri e'da otita dria yini 'ye 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi obu batungire, tiimu ekaguma eyehaireyo kandi eyeteekateekire aha bigyendererwa byayo. Okwehayo kwabo kuhika aha birungi, kukarebeka omu purogyekiti zoona ezi baakozire.

eng_prompt: In the midst of chaos and uncertainty, a dedicated team of medical professionals worked tirelessly to provide care and support to those in need. Their unwavering commitment to helping others was evident in every action they took.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butabanguko n'obutali bukakafu, ekibinja ky'abasawo abakugu baakola butaweera okuwa obujjanjabi n'obuyambi eri abo abali mu bwetaavu. Obumalirivu bwabwe obw'okuyamba abalala bweyolekera mu buli kimu kye baakola.
ach_prompt: I kare me kuku kuku ki peko, dul pa lutic yoto kom gutiyo matek me miyo kony ki kony bot joo matye ki peko. Cwinygi matek me konyo luwotgi nen I jami weng ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka amumu keda amamus aijen, apotu ipirioitin luka angaleu iswamata agogongu kanu aijaikin agangat nejaas lu ican. Apodokinit kec naka aingarakin luce aponi kojenunai kotoma akiro kere nuiswamaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru ma talasi, amuti azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi nga azi ande kokoru azakoma fezu 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi dri. Asi 'baza yiniri 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri e'da e'yo dria eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'akavuyo n'obutegyendesereza, tiimu y'abakugu omu by'amagara ekakora n'amaani kureeberera n'okuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa. Okwehayo kwabo kuhwera abandi kukarebeka omu bikorwa byabo byona.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the project results, he felt a sense of pride in the team's dedication and effort. Their commitment to excellence did not go unnoticed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyava mu pulojekiti, yawulira okwenyumiriza mu kwewaayo kwa ttiimu n'okufuba. Obumalirivu bwabwe obw'okukola obulungi tebwabulawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwoki me tic enoni, en obedo ki awaka I kom tic ki miti pa lutic. Cwinygi me timo jami maber pe okato ma pe kineno.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuelomunitos kotoma opurojekt, abu ngesi kopup aiyalama kanu ainakina keda agogong naka etimu. Apotu itunga kowanyutu ainakina kec naka aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo efupi otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri isu afusi amuti 'da ma ava azini okpo eyini 'diyisi. Eyi ma ava e'yo muke 'yezu ri ma dria ri awini mu e'yo kokoru ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirugire omu purogyekiti, akeehurira aine ekitiinisa ahabw'okwehayo n'amaani ga tiimu. Okwehayo kwabo kukora kurungi tikurabuzireho.

eng_prompt: As he listened to their concerns, he realized that there was a deeper issue at play. Driven by empathy, he felt compelled to dig deeper into their struggles.
lug_prompt: Bwe yawuliriza bye baali boogera, yakizuula nti waaliwo ensonga esingawo obunene. Olw'okumukwatirwa ekisa, yawulira ng'alina okwekenneenya ebizibu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka winyo lokgi, en oniang ni tye peko mapol tutwal matye katimme. Ki cwiny me kica, en owinyo ni myero oket cwinye I kom peko ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Neipupia ngesi aiyalongongokec, abu ngesi koany ebe ejai akirot naepol noi. Kanu aitim, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi airereor atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo erini 'yole 'diyi eriria, eri esu ra kini e'yo azi angiri ni i 'ye i. Asi ndriza ma e'yosi, eri ama asi e'yo ewaru yini 'diyi ma ale andrizu drile.
nyn_prompt: Ku yaahurikiize okwerarikirira kwabo, akeetegyereza ngu hakaba hariho enshonga y'amaani. Ahabw'okugirira abandi esaasi, akeehurira naagyemeserezibwa kushwijuma entaro zaabo.

eng_prompt: In every organization, there are individuals whose skills and dedication set them apart from the rest. These unsung heroes tackle the most challenging tasks that others shy away from.
lug_prompt: Mu buli kitongole, waliwo abantu abalina obukugu n'obumalirivu ebibafuula ab'enjawulo ku balala. Abazira bano abatamanyiddwa bakola emirimu egisinga okusoomooza abalala gye beewala.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, tye dano matye ki diro kacel ki keto cwinygi me tic ma weko gi bedo pat ki dul mukene. Lutela ma pe ki lwongo gi ni gitiyo tic matego tutwal ma joo mukene pe timo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta kere, ejaasi itunga luejaasi keda acoa keda ainakina naepedori aitiak kes kanejaas luce. Itunga lu lumam ejenasi itemonokinete atiokisio nu etiono noi nu iyuunitos luce.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria eyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ma ondua azini ava eyini fe eyini aa'zu ndu 'ba azi 'diyi vurisi 'diyi ci. Ba 'bani ongo kokoru 'diyi e'yo ewaru 'ba azi 'diyi ni ku 'diyi 'ye.
nyn_prompt: Omuri buri kitongore, harimu abantu abu emyoga yaabo hamwe n'okwehayo kwabo birikubataanisa n'abandi. Abasinguzi aba abatarikwetegyerezibwa, nibakora emirimo erikukirayo oburemeezi abandi barikwetantara.

eng_prompt: In order to achieve their goals, the team must find a way to inspire each member. Without a strong sense of purpose, their efforts may fall flat.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe, ttiimu erina okunoonya engeri y'okuzzaamu buli mmemba amaanyi. Awatali kigendererwa kya maanyi, kaweefube waabwe ayinza okugwa butaka.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti gi, dul tuku eni omyero gunong yoo me cuku cwiny dano weng. Labongo bedo ki miti matek tutwal, tute gi twero poto.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec, ekot etimu adumun ewai lo isinyikokit ngol emeeba. Arai emamei alosikinet, epedorete aswamukec aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Asisile yini 'diyi esuzu, le amuti nde ma esu geri 'ba dria ma ava engazu. Asisile okporu kokoru, okpo yini 'diyi eco e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo, tiimu eshemereire kuronda omuringo gw'okugaruramu buri muntu amaani. Hatariho ekigyendererwa ky'amaani, amaani gaabo nigabaasa kuremwa.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and limited resources, the dedication and resilience of the healthcare team have been remarkable. Their efforts in managing patient care and responding to the crisis have not gone unnoticed.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi n'ebikozesebwa ebitono, okwewaayo n'obugumu bwa ttiimu y'ebyobulamu bibadde bya kitalo. Kaweefube waabwe mu kulabirira abalwadde n'okukola ku bizibu tebagenze nga tebategeerekese.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gukato ki peko mapol ki lim ma nok, tic ki tek cwiny pa lutic yoto kom obedo ber tutwal. Tute gi me tic i kom lutwo ki lweny i kom peko eni pe okato ma pe kineno.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu keda iboro lu ikidioko, ainakina keda agogong naka etimu loka angaleu erai ibore yenitegelikina. Aswam kec naka aidar adekak keda aitemokin atiokisio nuka adekak aponi kowanyunai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu tualu afa ayuzaru were 'diyi pie ra ti, asi 'baza azini asi 'baza amuti arojo ni 'diyiniri ebi ovu onyiru tu. Okpo eyini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu ri econi mu e'yo kokoru ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi n'ebikozeso bikye, okwehayo n'okugumitsiriza kwa tiimu y'eby'amagara kitangaaza. Amaani gaabo omu kureeberera abarwaire hamwe n'okugarukamu oburemeezi, tigarikubura kureebwa.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, they finally achieved their dreams. Now, surrounded by loved ones and enjoying their passions, they are extensively living a good life.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, baasobola okutuukiriza ebirooto byabwe. Kati, nga beetooloddwa abaagalwa baabwe n'okunyumirwa ebyo bye baagala, babeera mu bulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: I ngee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwinygi I kom tic, dong gucobo miti gi. Kombedi, ma dano gi me amara orumogi dok gitye ka nongo mit pa jami ma gimaro, gitye ka kwo kwo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu kesi kodolokisi airujasia kec. Kwape kwana, elukunitos kesi keda luminakec ido eminasi kesi aswam iboro lueminasi kesi, ejarete kesi aijar najokan noi.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, eyi esu asizu eyi ma orobi eyi ra. Sawa 'disi, 'ba leletu 'diyi ma kalasi azini ayiko esuzu e'yo yini leleri ma alia, yi ovu idri onyiru ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, baherize kuhikiiriza ebirooto byabo. Hati, barikwetorwa abakundwa baabo n'okushemererwa, nibatuura omu magara marungi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, effective food distribution is crucial for community support and resilience. It is essential that politicians focus on strategic planning and collaboration rather than directly handling food supplies.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, okugaba obulungi emmere kwa mugaso nnyo eri obuyambi n'obugumu bw'ekitundu. Kya mugaso nnyo bannabyabufuzi okussa essira ku kuteekateeka n'okukolagana mu kifo ky'okukwata butereevu eby'emmere.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, poko cam maber pire tek tutwal pi konyo lwak. Pire tek tutwal ni lucungu iwi bye guket cwiny gi i kom yub ki winye me kaka tic ki cam.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, aikor inyamat ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aigang itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga luka politikis apodokinit aitemonokin ka aiswamanara itia aitemonokin inyamat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, nyaka awaza kililiru ri eri orodriru atita fezu ongulumu eyini. Eri orodriru 'ba politiki ni 'diyi ma 'ba asi otita kililiru 'diyi ma dria azini ti icita ma dria aga e'yo nyaka awaza ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, okugaba eby'okurya kurungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obuhwezi bw'abantu. N'eky'omugasho munonga ab'eby'obutegyeki kuta omutima aha kuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, omu mwanya gw'okukora aha by'okurya.

eng_prompt: Given their extensive experience and deep understanding of the challenges we face, we have decided to include them in our efforts. Their insights will be invaluable in addressing the issues at hand.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bumanyirivu bwabwe obw'amaanyi n'okutegeera kwabwe okw'amaanyi ku kusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo, tusazeewo okubayingiza mu kaweefube waffe. Amagezi gaabwe gajja kuba ga muwendo nnyo mu kukola ku nsonga eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Pi ngec gi madit tutwal ki niang matut I kom peko ma watye kwede, wamoko tam wa me tic kwedgi bene. Ngec gi bibedo ber tutwal I tyeko peko matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kanu amisiarit kec naepol noi keda amisiarit naepol noi naka atiokisio nu itereikina keda oni, apotu sio aseutu aimorikikin kes toma aswam wok. Erai aomisio kec nuepolok noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini ovuzu nita be angiri azini vata be angiri e'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi ma dria risi, ama 'du e'yo yi 'bazu okpo amani 'diyi ma alia indi. Egata yini 'diyi nga ovu orodriru tu e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obuhangu bwabo bwingi n'okwetegyereza oburemeezi obu turikushanga, tushaziremu kubeta omunkora yaitu. Ebiteekateeko byabo nibiija kuba ebyomugasho munonga omu kukora aha nshonga eziriho.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated in the community, the local authorities convened an emergency meeting to address the growing unrest. They quickly realized that immediate action was necessary to prevent further chaos.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu kitundu baayita olukiiko olw'amangu okukola ku butabanguko obweyongera. Baakiraba mangu nti kyali kyetaagisa okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okutangira obuvuyo obulala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I kin lwak, lutela me tedero gulwongo kacoke ma opoto atura me tyeko lweny matye kamede. Guniang oyot-oyot ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot-oyot me gengo kuku mukene.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor atiokisio kotoma atutubet, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet konyarautu airiamunet naka atipet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuapolok. Apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet kanu aitikitik amumu.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi omve mitingi mbeleru e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi esu mbeleru kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru ngiringiri drile ri atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu bantu, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakeeta orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kukora aha butabanguko obweyongyeire. Bakareeba bukiri kare ngu haine ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho okubaasa kuzibira akavuyo akandi.

eng_prompt: After discussing our goals and objectives, we realized the importance of establishing a clear plan. To achieve our desired outcomes, we then tried to make sure things are done in the right way.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biruubirirwa byaffe n'ebigendererwa, twakitegedde obukulu bw'okuteekawo enteekateeka etegeerekeka obulungi. Okusobola okutuuka ku bye twagala, twagezaako okulaba nti ebintu bikolebwa mu ngeri entuufu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok I kom miti wa, waniang ber pa bedo ki yub maber. Me nongo adwogi ma wamito, watemo me neno ni jami weng otime I yoo matir.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem alosikinetekosi, apotu sio awanyutu ajokis naka aitolomun ainapeta nuacaete. Kanu adumun nu ikoto oni, apotu sio atamutu awanyun ebe iswamao iboro koipone kalo abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzezu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu orodri otuta kililiru 'bazu ci. E'yo amani lele 'diyi esuzu, ama o'bi ra kini 'ba e'yo yi 'ye geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura aha bigyendererwa byaitu, tuketegyereza omugasho gw'okukora enteekateeka. Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo byaitu, tukagyezaho kureeba ngu ebintu bikorwa omu muringo oguhikire.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the community, the city council convened to discuss potential solutions for the rising food insecurity. They recognized that immediate action was necessary to support struggling families during the economic downturn.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'ekitundu ebyeyongera, akakiiko k'ekibuga kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ebbula ly'emmere eryeyongera. Baakitegeera nti kyali kyetaagisa okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okuyamba amaka agaali mu buzibu mu kaseera k'eby'enfuna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, kancil me boma madit obedo tye me nywako tam i kom kit me tyeko peko me can cam matye kamede. Gu niang ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot me konyo gangi matye ka canne ikare me poto pa lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, abu ekansulo loka eibuga iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itikitikere ekadakada loka inyamat. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet kanu aigang ikalia luejaasi keda ationis naepol noi kotoma apak naka aibiror naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo ongulumu eyini lele tu 'diyi ma aza kozu, kanisulu aku ambu city niri ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu e'yo nyaka ako ni tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru atita fezu familia e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu sa'wa e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu ebyeyongyeire,akakiiko k'orurembo kakwatanisa kuhanuura aha nshonga y'eibura ry'eby'okurya erikweyongyera. Bakeetegyereza ngu hakaba hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho okuhwera amaka agatarikwebaasa omu bwire bw'okugwa kw'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After several complaints from residents about the rising crime rates, the school board convened an emergency meeting. They decided to form a district task force to address the growing concerns within the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwemulugunya okuva mu batuuze ku bumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera, olukiiko lw'essomero lwayita olukiiko olw'amangu. Baasazeewo okutondawo akakiiko ka disitulikiti akakwasisa amateeka okukola ku nsonga ezigenda zeeyongera mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Inge koko mapol ma aa ki bot lutedero I kom medde pa timo bal, dul madoro gang kwan olwongo kacoke madit tutwal. Gumoko tam gi me yubu dul ma doro lok kom two corona i district pi tyeko peko matye kamedde I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na angurian naepol noi kama ejaasi itunga luka atutubet kanu aiyatakin na abilibilio naka ikisila, apotu lukapolok luka esomero konyarautu airiamunet naka atipet. Apotu kesi koseutu aitolomun atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce ko disitrikt kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu eyatakinos kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu e'yo onzi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, driceza sukulu niri omve mitingi mbeleru ni. Eyi ai drice'ba distrikitia 'diyi e'do e'yo ewaru tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu batuuragye ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire,akakiiko k'eishomero kaketa orukiiko rw'ahonaaho. Bakasharamu kutandikaho akakiiko ka disiturikiti, okukora aha nshonga ezirikweyongyera omu bantu.

eng_prompt: The budget report outlined the necessary allocations for various departments. It was crucial to ensure that all expenses were accounted for, especially since the finances were for service provision.
lug_prompt: Alipoota y'embalirira yalaga ensimbi ezeetaagibwa mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. Kyali kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti ensaasaanya yonna ebalirirwa, naddala okuva ssente bwe zaali ez'okuwa obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Ripot me byek lim ne onyuto wel lim ma mite pi jang gamente mapat-pat. Obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni kitiyo ki cente weng ma mite, tutwale pien cente ne obedo pi miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Abu eripoota loka ebajet itodunit eipone lo ekotoi aijanakin ikapun mama ejaasi atutubena nuegelegela. Arai ibore yenepol noi aanyun ebe itwasamao ikapun kere koipone kalo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: O'duko bajeti niri ece robia fele okalamvu ndundu eyini ri ra. Eri ndra orodriru ndrezu kini 'ba e'da geri 'bani robia ayuzu dria ra, tutuni e'yo 'bani robia 'da ayuzu azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota y'embaririra ekashoboorora empiiha ezirikwetengwa omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. Kikaba kiri eky'omugasho kureeba ngu enshohoza yoona ekorwe, okukira munonga ahabw'okuba esente zikaba ziri ez'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the project's potential impact, we reached a consensus among the team. It was clear that funding was essential to support the initiative and drive meaningful change.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku biyinza okuva mu pulojekiti, twatuuka ku nzikiriziganya mu ttiimu. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti ensimbi zaali zeetaagisa nnyo okuwagira enteekateeka eyo n'okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ey'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom adwoki pa yub eni, wa oo I winye ikin lutic. Onen atyer kamaleng ni lim obedo gin ma pire tek me cwako yub eni ki kelo aloka loka maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos epone loepedoria epurojekt aitodolikin, apotu sio adolokisi acamanara. Acai cut ebe ejokuna noi agangat na ikapun kanu aigang aswamisioit ngin ka ayangaun aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otiza ma vutia e'yo otita 'da ni eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria, ama esu ti ecita amuti 'da ma eselea ra. Eri ndra e'da kililiru kini robia feza eri orodriru atita fezu e'yo nde ma dria azini ojata orodriruni ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebirikubaasa kukorwa purogyekiti, tukahika aha kwikirizana omu tiimu. Kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu esente zikaba ziri ez'omugasho okushagika enteekateeka n'okureetaho empinduka y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: With the budget constraints looming over the project, the team knew they had to make every dollar count. They gathered to discuss their priorities and ensure that the funds would be allocated effectively.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbula ly'embalirira eriwo ku pulojekiti, ttiimu yamanya nti balina okufuula buli ddoola okuba ey'omugaso. Baakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye balina okukulembeza n'okulaba nti ensimbi zisaasaanyizibwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ki peko me byek lim ma obedo tye I kom yub eni, lutic ne guniang ni omyero guwek dola acel-acel obed gin ma pire tek. Gucokke me nywako lok I kom ngo ma omyero gutim me neno ni kitiyo ki lim maber.
teo_prompt: Keda aitikitiketa nuka ebajet kanu epurojekt, ajeni etimu ebe ibusakinit kesi aitwasam idolas kere. Apotu kesi kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ekotosi kesi aswam ka aanyun ebe itwasamao ikapun ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru otita 'da niri ma alea risi, amuti 'da nii ra kini le eyi ma 'ba dola dria eyi orodriru. Eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma dria azini nezu ra kini 'ba nga robia 'da ayu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra aha purogyekiti, tiimu ekamanya ngu buri doora eshemereire kubarwa. Baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo n'okureeba ngu esente zikozesibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: The local sports club has organized an event to foster community spirit. As part of the festivities, there will be a friendly match between the two teams.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'ebyemizannyo mu kitundu etegese omukolo okutumbula omwoyo gw'ekitundu. Ng'ekimu ku bikujjuko, wajja kubaawo omuzannyo ogw'omukwano wakati wa ttiimu ebbiri.
ach_prompt: Dul tuku me tedero guyubu yub me dongo cwiny lwak. Macalo but kwer ne, tuku me larem bibedo tye ikin tim aryo egoni.
teo_prompt: Abu ekilabu loka aboliasio lo okwap itemok epucit kanu aitopolor etau. Kwape ediope kotoma ainumunum, ejai abolia naka epaperone kiding itimun iarei.
lgg_prompt: Amuti avita ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo azi ongulumu eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo otuzu. Omu 'da ma azi ru, abala agyiru ni nga ovu amuti avitani iri 'diyi ma eselea ci.
nyn_prompt: Kiraabu y'eby'emizaano ey'omukyanga etebekaniise omukoro gw'okureetaho emiteekateekyere mirungi omu bantu. Nk'ekicweka ky'okujaguza, nihaza kubaho omuzaano gw'omukago ahagati ya tiimu ibiri.

eng_prompt: Education plays a crucial role in shaping our future, and the dedication of educators is often overlooked. Their commitment to guiding and supporting students is invaluable and deserves recognition.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola omulimu munene mu kukola ebiseera byaffe eby'omu maaso, era obumalirivu bw'abasomesa butera okubuusibwa amaaso. Obumalirivu bwabwe mu kulambika n'okuyamba abayizi bwa muwendo nnyo era basaana okusiimibwa.
ach_prompt: Kwan obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yubu kwo wa I kare me anyim, dok keto cwiny pa lupwonye ipol kare ki cayo woko. Keto cwiny gi me pwonyo ki konyo lutino kwan pire tek tutwal dok omyero ki pwo gi.
teo_prompt: Erai aisisia ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomun ingaren wok, konye mam epalunit aswam naka esisianakinak. Alosikinet kec naka aicor ka aigang esisiak erai naepol noi ido ekot aisiyalamikin.
lgg_prompt: Onita ni azi okporu nga ewu ama vile drialeri ma e'dota ma alia, dika 'ba e'yo asi feza imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ku. Eyi ma ava sukulu anzi eyini imbata fezu azini atita fezu ri eri orodriru saaru dika le eyi ma esu awa'difo ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura ebiro byaitu by'omumaisho, kandi okwehayo kw'abeegyesa nikukira kurekyererwa. Okwehayo kwabo omu kuhabura n'okuhwera abeegi n'okw'omuhendo kandi kushemereire kusiimwa.

eng_prompt: In every lesson, we are inspired by the passion and dedication of our educators. Their innovative approaches make learning engaging and enjoyable for all of us.
lug_prompt: Mu buli ssomo, tukubirizibwa obwagazi n'okwewaayo kw'abasomesa baffe. Enkola zaabwe ez'obuyiiya zireetera ffenna okunyumirwa okusoma.
ach_prompt: I pwonye weng, wanongo cuku cwiny ki miti pa lupwonye wa. Diro gi me diro weko kwan bedo mit tutwal pi wan weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisisiaet kere, isinyikokit sio noi kanu amina keda ainakina naka esisianakinak wok. Epone loitetet loiswamaete kesi einakinit oni kere aiyalama noi kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Embata dria ma alia, ama ava esu ava engazu ava azini asi feza emba'ba ama vile 'diyi vu. Geri eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu o'diru 'diyi fe onita ni aa'zu ndrizaru azini ayiko fezu ama dria ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu buri mwegyese, nitwegyesibwa rukundo n'okwehayo kw'abeegyesa baitu. Enkora yaabo ey'okujumbura neetureetera okushoma okushemeza kandi okushemeza itwe twena.

eng_prompt: Investing in the future of our nation is crucial for sustainable growth and development. One of the most effective ways to achieve this is by prioritizing funding for education.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu biseera by'eggwanga lyaffe eby'omu maaso kikulu nnyo mu kukulaakulana okw'olubeerera n'enkulaakulana. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukulembeza obuvujjirizi mu by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I kom anyim pa lobowa pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo matye anyim. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man obedo keto lim I gangi kwan obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma oingaren naka akwapuwok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda apol. Ediopet koboro luepedorete aitodolikin ngun ngesi aisingarenit ainanakin ikapun mama ejaasi asioman.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza kari amavileri ma ewu drialeri ma alea ri eri orodriru zota azini angu ezoma ni. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri geri 'bani robia fezu onita dri ri 'duzu okporu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omubiro bya nyensya by'eihanga ryaitu, n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'entunguuka. Omwe aha mihanda mirungi y'okukora eki n'okwebembeza eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Throughout my years in school, I have encountered many educators, but none have left as lasting an impression on me. Her passion for teaching and genuine care for her students set her apart from the rest.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gyange gyonna mu ssomero, nsisinkanye abasomesa bangi, naye tewali n'omu yandekawo ekifaananyi eky'olubeerera ku nze. Okwagala kwe eri okusomesa n'okufaayo kwe okwa nnamaddala eri abayizi be byamufuula ow'enjawulo ku balala.
ach_prompt: I kare weng ma abedo I cukul, arwatte ki lupwonye mapol, ento pe tye acel ma oweko tam ma rii I koma. Mar ma en tye kwede pi pwony ki paro pi lutino ne oweko en obedo pat ki lutino mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okaruka kere kosomero, eriamuna eong keda esisianakinak luipu, konye emamei idiopedori ajalakin eong aomisioit naepol noi. Amina ke naka aisisianakin keda apodokinitike mama ejaasi esisiak abu ijaik ngesi egitakina kanejaas luce.
lgg_prompt: Eli mani ovuzu sukulua 'diyi ma alia dria, ma fu dri emba'ba karakara yi be, te 'ba azini ku ma dria e'yo azi ewu drile 'dini ni ku ni ku. Leta erini imbata ma dria tualu asi ndriza erini sukulu anzi erini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi fe erini aa'zu ndu 'ba azi 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka yangye yoona y'eishomero,ntungire abeegyesa baingi, kwonka tihaine n'omwe owasigaireho ekiteekateeko ky'obuhangazi ahariinye. Rukundo ye y'okwegyesa hamwe n'okureeberera abeegi be kikamuhindura ow'omutaano aha bandi.
