eng_prompt: As the school prepared for the annual Teachers' Day celebration, the principal gathered the staff to remind them of the profound impact they have on their students' lives. He emphasized the importance of building strong, caring relationships in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Ng'essomero lyetegekera okukuza olunaku lw'abasomesa olutegekebwa buli mwaka, omukulu w'essomero yakunga abakozi okujjukiza engeri gye bakwatamu obulamu bw'abayizi baabwe. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuzimba enkolagana ey'amaanyi era efaayo mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gang kwan tye ka yubbe pi kwero nino pa lupwonye mwaka ki mwaka, ladit gang kwan olwongo lutic me poyo wigi I kom adwogi maber ma gitye kwede I kom kwo pa lutino kwan. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki wat matek I kin lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Neautar esomero aitemonokin kanuka ainumunum aparan naka isisianakinak, abu apolon esomero kitukok eswamak aiitun kes epone loepedoriata kesi aijar naka esisiak. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aiduk eidicane loajokan keda loeminasi itunga kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu ni otuta 'yeria o'du imba'ba eyini 'diyi inzizu eli vusi, dricere tra azi'ba eyi egazu eyini orodri eyini esu sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma edri ma dria ri ma dria. Eri fe okpo orodri aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea okporu, asi ndriza be 'diyi sizu kilasia ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero ku ryabaire niriteekateekyera omukoro gw'okujaguza eizooba ry'abegyesa buri mwaka, mukuru w'eishomero akarundaana abakozi kwijusya emigasho ei baine aha magara g'abeegi baabo. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okwombeka enkoragana nungi omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: In recognition of their hard work and creativity, the school administration decided to implement a new incentive program. This initiative aimed to encourage and celebrate innovative teaching practices among the faculty.
lug_prompt: Mu kusiima emirimu gyabwe egy'obunyiikivu n'obuyiiya, abakulembeze b'essomero baasalawo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka empya ey'okusikiriza. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukubiriza n'okujaguza enkola z'okusomesa ez'obuyiiya mu basomesa.
ach_prompt: Ki pwoc pi tic matek ki diro gi, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tam gi me keto yub manyen me cuku cwiny gi itic. Yub man obedo ki miti me cuku cwiny ki pwonyo diro manyen ikin lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiyalamikin aswam kec keda acoa, abu eyaitene lo esomero itolomu ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aisinyikokit ka ainumunum iponesio luitetiak luka aisisianakin kotoma esomero.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini okporu azini ondua yini 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, driceza sukulu niri asi e'yo 'du otita ava feza ni o'diru ni 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu ava fezu azini ayiko zozu geri onita ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria imba'ba eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okusiima okukora kwabo n'obwengye bwabo, abeebembezi b'eishomero bakasharamu kutaho enteekateeka ensya y'okushemeza abaana. Enteekateeka egi ekaba negyenderera okushagika n'okujaguza enkora nungi y'okwegyesa omu bashaho.

eng_prompt: Teachers were reminded of the importance of fostering an engaging learning environment. To achieve this, they were provided with strategies to motivate their students.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bajjukiziddwa obukulu bw'okutumbula embeera y'okusomeramu enyuma. Okutuukiriza kino, baaweebwa obukodyo bw'okuzzaamu abayizi baabwe amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ki poyo wi lupwonye i kom ber pa bedo ki kabedo me kwan ma yomo cwiny dano. Me cobo man, kimiinigi yoo me cuku cwiny lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Aponi isiitikinai isisianakinak ajokis naka aitopoloria aiboisio nu isisiaete. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, aponi ijaikinai kesi iwaitin lu isinyikokinet esisiak kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ega imba'ba eyini orodri onita 'ba eyini ayiko fezu ri ma omgbo ma dria ra. E'yo 'di 'yezu, 'ba fe eyini geri eyini ecozu eyi ma sukulu anzi eyini ava fezu ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa bakaijusibwa omugasho gw'okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Okuhikiiriza eki, bakaheebwa oburyo bw'okugaruramu abeegi baabo amaani.

eng_prompt: Excited to embrace the spirit of the event, she eagerly joined her friends at the park. The sun was shining, and the atmosphere was filled with laughter and friendly competition.
lug_prompt: Nga musanyufu nnyo olw'omwoyo gw'omukolo, yeegatta ku mikwano gye mu ppaaka. Omusana gwali gwaka, era embeera yali ejjudde enseko n'okuvuganya okw'omukwano.
ach_prompt: Ki yomcwiny madit tutwal me jolo cwiny me yub eni, en oribe ki lureme I park. Ceng obedo ka ryeny, dano gubedo ka nyero ki pyem I kingi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyalama noi kanu aitodolikin eipud loka epucit, abu ngesi kimorikikin keda ipaperoke kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang. Acai akolong noi, apotu akwap kilelebunos keda akwena keda abolobol naka epaperone.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko fu erini muzu omu 'da ma alea risi, eri fi i ma agyipi yi be angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia avasi. Etuka ri ri ve, angu nderi ga ogu azini baka seza agyiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushemererwa ahabw'okwikiriza omutima gw'omukoro, akeegaita ahari banywani be aha paaka. Omushana gukaba nigwaka, kandi embeera ekaba eijwire okusheka n'empaka z'omukago.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the pervasive challenges faced by women in her community, she dedicated her life to advocacy and education. Through workshops and mentorship programs, she inspired a new generation to stand up for their rights.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukimanya nti waliwo okusoomoozebwa okungi abakyala kwe basanga mu kitundu kyabwe, yawaayo obulamu bwe mu kulwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu n'ebyenjigiriza. Ng'ayita mu misomo n'enteekateeka z'okubuulirira, yakubiriza omulembe omupya okulwanirira eddembe lyabwe.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko mapol ma mon nongo I kabedo gi, en odyero kwone me miyo kony ki pwony. Kun tiyo ki kacoke me pwonye ki yub me pwonyo lutino, en ocuku cwiny lutino me cung pi twero gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuipu nuetereikina keda angor kotoma atutubeteke, abu ngesi koinak aijarake kanu aisisianakin keda aisisianakin. Kotoma airiamunun keda ainapeta nuka aisisianakin, abu ngesi isinyikok ateker naitetet aibwo kanu apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru oku eyini esu angu erini aa'zu ri ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, eri owi i ma edri e'yo a'di 'dizu azini onita ma dria. Trayi otita imbatani azini imbata ni 'diyisi, eri fe ava 'ba o'diru 'diyi dri pa sozu drilemgbo yini 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bwingi obu abakazi barikurabamu omukyanga kye, akaheereza amagara gye omu kurwanirira oburingaaniza n'obwegyese. Kurabira omu mishomo hamwe na puroguraamu z'okuhabura, akahiga abantu abasya kurwanirira obugabe bwabo.

eng_prompt: In a groundbreaking competition, the girls showcased their skills and determination, challenging the stereotypes that often limited their potential. With unwavering confidence, they set out to demonstrate their capabilities on equal footing with their male counterparts.
lug_prompt: Mu kuvuganya okwaliwo, abawala baayolesa obukugu bwabwe n'obumalirivu, nga bawakanya endowooza enkyamu ezaali zikugira obusobozi bwabwe. N'obwesige obutasalako, baatandika okulaga obusobozi bwabwe ku mutendera ogwenkanankana ne bannaabwe abasajja.
ach_prompt: I pyem ma okelo aloka-loka, anyira gunyuto diro gi kacel ki tek cwiny gi, kun gikwero tam macon ma pol kare gengo kero gi. Ki tek cwiny madit tutwal, gucako nyutu kero gi I rwom marom ki luwotgi ma coo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naetegelikina, apotu apesur itodutu acoasineikec keda amunokina kec, ainingosit aomisio nuepedorete aitikitik apedor kec. Keda amunokina naepol noi, apotu kesi kogeutu aitodun apedorosiokec kwape ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: A'bala o'diru ni ma alia, ezoanzi 'da eyi e'da ondua eyini 'diyi tualu asi 'baza eyini 'diyi pie, eyini ani e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma okpo atripi 'diyi atrizu. Asi'baza kokoru si, eyi e'do eyi ma okpo e'da trotro eyi ma agyipika agupi ru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpaka z'okutandikaho, abaishiki boorekire emyoga yaabo hamwe n'amaani gaabo, barikuhakanisa ebiteekateeko ebyabaire nibibaremesa. Baine obwesigye, bakatandika kworeka obushoboorozi bwabo nk'abashaija.

eng_prompt: After months of struggling to meet deadlines and facing numerous setbacks, he began to reflect on his journey. It dawned on him that the effort he put in was shaping not only his skills but also his character.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'alwana okutuukiriza ebisale era ng'ayolekaganye n'ebizibu bingi, yatandika okulowooza ku lugendo lwe. Yakitegeera nti okufuba kwe yateekamu tekwali kukyusa bukugu bwe bwokka wabula n'enneeyisa ye.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me tute matek me cobo miti ne ki nongo peko mapol, en ocako tam I kom wot mege. En oniang ni tute ma en oketo pe tye ka yubu dirone keken ento bene kite.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ainingosit kanu aitodolikin apaarasia nuka awasia keda atiokisio nuipu, abu ngesi kogeu aomoom nuikamunitos alosit ke. Abu ngesi kojen ebe aswam naepedori ngesi aswam mam epedori aitodolikin acoa ke bon konye epedori aitodolikin iponesioke.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini dri ciria o'du asizuri ma ta mbazu azini e'yo ewaru karakara isuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri e'do e'yo ega aci erini 'diyi ma dria. Eca eri ma dria kini okpo erini 'ba ri ni lu ondua erini 'diyi si ku te adriza erini 'diyi si indi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana kuhikiiriza ebiro by'ahamuheru hamwe n'oburemeezi bwingi, akatandika kuteekateeka aha rugyendo rwe. Kikamureetera kumanya ngu amaani agu yateiremu gakaba gatarikubumba emyoga ye yonka, kureka n'emitwarize ye.

eng_prompt: In the realm of education, the role of a teacher extends beyond mere instruction; it involves shaping the future of young minds. This raises an important question about the balance between encouragement and pressure in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enjigiriza, omulimu gw'omusomesa gusukka ku kuyigiriza kwokka; guzingiramu okubumba ebiseera by'abaana abato eby'omu maaso. Kino kireetawo ekibuuzo ekikulu ku bwenkanya wakati w'okukubirizibwa n'okunyigirizibwa mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: I tenge me pwony, tic pa lapwony pe obedo me pwonyo lutino keken; man kwako yubu anyim pa lutino. Man kelo lapeny mapire tek tutwal I kom rwate ikin cuku cwiny ki lyeto I ot kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisisia, aswam naka esisianakinak mam erai aisisianakin bon; imoriarit aitolomun ingaren naka idwe. Eyangauni ngin aingiset naepol noi naikamunit eidicane loejai kiding aisinyikokinit keda aiyalongongo kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: Angu onitaniri ma alia, azi emba'ba ni ri aga lu imbata fezu ri ra; eri ma alia e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ma egata ewu drialeri sizu ri indi. E'yo 'di fe zita azi orodriru ni efu e'yo 'bani ava fezu azini okpo fezu 'diyi ma eselea kilasia ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese,omurimo gw'abegyesa nigukira aha kwegyesa kwonka, nigutwariramu n'okutendeka eminyeeto omu biro by'omumaisho. Eki nikireetaho ekibuuzo ky'omugasho ekirikukwata aha buringaniza ahagati y'okugarurwamu amaani hamwe n'oburemeezi omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: Throughout our years in school, we encountered many educators, but none left a lasting impact like him. His dedication to our learning and personal growth made him an invaluable part of our lives.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gyaffe gyonna mu ssomero, twasisinkana abasomesa bangi, naye tewali n'omu yalekawo buzibu bwa nkalakalira nga ye. Okwewaayo kwe eri okusoma kwaffe n'okukulaakulana kw'omuntu kyamufuula ow'omuwendo ennyo mu bulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare weng ma wabedo I cukul, warwatte ki lupwonye mapol, ento pe tye lapwony mo ma okelo adwogi maber tutwal calo en. Keto cwinye I kom kwan wa ki dongo pa dano oweko en obedo ngat ma pire tek tutwal I kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Apakio nukosi kere nuka esomero, apotu sio adumutu isisianakinak luipu, konye emamei idiopedori aswam ngun. Apodokinit ke naka aisisia kosi keda apol abu ijaik ngesi naejok noi kotoma aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: Eli dria amani aa'zu sukulua 'diyi ma alea, ama fu dri imba'ba karakara eyi be, te 'ba azi ku e'yo aa'pi ewule 'diyi ma alea sa'wa ezu ekile eri le ni. Asi feza erini ama vile onita ma dria azini zota ama ma ngulupiniri ma dria ri fe erini ovuzu 'ba orodriruni idri ama vile 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka yoona ei twamazire omu ishomero, tukabugana abeegyesa baingi, kwonka tihaine owabaire naakora kihango nka we. Okwehayo kwe aha kwega kwaitu n'okutunguuka kwe kikamureetera kuba owomugasho omu magara gaitu.

eng_prompt: As she navigated through various challenges in her studies, she realized the importance of a strong foundation in mathematics. Embracing this subject would not only enhance her problem-solving skills but also prepare her for future academic pursuits.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayita mu kusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo mu kusoma kwe, yakitegeera obukulu bw'omusingi omunywevu mu kubala. Okwettanira essomo lino tekikoma ku kutumbula bukugu bwe mu kugonjoola bizibu naye era kimwetegekera okusoma mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma obedo ka kato ki I peko mapol I kwan mege, en oniang ber pa bedo ki guti matek I cura. Cako kwano pwony man pe bimedo diro mege me tyeko peko keken ento bene yube pi kwan i kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi aitodolikin atiokisio nuipu kotoma asiomanike, abu ngesi kojen ajokis naka aisisia aimar ejok. Aswam akiro nu mam epedori aitojokar acoa ke naka aitemokin atiokisio konye epedori aitemonokin ngesi kanuka asioman naka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Erini acizu e'yo ewaru eri vile onitaniri ma aliarisi, eri esu orodri e'yo namba ni okporu 'diyiniri ra. E'yo onitani 'diri 'duzuri ngani lu eri ma ondua e'yo otuzuri otu ku te eri otu vini e'yo onitani ewu drialeri ma alia 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ku yaatamburiire omu buremeezi bwingi omu mishomo ye, akeetegyereza omugasho gw'omusingye murungi omu kubara. Okwenda kwega eshomero eri, tikirikwija kumuhwera kushoboorora oburemeezi, kureka nikimweteekateekyera n'eby'obwegyese omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve educational outcomes, the government announced a new initiative aimed at supporting students across the country. As part of this initiative, they allocated significant resources to enhance the learning environment in schools.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenjigiriza, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okuyamba abayizi okwetooloola eggwanga. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, baateekawo ensimbi nnyingi okutumbula embeera y'okusoma mu masomero.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan, gamente okati ki yub manyen me konyo lutino kwan I but lobo man mapat-pat. Macalo but yub man, guketo lim mapol me ilo malo rwom me kwan i gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae lo asioman, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigang esisiak kakwap wok kere. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu kesi ibwaikisi iboro luipu kanu aitojokar ejautene loka aisisia kosomeroi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu agata onitani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'dini lezu sukulu anzi kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi atizu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eyi 'ba robia angiri e'yo onita ni sukulu eyi ma alea ri otuzu.

eng_prompt: The school administration has finalized the list of candidates for the upcoming program. Notifications have been sent out, and now it's time for everyone to prepare for the orientation.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'essomero bamalirizza olukalala lw'abayizi mu pulogulaamu ejja. Okumanyisibwa kuweerezeddwa, era kati kye kiseera buli omu okwetegekera okulambikibwa.
ach_prompt: Lutela me gang kwan gutyeko coyo nying lutino kwan ma gimito donyo I program matye kabino ni. Kicwalo ngec bot lwak, dok kombedi obedo kare pa dano weng me yubbe pi pwony.
teo_prompt: Adau eyaitene lo esomero angetakin ikiroria luka esisiak lu ebeit alomar toma ainapeta nu ebunit. Aponi ijukarai aicoreta, ido kwana erai apak na nginitunganan aitemonokin kanu aisisianakino.
lgg_prompt: Driceza sukulu niri de ru sukulu anzi sukulu lapi sukulu'a 'diyi ma ru oti otita emupi 'diyi ma alea 'bo. Ba efe o'dukoti 'ba eyidri 'bo, dika sa'wa ca 'ba dria eyini eyi otuzu imbata eyini.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant shift in societal attitudes towards female athletes. As a result, more opportunities and support for women in sports have emerged.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu ndowooza y'abantu ku bannabyamizannyo abakyala. N'ekivuddemu, emikisa mingi n'obuyambi eri abakyala mu byemizannyo bivuddeyo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I kit ma lwak neno kwede lutuko ma mon. Macalo adwogi ne, gum ki kony mapol tye pi mon I tuku.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma aomisio nuka itunga mama ejaasi akerak nungor. Kanuka ngun, apolor arerengesio keda agangat na angor kotoma aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia, ojata amboru ebi ovu 'yeta ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea 'ba ongu onzu'ba okuru 'diyi ma dria ci. E'yo 'disi, drileba azini atita angiri oku eyini avita eyi ma alea 'diyi efu 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, habaireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu miteekateekyere y'abakazi omu by'emizaano. N'ekyarugiremu, emigisha mingi n'obuhwezi bwingi aha bakazi omu by'emizaano byeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: As summer vacation came to an end, parents began preparing their children for the new school year. Excitement filled the air as families gathered school supplies and discussed their plans for the upcoming term.
lug_prompt: Nga oluwummula lw'omusana lukoma, abazadde baatandika okuteekerateekera abaana baabwe omwaka gw'essomero omupya. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga ng'amaka gakung'aanya ebikozesebwa mu masomero ne bateesa ku nteekateeka zaago ez'olusoma olujja.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yweyo otum, lunyodo gucako yubu lutino gi pi mwaka me kwan manyen. Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma gangi gujogo jami me tic ki lutino kwan me nywako lok I kom yub gi pi tem mabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana angetakinor aiyeng, apotu auriak kogeutu aitemonokin idwekec kanuka ekaru loitetet loka esomero. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos ne atukokinor ikalia iboro lu esomero kosodete aitemitem nu aitemonokinete kesi kanuka atamu na ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Lifu driasiri ni i deria, tipika eyi e'do eyi ma anzi eyi otu eli o'diru sukulu niri ni. Ayiko fu angu ma alea familia eyini afa sukulu ni 'diyi trazu tualu agbatara gbazu otita eyini 'diyi ma dria tamu emupi ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'ekihuumuro bwanyima, abazaire bakatandika kuteekateekyera abaana baabo omwaka gw'eishomero omutsya. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'amaka kurundaana eby'okukoresa omu mashomero, reero bagaaniira aha nteekateeka zaabo ez'eitaamu erikwija.

eng_prompt: Recognizing and nurturing a child's unique abilities early on can set the foundation for their future success. Encouraging their interests and skills can lead to greater confidence and achievement as they grow.
lug_prompt: Okuzuula n'okukuza obusobozi bw'omwana nga bukyali kisobola okuteekawo omusingi gw'obuwanguzi bwe mu biseera by'omu maaso. Okukubiriza ebyetaago byabwe n'obukugu biyinza okubaleetera okwekkiririzaamu n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi nga bakula.
ach_prompt: Niang ki dongo kero pa lutino con twero yubu guti me cobo miti gi ikare me anyim. Cuku cwiny lutino i kom jami ma gimaro ki diro gi twero weko gibedo ki tek cwiny kacel ki cobo miti gi ikare ma gitye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Ajenun ka aitopoloun apedorosio nuka idwe sek epedori aitolomun atukot naka akerianut koingaren. Aisinyikokinit kesi aswam iboro luepedorete kesi aswam ka aitodolikin iboro luepedorete kesi aswam kapak kana epolounete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndreza azini ezoanzi eyi ma okpo 'bazu drioru ri eco fe eyini drile suza ewu drialeri ma alea ra. E'yo ava fezu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria azini ondua eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ni fe eyini aa'zu asi'baza be azini eyini agata esuzu eyini zoria.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza n'okureeberera emyoga y'omwana bukiri kare, nikibaasa kutaho omusingye gw'obusinguzi omu biro by'omumaisho. Okugumya ebyetengo byabo n'emyoga yaabo, nikibaasa kubareetera kweyikiririzamu n'okukora kurungi baaba nibakura.

eng_prompt: As a parent, it's important to set a positive example for the children. Maintaining composure in challenging situations can help teach them valuable lessons about emotional regulation.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuzadde, kikulu okuteerawo abaana bo ekyokulabirako ekirungi. Okukuuma obukkakkamu mu mbeera ezisoomooza kisobola okuyamba okubayigiriza eby'omugaso ku ngeri y'okukwatamu enneewulira.
ach_prompt: Macalo lanyodo, pire tek tutwal me nyutu lanen maber bot lutinoni. Bedo mot ikare me peko twero pwonyo lutino kit me doro kit ma giwinyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape aurian, ejokuna aitodun awanyunet najokan nejaas idwe. Ajaut keda ainapakina kotoma ojautene loetiono epedori aisisianakin kes aisisiaeta nuepolok nuikamunitos aomisio.

nyn_prompt: Nk'omuzaire, n'eky'omugasho kuba eky'okureeberaho kirungi aha baana baawe. Okugumizamu n'obucureera omu mbeera ezigumire nikibaasa kubahwera kwega eby'omugasho ebirikukwata aha nyehurira zaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster a positive learning environment, the administration implemented new strategies to strengthen the bond between educators and students. One of these strategies emphasized the importance of building rapport through humor and shared experiences.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusoma, abakulembeze baateekawo enkola empya okunyweza enkolagana wakati w'abasomesa n'abayizi. Emu ku nkola zino yakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okuzimba enkolagana okuyita mu kusesa n'okugabana bye tuyiseemu.

teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor aiboisit najokan naka aisisia, abu eyaitene kitolom iwaitin luitetiak kanu aitogogong eidicane loejai kiding isisianakinak keda esisiak. lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu onita ni kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, driceza 'da 'ba geri o'diru eyi ti ecita imba'ba eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi alu 'diyi 'ba okpo orodri aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma sita ma dria geri ayiko fezu azini e'yo ndundu eyini esu 'diyi awazu 'diyisi.

teo_prompt: Auriak luipu lu epotiete ekotosi aijen nuikamunitos apedorosio nuka ngul lu ingarakinete aidoun. Aingiset adiope naetapit itunga aingitingit ngesi arai ibusakinit angor nu esidook ajaut keda asioman naka anasin.

eng_prompt: After struggling to cover the costs of my education, my family decided to explore financial options. They found that local banks offered loans specifically designed for school fees.

teo_prompt: Akaulo na ainingosit kanu aitac ikapun luka esomeroka, apotu lukokaleka koseutu aingic ewai lo ikapun. Apotu kesi odumutu ebe einanakinete aingadisia nuka ikapun ilonin kanu aitac isirigin lu esomero.

eng_prompt: Throughout my hospital stay, I encountered many healthcare professionals, but one stood out among the rest. Her compassion and dedication made a significant difference in my recovery.

eng_prompt: Recent assessments have highlighted several gaps in the current healthcare system. To address these issues, stakeholders are advocating for strategic reforms.

nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugire omu bigyezo omu mwaka gw'eby'obwegyese oguhwaire, abakyondoozi bakagyezaho kwetegyereza entaaniso omu bigyezo by'abashaija n'abakazi. eng_prompt: In order to maintain a positive credit history, the financial advisor emphasized the importance of responsible borrowing. Participants were reminded of the benefits of staying on top of their financial obligations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma ebyafaayo by'ebbanja ebirungi, omuwabuzi w'ebyensimbi yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwewola mu ngeri ey'obuvunaanyizibwa. Abeetabamu bajjukiziddwa emigaso gy'okusigala ku ntikko y'obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'ensimbi.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a supportive learning environment, educators must carefully assess the diverse abilities of their students. This understanding will enable them to tailor their teaching strategies effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma embeera y'okusoma ennungi, abasomesa balina okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza obusobozi bw'abayizi baabwe obw'enjawulo. Okutegeera kuno kujja kubasobozesa okukyusakyusa enkola zaabwe ez'okusomesa obulungi.

lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita ni atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu, le imba'ba eyi ma one okpo sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma dria. Vata 'di ni nga eyi ma aza ko geri eyini imbazu 'diyi otuzu kililiru.

eng_prompt: A supportive atmosphere fosters creativity and encourages students to engage actively in their learning. When schools prioritize tranquility and respect, they create a foundation for effective education.

ach_prompt: Kwo maber weko lutino bedo ki ngec manyen dok cuku cwiny gi me kwan. Ka gangi kwan guketo cwinygi I kom kuc ki woro, ci giyubu guti me kwan maber.
teo_prompt: Ejautene lo igangit isisianakini acoa ka aisinyikokit esisiak ajaut toma aisisia kec. Arai isingarenete isomeroi ainapakina keda ayongit, itolomunete kesi atukot naka asioman naejok.
lgg_prompt: Angu atita fepi ri ni e'yo onduaru 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eri sukulu anzi eyini ava fe eyini fizu onita eyivile ri ma alea okporu. Sukulu ka e'yo asianzuru azini inzita niri 'ba okporu, eyi e'do onita muke ri ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'obuhwezi neeyongyera amaani omu kwega kw'abeegi n'okubahiga kwejumba omu mishomo yaabo. Amashomero ku garikutwara obusingye n'ekitiinisa nka bikuru, nigatandikaho omusingye gw'okwegyesa kurungi.

eng_prompt: Every student deserves an equal opportunity to succeed, regardless of their academic abilities. It is essential to foster an inclusive environment that supports all learners.
lug_prompt: Buli muyizi agwanidde omukisa ogwenkanankana okutuuka ku buwanguzi, awatali kufaayo ku busobozi bwe mu byensoma. Kya mugaso okukulaakulanya embeera erimu abantu bonna ewagira abayizi bonna.

lgg_prompt: Le sukulu mva dria eyi ma esu drileba trotro eyi ma agata esuzu, eyini ta tro aa'zu sukulu'a ra ti. Eri orodriru angu 'ba dria ni atita fepi sukulu anzi dria eyini ri ezozu.

eng_prompt: The issue of child marriage has sparked intense debate in many societies. Advocates for children's rights argue that such practices violate fundamental human rights and personal freedoms.
lug_prompt: Ensonga y'okufumbirwa kw'abaana abato ereeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bitundu bingi. Abalwanirira eddembe ly'abaana bagamba nti ebikolwa ng'ebyo bityoboola eddembe ly'obuntu n'eddembe ly'obuntu.

nyn_prompt: Enshonga y'okushwera abaana bato, ereesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu bantu baingi. Abarwanirizi b'obugabe bw'abaana nibagira ngu ebikorwa nk'ebyo nibiteganisa obugabe bw'abantu n'obugabe bwabo.

eng_prompt: Many communities are grappling with rising rates of violence among youth. Implementing educational programs that focus on conflict resolution and emotional intelligence may offer a promising solution.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi birwanagana n'obutabanguko obweyongera mu bavubuka. Okuteeka mu nkola pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza ezissa essira ku kugonjoola obukuubagano n'amagezi g'ebirowoozo kiyinza okuwa eky'okugonjoola ekisuubiza.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol tye ka lweny ki tim gero matye kamede I kin bulu. Keto yub me pwony I tic ma keto cwiny I kom tyeko kuku kuku ki niang kit ma dano winyo kwede twero kelo adwogi maber tutwal.

lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tupi 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri be. Otita onita ni 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma aza kozu azini ondua e'yo egazu 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eco e'yo nde ma aza ko ra.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the well-being of future generations is a fundamental responsibility of society. It is essential to recognize that every child deserves access to essential resources for their development.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bw'omulembe ogujja buvunaanyizibwa bukulu mu kitundu. Kya mugaso okutegeera nti buli mwana agwanidde okufuna ebintu ebikulu mu nkulaakulana ye.

lug_prompt: Buli mwana agwanidde omukisa ogwenkanankana okuyiga n'okukula mu mbeera eyamba. Kya mugaso nnyo okussaawo obumu n'okussa ekitiibwa mu bayizi bonna, awatali kufaayo ku nsibuko yaabwe.

eng_prompt: Creating a safe learning environment is a shared responsibility that requires collaboration and commitment from the entire community. By working together, we can ensure that our schools are secure and supportive for every student.

eng_prompt: Educators are constantly challenged to adapt their teaching methods. To ensure all students succeed, it is essential to address their diverse learning styles and requirements.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa buli kaseera basomoozebwa okukyusa enkola zaabwe ez'okusomesa. Okukakasa nti abayizi bonna batuuka ku buwanguzi, kyetaagisa okukola ku ngeri zaabwe ez'okusoma n'ebyetaago byabwe eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye ipol kare gi nongo peko me loko yoo me pwony gi. Me neno ni lutino kwan weng gutimo maber, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma lutino kwan gi kwano kwede ki jami ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc aisinyikokin isisianakinak aijulakin iwaitin lu isisianakinete kesi. Kanu awanyun ebe epedorete esisiak kere akerianar, ejokuna aitodolikin iwaitin lu aisisia kec luegelegela keda iboro lu ekotos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba imba'ba eyi e'yo esu sa'wa driasi geri eyini imbazu 'diyi ojazu. Sukulu anzi dria eyini agata esuzu, eri orodriru geri eyini onita onizu ndundu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa buriijo nibashabwa kuhindura emihanda yaabo y'okwegyesa. Okureeba ngu abeegi boona basingura, n'eky'omugasho okukora aha mitwarize yaabo y'okwega etarikushushana hamwe n'ebibarikwetenga.

eng_prompt: It is essential for every member of the community to take an active role in ensuring the safety and well-being of children. By fostering a supportive environment, we can collectively address the challenges that threaten their protection.
lug_prompt: Kikulu nnyo buli muntu mu kitundu okwenyigira mu kukuuma n'okukuuma obulungi bw'abaana. Bwe tukuza embeera ebawagira, tusobola okukolera awamu okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okuteeka obukuumi bwabwe mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ni dano weng ma ikabedo omyero gutim tic gi me gwoko lutino. Ka wadongo kabedo maber, watwero tic kacel me lweny i kom peko matye katuru gwokgi.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi kanginitunganan kotoma atutubet ajaut keda aswam naepol noi kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara idwe. Kowai lo aitopolor aiboisit na igangit, ipedori oni kere aitemokin atiokisio nu iticanete ayuwara kec.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'ba dria ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyini azi ngazu okporu nezu ra kini anzi nyiri eyi ma agei tema azini aa'ta muke ri ma alea. Angu atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuza si, ama eco e'yo ewaru eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma aza ko tualu ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho buri muntu omu kyanga kwejumba omu kurinda n'okureeberera gye abaana. Kurabira omukureetaho embeera erikushagika, nitubaasa kukorera hamwe okurwanisa oburemeezi oburikuteganisa eby'okwerinda kwabo.

eng_prompt: As the season progressed, the players faced numerous challenges and setbacks. With each practice, the coaches implemented new strategies to enhance the team's performance.
lug_prompt: Sizoni bwe yagenda mu maaso, abazannyi baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa n'ebizibu bingi. Buli lwe baabadde beegezaamu, abatendesi baateeka mu nkola obukodyo obupya okutumbula omutindo gwa ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma pyem tuku tye ka wot anyim, lutuku onongo peko ki peko mapol. I kare me pwonye acel-acel, lupwonye gutiyo ki yoo manyen me medo rwom me tic pa tim.
teo_prompt: Neautar abolobol ngin alosit, apotu aboliak odumutu atiokisio keda atiokisio nuipu. Kangolitosi aitetemonor, apotu ikoosin itolomutu iwaitin luitetiak kanu aitojokar eswamae loka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ni muzu drile, 'ba avitani 'diyi fu dri e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi be tre. Yeta alu alu vusi, imba'ba avita ni 'diyi 'ba geri o'diru 'diyi amuti avita ni 'diyi ma agata otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Sizoni kuyagyendeire omu maisho, abazaani bakashanga oburemeezi n'oburemeezi bwingi. Bwanyima y'okwegyezamu, abatendeki bakataho oburyo busya bw'okwongyera aha kukora kwa tiimu.

eng_prompt: Completing any significant project requires more than just initial enthusiasm. Without dedication and perseverance, even the simplest tasks can become overwhelming.
lug_prompt: Okumaliriza pulojekiti yonna ey'omugaso kyetaagisa ekisingawo ku kuba n'obunyiikivu obusookerwako. Awatali kwewaayo n'okugumiikiriza, n'emirimu egisinga obutono giyinza okufuuka egy'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Tyeko tic mo keken ma pire tek mito jami mapol mapat ki mit kom me acaki keken. Labongo keto cwiny ki diyo cwiny, tic matino tino twero doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin epurojekt lo ajokis ekoto iboro luipu adepar eipuda lo ageunet. Arai emamei ainakina keda atitingikinit, epedorete aswamisinei nuepataka noi araun nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Otita azi orodriruni dezu ri le aga ava lu e'doria ri ra. E'yo asi feza azini asi teza kokoru, e'yo ewakokoru 'diyi vini eca ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhendera purogyekiti y'omugasho, nikyetenga ekirikukira aha kushemererwa kw'okubanza. Hatariho okwehayo n'okugumisiriza, n'emirimo yorobi munonga neebaasa kuremera.

eng_prompt: In every classroom, there are individuals who dedicate their lives to shaping the minds of future generations. Their passion and commitment create an environment where learning flourishes.
lug_prompt: Mu buli kibiina, mulimu abantu abeewaayo mu bulamu bwabwe okukola ebirowoozo by'emirembe egijja. Obwagazi n'obumalirivu bwabwe bitondawo embeera okusoma mwe kukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kilac acel-acel, tye dano matye ka miyo kwogi me yubu tam pa anyim. Mit komgi kacel ki keto cwinygi I komgi kelo kabedo ma kwan dongo iye.
teo_prompt: Kangin atukot, ejaasi itunga lueinanakinete aijarakec kanu aitodolikin aomisio nuka itunga lu oingaren. Amina kec keda ainakina kes itolomunenete ejautene lo itopoloritor asioman.
lgg_prompt: Kilasi dria eyi ma alea, 'ba eyi idri eyivile 'diyi owipi 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma omi edezu 'diyi ci. Eyi ma leta azini ava feza ni angu onita ni zozu ni eji.
nyn_prompt: Omuri buri kibiina, harimu abantu abarikuhayo amagara gaabo okukora ebiteekateeko by'eminyeeto y'omumaisho. Okukunda kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo, nibireetaho embeera erikureetera okwega kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: After months of intense training and preparation, the Ugandan athletes took to the track with determination and hope. Their remarkable performances in the international competition have sparked a wave of national pride and celebration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okutendekebwa n'okwetegekera ennyo, bannabyamizannyo bannayuganda baagenda mu misinde n'obumalirivu n'essuubi. Okukola kwabwe okulungi mu mpaka z'ensi yonna kuleetedde eggwanga okwenyumiriza n'okujaguza.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye ki yubbe matek tutwal, lungwec me lobo Uganda gucako ngwec ki miti ki gen. Tuko gi maber tutwal I pyem me wilobo okelo awaka ki kwero I lobo ni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitutuonoro keda aitemonokin, apotu akerak luko Uganda koloto toma akerit keda amuno keda amuno. Aswam kec najokan noi kotoma abolobol naka akwapin nukokinga ayangau aiyalama keda ainumunum kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta okporu azini otuta ni ma vutia, 'ba ongu onzu'ba kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi fu ongu nzuza ma alea asi 'baza azini asi'baza be. Yeta yini onyiru abala kari yi ma eselea 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eji ayiko kari ma alia tualu ayiko zuza be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okweteekateekyera munonga, abairuki ba Uganda bakaza omu mpaka n'amaani n'amatsiko. Enkora yaabo nungi omu mpaka z'ensi yoona, ereesire okwetunguura n'okujaguza omu ihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: The teacher has a unique ability to engage his students during lessons. His enthusiasm is infectious, inspiring them to participate actively.
lug_prompt: Omusomesa alina obusobozi obw'enjawulo okusikiriza abayizi be mu biseera by'okusoma. Obwagazi bwe bukwata era bubakubiriza okwenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: Lapwony tye ki kero me weko lutino bedo ki miti ikare me pwonye. Cwinye mit tutwal ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki miti me bedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi esisianakinan keda apedor na itegelikina na aitodolikin esisiak ke kapak naka aisisia. Emina ngesi aswam kagogong, ido isinyikokini kesi aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba eyi ma okpo sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyini e'yo eyi 'yezu sa'wa embata nirisi ri ci. Eri ma ava ni 'ba eyi ma eselea, eyini ava fe eyini aa'zu 'yeta 'da ma alea okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omwegyesa aine omuringo gw'omutaano gw'okureetera abeegi be kwejumba omu kwega. Omuhimbo gwe nigukwata, nigubareetera kwejumba omu mirimo.

eng_prompt: Education plays a crucial role in shaping our future, providing us with the knowledge and skills we need. Through their guidance and support, teachers equip us to navigate the challenges that lie ahead.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola omulimu munene mu kukola ebiseera byaffe eby'omu maaso, okutuwa amagezi n'obukugu bye twetaaga. Okuyitira mu kubudaabudibwa n'obuyambi bwabwe, abasomesa batuyamba okwaŋŋanga okusoomoozebwa okuli mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kwan konyo tutwal I yubu kwo wa me anyim, miyo itwa ngec ki diro ma wamito. Lupwonye miyo itwa kero me lweny i kom peko matye anyim kun gitiyo ki kony gi.
teo_prompt: Erai asioman naepol noi kanu aitolomun ingaren wok, ijaikini oni acoa keda acoa na ipudasi oni. Kotoma aicoreta kec keda agangat kec, isisianakinak isisianakinete oni aitodolikin atiokisio nu ejaas oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Onita ni azi okporu nga ewu ama vile drialeri ma sita ma alia, eri ama dri ondua azini ondua amani leleri fe. Geri eyini imbata fezu azini atita fezu risi, imba'ba eyi ama dri okpo fe e'yo ewaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura ebiro byaitu by'omumaisho, nibutuhereza okumanya n'emyoga ei turikwetenga. Barikurabira omu buhabuzi n'obuhwezi bwabo, abegyesa nibatuhwera okurwanisa oburemeezi oburi omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In the realm of education, many factors contribute to a student's success, but one element stands out above the rest. Research consistently shows that the impact of a dedicated educator can transform learning experiences, regardless of the environment.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enjigiriza, waliwo ebintu bingi ebiviirako obuwanguzi bw'omuyizi, naye ekintu kimu kyeyoleka okusinga ebirala. Okunoonyereza kulaga buli kaseera nti enkola y'omusomesa omumalirivu esobola okukyusa eby'okuyiga, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera.
ach_prompt: I tenge me kwan, jami mapol aye kelo loc pa lutino kwan, ento gin acel loyo weng. Kwed nyutu kare ki kare ni adwogi pa lapwony matye ki miti twero kelo aloka-loka i kom kit ma lutino kwano kwede, labongo paro pi kabedo ma orumu gi.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aisisia, ipu iboro lu itolomunenete eswamae lo esisiak, konye idiopebore nes itegelikina adepar luce. Itodunit duc aingic ebe epedori aswam naka esisianakinak luepedorete aijulakin eswamae lo aisisia, araida ejaasi kesi toma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Angu onitaniri ma alia, afa fepi sukulu mva ma drile suza ma alia 'diyi karakara, te afa alu ni pa so 'ba azi 'diyi ma drilea. E'yo eti ondaza eyi e'da sa'wa driasi kini 'ba imba'ba asi 'bapi ra 'diyi ma okpo eco e'yo onita ni 'diyi oja ra, angu amani aa'zu 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese, hariho ebintu bingi ebirikureetaho obusinguzi bw'omwegi, kwonka ekimwe nikyo kirikukira ebindi. Okucondooza nikyoreka butunu ngu omukoro gw'omwegyesa orikwehayo nigubaasa kuhindura eby'okwega, oihiremu eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: During a recent press conference, the minister acknowledged the challenges faced by educators in the current climate. He emphasized the importance of recognizing their hard work and dedication to shaping future generations.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gyebuvuddeko, minisita yakkiriza okusoomoozebwa abasomesa kwebasanga mu mbeera eriwo. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okusiima emirimu gyabwe egy'amaanyi n'obumalirivu mu kubumba emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: I kare me lok ki luco lok angeya cokcok-ki, minista owaco peko ma lupwonye tye ka kato ki iye ikare man. En owaco ni pire tek tutwal me miyo pwoc pi tic matek ma gutimo ki keto cwinygi me yubu anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto, abu eminista kocam atiokisio nuetereikina keda esisianakinak kotoma ojautene loakwana. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aisiyalamikin aswamukec kagogong ka ainakina kec kanu aitopolor itunga lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie eturisi, minisita 'da ai e'yo ewaru imba'ba eyini esu sa'wa 'di ma alea 'diyi ra. Eri fe okpo orodri 'bani azi okporu eyini nga 'diyi ma e'yo egazu tualu asi 'baza eyini 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi si ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, minisita akaikiriza oburemeezi bw'abeegyesa omu bwire obu. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okusiima emirimo yaabo n'obweziriki bwabo omu kutunguura eminyeeto y'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: At the beginning of the school year, we were struggling to grasp the concepts and often felt discouraged. However, with her engaging teaching style and unwavering support, we began to see the beauty in mathematics.
lug_prompt: Ku ntandikwa y'omwaka gw'essomero, twali tuzibuwalirwa okutegeera ebintu era emirundi mingi twawuliranga nga tuweddemu amaanyi. Naye olw'engeri gye yayigirizaamu n'obuwagizi bwe yatuwa, twatandika okulaba obulungi bw'okubala.
ach_prompt: I acaki me mwaka me kwan, onongo watye ka tute matek me niang pwony ma onongo watye kwede dok man onongo weko cwinywa tur. Kadi bed kumeno, ki yoo me pwonye ma en tiyo kwede ki kony ma en miyo, wacako neno ber pa cura.
teo_prompt: Kageunet naka ekaru lo esomero, ationikinit sio amisiikin akiro ngun ido apotu ipupiata sio aibiror. Konye, keda epone loajokan loka aisisianakin keda agangat ke, apotu sio ageutu aanyun aibuses naka aimar.
lgg_prompt: Eli sukulunirini e'doria, ama ri dri ci e'yo yi vazu azini ama eri sawa driasi ava ako ru. Kani si, geri erini imbata fezu 'diyi pie azini atita erini fe 'diyi pie, ama e'do ndre e'yo ndrizani namba ma alia 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutandika kw'omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese, tukaba tuteganisibwa kwetegyereza ebiteekateeko kandi tukaba tuhurira twahwa amaani. Kwonka, ahabw'enkora ye y'okwegyesa n'obuhwezi bwe, tukatandika kureeba oburungi bw'okubara.

eng_prompt: I often reflect on the lessons you've taught me and the values you've instilled in me. Your guidance has truly shaped who I am today.
lug_prompt: Ntera okufumiitiriza ku bye wanjigiriza n'empisa ze wanjigiriza. Okulambika kwo kukyusizza ddala ekyo kye ndi leero.
ach_prompt: Pol kare atamo I kom pwony ma I pwonya kwede ki jami mabeco ma I pwonya kwede. Kony ma imiya okonya adada me doko dano ma atye kwede I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Etapit eong aomoom nu aisisiaeta nu isisianakinit jo eong keda nu isisianakinit jo eong. Aingarenikinio kon nes abu iswama eong kwape eong lolo.
lgg_prompt: Ma sawa driasi e'yo ega e'yo mini emba ma dria azini e'yo onyiru mini 'ba ma alia 'diyi ma dria. Mi vile imbata 'diyi ede ma 'ba andru mani ovuzu ri ra ada.
nyn_prompt: Ninkira kuteekateeka aha mishomo ei onyegyesize hamwe n'emitwarize ei onshomesire. Obuhabuzi bwawe buhindwire omuntu ou ndi eriizooba.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and preparation, everything has gone horribly wrong. The unexpected turn of events has left us scrambling for solutions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okwetegekera, buli kimu kigenze bubi nnyo. Enkyukakyuka etasuubirwa mu bintu etusigadde nga tufuba okufuna eby'okugonjoola.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki yubbe, jami weng okato marac tutwal. Alokaloka ma pe byek tye I kom jami oweko watye ka tute matek me nongo yoo me cobo peko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, iboro kere elosete erono noi. Aijulakinio na iboro koipone kalo mam iwomit oni ajalakisi oni aimo iwaitin lu itemokinet.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otuta 'yezu azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo dria mu onzi onzi onzi. E'yo i 'yepi 'diyi ma ojata 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi fe ama dri asi otiza isu e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okweteekateekyera, buri kimwe kigyenzire kubi munonga. Enkora y'ebintu etarikuteekateekwaho, eturekire turikugyezaho kuronda oburyo bw'okugonjoora enshonga.

eng_prompt: The political landscape in Uganda has been dominated by a single party for several decades. This party has maintained its grip on power through various means, shaping the country's governance and policies.
lug_prompt: Ebyobufuzi mu Uganda bibadde bifugibwa ekibiina kimu okumala emyaka mingi. Ekibiina kino kikuumye obuyinza bwakyo mu ngeri ez'enjawulo, nga kikola ku bukulembeze n'enkola z'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Dul me cungu iwi bye acel keken aye dong oloyo lobo Uganda pi mwaki mapol. Dul me cungu iwi-bye man ogwoko twero ne I yoo mapat-pat, ki yubu tela ki cik me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Erai epate ediope loepugat akiro nuka epolitikis ko Uganda adaun ikar luipu. Edar epate lo aipuga koponesio luegelegela, aitolomun epugae keda ainapeta nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ebi ovu opi drile amuti alu ni si eli karakara eyi ma alea. Amuti politiki ni 'diri ebi okpo erini opi dria ri ma ta mba geri ndundu eyi si, erini driceza kari 'di ma alea azini azita kari 'di ma alea 'diyi edezu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obutegyeki omu Uganda bitwirwe ekibiina kimwe kumara emyaka mingi. Ekibiina ekyo kigumire kiri omu butegyeki kurabira omu miringo etari emwe n'emwe, ekirikutereeza obwebembezi n'ebiragiro by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: To ensure the success of our upcoming project, we need to assemble a skilled team. This will allow us to effectively address the challenges ahead.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obuwanguzi bwa pulojekiti yaffe ejja, twetaaga okukungaanya ttiimu ey'ekikugu. Kino kijja kutusobozesa okukola ku bizibu ebiri mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub wa matye kabino ni ocobo miti ne, omyero wacok lutic ma ludiro. Man bikonyo wa me lweny i kom peko matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ebuni epurojekt wok lo ebunit aswam ejok, ekot oni atukokin etimu lo emisiaritos. Ebuni ngin aingarakin oni aitemokin atiokisio nu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Otita ama vile emupi ri ma drile suzaru, le ama ma tra amuti azi ngapi kililiru 'diyi. Diri nga fe ama dri e'yo ewaru ewu drilia 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obusinguzi bwa purogyekiti yaitu erikwija, twine kurundaana tiimu y'abakugu. Eki nikiija kutubaasisa kukora kurungi aha buremeezi oburi omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Many organizations struggle to maintain their operations under extreme pressure. When faced with crises such as wars, their resources and support systems often become severely strained.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bingi birwana okukuuma emirimu gyabyo wansi w'okunyigirizibwa okusukkiridde. Bwe boolekaganye n'ebizibu ng'entalo, ebyetaago byabwe n'obuyambi bibeera ku bunkenke.
ach_prompt: Dule mapol tye ka tute matek me gwoko ticgi I kare ma gitye I lyeto madit tutwal. Kace ginongo peko macalo lweny, lim gi ki yub gi me miyo kony ipol kare doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete iriongeta luipu kagogong kanu aidar aswamukec kotoma ainingosit naepol noi. Karai etereikina keda atiokisio kwape ka ijisinei, etionikinos noi iborokec keda iponesiokec luka agangat.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi dri ci azi eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo ewaru eyi ma dria 'diyi ma alea. Ka e'yo ewaru ekile a'di pile 'diyi esu, afa yini 'diyi azini geri eyini atita fezu 'diyi eca ewaru saaru.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebingi nibirwana kurinda emirimo yaabyo ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi. Ku barikutunga oburemeezi nk'entaro, eby'obugaiga byabo hamwe n'obuhwezi bwabo, nibiteganisibwa munonga.

eng_prompt: The success of the local economy hinges on various factors. One of the most significant influences comes from international investments and tourism.
lug_prompt: Obuwanguzi bw'ebyenfuna by'ekitundu kisinziira ku nsonga ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bisinga okuva mu nsi z'ebweru n'ebyobulambuzi.
ach_prompt: Loc pa biacara me tedero jenge I kom jami mapol. Gin acel ma pire tek loyo en aye biacara ki limo piny ma aa ki ilobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Akerianut naka edumune loka ikapun kotoma atutubet ejai toma akiro nuipu. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi elomunit kama ejaasi ibiasaran luka akwapin nukokinga keda nuka elatok.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza e'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ati e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria. E'yo okporu 'diyi ma azi enga lonyi vuti aleza kari amve 'diyi ma alea azini e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi vu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the tourism industry has been significantly impacted by global events and changing consumer preferences. As a result, many businesses within this sector are struggling to secure the necessary funding to adapt and thrive.

nyn_prompt: Obu twabaire tushutami omu kafeero, nkaba ntarikubasa kwihaho ekiteekateeko ngu hariho omuntu orikutureeba. Okuhuhurirana n'okureebana ahagati y'abantu abari haihi nikyoreka ngu nibatuteekateekaho.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and scheduling conflicts, we finally found a time that worked for both of us. The anticipation had been building, and I was eager to see you face to face.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga tuteekateeka era nga tetukakasa budde, kyaddaaki twafuna obudde obwatukolera ffembi. Essuubi lyali lyeyongedde era nnali nneesunga okukulaba maaso ku maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki yub mapat-pat, I agiki ne wanongo cawa ma opore pi wan aryo weng. Byek obedo tye matek tutwal, dok abedo ki miti matek me neni wang ki wang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin keda ainapeta nuetioko, apotu sio adumutu apak naejok kanukosi kere. Ajaasi eong keda eipud loepol noi, ido akoto eong noi aanyun jo ore.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini sa'wa eyi ma alea e'yo eyi 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu asizu sa'wa azi ngapi ama dria driri ra. Asi 'baza ndra tu, azini ma ndra avaru mi ndrezu mi andretia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateekyera hamwe, tukaheza kutunga obwire oburikutukorera twembi. Okutegyereza kukaba kuriyo nikweyongyera, kandi nkaba nyine ekihika ky'okureeba amaisho aha maisho.

eng_prompt: As the economy continues to improve, more people are looking to purchase vehicles. This surge in demand has led to an increase in imports.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyenfuna byeyongera okutereera, abantu bangi batunuulidde okugula emmotoka. Okweyongera kw'obwetaavu buviiriddeko okweyongera kw'ebintu ebiyingizibwa mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me lim tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ka mito wilo mutoka. Medde pa miti eni oweko wel jami acata ma aa ki ilobo ma woko omede.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos nuka ikapun ajokunar, ekotosi itunga luipu agwel amotokan. Apol naka eipuda lo eyangau aiyatakino na iboro lu agwelanar akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ni mu drile otuzu, 'ba karakara eyi le mutukari eyi je. Afa 'bani le tu 'di fe afa 'bani eji engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entaasya ku birikugumizamu nibitereera, abantu baingi nibaronda kugura emotoka. Okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago, kireesire okweyongyera kw'ebintu ebirikuruga aheeru y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: After assessing the current challenges in our healthcare system, it has become clear that immediate action is necessary. To address the growing demand for medical services, we are implementing a strategic plan.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebisoomooza ebiri mu nkola yaffe ey'ebyobulamu, kyeyoleka kaati nti kyetaagisa okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, tuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee neno peko matye I tenge me yot kom, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero ki tim gin mo oyot oyot. Me cobo miti me tic me yot kom matye kamede, watye ka keto yub maber itic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor atiokisio nu ejaas owai lo angaleu, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet. Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo amukian, iuta sio aitegear ainapeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ama vile e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo azi mbeleru. E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, ama otuta azi 'ye'i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma oburemeezi oburiho obwahati omu kitongore kyaitu ky'eby'amagara, nikyoreka butunu ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho. Okuhikiiriza ekyetengo ky'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara ekyeyongyeire, turiyo nituta enteekateeka omu nkora.

eng_prompt: After a long and contentious meeting, the team finally reached a consensus on the key issues at hand. Now, all that remains is to see if they can align their efforts moving forward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olukiiko oluwanvu era olw'okusika omuguwa, ttiimu yatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku nsonga enkulu ezaaliwo. Kati, ekisigaddeyo kwe kulaba oba basobola okukwataganya kaweefube waabwe okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee kacokke ma obedo pi kare malac dok ma opong ki apoka-poka, dul ne dong guwinye I kom lok mapigi tego matye I cinggi. Kombedi, gin ma odong en aye me neno kace gitwero ribo kero gi me mede anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airiamunet naepol noi, apotu etimu kodolokisi acamanara kanuikamunitos akiro nuapolok nuejaas. Kwana, ibore yenideuna bon ngesi aanyun arai epedorete kesi aimorikikin agogongukec kanu ainyikokinit.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ezu azini erita ako be 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu asizu ti ecita e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria ra. Sawa 'disi, afa acepi ri ndrezu kani eyi eco okpo eyini 'diyi otu muzu drile ra ya ri i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orukiiko rw'obwire buraingwa kandi orwabaire rurimu entongane, tiimu ekahika aha kwikirizana aha nshonga nkuru ezabaire ziriho. Hati ekisigaireho n'okureeba yaaba nibabaasa kukoresa amaani gaabo okugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As they sat down at the café, their conversation flowed easily, filled with laughter and shared memories. Curiosity sparked in her mind as she wondered what topics had captured their attention.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe batuula wansi mu kafeero, emboozi yaabwe yatambula bulungi, nga ejjudde enseko n'okugabana ebijjukizo. Okwagala okumanya kwabalukawo mu birowoozo bye nga yeebuuza emitwe ki egyabakwatako.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gubedo piny I kacato cam, lok meggi obedo yot, opong ki nyero ki jami ma wigi poo I komgi. En obedo ki miti madit tutwal me ngeyo ngo ma oyomo cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Neabwounatar kesi kocafe, apotu kesi kinerata kopone kaloejok, ileleba keda akwena keda aiituneta. Abu ngesi kogeu aingic akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuikamunitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Yi riria va pari kafe nyazuri ma alia, e'yo nzeza yi ma eselea ri aci ewakokoru, yi ga o'duko ndrizaru azini e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi pie. E'yo lezu e'yo onizu 'diyi e'do eri ma omi ma alia erini e'yo egazu e'yo yi ma asi 'bapi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku baashutamiire ahansi aha kafeero, orubazo rwabo rukaba nirugyenda omu maisho, rwijwire okusheka hamwe n'ebintu ebirikukwata aha magara gaabo. Okwenda kumanya kukamureetera okwebuuza enshonga ezirikubakwataho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost economic growth and improve transportation infrastructure, the Ugandan government has prioritized the development of its railway system. This initiative aims to enhance connectivity between major cities and rural areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna n'entambula, gavumenti ya Uganda ekulembezza enkulaakulana y'eggaali y'omukka. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'ebibuga ebinene n'ebyalo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo rwom me timo biacara ki yub me wot, gamente me Uganda oketo tek me dongo dul me gar meggi. Yub man tye ki miti me medo kubbe ikin citi madongo ki caro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitojokar elose, abu apugan nako Uganda isingarenit aitopolor erot loka agaali. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar arucokina kiding itaunin luapolok keda aiboisio nu ocaaloi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini geri acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete Uganda niri 'ba e'yo okporu eri vile geri garamusi ni 'diyi ma ezota ma dria. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo ti icita ni aku ambo eyi ma eselea angu caloru 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okutunguura eby'engyenda,gavumenti ya Uganda etandikire kutunguura eby'egaari y'omwika. Enteekateeka egi egyendereire kutunguura enkwatanisa ahagati y'endembo empango hamwe n'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: Despite the ongoing logistical challenges, the suppliers have assured us of their commitment to meet our demands. Their willingness to adapt has been crucial in maintaining our supply chain.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso mu by'okutambuza ebintu, abatutuusaako ebintu batukakasizza obumalirivu bwabwe okutuukiriza ebyetaago byaffe. Okwagala kwabwe okukyusakyusa kubadde kwa nkizo mu kukuuma enkola yaffe ey'okutunda ebintu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni peko tye, joo ma cato jami ni guminiwa gen ni gubi timo jami ma wamito. Miti gi me ngiyo ki jami mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I gwoko jami ma wamito.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas atiokisio nu elosi akonye, abu agwelanarak isinyikok sio ebe epedorete kesi aitodolikin iboro lu ikoto oni. Akapakina kec naka aijulanakineta erai naepol noi kanu aidar akorio na iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru drile 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi fe amani asi'baza asi'baza yini afa amani le 'diyi 'yezuri ma dria. Asi 'baza yini e'yo yi ojazu ri ebi ovu orodriru ama vile okalamvu afa ozizuri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho, abarikutuheereza ebintu batuhamize ngu nibenda kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byaitu. Okwenda kwabo kuhikaana n'embeera kibeire eky'omugasho munonga omukureeberera enkora yaitu y'okuguza ebintu.

eng_prompt: The local forestry company has established a sustainable harvesting program. As a result, they provide us with timber.
lug_prompt: Kkampuni y'ebibira mu kitundu etaddewo enteekateeka y'okukungula ebirime mu ngeri ey'obwegendereza. N'ekivuddemu, batuwa embaawo.
ach_prompt: Dul ma loyo lok kom bunga I tedero okatti ki yub me kwanyo cam ikare me kac. Macalo adwogi ne, gi miniwa bao.
teo_prompt: Etolomu ekampuni loka amagoron ainapeta nuka aisak ikorion. Kanuka ngun, einanakinete kesi oni abawoi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo jere ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbapiri e'do otita azi e'yo ori okuza ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ni. E'yo 'disi, eyi ama dri mbawu eyi fe.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'amahamba eky'omubyaro kitandikireho enteekateeka y'okusharuura. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatuhereza embaaho.

eng_prompt: Recent political changes have prompted many to seek refuge or new opportunities across the border. As a result, there are movements of people in and out of the neighbouring country.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka mu byobufuzi ezaakagwawo ziwalirizza bangi okunoonya obubudamu oba emikisa emipya emitala w'ensalo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo entambula y'abantu abayingira n'okufuluma mu nsi eziriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka me cungu iwi-bye ma otime cokcok-ki oweko dano mapol gucito ka yenyo luring ayela onyo gum me tic I lobe mukene. Macalo adwogi ne, wot pa dano tye ka donyo ki kato ki I lobo matye jirani.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka epolitikis nes ayau itunga luipu aimo aiboisio nu ikerai keda arerengesio nuitetiak kokoru. Kanuka ngun, ejai alosit naka itunga toma keda kinga naka akwapin nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Ojata politiki ni o'diru 'diyi fe 'ba karakara eyini emunyale ndazu kani ku drileba o'diru 'diyi ndazu boda milia. E'yo 'disi, acita 'ba eyini emuzu azini fuzu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri ci.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka y'eby'obutegyeki eyabaireho obwahati, ereesire baingi kuronda obuhungiro nainga emigisha misya aha nsharo. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho entambura y'abantu kuruga n'okuza omu ihanga erituherereire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance regional connectivity and boost trade, the Ugandan government has announced plans for significant infrastructure development. This initiative includes the construction of a railway line towards the Tanzanian border and Kenya respectively.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkolagana mu bitundu n'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi, gavumenti ya Uganda erangiridde enteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya ebintu ebikulu. Enteekateeka eno erimu okuzimba oluguudo lw'eggaali y'omukka olugenda ku nsalo ya Tanzania ne Kenya.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo kubbe I but lobo mapat-pat ki medo rwom me biacara, gamente me Uganda otito yub mapat-pat me dongo lobo. Yub man tye iye yubu gudi ma cito I wang lobo me Tanzania ki Kenya.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong arucokina naka aiboisio keda aitopolor agwelanar, abu apugan nako Uganda kolimo ainapeta nuka aitopol iboro luingarakinete itunga. Imoriarit ainapeta ngun aiduk erot lo agaali lo elosi oikoru loko Tanzania keda Kenya.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ti icita ni angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu tujari ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, gamete Uganda niri azi otita eyi e'yo angu ezoma ni okporu 'diyi ezozu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma alia, 'ba nga geri garamusi ni 'diyi si muzu boda mile Tanzania ni azini Kenya ni 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda erangirire enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'entunguuka omu byanga. Enteekateeka egi erimu okwombeka oruguuto rw'egaari y'omwika orurikuza aha nsharo za Tanzania na Kenya.

eng_prompt: Advancements in technology and infrastructure have significantly improved transportation options. As a result, individuals can choose from a wide range of travel methods to suit their needs.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya n'ebizimbe erongoosezza nnyo ebyentambula. N'ekivuddemu, abantu basobola okulondako mu ntambula ez'enjawulo okusinziira ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo I kom tet manyen ki jami ma mite me tic I kabedo mapatpat okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I yoo me wot. Macalo adwogi ne, dano acel-acel twero yero yoo me wot mapat-pat malube ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana ka aiboisio nuegelegela etojokasi noi nuka elose. Kanuka ngun, epedorete itunga aseun iponesio luegelegela luka alosit kwape ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Angu ezoma e'yo tekenologiani azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi otu geri acizu 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba alu alu eco geri acizu ndundu 'diyi pe eyini ani e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu tekinorogye hamwe n'ebyombeko byongyeire ahaby'engyenda. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibabaasa kutoorana omu miringo mingi y'engyenda erikuhikaana n'ebyetaago byabo.

eng_prompt: In the face of overwhelming challenges, it's easy to feel that extreme measures are our only option. However, we must explore alternative approaches that prioritize our well-being and sustainability.
lug_prompt: Nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okunene, kyangu okuwulira nti ebikolwa eby'amaanyi bye byokka bye tusobola okukola. Newankubadde, tulina okunoonyereza ku ngeri endala ezikulembeza obulungi bwaffe n'okuyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ki peko mapol tutwal, yot tutwal me tamo ni yoo me timo jami mapol tutwal en aye yoo acel keken ma watye kwede. Kadi bed kumeno, omyero wanong yoo mukene ma keto ber bedo wa ki dongo lobo obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka atiokisio, epatana aomit ebe ibusakinit oni aswam iboro luitegelikina. Konye, ibusakinit oni aimo iwaitin ice luepedorete aisingarenit aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi ma drilea, eri ewakokoru ama ega kini e'yo onzi 'diyi e'yo lu amani eco 'ye ra ri'I. Kani si, le ama ma nda geri azi 'diyi amani aa'zu muke azini aa'zu edriru 'diyi 'bazu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi, nikyanguhi kuhurira ngu enkora y'amaani n'eky'okureeberaho kyaitu kyonka. Kwonka, twine kuronda oburyo obundi oburikubaasa kuturinda.

eng_prompt: Our journey has been long and filled with challenges, but we are determined to see it through to the end. With each passing mile, our excitement grows as we approach our goal.
lug_prompt: Olugendo lwaffe lubadde luwanvu era lujjudde okusoomoozebwa naye tuli bamalirivu okulutuukako okutuuka ku nkomerero. Buli mayiro gye tuyitamu, essanyu lyaffe lyeyongera nga tusemberera ebiruubirirwa byaffe.
ach_prompt: Wot wa obedo bor dok opong ki peko, ento wamoko tamwa me neno ne naka wa I agiki. I ngee ngwec ki mairo acel-acel, yomcwiny wa mede ka nongo wa cok ki miti wa.
teo_prompt: Erai erot wok loewoja noi ido ipu atiokisio, konye ikapakina sio aitodolikin kitoni angetakinet. Kanginimailo lo atuboros, iyatakinos aiyalama wok neyapiete sio alosikinetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Aci amavileri ebi ovu ezuru azini e'yo ewaru be tre, te ama asi 'ba e'yo nde ndrezu kpere asizu. Mailo dria agapi 'boria, ayiko amavileri ni tu amani cazu ama vile asisile vu 'boria.
nyn_prompt: Orugyendo rwaitu rutwire ruri ruraingwa kandi rwijwire oburemeezi, kwonka twehaireyo kurukoresa okuhitsya aha muheru. Buri mayiro erikuhingura, okushemererwa kwaitu nikweyongyera ku turikuhika haihi n'ekigyendererwa kyaitu.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of our travel needs, we reached out to the ministry for assistance. They assured us that they would facilitate our transportation requirements.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku byetaago byaffe eby'entambula, twatuukirira minisitule okufuna obuyambi. Baatukakasa nti bajja kukola ku byetaago byaffe eby'entambula.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom jami ma mite pi wotwa, waloko ki jang gamente me nongo kony. Gu cuku cwiny wa ni gubi miyo jami ma mite pi wot wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos alosit kosi, apotu sio adolokisi erionget kanu aingarakinio. Apotu kesi isinyikokisi sio ebe epote kesi aitemokin nuka elose wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile afa acizu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama e'yo nze okalamvu 'da vu azakoma esuzu. Eyi fe amani asi'baza kini eyi nga e'yo amani acizu 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye ebyetengo byaitu by'engyenda, tukashaba obuhwezi kuruga omu minisiture. Bakatuhamiza ngu nibaza kutuhwera omu by'engyenda.

eng_prompt: Many people are unaware of the serious health risks associated with diabetes. Understanding its implications is crucial for prevention and management.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi tebamanyi bizibu bya bulamu eby'amaanyi ebiva mu bulwadde bwa sukaali. Okutegeera ebiyinza okuvaamu kya mugaso nnyo mu kuziyiza n'okuddukanya.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe gingeyo rac pa two cukari. Niang adwogi ne pire tek tutwal pi gengo ki doro ne.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nu adekasinei nu ikamanara keda adeka naka esukali. Amisiikin nuepedorete aswam erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi nini e'yo onzi azo sukari niri ni 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo erini eco 'ye 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo atrizu azini e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi tibarikumanya akabi k'amaani akarikuruga omu ndwara ya sukaari. Okwetegyereza ebirikubaasa kurugamu n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira n'okureeberera.

eng_prompt: In response to growing public unrest and demands for reform, lawmakers convened to address the nation's pressing issues. The political climate was charged, with factions clashing over the future direction of the country.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko bw'abantu obweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'ennongoosereza, ababaka ba palamenti baatuula okukola ku nsonga z'eggwanga ez'amangu. Embeera y'ebyobufuzi yabadde mbi, ng'ebiwayi bikontana ku ngeri eggwanga gye lirina okutambulamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me jemo matye kamede I kin lwak kacel ki miti me kelo aloka-loka, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gubedo ka lok I kom peko matye I lobo man. Lok me cungu iwi-bye omede, dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat obedo ka lweny i kom yoo me tela pa lobo man i kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amumu naka itunga keda eipud loka aijulakin akiro, apotu imeeban luka airabet iriamunos aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka akwap. Aponi kitoronai ejautene loka politikis, ido apotu ipatei kongurianata kanu aingarenikinio naka akwapuwok koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri o'bi eyini tuzu tualu e'yo 'ba eyini lezu ojata ejizu 'diyi pie, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi tra eyi e'yo okporu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Angu politiki niri ma omgbo tu ra, ongulumu eyini aco cozu e'yo driceza kari ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: After checking the area for any potential threats, he decided it was best to find a safe location. Safety was his top priority, so he carefully considered his options.

eng_prompt: In a world where empathy and compassion are essential for coexistence, the act of taking another person's life is a profound violation of our shared humanity. Such actions not only devastate individuals and families but also erode the moral fabric of society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga okusaasira n'obusaasizi bikulu mu kubeera awamu, ekikolwa ky'okutwala obulamu bw'omuntu omulala kityoboola nnyo obuntubulamu bwaffe. Ebikolwa ng'ebyo tebikoma ku kusaanyawo bantu ssekinnoomu n'amaka naye era bisaanyawo empisa z'ekitundu.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia asi ndriza azini asi ndriza eri orodriru aa'ta tualuri ma alia, e'yo 'bani 'ba azi 'diyi ma idri 'duzu ri eri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ezazuri'i. Yeta 'dile 'diyi feni lu 'ba yi ma ngulupi azini familia yi eza ku te yi vini o'bi yi ma adriza onzi.
