eng_prompt: As gun violence continues to rise in many communities, law enforcement agencies are facing unprecedented challenges. It is crucial for authorities to develop effective strategies to address the growing number of firearm-related incidents.
lug_prompt: Ng'obutabanguko bw'emmundu bweyongera mu bitundu bingi, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Kya mugaso nnyo ab'obuyinza okukola enteekateeka ennungi okukola ku bungi bw'emisango egyekuusa ku mmundu egyeyongera.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tim gero ki muduku tye ka mede I kabedo mapol, dul ma gwoko cik tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Pire tek tutwal ki lutela me yubu yoo maber me lweny i kom wel dano matye kadonyo I tim me nywaro tic ki muduku.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos amumu naka imudun aiyatakin kotoma atutubena nuipu, etereikina iriongeta lu ikisila keda atiokisio nuipu noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi apedorosio aitolomun iwaitin lu epedorete aitemokin ationis na imudun.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri osu si ri ni mu drile tuzu ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. Eri orodriru okpo e'ipi eyini geri kililiru 'diyi esuzu e'yo osu eyi ayupi 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro bw'embundu ku burikuguma nibweyongyera omu byanga bingi, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro biriyo nibishanga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. N'eky'omugasho ab'obushoborozi okutandikaho oburyo bw'okukora aha bikwatiraine n'embundu obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in criminal activity, particularly in the form of burglary and shoplifting. As a result, residents are growing increasingly concerned about their safety and the security of their belongings.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera mu bumenyi bw'amateeka naddala mu ngeri y'okumenya amayumba n'okubba ebintu mu maduuka. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bwabwe n'obw'ebintu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me timo bal omede tutwalle kwalo ot ki kwalo jami acata. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ka mede ki paro pi ber bedo gi ki jami gi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakinos noi aswamisio nuka abilibilio naka ikisila ka apugan keda akoko na iboro. Kanuka ngun, iyatakitos itunga aiyuwara kec keda iborokec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu ra tutuni e'yo ogu ni azini dukani eyi ma ogu ni 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi curu'do asi otiza be eyi ma tambaza ma dria tualu afa eyivile 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'obukozi bw'ebibi, okukira munonga omu muringo gw'okwiba amaju n'okwiba omu maduuka. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye beeyongyeire kufayo aha magara gaabo n'ebintu byabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the rise in gun violence has become a pressing concern for communities across the nation. As debates over gun control intensify, the tragic consequences of this issue are becoming increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweyongerayongera mu butabanguko bw'emmundu kifuuse ekyeraliikiriza mu bitundu okwetooloola eggwanga. Ng'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'okukugira emmundu kweyongera, ebizibu ebiva mu nsonga eno byeyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, medde pa tim gero ki muduku odoko peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapat-pat I lobo man. Kit ma laro lok i kom gengo nyayo muduku tye ka mede, adwogi marac pa lok man tye ka nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol naka amumu naka imudun erai ibore yenepol noi lo epodokinit itunga kotoma akwap. Kwape epol epeget loikamunit aitikitik imudun, ejenuna noi atiokisio nuelomunete kanuka ngun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri osu eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri eca asi otiza okporu ongulumu eyi ma eselea kari 'di ma alea ndulu ni ru. Agbatara e'yo osu eyi ma tambazu ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, e'yo ewaru e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi eca e'da sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko bw'embundu kihindukire enshonga y'amaani omu bantu omu ihanga ryona. Okuhanuura aha nshonga y'okurwanisa embundu kwayeyongyera, ebirugyire omu nshonga egi nibyeyongyera kureebeka.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise over the city, the streets were already bustling with commuters heading to their jobs. Suddenly, the sound of gunfire shattered the morning calm, leaving bystanders in shock.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo mu kibuga, enguudo zaali zijjudde abasaabaze nga boolekera emirimu gyabwe. Amangu ago, amaloboozi g'amasasi gaataataaganya obukkakkamu bw'oku makya, ne galeka abaabaddewo mu kutya.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako aa malo, dano mapol onongo gitye ka wot me cito I gang ticgi. Cutcut, dwan muduku obalo kuc ma onongo tye odiko, oweko dano ma onongo gitye ka nenoni gubedo ki ngeng tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibwo kosite, apotu itunga luipu opotu orot alosit aswamisineikec. Apotu akiro nuka imudun kobilibilakisi ainapakina naka atupuruc, kosodete ajalakisi itunga luapotu kojaikinos toma aumokinio.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria efuria aku ambu cityniri ma dria, 'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba aci'ba E'doria, osu ma o'duko eza e'yo e'yere o'bitisi 'diyi, erini fezu 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi dri osuta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kwija omu rurembo, enguuto zikaba ziijwire abantu abaabaire nibaza aha mirimo yaabo. Ahonaaho, eiraka ry'amasasi rikashiisha obusingye bw'akasheeshe, ryareka abaabaire beemereireho bashemereirwe.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about public safety, the president expressed concerns over the escalating use of force by law enforcement. He believes that a more peaceful approach would foster better community relations.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku by'okwerinda kw'abantu, pulezidenti yalaze obweraliikirivu olw'abakuumaddembe okweyongera okukozesa amaanyi. Alowooza nti enkola ey'emirembe ejja kutumbula enkolagana ennungi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom gwoko ber bedo pa lwak, ladit lobo onyuto lworo I kom tic ki teko ma abili tye katimo. En tye ki niyee ni yoo me kuc obi kelo ber bedo ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos ayuwara naka itunga, abu lokapolon akwap kitodu aiyalongongokec kanu aitwasam agogongu kama ejaasi ipolisin. Iyuunit ngesi ebe epone loka ainapakina epedori aitopolor eidicane loajokan kotunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria, prisdent ece asi otiza e'yo 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ni okpo ayuzu ri ma dria. Eri a'i ra kini geri asianzuru ni nga aa'ta muke ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho ahaby'okwerinda omu bantu, omwebembezi w'eihanga akooreka okwerarikirira kwe ahabw'okukoresa amaani kw'abakuumi b'ebiragiro. Naayikiriza ngu enkora y'obusingye neebaasa kureetaho enkoragana nungi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In response to escalating tensions and widespread discontent among the population, authorities have taken precautionary measures. Fears of unrest have prompted officials to bolster security in key areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obunkenke obweyongera n'obutali bumativu mu bantu, ab'obuyinza bakoze enkola z'okwewala. Okutya obutabanguko kuleetedde abakungu okunyweza eby'okwerinda mu bitundu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa telle ki cwer cwiny I kin lwak, lutela gutimo jami mapat-pat me gwokke. Lworo lweny oweko lutic omedo rwom me gwoko kuc I kabedo mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyatakinos keda amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga, apotu apedorosio kiswamata nu aitikitik. Akurianu na amumu nes abu isinyikok eswamak aitogogong ayuwara kaiboisio nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi pie, drice'ba eyi 'ye e'yo eyi ma tambazu. Uri ngiringiri niri fe azi'ba eyini okpo fe e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo angu okporu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana obweyongyeire omu bantu, ab'obushoborozi bateireho oburyo bw'okwerinda. Okutiina akaimukiriro kireesire abakungu kwongyera eby'okwerinda omu myanya mikuru.

eng_prompt: As the political landscape continues to evolve, law enforcement agencies must adapt their strategies to better engage with the community. Observing the dynamics of voter behavior and public sentiment during these events can provide valuable insights.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyobufuzi yeeyongera okukyuka, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe birina okukyusa obukodyo bwabyo okusobola okukwatagana obulungi n'abantu. Okwetegereza enneeyisa y'abalonzi n'endowooza y'abantu mu biseera bino kisobola okuwa amagezi ag'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka lokke kwede, dul ma gwoko cik omyero gulok yoo me tic gi wek gubed ki kubbe maber ki lwak. Neno kit ma lubol kwir timo kwede ki tam pa lwak I kare me yub eni twero miyo ngec ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi akiro nuka epolitikis aijulanakin, ekot iriongeta lu ikisila aijulakin iwaitin kec kanu aiswamanar keda itunga. Asesen iponesio luka aseak keda aomisio nuka itunga kotoma apakio kanu ijaikini oni acoa naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni 'diyi ni mu drile yi ojazu, le amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma oja geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi eyini ani aa'zu o'bi eyi pie kililiru beni. E'yo 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma adriza azini egata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma pamvu onezu sa'wa 'diyi ma alea ri eco e'yo orodriru 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obutegyeki ku birikugumizamu nibihinduka, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro bishemereire kuhindura emiringo yaabo, kugira ngu bakoragana kurungi n'abantu. Okwetegyereza emicwe y'abateezi b'akaruuru hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'abantu omu mikoro egi, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya bingi.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing concerns about efficiency and public safety, the government has announced plans for significant changes within the police force. Officials have indicated that these adjustments are necessary to improve operations and address community needs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku bukugu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka z'enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu poliisi. Abakungu balaze nti enkyukakyuka zino zeetaagisa okulongoosa emirimu n'okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye I kom tic maber ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak, gamente owaco ni tye ki yub me kelo aloka-loka madongo I dul pa abili. Lutela guwaco ni aloka-loka magi mite me yubu tic ki cobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan keda ayuwara naka itunga, elimorit apugan ainapeta nuka aijulanakineta nuepolok kotoma apugan naka ipolisin. Apotu eswamak itodutu ebe ejokuka aijulanakineta nu kanu aitojokar aswam ka aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu asi otiza be e'yo azi ngazu kililiru azini o'bi eyini aa'zu ageitema be ri ma dria, gamete azi otita eyi ojata okporu ni eyi 'yezu polisi eyi ma eselea. Azi'ba eyi 'yo kini ojata 'diyi orodriru azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira okurikugyenda omu maisho aha bukoryo n'okwerinda kw'abantu,gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka y'empinduka y'amaani omu pooriisi. Abakuru boorekire ngu empindahinduka ezi nizetengwa okutunguura emirimo n'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: After months of planning, the robbers finally executed their heist, leaving a trail of chaos in their wake. Investigators soon discovered that the weapon used in the crime had a shocking origin.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka, ababbi baasembayo okukola obubbi bwabwe, ne balekawo akavuyo mu bigere byabwe. Bambega baakizuula mangu nti ekyokulwanyisa ekyakozesebwa mu bumenyi bw'amateeka kyava mu nsibuko eyeewuunyisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe, lukwo ne otyeko timo timgi, kun giweko kuku kuku I nge gi. Lutim kwed oyot oyot gunongo ni jami lweny ma kitiyo kwedgi me timo bal enoni obedo gin ma kelo lworo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin, apotu ikokolak kitodolikisi akoko kec, kojalakisi amumu noi. Apotu angicak kojenutu atipet ebe iboro luitosomao kotoma abilibilio naka ikisila ngun eraasi luitukurianete noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza ma vutia, ogua 'da eyi 'ye ogua eyivile 'diyi asizu, eyini ani ngiringiri kuzu eyi ma vutia. Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi esu mbeleru kini nyafe 'bani ayu e'yo onzi 'da 'yezu ri ma e'dota onzi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera, abashuma bakahendera baakora obushuma bwabo, bareka akavuyo omu maisho gaabo. Bambega bukiri kare bakareeba ngu ekikwato ekyakoresibwe omukukora ebihagaro kikaba kiine oburugo bw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the region after a series of violent confrontations between law enforcement and local residents. In a shocking turn of events, security operatives were arrested yesterday for killing a civilian.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kitundu oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana okw'amaanyi wakati w'abakuumaddembe n'abatuuze. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, ab'eby'okwerinda baakwatiddwa eggulo olw'okutta omuntu wa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I but piny eni inge lweny ma obedo tye ikin abili ki lutedero. I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, kimako lugwok kuc laworo pi neko dano acel.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kotoma aiboisit kangin akaulo naka ingungeta kiding ipolisin keda itunga luka atutubet. Kotoma aijulakineta nuapolok noi, aponi ikamarai itunga luka ayuwara bian kanu aiyar itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri tu angu 'da ma alea e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma vutia 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. E'yo onzi ni ma alia, 'ba obi aje 'ba agei temani 'diyi yini 'ba asikari ru ku 'diyi o'dizurisi.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu kyanga ahanyima y'okurwanagana kw'amaani ahagati y'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro hamwe n'abatuuragye. Omu mpindahinduka y'omutaano, ab'eby'okwerinda bakwasirwe nyomwebazyo ahabw'okwita omuntu wa buriijo.

eng_prompt: Authorities are facing mounting pressure from the public and media for updates on the ongoing investigations. As a result, police have decided to withhold certain information until they can ensure the integrity of the case.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza boolekedde okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bantu ne bannamawulire okufuna ebipya ku kunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso. N'ekyavaamu, poliisi esazeewo obutamanyisa bantu bintu ebimu okutuusa nga bakakasizza nti omusango guwedde.
ach_prompt: Lutela tye ka nongo lyeto madit tutwal kibot lwak ki odi poko ngec me nongo ngec manyen I kom kwed matye kawot anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, abili omoko tamgi pe me miyo ngec mogo wang ma gunongo ni lok ne tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Etereikina apedorosio keda ainingosit kama ejaasi itunga keda arotak iyemuto kanu akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos aingic na elosi akonye. Kanuka ngun, aseutu ipolisin aingop akiro ace itoni ne aanyunor kesi abeit naka emusago ngol.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi omiza esu engazu o'bi eyi vu tualu geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi pie e'yo eti ondaza mupi drile ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi ai e'yo azi eyi ma dria ku kpere eyini ani esuzu e'yo 'da eyi ma dria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibateganisibwa abantu n'abanyamakuru okubaasa kumanya ebirikukwata aha kucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho. N'ekyarugiremu, poriisi eshaziremu okurinda amakuru agamwe kuhisya obu erikureeba ngu omushango gwahika aha muheru.

eng_prompt: The charity event aims to provide support to underprivileged communities. As part of the initiative, we need to determine the number of motorcycles that will be distributed.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gw'okugaba obuyambi gugendererwamu kuwa obuyambi abantu abateesobola. Ng'omu ku kaweefube, twetaaga okuzuula omuwendo gwa ppikipiki ezigenda okugabibwa.
ach_prompt: Yub me miyo kony eni tye ki miti me miyo kony bot lwak ma can tye ka yelo gi. Macalo but yub eni, omyero waniang wel piki piki ma kibimiyo.
teo_prompt: Alosikinet naka aidar ngul luicanasi ngesi ainakin agangat mama ejaasi itunga luicanasi. Kwape ediopet koboro, ekot oni ajenun enaaba loka ipikipikin luebeit aikor.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'ba azakoma fepi 'da ma asisile ri lezu atita fezu ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, le ama ma esu kalafe pikipiki 'bani nga awa 'diyi ma kalafe ra.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'okugaba obuhwezi nigugyenderera okuheereza obuhwezi abantu abatarikwebaasa. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa, twine kumanya omuhendo gwa pikipiki ezirikuza kugabwa.

eng_prompt: Many health experts recommend a balanced diet that limits red meat consumption. Excessive intake of beef can lead to various health issues.
lug_prompt: Abakugu mu byobulamu bangi bawa amagezi okulya emmere erimu ebirungo byonna ekendeeza okulya ennyama emmyufu. Okulya ennyo ennyama y'ente kiyinza okuvaako ebizibu by'obulamu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ludiro me yot kom mapol giwaco ni dano omyero gucam cam mabeco wek pe gucam ringo makwar. Camo ringo dyangi tutwal twero kelo peko me yot kom mapol.
teo_prompt: Ipirioitin luipu luka angeleu icorakitos ainyam inyamat lu ejokuka lu itidisiaret ainyam akiring narengan. Ainyam akiring naepol epedori ayangaun adekasinei nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi fe imbata nyaka esele coza be 'diyi ma nyaza ma dria. Za nyaza badakaru ri eco fe e'yo rua ala ni ndundu 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Abakugu omu by'amagara abingi nibahaburira eby'okurya ebirimu ekiriisa kyona, ebirikuzibira okurya enyama erikutukura. Okurya enyama y'ente munonga nikibaasa kureeta oburemeezi bwingi aha magara.

eng_prompt: Maintaining proper hygiene is essential for overall health and well-being. However, various factors can impede individuals from achieving and sustaining good hygiene practices.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu n'obulungi. Newankubadde, ensonga ez'enjawulo zisobola okulemesa abantu okufuna n'okuyimirizaawo enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek pi yotkom ki kwo maber. Kadi bed kumeno, jami mapol twero gengo dano me gwoko lengo.
teo_prompt: Aidar aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu keda aijar najokan. Konye, ipu iboro luepedorete aimik itunga adumun ka aidar aila.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza eri orodriru aa'zu rua ala be. Kani si, e'yo ndundu eyi eco 'ba eyi atri geri alata ni 'diyi esuzu dika eyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Okukuratira obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara n'amagara marungi. Kwonka, ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe nibibaasa kuremesa abantu kutunga n'okugumizamu n'emitwarize mirungi y'eby'obuyonjo.

eng_prompt: Maintaining personal cleanliness is essential for both physical health and social interactions. However, many people struggle with establishing good hygiene practices.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo bw'omubiri kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'omubiri n'okukolagana n'abantu. Newankubadde, abantu bangi balwana okuteekawo enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo me kom dano pire tek tutwal pi yotkom kom ki winye ikin dano. Kadi bed kumeno, dano mapol nongo peko me gwoko lengo.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aila erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka akwan keda aiswamanara keda itunga. Konye, etiono itunga luipu aitodolikin nuka aila.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza eri orodriru rua ala ni azini aa'ta 'ba eyi pie ri ni. Kani si, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'bazu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obwecumi n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'omubiri hamwe n'okukorengana n'abantu. Kwonka, abantu baingi nibarwana kutaho enkora nungi y'eby'obuyonjo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maximize their profits, many entrepreneurs explore various strategies to minimize their financial obligations. However, some business owners try to dodge paying taxes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amagoba gaabwe, abasuubuzi bangi banoonyereza ku bukodyo obw'enjawulo okukendeeza ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'ensimbi. Kyokka, bannannyini bizinensi abamu bagezaako okwewala okusasula emisolo.
ach_prompt: I tute gi me medo magoba gi, lutim biacara mapol gitiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me dwoko piny rwom me lim gi. Kadi bed kumeno, lutim biacara mukene pe gi culu mucoro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aiyatakin ameda kec, eutasi agwelanarak aimo iwaitin luegelegela kanu aitidisiar ikapunukec. Konye, icie ikulepek ibiasaran etamitos ainac aitac isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu orodri eyini esu ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba karakara tujari 'yepi 'diyi geri ndundu eyi onda eyini ani robia eyini esu ri ma omgbo esizu. Kani si, tujari e'ipiru 'diyi ma azi eyi o'bi musoro ofezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera amagoba gaabo, abashuubuzi baingi nibasherura oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha sente zaabo. Kwonka, bakama ba bizinesi abamwe nibagyezaho kwetantara okushashura emishoro.

eng_prompt: Effective leaders inspire and motivate their teams, fostering an environment of trust and collaboration. Their actions and decisions can shape the direction of individuals and organizations alike.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze abalungi bakubiriza n'okuzzaamu ttiimu zaabwe amaanyi, okutumbula embeera y'okwesiga n'okukwatagana. Ebikolwa byabwe n'okusalawo kwabwe bisobola okulungamya abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole.
ach_prompt: Lutela mabeco cuku cwiny ki cuku cwiny luticgi, weko dano bedo ki gen kacel ki winye. Ticgi ki moko tam gi twero yubu yoo me tic pa dano ki dule.
teo_prompt: Engarenok lu iswamaete ejok isinyikokitos ka isinyikokitos itimun kec, aitopolorite aiboisit na amunokina ka aiswamanara. Aswamisinei kec keda aseununeta kec epedorete aitolomun aingarenikinio naka itunga keda iriongeta.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba azi ngapi kililiru 'diyi ava fe azini ava fe amuti yini 'diyi dri, e'yo asi'baza ni azini ti icita ni ma omgbo otuzu. Yeta yini azini e'yo yini pe 'diyi eco driceza 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni azini amuti yi ni 'diyi ma dri ce ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi barungi, nibagaruramu tiimu zaabo amaani, nibareetaho obwesigye n'okukwatanisa. Ebikorwa byabo hamwe n'ebiteiso byabo nibibaasa kureetaho obwebembezi bw'abantu n'ebitongore.

eng_prompt: Maintaining cleanliness is essential for overall health and well-being. Many people overlook the impact that hygiene practices can have on preventing illness and promoting a healthy lifestyle.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu n'obulungi. Abantu bangi babuusa amaaso omugaso gw'obuyonjo mu kutangira endwadde n'okutumbula obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo pire tek tutwal pi yotkom ki kwo maber. Dano mapol cayo ber pa gwoko lengo ikare me gengo two ki ilo malo rwom me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aila erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu keda aijar najokan. Mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis na aila kotoma aitikitik adekasinei ka aitopoloria aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma ta mbaza eri orodriru alata dria si azini aa'ta muke si. Ba karakara eyi asisile alata ni ecozu azo eyi atrizu azini geri aa'zu alata be 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara n'amagara marungi. Abantu baingi tibarikwetegyereza omugasho gw'eby'obuyonjo omu kuzibira endwara n'okureetaho amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Consuming spoiled or improperly stored food can lead to serious health risks. It's important to understand the potential consequences of eating meat that has been left out for too long.
lug_prompt: Okulya emmere eyonoonese oba etaterekeddwa bulungi kiyinza okuvaako obulabe obw'amaanyi eri obulamu. Kikulu okutegeera ebiyinza okuva mu kulya ennyama ebadde erekeddwa okumala ebbanga eddene.
ach_prompt: Camo cam ma obale onyo ma pe kigwoko maber twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom. Pire tek tutwal me niang adwoki pa camo ringo ma kiweko woko pi kare malac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ainyam inyamat lu emunaritos arai lu mam idaritai ejok epedori ayangaun atiokisio nu angaleu. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin atiokisio nuelomunete kanuka ainyam akiring naepikakinitai adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka ezapi azini 'bani ta mba kililiru ku 'diyi ma nyaza eco fe e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi eji ra. Eri orodriru e'yo onzi ecopi 'yepi 'bani za 'bani ku sawa ezu ri nyazu ri ma dria 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Okurya eby'okurya ebishiisire nainga ebitabiikirwe kurungi, nikibaasa kurugwamu akabi kahango aha magara gaawe. N'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kurya enyama etwireho kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: As the holiday season approaches, many families are preparing for festive gatherings and special meals. This increased demand for certain foods has led to a rise in prices across the market.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'ennaku enkulu esembera, amaka mangi geetegekera enkungaana z'ennaku enkulu n'emmere ey'enjawulo. Okweyongera kw'obwetaavu bw'emmere ezimu kuleetedde ebbeeyi okulinnya mu butale.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me karama tye ka cok, gangi mapol tye ka yubbe pi gure ki cam mapat-pat. Medde pa miti pa cam mukene oweko wel cam omede I cuk mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aparasia nuapolok, eutasi ikalia aitemonokin airiamunun keda ainyam na itegelikina. Apol naka eipuda lo kanu inyamat ice eyangau aiyatakin na itiaisinei kosokoni kere.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti natali niri ni ecazu ogogo risi, familia karakara eyi eyi otuta 'ye okuta natali ni 'diyini azini nyaka wura ndusi 'diyini. E'yo 'bani nyaka azi 'diyi lezu tu ri fe aje tuzu cu ma alia dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'ebiro bikuru ku burikuhika haihi, amaka maingi nigatebekanisa enteerane n'eby'okurya by'omutaano. Okwongyera kw'ebyetengo by'eby'okurya ebimwe, kireesire emihendo kweyongyera omu butare.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the market, I noticed a distinct lack of vendors offering fresh meat. It struck me as odd, considering the town's size and the demand for local produce.
lug_prompt: Bwe natambula mu katale, nnakiraba nti tewali batunzi batunda nnyama mpya. Kyanneewuunyisa nnyo bw'olowooza ku bunene bw'ekibuga n'obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebikolebwa wano.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I cuk, aneno ni lucat pe tye ka cato ringo manyen. Onongo nen calo gin ma mwonya tutwal, ka ineno dit pa boma ne ki miti pa jami ma aa ki kany.
teo_prompt: Nealosia eong osokoni abu eong awany ebe emamete agwelanarak lu egwelanarete akiring. Abu eong aomit ebe erai ibore yenitegelikina, kotupitete adoketait na etaun keda eipuda lo iboro lu akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria cu ma alia, ma ndre kini 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma rua za o'diru 'diyi yo. Eri e'da ma dri e'yo onzi ni ru, tawuni 'di ma omgbo azini afa ofule angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo lezu ri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu katare, nkareeba ngu hakaba hatariho abatembeyi abarikuguza enyama nungi. Kikaba kitari kya buriijo ahabw'obuhango bw'orurembo hamwe n'okwetenga kw'ebintu ebirikuruga omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: As consumers become more health-conscious and seek transparency in food sourcing, they are increasingly drawn to establishments that prioritize hygiene and quality. This shift in preference has led to a noticeable change in purchasing habits among local residents.
lug_prompt: Nga abaguzi beeyongera okufaayo ku byobulamu n'okunoonya obwerufu mu kugula emmere, beeyongera okusikirizibwa mu bifo ebikulembeza obuyonjo n'omutindo. Enkyukakyuka eno mu bye baagala ereeseewo enkyukakyuka mu ngeri abatuuze gye bagula ebintu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma luwil tye ka paro pi yotkomgi dok giyenyo adaa I kom kit me wilo cam, gin tye ka cako cako cito I kacato cam ma keto lengo ki rwom me cam obedo gin ma pire tek. Aloka-loka man okelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I kit me wilo jami I kin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kwape epodokinitos agwelak nuka angaleu ka aimo aica kotoma agwel inyamat, ekotosi kesi aiboisio nuisinyikokinitos nuka aila ka adoketait najokan. Aijulanakineta nu ekotos itunga ayangau aijulanakineta kotoma epone loka agwel iboro kanejaas itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa je'ba 'diyi ni ecazu mile be e'yo rua ala ma dria dika eyini lezu e'yo ada be e'yo nyaka jezu 'diyi ma alea, eyi e'yo 'du pari nyaka ozizu alata azini wura muke 'diyi 'duzu okporu 'diyi vu. E'yo 'bani lezu ojazu 'diri fe ojata wura afa jezaniri ma alia 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abaguzi kubarikweyongyera kumanya eby'amagara n'okuronda oburingaaniza omu kugura eby'okurya, nibakunda eby'okurya ebirikworeka obwegyendesereza n'omutindo. Empindahinduka omu by'okwegomba, ereesireho empindahinduka omu mize y'okugura ebintu omu batuura gye.

eng_prompt: As consumer demand continues to rise, many are struggling to afford basic necessities. This has led to growing concerns about price fluctuations and their impact on the economy.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'abaguzi bweyongera okulinnya, bangi balwana okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo. Kino kireetedde okweraliikirira okweyongera ku nkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi n'engeri gye bikosaamu ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa luwil tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ka yele me wilo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Man okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom lok pa wel jami ki adwogi ne I kom biacara.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata eipuda lo agwelak, eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit adumun iboro luipudasi kesi. Eyangau na aiyalongong kanu aijulanakineta nuka itiaisinei keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu drile turia, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi jezu. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza tuzu e'yo ojata aje ma dria azini e'yo yini 'ye e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'abaguzi bigumizemu kweyongyera, baingi nibarwana kugura ebyetengo by'omutaano. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'emihindahinduka y'emihendo hamwe n'omugasho gwayo ahaby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After months of renovations and upgrades, the long-awaited facility is finally ready for operation. Local officials are excited to announce the grand opening of the city abattoir.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuddaabiriza n'okusitula omutindo, ekifo ekirindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene kyaddaaki kyetegefu okutandika okukola. Abakungu b'ebyalo basanyufu okulangirira okuggulawo amaterekero g'ente mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me roco ki medo rwom me tic, ot yat ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac dong tye atera me tic. Lutela me tedero cwinygi yom me yabo ka neko lee I boma madit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokino ka aisiteteun, ekapakina kwana aiboisit na idaritai apak naepol kanu aswam. Eyalamasi eswamak luka atutubet alimor apukor aiboisit naedoere akiring.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia 'bani afa 'diyi edezu o'diru dika eyi ma wura otuzu, pari 'bani ebi te sa'wa ezu ri nga asizu aa'zu ngonde azi ngazu. Azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ayikosi e'yo 'bani pari 'bani 'ba eyi o'dizu aku ambu city niri ma ti zizu ri oluzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhunduuza n'okutunguura ebyombeko, ebyombeko ebirikutegyerezibwa kumara obwire buraingwa, hati byeteekateekire kukora. Abakuru b'ebyaro bashemereirwe kurangirira okwiguraho omwanya gw'okuteereramu amatungo omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower rural families and improve their economic stability, the government has introduced a new initiative. This program aims to provide essential resources to women, recognizing their vital role in household income generation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amaka g'omu byalo n'okutumbula eby'enfuna byabwe, gavumenti ereese enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abakyala ebyetaago ebikulu, nga bamanyi omulimu gwabwe omukulu mu kufuna ensimbi mu maka.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa gangi me caro ki medo rwom me biacara gi, gamente okelo yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo jami ma pigi tego bot mon, kun gingeyo ticgi mapire tek tutwal I kelo lim I gangi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong ikalia lu ocaaloi ka aitojokar ainapakina kec naka ikapun, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aijaikin angor iboro lu itwasamao kanu adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu familia caloa 'diyi ma okpo otuzu dika eyi ma lonyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di 'ba asi afa orodriru 'diyi fezu oku eyidri eyini azi eyini nga robia esuzu aku eyi ma alea ri ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura amaka g'omubyaro n'okutunguura entatsya yaabo, gavumenti ereesireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuheereza abakazi ebintu by'omugasho, erikwetegyereza omurimo gwabo gw'amaani omukureeta entaasya omu maka.

eng_prompt: In many communities, local butchers play a vital role in providing fresh meat to residents. These artisans often build strong relationships with their clientele, ensuring a steady demand for their products.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, abatunzi b'ennyama bakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuwa abatuuze ennyama ennungi. Abakozi b'emikono bano batera okuzimba enkolagana ey'amaanyi ne bakasitoma baabwe, ekikakasa obwetaavu bw'ebintu byabwe obutasalako.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, lucat ringo konyo totwal I miyo ringo manyen bot lwak. Luyub jami magi ipol kare giyubu wat matek tutwal ki luwil gi, ma weko jami gi bedo ki miti I komgi ikare weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, iswamaete agwelanarak akiring naepol noi kanu aijaikin itunga akiring. Etapit acuman ngun adukun eidicane loajokan keda agwelak kec, kanu awanyun ebe ejai eipuda lo iboro kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba anyapa ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi okporu nga 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri za fezu. Ba afa edepi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi tutuni yi ma eselea 'ba yini afa jezu 'diyi pie aa'ta kililiru si eyini ani e'yo 'bani afa edeza eyivile 'diyi lezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, abatembeyi b'enyama nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza abatuuragye enyama. Abakugu omu by'emikono, nibakira kukora enkoragana nungi n'abaguzi baabo, ekirikureetera ebintu byabo kuguma nibyetengwa.

eng_prompt: In a thriving community, the actions and attitudes of individuals play a crucial role in shaping the environment. It raises an important question: Who are the responsible citizens?
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekikulaakulana, ebikolwa n'endowooza z'abantu ssekinnoomu bikola omulimu munene mu kubumba obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo matye ka dongo, tim ki tam pa dano timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yubu kabedo ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejok, aswamisio keda aomisio nuka itunga iswamaete nuepolok noi kotoma aitolomun ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu drile suzaru 'diyi ma alea, 'yeta azini egata 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi azi okporu nga angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma edeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebirikukurakurana, ebikorwa n'emiteekateekyere y'abantu nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhindura eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: I've been feeling a bit sluggish lately and want to make some positive changes in my lifestyle. What are some effective strategies for staying healthy?
lug_prompt: Mbadde mpulira nga ndi mugayaavu ennaku zino era njagala okukola enkyukakyuka ennungi mu bulamu bwange.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka winyo marac tutwal I kare-ni dok amito timo alokaloka mogo mabeco I kwo na.
teo_prompt: Apupi eong epalunit apakio nu ido akoto eong aijaikin aijulanakineta kotoma aijaraka.
lgg_prompt: Ma e'bi ma ma etumu o'du 'diyi ma alia aliaru azini ale ojata azi onyiru 'diyi 'ye ma edri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninyehurira nk'omugayaavu ebiro ebi kandi ninyenda kukora empindahinduka nungi omu magara gangye.

eng_prompt: It is essential to prioritize the health and well-being of expectant mothers during this critical time. Their physical and emotional needs require special attention and consideration.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okukulembeza obulamu n'obulungi bwa bamaama abali embuto mu kaseera kano akazibu. Ebyetaago byabwe eby'omubiri n'ebirowoozo byetaaga okufaayo okw'enjawulo n'okufaayo.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa mon ma oyac I kare man me peko. Miti gi me kom ki kit ma giwinyo kwede omyero ki par pigi.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aisingarenit angaleu keda aijar naka angor nu epotiete kapak kana. Ekotos ipudesia kec luka akwan keda aomisiokec apodokinit ka apodokinit kes.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'bani e'yo rua ala ni azini aa'ta muke ayia okporovu ru 'diyini ri 'duzu okporu sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea. Le 'ba ma 'ba asi afa eyini lele rua si azini e'yo eyini ega 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kwebembeza amagara n'amagara marungi g'abakazi abaine enda omu bwire obu obw'akabi. Ebyetengo byabo by'omubiri hamwe n'eby'enyehurira nibyetenga okureebererwa n'okureebererwa omu muringo gw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, the arrival of a new child is celebrated as a significant milestone. Families often view the birth of a baby as a source of pride and continuity of their lineage.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, okutuuka kw'omwana omupya kujaguzibwa ng'olunaku olukulu. Amaka gatera okutunuulira okuzaalibwa kw'omwana ng'ensibuko y'okwenyumiriza n'okugenda mu maaso kw'olunyiriri lwabwe.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, ki kwero nywal pa latin macalo nino madit tutwal. Gangi ipol kare gineno nywal pa latin macalo gin ma kelo awaka ki mede pa kaka gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, inumunumio adolun naka ikoku kwape aparan naepol noi. Ejenete duc ikalia aidoun naka ikoku kwape aiboisit naka aiyalama keda ainyikokinio naka atekerin kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba anzi eyi ma esuta inzi inzita okporu ni ru. Familia yi o'du driasi mva ma osita ndre ekile afa 'ba eyini aa'zu ayiko si azini familia eyivile 'diyi ni muzu drile ri le.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bwingi, okuzaarwa kw'omwana omusya nikujaguzibwa nk'ekintu ky'omugasho munonga. Amaka nigakira kureeba okuzaarwa kw'omwana nk'oburugo bw'okwehimbisa n'okugumizamu n'oruganda rwabo.

eng_prompt: As the contractions intensified, I gripped the edge of the bed, knowing that the time had finally come. The anticipation mixed with fear filled the room, and I could feel the weight of the moment pressing down on me.
lug_prompt: Ng'okusinda kweyongera, nakwata ku mabbali g'ekitanda, nga mmanyi nti ekiseera kyange kyali kituuse. Okusuubira awamu n'okutya byajjula ekisenge, era nnali mpulira obuzito bw'ekiseera ekyo nga bunnyigiriza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma abedo ka winyo arem matek adada, amako kor kabuto, kun angeyo ni kare ne dong oromo. Bedo ki gen kacel ki lworo opong ki ot, dok onongo atwero winyo pek pa kare ne tye ka diyo wiya.
teo_prompt: Neapolor aiyalongongoka, abu eong adum eiduka, ajeni eong ebe adolu kwana apak. Apotu aiyalongongo keda akuriau kilelebunos toma agola kangin, ido apedori eong apupun apolou naka akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu okposi, ma bi kitanda ma kalatia ra, ani nizu kini sawa 'di eca asizu ra. E'yo egaza tualu ori be 'diyi ga jo ale aliza ma alia tre, azini ma eco te e'yo nziza sawa 'di ma dria 'diyi etumu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obusaasi ku bwayeyongyeire, nkakwata orubaju rw'ekitanda, ndikumanya ngu obwire bwangye bukaba buhikire. Okwerarikirira hamwe n'okutiina bikaruga omu kishengye kyona, kandi nkaba ninyehurira oburemeezi bw'obwire oburiho.

eng_prompt: I'm planning a trip to a region where yellow fever is prevalent, and I want to make sure I'm protected. Can you tell me where I can get immunised from yellow fever?
lug_prompt: Nteekateeka olugendo mu kitundu omuli omusujja gw'enkaka era njagala okukakasa nti nkuumibwa.
ach_prompt: Atye ka yubbe me cito I kabedo ma two yellow fever dwong iye, dok amito neno ni kigwoka maber.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aitemonokin alosit aiboisit naejaatar eimidi loidosoikini akonye, ido akoto eong awanyun ebe eyuwaritai eong.
lgg_prompt: Ma otuta 'ye aci muzu angu azo yellow fever niri ma omgbo angiri 'diyi ma alea, ma le ne ra kini ma ma ta mba ra.
nyn_prompt: Ninteekateeka oruramburo omu kyanga ahu omushwija gw'enkaka gurikujanjaara munonga, kandi ninyenda kuhamya ngu ninkuuma.

eng_prompt: I've been trying to follow up on my recent treatment, but I'm not sure how to access my medical history. Can you guide me on the process for obtaining my medical records from the hospital?
lug_prompt: Mbadde ngezaako okulondoola obujjanjabi bwe nnafuna gye buvuddeko, naye simanyi ngeri gye nnyinza okufunamu ebyafaayo byange eby'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Abedo katemo me lubu kit ma atye ka nongo kwede yat cokcok-ki, ento pe angeyo kit me nongo lok angeya me yotkom.

lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku kwenkanankana okwa nnamaddala kwetaaga okwenyigiramu kwa buli muntu mu kitundu. Kya mugaso nnyo abasajja okuwagira n'okulwanirira eddembe ly'abakyala.
ach_prompt: Cobo miti me bedo marom ikin mon ki coo mito ni dano weng ma ikabedo omyero gubed tye. Pire tek tutwal ki coo me cwako ki lweny pi twero pa mon.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor ekot nginitunganan ajaut toma. Erai ibore yenejok noi ikiliok aigang ka aikeun apedorosio nuka angor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agupi eyini aa'zu oku eyi be trotro ri esuzu ri le 'ba dria ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aa indi. Eri orodriru agupi eyini atita fezu azini a'di 'dizu drilemgbo oku eyini 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: As we start discussing your new venture, it's important to establish your brand identity. Have you thought about what you want to call your business?
lug_prompt: Nga tutandika okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bizineesi yo empya, kikulu okuteekawo ekifaananyi kyo.
ach_prompt: Ka wacako nywako lok I kom biacara ni manyen, pire tek tutwal me niang nyingi.
teo_prompt: Neageuna sio aitemitem nuikamunitos aswam kon naitetet, ejokuna aitolomun ekirorikon.

nyn_prompt: Kuturikutandika kuhanuura aha bizinesi yaawe ensya, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ekika kyawe.

eng_prompt: In response to the economic challenges faced by the community, the government has implemented several new regulations. These measures are designed to foster a supportive environment for entrepreneurs and small enterprises.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna abantu kwe basanga, gavumenti etaddewo amateeka amapya agawerako. Enkola zino zitegekeddwa okusobozesa embeera ennungi eri abasuubuzi n'ebitongole ebitonotono.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can lim ma lwak nongo, gamente oketo cik manyen mapol. Yub magi kiyubu gi me konyo lutim biacara ki biacara matino-tino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun nu ejaas itunga, etolomu apugan ikisila luitetiak luipu. Itemonokinitai iboro lu kanu aitopolor ejautene lo igangit agwelanarak keda ibiasaran ludidik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu e'yo robia nirisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba azita o'diru karakara eyi 'yeta ma alea. Ba o'ba e'yo 'diyi angu atita fezu 'ba tujari 'ye'baa azini tujari nyiria 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho ebiragiro bisya bingi ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obu abantu barikurabamu. Enkora egi etebekanisiibwe okureetaho embeera erikushagika abashubuzi n'ebitongore ebikye.

eng_prompt: The recent changes in regulations have raised concerns among industry experts. Many believe that the new framework is designed to consolidate power among a few key players.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka ezaakakolebwa mu mateeka zireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakugu mu by'amakolero. Bangi balowooza nti enkola empya ekoleddwa okunyweza obuyinza mu bazannyi abakulu abatono.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka matye I cik ma okato cokcok-ki okelo lworo ikin ludiro. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni yub manyen eni kiyubu me jingo tela ikin ludito matino-tino.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka ikisila nupac ayautu aiyalongong kanejaas ipiriotin luka ekampuni. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe itemonokinitai ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aitogogong apugan kanejaas itunga luikidioko.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru azita eyi ma alea 'diyi eji asi otiza 'ba onita angiri be e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini 'ba o'ba geri o'diru 'da okpo 'ba okporu 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka omu biragiro ebiherize kubaho, ereesireho okwerarikirira omu bakugu omu by'obushubuzi. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu enkora ensya etebekanisiibwe okugumya obushoborozi omu bantu bakye abakuru.

eng_prompt: As our company continues to grow and evolve, it's essential to establish guidelines that everyone can follow. This will help us maintain consistency and accountability in our operations.
lug_prompt: Kampuni yaffe bwe yeeyongera okukula n'okukulaakulana, kyetaagisa okuteekawo ebiragiro buli omu by'ayinza okugoberera. Kino kijja kutuyamba okukuuma obutebenkevu n'embalirira mu mirimu gyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ka dul megwa tye kamede ki dongo ki dongo, pire tek tutwal me keto cik ma dano weng twero lubu. Man bikonyo wa me neno ni tic wa tye kawot maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini ekampunikosi apol, ejokuna aitolomun ikisila lu itunga kere epedorete aitup. Ingarakini ngin oni ajaut keda ainapakina keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere iboro wok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ni mu drile zozu azini zoria, eri orodriru azita 'ba dria ni ecozu obizu 'diyi sizu. Di ni nga ama aza ko e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo ama ni 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni yaitu ku erikugumizamu neekura n'okutunguuka, niky'omugasho kutaho ebiragiro ebi buri omwe arikubaasa kukuratira. Eki nikiija kutuhwera kuguma nitugyenda omu maisho kandi tukoresa embaririra omu mirimo yaitu.

eng_prompt: To ensure a clear understanding of the terms and responsibilities, it is essential for both parties to establish a formal arrangement. This helps protect the rights of both landlords and tenants throughout the rental period.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti bategeera bulungi amateeka n'obuvunaanyizibwa, kya mugaso eri enjuyi zombi okuteekawo enteekateeka entongole. Kino kiyamba okukuuma eddembe lya bannannyini mayumba n'abapangisa mu kiseera kyonna eky'okupangisa.
ach_prompt: Pi niang maber I kom cik ki tic mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal pi dul aryo weng me kati ki yub matye. Man konyo gwoko twero pa wegi odi ki lupang ot ikare weng me pango odi.
teo_prompt: Kanu amisiikin nuka ikisila keda aswamisinei, ejokuna noi itunga kere aitolomun acamanar. Ingarakini ngin ayuarite apedorosio nuka ikulepek itogoi keda epagisak kotoma apak naka aipagis.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini e'yo azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi va kililiru, eri orodriru 'ba iri 'diyi dri otita azita palaa 'diyi e'dozu. Diri azakoma fe drilemgbo 'ba angu e'ipiru 'diyi ni azini 'ba pangisa ru 'diyi ma ta mbazu sa'wa dria 'bani angu pangisani ri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho okwetegyereza kurungi ebirikwetengwa n'obujunaanizibwa, n'eky'omugasho amahanga goona kukora enteekateeka. Eki nikiyamba kurinda obugabe bwa bakama b'amaju hamwe n'abapangisa omu bwire bw'okupangisa.

eng_prompt: The challenges faced by coffee farmers have become increasingly evident, as many struggle to connect with buyers who value their quality products. To ensure their livelihoods and promote sustainable practices, it's crucial that we assist them in navigating the marketplace.
lug_prompt: Okusoomoozebwa abalimi b'emmwanyi kwe boolekaganye nakwo kweyongedde okweyoleka, nga bangi balwana okukwatagana n'abaguzi abatwala ebintu byabwe ebyomutindo nga bya muwendo. Okusobola okubeezaawo obulamu bwabwe n'okutumbula enkola ez'obutebenkevu, kikulu nnyo okubayamba okutambula mu katale.
ach_prompt: Peko ma lupur mwanyi nongo tye ka medde ameda, macalo dano mapol gitye ka tute me kube ki luwil ma pwoyo jami gi ma rwom gi malo. Me neno ni kwo gi tye maber ki me tyelo kor yoo me kwo gi, pire tek tutwal ni myero wakony gi me donyo I cuk.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nu etereikina keda akoriok lu emwanyi ewanyunitos noi, naarai etiono adolokin agwelak lu ekotosi iboro lu ejokuka. Kanu aitojokar aijar kec ka aitopolor iponesio luajokak, ejok oni aingarakin kes aimo esokoni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba kawa ezo'ba 'diyini dri fuzu yi be 'diyi eca curu'do e'dazaru, ekile 'ba karakara yi dri ci yi ecizu 'ba afa je'baa afa yini edele wura muke si 'diyi pie. Lezu geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini geri eyini aa'zu ewule ewule 'diyi ma alea ri otuzu, eri orodriru amani eyidri azakoma fezu geri eyini aa'zu cu'a 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi obu abahingi b'omwani barikutunga bweyongyeire kureebeka, ahabw'okugira ngu baingi nibarwana kukwatanisa n'abaguzi abarikutwara ebintu byabo nk'eby'omuhendo. Okureeba ngu babaasa kwebaisaho, n'okureetaho enkora nungi, n'eky'omugasho munonga ngu tubahwere omu kutamburira akatare.

eng_prompt: As the demand for tobacco continues to rise, many farmers are considering entering the industry. However, it's important to understand the potential implications of cultivating this crop.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bwa taaba bweyongera okulinnya, abalimi bangi balowooza ku ky'okuyingira mu mulimu guno. Newankubadde, kya mugaso okutegeera ebiyinza okuva mu kulima ekirime kino.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me mato taa tye ka medde ameda, lupur mapol tye ka tam me donyo I tenge enoni. Kadi bed kumeno, pire tek tutwal me niang adwoki me puru cam man.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo etaba, eutasi akoriok luipu aomoom alomar toma okampuni lo. Konye, ejokuna noi amisiikin atiokisio nuka akoru iraan lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani taba lezu ri ni mu drile tu, 'ba karakara ori ezo'ba 'diyi e'yo ega fizu okalamvu 'di ma alia. Kani si, eri orodriru vata esuzu e'yo ecopi 'yepi ori 'di ma ezoza ma dria ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ekyetengo ky'etaabe kigumizemu kweyongyera, abahingi baingi nibateekateeka okutaahamu. Kwonka, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kuhinga ebihingirwe ebi.

eng_prompt: I'm curious to learn more about your work. Can you tell me what industry you're involved in?
lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya ebisingawo ku mulimu gwo.
ach_prompt: Amito ngeyo jami mapol I kom tici.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuipu nuikamunitos aswam kon.
lgg_prompt: Ma ava be e'yo onizu azi miniri ma dria drile.
nyn_prompt: Nyine ekihika ky'okumanya ebirikukiraho ebirikukwata aha murimo gwawe.

eng_prompt: As we explore successful entrepreneurial ventures in Africa, it's important to identify key players that have made a significant impact in their local markets. In particular, we should focus on Uganda, where innovative businesses are thriving despite various challenges.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tunoonyereza ku buwanguzi bw'obusuubuzi mu Afirika, kikulu okuzuula abazannyi abakulu abakoze kinene mu butale bwabwe obwa wano. Okusingira ddala, tulina okussa essira ku Uganda, bizinensi ez'obuyiiya gye zikulaakulana wadde nga waliwo okusoomoozebwa kungi.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka kwedo yub me timo biacara maber I lobo Afrika, pire tek tutwal me niang lutim biacara mapigi tego ma okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I cuk meggi. Omyero waket cwiny wa tutwalle I kom lobo Uganda, kama biacara manyen tye ka dongo kadi bed ni peko tye mapol.
teo_prompt: Neisisia oni nuka agwelanar najokan ko Africa, ejokuna ajenun aboliak luapolok luiswamaete nuepolok noi kosokonin kec. Ibusakinit oni aisingarenit akiro nuikamunitos Uganda, ne epoloete ibiasaran luitetiak araida ejaas atiokisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo angu tujari 'yezu Africaa drile suzaru 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri orodriru 'ba orodriru e'yo 'yepi angu yini 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'dazu. Le ama ma 'ba asi tuni kari Uganda niri ma dria, tujari o'diru 'diyi ni mu drile e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma emirimo y'obushubuzi erikusingura omuri Afirika, n'eky'omugasho kumanya abazaani abakuru abakozire kihango omu butare bwabo. Okukira munonga, tushemereire kuta amaani ahari Uganda, ahu eby'obushubuzi eby'omutaano biriyo nibyeyongyera n'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bwingi.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the neighborhood, I noticed a variety of storefronts and local establishments. It made me curious about the types of businesses that contribute to the community's economy.
lug_prompt: Bwe natambula mu kitundu, nalaba amaduuka ag'enjawulo n'amaduuka g'omu kitundu. Kyandeetera okwagala okumanya ebika bya bizinensi ebiyamba mu by'enfuna by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I kabedo ne, aneno dukan mapat-pat mapat-pat. Man oweko abedo ki miti me ngeyo kwai biacara ma kelo lim I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit aiboisit, abu eong asesen idukai luegelegela keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Abu ngin ijaik eong akoto aijen iponesio luka ibiasaran lueyangaunete edumune loka ikapun kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria angu ama agei 'diyi ma aliasi, ma ndre pari dukani ndundu 'diyi azini angu tujari 'yezu 'diyi tre. Eri fe ma dri ava tujari esele ongulumu eyi ma lonyi ma omgbo otupi 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: I just wanted to check in with you about your progress. The deadline is approaching quickly, so I wanted to see if you needed any help.
lug_prompt: Njagala kukukebera ku by'ogenda mu maaso. Nsalesale asembera mangu, kale njagala okulaba oba weetaaga obuyambi bwonna.
ach_prompt: Amito niang kit ma itye ka wot kwede. Nino me agiki ne dong cok tutwal, pi meno onongo amito niang kace imito kony mo.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong aingic keda jo nuikamunitos apolokon. Eyapie apaarasia nuka awasia, aso akoto eong aanyun arai ipuda jo aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: Ale lu mi vu e'yo amazu e'yo mini muzu drile ri ma dria. O'du asizuri ni ecaria mbeleru, ka 'dini ale ndre kani mi le azakoza azini ra yari.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba niinyenda kukureeba aha ntunguuka yaawe. Ebiro by'ahamuheru biri haihi kuhika, nahabwekyo nkaba niinyenda kureeba yaaba nooyenda obuhwezi bwona.

eng_prompt: Due to the growing economic opportunities in the region, many entrepreneurs are exploring new markets. As a result, some Ugandans do business in South Sudan.
lug_prompt: Olw'emikisa gy'ebyenfuna egyeyongera mu kitundu, abasuubuzi bangi banoonya obutale obupya. N'ekivuddemu, Bannayuganda abamu bakola bizinensi mu South Sudan.
ach_prompt: Pi dongo pa biacara I but lobo man, lutim biacara mapol tye ka yenyo cuk manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali me Uganda mukene timo biacara I lobo South Sudan.
teo_prompt: Kanuka apol naka ikapun kotoma aiboisit, eutasi agwelanarak luipu aimo isokonin luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete itunga ice luko Uganda ebiasara ko South Sudan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileba e'yo robiani angu 'di ma alea ri ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba tujari 'yepi karakara eyi cuu o'diru 'diyi nda. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma azi eyi tujari 'ye kari South Sudan niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emigisha y'eby'entaasya eyeyongyeire omu kyanga, abashuubuzi baingi bariyo nibaronda obutare obusya. N'ekyarugiremu, abanya Uganda abamwe nibakora bizinesi omuri South Sudan.

eng_prompt: The roof of the house was recently upgraded to accommodate renewable energy sources. As the workers finished the installation, they stepped back to admire their handiwork.
lug_prompt: Akasolya k'ennyumba kaakatongozebwa gyebuvuddeko awo okusobola okussaamu amasannyalaze agava mu bintu ebizzibwa obuggya. Abakozi bwe baamaliriza okuteekamu ebintu, baddayo emabega ne beewuunya emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ki roco wii ot ne cokcok-ki wek obed ki mac ma aa ki icing dano. I kare ma lutic otyeko keto nyonyo ne, gudok cen ka neno jami ma gutiyo.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitemokinai atuluru na etogo pac kanu aitodolikin aiboisio nu itwasamaere akim. Neangetakinatar eswamak aipikakin, apotu kesi kobongutu kanu aisiyalamikin aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Ba otu jo 'di ma jo dri o'diru ecozu geri aci ayupi dika 'diyi ayuzu. Azi'ba 'da eyini afa 'da osuzu dezu 'boria, eyi so pa drile e'yo eyini ede 'diyi ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Eshaho y'enju egi etakahwireho, ekongyerwamu amashanyarazi agarikubaasa kugaruka kubaho. Abakozi ku baaherize kutaho ebyoma, bakagaruka enyima kureeba omurimo gwabo.

eng_prompt: As the healthcare landscape continues to evolve, many institutions are grappling with various operational and financial pressures. Understanding the complexities of hospital management is crucial for identifying potential areas of improvement.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyobulamu yeeyongera okukyuka, ebitongole bingi birwanagana n'okunyigirizibwa kw'emirimu n'ebyensimbi. Okutegeera ebizibu by'enzirukanya y'eddwaliro kya mugaso nnyo mu kuzuula ebifo ebiyinza okulongoosebwamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub me yot kom tye kamede ki dongo, gangi tic mapol tye ka lweny ki peko me tic ki lim. Niang peko matye I tela pa odi yadi pire tek tutwal me niang kama omyero kimed iye rwom me tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi aiboisit naka amukian aijulanakin, ejaas iriongeta luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun keda nuka aswam. Amisiikin atiokisio nuka eyaitene lo adekis erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ajenun aiboisio nuibusakinit aitojokar.
lgg_prompt: Angu alata niri ni mu drile e'doria, angu karakara eyi dri ci e'yo 'yeta ni azini e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie. E'yo ewaru driceza arojo niri ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru angu ecopi otuzu ra 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuringo gw'eby'amagara nigugumizamu niguhinduka, ebitongore bingi nibirwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'emirimo hamwe n'eby'esente. Okwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'okwebembera eirwariro n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kumanya emyanya erikubaasa kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges our community has encountered, we are reaching out for support. Your generosity can make a significant difference in our efforts to overcome these obstacles.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa ekitundu kyaffe kwe kisanga gyebuvuddeko, tusaba obuyambi. Obugabi bwammwe busobola okuleetawo enjawulo mu kaweefube waffe ow'okuvvuunuka ebizibu bino.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak wa tye kanongo cokcok-ki, watye ka penyo pi kony. Cwiny me kica ma itye kwede twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I tutewa me loyo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda atutubetekosi pac, iuta sio adolokin agangat. Ainanakinetekon epedori aitolomun aijulanakineta kotoma agogongu wok naka aipikor atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu amavileri ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, ama atita esu. Afa feza miniri eco ojata okporu eji okpo amani 'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi ndezu ri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu baitu batungire, turiyo nitushaba obuhwezi. Okugaba kwawe nikubaasa kureetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu nteekateeka yaitu y'okusingura oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: Due to the severe storm last night, many areas in the city are experiencing disruptions. As a result, our operations have been significantly impacted.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuyaga ogw'amaanyi ogwabaddewo ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero, ebitundu bingi mu kibuga bitaataaganyizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, emirimu gyaffe gikoseddwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Pi kot ma ocwe matek tutwal laworo i dyewor, pol pa kabedo me boma ne tye ka nongo peko. Macalo adwogi ne, tic wa olokke tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ekwam loapol noi akware nabian, ejaasi aiboisio nuipu nuka eibuga keda ationis. Kanuka ngun, etirorit aswamisiowok noi.
lgg_prompt: Oli okporu ini ajerisi ri ma e'yosi, angu karakara aku ambu city niri ma alea 'diyi e'yo eyi esu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ebi ovu onzi onzi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eihunga ry'amaani ekiro kya nyomwebazyo, emyanya mingi omu rurembo etungire obutabanguko. N'ekyarugiremu,emirimo yaitu eteganiisibwemu munonga.

eng_prompt: With a dedicated team of professionals and state-of-the-art facilities, we prioritize patient care above all else. Many residents trust us for their medical needs, knowing they will receive exceptional treatment.
lug_prompt: Nga tulina abakugu abajjumbidde n'ebikozesebwa eby'omulembe, tukulembeza okulabirira abalwadde okusinga ebirala byonna. Abatuuze bangi batwesiga olw'ebyetaago byabwe eby'obujjanjabi, nga bakimanyi nti bajja kufuna obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ki dul pa ludiro ki odi yadi ma rwom gi lamal tutwal, waketo gwoko lutwo bedo gin ma pire tek loyo jami weng. Lutedero mapol geno wa pi kony me yot komgi, kun gingeyo ni gubi nongo kony me yot kom maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Keda etimu loka ipirioitin keda aiboisio nuegelegela, isingarenit sio aidar adekak adepar icie iboro. Itunga luipu emunokina sio kanu amukian kec, ejenete ebe epote kesi adumun amukian na itegelikina.

teo_prompt: Apolor noi esokoni loka akinyeta kotoma akwap kere. Kwape ekotosi agwelak iboro lu iswamao keda iboro lu iswamao ejok, ejai ibore yenitegelikina adepar luce.

eng_prompt: In response to the challenges posed by climate change and disease, researchers have been exploring innovative agricultural solutions. As part of this effort, new species of bananas have been introduced to ensure continuous productivity.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okuva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'endwadde, abanoonyereza babadde banoonyereza ku ngeri empya ez'okulima n'okulunda. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ebika by'amatooke ebipya bitongozeddwa okukakasa nti ebibala bigenda mu maaso.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ojata angu mile ni azini azo eyini eji 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi ebi geri ndundu agirikica ni 'diyi onda. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do a'bua esele o'diru 'diyi nezu ra kini a'bua eyi ma ezota mu drile.

eng_prompt: As urban agriculture gains popularity, many city dwellers are exploring innovative ways to utilize limited land. One such method that has emerged is the practice of raising poultry in compact environments.

eng_prompt: In response to the declining yields and increasing challenges faced by local farmers, the initiative aims to provide essential resources and training. By addressing these critical issues, the project will empower banana growers to continue with banana production.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okukendeera kw'amakungula n'okweyongera kw'okusoomoozebwa abalimi b'omu kitundu kwe boolekaganye nakwo, enteekateeka egenderera okuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa n'okutendekebwa.
