ach_prompt: Pi dwoko piny rwom me kac ki peko ma lupur me tedero tye ka kato ki iye, yub eni tye ki miti me miyo kony ki pwonye ma mite pi lupur me tedero. I yoo me tyeko peko magi mapigi tego, yub eni obi konyo lupur labolo me mede ki puru labolo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aibiror naka ikorion keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda akoriok luka atutubet, alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aijaikin iboro ka aitutuoro. Kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio nu, ebuni epurojekt aitigogong akoriok etaget kanu ainyikokin aitolom etaget.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma dria eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma omgbo esizu azini eꞌyo ewaru ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ni esu ꞌdiyi ma dria, eꞌyo ꞌdi ma asisile afa ꞌbani lele ꞌdiyi fezu E'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu risi, otita 'di ni nga okpo fe 'ba a'bua ezo'ba 'diyi dri muzu a'bua ezoza be drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihingirwe okukyendera hamwe n'oburemeezi obweyongyeire obu abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro barikutunga, ekigyendererwa n'okuheereza abantu eby'okukoresa n'okutendeka. Omu kukora aha nshonga ezi, purogyekiti neija kuhwera abahingi b'ebitookye kugumizamu n'okubihinga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, agricultural practices have evolved significantly, leading to advancements in crop management and sustainability. As a result, farmers have focused on enhancing the quality of their produce to meet consumer demands.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enkola z'obulimi zikulaakulanye nnyo, ekiviiriddeko enkulaakulana mu nzirukanya y'ebirime n'okuyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi batadde essira ku kutumbula omutindo gw'ebirime byabwe okusobola okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abaguzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub me pur olokke tutwal, ma okelo dongo lobo I tenge me gwoko cam ki gwoko jami apita. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur oketo cwinygi i kom medo rwom me camgi wek ocob miti pa luwil.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi iponesio luka akor, ido ayangau apolo kotoma aidar iraan keda aidar ejok. Kanuka ngun, apodokinit akoriok aitojokar adoketait na iraanakec kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi eca curu'do onyiru tu, e'yo fepi zota e'yo ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi 'ba asi afa yini ofule 'diyi ma wura otuzu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, enkora y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ehindukire munonga, ekirikureetaho entunguuka omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi bateire amaani omu kutunguura omutindo gw'ebihingirwe byabo, kugira ngu bahikiirize ebyetengo by'abaguzi.

eng_prompt: The government is implementing new policies to boost agricultural productivity and attract foreign investment. As a result, farmers are encouraged to adopt modern farming techniques and expand their operations.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti eri mu kuteeka mu nkola enkola empya okutumbula ebyobulimi n'okusikiriza abasiga nsimbi okuva ebweru w'eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi bakubirizibwa okwettanira enkola z'okulima ez'omulembe n'okugaziya emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Gamente tye ka keto cik manyen itic me medo rwom me pur ki kelo lim ilobo ma woko. Macalo adwogi ne, kicuku cwiny lupur me tic ki diro me pur ma ite kare ni me medo rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Euta apugan aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aitopolor akoru ka aisukunyun ibiasaran luka akwapin ace. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitai akoriok aitwasam iponesio lu akoru luakwana kanu aitanyanyar aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni azita o'diru 'diyi 'ba e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika lonyi vuti aleza engapi kari amve 'diyi vu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eka 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi geri ori ezoza ni ewu curu'do 'diyi 'duzu dika eyi ma tujari ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eriyo neetaho engyenderwaho nsya y'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'okureeta abashubuzi kuruga aheeru y'eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi n'abariisa nibahigwa okukoresa emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa ey'omurembe, babaase kwongyera aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Access to modern farming equipment is essential for improving agricultural productivity. To support local farmers and enhance their livelihoods, it is crucial to provide shared resources within each community.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebyuma by'okulimirako eby'omulembe kya mugaso mu kutumbula amakungula g'ebyobulimi. Okuyambako abalimi b'omu kitundu n'okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu, kikulu nnyo okugabana ebintu mu buli kitundu.
ach_prompt: Nongo jami pur ma ite kare ni pire tek tutwal pi medo rwom me pur. Me konyo lupur me tedero ki ilo malo rwom me kwo gi, pire tek tutwal me poko jami ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Adumunun iswamasia lu akoru lu apakio nu ejok kanu aitojokar eswamae lo akoru. Kanu aigang akoriok luka atutubet ka aitojokar aijarakec, ejokuna noi aimor iboro kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Afa ori ezozani ewu curu'do 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru afa ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atizu dika eyi ma edri otuzu, eri orodriru afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu o'bi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga ebyoma by'obuhingi eby'omurembe n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro n'okutunguura emituurire yaabo, n'eky'omugasho munonga okugabana ebintu omu buri kyanga.

eng_prompt: The agricultural sector is facing numerous obstacles, including climate change, market fluctuations, and resource scarcity. To ensure food security and sustainable practices, it is crucial to provide assistance to those who cultivate our land.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi kisanga obuzibu bungi, omuli enkyukakyuka y'obudde, enkyukakyuka mu katale, n'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa. Okusobola okuba n'emmere ennungi n'enkola ennungi, kikulu nnyo okuwa obuyambi abo abalima ettaka lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Tenge me pur tye ka nongo peko mapol, ma I kingi obedo alokaloka me piny, alokaloka me cuk ki can lim. Me neno ni cam tye ma oporre pi anyim, pire tek tutwal me miyo kony bot lupur.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi erionget loka akor keda atiokisio nuipu, aimoriarit aijulujuleta nuka ekuse, aijulanakineta nuka esokoni keda aikidiokus na iboro. Kanu awanyun ebe ejaas inyamat keda iponesio luajokak, ejokuna noi aijaikin agangat mama ejaasi ngul luekoriete alupok wok.
lgg_prompt: Esele agrikica niri ni e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu tualu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu 'diyi pie, e'yo cuu ni ojazu 'diyi pie azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako pie. Nyaka ma tambaza kililiru azini 'yeta muke 'diyi, eri orodriru azakoma fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa kiine oburemeezi bwingi, otwariiremu empindahinduka y'obwire, empindahinduka y'akatare hamwe n'eibura ry'ebintu. Okureeba ngu hariho eby'okurya ebirikumara, n'eky'omugasho okuheereza obuhwezi abo abarikuhinga eitaka ryaitu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, local communities have sought sustainable agricultural practices to improve their livelihoods. As a result, many have turned to banana cultivation as a viable source of income.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, abantu b'omu kitundu banoonyezza enkola z'obulimi ez'olubeerera okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu. N'ekivuddemu, bangi baddukidde mu kulima amatooke ng'ensibuko y'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak me tedero guyenyo yoo me pur matye anyim me ilo malo rwom me kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol dong gucako puru labolo macalo yoo me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ekotosi itunga luka atutubet iwaitin lu akoru lu eyuwara kanu aitojokar aijar kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu koloto akoru etaget kwape epone loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nda geri agirikica eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi curu'do a'bua ezo geri azi eyini ecozu robia esuzu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu b'omubyaro batandikire kuronda emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikubaasa kutunguura emituurire yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi batandikire kuhinga ebitookye nk'oburugo bw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: As consumers become more conscious of sustainability and ethical sourcing, they are seeking out products that support local economies. This shift in consumer behavior is driving a notable trend in global trade dynamics.
lug_prompt: Nga abaguzi beeyongera okufaayo ku buwangaazi n'okugula ebintu mu ngeri ey'empisa, banoonya ebintu ebiyamba ebyenfuna by'omu kitundu. Enkyukakyuka eno mu nneeyisa y'abaguzi ereetawo enkulaakulana mu by'obusuubuzi mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma luwil tye ka dongo ngecgi I kom gwoko kwo ki cato jami maber, gitye ka yenyo jami ma cwako biacara me tedero. Aloka-loka man me kit luwil tye ka kelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I lok me cato wil I wilobo.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejenete agwelak nuikamunitos ejautene loajokan keda agwel iboro, eutasi kesi aimo iboro lu igangitos edumune loka ikapun. Aijulanakineta kotoma iponesio luka agwelak kes eyangaunit aijulanakineta kotoma agwelanar naka akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa je'ba 'diyi ni ecazu e'yo egazu e'yo ewu drialeri ma dria azini afa jeza kililiru ri ma dria, eyi afa ecopi atita fepi e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nda. Ojata 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma adriza ma alia 'diri e'yo 'yepi tujarani wudrikurusiri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abaguzi kubarikweyongyera kumanya ebirikukwata aha ntwaza n'obuhangwa, nibaronda ebintu ebirikuhwera eby'entaasya y'eihanga. Empindahinduka omu mitwarize y'abaguzi, niyo erikureetaho empindahinduka omu by'obushubuzi omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: Effective financial management is crucial for any business to ensure sustainability and growth. One key aspect of this process is understanding the company's financial health through detailed assessments.
lug_prompt: Enkwata y'ensimbi ennungi ya mugaso nnyo eri bizinensi yonna okusobola okuwangaala n'okukulaakulana. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno kwe kutegeera embeera ya kampuni ey'ebyensimbi okuyitira mu kwekenneenya mu bujjuvu.
ach_prompt: Tic ki lim maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi biacara mo keken me dongo. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo niang kit ma dul ne tye kwede I lok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Aidar ikapun ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka ebiasara kere kanu awanyun ebe ejai apol keda apol. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi amisiikin ejautene loka ikapun luka ekampuni kopone loka aingic ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru tujari ci eyini ani zozu. E'yo azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri eri e'yo amuti 'da ma robia ni aa'zu muke ri ma eti ondazu geri 'bani e'yo nde ma ale andrizu kililiru risi.
nyn_prompt: Okukoresa kurungi esente n'eky'omugasho munonga omu bizinesi yoona okubaasa kutunguuka n'okutunguuka. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru omu nkora egi n'okumanya esente za kampuni kurabira omu kushwijuma gye.

eng_prompt: As the demand for sustainable and eco-friendly products rises, more farmers are exploring the lucrative opportunities in the palm oil industry. This shift in agricultural focus is leading to a notable surge in the number of palm oil growers in the country.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebiwangaala n'ebitali bya bulabe eri obutonde bw'ensi bweyongera, abalimi bangi banoonyereza ku mikisa egivaamu ssente mu makolero g'ebinazi. Enkyukakyuka eno ey'okussa essira ku byobulimi ereetedde okweyongera okw'amaanyi mu muwendo gw'abalimi b'ebinazi mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kit macalo miti pa jami ma pe balo cwec ma orumuwa tye ka medde, lupur mapol tye ka yenyo gum me nongo cente madwong I tenge me yubu moo gasi. Alokaloka man me keto cwiny I kom pur tye ka weko wel lupit yat gasi me moo tye ka medde tutwal I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo iboro lu mam itwasamaete ekwam, eutasi akoriok luipu aingic arerengesio nu edumununete ikapun luipu kotoma okampuni loka akinyet naka idukudukun. Aijulanakineta kotoma akoru eyangauni aiyatakinio naka enaaba loka akoriok luitolomete idukudukun akinyet kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu afa ecopi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea ra azini angu amani aa'zu alenia ku 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri si, 'ba karakara amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi drileba orodriru okalamvu odu pati o'diru 'diyiniri ma alea 'diyi onda. Ojata 'di e'yo agirikica niri ma dria ri ni fe kalafe 'ba pati o'bu 'diyi ezo'ba kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'ebintu ebirikubaasa kugumaho kandi ebitarikutokooza eby'obuhangwa byeyongyeire, abahingi baingi bariyo nibasherura emigisha y'amajuta g'ebinazi. Okuhindura omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa nikireetaho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abahingi b'ebinazi omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the oil palm industry has encountered numerous obstacles that threaten its sustainability and productivity. To ensure the long-term viability of this crucial sector, it is essential to tackle these pressing issues head-on.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, amakolero g'ebinazi gafunye ebizibu bingi ebitabangula obuwangaazi bwago n'amakungula gaago. Okukakasa obuwangaazi bw'ekitongole kino ekikulu, kya mugaso okukola ku nsonga zino ez'amangu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, biacara me tedo yadi ola tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal matye ka balo rwom me ticgi. Me neno ni tenge man ma pire tek ni omede ki tic pi kare malac, pire tek tutwal me cobo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, adumutu ikampunin luka idukudukun iboro luipu luepedorete aimusung eswamae kec. Kanu awanyun ebe epedori erionget lo aijar apak naepol, ejokuna aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, okalamvu odu pati eyi ma dria 'diyi esu e'yo karakara eyi ecopi e'yo eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea dika afa eyini ofule 'diyi ma omgbo esipi ra 'diyi. E'yo orodriru esele orodriru 'di ma ta mbazu ewu ezu ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu drile.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, amakorero g'ebinazi gatungire oburemeezi bwingi oburikuteganisa entunguuka yaago hamwe n'obuhingi bwago. Okureeba ngu ekitongore eki kikagumaho kumara obwire buraingwa, ni kikuru okukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: In today's society, financial stability is essential for meeting basic needs and achieving personal goals. As a result, individuals often seek various means to support themselves and their families.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, obutebenkevu mu by'ensimbi bwa mugaso mu kutuukiriza ebyetaago n'ebiruubirirwa by'omuntu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu banoonya engeri ez'enjawulo okweyimirizaawo n'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kwo me kare-ni, bedo ki cente maber pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa dano ki cobo miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ipol kare gi yenyo yoo mapat-pat me gwoko kwo gi ki gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, ejokuna aiboisit naka ikapun kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga ka aitodolikin alosikinetekec. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga aimo iponesio luegelegela lu igangakinete kes keda ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, aa'ta kililiru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu azini e'yo mini lele 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba yi geri ndundu nda yi atizu yi ma ngulupi azini familia yini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, okutereera omu by'empiiha n'eky'omugasho omu kuhikiiriza ebyetengo n'ebigyendererwa by'omuntu. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okwebaisaho hamwe n'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost agricultural production and support local economies, the government has announced a new initiative. This program aims to enhance the cultivation of cash crops in rural areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi n'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula okulima ebirime eby'okutunda mu byalo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo rwom me pur ki dongo lobo, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom me puru cam me acata icaro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor akoru ka aigangia ikapun luka atutubet, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitojokar akoru na iraan lu itwasamao kocaaloi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ori ezoza ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri, gamete azi e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu ori ezoza tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu caluru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya. Enteekateeka egi egyendereire kutunguura okuhinga kw'ebihingirwe ebirikuguzibwa omu byaro.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about agricultural development, community leaders emphasized the need for sustainable practices. They highlighted the importance of establishing local processing facilities to support the region's palm oil industry.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nkulaakulana y'ebyobulimi, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakikkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'enkola eziwangaala. Baalaga obukulu bw'okuteekawo ebifo ebirongoosa amafuta g'enkindu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom dongo lobo I tenge me pur, lutela me kabedo mapatpat guwaco ni omyero ki tii ki yoo mapat-pat matye I kare-ni. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me yubu kabedo me yubu moo pa dano wek okony tic me yubu moo pa dano I but piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos apol naka akor, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitogogongoto eipud loka aitodolikin iponesio luajokak. Apotu kesi kitetemoto ajokis naka adukun aiboisio nu iswamaere akinyet naka idukudukun katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza e'yo agirikica ma ezota ma dria o'diru 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba asi e'yo 'yeta muke 'diyi ma dria. Eyi nze e'yo orodri angu 'bani afa edeza edezu 'diyi sizu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atita fezu okalamvu odu pati eyi ma edeta ni angu 'da ma alea ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha ntunguuka y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakahamya ekyetengo ky'okukoresa emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumaho. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okutandikaho ebyoma by'okutereeza amajuta g'ebinazi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In a community initiative aimed at fostering economic growth, local leaders introduced a new program to support entrepreneurship. As a result, residents were encouraged to explore various business ventures that aligned with their skills and interests.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'ekitundu agenderera okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baayanjudde enteekateeka empya ey'okuwagira eby'obusuubuzi. N'ekyavaamu, abatuuze baakubirizibwa okunoonyereza ku bizinensi ez'enjawulo ezaali zikwatagana n'obukugu bwabwe n'ebyo bye baali baagala.
ach_prompt: I yub ma lwak tye kwede me kelo dongo lobo, lutela me tedero gukelo yub manyen me cwako biacara. Macalo adwogi ne, ki cuku cwiny lutedero me timo biacara mapat-pat malube ki diro gi ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka atutubet kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun, apotu engarenok itolomutu ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigang agwelanar. Kanuka ngun, aponi isinyikokinai itunga aingic ibiasaran luegelegela luepedorete aitodolikin acoa kec keda ipudesiakec.
lgg_prompt: Otita ongulumu eyini 'bani lezu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri ma alea, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi e'do otita azi o'diru ni atita fezu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eka 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tujari ndundu eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'ekyanga erikugyenderera okutunguura eby'entaasya, abebembezi b'ebyaro batandikireho puroguraamu nsya y'okushagika eby'obushubuzi. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye bakahigwa okushwijuma eby'obushubuzi ebitarikushushana n'emyoga yaabo hamwe n'ebi barikukunda.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, addressing the needs and challenges faced by communities is more crucial than ever. Therefore, any new initiative must focus on enhancing the well-being of individuals and families.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, okukola ku byetaago n'okusoomoozebwa ebitundu bye bisanga kikulu nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. N'olwekyo, enteekateeka yonna empya erina okussa essira ku kutumbula obulamu bw'abantu ssekinnoomu n'amaka.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni, cobo miti ki peko ma lwak nongo pire tek tutwal. Pi meno, yub mo keken manyen omyero oket cwinygi I kom medo rwom me kwo pa dano ki gangi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina atipet, aitemokin ipudesia keda atiokisio nu ejaas itunga erai ibore yenepol noi adepar kapakio nukokau. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit aswam naitetet aitogogong aijar naka itunga keda ikalia.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru oja'ba mbeleru andruri ma alia, e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Ka'dini, le e'yo azi o'diru ni ma 'ba asi 'bazu aa'ta muke 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni azini familia eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, okukora ahabyetaago n'oburemeezi obu abantu barikurabamu n'eky'omugasho munonga. N'ahabw'ekyo, ekigyendererwa kyona ekisya kishemereire kuta amaani omu kutunguura emituurire y'abantu hamwe n'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: I've been hearing a lot of news about political unrest and social issues lately. Can someone fill me in on the current situation?
lug_prompt: Mbadde mpulira amawulire mangi agakwata ku butabanguko mu byobufuzi n'ensonga z'embeera z'abantu ennaku zino.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka winyo lok angeya mapol I kom jemo me cungu iwi bye ki peko me kwo pa lwak ikare-ni.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong iyemuto luipu nuikamunitos amumu naka epolitikis keda akiro nuka itunga apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi o'duko e'yo ngiringiri politiki ni azini e'yo o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eri curu'do tre.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire nimpurira amahurire maingi agarikukwata aha butabanguko omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'eshonga z'abantu ebiro ebi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost agricultural productivity and support local farmers, the government has announced a new initiative. As part of this program, the ministry will distribute palm oil seeds to the farmers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi n'okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, minisitule ejja kugabira abalimi ensigo z'ebinazi.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me pur ki konyo lupur me tedero, gamente otito yub manyen. Macalo but yub man, gangkal obi poko kodi pa tyang bot lupur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong akoru ka aigang akoriok luka atutubet, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, ebuni erionget aikor ikinyom luka idukudukun mama ejaasi akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ori ezoza ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri, gamete azi e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu 'di ni mu ori pati oli ni 'diyi awa 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'okushagika abahingi n'abariisa b'omwihanga, gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture neija kugabira abahingi embibo y'ebinazi.

eng_prompt: In response to rising global demand for sustainable agricultural products, officials have been evaluating strategies to boost local industries. As part of this initiative, the government will increase funds for palm oil production.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi obweyongera mu nsi yonna, abakungu babadde beekenneenya engeri y'okutumbula amakolero mu ggwanga. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ejja kwongera ensimbi mu kufulumya amafuta g'ebinazi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me jami apura ma dongo I wilobo lung, lutic gubedo katamo I kom yoo mapat-pat me tyelo kor tic mapat-pat matye I tedero. Macalo but yub man, gamente bimedo cente me yubu moo gasi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akwap kere lo iboro lu akoru lu iswamaete ejok, eutasi eswamak airereonor iwaitin lu itopoloere icuman luka akwapuwok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni apugan aiyatakin ikapun luka aitolomio naka akinyet naka idukudukun.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi e'bi geri 'bani ecozu okalamvu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma ale andri e'yo 'bani lezu wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete ni mu robia fele okalamvu odu pati o'diru 'diyiniri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu nsi yoona, ab'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okutunguura amakorero g'omwihanga. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, gavumenti neija kwongyera esente z'okukora amajuta g'ebinazi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for palm oil has surged due to its versatility and widespread use in various products. As a result, local farmers have been motivated to expand their cultivation efforts to meet this growing market need.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'amafuta g'ebinazi bweyongedde olw'engeri gye gakozesebwa mu bintu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi b'omu kitundu bakubiriziddwa okwongera amaanyi mu kulima okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'akatale buno obweyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti me moo tedo omede tutwal pi tic kwede mapol tutwal I jami mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur me tedero gunongo tekcwiny me medo rwom me pur gi me cobo miti me cuk matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor eipud loka akinyet naka idukudukun naarai epedori aswam iboro luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitai akoriok luka atutubet aiyatakin akoru kec kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, lezu odu pati o'diru 'diyiniri tu ra e'yo erini ovuzu afa ndu ndu 'diyi ma alia azini ayuzuri ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu ava okpo eyini amvu 'yazu ri ma omgbo otuzu eyini ani e'yo cuu ni tupi tutu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, obwetago bw'amajuta g'ebinazi bweyongyeire ahabw'okukoresibwa munonga omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi b'omubyaro batungire amaani g'okwongyera aha buhingi bwabo, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'akatare.

eng_prompt: During their meeting, the president expressed interest in the country's economic development. In response, the minister prepared a detailed report highlighting key advancements.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwabwe, pulezidenti yalaze obwagazi mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna by'eggwanga. Mu kwanukula, minisita yategeka alipoota enzijuvu ng'eraga enkulaakulana enkulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke meggi, ladit lobo onyuto miti me dongo lobo I tenge me lim. Macalo lagam, minista ocoyo adwogi tic matut ma nyutu dongo lobo mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kec abu lokapolon akwap kitodu eipud loka apol naka ikapun kotoma akwapuwok. Kanu abongokin, abu eminista kitemok eripoota lo itodunit apol.
lgg_prompt: Sawa yini dri fuzurisi, prisdent ece ava e'yo zota e'yo robiani kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra. Omvitaniria, minisita 'da si o'duko siza angiri e'yo angu ezoma ni okporu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rwabo, omwebembezi weihanga akooreka ngu nayenda entunguuka y'eihanga omu by'entaasya. Omu kugarukamu, minisita akatebeekanisa ripoota erikworeka entunguuka y'amaani.

eng_prompt: Integrating livestock into agricultural practices can enhance sustainability and provide additional sources of income. By diversifying their operations, farmers can improve soil health and reduce reliance on chemical fertilizers.
lug_prompt: Okuyingiza ebisolo mu byobulimi kisobola okwongera ku buwangaazi n'okuwa ensibuko z'ensimbi endala. Mu kukola ebintu eby'enjawulo, abalimi basobola okulongoosa embeera y'ettaka n'okukendeeza ku kwesigama ku bigimusa eby'eddagala.
ach_prompt: Rwom me gwoko lee I tenge me pur twero medo rwom me kwo pa dano ki bene kelo yoo me nongo lim mukene. Ka lupur guyubo jami mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat
teo_prompt: Aimorikikin ibaren toma oriongeta lu akoru epedori aitojokar aijar ka aijaikin ikapun luipu. Kowai lo aijulakin aswamisio kec, epedorete akoriok aitojokar alupok kec ka aitidisiar aitosom ebolia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyapa eyi ma tambazu e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma alea ri eco geri eyini ecozu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eco geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra. Geri 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu risi, eyi eco nyaku ma rua ala otu dika eyi eco asi 'ba afa nyakuni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutwarira amatungo omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa nikibaasa kureetaho entunguka n'oburugo bw'entaasya obundi. Abahingi n'abariisa ku barikuhindura emirimo yaabo, nibabaasa kwongyera aha magara g'eitaka n'okutuubya aha kukozesa orwezo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote sustainability and encourage eco-friendly transportation, the local government has proposed new guidelines for council members. As part of these guidelines, all local council chairpersons need to at least have a bicycle.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula entambula etali ya bulabe eri obutonde bw'ensi, gavumenti y'ebitundu eteesezza ebiragiro ebipya eri bammemba b'akakiiko. Ng'ekimu ku biragiro bino, bassentebe b'obukiiko bw'ebitundu bonna beetaaga waakiri okuba n'obugaali.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor yub me wot ma pe balo cwec ma orumuwa, gamente me tedero okati ki cik manyen pi lumemba me kancil. Macalo but cik man, lutela me tedero weng omyero gubed ki lela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor aijar naejok ka aisinyikokit elose loajokan, abu apugan naka atutubet itolomun aicoreta nuitetiak mama ejaasi imeeban luka ekansulo. Kwape ediope kotoma aicoreta nu, ekot lukapolok luka ekansulo kere ajaut keda igalin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo angu ta mbazani 'diyi otuzu azini geri acizu angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbapi muke 'diyi otuzu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri fe egata azita o'diru 'diyi memba kanisulu ni 'diyi dri. Azita 'diyi ma azi ru, le 'ba dria ogua e'ipi local council ru 'diyi ma ovu ogogo gari be ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entambura nungi, gavumenti y'ebyaro eteireho ebiragiro bisya aha ba memba b'akakiiko. Nk'emwe aha biragiro ebi, abebembezi b'obukiiko bw'ebyaro boona bashemereire kugira egaari.

eng_prompt: To effectively reach remote communities and provide essential services, extension workers require reliable transportation. The current fleet is outdated and insufficient for their growing demands.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka obulungi mu byalo n'okuwa obuweereza obwetaagisa, abakugu mu by'entambula beetaaga entambula eyeesigika. Ennyonyi eziriwo kati zikaddiye era tezimala kukola ku byetaago byabwe ebigenda byeyongera.
ach_prompt: Pi oo I kabedo matye icaro ki miyo kony ma pire tek, lutic ma konyo luwot omyero gubed ki yoo me wot ma genne. Mutoka ma gitye kwede kombedi kare gi okato woko dok pe romo cobo miti gi matye kamede ameda.
teo_prompt: Kanu adolokin aiboisio nu ocaalo ejok ka aijanakin ejanakine lo epol ajokis, ekotosi eswamak lu aijanakin itunga elose lo ejok. Iporotoi lu ejaas kwape kwana emojongitos ido mam edoli aitodolikin ipudesia kec lu iyata.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu angu calo ru 'diyi ma alea kililiru azini azi orodriru 'diyi fezu, azi'ba angu ezoma ni 'diyi le geri acizu kililiru 'diyi. Motokari eyi ma sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma sa'wa aga 'bo dika eyi cani e'yo eyini le tupi tutu 'diyi 'yezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Okuhika kurungi omu byaro n'okuheereza obuheereza, abakozi b'eby'obuhangwa nibetenga engyenda nungi. Ebikwato ebiriho hati byahwaireho kandi tibirikumara ebyetengo byabo ebirikuguma nibikura.

eng_prompt: Many small-scale farmers struggle to connect with larger distribution networks. As a result, they often miss out on lucrative opportunities to sell their products.
lug_prompt: Abalimi abatonotono bangi bafuba okweyunga ku mikutu eminene egy'okutambuza ebintu. N'ekivuddemu, tebatera kufuna mikisa gya kutunda bintu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Lupur matino-tino mapol nongo tek tutwal me kube ki dul mapat-pat madongo. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi rwenyo gum me cato jami gi.
teo_prompt: Akoriok luipu lu ikidioko etionikinit arucokina keda iponesio luepolok lu ekorio. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi atwaniar arerengesio nuka agwelanar iborokec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba kalafe weresi 'diyi dri ci yi ecizu geri 'bani ori eyi awazu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni drileba orodriru afa eyini ede 'diyi ozizu 'diyi avi.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa bakye nibarwana kwegaita aha mikutu mikuru y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Ekyarugiremu, nibafeerwa emigisha y'okuguza ebintu byabo.

eng_prompt: One effective method for extending the shelf life of dairy products is through pasteurization. This process eliminates harmful bacteria, allowing for safer storage and consumption.
lug_prompt: Engeri emu ennungi ey'okwongera ku bbeeyi y'ebintu ebiva mu mata kwe kuyita mu pasteurization. Enkola eno egyawo obuwuka obw'obulabe, ne kisobozesa okutereka n'okulya obulungi.
ach_prompt: Yo acel maber tutwal me medo kare me tic pa jami ma kiyubu ki I kom cak en aye me yubu jami ma kiyubu ki I kom cak. Yub man kwanyo kwidi maraco, weko gwoko ki camo gi bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aiyatakin aijar naka iboro lu akile erai aisiteteun. Elemari epone lo ibakitin lu erono, ijaikini aidar ka ainyam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu afa edele lesusi 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri eri geri 'bani afa edele lesusi 'diyi ma ta mbazuri'i. Geri 'di ni bacteria onzi 'diyi odro, erini fezu eyi ma tambazu kililiru azini eyi ma nyazu.
nyn_prompt: Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okwongyera obwire obu ebintu ebirikuruga omu mate birikubaasa kugumaho n'okubihunduuza. Enkora egi neecwekyereza obukooko bw'obukooko oburikubaasa kukora akabi, ekirikwikiriza okurinda n'okurya kurungi.

eng_prompt: The new testing device has been developed to ensure food safety standards are met. With its advanced technology, it is capable of providing accurate evaluations.
lug_prompt: Ekyuma ekipya eky'okukebera kikoleddwa okukakasa nti omutindo gw'obukuumi bw'emmere gugobererwa. Ne tekinologiya waayo ow'omulembe, esobola okuwa okubalirira okutuufu.
ach_prompt: Kiyubu Cuma manyen me pimo cam me neno ni rwom me gwoko cam tye maber. Ki diro me tet manyen ma en tye kwede, en twero miyo ngec matir.
teo_prompt: Etolomun acuma naitetet na ainwakio kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinitai adoketait na ayuwara na inyamat. Keda etatai loakwana, epedori ngesi aitodun ajenanut na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do afa o'diru 'bani afa eyi o'bizu 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba eyi 'ye wura nyaka eyini aa'zu muke ri ma vuti. E'yo tekenologiani uru 'diyisi, eri eco e'yo eti ondaza kililiru 'diyi fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyoma ebisya ebirikukyebera eby'okurya, bikozirwe kureeba ngu ebiragiro by'okurinda eby'okurya nibihikirizibwa. Ahabw'okukoresa tekinorogye ey'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, nikibaasa kuheereza okucondooza okuhikire.

eng_prompt: The new software tool streamlines the workflow for our team. By automating repetitive tasks, it enhances productivity significantly.
lug_prompt: Ebikozesebwa mu pulogulaamu empya bitereeza emirimu gya ttiimu yaffe. Mu kukola emirimu egiddingana, kyongera nnyo ku bungi bw'ebintu ebikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Yub manyen me purugram eni weko tic bedo yot pi lutic wa. Ka itiyo tic mapat-pat ma nongo ipol kare, man medo rwom me tic maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aitwasam iboro luitetiak luka elago itojokaritos eswamae loka etimukosi. Kowai lo aitodolikin aswamisinei nuipu, iyatakini aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru software ru o'diru 'da ni azi ngaza ama vile amuti 'da ni ri otu ewakokoru. Azi 'bani 'ye pale alu 'diyi 'yezu otomatiki si, eri azi ngaza ma omgbo otu saaru.
nyn_prompt: Ebikwato bya sofutiweya ebisya, nibitunguura emirimo ya tiimu yaitu. Kurabira omu kukora emirimo erikugarukwamu, nikyongyera aha by'okukora.

eng_prompt: Milk is often considered a vital part of a balanced diet due to its rich composition. Many people wonder about the specific components that contribute to its nutritional value.
lug_prompt: Amata gatera okutwalibwa ng'ekitundu ekikulu eky'emmere erimu ebiriisa byonna olw'ebintu ebingi ebirimu. Abantu bangi beebuuza ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebigiyamba okuba n'emmere ennungi.
ach_prompt: Cawa mapol ki neno cak calo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kom cam matye ki moc cam weng ma mite pi jami mabeco ma tye iye. Dano mapol gipenye I kom jami mapat-pat ma kelo ber pa cam meggi.
teo_prompt: Erai akile ibore yenepol noi kotoma ainyam naejok naarai ejaasi keda iboro luipu. Ipu itunga lu ejenete iboro lu ijaikitos inyamat ngun ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Ba sawa driasi lesu 'du ekile afa orodriru nyaka nyaza kililiru ma alia 'diyi ru a'disiku afa erini ede 'diyi ma ongmbo angiri. Ba karakara eyi osu afa orodriru eri ma rua 'diyi fepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amate nigakira kutwarwa nk'ekintu ky'omugasho omu by'okurya ebirimu ekiriisa kyona ahabw'ebintu bingi ebigirimu. Abantu baingi nibeebuuza ebicweka ebirikugaita ahaby'okurya byayo.

eng_prompt: In the dairy industry, ensuring the quality of milk is crucial for both safety and consumer satisfaction. To address this need, researchers have developed innovative technology to assess milk quality efficiently.
lug_prompt: Mu makolero g'amata, okukakasa omutindo gw'amata kikulu nnyo eri obukuumi n'obumativu bw'abaguzi. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, abanoonyereza bakoze tekinologiya ow'obuyiiya okukebera obulungi bw'amata mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yubu cak, neno ni rwom me cak tye maber pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo ki yom cwiny pa luwil. Me tyeko miti man, lukwed gukati ki diro manyen me pimo rwom me cak maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okampuni loka akile, aanyun ebe ejokuka akile erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayuwara keda aiyalama naka agwelak. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, etolomutu angicak acoa na itegelikina na aanyun adoketait na akile ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu lesuni 'diyi ma alia, leki ma wura ma ta mbazu ri eri orodriru ageitema ni azini 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi dri ayiko fezu. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi e'do afa ndundu eyi ecozu lesu ma wura onezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu makorero g'amate, okureeba ngu amate gaine omutindo n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburinzi n'okumarwa kw'abaguzi. Okuhikiiriza ekyetengo eki, abakyondoozi batungire tekinorogye y'omutaano y'okushwijuma omutindo gw'amate kurungi.

eng_prompt: Access to quality education is essential for all students, and hands-on learning experiences play a crucial role in their development. To enhance scientific understanding and foster innovation, every government school should be equipped with essential facilities.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo kyamugaso eri abayizi bonna, n'ebyokuyiga eby'emikono bikola omulimu munene mu nkulaakulana yabwe. Okutumbula okutegeera kwa ssaayansi n'okutumbula obuyiiya, buli ssomero lya gavumenti lirina okuba n'ebikozesebwa ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kwan me rwom mamalo pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan weng, dok pwonyo dano ki cing konyo tutwal I dongo gi. Me medo niang pa lucayan ki dongo diro manyen, gangi kwan pa gamente omyero gubed ki jami weng ma mite.
teo_prompt: Adumunun asioman na ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu esisiak kere, ido aisisia naka akanin erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma apolokec. Kanu aitopoloria acoa naka esayanis ka aitopoloria acoasinei nuitetiak, ekot isomeroi kere luka apugan ajaut keda iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Onita muke ri ma esuta eri orodriru sukulu anzi dria eyini, dika e'yo eyini oni eyi ma dria 'diyi azi okporu ni nga eyi ma zota ma alea. E'yo onita sayansini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, le sukulu dria gamete ni 'diyi ma ovu afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obwegyese burungi n'eky'omugasho aha beegi boona, kandi okwegyezamu nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu ntunguuka yaabo. Okutunguura okwetegyereza kwa sayansi n'okureetaho okujumbura, buri eishomero rya gavumenti rishemereire kuba riine ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: With advancements in technology, farmers now have access to affordable testing kits. This allows them to ensure the quality of their products before selling them to consumers.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in dairy technology have provided innovative solutions for milk storage. As a result, farmers will be able to preserve milk and prevent contamination.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya w'amata gye buvuddeko yaleeseewo engeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okutereka amata. N'ekinaavaamu, abalimi bajja kusobola okukuuma obulungi amata n'okukendeeza ku bucaafu.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I kom diro me gwoko cak okelo yoo manyen me gwoko cak. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur gubi gwoko cak maber wek pe oballe.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana nes ejaiki iwaitin luitetiak luka aidar akile. Kanuka ngun, epedorete akoriok aidar akile ejok ka aitikitik ekorono.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ewu ꞌdi ma alia ꞌdiyi fe geri ꞌbani lesu ma tambazu ꞌdiyi ꞌi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi eco lesu ta mba dika eyi ma ezata atri ra.

eng_prompt: Through a series of workshops and training sessions, agricultural experts shared valuable techniques with local farmers. This education focused on improving dairy farming practices and enhancing milk preservation methods.
lug_prompt: Mu misomo egy'enjawulo n'okutendekebwa, abakugu mu byobulimi baagabana obukodyo obw'omugaso n'abalimi b'omu kitundu. Ebyenjigiriza bino byassa essira ku kutumbula enkola z'okulunda amata n'okutumbula enkola z'okukuuma amata.
ach_prompt: I kacoke me pwonye mapol, ludiro me pur gupoko diro me pur ki lupur me tedero. Pwony man oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo rwom me gwoko cak ki kit me gwoko cak.

eng_prompt: A new initiative has been launched to enhance the quality and distribution of dairy products. By improving production standards and logistics, the program aims to expand opportunities for local farmers.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety and health standards of dairy products, a comprehensive analysis is necessary. As part of this initiative, the laboratory will test the quality levels of milk.

lgg_prompt: Afa edele lesusi 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru azini rua ala ma ta mbazu, le 'ba ma andri e'yo eyi ma dria dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, angu afa eyi o'bizu 'da ni mu lesu eyi ma wura o'bi.

eng_prompt: The evolution of farming practices has been significantly influenced by technological advancements. As a result, farmers have increasingly adopted modern machinery and innovative processing methods to enhance productivity.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for dairy products has surged, prompting the need for a more organized approach to the industry. To address this challenge, a dedicated agency was established to enhance the efficiency and quality of milk-related activities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'ebintu ebiva mu mata bweyongedde, ekireetedde obwetaavu bw'enkola entegeke mu mulimu guno. Okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, ekitongole eky'enjawulo kyatandikibwawo okutumbula obulungi n'omutindo gw'emirimu egyekuusa ku mata.

ach_prompt: Pi peko matye I tenge me pur, gamente okatti ki yub me konyo lupur me tedero. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom me kac ki neno ni cam tye mapol I lobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas erionget loka akor, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuka aigang akoriok luka atutubet. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar iboro lu itolomio ka awanyun ebe ejai inyamat kakwap kere.

eng_prompt: As agricultural technology continues to advance, the demand for innovative solutions in farming practices is on the rise. This shift is prompting a transformation in the way services are delivered to farmers nationwide.

ach_prompt: Kit ma diro me pur tye ka medde anyim, miti me nongo diro manyen me pur tye ka mede. Aloka-loka man tye ka kelo aloka-loka I yoo me miyo kony bot lupur ilobo ni lung.

eng_prompt: To enhance agricultural productivity and sustainability, a comprehensive training program was implemented for local farmers. This initiative aimed to provide them with essential skills and insights into modern farming techniques.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula amakungula g'ebyobulimi n'obutebenkevu, enteekateeka y'okutendeka abalimi n'abalunzi eya wano yateekebwa mu nkola. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okubawa obukugu obwetaagisa n'amagezi ku nnima ey'omulembe.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing challenges posed by pests and diseases, a comprehensive training program was developed for local farmers. This initiative aimed to enhance their skills and knowledge in sustainable agricultural practices.

eng_prompt: In rural areas, the lack of infrastructure poses significant challenges for agricultural productivity. Improved transportation networks are essential for ensuring that farmers can efficiently reach their customers.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, obutaba na bikozesebwa kuleetawo okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri ebyobulimi n'obulunzi. Entambula ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kukakasa nti abalimi batuuka bulungi ku bakasitoma baabwe.

eng_prompt: To maximize their profits and ensure sustainability, farmers must diversify their sales strategies. Expanding their reach can help them adapt to changing market demands and consumer preferences.

eng_prompt: Through years of trial and error, agricultural practices evolved as farmers learned to identify the characteristics of different types of land. This experience led them to understand the importance of soil quality in crop production.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gy'okugezesa n'ensobi, enkola z'obulimi n'obulunzi zaakulakulana nga abalimi bayiga okuzuula engeri z'ebika by'ettaka eby'enjawulo. Obumanyirivu buno bwabaleetera okutegeera obukulu bw'omutindo gw'ettaka mu kulima ebirime.

lgg_prompt: Eli o'bizu azini e'yo onzi 'yezuri ma aliasi, geri agirikica ni 'diyi e'do yi ma eselea 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni e'yo onizu wura nyaku ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di fe eyini vata esu orodri nyaku ma wura ni ori ezoza ma alea ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing emphasis on sustainable development and food security in the region. As a result, local communities have been encouraged to engage more actively in agricultural practices.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okussa essira ku nkulaakulana ey'olubeerera n'obutebenkevu bw'emmere mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu b'omu kitundu bakubiriziddwa okwongera okwenyigira mu byobulimi n'obulunzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano tye ka keto cwinygi tutwal I kom dongo lobo matye anyim ki bedo ki cam I twok piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, ki cuku cwiny lutedero me timo pur.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai apodokinit naepol noi nuka apol keda amamus na inyamat kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitai itunga luka atutubet ajaut toma akoru.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, okpo 'ba e'yo angu ezoma ni azini nyaka ako ni angu 'di ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eka ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi 'yezu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, abantu beyongyeire kuta amaani aha ntunguuka n'eby'okurya omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu b'omubyaro bashabirwe kwejumba omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for sustainable farming practices has increased significantly. To address this need, the factory has implemented innovative solutions to support local farmers.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'ennima ez'obuwangaazi bweyongedde nnyo. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, ekkolero litaddewo engeri empya ez'okuyambamu abalimi b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti me tic ki diro me pur ma gwoko kwo pa dano omede tutwal. Me tyeko miti man, factory okatti ki yoo manyen me konyo lupur me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi eipuda lo akoru. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, etolomu acuma na iboro luitetiak kanu aigang akoriok luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia, leta geri ori ezozani 'diyi ma dria ri tu ra. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, okalamvu 'da e'do e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye 'ba amvu 'yapi ogogo 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, obwetago bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'obuhangwa bweyongyeire munonga. Okukora ahabyetaago ebi, eikorero rikozireho oburyo bw'okuhwera abahingi b'omwihanga.

eng_prompt: Many farmers are increasingly turning to sustainable practices to enhance soil health. One key aspect of this shift is the use of natural fertilizers, which offer numerous benefits over their synthetic counterparts.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi beeyongedde okukozesa enkola ez'obutonde okusobola okutumbula obulamu bw'ettaka. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkyukakyuka eno kwe kukozesa ebigimusa eby'obutonde, ebiwa emigaso mingi okusinga ebigimusa eby'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: Lupur mapol tye ka tic ki yoo mapat-pat me gwoko ngom wek obed yot. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I aloka-loka man obedo tic ki moc moc moc cam ma aa ki bot lubanga, ma miyo ber pa jami mapol tutwal I kom jami ma aa ki bot lubanga.
teo_prompt: Eutasi akoriok luipu aitwasam iponesio luajokak kanu aitojokar aijar na alupok. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka aijulanakineta nu ngesi aitwasam ebolia, luejaasi keda ajokisio nuipu noi adepar luce.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba karakara 'diyi curu'do yi oja geri ecopi angu ta mbapi ra 'diyi vu e'yo nyaku ma rua ala ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi okporu ojata 'di ma alea ri eri afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ayuza, orodri eyini fe 'diyi karakara aga afa edele nyakuni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa beyongyeire kukoresa emiringo y'obuhangwa kutunguura eitaka. Ekikuru omu mpindahinduka egi n'okukoresa orwezo rw'obuhangwa, orurikuheereza emigasho mingi kukira orwezo orw'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: To ensure sustainable agricultural practices, it is essential for farmers to focus on enhancing the quality of their land. This involves implementing various techniques that promote nutrient-rich soil.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba nti ennima n'obulunzi biwangaala, kyetaagisa abalimi okussa essira ku kutumbula omutindo gw'ettaka lyabwe. Kino kizingiramu okussa mu nkola enkola ez'enjawulo ezitumbula ettaka eririmu ebiriisa.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic me pur tye maber pi kare malac, pire tek tutwal ki lupur me keto cwiny gi i kom medo rwom me ngom gi. Man kwako keto diro mapat-pat itic ma weko ngom bedo ki moc cam mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorete akoriok aitojokar alupok kec, ekot akoriok apodokinit aitojokar adoketait na alupok kec. Imoriarit ngin aitwasam iponesio luegelegela luepedorete aitopolor alupok nuejaasi keda iponesio luajokak.

nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bigumireho, n'eky'omugasho abahingi n'abariisa kuta omutima aha kutunguura omutindo gw'eitaka ryabo. Eki nikitwariramu okukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe erikureetera eitaka kugira ebiriisa bingi.

eng_prompt: Farmers are constantly seeking ways to enhance their crop yields and meet the growing demands of the global market. One effective strategy has been the development of advanced agricultural technologies, particularly in seed production.
lug_prompt: Abalimi buli kaseera banoonya engeri y'okwongera ku makungula gaabwe n'okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'akatale k'ensi yonna obweyongera. Ekimu ku bintu ebikoze obulungi kwe kukozesa tekinologiya ow'omulembe mu bulimi n'obulunzi nnaddala mu kusimba ensigo.
ach_prompt: Lupur tye ka yenyo yoo me medo kac gi ki cobo miti pa cuk me wilobo. Yoo acel maber tutwal obedo yubu diro me pur ma rwom gi malo tutwalle kodi.
teo_prompt: Eutasi akoriok aimo iponesio lu iyatakina esakec ka aitodolikin eipuda lo esokoni lo akwap kere. Adiopet ewai lo iswamat ejok ngesi aitolomun iwaitin lu akoru lu iswamaete ejok kacut kotoma aitolom ikinyom.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi sa'wa driasi geri nda ori yini 'diyi ma ori ma omgbo otuzu azini afa yini le cu wudrikurusiri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi okporu ni ebi ovu geri agirikica ni ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ma ezota tuni ori eyi ma ezota ma alea ri'I.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive agricultural landscape, staying informed about economic trends is crucial. Farmers must navigate various factors that influence their profitability and sustainability.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya mu byobulimi n'obulunzi, okusigala ng'omanyi ku bigenda mu maaso mu by'enfuna kya mugaso nnyo. Abalimi balina okwetegereza ensonga ez'enjawulo ezikwata ku magoba gaabwe n'okuyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I lok me pur, bedo ki ngec I kom jami matye katime I tenge me lim pire tek tutwal. Lupur omyero guniang jami mapol ma weko ginongo magoba mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka akoru ilolo, ejokuna noi aijen nuka ikapun. Ibusakinit akoriok ajenun iboro luegelegela luepedorete aitodolikin ameda kec.

eng_prompt: The country's diverse climate and fertile soil provide ideal conditions for various crops. Farmers in Uganda benefit from a consistent rainfall pattern that supports year-round cultivation.

eng_prompt: Agricultural productivity in Uganda has been hindered by outdated farming practices and limited access to quality inputs. To address these challenges, farmers are seeking innovative solutions that can enhance their crop yields.

E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi geri ꞌbani ecozu ori yini ꞌdiyi ma ori ma omgbo otuzu ꞌdiyi nda.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu Uganda bigumire ahabw'enkora y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eyahwaireho, hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'okutunga ebintu by'omutindo. Okubaasa kumaraho oburemeezi obu, abahingi nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura amasharuura gaabo.

eng_prompt: Local farmers have been implementing new techniques and technologies to enhance their crop yields. As a result, the community is focusing on strengthening its agricultural infrastructure and market access.

nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro batwire nibata omu nkora obukoryo busya n'ebya tekinorogye kwenda kwongyera aha musharuuro gw'ebihingirwe byabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibata amaani omu kutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'okutunga obutare.

eng_prompt: To enhance agricultural productivity and foster community engagement, it is essential to strengthen local farming initiatives. One effective approach to achieve this is by establishing organized farmer groups.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula ebyobulimi n'okukubiriza abantu okwenyigira mu byobulimi, kya mugaso okunyweza enteekateeka z'abalimi n'abalunzi mu kitundu. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kutandikawo ebibiina by'abalimi ebitegekeddwa.

eng_prompt: Life experiences often provide lessons that formal education cannot replicate. While classrooms offer valuable knowledge, they often miss the nuances of real-world challenges.
lug_prompt: Ebintu bye tuyitamu mu bulamu bitera okutuyigiriza ebintu bye tutasobola kuyigira mu masomero. Wadde ng'ebibiina biwa amagezi ag'omugaso, tebitera kutegeera bizibu ebiri mu nsi.
ach_prompt: Jami ma ngat moni okato iye ipol kare miyo pwony ma lutino kwan pe twero nongo. Kadi bed ni gang kwan pwonyo dano ki jami ma pigi tego, pol kare pe gi ngeyo peko ma dano tye ka kato ki iye.

eng_prompt: In order to assess their understanding of the material comprehensively, the school has decided to implement a new evaluation system. This system will ensure that all pupils demonstrate their knowledge through various formats.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okumanya engeri gye bategeeramu ebintu mu bujjuvu, essomero lisazeewo okuteekawo enkola empya ey'okukebera. Enkola eno ejja kukakasa nti abayizi bonna balaga amagezi gaabwe mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.

teo_prompt: Kanu airereonor amisiikin kec naka akiro ngun, abu esomero itolomu epone loitetet loka airereonor akiro ngun. Ebuni epone lo awanyun ebe itodunitos idwe acoa kec koiponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma vata e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma ale andrizu kililiru, sukulu 'du e'yo geri o'diru 'bani afa 'da ma ale andrizu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Geri 'di ni nga ne ra kini sukulu anzi dria eyi onita eyini ri e'da geri ndundu eyi si.

eng_prompt: To facilitate better collaboration and communication, the participants need to be divided based on their skills and interests. This will enhance the overall effectiveness of the project.

eng_prompt: It's crucial for us to find partners who genuinely prioritize the well-being of the Ugandan people. Many initiatives have fallen short, often causing more harm than good.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okufuna bannaffe abafaayo ennyo ku bulungi bw'abantu ba Uganda. Enteekateeka nnyingi ziremereddwa, emirundi egisinga okuleeta obulabe okusinga ebirungi.
