eng_prompt: In response to ongoing challenges in the education sector, officials have been holding consultations with various stakeholders. These discussions aim to address the needs of students and improve overall educational outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso mu kitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza, abakungu babadde beebuuza ku bakwatibwako ab'enjawulo. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno kugendererwamu kukola ku byetaago by'abayizi n'okutumbula ebyava mu kusoma okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko matye I tenge me pwony, lutic gubedo ka lok ki dano ma padi padi. Nywako lok magi tye ki miti me tyeko peko pa lutino kwan ki medo rwom me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka erionget loka asioman, eutasi eswamak einer keda itunga luegelegela. Alosikinet naka ineresinei lu erai aitemokin ipudesia luka esisiak ka aitojokar eswamae lo asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru mupi drile esele onitaniri ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi ebi e'yo nze 'ba ambo ndundu 'diyi pie. E'yo onzeza 'diyi ma asisile lezu e'yo sukulu anzi eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu azini agata onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu by'obwegyese, abakuru batwire nibeebuuza aha bantu baingi. Okuhanuura oku nikugyenderera okukora ahabyetaago by'abeegi n'okutunguura eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Many families in the countryside struggle to make ends meet due to limited job opportunities and resources. As a result, essential services and infrastructure are often lacking in these regions.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu byalo galwana okweyimirizaawo olw'emirimu n'ebikozesebwa ebitono. N'ekivuddemu, obuweereza obwetaagisa n'ebikozesebwa tebitera kubaawo mu bitundu bino.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol I caro gitye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi pi tic ki lim matye nok tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano ipol kare bedo peke ikabedo magi.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu kocaaloi eutasi ainingosit kanu aijar naarai ikidioko aswamisinei keda iboro. Kanuka ngun, amamete duc aijanakino keda iboro luipudasi itunga aiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara angu calu ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri ci afa yini lele 'diyi esuzu e'yo drileba azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe ni ovuzu were risi. E'yo 'disi, afa ayuzaru azini orodriru 'diyi ma ako angu 'diyi ma alia ci.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu byaro nigarwana kureberera ebyetaago byago ahabw'emirimo mikye n'eby'obugaiga bikye. N'ekyarugiremu, obuheereza n'ebintu ebikuru nibibura omu byanga ebi.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, the ability to effectively convey ideas and collaborate with others is more important than ever. Therefore, it is essential to equip students with the tools they need to succeed in both their personal and professional lives.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, obusobozi okuyisa obulungi ebirowoozo n'okukwatagana n'abalala kya mugaso okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. N'olwekyo, kya mugaso okuwa abayizi ebikozesebwa bye beetaaga okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu bulamu bwabwe obw'obuntu n'obw'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma kubbe tye iye, kero me kelo tam maber ki winye ki joo mukene pire tek tutwal. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me miyo jami ma mite ki lutino kwan me cobo miti gi ikwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina, epol ajokis noi aitodolikin aomisio ka aiswamanar keda luce. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aijaikin esisiak iboro lu ekotos kesi kanu akerianar kotoma aijar kec naka itunga keda nuka aswam.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, okpo e'yo ecezu kililiru azini ti ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Ka'dini, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini afa eyini le 'diyi fezu eyini ani agata esuzu eyi ma edri eyi ma ngulupi ni azini azi eyini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, okubaasa kuhisya ebiteekateeko n'okukwatanisa n'abandi n'eky'omugasho munonga. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza abeegi eby'okukoresa ebi barikwetenga kubaasa kusingura omu magara gaabo n'omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: English is one of the official languages of Uganda, and it is widely used in education and government. As a result, the population has a significant level of proficiency in the language.
lug_prompt: Olungereza lwe lumu ku nnimi entongole mu Uganda, era lukozesebwa nnyo mu by'enjigiriza ne mu gavumenti. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bamanyi bulungi olulimi.
ach_prompt: Leb munu obedo leb acel I kin leb ma gamente tiyo kwedgi I lobo Uganda dok bene kitiyo kwede I gangi kwan ki gangi tic pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ki ngec ma lamal tutwal I kom leb eni.
teo_prompt: Erai Amusugun ediopet kotoma angajepisinei nuapolok ko Uganda, ido itwasamao noi kotoma asioman keda apugan. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi itunga keda adoketait naepol noi naka aijen angajep ngin.
lgg_prompt: Mundu ti eri ti azi alu kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma azi, dika 'ba eri ayu angiri onita ma alea azini gamete ma alea. E'yo 'disi, o'bi eyi ma nita ti 'da ma dria ri ma omgbo angiri.
nyn_prompt: Orungyereza nirumwe aha ndimi z'obutegyeki omu Uganda, kandi nirukoresibwa munonga omuby'obwegyese hamwe na gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibamanya orurimi aha rurengo rw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: To ensure the success of our project, it's crucial that we establish a clear timeline. Let's discuss our priorities and set specific goals.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba nti pulojekiti yaffe etuuka ku buwanguzi, kikulu nnyo okuba n'ebiseera ebituufu. Ka twogere ku bintu bye tukulembeza n'okuteekawo ebiruubirirwa ebitegeerekeka.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic wa owoto maber, pire tek tutwal ni omyero wabed ki kare me timo ne. Myero wanywak lok I kom ngo ma omyero waket iye cwiny wa dok waket yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedori epurojekt wok aswam ejok, ibusakinit oni aitolomun apak naejok. Itetemete nu ipolokit oni kosodete aitolomun alosikineta.
lgg_prompt: Otita amavileri ma drile suzaru, eri orodriru amani sa'wa 'duzu kililiru. Le ama ma nze e'yo e'yo amani 'bale okporu 'diyi ma dria azini ama ma 'ba asi 'baza kililiru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obusinguzi bwa purogyekiti yaitu, n'eky'omugasho ngu tutaho obwire burungi. Reka tuhanuure ebirikutwebembeza kandi tutaho ebigyendererwa ebimwe.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, having technological skills is essential for personal and professional growth. As the world becomes increasingly interconnected, it is crucial for individuals in Uganda to adapt to these changes.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, okubeera n'obukugu mu tekinologiya kya mugaso mu kukulaakulana kw'omuntu n'obw'ekikugu. Ng'ensi yeeyongera okukwatagana, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu mu Uganda okumanyiira enkyukakyuka zino.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, bedo ki diro me tic ki nyonyo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa ngat moni. Kit ma lobo tye ka kube kwede, pire tek tutwal ki dano me lobo Uganda me ngiyo ki aloka-loka magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejokuna noi ajaut keda acoa naka etatai loakwana kanu apolo ka aswam. Kwape elomanar akwap kere, ejokuna noi itunga luko Uganda acamanar keda aijulanakineta nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologianiri ma alia, ovuzu ondua tekenologianiri be ri eri orodriru zota 'ba ma ngulupi ni azini onita ni 'diyi dri. Wudrikuru ni ecaria yi ecizu yi ma eselea drile, eri orodriru 'ba yi ma ngulupisi Ugandaa 'diyini yi ojazu ojata 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, okuba n'emyoga ya tekinorogye n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'omuntu n'omurimo gwe. Nk'oku ensi erikweyongyera kukwatanisa, n'eky'omugasho munonga abantu omu Uganda kumanya empindahinduka ezi.

eng_prompt: Before diving into any project, it's essential to understand what you want to achieve. Establishing a clear vision will guide your planning and execution.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kwenyigira mu pulojekiti yonna, kikulu okutegeera ky'oyagala okutuukako. Okuteekawo okwolesebwa okutegeerekeka obulungi kijja kukulambika enteekateeka yo n'okutuukiriza.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe idonyo I yub mo keken, pire tek tutwal me niang ngo ma imito cobo. Bedo ki neno ma niange maber bikonyo I yubu yub ki timo tic.
teo_prompt: Erongo ijo elomar toma opurojekt ediokere, ejokuna amisiikin nu ikoto ijo aitodolikin. Aitolomun aomisioit na ecai ingarakini jo aitemonokin ka aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi e'doni e'yo azi 'ye ku, eri orodriru mini afa mini le esu 'diyi vazu. E'yo ndreza kililiru niri ma e'dota ni nga mi ma otita eyi ma aza ko azini eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire purogyekiti yoona, ni kikuru kumanya eki orikwenda kukora. Okugira ekirooto ekirikwetegyerezibwa, nikiija kukuhabura omu kuteekateekyera n'okukikora.

eng_prompt: When planning a trip to Uganda, it's essential to consider the quality of accommodations available. Travelers often seek out hotels that are well-managed to ensure a pleasant stay.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oteekateeka olugendo mu Uganda, kikulu okulowooza ku mutindo gw'okusula oguliwo. Abatambuze batera okunoonya wooteeri eziddukanyizibwa obulungi okusobola okubeera obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubbe me cito I lobo Uganda, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom rwom me kabutu matye. Luwot ipol kare gi yenyo hotel ma ki doro gi maber wek gubed ki yom cwiny.
teo_prompt: Arai itemonokini jo alosit Uganda, ibusakinit ijo aomoom adoketait na aiboisio nu ejai. Etapit duc alotok aimo iooterin lu eyaitai ejok kanu aiboi ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka aci muzu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri otu, eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu angu aa'zu 'diyi ma wura ma dria. Ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tutuni hoteli eyi nda eyini ani aa'zu ayikosi.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka oruramburo omu Uganda, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha mutindo gw'oburaaro oburiho. Abagyenzi nibasherura za hoteeri ezirikureebererwa kurungi, kugira ngu batuure gye.

eng_prompt: To ensure the project's success and adherence to timelines, a dedicated team will be assigned to oversee all operations. This team will be responsible for coordinating efforts and maintaining quality standards throughout the process.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obuwanguzi bwa pulojekiti n'okugoberera ebisale by'obudde, ttiimu eyeewaddeyo ejja kuweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa okulondoola emirimu gyonna. Ttiimu eno ejja kuvunaanyizibwa ku kukwasaganya emirimu n'okukuuma omutindo mu nkola yonna.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub eni owoto maber dok I kare ma kiyubu kwede, kibicimo dul pa lutic matye ki kero me doro tic weng. Dul enoni obi bedo ki tic me doro tic ki neno ni rwom me tic tye maber ikare weng me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ebuni epurojekt aitodolikin ejok kosodi aitodolikin apak, eponio aijaikin etimu loajokan kanu aimaniman aswamisinei kere. Ebuni etimu lo arereng naka arucokinit aswam ka aidar adoketait na abeit kotoma ainapeta ngun kere.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ma drile suza azini sa'wa 'bani 'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu, 'ba nga amuti azi ngapi e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi ma pamvu onezu. Amuti 'diri nga ovu azi ngaza be e'yo otuta ni 'diyi ma ti ojizu azini wura kililiru 'diyi ma tambazu e'yo nde ma alia dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu purogyekiti neekora kurungi n'okukuratira obwire, tiimu eyehaireyo neija kuheebwa obujunaanizibwa bw'okureeberera emirimo yoona. Tiimu egi neija kuba nejunanizibwa aha kukwatanisa n'okurinda omutindo omu nkora yoona.

eng_prompt: Before we can develop a comprehensive plan, it's crucial to understand who will be impacted by our decisions. This will help us ensure that all relevant perspectives are considered.
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnakola nteekateeka yonna, kikulu nnyo okutegeera ani anaakosebwa okusalawo kwaffe. Kino kijja kutuyamba okukakasa nti endowooza zonna ezirina akakwate zitunuulirwa.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wayubu yub maber tutwal, pire tek tutwal me niang anga ma tam ma wamoko bikelo adwogi ne I komgi. Man bikonyo wa me neno ni kitamo I kom jami weng ma mite.
teo_prompt: Erongo oni ipedoria aitolomun ainapeta, ejokuna noi amisiikin itunga luetiroritos aseununetawok. Ingarakini ngin oni awanyun ebe itodolikinitai aomisio kere nuikamunitos akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama e'doni otita kililiru ni ku, eri orodriru tu 'ba ama vile e'yo 'dupi 'diyi ma e'yo 'yepi ra 'diyi vazu. Diri nga ama aza ko nezu ra kini 'ba ega e'yo dria orodriru 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Tutakakozire enteekateeka y'omutaano, ni kikuru kumanya abarikukwatwaho okusharamu kwaitu. Eki nikiija kutuhwera kureeba ngu enshonga zoona ezirikwetengwa nizitwarwa nk'ez'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Before moving forward, the team conducted a thorough review of the regulatory requirements. This ensured that all necessary guidelines were understood and would be adhered to throughout the process.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannagenda mu maaso, ttiimu yeekenneenya bulungi ebyetaago by'amateeka. Kino kyakakasa nti ebiragiro byonna ebyetaagibwa byategeerekeka era ne bigobererwa mu nkola yonna.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gucito anyim, dul pa ludito gutimo kwed matut I kom cik ma mite. Man obedo me neno ni ki niang dok ki lubu cik weng ma mite ikare weng me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Eringa elosi ngaren, abu etimu airereor iboro lu ekotoi. Abu ngin koany ebe aponi kojenunai ka atupakin aicoreta kere nu ekotoi kotoma ainapeta kere.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eyi mu drile ku, amuti 'da one e'yo 'bani lele azita palaa 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru. Diri ne ra kini 'ba va azita dria lele 'diyi ra dika 'ba nga yi ma vuti obi e'yo nde ma alia dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekibiina kitakagiire omu maisho, kikashwijuma kurungi ebirikwetengwa omu biragiro. Eki kikahamya ngu ebiragiro byona ebirikwetengwa byetegyerezibwa kandi byakuratirwa omu nkora yoona.

eng_prompt: As the project progresses, it has become clear that we need a dedicated expert to ensure the accuracy and clarity of our documentation. Therefore, we are looking to appoint a specialist who can focus on this critical task.
lug_prompt: Nga pulojekiti egenda mu maaso, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga omukugu eyeewaddeyo okukakasa obutuufu n'obwerufu bw'ebiwandiiko byaffe. N'olw'ekyo, tutunuulidde okulonda omukugu asobola okussa essira ku mulimu guno omukulu.
ach_prompt: Ka yub eni tye ka wot anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero wabed ki ludiro matye ki kero me neno ni coc megwa tye kakare. Pi meno, watye ki miti me coyo ladiro ma twero keto cwinye I kom tic man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi epurojekt ngol, ecai cut ebe ikoto oni ipirioit lu itutuoritai kanu awanyun ebe ecai ka ecai apapulawok. Kanuka ngun, ikoto iso aseun epirioit lo epedori aitodolikin aswam na naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'di ni muzu drile, eca e'da kililiru kini ama le 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi nezu ra kini ama vile kokobi 'diyi kililiru azini e'dazaru. Ka'dini, ama le 'ba onita be angiri be ecopi asi 'bapi azi okporu 'di ma dria ra ni pe.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti ku erikugyenda omu maisho, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu nitwetenga omukugu okureeba ngu ebihandiiko byaitu nibihikire. N'ahabw'ekyo, nitwenda kutoorana omukugu orikubaasa kuta amaani aha murimo ogu.

eng_prompt: To ensure the success of our initiative, it's crucial that we have a well-structured plan in place. One of the key components of this plan is to bring in skilled professionals who can effectively manage and oversee the various project activities.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obuwanguzi bw'enteekateeka yaffe, kikulu nnyo okuba n'enteekateeka entegeke obulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka eno kwe kuleeta abakugu abasobola okuddukanya obulungi n'okulondoola emirimu gya pulojekiti egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic wa owoto maber, pire tek tutwal ni wabed ki yub ma kiyubu maber. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo kelo ludiro ma gitye ki diro ma twero doro ki doro tic mapat-pat me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aswam wok, ejokuna noi ajaut keda ainapeta nuajokak. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitolomun ipirioitin luepedorete aidar ka aimaniman aswamisinei nuegelegela nuka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama ni 'diyi ma drile suzaru, eri orodriru amani ovuzu otita kililiru be. Afa azi okporu otita 'di ma alea 'diyi ma azi eri 'ba nita be 'diyi ejizu ecopi azi otita 'da ni ndundu 'diyi ma ta mbapi ra 'diyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obusinguzi bw'ekigyendererwa kyaitu, n'eky'omugasho kugira enteekateeka nungi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu nteekateeka egi n'okureeta abakugu abarikubaasa kureeberera emirimo ya purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: As our business continues to grow, we are facing increasing challenges in logistics. The current transportation methods are proving to be inefficient and costly.
lug_prompt: Bizinensi yaffe bwe yeeyongera okukula, twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okweyongera mu by'okutambuza ebintu. Enkola y'entambula eriwo kati eraga nti tekola bulungi era egula ssente nnyingi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma biacarawa tye ka dongo, watye ka nongo peko mapol I yoo me tic. Yoo me wot matye kombedi tye ka nyutu ni pe tiyo maber dok bene welgi tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini ebiasara wok apolo, itereikina sio keda atiokisio nuipu noi. Iwaitin lu elose kwana itodunitos ebe mam iswamaete ejok ido epol etiai noi.
lgg_prompt: Tujara amavileri ni mu drile zoria, ama e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo afa eyi ma ayuza ni 'diyi ma alea. Geri 'bani acizu curu'do 'diyi e'da kililiru kini eyi azi nga muke ku dika eyi ajeru.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi yaitu ku erikugumizamu neekura, nitubugana oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu kukora ebintu. Enkora y'eby'engyenda eriho obwahati terikukora kurungi kandi n'ey'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about sustainable farming practices, stakeholders highlighted the importance of improving crop yields. They recognized that enhancing agricultural productivity is crucial for meeting the growing demands of the population.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nnima ey'obuwangaazi, abakwatibwako baalaga obukulu bw'okutumbula amakungula. Baakitegeera nti okutumbula ebyobulimi kya mugaso nnyo mu kutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera buli lukya.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom diro me pur matye anyim, dano mapol guwaco ber pa medo rwom me kac pa cam. Gu niang ni medo rwom me pur pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lwak matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos akoru na ejok, apotu itunga kitetemoto ajokis naka aitojokar esake. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe aitojokar iboro lu akoru erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea geri ori ezozaniri ma dria, 'ba ambo 'diyi ece orodri ori ezoza ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. Eyi esu ra kini e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi, ab'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bakagamba aha mugasho gw'okwongyera aha buhingi n'oburiisa bw'ebihingirwe. Bakareeba ngu okwongyera ahaby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the demand for sustainable food sources continues to rise, many individuals are exploring new opportunities in the agricultural sector. This shift towards agribusiness is not only beneficial for the economy but also offers various avenues for personal financial growth.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'emmere ey'obutonde bweyongera okulinnya, abantu bangi banoonyereza ku mikisa emipya mu byobulimi. Enkyukakyuka eno mu byobulimi n'obulunzi si nnungi mu by'enfuna byokka naye era ewa amakubo ag'enjawulo ag'okukulaakulana mu by'enfuna by'omuntu.
ach_prompt: Kit macalo miti me nongo cam matye ki moc cam ma oromo tye ka medde ameda, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me tic i tenge me pur. Alokaloka man me donyo I biacara me pur pe ber pi biacara keken ento bene miyo yoo mapol me dongo lim pa ngat acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo inyamat, eutasi itunga luipu aingic arerengesio nuitetiak nuka akor. Aijulakinio na toma akoru mam erai na ajokis bon kanu edumune loka ikapun konye ijaikini itunga iponesio lu itopoloere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu nyaka eyini aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu risi, 'ba karakara eyi drileba o'diru 'diyi onda e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma alea. Ojata 'di tujari agirikicani 'diyi ma alia ri ovuni lu orodriru e'yo robiani 'diyi dri ku te eri vini geri ndu ndu fe zota robiani 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ebyetaago by'eby'okurya ebirikubaasa kuguma nibyeyongyera, abantu baingi nibasherura emigisha misya omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Okuhindukira omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa tikirikugasira eby'entaasya byonka, kureka nikiretaho emiringo mingi y'okutunguuka omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, low income levels are closely tied to inadequate agricultural practices and limited access to resources. To address this pressing issue, a new initiative has been developed.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, enfuna entono ekwatagana n'ennima embi n'okufuna ebintu ebitono. Okusobola okukola ku kizibu kino eky'amangu, enteekateeka empya ekoleddwa.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, rwom me nongo lim matidi tye macalo adwogi me pur ma pe ber ki nongo jami ma mite. Me tyeko peko man matye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, yub manyen dong kiyubu.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, ikapun lu ikidioko elomunitos kama ejaasi iponesio luka akor lumam edolitos keda adumunun iboro lu ikidioko. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, etolomun ainapeta nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, geri lonyi esuzuri ma ongmbo ele ri eci'i e'yo agirikica 'yezu kililiru ku azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma esuta ma ongmbo ni cazu ku ri be. E'yo okporu 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do e'yo azi o'dini 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, entaasya nkye neekwatanisa n'obuhingi n'oburiisa bubi hamwe n'okutunga ebintu ebitarikumara. Okukora aha nshonga egi ey'amaani, enteekateeka nsya ekozirweho.

eng_prompt: In light of recent market trends and emerging opportunities, we have identified the need for collaboration. To enhance our competitive edge, we are initiating a series of meetings with key stakeholders.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigenda mu maaso mu katale n'emikisa egivaayo, tulabye obwetaavu bw'okukolagana. Okutumbula okuvuganya kwaffe, tutandika enkiiko eziwerako n'abakwatibwako abakulu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami matye katime I cuk cokcok-ki ki gum mapat-pat matye kabino, waniang ni omyero waribbe. Me medo rwom me pyem I kinwa, watye ka cako kacoke mapol ki joo ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nueswamauna kosokoni keda arerengesio nuelomunete, iwanyunit sio eipud loka aiswamanara. Kanu aitogogong abolobol wok, iuta sio aitolot airiamununeta keda itunga luapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo curu'do e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma dria azini drileba efu'ba 'diyi ma dria, ama esu e'yo lezu ti icita ma dria ra. A'bala amavile ri ma omgbo otuzu, ama mu mitingi karakara eyi 'ye 'ba ambo 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntatsya y'akatare n'emigisha erikwija, twareeba ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa. Okutunguura obusinguzi bwaitu omu by'okuhayahayana, turiyo nitutandikaho enkiiko nyingi n'abarikukwataho abakuru.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of our proposal, the funding committee has approved our request. This financial backing will enable us to implement various initiatives aimed at enhancing local farming practices.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku kiteeso kyaffe, akakiiko akagaba obuyambi kakkirizza okusaba kwaffe. Obuyambi bw'ensimbi buno bujja kutusobozesa okussa mu nkola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ennima n'obulunzi mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom tam megwa, dul madoro lok kom lim omoko kwac megwa. Kony me lim man bikonyo wa me keto yub mapat-pat ma tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me pur.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos aomisiowok, abu ekomiti lo igangak ikapun kocam ailipakosi. Ebuni agangat na naka ikapun aingarakin oni aitegear iponesio luegelegela lu ekotore aitojokar akoru na akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile egata ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti robia fezani 'diyi a'i e'yo amani a'ile 'diyi ra. Atita robia niri ni 'diri nga ama aza ko otita ndundu 'bani lezu geri agirikica 'yezu ogogo 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ekiteiso kyaitu, akakiiko akarikugaba esente kakaikiriza okushaba kwaitu. Obuhwezi bw'esente nibuza kutubaasisa okuta omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omwihanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing public health concerns, a comprehensive plan was developed to improve healthcare access. As part of this initiative, the system was established by the ministry of health.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu mu bantu okweyongera, enteekateeka enzijuvu yakolebwa okutumbula obujjanjabi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, enkola yatandikibwawo minisitule y'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom ma tye kamede, kiyubu yub me medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom. Macalo but yub man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom aye oyubu yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka angaleu naka itunga, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar adumunun amukian. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, erionget loka angaleu ngesi abu kitolomu ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do otita azi dria 'bani ecozu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu alataniri e'do geri 'di ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara g'abantu ezirikuguma nizeeyongyera, enteekateeka y'omutaano ekakorwa kwenda kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, enkora ekatandikwaho minisiture y'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: By analyzing vast amounts of data and identifying patterns, the system enhances decision-making processes. Users can rely on its predictions to navigate future scenarios effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obubaka bungi n'okuzuula enkola, enkola eyongera ku nkola y'okusalawo. Abakozesa basobola okwesigama ku kuteebereza kwayo okusobola okutambuza obulungi ebintu mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I yoo me ngiyo lok mapol tutwal ki niang kit ma jami tye ka time kwede, yub eni medo yoo me moko tam. Jo ma tiyo kwede twero jenge I kom byek ma tye iye me niang ngo ma obitimme I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aanyanar akiro nuipu noi kosodete ajenun iponesio luegelegela, itojokari ainapeta nuka aitolomun aseununeta. Epedorete etosomak amunokina aomisio ke kanu ajenun iboro luebeit atakanun koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Geri o'duko omgbo angirisi 'diyi ma ale andrita si azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma esuta si, geri 'bani e'yo 'duzu 'diyi ma omgbo otu. Ba eri ayupi 'diyi eco asi'ba e'yo erini 'yo ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Kurabira omu kushwijuma ebihandiiko bingi n'okumanya engyenderwaho, enkora neeyongyera aha nkora y'okusharamu. Abarikugikoresa nibabaasa kwesiga okuteebereza kwayo kwenda kumanya ebiro bya nyensya kurungi.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming implementation, a training session was scheduled for all department heads. The goal was to ensure everyone was familiar with the latest technology updates.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okuteekebwa mu nkola okujja, entendekero yateekebwawo eri abakulu b'ebitongole byonna. Ekigendererwa kyali kya kukakasa nti buli omu amanyi tekinologiya ali ku mulembe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi keto yub eni itic, kiyubu pwonye pi ludito me dul mapat-pat weng. Miti ne obedo me neno ni dano weng tye ki ngec i kom diro me tet manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin nu ebeit aitodolikin, aponi kitemokinai aituutoorio kanuka lukapolok edipatiment kere. Alosikinet arai awanyun ebe ejenete itunga kere akiro nuitetiak nuka etatai loakwana.
lgg_prompt: Otuta 'bani e'yo 'di 'yezu ri ma otuta ma alea, 'ba otu otita imbatani ni drice'ba enyati ni 'diyi dri dria. Asisile nderi ndra nezu ra kini 'ba dria ni e'yo tekenologia o'diru 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza okuta ebiragiro omu nkora, abakuru b'ebitongore boona bakatendekwa. Ekigyendererwa kikaba kiri okureeba ngu buri omwe yaamanya ebirikukwata aha tekinorogye.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges facing the agricultural sector, the government sought to engage various parties in a collaborative dialogue. This initiative aimed to gather diverse perspectives and expertise to inform future policies.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa kw'ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi, gavumenti yafuba okuyingiza abantu ab'enjawulo mu nteeseganya ez'awamu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukungaanya endowooza ez'enjawulo n'obukugu okusobola okulambika enkola ez'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ki niang peko matye I tenge me pur, gamente otemo kelo dul mapat-pat me lok. Yub man obedo ki miti me coko tam ki ngec ma pat pat wek okony I moko cik me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas erionget loka akoru, abu apugan otamit aimorikikin ipatei luegelegela toma aineranara. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aimorikikin aomisio nuegelegela ka ipirioitin kanu aitolomun ainapeta nuka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru esele agrikica niri ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, gamete nda geri amuti ndundu eyi ejizu e'yo nzezu tualu. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu egata ndundu eyi trazu azini ondua ndundu eyini 'diyi ejizu e'yo eyi 'yezu ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi oburikushangwa omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa,gavumenti ekagyezaho kureetaho enkoragana n'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kurundaana ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana n'obuhangu bw'abantu kugira ngu babaase kumanya ebiteekateeko by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: The research team aimed to understand the various practices employed in modern agriculture. To achieve this, they designed a comprehensive survey targeting local farmers.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abanoonyereza yabadde n'ekigendererwa eky'okutegeera enkola ez'enjawulo ezikozesebwa mu bulimi n'obulunzi obw'omulembe guno. Okutuukiriza kino, baakola okunoonyereza okujjuvu nga batunuulidde abalimi b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Dul me kwed ne obedo ki miti me niang yoo mapat-pat ma kitiyo kwede I pur me kare-ni. Me cobo man, guyubu yub me kwed ma okeme ki lupur me tedero.
teo_prompt: Alosikinet naka etimu loka angicak arai amisiikin iponesio luegelegela luka akor luakwana. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, apotu kesi kitolomutu aingic naepol noi naka akoriok luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo vuti ondazani 'diyi le ndra geri ndundu 'bani ayu agirikica ewu curu'do ri ma alea 'diyi va. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eyi 'ye e'yo eti ondaza 'ba amvu 'yapi ogogo 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abakyondoozi ekaba negyenderera kwetegyereza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe erikukoresibwa omu buhingi n'oburiisa obw'omurembe. Okuhikiiriza eki, bakakora okucondooza okurikukwata aha bahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: To enhance project management efficiency, a new software solution has been developed. This innovative tool is designed to streamline workflows and improve communication among team members.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enzirukanya ya pulojekiti, pulogulaamu empya ekoleddwa. Ekikozesebwa kino eky'obuyiiya kikoleddwa okwanguya emirimu n'okulongoosa empuliziganya mu bammemba ba ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me doro tic, kiyubu yub manyen me purugram. Jami tic manyen man kiyubu me yubu kit ma tic woto kwede ki me yubu lok ikin lumemba me dul tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eipone lo eyaitere ipurojektin, etolomun iboro luitetiak luka elago. Etemonokinitai ibore yen kanu aitapatan aswam ka aitojokar einer kanejaas itunga luka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza otita 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do geri azi o'diru ni. Ba ede afa ndundu o'diru 'diyi azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo nzeza ma omgbo otuzu 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura oburyo bw'okureeberera purogyekiti, hariho purogyekiti nsya ekozirweho. Eky'okukoresa eki eky'omutaano kikakorwa kukyendeeza emirimo n'empurizagana ahagati y'abantu.

eng_prompt: The pilot program has been designed to test its effectiveness in select areas before a broader rollout. Initial funding will support a limited number of districts to gather data and refine the approach.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okugezesa ekoleddwa okugezesa obulungi bwayo mu bitundu ebirondeddwa nga tennatandikibwawo. Obuyambi obusookerwako bujja kuyamba disitulikiti entono okukungaanya obubaka n'okulongoosa enkola.
ach_prompt: Yub eni kiyubu me pimo ber pa yub eni I kabedo ma ki yero mapwod pe ki cwalo I kabedo mukene. Cente me acel obi konyo districts manok me coko ngec ki yubu yoo me tic.
teo_prompt: Etemokinitai ainapeta ngun kanu ainwak eswamae ke kotoma aiboisio nu eseunitai eringa itolosia. Ikapun lu egeunete eponio aigang idisitriktan lu ikidioko adumun akiro ka aitojokar epone ngol.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do otita 'di e'dazu e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu angu 'bani ope 'diyi ma alea raka de nga po'di 'ba awini eyi e'do angu ndundu eyi ma alea ku. Robia fele oko ri ni mu atita fe distrikiti kalafe were 'diyi dri e'yo eyi trazu dika geri eyini azi ngazu ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okwegyezamu eteirweho kukyebera oku erikukora omu myanya erikutooranwa, etakatandikire kukoresibwa omu bantu baingi. Esente ez'okubanza niziija kuhwera disiturikiti nkye kurundaana ebirikukwata aha nshonga n'okwongyera amaani omu nkora yaabo.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in technology have revolutionized the way companies operate. As a result, many businesses have adopted new systems to streamline their processes.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya eyakabaawo ekyusizza engeri amakampuni gye gakolamu emirimu. N'ekivuddemu, bizinensi nnyingi zikozesezza enkola empya okwanguya emirimu gyazo.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo I kom tet manyen okelo aloka-loka I kom kit ma dul mapat-pat tiyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, biacara mapol gutiyo ki yoo manyen me yubu tic gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana nes ejulaki epone loiswamata ikampunin. Kanuka ngun, etojokaasi ibiasaran luipu iwaitin luitetiak kanu aitapatan aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni o'diru tekenologia ma alia 'diyi oja geri amuti yini azi ngazuri ra. E'yo 'disi, tujari karakara eyi 'du geri o'diru 'diyi eyini ani e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu bya tekinorogiya ehindwire omuringo ogu kampuni zikoreramu. N'ekyarugiremu, bizinesi nyingi zitandikire kukoresa emiringo misya kwenda kutereeza emirimo yaazo.

eng_prompt: In response to changing climate conditions and the need for higher yields, agricultural experts have been researching new methods to enhance crop production. As a result, farmers are planting improved seed varieties.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'obudde ekyukakyuka n'obwetaavu bw'amakungula amangi, abakugu mu byobulimi babadde banoonyereza ku ngeri empya ez'okwongera ku makungula. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi basimba ensigo ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me aloka loka pa piny ki miti me nongo cam madwong, ludiro me pur gubedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me cam. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur tye ka pito kodi mapat-pat mabeco.
teo_prompt: Kanu aijulakin ejautene loka ikwamin keda eipud loka akoru naepol, eutasi ipiriotin luka akor aingic iwaitin luitetiak lu itojokaret akoru na iraan. Kanuka ngun, ekoriete akoriok ikinyom lu itojokaritai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni i ojazu ri ma e'yosi azini e'yo lezu ori ofuza ma ongmbo angiri ri ma dria, 'ba onita be e'yo agirikica ma dria 'diyi ebi geri o'diru 'diyi onda ori ezoza ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ori wura muke 'diyi sa.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'obwire ehindukire hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'amasharuura maingi, abakugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa batwire nibacondooza emiringo misya y'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi nibahinga embibo nungi.

eng_prompt: Due to favorable weather conditions and improved farming techniques, agricultural yields have seen a significant increase this season. As a result, farmers are producing quality grain output.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'obudde ennungi n'obukodyo bw'okulima okulongooseddwa, amakungula g'ebyobulimi geeyongedde nnyo sizoni eno. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi bafulumya emmere ey'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Pi kit ma piny ber kwede ki diro me pur ma kiyubu maber tutwal, kac me pur omede tutwal I kare me pur eni. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur tye ka nongo cam mabeco.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ekuse ka etepe loajokan keda iwaitin lu akoru lu itojokaritai, eyatakinos ikorion noi apakio nu. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akoriok aitolomun inyamat luejokuka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni muke ri ma e'yosi azini geri ori ezoza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzuri ma e'yosi, afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ma omgbo tu sa'wa 'disi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ori efi onyiru 'diyi ofu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'obwire nungi hamwe n'entunguuka omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, ebihingirwe byeyongyeire omu bwire obu. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi nibahinga eby'okurya by'omutindo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in public interest towards various forms of physical activity. As a result, a diverse range of individuals are now exploring different athletic pursuits.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu kwagala kw'abantu eri engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukola emirimu gy'omubiri. N'ekivuddemu, abantu ab'enjawulo kati banoonyereza ku mizannyo egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I miti pa lwak I kom yoo mapat-pat me timo jami mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol kombedi tye ka timo jami mapat-pat me pyem ngwec.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta kotoma eipud loka itunga mama ejaasi iponesio luegelegela luka aswam. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kwana itunga luipu aingic aboliasio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, o'bi eyi ma ava oja e'yo eyini lezu 'yeta rua ni 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi curu'do e'yo avita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, abantu batandikire kukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okukoresa emibiri yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu b'emiringo mingi obwahati bariyo nibasherura eby'emizaano etari emwe.

eng_prompt: The country's investment in sports programs and training facilities has begun to pay off. As a result, Ugandan athletes are increasingly dominating competitions on the international stage.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu byemizannyo n'okutendekebwa kutandise okusasulwa. N'ekivuddemu, bannabyamizannyo bannayuganda beeyongedde okufuga empaka ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: Cente ma lobo man oketo I yub me tuku ki pwonye dong ocako nyako nyige. Macalo adwogi ne, lungwec me lobo Uganda tye ka loyo pyem I rwom me lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit akwapuwok aipikakin ikapunukec toma ainapeta nuka aboliasio keda aiboisio nuituutoonorere. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akerak luko Uganda aipuga noi kotoma abolobol naka akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Kari 'di ma lonyi vuti aleza otita avita ni 'diyi ma alia azini pari embata ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi e'do curu'do orodri esu 'bo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ongu onzupi kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma okpo abala kari eselia 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'emizaano n'okutendeka abantu kutandikire kushashura. N'ekyarugiremu,abairuki ba Uganda beyongyeire kwebembera empaka z'amahanga goona.

eng_prompt: In recent competitions, Ugandan athletes have consistently showcased their exceptional talent and determination. Their hard work and dedication are beginning to pay off on the international stage.
lug_prompt: Mu mpaka eziyise, bannabyamizannyo bannayuganda balaze ebitone byabwe eby'enjawulo n'obumalirivu. Okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo kwabwe kutandise okusasulwa ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I pyem ma okato cokcok-ki, lungwec me lobo Uganda gubedo ka nyuto diro ki miti gi. Tic matek kacel ki keto cwiny gi tye ka cako nyako nyige I rwom me lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol napac, apotu akerak luko Uganda itodutu atalanta kec keda agogongu. Aswam kec na aswam kagogong ka ainakina kes egeunos aitac kotoma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: A'bala o'diru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba ongu onzu'ba kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'da eyi ma feta Munguni fe eyidri 'diyi sa'wa driasi. Azi ngaza yini okporu azini asi feza yini 'diyi e'do yi ma orodri ofe kari yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpaka ezihweireho, abairuki ba Uganda boorekire etaraanta yaabo n'obwegyendesereza bwabo. Omurimo gwabo gw'amaani hamwe n'okwehayo kwabo bitandikire kushashurwa aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: Throughout the history of international football, only a select few players have reached the milestone of scoring over a hundred goals for their national teams. This remarkable feat not only showcases exceptional talent but also a deep commitment to representing one's country on the global stage.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo by'omupiira gw'ensi yonna, abazannyi batono abatuuse ku ddaala ly'okuteeba ggoolo ezisoba mu kikumi mu ttiimu zaabwe ez'eggwanga. Ekikolwa kino ekyewuunyisa tekikoma ku kulaga busobozi bwa njawulo naye era n'obumalirivu obw'amaanyi mu kukiikirira eggwanga ly'omuntu ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro pa tuku odilo me kin lobe, lutuku manok keken aye gunongo gum me moto golo makato miya acel pi tim meggi me lobo. Man pe nyutu ni ngat moni tye ki talanta keken ento bene nyuto ni ngat moni tye ki miti matek me cung pi lobo ne I rwom me lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo nuka emopira loka akwapin kere, aboliak lu ikidioko kesi edolonokinete igolon lu edeparete akwatat kanuka itimunukec luka akwapuwok. Mam aswamisioit na itodunit ajenanut konye itodunit apodokinit naka abwoikin akwapuke kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Adi dria mupira tuza kari eselia 'diyiniri ma alia, 'ba avitani 'diyi ma kalafe were yi ca e'yo 'bani golo osuzu aga turu alu yi vile amuti kari ni 'diyi dri. Afa onyiru 'di ece lu feta Munguni fe 'diyi ku te asi 'baza okporu 'ba alu ma kari ma paria wudrikuru ma dria ri indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo by'omupiira gw'ensi yoona, abazaani bakye nibo batungire gooro ezirikuhingura igana omu tiimu zaabo. Ekikorwa eki eky'omutaano tikirikumanyisa etaraanta y'omutaano yonka, beitu n'okwehayo kw'amaani omu kujwekyera eihanga rye aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: The recent decline in funding and infrastructure has severely impacted the development of athletics in the country. As a result, many athletes are struggling to access the resources they need to succeed.
lug_prompt: Okukendeera kw'ensimbi n'ebizimbe gye buvuddeko kikosezza nnyo enkulaakulana y'emizannyo mu ggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, bannabyamizannyo bangi balwana okufuna ebintu bye beetaaga okusobola okuwangula.
ach_prompt: Rwom me nok pa lim ki gedo ma otime cokcok-ki okelo peko madit tutwal I kom dongo pa pyem ngwec I lobo Uganda. Macalo adwogi ne, lungwec mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pigi me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Adisiar na ikapun keda adukena nes emunarit noi apol naka akerit kotoma akwapuwok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akerak luipu ainingosit adumunun iboro lu ekotos kesi kanu akerianar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani robia fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu o'diru ri eza e'yo ongu nzuzani kari ma alia 'diyi ma zota ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ongu onzu'ba karakara 'diyi dri ci afa yini le drile suzaru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okukyerererwa kw'esente n'ebyombeko omu by'emizaano omu bwire butari bwa hare, kihindwire munonga entunguuka y'emizaano omu eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu,abairuki baingi nibarwana kutunga eby'okukoresa ebibarikwetenga kubaasa kusingura.

eng_prompt: After years of rigorous training and dedication, he finally had the opportunity to compete at the prestigious athletic games. The atmosphere was electric as athletes from around the world gathered to showcase their talents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'atendekebwa era ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yafuna omukisa okuvuganya mu mizannyo gy'emizannyo egy'ekitiibwa. Embeera yabadde ya maanyi ng'abazannyi okuva mu nsi yonna bakungaanidde okwolesa ebitone byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee pwonye matek tutwal pi mwaki mapol, lacen en onongo gum me pyem I pyem ngwec ma oywek tutwal. Kwo obedo ber tutwal I kare ma lungwec ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat gugure me nyuto mot gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitutuonoro keda ainakina, abu ngesi kodum arereng naka abolobol kotoma abolobol naka akerit. Apol noi ejautene loka akerak kotoma akwap kere lu atukokinos kanu aitodiar atalantanakec.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara embata okporu azini asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, isu asizu drileba a'bala 'yezu avita ongu nzuzani inzile inzi 'diyi ma alia ra. Angu nderi ndra aci ru 'ba ongu onzu'ba enga'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi kuru 'diyi ni okuzu yi ma feta Munguni fe yi dri 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutendekwa n'okwehayo, akahendera yaatunga omugisha gw'okuzaana omu mizaano y'okwiruka ey'ekitiinisa. Embeera ekaba eri ey'omutaano ahabw'abairuki kuruga omunsi yoona kurundana kworeka emyoga yaabo.

eng_prompt: After a challenging season filled with ups and downs, the team is determined to turn things around. Fans are hopeful as the new coach implements fresh strategies and motivates the players.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa sizoni enzibu ejjudde ebirungi n'ebibi, ttiimu emaliridde okukyusa ebintu. Abawagizi balina essuubi ng'omutendesi omupya assa mu nkola obukodyo obupya n'okuzzaamu abazannyi amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me pyem ma obedo tek tutwal ma opong ki jami mabeco ki maraco, tim ne omoko tamgi me loko jami. Lucwak tuku tye ki gen pien lapwony tuku manyen tye katic ki diro manyen me cuku cwiny lutuku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naetiono noi naepol noi, ekapakina etimu aijulakin iboro. Ejaas egangitok keda amuno naarai itolomuni ekooc loitetet iwaitin luitetiak ka aisinyikokinit aboliak.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti ewaru tualu e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, amuti avitani 'diyi asi 'ba asi e'yo yi ojazu. Ba atita fepi 'diyi asi'baza be ekile imbapi mupira ni o'diru ri ni geri o'diru 'diyi ayu 'ba avitani 'diyi dri ava fezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bw'oburemeezi burimu ebirungi n'ebibi, tiimu eyehaireyo kuhindura ebintu. Abahagizi baine amasiko ahabw'okuba omutendeki omusya naataho oburyo busya bw'okugaruramu abazaani amaani.

eng_prompt: The venue has become a popular choice for hosting various athletic competitions. To ensure smooth operations, Namboole Stadium has a management team for sporting events.
lug_prompt: Ekifo kino kyettanirwa nnyo okutegekamu empaka z'emizannyo egy'enjawulo. Okukakasa nti emirimu gitambula bulungi, ekisaawe ky'e Namboole kirina akakiiko akaddukanya emizannyo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ne dong odoko kama oywek tutwal me yubu pyem ngwec mapat-pat. Me neno ni tic tye maber, bar tuku me Namboole tye ki ludor tuku.
teo_prompt: Araun aiboisit naejok noi kanu aitolot abolobol naka akerit. Kanu aswam ejok, ejaasi esawe loka aboliasio loko Namboole keda etimu loka eyaitene loka aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: Pari 'di eca 'ba 'bani lele tu a'bala ongu onzuzani 'diyi 'yezu 'bo. Azi ngaza kililiru ri nezu, pari avita eyini Namboolea ri ma driceza e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dria ri ci.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya guhindukire ogurikukirayo kukoresibwa omu mpaka z'okwiruka ezitarikushushana. Okureeba ngu ekishaayi kya Namboole nikikora kurungi, kiine tiimu erikwebembera emikoro y'emizaano.

eng_prompt: Growing up surrounded by fields and open skies, he always dreamed of a life beyond the hills. The allure of the city and the promise of a brighter future called to him like a siren's song.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yakulira mu nnimiro ne mu bbanga eryerere, yalowoozanga ku bulamu obusinga ku nsozi. Obulungi bw'ekibuga n'ebisuubizo by'ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebitangaavu byamuyita ng'oluyimba lwa sireni.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en odongo I kabedo ma opong ki poto ki polo ma tye ayaba, en obedo ka lek I kom kwo I kabedo mapat-pat manonge I cere. Ber pa boma ne ki gen me kwo maber I kare me anyim olwonge calo wer pa lamyel.
teo_prompt: Apoloun naejaasi keda amisiri keda ekwam loepukora, abu ngesi koomoom nuikamunitos aijar nakokinga naka imoru. Ajokis na esite keda aisumunet naka ingaren na ejok apotu kolimokisi ngesi kwape ekosio.
lgg_prompt: Erini zozu amvu azini angu ngmboru 'diyi ma ageia, eri orobi orobi idri 'be ma drilea ri ma dria. Afa ndrizaru aku ambu cityniri ma alia azini asi'baza ewu drialeri ma e'yo onyiruri ma dria 'diyi omve eri ekile ongo sireniniri le.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukurira omu musiri n'omu mwanya ogurikwetorwa, akaroota aha magara g'aheeru y'enshozi. Oburungi bw'orurembo hamwe n'okumuraganisa ebiro bya nyensya birungi bikamweta nk'ekyeshongoro kya sireni.

eng_prompt: After years of rigorous training and countless competitions, he has consistently outperformed all his rivals. His remarkable speed and endurance have earned him a reputation that extends far beyond his local track.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'atendekebwa era ng'avuganya nnyo, buli kiseera abadde asinga abo bonna b'avuganya nabo. Obwangu bwe n'obugumiikiriza bimufunidde erinnya erisukka ku ly'empaka z'ebidduka.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me pwonye matek tutwal ki pyem mapol tutwal, en obedo katimo maber loyo jo ma obedo ka pyem kwedgi. Rwom me ngwec ki diyo cwinye ma pire tek tutwal oweko en oywek tutwal I kabedo mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aituutoonor keda abolobol naepol noi, iswamat ngesi ejok adepar lueboloboloete keda ngesi. Esipidi ke loitegelikina keda angirikinit ke einakini ngesi ekiror loepol noi adepar akerit ke.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara embata okporu ni azini abala karakara eyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia, eri aga 'ba dria erini baka sezu 'diyi ra. E'yo erini acizu okposiri tualu asi teza be 'diyi fe eri dri rukusa ongmbo angiri si aga ongu erini acizu angu 'da ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutendekwa n'empaka nyingi, atwire naakora kurungi kukira abarikumuhakanisa. Okwiruka kwe okw'omutaano hamwe n'okugumisiriza bimuhereize eiziina eririkuhingura aha muzaano gwe.

eng_prompt: Effective communication and collaboration among team members are crucial during a match. Without a clear strategy and teamwork, achieving success on the field becomes challenging.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi n'okukwatagana mu bammemba ba ttiimu bikulu nnyo mu kiseera ky'omuzannyo. Awatali nkola ntegerekeka n'okukolera awamu, okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu kisaawe kifuuka kizibu.
ach_prompt: Lok ki winye ikin lumemba me dul tuku pire tek tutwal ikare me tuku. Labongo yub matye atir ki tic kacel, nongo loc I bar doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luka etimu erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma abolia. Arai emamei ainapeta nuecaete ka aswam nepepe, etiono aitodolikin akerianut kotoma aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru azini ti icita 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru sa'wa avita ni si. Otita kililiru azini azi ngaza tualu ri kokoru, drile suza pari avita niri ma alea ri eca ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Okuganiira kurungi n'okukwatanisa omu ba memba ba tiimu n'eby'omugasho omu muzaano. Hatariho enkora nungi hamwe n'okukorera hamwe, okutunga obusinguzi omu kishayi nikiba kigumire.

eng_prompt: It's important for supporters to remember that the players are human beings who dedicate their lives to the sport. Constructive criticism can be valuable, but it should never cross the line into disrespect.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso abawagizi okujjukira nti abazannyi bantu abawaayo obulamu bwabwe mu muzannyo. Okuvumirira okuzimba kuyinza okuba okw'omugaso, naye tekulina kusukka layini mu butassa kitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lucwak me poo ni lutuku gubedo dano ma gudyero kwogi pi tuku. Loko lok matye ki tyen lok maber twero bedo ber tutwal, ento pe omyero okat kama pe woro.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu egangitok aiitun ebe eraas aboliak itunga lueinanakinete aijarakec kanuka abolia. Aitoronikin na ejok epedori ajokunar, konye mam ibusakinit aitodolikin amamut ayongite.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'ba atita fepi 'diyini egazu kini 'ba avitani 'diyi 'ba ada eyi idri eyini 'diyi owipi avita 'di ma alea 'diyi. E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eco ovu orodriru ra, te le ma ali e'yo inzita ako ni ma alia ku.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho abahagizi kwijuka ngu abazaani n'abantu abaheireyo amagara gaabo omu muzaano. Okuhakanisa kurungi nikubaasa kuba okw'omugasho, kwonka tikushemereire kureetaho obutaheereza abantu ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: After a disappointing match, the atmosphere among Manchester United supporters in Uganda turned tense. Many fans are feeling the weight of their team's defeat to Tottenham and are choosing to stay out of sight.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuzannyo ogutaali mulungi, embeera mu bawagizi ba ManU mu Uganda yafuuka ya bunkenke. Abawagizi bangi bawulira obuzito bwa ttiimu yaabwe okukubwa Tottenham era basalawo okusigala ebweru.
ach_prompt: Ingee tuku ma pe obedo ber tutwal, cwiny lucwak ManU I lobo Uganda odoko tek. Lucwak tuku mapol gitye ka winyo peko me goyo timgi ki Tottenham dok gitye ka yero me bedo mabor ki wang gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolia naetiono noi, abu ejautene loka egangitok luka Manchester United ko Uganda koraun loetiono noi. Eutasi egangitok luipu apupokin ationis naka etimu kec aibiror Tottenham kosodete aseun asalakin kokinga.
lgg_prompt: A'bala asi nyozani ma vutia, angu 'ba atita fepi ManU ni Ugandaa 'diyi ma eselea ri eca asi otiza ru. Ba atita fepi karakara eyi e'yo amuti eyini Tottenham ni eyi ndezu ri ma e'yo ega eyini ani aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'omuzaano ogutarashemeize, embeera y'abashagiki ba ManU omu Uganda ekahinduka ey'obunkenke. Abahagizi baingi bariyo nibahurira oburemeezi bwa tiimu yaabo okusingwa Tottenham, reero bacwamu obutareeba tiimu yaabo.

eng_prompt: In football, each position plays a crucial role in the team's overall performance. Among these, strikers hold a particularly vital responsibility for scoring goals.
lug_prompt: Mu mupiira gw'ebigere, buli kifo kikola kinene nnyo ku mutindo gwa ttiimu okutwalira awamu. Mu bino, abateebi balina obuvunaanyizibwa obw'amaanyi mu kuteeba ggoolo.
ach_prompt: I tuku odilo, kabedo acel-acel pire tek tutwal I kom kit ma dul tuku tye katuku kwede. I kin magi, lutuk odilo ma goyo odilo gitye ki tic mapire tek tutwal me moto golo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolia naka emopira, iswamai ngin aiboisit naepol noi kanu eswamae loka etimu. Kotoma ngul, ejaasi aboliak keda aswam naepol noi naka aipet igolon.
lgg_prompt: Mupira tuza ma alia, pari alu alu ni azi okporu nga avita amuti avitani 'diyiniri ma alia. Diyi ma eselea, 'ba mupira avipi 'diyi ma azi orodriru golo eyi suzu ri ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu mupiira gw'ebigyere, buri mwanya nigukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora kwa tiimu. Omuri ebi, abateezi b'ebigyere nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuteeba gooro.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the world of sports has seen a surge in talented athletes who excel in various disciplines. Among them, a select group stands out for their remarkable abilities on the football field.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ensi y'ebyemizannyo elabye okweyongerayongera mu bannabyamizannyo abalina ebitone abasukkuluma mu mizannyo egy'enjawulo. Mu bo, ekibinja ekitono kyeyoleka olw'obusobozi bwakyo obw'ekitalo mu kisaawe ky'omupiira.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me pyem tuku omede tutwal I kin lungwec ma gitye ki diro me pyem I pyem mapatpat. I kingi, gurup mo ma kiyero gi pat ki mukene pi diro gi I bar tuko odilo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit akwap naka aboliasio apol naka akerak luejaasi keda atalanta naepol noi kotoma aboliasio nuegelegela. Kotoma kakesi, egurupu lo eseunitai itegelikina kanu apedorosiokec kotoma abolia emopira.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, wudrikuru avita niri ndre e'yo 'ba ongu onzu'ba talanta be 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tu ra. Yi ma eselea, ongulumu azi 'diyi e'da yi ma okpo avita mupira tuzaniri ma alia 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ensi y'eby'emizaano ereebire okweyongyera kw'abairuki abaine etaraanta abarikukora kurungi omu mizaano etari emwe. Omuri bo, guruupu erikutooranwa neshangwa ahabw'emyoga yaabo y'omutaano omu kishayi ky'omupiira.

eng_prompt: We are excited to announce that our admissions for the upcoming semester are now open. If you're looking for a place to further your education, you are welcome to enrol at our university.
lug_prompt: Tuli basanyufu okulangirira nti okuyingiza kwaffe okw'olusoma olujja kugguddwawo. Bw'oba onoonya ekifo we weyongerayo okusoma, oyanirizibwa okwewandiisa ku yunivasite yaffe.
ach_prompt: Watye ki yom cwiny me cwalo lok angeya ni coyo lutino kwan me tem me kwan matye kabino ni dong tye ayaba. Kace itye ka yenyo kabedo me mede ki kwan, ki jolo in me donyo i gang kwan me yunibaciti wa.
teo_prompt: Iyalama sio alimor ebe engara kwana aiwadikao naka esisiak luka atamu naebunit. Arai ikoto ijo aiboisit na iyatakina asioman kon, ijaun ijo alomar ounibasite wok.
lgg_prompt: Ama ayikosi e'yo oluzu kini 'ba si ama sukulu semesita emupiri ma alia 'bo. Eka pari nda onita mivileri ma omgbo otuzu, mi a'i mi si ama vile univasitia ra.
nyn_prompt: Tushemereirwe kurangirira ngu okweta abantu omu semisita erikwija, kwigwirweho. Ku oraabe nooronda omwanya gw'okugumizamu n'obwegyese bwawe, noobaasa kwehandikisa aha yunivasite yaitu.

eng_prompt: Legal decisions can significantly influence market dynamics and investor confidence. As a result, stakeholders must closely monitor court rulings that may impact their investments.
lug_prompt: Okusalawo kw'amateeka kusobola okukyusa akatale n'obwesige bw'abasiga nsimbi. N'ekivuddemu, abakwatibwako balina okulondoola ennyo ensala za kkooti eziyinza okukosa okusiga ensimbi kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Moko tam malube ki cik twero weko lutim biacara bedo ki tek cwiny. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma timo biacara omyero gubed ki wang matek I kom ngolo kop ma kot ongolo ma twero balo biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Epedorete aseununeta nuka ikisila aitojokar esokoni keda amunokina naka agwelanarak. Kanuka ngun, ekot itunga aanyanar noi etube lo adieket lo epedori aitolitol ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'duza azita palaa 'diyi eco e'yo cuu ni 'diyi oja tualu asi'baza 'ba lonyi vuti alezani 'diyiniri pie ra. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ambo eyi ma one e'yo liza koti ni ecopi eyi ma lonyi vuti aleza 'diyi 'yepi ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Encwamu y'ebiragiro neebaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu katare hamwe n'obwesigye bw'abasiga sente. N'ekyarugiremu, abu kirikukwataho bashemereire kureebuuza kurungi ensharaho za kooti ezirikubaasa kuteganisa eby'obushubuzi byabo.

eng_prompt: The courtroom was tense as the prosecution prepared to challenge the witness's credibility. As the judge signaled for the cross-examination to begin, the lawyers exchanged determined glances.
lug_prompt: Kkooti yabaddemu obunkenke ng'oludda oluwaabi lwetegekera okuwakanya obwesige bw'omujulizi. Ng'omulamuzi alaga nti okubuuzibwamu ebibuuzo kutandise, bannamateeka baawaanyisiganya amaaso ag'obumalirivu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I ot kot I kare ma adot tye ka yubbe me pyem I kom ada pa caden. I kare ma langol kop tye ka miyo lanyut ni lapeny omyero ocak, lupilida ne gubedo ka nyutu tek cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi adieket keda aiyalongong naarai akapakina emusago aitepeg abeit naka ajenan. Neautar ekatubon aitodun ebe ebeit aingisingisio ageun, apotu ipulidan koinakisi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Angu dwaniniri ma alia 'ba e'yo lipirini yi oturia e'yo a'da 'ba sadiniri ma dria ri a'dazu. Ba e'yo lipiri ni e'dazu kini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ozizu 'diyi e'do 'bo, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi e'da eyi ma mile asi 'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Ekishengye kya kooti kikaba kiine obunkenke ahabwokuba orubanja rukaba nirweteekateekyera kuhakanisa obwesigwa bw'abajurizi. Omucwi w'emanja ku yaakozire akamanyiso k'okutandika okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo, ba puriida bakarebana amaisho.

eng_prompt: In a world where many face oppression for their beliefs, it is essential to recognize the freedoms we enjoy. Our society values individual rights, allowing us to express our faith openly.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi abantu gye batulugunyizibwa olw'enzikiriza zaabwe, kikulu nnyo okumanya eddembe lye tulina. Ekitundu kyaffe kitwala eddembe ly'omuntu kinnoomu ng'ekintu ekikulu, ekitusobozesa okwogera enzikiriza zaffe mu lwatu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano mapol gitye ka deno can pi niyee gi, pire tek tutwal me niang twero ma watye kwede. Lwak wa tero twero pa ngat acel acel calo gin ma pire tek, ma weko wanyuto niye wa I dye lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaatar itunga luipu keda aiticanio kanu aiyuunikec, ejokuna noi ajenun ailajara na ijaatar oni. Isingarenit itunga wok apedorosio nuka itunga, ijaikini oni aitodiar aiyuunikec koipone kaloejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'ba karakara eyini candi esuzu e'yo eyini a'i 'diyi ma e'yosi ri ma alea, eri orodriru amani driwala amani esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Ongulumu amavileri ni drilemgbo 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu, erini fezu ama dri e'yo a'ita amani 'diyi ecezu o'bi eyidri.

ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom two cancer pire tek tutwal me niang ki gengo ne con. Ka wapwonyo lwak i kom rac pa two ki lanyut ne, watwero miyo kero ki dano me timo jami ma mite pi gwoko yot komgi.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos ekansa erai ibore yenepol noi kanu angicun ka aitikitik. Kowai lo aisisianakin itunga atiokisio keda ijenuneta, ipedori oni aitigogong itunga aswam kagogongu kanu angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Imbata feza e'yo azo cancer niri ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo azo cancer niri ni esuzu drioru azini atrizu. O'bi eyini imbata fezu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria tualu eceta eyi pie, ama eco 'ba eyi ma okpo fe eyini ani e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru eyi ma rua ala ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata ahari kokoro n'eky'omugasho omu kumanya n'okuzibira. Kurabira omu kwegyesa abantu akabi n'obubonero, nitubaasa kuheereza abantu amaani okukora kurungi aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many drivers underestimate the dangers of speeding on that highway. Despite numerous warning signs, reckless behavior continues to be a problem.
lug_prompt: Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi banyooma akabi akali mu kuvuga endiima ku luguudo olwo. Newankubadde waliwo obubonero bungi obulabula, okweyisa obubi kukyali kizibu.
ach_prompt: Ludwo mutoka mapol pe gi tamo I kom rac pa dwoyo motoka I cipid I gudu enuni. Kadi bed ni lanyut mapol tye me ciko dano, tim maraco pud tye peko.
teo_prompt: Mam iderepan luipu ejenete atiokisio nuka airenge keda esipidi korot ngol. Karaida ipu ijenuneta lu ikwenyarete, eringa iponesio luarokok eraas ationis.
lgg_prompt: Dereva karakara eyi e'yo onzi nzuta okposiri ma dria nzila 'da ma dria 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo ecetaru karakara 'diyi ma talasi, adriza onzi ri nga po'di adri e'yo ewaru ni.

eng_prompt: Engaging in regular exercise can significantly improve our overall well-being. Many studies have shown a strong link between physical activity and various health benefits.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu kukola dduyiro buli lunaku kiyinza okulongoosa ennyo obulamu bwaffe okutwalira awamu. Okunoonyereza kungi kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'okukola dduyiro n'emigaso gy'ebyobulamu egy'enjawulo.

lgg_prompt: E'yo avita ni 'diyi 'yezu sa'wa driasi ri eco ama ma aa'ta muke ri otu ra. E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo 'yeta rua ni 'diyi ma eselea orodri rua ala ni 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: Recent surveys and voter sentiment studies indicate a growing preference for fresh perspectives in political leadership. As a result, the analysis focuses on the impact of age and experience on electoral success.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko n'okunoonyereza ku ndowooza y'abalonzi kulaga nti abantu baagala nnyo endowooza empya mu bukulembeze bw'ebyobufuzi. N'ekivuddemu, okwekenneenya kussa essira ku ngeri emyaka n'obumanyirivu gye bikosaamu obuwanguzi mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki kacel ki kwed me tam pa lubol kwir nyutu ni dano mapol tye ki miti me neno jami manyen I tela me cungu iwi bye. Macalo adwogi ne, kwed ne oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom adwoki pa mwaka ki ngec I kom loc I yer.
teo_prompt: Aingic na pac keda aomisio nuka aseak itodunit ebe epol eipud loka itunga luitetiak kotoma apugan naka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, isingarenit aingic ngun nuikamunitos apolou naka ikar keda amisiarit kotoma aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru azini e'yo vuti ondaza 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ece kini 'ba eyi le egata o'diru 'diyi driceza politiki niri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, e'yo eti ondaza 'da ni asi 'ba eli azini nita e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In today's society, empowering women is more important than ever. Many organizations and individuals are taking steps to address gender inequality and promote women's rights.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, okutumbula abakyala kya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Ebitongole bingi n'abantu ssekinnoomu bakola emitendera okumalawo obutali bwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu n'okutumbula eddembe ly'abakyala.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, aitigogong angor erai ibore yenepol noi adepar kapakio nukokau. Iriongeta keda itunga luipu eutasi aswam kagogongu kanu aitemokin atiakatiaka naka ikiliok keda angor ka aitopolorite apedorosio nuka angor.

lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebikolwa eby'obukambwe ebitabalika bireetedde abantu abatalina musango okubonaabona. Kikulu nnyo okutegeera engeri ebikolwa bino gye bikosaamu abantu kinnoomu n'ekitundu kyonna okutwalira awamu.

eng_prompt: Many organizations seek financial support to achieve their goals. One effective method they often employ is fundraising.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bingi byetaaga obuyambi bw'ensimbi okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byabyo. Engeri emu ennungi gye bakozesa kwe kusonda ssente.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, access to information has become easier than ever before. Many people turn to online platforms for answers to their questions and to expand their understanding of various topics.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about urban transportation, many passengers have expressed their frustrations with the behavior of taxi drivers. Reports of reckless driving and disregard for traffic rules have become increasingly common.

O'duko e'yo mutukari ti ojizu asi kokoru azini e'yo 'bani azita nzila dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu ku 'diyi ma dria 'diyi eca curu'do karakara.

eng_prompt: As the holiday shopping season approaches, many consumers eagerly anticipate the biggest sales of the year. Retailers prepare for Black Friday by slashing prices to attract bargain hunters.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'okugula ebintu mu nnaku enkulu esembera, abaguzi bangi beesunga okutunda okusinga mu mwaka. Abasuubuzi beetegekera Black Friday nga bakendeeza ku miwendo okusikiriza abayigga amagoba.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me wilo jami I kare me karama tye cok, luwil mapol tye ki miti me nongo jami madit loyo I mwaka ni. Lucat wil giyube pi Black Friday kun gi dwoko piny welgi wek oywek lucat.
teo_prompt: Neyapia apak naka agwel iboro luka aparaan, ekotosi agwelak noi agwelanar naepol noi kokaru kalo. Itemonokinos agwelanarak kanuka Black Friday kowai lo aitidisiar itiaisinei kanu aisukunyun agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa afa jezani lifu natali nirisi ri ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba afa je'ba 'diyi asi driasi afa oziza angiri ndeni eli 'di ma alea 'diyi ega. Ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi yi otu o'du towi omvele black friday nirisi geri yini aje esizu 'ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okugura ebintu omu bwire bw'ebiro bikuru ku burikuhika haihi, abaguzi baingi nibateekateeka ngu nibaza kuguza ebintu bingi omu mwaka. Abashuubuzi nibeteekateekyera orwakataano orurikwetwa Black Friday, barikusharamu emihendo y'ebintu kugira ngu bashendekyere abashuubuzi.

eng_prompt: Retailers often offer significant discounts and promotions during the holiday shopping season. As a result, consumers are drawn to take advantage of these deals, especially on Black Friday.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi batera okukendeeza ku miwendo n'okutumbula ebintu mu biseera by'okugula ebintu mu nnaku enkulu. N'ekivuddemu, abaguzi basikirizibwa okweyambisa amagoba gano naddala ku Black Friday.

teo_prompt: Etapit duc agwelanarak aitidisiar itiaisinei luipu kapakio nu agwelanar. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi agwelak aitwasam arerengusio nu, kacut Naikanyet Nairionon.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa nyiri ozipi 'diyi sa'wa driasi aje ma omgbo esi azini otuta fe sa'wa afa jeza natali nirisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa je'ba 'diyi e'yo afa ozizaru 'diyi ma ayuza 'du tuni o'du towi iniru 'diyi ma alia.

eng_prompt: As the holiday season approaches, shoppers eagerly anticipate the biggest sales of the year. One of the most significant shopping events is just around the corner.

eng_prompt: Having spent time in Uganda, I was continually impressed by the warmth and hospitality of the locals. Their resilience and sense of community truly stand out.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adaun apak ko Uganda, abu eong anyunyura noi kanu amina keda aijaun itunga luka atutubet. Agogongukec keda aomisioitikec naka aimorikikin itunga ejokuna noi.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that the joy and laughter children bring into our lives are unmatched. Their innocence and curiosity remind us of the beauty in the world around us.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti essanyu n'okuseka abaana bye baleeta mu bulamu bwaffe tebirina kye bifaanagana nabyo. Obutaliiko musango bwabwe n'okwagala okumanya bitujjukiza obulungi bw'ensi etwetoolodde.

eng_prompt: Early detection and prevention are crucial in combating the high mortality rates associated with this illness. Many women remain unaware of the risks and symptoms, leading to late-stage diagnoses.
lug_prompt: Okuzuula n'okuziyiza nga bukyali bikulu nnyo mu kulwanyisa omuwendo gw'abantu abafa ennyo olw'obulwadde buno. Abakyala bangi tebamanyi bulabe n'obubonero, ekivaako okuzuulibwa ekikeerezi.

eng_prompt: In a world where creativity knows no bounds, we have the freedom to express ourselves fully. Let's embrace our individuality and make the most of our time together.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obuyiiya gye butabeera na kkomo, tulina eddembe okweyoleka mu bujjuvu. Tukkirize engeri zaffe ez'enjawulo era tukozese ebiseera byaffe nga tuli ffenna mu ngeri esingayo obulungi.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and division, it is crucial that we prioritize our unity. We must remember the strength that comes from standing together as one.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'enjawukana, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obumu bwaffe. Tulina okujjukira amaanyi agava mu kuyimirira awamu ng'omuntu omu.

lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti enteekateeka z'okusomesa eziriwo kati ziyinza obutakola bulungi ku byetaago bya bamaama abali embuto eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, kya mugaso okwekenneenya n'okutumbula enteekateeka zino okulaba nga bivaamu ebirungi eri bamaama n'abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni yub me rweyo lwak I kom peko pa mon ma oyac I kare-ni pe tiyo maber tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo ki yubu yub magi me neno ni gimiyo adwogi maber bot mege ki lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuitetiak ebe mam ainapeta nuka aisisianakin nuka angor nu epotiete epedorete aitemokin ipudesia luegelegela luka angor nu epotiete. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi airereor ka aitojokar ainapeta nu kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna kanu angor keda idwekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini otita imbatani curu'do 'diyi econi e'yo ndundu ayia okporovu ru 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru ku. E'yo 'disi, eri orodriru e'yo 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini otuzu agata muke 'diyi esuzu ayia eyini azini anzi eyivile 'diyini.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a clean environment is crucial for public health. By implementing effective hygiene practices, we can significantly reduce the risk of illness in our community.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obutonde obuyonjo kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu bw'abantu. Nga tussa mu nkola enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo, tusobola okukendeeza ennyo ku bulabe bw'endwadde mu kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo me kabedo ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal pi yot kom pa lwak. Ka waketo yub me gwoko lengo itic, watwero dwoko piny rwom me two I kabedo wa.

lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma tambazu alaru ri eri orodriru alata o'bi eyini ri ni. Azita alata ni 'diyi ma vuti obiza si, ama eco e'yo azo ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea ra.
