eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a significant increase in waterborne diseases in the region. Health officials are warning that the lack of sanitation facilities could lead to a serious outbreak.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti endwadde eziva mu mazzi zeeyongedde nnyo mu kitundu. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balabudde nti obutaba na bifo bya buyonjo kiyinza okuvaako okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni two ma bino macalo adwogi me pii tye ka medde tutwal I twok piny eni. Lutic me yot kom tye ka ciko dano ni peko me lengo twero kelo poto pa two marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe iyata noi adekasinei nu eyangaununete akipi kotoma aiboisit. Apotu eswamak lu adekis ikwenyasi ebe amamus aiboisio nu aila eyangauni abwangun na adekasinei nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini azo yi si 'diyi ma omgbo tu angu 'di ma alea ra. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza kini angu alatani 'diyi ma ako eco fe e'yo azo korona niri ni e'dozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'endwara ezirikuruga omu maizi omu kyanga. Ab'ebyamagara nibarabura ngu eibura ry'eby'obuyonjo niribaasa kureetaho okubarukaho kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing concerns about patient care and safety, officials have been reviewing the current standards of medical facilities. As part of this initiative, the ministry of health wants to improve the quality of oxygen in referral hospitals.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kulabirira abalwadde n'obukuumi, abakungu babadde beekenneenya omutindo gw'ebyobujjanjabi oguliwo kati. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule y'ebyobulamu eyagala okutumbula omutindo gwa oxygen mu malwaliro amanene.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko lutwo ki ber bedo, lutic me ot yat gubedo ka ngiyo rwom me ot yat matye kombedi. Macalo but yub man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom mito medo rwom me yamo ayweya I odi yadi madongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit aidar adekak keda ayuwara, eutasi eswamak airereor adoketait na adekisia. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ekoto erionget loka angaleu aitojokar adoketait na ekwam kadekisia nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu azini tambaza ma dria, azi'ba eyi ebi geri arojo eyini aa'zu sa'wa 'disi ri ma ale andri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu alataniri le oli seza arojo ambo 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okureeberera abarwaire hamwe n'oburinzi, abakungu batwire nibareebuuza omutindo gw'amarwariro. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture y'eby'amagara neeyenda kutunguura omutindo gw'omwika gw'okwisya omu marwariro amahango.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for medical resources, the government recognized the need for collaboration. As a result, they sought to strengthen international relations to enhance the availability of essential health supplies.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi obweyongera, gavumenti yalabye obwetaavu bw'okukolagana. N'ekyavaamu, baanoonya okunyweza enkolagana y'ensi yonna okutumbula okufunibwa kw'ebikozesebwa mu byobulamu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me jami tic me ot yat, gamente oniang miti me winye. Macalo adwogi ne, guyenyo yo me jingo wat ikin lobe mapat-pat me medo rwom me nongo jami ma mite pi yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo iboro lu amukian, abu apugan koany eipud loka aiswamanara. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi kopedosi aitogogong eidicane lo akwapin kere kanu aitopolor adumunet naka iboro luka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete esu e'yo lezu ti icita ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi nda geri eyi ma eselea kari amve 'diyi pie eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma okpo otuzu eyini ani afa arojo ni okporu 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ekareeba oburemeezi bw'okukwatanisa ahabw'okwenda kw'eby'amagara kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, bakagyezaho kutunguura enkoragana yaabo n'amahanga g'aheeru kwenda kwongyera ahabintu ebikuru ebirikukoresibwa omu marwariro.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming rise in malaria cases, the government has prioritized public health initiatives. A comprehensive plan has been developed to tackle the disease at its roots.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera kw'abalwadde b'omusujja gw'ensiri, gavumenti ekulembezza enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu bantu. Enteekateeka enzijuvu ekoleddwa okulwanyisa ekirwadde mu mirandira gyakyo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two malaria, gamente oketo cwinye tutwal I kom yub me yot kom pa lwak. Yub maber dong kiyubu me lweny i kom two eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda eimidi, abu apugan isingarenit aswam nuikamunitos angaleu naka itunga. Etolomun ainapeta nuepedorete aitikitik adeka ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo malaria niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu okporu risi, gamete 'ba e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi okporu. Ba e'do otita azi dria si 'bani ecozu e'yo a'di 'dizu azo 'di be ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'omushwija gw'ensiri, gavumenti etandikire kukora ahaby'amagara g'abantu. Enteekateeka y'omutaano ekozirwe okurwanisa oburwaire aha mirandira yabwo.

eng_prompt: As the number of individuals experiencing homelessness continues to rise, communities are increasingly recognizing the urgent need for effective solutions. This growing awareness highlights the importance of addressing the root causes of poverty and instability.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu abatalina we babeera gweyongera okulinnya, ebitundu byeyongera okutegeera obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okugonjoola ensonga. Okumanyisibwa kuno okweyongera kulaga obukulu bw'okukola ku nsibuko y'obwavu n'obutali butebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki peko me bedo labongo gang tye ka medde, lwak tye ka niang ni miti me nongo yoo me cobo peko eni tye kamedde. Rwom me ngec eni nyutu ber pa lweny i kom jami ma kelo can ki lweny.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luemamete ireria, ejenete itunga eipud loka aitemokin ationis. Aijen na naepol noi itodunit ajokis na aitemokin iboro lu eyangaunitos ican keda amamus ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba aku koko 'diyi ni tu uru, ongulumu eyi e'yo nde ma aza kozu mbeleru. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile ozizu ri ece orodri e'yo e'yo alio ni azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu abatagiine butaaho nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutereeza embeera. Okumanyisibwa kweyongyeire nikworeka omugasho gw'okukora aha nshonga ezirikureeta obworo n'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: In today's world, where misinformation about health is rampant, it is crucial to equip young people with accurate knowledge. By providing them with the right tools and information, we can empower them to make informed decisions about their well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero omuli obubaka obukyamu ku byobulamu, kikulu nnyo okuwa abavubuka amagezi amatuufu. Nga tubawa ebikozesebwa ebituufu n'amawulire, tusobola okubawa amaanyi okukola okusalawo okulungi ku bulungi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, kama lok goba mapol tye iye I kom yotkom, pire tek tutwal me miyo ngec matir ki bulu. Ka wamiyo botgi jami tic ki ngec matir, watwero minigi kero me moko tam mabeco pi ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ne ipu akiro nuarokok nuikamunitos angaleu, ejokuna noi aijaikin atumunak acoa na abeit. Kowai lo aijaikin kes iboro ka akiro nuajokak, ipedori oni aigang kes aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, o'duko enzoru e'yo alata ma dria 'diyi ni ovuzu tre, eri orodriru 'ba ode yi dri ondua kililiru 'diyi fezu. Afa ayuzaru azini o'dukoti kililiru 'diyi fezurisi, ama eco yi dri okpo fe e'yo 'duzu kililiru eyi ma edri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ahu amakuru gatahikire agarikukwata ahaby'amagara garikujanjaara munonga, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuheereza eminyeeto obwengye obuhikire. Twabaha ebikwato n'amakuru agahikire, nitubaasa kubaha amaani g'okucwamu kurungi aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: As public health campaigns gained momentum, communities began to prioritize their well-being. Increased access to information and resources played a crucial role in fostering awareness about health issues.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube w'ebyobulamu bw'olukale bwe yeeyongera amaanyi, ebitundu byatandika okukulembeza obulungi bwabyo. Okwongera okufuna amawulire n'ebikozesebwa kyakola omulimu munene mu kutumbula okumanyisa ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub me miyo ngec i kom yotkom omedde, lwak gucako keto cwiny gi i kom ber bedo gi. Medde pa nongo ngec ki kony obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kwape apotu ikampeins luka angaleu kodumutu agogongu, apotu itunga kogeutu aisingarenit aijar kec. Apol naka adumunun akiro keda iboro luingarakinete itunga abu iswama ejok kanu aisisianakin itunga nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'dukoti edrizu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, ongulumu eyi e'do e'yo eyini aa'zu muke ri 'du okporu. E'yo eceza ma esuta ma omgbo tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie ri nga azi okporu e'yo rua ala ma dria 'diyi ma mile oziza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ehururu z'eby'amagara zikatandika kweyongyera, abantu batandika kwebembeza eby'amagara gaabo. Okweyongyera kutunga amakuru n'eby'okukoresa kikakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Health organizations around the world are mobilizing resources and expertise. Scientists and researchers are collaborating to find innovative solutions and treatments.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ebyobulamu okwetooloola ensi yonna bikunga ebintu n'obukugu. Bannassaayansi n'abanoonyereza bakolera wamu okuzuula eby'obuyiiya n'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Dule ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I wilobo gitye ka rayo jami ki diro me tic. Lucayan kacel ki lukwed tye ka tic kacel me nongo yoo me cango two.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luka angaleu luka akwap kere eutasi aituk iboro keda ipirioitin. Eutasi itunga luka sayanis keda angicak aiswamanara kanu adumun iwaitin luitetiak ka amukian.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo rua alanisi wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi afa ayuzaru azini ondua be 'diyi tra. Ba sayansini 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi pie azi nga tualu e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'ebyamagara okwetoroora ensi yoona, biriyo nibikunga ebintu n'obukugu. Abanyasayansi n'abakyondoozi bariyo nibakwatanisa kuronda oburyo bw'okutereeza n'okuragurira.

eng_prompt: Vaccination is a crucial step in preventing certain types of cancers. One of the most effective ways to protect young women is through vaccination against the human papillomavirus (HPV).
lug_prompt: Okugema ddaala lya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira ebika bya kookolo ebimu. Emu ku ngeri esinga obulungi ey'okukuumamu abakyala abato kwe kugema akawuka akaleeta mukenenya (HPV).
ach_prompt: Gwer obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me gengo kwai two cancer mukene. Yo acel maber loyo me gwoko mon matino obedo gwero gi i kom two ma kilwongo ni human papilloma virus (HPV).
teo_prompt: Erai aikis ekato epone loepol noi loka aitikitik iponesio ice luka ekansa. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu ayuarite angor nudidika ngesi aikis ekato loka adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri e'yo azi okporu ni azo cancer ru 'diyi atrizu. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu oku oderu 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri eri geri 'bani eyi osozu aro soza azo human papilloma virus (HPV) nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika n'omuringo gw'amaani omu kuzibira ebika bya kokoro ebimwe. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kurinda abakazi abato n'okugyema akakooko ka siriimu.

eng_prompt: With the rising number of mosquito-borne illnesses in our area, it's crucial to take preventive measures. One effective way to protect ourselves and our families is to address the breeding grounds of these pests.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'endwadde ezireetebwa ensiri ogweyongera mu kitundu kyaffe, kikulu nnyo okukola ebintu ebiziyiza. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okwekuumamu n'ab'omu maka gaffe kwe kukola ku bifo ebiwuka bino we bizaalira.
ach_prompt: Ki mede pa wel two ma obee kelo ikabedo wa, pire tek tutwal me gengo ne. Yo acel maber loyo me gwokke kenwa ki gangiwa en aye me lweny i kom kabedo ma kwidi magi nywal iye.
teo_prompt: Keda enaaba loepol loka adekasinei nu eyangaununete isiru kaiboisit wok, ejokuna noi aitikitik. Epone ediope loepedoria oni ayuarite awatewok keda ikaliawok ngesi aitemokin aiboisio nu iurunete ikur lu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe azo yiyia eyini eji amavile angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, eri orodriru e'yo 'duzu e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi 'duzu. Geri azi kililiru amani ecozu ama ma ta mbazu tualu familia amavile 'diyi pie ri eri e'yo 'yezu angu afa ori eza'ba 'diyi ni ori ezozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu endwara ezirikureetwa ensiri nizeeyongyera omu kyanga kyaitu, n'eky'omugasho kukora emiringo y'okuzibira. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okwerinda hamwe n'amaka gaitu, n'okukora aha myanya y'okuzaarira kw'obukooko obu.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, the spread of diseases knows no borders and can affect anyone, anywhere. To effectively address these health challenges, collaboration among individuals, communities, and nations is essential.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, okusaasaana kw'endwadde tekumanyi nsalo era kusobola okukosa omuntu yenna, wonna. Okukola obulungi ku kusoomoozebwa kuno okw'ebyobulamu, okukwatagana wakati w'abantu ssekinnoomu, ebitundu, n'amawanga kikulu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni matye ki kubbe ikin dano, nyaa pa two pe ngeyo wang lobo dok twero balo ngat mo keken, kamo keken. Me tyeko peko me yotkom eni maber, ribbe ikin dano, kabedo ki lobo obedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina, awea naka adekasinei mam ejenete ikoruo ido epedori aimusung idio itunganan, aiboisio kere. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu nuka angaleu, aiswamanara kiding itunga, itunga keda akwapin erai ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alea, azo eyi ma ereta ni boda eyi ku dika eyi eco 'ba dria eyi 'ye ra, pari ciria. E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, ti ecita 'ba yi ma ngulupi yi ma eselea, ongulumu yi ma eselea azini kari yi ma eselea ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, okujanjaara kw'endwara tikurikwetegyerezibwa kandi nikubaasa kuteganisa buri omwe, buri hamwe. Okukora ahaburemeezi obu omu by'amagara, okukwatanisa kw'abantu, ebyanga hamwe n'amahanga nikikuru.

eng_prompt: Today marks a significant milestone for our company, celebrating our achievements and the hard work of our team. It's important to take a moment to appreciate all that we've accomplished together.
lug_prompt: Leero lunaku lwa nkizo nnyo mu kampuni yaffe, nga tujaguza ebituukiddwako n'okufuba kwa ttiimu yaffe. Kikulu okutwala akaseera okusiima byonna bye tutuuseeko nga tuli wamu.
ach_prompt: Tin obedo nino ma pire tek tutwal pi dul megwa, kwero jami ma watimo ki tic matek pa lutic wa. Pire tek tutwal me kwanyo kare me pwoyo jami weng ma watimo kacel.
teo_prompt: Lolo erai aparan naepol noi kanuka ekampunikosi, ainumunum aitodolinikinetawok keda aswam naepol noi naka etimu wok. Erai ibore yenepol noi ayangar apak kanu aisiyalamikin nu iswamat oni nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Andru ri e'yo azi okporu ni amuti amavileri ni, e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi inzizu azini azi okporu amuti amavile 'diyiniri inzizu. Eri orodriru sawa 'duzu afa amani 'yele tualu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Erizooba n'eizooba rikuru omu kampuni yaitu, okujaguza ebituhikiriize hamwe n'okukora n'amaani kwa tiimu yaitu. N'eky'omugasho okutwara akaire tukasiima ebyo byona ebi tutungire hamwe.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in pharmaceutical research and partnerships with international organizations are paving the way for improved healthcare solutions. As a result, Uganda will have access to better drugs in the future.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana eyaakaggwa mu kunoonyereza ku ddagala n'okukolagana n'ebitongole by'ensi yonna biggulawo ekkubo ly'okutumbula ebyobulamu. N'ekinaavaamu, Uganda ejja kufuna eddagala eddungi mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I kwed me yubu yadi ki ribbe ki dule ma aa ki ilobo mapat-pat tye ka yabo yoo me yubu yoo me nongo kony me yot-kom. Macalo adwogi ne, Uganda obi nongo yadi mabeco I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akiro nuka angicak ikee keda aiswamanara keda iriongeta luka akwapin ace itolomete epone loka aitojokar nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, ebuni Uganda adumun ikee luajokak koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌye oꞌdiru eꞌyo eti ondazu aro ma dria ꞌdiyi azini ti icita amuti kari yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi pie ꞌdiyi geri ꞌbani ecozu eꞌyo ꞌyezu alata ma dria ꞌdiyi ma omgbo otuzu ꞌi. E'yo 'disi, kari Uganda niri ni nga aro muke ndeni 'diyi esu ewu drialeri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu kucondooza ahaby'emibazi hamwe n'okukwatanisa n'ebitongore by'ensi yoona, nibitunguura omuhanda gw'okutunguura eby'amagara. Ekyarugiremu, Uganda neija kutunga emibazi mirungi omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: As summer approaches, it's important to consider the health risks associated with mosquito bites. To protect ourselves and our families, we need to make sure there are no mosquito-infested areas near our homes.
lug_prompt: Ng'omusana gunaatera okutuuka, kikulu okulowooza ku bulabe bw'ebyobulamu obuva mu kulumwa ensiri. Okusobola okwekuuma n'okukuuma ab'omu maka gaffe, tulina okukakasa nti tewali bifo birimu nsiri okumpi n'amaka gaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma oro tye ka bino, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom peko ma twero bedo tye ka ober okayo dano. Me gwoko kwo wa ki gangi wa, omyero wanen ni kabedo ma ober tye iye pe tye cok ki gangi wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyapie akwap, ejokuna aomoom atiokisio nu adekasinei nu ikamanara keda aikony naka isiru. Kanu ayuarite awatewok keda ikaliawok, ekot oni awanyun ebe emamete isiru kaiboisio nu idunyasi keda ireriawok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa eli vurisi, eri orodriru egazu e'yo onzikanya rua ala ni yiyia ni 'diyi ma dria. Ama ma ta mbazu ama ma ngulupi azini familia amavile 'diyi pie, le ama ma ne ra kini angu yiyia eyini aa'zu 'diyi aku amavile 'diyi ma ageia yo.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'obutiti ku burikuhika, ni kikuru kumanya akabi akari omu kurumwa ensiri. Okwerinda hamwe n'amaka gaitu, twine kureeba ngu tihariho myanya erimu ensiri haihi n'amaka gaitu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for quality healthcare, significant investments are being made in the infrastructure of hospitals and clinics. These enhancements aim to ensure that all patients receive the best possible care.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'omutindo, okusiga ensimbi okunene kukolebwa mu bikozesebwa mu malwaliro ne mu malwaliro. Enkulaakulana zino zigendererwamu okukakasa nti abalwadde bonna bafuna obujjanjabi obusoboka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo, kitye ka keto lim madit tutwal I odi yadi ki odi yadi. Yub eni tye me neno ni lutwo weng gunongo kony me yot kom maber loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin eipud loka amukian najokan, eutai aitolomun ikapun luipu noi toma adekisia keda adekisia. Alosikinet naka aitojokar iboro ngun ngesi awanyun ebe edumunenete adekak kere amukian najokan kakere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi 'ye angu arojo eyini 'diyi ma alea tualu pari arojo eyini 'diyi pie. E'yo otuza 'diyi lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria azoru 'diyi atita muke ndeni 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwetenga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara oburikukirayo oburungi, enteekateeka y'amaani eriyo neekorwa omu kukora ebyombeko by'amarwariro n'amarwariro. Ebintu ebi bigyendereire kureeba ngu abarwaire boona batunga okuragurirwa okurikukirayo oburungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in infectious diseases, it is crucial for leaders to be well-informed. To effectively address these challenges, a comprehensive training program will be implemented.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okumanya. Okusobola okukola obulungi ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa enzijuvu ejja kuteekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa two ma kobo i kare-ni, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gubed ki ngec muromo. Me tyeko peko magi maber, kibi keto yub me pwonye I tic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi engarenok aijen ejok. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, eponio aitegear ainapeta nuka aitutuoro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ewu 'disi risi, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini aa'zu o'dukoti be kililiru. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, 'ba nga otita imbatani 'diyi 'ye dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu endwara ezirikuturira nizeyongyera, nikikuru abebembezi kumanya gye. Okukora kurungi aha buremeezi obu, enteekateeka y'okutendeka buri omwe neija kuta omu nkora.

eng_prompt: After years of planning and construction, the community eagerly anticipated the opening of the state-of-the-art healthcare center. With the finishing touches being applied, excitement was palpable among the residents.

ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki gedo, lwak obedo ki miti madit tutwal me yabo ot yat manyen. I kare ma kitye ka tyeko tic, yomcwiny obedo tye ikin lutedero.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent health reports highlighting rising medical issues in rural areas, a meeting was organized. Various representatives from healthcare, government, and community organizations gathered to address these pressing concerns.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku alipoota z'ebyobulamu ezaakaggwa eziraga obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu byalo, olukiiko lwategekebwa. Abakiise ab'enjawulo okuva mu byobulamu, gavumenti n'ebitongole by'ebitundu baakuŋŋaanye okukola ku nsonga zino ez'amangu.

lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba eyi obi azita amavile e'yo o'duko eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma vuti, ama nga e'yo siza ci 'diyi ma ale andri. Otita 'di eri orodriru e'yo afa eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu nitukuratira ebiragiro byaitu eby'okureeberera ebihandiiko, nitwija kushwijuma ebihandiiko byona ebiriho. Enkora egi n'eyomugasho omu kurinda ebihandiiko ebihikire kandi ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the spread of malaria has intensified due to factors such as climate change and increased resistance to treatment. As a result, public health officials are increasingly alarmed by the rising number of cases and fatalities associated with this illness.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okusaasaana kw'omusujja gw'ensiri kweyongedde olw'ensonga ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'obutafuna bujjanjabi. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde n'abafa ogweyongedde ogukwatagana n'obulwadde buno.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, nyaa pa two malaria omede matek tutwal pi jami macalo alokaloka me piny ki gengo nongo yat. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom wel dano matye ka nongo two man ki wel dano ma too ikare me two eni.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakin awea naka eimidi kanuka akiro kwape nat aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda ekuse keda amukian. Kanuka ngun, ekuriaka eswamak luka angaleu kanuka enaaba loepol loka adekasinei keda luetwakito kanuka adeka kana.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, azo malaria niri ma ereta ma omgbo tu e'yo ekile e'yo angu mile ni ojazu azini e'yo 'bani aro esuzu ku 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi asi otiza be kalafe tupi 'ba azo be azini 'ba odrapi azo 'di be 'diyisi.

eng_prompt: As we strive to create a more inclusive society, it's essential to address the needs of individuals with various disabilities. One significant area of concern is the support and resources available for those experiencing hearing difficulties.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tufuba okutondawo ekitundu ekirimu abantu bonna, kikulu nnyo okukola ku byetaago by'abantu abaliko obulemu obw'enjawulo. Ekintu ekimu ekikulu eky'okweraliikirira bwe buyambi n'ebikozesebwa ebiriwo eri abo abalina obuzibu mu kuwulira.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yele me yubu kabedo ma dano weng tye iye, pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lugoro. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye kony ki jami ma tye pi jo matye ki peko me winyo lok.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aswam kagogong kanu aitolomun itunga kere, ejokuna aitemokin ipudesia luka ingwalasik luegelegela. Ationis adiope naepol noi nes agangat keda iboro lu ejaas kanu ngul lu mam epupete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Amani okpo 'bazu ongulumu 'ba driasi, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba aco be 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo azi okporu 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri eri atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi 'ba e'yo erizu ewaru 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: Despite recent concerns about the spread of infectious diseases in the region, health officials have reported no new cases of the virus. As a result, Ugandans are still safe from the ebola virus outbreak.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okweraliikirira ku kusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu tebannaba kutegeeza balwadde bapya. N'ekyavaamu, Bannayuganda bakyali bulungi okuva ku kubalukawo kw'akawuka ka ebola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni itye ki lworo I kom nyaa pa two ma kobo I but lobo man, lutic me yot kom pe gumiyo ngec I kom ngat mo keken manyen matye ki two eni. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali me Uganda pwod tye maber ki poto pa two ebola.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekuriaka kwana nuikamunitos awea naka adekasinei nuikopasi kotoma aiboisit, mam eswamak luka angaleu elimoritos itunga luitetiak luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, eringa itunga luko Uganda eyuwara kotoma abwangun naka ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru 'diyi ma talasi azo eyi ma ereta ma dria angu 'di ma alea ra ti, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi olu e'yo 'ba azo nde be 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi nga po'di ageitema be azo ebola niri ma e'dota vurisi.

eng_prompt: Given the rising cases of preventable diseases and the importance of community health, it is crucial that we take action. By raising awareness about the benefits of vaccination, we can help protect our population.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'endwadde eziziyizibwa n'obukulu bw'ebyobulamu mu kitundu, kikulu nnyo okubaako kye tukolawo. Bwe tumanyisa abantu ku miganyulo egiri mu kugema, tusobola okuyamba okukuuma abantu baffe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa two ma gengo ki ber pa yot kom pa lwak, pire tek tutwal ni omyero watim gin mo. I yoo me rweyo lwak i kom ber pa gwero dano, watwero konyo gwoko dano wa.

lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi ma kalafe tuzu tualu orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu alataa be ri be risi, eri orodriru amani e'yo 'yezu. E'yo 'ba eyini imbata fezu orodri aro soza niri ma dria risi, ama eco azakoma fe 'ba amavile 'diyi ma tambazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu endwara ezirikuzibirwa nizeyongyera n'omugasho gw'eby'amagara omu bantu, nikikuru ngu tukoreho. Twamanyisa abantu emigasho y'okugyema, nitubaasa kuhwera omu kurinda abantu baitu.

eng_prompt: It's been a while since our last visit to the doctor, and I think it's important to stay on top of our health. How about we schedule some appointments?

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality and enhance community health, the government has announced a new initiative. This program aims to eliminate financial barriers to healthcare for women.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omwenkanonkano mu kikula ky'abantu n'okutumbula ebyobulamu mu kitundu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo ebiremesa abakyala okufuna obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo ki medo rwom me yot kom I kabedo mapatpat, gamente otyeko cwalo lok angeya manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me kwanyo lageng me lim I kom kony me yot kom pa mon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolorite nuka angor keda ikiliok ka aitojokar angaleu naka itunga, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi alemar atiokisio nuka ikapun nuka angaleu naka angor.

eng_prompt: Tuberculosis is a serious infectious disease that requires careful management and treatment. To effectively combat the infection, patients must adhere to a specific medication regimen.
lug_prompt: Akafuba bulwadde obw'obulabe obusiigibwa era nga bwetaaga okukolebwako n'obwegendereza n'okujjanjabibwa. Okusobola okulwanyisa obulungi obulwadde, abalwadde balina okugoberera enkola y'eddagala etongole.
ach_prompt: Two aona opio obedo two ma kobo oyot tutwal ma mito gwok ki yat maber. Me lweny maber i kom two eni, lutwo omyero gu tii ki yoo me yat ma kiyubu pigi.

lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, kikulu nnyo okutegeera ebiremesa abakyala okwenyigira mu bintu eby'enjawulo. Bwe tugonjoola okusoomoozebwa kuno, tusobola okutondawo embeera abakyala mwe bawulira nga beesigwa era nga basobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for better healthcare, local authorities have prioritized investments in the medical sector. As a result, new health facilities have been established to improve medical services.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obulungi, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bakulembezza okusiga ensimbi mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro amapya gazimbiddwa okutumbula obuweereza bw'ebyobulamu.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo aiyatakin lo amukian najokan, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena kisingarenata aipikakin ikapun toma orionget loka amukian. Kanuka ngun, adukun adekisia nuitetiak kanu aitojokar amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ma dria esele aro niri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba si arojo o'diru 'diyi azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'amagara marungi, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bateire amaani omu kuta esente omu by'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro masya gatandikirweho kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Under his leadership, significant progress has been made in various sectors, improving the quality of life for many citizens. His dedication and commitment to public service have earned him widespread respect and admiration.
lug_prompt: Wansi w'obukulembeze bwe, enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi ekoleddwa mu bitundu eby'enjawulo, okulongoosa omutindo gw'obulamu bwa bannansi bangi. Okwewaayo kwe n'obumalirivu mu buweereza bw'olukale bimusobozesezza okuweebwa ekitiibwa n'okusiimibwa abantu bangi.
ach_prompt: I te tela mege, dongo lobo madit tutwal otimme I tenge mapat-pat, ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa anywali mapol. Dyerene I tic pa lwak oweko dano mapol gubedo ki woro I kome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingarenone ke, aponi kitolomunai apol toma oriongeta luegelegela, aitojokar aijar naka itunga luipu. Apodokinit ke keda ainakina ke kotoma aijanakin itunga einakinit ngesi ayongite ka aisiyalamikin.
lgg_prompt: Driceza erivileri ma palaa, 'ba e'bi angu ezoma angiri 'ye esele ndundu eyi ma alea, dika kari anzi karakara eyi ma edri ma omgbo otu. Eri ma ava azini asi feza azi ngazu o'bi eyidri ri fe eri dri inzita azini ava angiri.
nyn_prompt: Ahansi y'obwebembezi bwe, entunguuka y'amaani ekozirwe omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe, ekyongyeire aha mutindo gw'entuura y'abantu baingi. Okwehayo kwe n'okwehayo kwe omu buheereza bw'abantu, bikamutungire ekitiinisa n'okusiimwa.

eng_prompt: His tireless efforts and unwavering dedication have made a significant impact on our nation's progress. It is important to recognize those who work selflessly for the greater good.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube we ow'obutaweera n'obumalirivu bwe byaleetawo enkyukakyuka mu nkulaakulana y'eggwanga lyaffe. Kya mugaso okusiima abo abakola nga tebeefaako bokka ku lw'obulungi bw'abantu bonna.

teo_prompt: Aswam ke naepol noi keda ainakina ke nes iswamat noi kotoma apol naka akwapuwok. Erai ibore yenejok aijen ngul lu iswamaete agogongu kanu ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'ba ande kokoru azini asi feza erini okpo kokoru ri 'ye orodri angiri kari amavileri ma zota ma dria. Eri orodriru 'ba azi ngapi ikpere kokoru e'yo onyiru 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Amaani ge agatarikuhwa hamwe n'obwegyendesereza bwe, bikozire kihango aha ntunguuka y'eihanga ryeitu. N'eky'omugasho okusiima abo abarikukora n'omutima gwabo gwona ahabw'ebirungi by'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a tidy living space is essential for both physical and mental well-being. A clean environment not only promotes health but also creates a welcoming atmosphere for family and guests.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma ekifo ky'okubeeramu ekiyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'omubiri n'obwongo. Ekifo ekiyonjo tekikoma ku kutumbula bulamu naye era kireetawo embeera ennungi eri ab'omu maka n'abagenyi.

lgg_prompt: Angu aa'zu alaru ri ma tambazu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke rua ni azini omi niri ni. Angu alaru ri ni lu alata ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini angu a'izuri eji familia eyini azini omu eyini.
nyn_prompt: Okubutuura gye n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'omubiri n'omutwe. Eby'obuhangwa ebirikwera, tibirikutunguura magara g'abantu bonka, kureka nibituma ab'omuka hamwe n'abagyenyi batunga obusingye burungi.

eng_prompt: Many patients and their families have expressed gratitude for the exceptional care they received. The dedication and expertise of the staff have made a significant impact on the community.
lug_prompt: Abalwadde bangi n'ab'enganda zaabwe balaze okusiima olw'obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo bwe baafuna. Obumalirivu n'obukugu bw'abakozi bukoze kinene mu kitundu.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing healthcare crisis, it is crucial to empower those on the front lines. To address the pressing issues they face, targeted resources and assistance will be provided.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo okuwa abo abali ku mwanjo amaanyi. Okusobola okukola ku bizibu eby'amangu bye basanga, ebyetaago n'obuyambi bijja kuweebwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal me miyo kero ki joo matye I nyim dul pa gamente. Me tyeko peko ma gitye ka kato ki iye, kimiyo kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka amukian na elosi akonye, ejok aitigogong ngul lu ejaas oingaren. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas kesi, eponio aijaikin iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru okpo fezu 'ba drilea 'diyi dri. E'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba nga afa ayuzaru azini azakoma 'bani lele 'diyi fe eyidri.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare challenges faced by our community, local leaders have prioritized the enhancement of medical resources. This initiative aims to address urgent health concerns and improve patient outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera mu kitundu kyaffe, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakulembezza okutumbula eby'obujjanjabi. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukola ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu ez'amangu n'okutumbula embeera z'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kamede I kabedo wa, lutela me tedero guketo cwiny gi I kom medo rwom me kony me yot kom. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko peko me yot kom ma opoto atura ki medo rwom me kwo pa lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu aiyatakin nuka amukian nu ejaas atutubetekosi, engarenok luka atutubet isingarenitos aitojokar ewai lo amukian. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu ka aitojokar ejautene loka adekak.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for healthcare solutions, the government has initiated a plan to boost local pharmaceutical production. This strategic move aims to reduce reliance on imports and ensure that essential medications are readily available to the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, gavumenti etaddewo enteekateeka okutumbula okufulumya eddagala mu ggwanga. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukendeeza ku kwesigama ku bintu ebiyingizibwa mu ggwanga n'okukakasa nti eddagala ery'omugaso lifunibwa mangu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente okatti ki yub me medo rwom me yubu yadi I tedero. Yub man tye ki miti me dwoko piny rwom me jenge I kom jami ma aa ki lobo mawoko ki bene neno ni yat ma mite pi kwo tye pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo amukian, etolomu apugan ainapeta nu aitopolor aitolomio na ikee kotoma akwapuwok. Alosikinet naka aswamisioit ngin erai aitidisiar agogong naka agwel iboro lu okinga ka aanyun ebe epatana itunga adumun ikee lu itwasamao.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote community wellness, various departments have collaborated on a new initiative. This week, they are focusing on raising awareness about important health issues through targeted advertising.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health crisis, public health officials have launched an educational campaign. This initiative aims to raise awareness and inform the community about the disease.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu batandise kaweefube w'okusomesa abantu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumanyisa abantu n'okubategeeza ku bulwadde.

ach_prompt: Lutwo ma ki nongo ni gitye ki two eni ipol kare gi nongo peko mapol. Niang peko matwero bedo tye pire tek tutwal pi tic ki yat maber.
teo_prompt: Adekak lu inwakunono ejautene lo itereikina duc keda ainingosia. Ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka aimuke.
lgg_prompt: Ba 'bani esu eyi ma rua e'yo 'di be 'diyi sa'wa driasi e'yo ewaru eyi esu. E'yo ewaru ecopi ra 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru azini aro esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abarwaire abarikushangwa baine oburemeezi obu, buriijo nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okwetegyereza akabi akarikubaasa kubaho, n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurira kurungi.

eng_prompt: Every year, millions of people around the world are impacted by infectious diseases. Among these, malaria remains one of the deadliest, particularly threatening vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu okwetooloola ensi yonna bakosebwa endwadde ezisiigibwa. Mu bino, omusujja gw'ensiri kye kimu ku bisinga okutta naddala mu bantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, dano milion mapol I wilobo gi nongo peko me two ma kobo oyot-oyot. I kin magi, malaria pud tye acel me kin two ma kelo too, tutwalle i kom dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Kangol karu, imilionin luka itunga kotoma akwap kere edumununete adekasinei nu ikopas. Kotoma ngul, eringa eimidi erai ediope kotoma lu eyarete noi, kacut itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Eli alu alu vusi, 'ba milioni karakara wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi dri ci azo 'ba eyi erepi eyi ma eselea 'diyisi. Diyi ma eselea, malaria ni nga po'di 'ba eyi o'di okporu ndeni, tutuni 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, obukaikuru bw'abantu omu nsi yoona nibarwara endwara ezirikuturira. Omuri ebi, omushwija gw'ensiri nigwo gurikukirayo kwita abantu, okukira munonga ogurikuteganisa abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: I hope you find some time to relax and enjoy the weekend ahead. Wishing you moments filled with happiness and laughter!
lug_prompt: Nsuubira nti ojja kufuna akadde okuwummulamu n'okunyumirwa wiikendi ejja. Mbaagaliza ebiseera ebijjudde essanyu n'enseko!
ach_prompt: Atye ki gen ni ibinongo kare me yweyo ki nongo yomcwiny I tum pa cabit matye anyim. Amito ni ibed ki kare me yom-cwiny ki nyero!
teo_prompt: Amuno ebe ibuni jo adumun apak naka aiyengun kosodi alelakin esabiti lo ebunit. Amunor jo apakio nu elelete keda aiyalama keda akwena
lgg_prompt: Ma ovu asi 'baza be mini sawa esuzu ava lizu azini ayiko esuzu wikiendi emupi ri ma alia ra. Le mi ma esu sa'wa ayiko be azini guza be tre 'diyi
nyn_prompt: Ninteekateeka ngu noija kutunga obwire bw'okuhuumura nookunda wiikendi erikwija. Nikwendeza obwire burimu okushemererwa n'okusheka

eng_prompt: In response to the rising concerns about public health and safety, officials have been actively assessing the situation. As a result, various prevention measures have been put in place.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku byobulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, abakungu babadde beetegereza embeera. N'ekivuddemu, enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okuziyiza ziteekeddwawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak, lutic gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, ki keto yoo mapat-pat me gengo two.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, eutasi eswamak airereor ejautene. Kanuka ngun, etolomun iwaitin luegelegela lu itikitikere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria, azi'ba eyi e'bi e'yo nde ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba o'ba geri ndundu e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha magara n'obuhwezi bw'abantu, abakungu batwire nibashwijuma embeera. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okuzibira, eteirweho.

eng_prompt: Leaders from various sectors gathered to discuss the pressing issues facing public health today. With rising concerns over chronic diseases and access to care, the agenda focused on collaborative solutions.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze okuva mu bitongole eby'enjawulo baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'amangu abantu ze basanga mu byobulamu leero. Olw'obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku ndwadde ez'olukonvuba n'okufuna obujjanjabi, enteekateeka yeesigamye ku kukolagana.
ach_prompt: Lutela ma aa ki I tenge mapat-pat gugure me nywako lok I kom peko me yot-kom ma dano tye ka kato ki iye I kare-ni. Ki lworo matye kamede I kom two ma pe cang ki nongo kony me yot kom, yub me tic obedo I kom yoo me tic kacel.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok luka iriongeta luegelegela kiriamunos kanu aitemitem atiokisio nu etereikina keda angaleu naka itunga ilolo. Keda aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit adekasinei nu mam enyamio ka adumunun amukian, apodokinit ainapeta ngun aitemokin atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba enga'ba esele ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ewaru o'bi eyini esu 'diyi ma dria. Asi otiza tupi e'yo azo ewule 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'bani ecozu aro esuzu 'diyi ma dria risi, e'yo otuza 'da 'ba asi e'yo otuza tualu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi kuruga omu bitongore ebitarikushushana, baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikukwata ahaby'amagara g'abantu ebiro ebi. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha ndwara ezitarikukira hamwe n'okutunga obujanjabi, enteekateeka ekata amaani aha kukorera hamwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of Ebola in neighboring regions, health officials are prioritizing public awareness. To ensure the safety of all citizens, the ministry will implement a comprehensive education campaign.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kwa Ebola gyebuvuddeko mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakulembeza okumanyisa abantu. Okukakasa obukuumi bwa bannansi bonna, minisitule ejja kuteekawo kaweefube w'okusomesa abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ebola i kabedo ma orumuwa cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom tye ka miyo ngec bot lwak. Me neno ni anywali weng tye agwoka, gangkal obicako yub me pwonyo dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka ebola kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aisisianakin itunga. Kanu awanyun ayuara naka itunga kere, ebuni erionget aitegear aisisianakino naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi imbata fe o'bi eyidri okporu. Kari anzi eyi ma tambazu, okalamvu 'da ni mu otita imbatani 'ba dria eyini ri 'ye.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ya ebora omu byanga ebituherereire, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibahabura abantu. Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abatuuragye boona, minisiture neija kutaho ehururu y'okwegyesa abantu boona.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote public health, the ministry launched a new campaign aimed at encouraging a more active lifestyle. They emphasized that regular physical activity can significantly improve overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu, minisitule yatongoza kaweefube omupya ogugendereddwamu okukubiriza obulamu obweyagaza. Baakakasizza nti okukola dduyiro buli kaseera kisobola okutumbula obulungi bw'omubiri okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak, gangkal ocako yub manyen me cuku cwiny dano me bedo ma komgi yot. Guwaco ni rweyo lee kare ki kare twero medo rwom me kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor nuka angaleu naka itunga, abu erionget kitegea ekampein loitetet lo isinyikokit itunga aijar ejok. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ebe aswam na etapit epedori aitojokar aijar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala otuzu, okalamvu 'da e'do otita azi o'diru 'bani lezu 'ba eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu Eyi 'ba asi kini 'yeta rua ma rua 'diyi ma dria sa'wa driasi 'diyi eco 'ba eyi ma rua ala otu sa'wa driasi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu, minisiture etandikireho ehururu nsya erikugyenderera okukora emirimo y'amaani. Bakashoboorora ngu okukora emirimo y'omubiri buri kaire nikibaasa kwongyera aha magara marungi.

eng_prompt: Health officials are preparing to address the growing concerns surrounding the outbreak. A comprehensive evaluation of the situation is necessary to ensure public safety.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu beetegekera okukola ku kweraliikirira okweyongera okwekuusa ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde. Okwekenenya embeera mu bujjuvu kyetaagisa okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka yubbe me lweny i kom peko ma tye ka nya ma lubbe ki poto pa two eni. Pimo jami weng I kom ngo matye katimme pire tek pi gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Ekapanakinos eswamak lu adekis aitemokin atiokisio nu iyatakinete kanuka abwangun naka adeka. Aingic ejok ejautene ngol kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi eyi otuta 'ye e'yo asi otiza eyini tupi e'yo azo korona niri ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu. Le 'ba ma one e'yo 'da ma eti kililiru nezu kini o'bi eyi ma ageitema kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara bariyo nibeteekateekyera okukora aha nshonga ezirikweyongyera ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara. Okucondooza gye embeera, nikyetengwa, okureeba ngu abantu baguma baine oburinzi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing outbreak, health officials are implementing a comprehensive care plan. This initiative aims to ensure that individuals impacted by the virus receive the necessary resources and assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde okugenda mu maaso, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bateeka mu nkola enteekateeka y'obujjanjabi ey'awamu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukakasa nti abantu abakoseddwa akawuka bafuna ebyetaago n'obuyambi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two eni, lutic me yot kom tye ka kati ki yub me gwoko dano weng. Yub man tye me neno ni dano ma two eni okelo peko i komgi gunongo kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aitegear ainapeta nuka amukian. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe itunga luetirorit ekorona edumunenete iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'dota azo 'da niri ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi otuta aro fezu 'ba dria ni 'diyi 'ba. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba azo 'da ni candi fe 'diyi afa ayuzaru azini azakoma kililiru 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire oburikugyenda omu maisho, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibakora enteekateeka y'okuragurira abantu boona. Ekigyendererwa n'okureeba ngu abantu abateganisiibwe akakooko batunga obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Vaccination is a crucial step in safeguarding public health. Many viral infections, including hepatitis, can be effectively controlled through immunization.
lug_prompt: Okugema ddaala lya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. Obulwadde bungi obusiigibwa akawuka omuli n'obulwadde bw'ekibumba busobola okutangirwa obulungi okuyita mu kugema.
ach_prompt: Gwer obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Two mapol ma kwidi ma kilwongo ni viral infections, ma I kingi obedo hepatitis, kitwero gengo gi maber tutwal I yoo me gwero dano.
teo_prompt: Erai aikis ekato epone loajokan noi loka ayuarite angaleu naka itunga. Adekasinei nuipu, aimoriarit adeka naka emany, epedorio aitikitik ejok kowai lo aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri e'yo azi okporu ni rua ala o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu. Ba eco azo karakara eyi ma aza ko geri aro soza vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika n'omuringo gw'amaani omu kurinda amagara g'abantu. Endwara nyingi, otwariiremu n'oburwaire bwa Hepatitis, nizibaasa kuzibirwa kurabira omu kusirika.

eng_prompt: Recent health assessments have confirmed that the country has effectively managed any potential outbreaks. As a result, travelers can feel confident about visiting the region.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku byobulamu kukakasizza nti eggwanga liddukanya bulungi okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kyonna. N'ekivuddemu, abatambuze basobola okuwulira obuvumu okukyalira ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Kwed me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki omoko ni lobo Uganda tye ki kero me lweny i kom two mo keken matwero poto. Macalo adwogi ne, luwot twero bedo ki tek cwiny me limo but piny eni.
teo_prompt: Aingic na angaleu na pac itigogongori ebe epedorit akwap aitikitik adekasinei nuepedorete abwangun. Kanuka ngun, epedorete alotok aiyalama aipejonokin aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ece kini kari 'di 'ye e'yo azo efupi ra 'diyi ma aza kililiru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aci'ba 'diyi eco aa asi'baza be muzu angu 'da ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza ahaby'amagara okwabaireho obwahati, kukahamya ngu eihanga rikora kurungi okubarukaho kw'endwara. N'ekyarugiremu, abagyenzi nibabaasa kugira obwesigye omu kutaayaayira ekyanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge of misleading content online, the government is taking steps to address the issue. During a press conference, the minister emphasized the importance of verifying information before sharing it.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'ebintu ebibuzaabuza ku mikutu gya yintaneeti, gavumenti ekola ku nsonga eno. Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, minisita yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukakasa amawulire nga tegannagabibwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa lok angeya ma pe atir I kabedo me nywako lok me intanet, gamente tye ka timo gin mo me tyeko lokke. I kare me lok ki lucoo lok angea, minista owaco ni pire tek me niang lok ma peya opokke.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakinio naka akiro nuka elago, euta apugan aitemokin ngun. Kotoma apak naka einer keda arotak iyemuto, abu eminista kitogogong ajokis naka aingic akiro eringa emorete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko enzoru 'diyi ma omgbo o'diru geri oli aliasiri ma e'yosi, gamete ni e'yo 'du e'yo nde ma aza kozu. Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi, minisita 'da fe okpo orodri 'bani e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu rakaka de nga po'di eyi awini eyi awa ku ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebihandiiko ebirikuhabya abantu aha mikutu, gavumenti eriyo neekora kyona ekirikubaasika kukora aha nshonga egyo. Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, minisita akahamya omugasho gw'okushwijuma amakuru tutakagabaniise.

eng_prompt: Our commitment to eradicating this deadly disease drives us forward. Together, we will fight tirelessly for a healthier future for all.
lug_prompt: Obumalirivu bwaffe okumalawo obulwadde buno obw'obulabe bututwala mu maaso. Ffenna awamu tujja kulwanirira ebiseera by'abantu eby'omu maaso ebirungi.
ach_prompt: Cwiny ma watye kwede me lweny i kom two marac eni aye tye ka telowa anyim. Wan weng kacel wabi lweny matek pi anyim maber pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Ainakinawok nuka aikisar adeka na eyangauni sio ngaren. Nepepe, ibuni sio ejie keda agogongu kanu aijar naejok kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza amani azo onzi 'di drozu ri ni ama ma ti oji drile. Amuti tualu, ama nga a'di 'di ande kokoru ewu drusiri ma alata ni 'ba dria ni.
nyn_prompt: Okwehayo kwaitu kumaraho oburwaire obu obw'akabi munonga nikutugumya omu maisho. Twena hamwe, nitwija kurwanirira nyensya y'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread awareness campaigns, many individuals in Africa continue to underestimate the risks linked to hepatitis. This lack of concern may stem from a combination of misinformation and limited access to healthcare resources.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo kampeyini z'okumanyisa abantu, abantu bangi mu Afirika bakyatwala obulabe obuli mu bulwadde bwa Hepatitis nga butono. Obutabeera na kufaayo kuno kuyinza okuba nga kuva ku bubaka obukyamu n'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa mu byobulamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me rweyo lwak i kom two Hepatitis tye mapol, dano mapol I lobo Afrika pud pe gingeyo rac pa two Hepatitis. Bedo peke pa lworo man twero bedo macalo adwogi me ngec ma pe atir ki nok pa yoo me nongo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas aisisianakino naepol noi, mam itunga luipu luko Africa ejenete atiokisio nuikamunitos adeka naka emany. Atiokisio nu aticepak elomunitos kama ejaasi akiro nuarokok keda ikidioko iboro lu itwasamao kanu amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mile oziza ni 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara Africaa 'diyi nga po'di e'yo onzi azo hepatitis niri ni 'diyi ma e'yo ega ku. Asi otiza ma ako 'di eco e'do e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria e'yo onzi 'diyi ma e'yosi azini geri e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo esizu ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ehururu nyingi z'okumanyisa abantu, abantu baingi omuri Afirika nibagumizamu nibaremwa kumanya akabi akarikuruga omu ndwara ya Hepatitis. Okubura okwerarikirira nikubaasa kurugirira aha makuru gatahikire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Health officials are warning the public about the rising number of infectious disease cases in neighboring countries. As a result, Ugandans should be careful because new cases have been found in Congo.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balabudde abantu ku kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu abakwatibwa endwadde ezisiigibwa mu nsi eziriraanyeewo. N'ekivuddemu, Bannayuganda balina okwegendereza kubanga abalwadde abapya bazuuliddwa mu Congo.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka ciko lwak i kom wel dano matye ka nongo two ma kobo i lobo ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali me Uganda omyero gugwoke pien dano mapol gunongo two I lobo Congo.
teo_prompt: Eutasi eswamak lu adekis aikwenyar itunga kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nu ikopas kotoma akwapin nu idunyare. Kanuka ngun, ekot itunga luko Uganda acoit naarai aponi odumunai adekak luitetiak ko Congo.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ma bile ndu liza fe kalafe tupi 'ba azo esupi 'diyi pie kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, le kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma aa milesi a'dusikuni 'ba esu 'ba azo be o'diru 'diyi kari Congo niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara bariyo nibarabura abantu aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'endwara ezirikuturira omu mahanga agatuherereire. N'ekyarugiremu, abanya Uganda bashemereire kwegyendesereza ahabwokuba abarwaire basya bashangirwe omuri Congo.

eng_prompt: Health experts have raised alarms about the recent outbreak. Many individuals are experiencing severe reactions that could lead to serious complications.
lug_prompt: Abakugu mu byobulamu baalabudde ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko. Abantu bangi bafuna ebizibu eby'amaanyi ebiyinza okuviirako ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ludiro me yot kom guciko dano pi peko me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki. Dano mapol tye ka nongo adwogi marac tutwal ma twero kelo peko madongo.
teo_prompt: Apotu ipirioitin luka angaleu kikwenyasi nuikamunitos abwangun naka adeka. Itunga luipu ejaas keda atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Ba nita be e'yo alata ma dria angiri 'diyi fe bile ndu liza e'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi e'yo onzi eyi esu eyini ani ecozu e'yo ewaru eyi ejipi ra 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abakugu omu by'amagara, batwireho okwerarikirira ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara egi. Abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani oburikubaasa kurugwamu oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In today's society, the safety and well-being of children, especially girls, have become increasingly concerning. It is crucial for caregivers to understand the various risks and challenges that young girls face.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abaana naddala abawala byeyongedde okweraliikiriza. Kya mugaso nnyo eri abalabirira okutegeera akabi n'okusoomoozebwa abawala abato kwe basanga.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, ber bedo pa lutino tutwalle anyira tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal. Pire tek tutwal ki joo ma gwoko lutino anyira me niang peko ki peko ma anyira matino nongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, aiyuwara keda aijar naka idwe kacut apesur erai ibore yenepol noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi lu idarete apesur amisiikin atiokisio nuegelegela keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda apesur nudidika.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, ageitema azini aa'ta muke anzi nyiri eyini, tutuni ezoanzi eyini ri, eca asi otiza ru tu. Eri orodriru 'ba e'yo ezoanzi eyini 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ni e'yo ewaru ndundu ezoanzi nyiri eyini esu 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, oburinzi n'amagara marungi g'abaana, namunonga abaishiki, byeyongyeire kwerarikirira. Ni kikuru abarikureeberera abaishiki kwetegyereza akabi n'oburemeezi obu abaishiki abato barikutunga.

eng_prompt: Recent developments indicate a positive shift in the country's economic stability. With new policies in place, the future looks promising for the nation.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko biraga enkyukakyuka ennungi mu by'enfuna by'eggwanga. Nga waliwo amateeka amapya, ebiseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso birabika nga birungi.
ach_prompt: Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu alokaloka maber I tenge me lim I lobo man. Ki cik manyen matye, anyim pa lobo man nen maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuiswamasi pac itodunitos aijulanakineta nuejokuka kotoma akwap. Keda ainapeta nuitetiak, esubit bala ejokuka ingaren naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi e'da ojata onyiru e'yo lonyi ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria. Azita o'diru 'diyisi, ewu drialeri e'da onyiru kari dri.
nyn_prompt: Ebiherize kubaho nibyoreka empindahinduka omu by'entaasya y'eihanga. N'ebiragiro ebisya ebiteirweho, ebiro bya nyensya nibiraganisa eihanga.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak spread and awareness grew, communities began to seek information on effective prevention methods. Health organizations launched campaigns to educate the public about the risks and safety measures.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bwe bweyongera okusaasaana n'okumanyisa abantu, abantu baatandika okunoonya obubaka ku ngeri y'okwewalamu. Ebitongole by'ebyobulamu byatandikawo kampeyini okusomesa abantu ku kabi n'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma poto pa two ne omedde ki rweyo lwak, lwak ocako yenyo ngec i kom yoo maber me gengo ne. Dule ma loyo lok kom yoto kom gucako yub me pwonyo lwak i kom rac pa two ki yoo me gwokke.
teo_prompt: Neautar adeka aisiarakin keda aijen naepol, apotu itunga kogeutu aimo akiro nuikamunitos iwaitin lu itikitikere. Apotu iriongeta luka angaleu kogeutu aisisianakin itunga nuka atiokisio ka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'da ni i erezu tualu mile oziza be tualurisi, ongulumu eyi e'do o'duko nda geri kililiru 'bani ecozu eyi atrizu ra 'diyi ma dria. Amuti alata ni 'diyi e'do ti odaza o'bi eyini imbata fezu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria azini geri ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara ku kwayeyongyeire, abantu batandika kuronda amakuru agarikukwata aha muringo murungi gw'okuzibira. Ebitongore by'ebyamagara bikataho ehururu y'okwegyesa abantu aha kabi n'oburyo bw'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: As the Easter season approaches, the government is encouraging citizens to reflect on the values of hope and renewal. In light of this festive occasion, the ministry wishes Ugandans a happy Easter holiday.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni ya Paasika esembera, gavumenti ekubiriza bannansi okufumiitiriza ku migaso gy'essuubi n'okuzza obuggya. Okusinziira ku mukolo guno ogw'ennaku enkulu, minisitule eyagaliza Bannayuganda oluwummula lwa Paasika olulungi.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me Easter cok, gamente tye ka cuku cwiny anywali me tam I kom ber pa gen ki roc manyen. Ma lubbe ki nino me karama man, Minictry tye kamito ni dano me Uganda gubed ki yweyo me Easter maber.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aparasia nuka epasika, isinyikokinit apugan itunga aomoom nuikamunitos amuno keda aisiteteun. Koipone kalo loka epucit lo, ekoto erionget itunga luko Uganda aiyeng naka epasika loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa Easter niri ni ecazu ogogo, gamete ni kari anzi eyi eka e'yo egazu e'yo asi 'baza ni 'diyi ma dria. O'du natali ni 'diri ma e'yo si, okalamvu 'da le kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma ovu lifu Easter niri ma alia ayikosi.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bwa Paasika ku burikuhika haihi, Gavumenti eriyo neehanangiriza abatuuragye okuteekateeka aha migasho y'amatsiko n'okugarurwa busya. Ahabw'ebiro ebi eby'okujaguza, minisiture neeyendeza abanya Uganda ekihuumuro kirungi ekya paasika.

eng_prompt: Despite significant advancements in medicine and public health, certain infectious diseases continue to pose a severe threat to global health. Among these, malaria remains a leading cause of morbidity and mortality, particularly in tropical regions.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu bujjanjabi ne mu byobulamu by'abantu, endwadde ezimu ezisiigibwa zikyali za bulabe eri obulamu bw'ensi yonna. Mu bino, omusujja gw'ensiri gwe gusinga okuviirako abantu okulwala n'okufa naddala mu bitundu eby'obutiti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dongo lobo tye I tenge me yot kom, two mukene ma kobo ikin dano pud tye ka kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yot kom pa dano I wilobo. I kin magi, malaria pud obedo gin ma kelo two ki too tutwalle I kabedo ma piny lyet.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naka ikee keda angaleu naka itunga, eringa adekasinei ace nuikopasi eraas nuepedorete aimusung angaleu naka akwap kere. Kotoma aiboisio nu, eringa eimidi erai ibore yen eyangaunit adekasinei keda atwakisia, kacut kotoma aiboisio nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota okporu aro ni azini alata o'bi eyini ri ma alea ra ti, azo azi eyi ecopi eyi erepi ra 'diyi nga po'di e'yo onzi eji e'yo alata ni wudrikuru si ri ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, malaria ni nga po'di e'yo 'ba eyini azo fezu azini eyini odrazu 'diyi ma azi tuni angu drioru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka omu by'emibazi n'eby'amagara g'abantu, endwara ezimwe ezirikuturira nizigumizamu kuba akabi aha magara g'ensi yoona. Omuri ebi, omushwija gw'ensiri nigwo gurikukirayo kureetaho oburwaire n'okufa, namunonga omu myanya y'obutiti.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is essential for any successful project. One of the best ways to ensure everyone is on the same page is through regular meetings.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu pulojekiti yonna ewangudde. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi okukakasa nti buli omu ali ku ludda lwe lumu kwe kutuula enkiiko buli luvannyuma lwa kiseera.
ach_prompt: Lok maber pire tek tutwal pi yub mo keken ma cobo miti ne. Yo acel maber loyo weng me neno ni dano weng tye ki tam marom obedo bedo ki kacoke kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka epurojekt loekerianara. Adiopepone loajokan noi loka awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga kere toma akiro adiope ngesi airiamunun duc.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru otita azi drile suzaru ni ni. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu nezu ra kini 'ba dria eyi e'yo alu ma dria ri mitingi eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizagana kurungi n'okw'omugasho omu purogyekiti yoona erikusingura. Omwe aha mihanda mirungi y'okureeba ngu buri omwe aine enteekateeka emwe, n'okurabira omu nkiiko eza butoosha.

eng_prompt: Hepatitis is a serious health concern that affects millions of people worldwide. Increasing awareness and understanding of the disease is crucial for prevention and early detection.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bw'ekibumba kizibu kya maanyi ekiruma obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu mu nsi yonna. Okwongera okumanyisa n'okutegeera ku bulwadde kikulu nnyo mu kuziyiza n'okubuzuula nga bukyali.
ach_prompt: Two Hepatitis obedo peko madit tutwal ma yelo dano milion mapol I wilobo lung. Medo rwom me ngec ki niang I kom two enoni pire tek tutwal me gengo ki niang I kome con.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka emany adeka na itisilanari imilionin luka itunga kotoma akwap kere. Aiyatakin aijen keda amisiikin nuikamunitos adeka erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka ajenun sek.
lgg_prompt: Azo hepatitis niri eri e'yo azi okporu e'yo rua alanisi 'ba milioni karakara eyi 'yepi wudrikurusi ndulu ni i. E'yo mile oziza ma omgbo otuzu azini vata ma omgbo otuzu azo ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo azo 'da atrizu azini eri esuzu drioru.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa Hepatitis n'oburwaire bw'amaani oburikuteganisa obukaikuru bw'abantu omunsi yoona. Okwongyera okumanyisa abantu n'okubahwera kwetegyereza endwara n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira n'okukimanya bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: Advancements in medical research and technology have opened new avenues for disease prevention and treatment. As a result, we are now closer than ever to eradicating some of the most challenging health issues.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza ku by'obujjanjabi ne tekinologiya egguddewo amakubo amapya mu kutangira n'okujjanjaba endwadde. N'ekivuddemu, kati tuli kumpi okusinga bwe kyali kibadde okumalawo ebimu ku bizibu by'ebyobulamu ebisinga okusoomooza.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo I kwed me yot kom ki diro me tet manyen oyabo yoo manyen me gengo ki cango two. Macalo adwogi ne, dong watye cok tutwal ki tyeko peko me yot kom mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aingic naka adekisia keda etatai loakwana engara iponesio luitetiak luka aitikitik keda aimuke adekasinei. Kanuka ngun, idunyasi kwana oni aitikitik atiokisio nuka angaleu nuetioko noi.
lgg_prompt: Angu zoza e'yo vuti ondaza ni azini e'yo tekenologiani aro ma dria 'diyi fe geri o'diru 'bani azo eyi atrizu azini aro esuzu 'diyi ma ti zizu. E'yo 'disi, ama curu'do ogogo e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma azi yi drozu aga oku driorisi.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu kucondooza ahaby'amagara hamwe na tekinorogye, egwireho emihanda misya y'okuzibira endwara hamwe n'okuziragurira. N'ekyarugiremu, hati turi haihi kumaraho bimwe ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikukirayo oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the dedication and sacrifices made by those in the healthcare field become even more evident. Their tireless efforts to care for others deserve recognition and gratitude.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, okwewaayo n'okwefiiriza okukolebwa abo abali mu byobulamu kweyoleka nnyo. Kaweefube waabwe ow'obutaweera okulabirira abalala agwanidde okusiimibwa n'okusiimibwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, keto cwiny ki jalle pa joo ma tiyo ilok me yot kom nen tutwal. Omyero ki mi pwoc ki pwoc pi tic matek ma gitye katimo me konyo jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, ainanakinet keda ainanakineta nu iswamaete ngul luka angaleu ewanyunono noi. Ibusakinit aisiyalamikin keda aisiyalamikin kesi kanu aswam kagogong kanu aidar luce.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, ava feza azini afa feza 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyini 'diyi eca e'da saaru. Le 'ba ma fe awa'difo eyini e'yo eyini 'ye 'ba azi 'diyi ma tambazu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, okwehayo n'okwefeerereza okwakozirwe ab'eby'amagara nikweyongyera kureebeka. Amaani gaabo omu kureeberera abandi, gashemereire kusiimwa.

eng_prompt: In many regions, access to healthcare can be severely limited by poor infrastructure and long distances. Innovative transportation solutions, such as motorcycles, may offer a viable way to bridge this gap and improve medical service delivery.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna obujjanjabi kisobola okukugirwa ennyo olw'ebizimbe ebibi n'ebanga eddene. Enkola z'entambula ez'obuyiiya, nga ppikipiki, ziyinza okuwa engeri ennungi okuziba ekituli kino n'okutumbula obuweereza bw'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, nongo kony me yot kom twero bedo tek tutwal pi jami ma goro ki bor piny. Yoo me wot manyen calo pikipiki twero bedo yoo maber me tyeko peko man ki medo rwom me miyo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, epedori adumunun amukian ationis naarai amamete iboro luepedorete aingarakin keda alosit aiboisio nuelwaka. Iponesio luitetiak luka elose kwape ipikipikin, epedorete aitodolikin ationis na ka aitojokar ejanakine lo amukian.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, geri aro esuzu 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo esi e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ni aa'zu muke ku azini angu eyi ma aa'ta angu ezuru 'diyisi. Geri o'diru acizu 'diyi ekile pikipiki le 'diyi eco geri azi muke ni fe e'yo 'di ma aza kozu azini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okutunga obujanjabi nikuremererwa munonga ahabw'ebyombeko ebitabonaire hamwe n'engyenda ndaingwa. Enkora nungi y'eby'engyenda nka pikipiki, neebaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi bw'okumaraho omwanya ogu n'okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: To ensure that team objectives are being met and standards are upheld, it is essential for leaders to maintain a hands-on approach. Regular evaluations can help identify areas for improvement and reinforce accountability among team members.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti ebigendererwa bya ttiimu bituukiddwaako era n'emitindo gigobererwa, kya mugaso nnyo eri abakulembeze okukuuma enkola ey'emikono. Okwekenenya buli kaseera kusobola okuyamba okuzuula ebifo eby'okulongoosaamu n'okunyweza embalirira mu bammemba ba ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kitye ka cobo miti pa team dok bene kitye ka lubu cik, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gubed ki yoo me tic. Neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede kare ki kare twero konyo me niang kabedo ma omyero kitim iye aloka-loka ki bene medo rwom me tic I kin lumemba me dul tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinio alosikineta nuka etimu ka aitup adoketait, ejokuka engarenok ajaut keda ainapeta nuka aswam. Aitetemonor duc epedori aingarakin ajenun aiboisio nuibusakinit aitojokar ka aitogogong eipone lo itwasamatere itimun.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo amuti 'da ni 'diyi 'ye ra azini 'ba ma 'ba e'yo eyi ma dria ra, eri orodriru 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma dria. E'yo eyi ma ale andrizu sa'wa driasi ri ni nga azakoma fe angu 'bani ecozu eyi otuzu ra 'diyi esuzu dika e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'ba amuti ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebigyendererwa bya tiimu nibihikiirizibwa kandi n'omutindo nigukuratirwa, nikikuru abebembezi kuguma nibakoresa emikono yaabo. Okushwijuma buri kaire nikibaasa kuhwera omu kumanya emyanya y'okutereeza n'okureetaho embaririra omu ba memba ba tiimu.

eng_prompt: In today's medical practice, advanced imaging techniques play a crucial role in diagnosing various health conditions. Patients often wonder about the necessity of these scans during their hospital visits.
lug_prompt: Mu bujjanjabi bwa leero, enkola y'okukuba ebifaananyi ey'omulembe ekola omulimu munene mu kuzuula embeera z'obulamu ez'enjawulo. Abalwadde batera okwebuuza obwetaavu bw'okukeberebwa kuno nga bagenze mu malwaliro.
ach_prompt: I tic me yot kom ma ite kare ni, diro me mako cal ma ite kare ni konyo tutwal I niang peko me yot kom mapat-pat. Lutwo ipol kare gipenye pi miti pa pim magi ka gitye I ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma amukian naka lolo, epone loka ainom aputosia erai lo epol ajokis noi kanu ajenun adekasinei nuegelegela. Etapit duc adekak aomoom nuikamunitos ajokis naka ainwakio na adekis.
lgg_prompt: Arojo eyi ma alea curu'do, geri 'bani e'da gbazu 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo rua ala ni ndundu 'diyi ma eti ondazu. Ba azoru 'diyi sawa driasi yi osu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua andrizu 'diyi ma orodri ma dria eyini mu arojoa risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu marwariro g'erizooba, obukoryo bw'okuteera ebishushani nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya oburwaire butari bumwe na bumwe. Abarwaire nibakira kwebuuza oburemeezi bw'okukyeberwa omu irwariro.

eng_prompt: In the face of countless challenges, healthcare professionals play a crucial role in patient care. Among them, nurses and midwives are often the first line of support for those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kusoomoozebwa okungi, abasawo bakola omulimu munene mu kulabirira abalwadde. Mu bo, abasawo n'abazaalisa be basooka okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko mapol tutwal, lutic yoto kom timo tic mapire tek tutwal I gwoko lutwo. I kingi, lutic yoto kom kacel ki mon ma mon gi nywal ipol kare gubedo joo ma okwongo miyo kony ki joo ma peko tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loka atiokisio nuipu, iswamaete ipirioitin lu adekis aswam naepol noi kanu aidar adekak. Kokidingikec, anaasin keda nu esidook kes duc isingarenitos aigang ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tre 'diyi ma drilea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi azi okporu nga 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu. Eyi ma eselea, nasi eyi tualu oku eyi pie eyi tutuni atita fe 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi dri oko.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi, abashaho nibakora omurimo muhango omu kureeberera abarwaire. Omuri bo, abashaho n'abazaarisa nibo barikubanza kuhwera abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals seek to deepen their spiritual connection and enhance their faith through various practices. Among these, fasting and prayer hold significant importance in many religious traditions.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya okunyweza enkolagana yaabwe ey'omwoyo n'okutumbula okukkiriza kwabwe nga bayita mu bikolwa eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, okusiiba n'okusaba bikulu nnyo mu nnono z'enzikiriza nnyingi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyenyo yo me dongo wat gi ki Lubanga ki dongo niye gi kun gitiyo ki yoo mapatpat. I kin magi, kwero cam ki lega obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro me dini mapol.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi itunga luipu aitogogong arucokina kec kosodete aitogogong aiyuunikec kotoma aswamisio nuegelegela. Kotoma aiboisio nu, ailip ka aisiba eraasi nuepolok noi kotoma odiinin luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi le eyi ma aa'ta eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma aita ma omgbo otu geri ndundu eyisi. Diyi ma eselea, nyaka 'daza azini izita yi orodriru tu e'yo dini ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibenda kwongyera omukago gwabo omu by'omwoyo n'okwongyera okwikiriza kwabo barikurabira omu bikorwa bitari bimwe na bimwe. Omuri ebi, okusiiba n'okushaba n'eby'omugasho omu nganda z'ediini nyingi.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, information spreads rapidly through various channels. As a result, the role of media in informing and educating the public has become increasingly vital.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, obubaka busaasaana mangu okuyita mu mikutu egy'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, omulimu gw'emikutu gy'amawulire mu kutegeeza n'okusomesa abantu gweyongedde okuba omukulu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami woto oyot-oyot tutwal, ngec nya oyot-oyot tutwal I yoo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, tic pa odi poko ngec me miyo ngec ki pwonyo lwak odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda esipidi loepol noi, ekorete akiro katipet kotoma orotin luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, epol noi aswam naka arotak iyemuto kotoma aitijenikin ka aisisianakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, o'duko yi ere mbele geri ndu ndu yi vusi. E'yo 'disi, azi 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ni o'duko fezu azini imbata fezu o'bi yi dri ri eca curu'do orodriru tu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani, amakuru nigajanjaara ahonaaho kurabira omu mikutu etari emwe. N'ekyarugiremu,omurimo gw'abanyamakuru omukumanyisa n'okwegyesa abantu gweyongyeire kuba ogw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the well-being of the youngest members of our society is crucial for a healthier future. Therefore, it is essential for healthcare institutions to focus on enhancing pediatric care and services.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bw'abantu abato mu kitundu kyaffe kya mugaso nnyo eri ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebirungi. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo amalwaliro okussa essira ku kutumbula obujjanjabi bw'abaana.
ach_prompt: Neno ni lutino matino me kabedo wa tye maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi anyim maber. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal pi odi yadi me keto cwiny gi i kom ilo malo rwom me gwoko lutino.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong ejautene loajokan loka itunga ludidik kotoma atutubetekosi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar naejok koingaren. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aiboisio nu amukian aitojokar amukian na idwe.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta muke 'ba oderu amavile ongulumu ri ma alea 'diyi niri eri orodriru ewu drialeri ni aa'zu rua ala be. Ka'dini, eri orodriru arojo eyini asi 'bazu azakoma fele anzi nyiri eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu abato nibatunga amagara marungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya birungi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho amatendekyero g'eby'amagara kuta amaani omu kutunguura obuheereza n'okureeberera abaana.

eng_prompt: The evolving landscape of healthcare has led to a greater appreciation for the roles of various professionals. As a result, the contributions of nurses and midwives have gained significant acknowledgment within the health sector.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka mu byobulamu eviiriddeko okusiima ennyo emirimu gy'abakugu ab'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, obuyambi bwa ba nurse n'abazaalisa bufunye okusiimibwa okw'amaanyi mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka matye katime I tenge me yot kom oweko dano mapol tye ki pwoc pi tic pa ludiro ma padi padi. Macalo adwogi ne, tic pa lu nurse ki mon ma mon gi nywal tye ka nongo pwoc madit tutwal I tenge me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka amukian ayangau aiyalama naepol noi kanuka aswam naka ipirioitin luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiyalamikinai aswam naka anasin keda nu esidook kotoma orionget loka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu alata ni oja'ba 'diyi fe 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi azi 'ba nita be angiri 'diyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi 'ba nurse ru azini oku eyi osipi 'diyini nga ri isu awa'difo angiri esele alata niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'amagara ehindukire, eretsireho okusiima munonga emirimo y'abakugu abatarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, emirimo y'abashaho n'abazaarisa, emanyirwe munonga omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for healthcare professionals, new educational programs have been established. As a result, institutes have now been accepted to train nurses.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abasawo obweyongera, pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza empya zitandikiddwawo. N'ekyavaamu, amatendekero kati gakkiriziddwa okutendeka abasawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic yoto kom, ki kati ki yub me pwonye manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mapat-pat dong kiyee gi me pwonyo lu nurse.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka eswamak luka angaleu, etolomun ainapeta nuitetiak nuka asioman. Kanuka ngun, acamakin kwana isomeroi aitutuonor anasin.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do otita onita ni o'diru 'diyi e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma dria ri ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai curu'do pari onita ni 'diyi nasi eyini imbata fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'abakugu omu by'amagara obweyongyeire, enteekateeka nsya z'eby'obwegyese zitandikirweho. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero gakikirizibwa kutendeka abashaho.
