eng_prompt: Traveling between nations can often involve various regulations and procedures. Many people wonder about the challenges they might face when attempting to cross borders.
lug_prompt: Okutambula wakati w'amawanga kutera okubeeramu amateeka n'emitendera egy'enjawulo. Abantu bangi beebuuza ku kusoomoozebwa kwe bayinza okusanga nga bagezaako okusala ensalo.
ach_prompt: Wot ikin lobe mapat-pat ipol kare kelo cik ki yoo mapat-pat. Dano mapol gipenye I kom peko ma giromo nongo kace gitye ka ngolo wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Alosit kiding akwapin ejaas keda ikisila luegelegela. Ipu itunga lu ejenete atiokisio nu etereikina keda kes kapak kana aitam aitub ikoruo.
lgg_prompt: Acita kari eyi ma eselea ri ma alea azita eyi karakara. Ba karakara eyi e'yo ega e'yo ewaru eyini esu eyini lezu boda eyi alizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okugyenda ahagati y'amahanga, nikitwariramu ebiragiro bingi. Abantu baingi nibeebuuza oburemeezi obu barikubaasa kuhikwaho baaba nibagyezaho kucwekanisa ensharo.

eng_prompt: To ensure the highest quality of care, it is essential for health workers to stay updated on the latest medical practices and protocols. Continuous education plays a crucial role in enhancing their skills and knowledge.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa omutindo gw'obujjanjabi ogusinga, kyamugaso eri abasawo okusigala nga bamanyi ku nkola z'obujjanjabi ezisembyeyo n'emitendera. Okusoma obutasalako kukola kinene nnyo mu kutumbula obukugu n'amagezi gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni rwom me kony me yot kom tye malo, pire tek tutwal pi lutic yoto kom me bedo ki ngec I kom yoo me tic ki cik me yot kom matye manyen. Kwan matye kawot anyim konyo totwal me medo ngec ki diro pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun adoketait naepol noi naka amukian, ejokuna noi eswamak luka angaleu aijen nuikamunitos iponesio luitetiak luka amukian. Asioman na mam enyikokinit erai naepol noi kanu aitojokar acoa kec keda acoa.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini aa'zu o'dukoti edrizu geri arojo ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Onita muzu drile ri ni azi okporu nga ondua eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini onita eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho obujanjabi bw'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, n'eky'omugasho abashaho kuguma nibamanya enkora y'eby'amagara n'ebiragiro ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Obwegyese oburikugumizamu nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura emyoga n'obwengye bwabo.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent outbreak of infectious diseases, it is crucial to prioritize public health. Implementing effective strategies can significantly reduce the risk of transmission.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza ebyobulamu by'abantu. Okussa mu nkola enkola ennungi kisobola okukendeeza ennyo akabi akali mu kusiiga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma kobo cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me keto pi yot kom pa lwak obed gin ma pire tek. Keto yoo me tic maber I tic twero dwoko piny rwom me nyaa pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi aisingarenit nuka angaleu naka itunga. Aitodolikin iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok epedori aitidisiar atiokisio nuka awea.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ni e'dozu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma rua ala niri 'duzu okporu. Geri kililiru 'diyi ma vuti obiza eco e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikuturira, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'amagara g'abantu. Okuta omu nkora oburyo burungi, nikibaasa kukyendeeza munonga akabi k'okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: Ebola has been a significant concern in global health due to its high mortality rate and the outbreaks that have occurred in various regions. Many people are still unaware of its transmission methods and symptoms.
lug_prompt: Ebola ebadde yeeraliikiriza nnyo mu byobulamu mu nsi yonna olw'omuwendo gw'abantu abangi abafa n'okubalukawo kw'obulwadde mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Abantu bangi tebamanyi ngeri gye kisaasaanamu n'obubonero bwakyo.
ach_prompt: Ebola obedo peko madit tutwal I tenge me yot kom I wilobo lung pi too pa dano mapol tutwal ki poto pa two man I but lobo mapat-pat. Dano mapol pwod pe gingeyo kit ma two eni kobo kwede ki lanyut ne.
teo_prompt: Erai ebola aiyalongong naepol noi kotoma angaleu naka akwap kere kanuka atwakisia nuipu noi keda abwangun naka adeka naka ebola kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Mam itunga luipu ejenete epone lo ekorere keda ijenuneta ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ebola niri ebi ovu asi otiza ru wudrikuru ma alea e'yo 'ba eyini odrazu 'diyi ma kalafe angiri azini e'yo efupi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyisi. Ba karakara eyi nini nga po'di geri erini i erezu 'diyi ma dria ku tualu wura erini i erezu 'diyi pie ku.
nyn_prompt: Ebola etwire nereeta okwerarikirira omu by'amagara omunsi yoona ahabw'okufa kw'abantu baingi hamwe n'okubarukaho kw'endwara omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe. Abantu baingi tibarikumanya oku erikuturira hamwe n'obubonero bwayo.

eng_prompt: When we put our heart and effort into our tasks, we often find a deeper sense of fulfillment. This connection between effort and outcome is what drives us to strive for excellence.
lug_prompt: Bwe tuteeka omutima n'amaanyi mu mirimu gyaffe, tutera okufuna obumativu obw'amaanyi. Enkolagana eno wakati w'okufuba n'ebinaavaamu y'etukubiriza okufuba okutuuka ku busukkulumu.
ach_prompt: Ka waketo cwiny ki kero wa I tic wa, wawinyo yomcwiny madit tutwal. Kube matye ikin tute ki adwogi ne aye weko watute matek me timo jami maber.
teo_prompt: Arai ipikakini oni agogongu wok toma aswamisinei wok, idumunenei oni aiyalama naepol noi. Eidicane lo kiding aswam keda aitodolikinio nes isinyikokini oni aswam kagogongu.
lgg_prompt: Aka ama ma asi azini okpo 'ba azi amani 'diyi ma alia, ama sawa driasi ayiko esu angiri. Erita okpo 'bazu azini e'yo efupi 'diyi ma eselea ri eri afa fepi ama dri asi 'bazu e'yo muke 'diyi 'yezu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikuta omutima n'amaani omu mirimo yaitu, nitutunga okumarwa kw'amaani. Enkoragana eri ahagati y'amaani n'ebyarugiremu niyo erikutureetera okurwanirira okukora gye.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the efforts of those who lead with integrity and accountability is essential for fostering a culture of excellence. By celebrating responsible leadership, we encourage others to follow suit and prioritize ethical decision-making.
lug_prompt: Okusiima kaweefube w'abo abakulembera n'obwesimbu n'obuvunaanyizibwa kya mugaso mu kutumbula obuwangwa bw'okusukkuluma. Bwe tujaguza obukulembeze obw'obuvunaanyizibwa, tukubiriza abalala okubukoppa n'okukulembeza okusalawo okw'empisa.
ach_prompt: Miyo pwoc pi tic pa joo ma telo ki ada ki kor tic gi pire tek tutwal pi dongo tekwaro me timo jami maber. I kare ma wakwero tela maber, wacuku cwiny dano me lubu korwa ki me keto tam mabeco obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Ajenun aswam naka ngul luingarenikinitos kopone loajokan ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere iboro ejok. Kowai lo ainumunum engarenone loajokan, isinyikokit sio luce atupakin kosodete aisingarenit aitolomunun aseununeta nuejokuka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba drice'ba e'yo ada be azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ri eri orodriru e'yo onyiru 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo driceza kililiru ri inzizu risi, ama 'ba azi 'diyi eka yi ma vuti obizu azini e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'duzu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Okusiima amaani g'abo abarikwebembera n'obwesigwa n'embaririra n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa. Twajaguza obwebembezi burungi, nituhiga abandi kubukuratira n'okwebembeza okucwamu kurungi.

eng_prompt: Recent assessments have highlighted several areas in need of enhancement within the healthcare system. As a result, various initiatives are being implemented to address these challenges.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga ebintu bingi ebyetaaga okulongoosebwa mu byobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ziteekebwa mu nkola okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa kuno.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kabedo mapol ma omyero ki med rwom me tic I tenge me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye katic ki yoo mapat-pat me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit aiboisio nuipu nuibusakinit aitojokar kowai kalo amukian. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitegear iboro luegelegela kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da angu karakara lepi otuza be geri alata ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati kworeka emyanya mingi erikwetenga kutunguurwa omu by'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi ziriyo nizikorwa kumaraho oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: It's important to take proactive steps for your health. Consider making lifestyle changes that can significantly reduce your risk.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okubaako ky'okolawo ku lw'obulamu bwo. Lowooza ku ky'okukola enkyukakyuka mu bulamu bwo eziyinza okukendeeza ennyo ku bulabe bwo.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me timo jami ma mite pi yotkom ni. Tam kong I kom timo aloka-loka I kwo ni ma twero dwoko piny rwom me two ni.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aswam iboro luibusakinit jo aswam kanuka angaleukon. Koomoom aswam aijulanakineta kotoma aijar kon nuepedorete aitidisiar atiokisio kon.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo 'yezu okporu mi ma rua ala ni. Le mi ma ega e'yo ojata 'yezu geri mini aa'zu ri ma dria ecopi mi ma e'yo ewaru esipi ra 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okukora ebirikwetengyesa aha magara gaawe. Teekateeka aha kukora empindahinduka omu mitwarize yaawe erikubaasa kukyendeeza aha kabi.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, it's easy to overlook the importance of well-being. However, prioritizing our health is essential for a fulfilling life.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, kyangu okubuusa amaaso obukulu bw'okubeera obulungi. Newankubadde, okukulembeza obulamu bwaffe kya mugaso mu bulamu obumatiza.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami woto oyot-oyot tutwal, yot tutwal me cayo ber pa kwo maber. Kadi bed kumeno, keto pi yotkom obed gin ma pire tek tutwal pi kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, epatana apalunit ajokis naka aijar najokan. Konye, aisingarenit nuka angaleu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, eri ewakokoru e'yo orodri aa'zu muke ri ma dria ku. Kani si, e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi 'duzu okporu ri eri orodriru aa'zu edri ayikosi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani, kyanguhi kwehuzya omugasho gw'okuba gye. Kwonka, okwebembeza amagara gaitu n'eky'omugasho omu magara marungi.

eng_prompt: When emergencies arise, quick medical assistance is crucial. One of the primary ways to transport individuals in need of urgent care is through ambulances.
lug_prompt: Ebintu eby'amangu bwe bibaawo, obujjanjabi obw'amangu bwa mugaso nnyo. Engeri emu enkulu ey'okutambuza abantu abeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'amangu kwe kuyita mu mmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Ka peko ma poto atura otimme, kony me yot kom oyot obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yo acel ma pire tek me cwalo dano ma mito kony me yot kom oyot-oyot obedo tic ki ambulance.
teo_prompt: Karai ejai atiokisio nu engeso, epolok noi amukian na atipet. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lu itwasamao kanu aitolot itunga lu ekotos amukian na atipet erai aitwasam amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ka e'do, azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru ri eri orodriru. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu 'ba azoru 'diyi ojizu ri ambulansi eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Habaho oburemeezi bw'amaani, obuhwezi bw'eby'amarwariro obw'ahonaaho n'obw'omugasho. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kutwara abantu abarikwetenga okuragurirwa ahonaaho, n'okukoresa za ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a culture of integrity and trust within their organizations, leaders must prioritize ethical practices. Addressing the pervasive issue of dishonesty is essential for sustainable progress.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obuwangwa bw'obwesimbu n'obwesige mu bitongole byabwe, abakulembeze balina okukulembeza enkola ez'empisa. Okukola ku kizibu ky'obutali bwesimbu ekibunye buli wamu kya mugaso eri enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Me kelo tekwaro me bedo ki ada ki gen ikin dul gi, lutela omyero guket cik me tela obed gin ma pire tek. Cobo peko me camucana ma onya tutwal-li pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo matye kamedde anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor einono lo abeit ka amunokina kotoma oriongeta kec, ekot engarenok aisingarenit iponesio luajokak. Aitemokin ationis naka amamus amunonoro erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo a'da ni azini asi'baza ni otuzu amuti eyivile 'diyi ma alea, le drice'ba eyi ma 'ba e'yo adriza ala ni 'diyi okporu. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'bani e'yo ada kokoru 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okureetaho obuhangwa bw'obwesigwa n'obwesigwa omu bitongore byabo, abebembezi bashemereire kwebembeza emicwe mirungi. Okukora aha nshonga y'obutari bwesigwa, n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka erikugumaho.

eng_prompt: In the intricate web of nature, various organisms play crucial roles in maintaining ecological balance. Among them, certain insects are known to carry pathogens that can affect both human and animal health.
lug_prompt: Mu nkwatagana y'obutonde, ebiramu eby'enjawulo bikola emirimu emikulu mu kukuuma obutonde. Mu byo, ebiwuka ebimu bimanyidwa okutambuza endwadde ezisobola okukosa obulamu bw'abantu n'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapat-pat me cwec ma orumuwa, jami makwo mapat-pat timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. I kingi, ki ngeyo ni anyai mukene gi tingo kwidi ma twero balo yotkom pa dano ki lee.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka Edeke, iswamaete iboro luegelegela aswam naepol noi kanu aidar aiboisio nuka Edeke. Kanejaas kesi, ejenasi ikur ice keda adekasinei nuepedorete aimusung angaleu naka itunga keda itiang.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyakuni 'diyi ma alia, afa idriru ndu ndu 'diyi azi okporu nga afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu tro tro. Yi ma eselea, 'ba ni osasaa azi 'diyi ma rua azo 'ba eyini azini anyapa eyini 'diyi ejipi ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'obuhangwa, ebintu ebitari bimwe na bimwe nibikora omurimo gw'amaani, okureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Omuri byo, obukooko obumwe nibumanywa nk'oburikutwara oburwaire oburikubaasa kushiisha amagara g'abantu n'amatungo.

eng_prompt: Hepatitis is a viral infection that affects the liver and can lead to serious health complications. It's important to understand its causes, symptoms, and prevention methods.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bw'ekibumba buluma ekibumba era busobola okuleeta obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu bulamu. Kya mugaso okutegeera ebigiviirako, obubonero n'engeri y'okuziyizaamu.
ach_prompt: Two Hepatitis obedo two ma kwidi ma kelo ma balo kwidi pa dano dok twero kelo peko mapol tutwal I kom dano. Pire tek tutwal me niang ngo ma kelo, lanyut, ki yoo me gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka emany adeka naka ekorona na itolitoli ekurut ido epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin iboro lu eyangaununei, ijenuneta, keda iwaitin lu itikitikere.
lgg_prompt: Hepatitis eri azo omvele viral infection ruri'i dika eri eco fe e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi pie ra. Eri orodriru afa eri fepi 'diyi vazu, wura erini e'dazu 'diyi azini geri 'bani ecozu eri atrizu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa Hepatitis n'oburwaire oburikuturira oburemeezi bw'ekibumba kandi nibubaasa kurugwamu oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ekirikubireeta, obumanyiso bwakyo, n'emihanda y'okukyebera.

eng_prompt: In times of reflection, we find ourselves contemplating the lives of those who have passed. Their stories linger in our hearts and minds, shaping our memories and traditions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okufumiitiriza, twesanga nga tufumiitiriza ku bulamu bw'abo abaafa. Emboozi zaabwe zikyali mu mitima gyaffe ne mu birowoozo, nga zikola ku bijjukizo byaffe n'ennono zaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lwodo lok, wanongo watye ka lwodo lok I kom kwo pa jo ma otoo. Ododo meggi pud tye I cwiny wa ki I adam wa, ki yubu jami ma wigi poo I komgi ki tekwaro wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu aomoom, iwanyuni oni awanyun aijar naka ngul lu atuboros. Ejaasi akiro kec toma otauwok keda aomisiowok, aitodolikin aiitunetekosi keda inonosio wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa amani e'yo egazu 'diyi ma alea, ama ama esu ama e'yo ega 'ba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma edri ma dria. E'yo yi ma dria 'diyi ovu ama ma asi azini omi ma alia, e'yo ama ma e'yo egazu azini e'yo a'bini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuteekateeka, nitushanga nituteekateeka aha magara g'abo abafiire. Emboozi zaabo zikaguma omu mitima yaitu n'ebiteekateeko byaitu, nizikora aha biteekateeko byaitu n'emigyenzo yaitu.

eng_prompt: Food safety is a critical concern for many people, especially when it comes to consuming perishable items. Understanding the risks associated with contaminated food is essential for maintaining good health.
lug_prompt: Obukuumi bw'emmere kintu kikulu nnyo eri abantu bangi naddala bwe kituuka ku kulya ebintu ebyonooneka amangu. Okutegeera akabi akali mu kulya emmere eyonoonese kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Gwoko cam maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kom dano mapol tutwalle ka odok ilok me camo cam ma bale oyot-oyot tutwal. Niang rac pa cam ma obale pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom.
teo_prompt: Ayuwara na inyamat erai ibore yenepol noi lo epodokinit itunga luipu, kacut kanu ainyam iboro luepedorete aibiror. Ajenun atiokisio nu ikamanara keda inyamat lu ekorono ejok kanu aidar angaleu najokan.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka ma tambaza eri asi otiza okporu 'ba karakara eyini tuni ka eca nyaka ecopi i ezapi mbeleru 'diyi nyazu ria. Onita e'yo onzi nyaka ezapi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru aa'zu rua ala be.
nyn_prompt: Ebyokurya ebitaine kabi n'ekintu ky'omugasho munonga aha bantu baingi, namunonga ku kirikuhika aha kurya ebyokurya ebirikufa juba. Okwetegyereza akabi akarikuruga omu by'okurya ebirimu obukooko, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain public trust and ensure effective governance, it is essential for government organisations to operate with transparency and responsibility. This commitment to ethical practices fosters a culture of accountability.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu n'okulaba nti waliwo obukulembeze obulungi, kikulu nnyo ebitongole bya gavumenti okukola mu bwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okwewaayo kuno eri enkola ez'empisa kutumbula obuwangwa bw'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko gen pa lwak ki tela maber, pire tek tutwal ni dul mapat-pat pa gamente omyero gutii ki ada. Keto cwiny eni me timo jami maber weko dano bedo ki tekwaro me tic ki kor tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar amunokina naka itunga ka aanyun ebe ejai epugae loajokan, ejokuna noi iriongeta luka apugan aswam koipone kalo ecai. Alosikinet ngin mama ejaasi iponesio luajokak isinyikokini itunga aitodun ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma asi'baza ma ta mbazu azini driceza kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru amuti gameteni 'diyini azi ngazu e'yo ada be azini e'yo ada be. Asi 'baza 'di 'yeta kililiru 'diyi ma dria ri ni e'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obwesigye bw'abantu n'okureeba ngu hariho obwebembezi burungi, nikikuru ebitongore bya gavumenti kukoresa amazima n'obujunaanizibwa. Okwehayo aha mitwarize mirungi nikureetaho engyenderwaho y'embaririra.

eng_prompt: To provide quality care and ensure patient safety, healthcare facilities must prioritize their resources. A well-equipped hospital can significantly improve treatment outcomes and streamline operations.
lug_prompt: Okuwa obujjanjabi obw'omutindo n'okukakasa obukuumi bw'abalwadde, amalwaliro galina okukulembeza eby'obugagga byago. Eddwaliro eririmu ebikozesebwa ebirungi lisobola okulongoosa ennyo obujjanjabi n'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Pi miyo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo ki gwoko lutwo, odi yadi omyero guket lim gi obed gin ma pire tek. Ot yat ma tye ki jami weng ma mite twero yubu kit ma ot yat tiyo kwede dok weko tic bedo yot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aijanakin amukian najokan ka awanyun ebe eyuwara adekak, ekot adekisia aisingarenit iboro kec. Adekis naejaasi keda iboro lu itwasamao ejok epedori aitojokar amukian ka aitapatan aswam.
lgg_prompt: Aro fezu kililiru azini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu, le pari arojo ni 'diyi ma 'ba afa eyini ayu 'diyi okporu. Arojo afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie kililiru ri eco aro esuza ma omgbo otu dika azi ngaza ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuheereza obujanjabi burungi n'okurinda abarwaire, amarwariro gashemereire kwebembeza eby'obugaiga byago. Eirwariro eririmu ebikwato birungi, niribaasa kwongyera aha burwaire bw'abantu n'emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Numerous studies have shown the harmful effects of smoking and tobacco use. As a result, public health officials are increasingly concerned about its impact on society.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okungi kulaga obulabe bw'okunywa sigala n'okukozesa taaba. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri gye kikosaamu abantu.
ach_prompt: Kwed mapol onyuto rac pa mato taa. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ka paro tutwal I kom adwogi ne I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu aingic naepol itodutu atiokisio nuka aimat esigala keda etaba. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos eswamak luka angaleu nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza karakara eyi e'da e'yo onzi taba seza ni 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba alatani o'bi eyini 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo erini eco 'ye o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kwingi kworeka akabi akari omu kureesa etaabe. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu by'amagara, beeyongyeire kufayo aha bikwatireine n'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: It is essential for a country's citizens to have equitable access to the wealth and resources that their land provides. This principle ensures that the benefits of natural resources contribute to the well-being of the nation's people.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo bannansi b'eggwanga okufuna mu bwenkanya eby'obugagga n'ebintu ebiva mu ttaka lyabwe. Omusingi guno gukakasa nti emigaso gy'obugagga obw'obutonde giyamba ku bulungi bw'abantu b'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal pi anywali me lobo moni me nongo lonyo ki jami ma lobogi miyo. Cik man neno ni ber pa lonyo ma lubanga aye ocweyo tye pi ber bedo pa dano me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga luka akwapuwok adumunun abar keda iboro lu ijaikitos alupok kec. Itodunit ainapeta ngun ebe ajokis naka isuban luka Edeke eyauni aijar naka itunga luka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru kari anzi eyini ecozu lonyi kari eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi esuzu trotro. E'yo 'di ni ne ra kini orodri afa nyakuni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe kari ma 'ba eyini aa'zu muke.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho munonga abatuuragye b'eihanga kutunga obugaiga n'ebintu ebi eitaka ryabo ririkureeta. Omusingye ogu nigureeba ngu emigasho y'eby'obuhangwa neeyongyera aha mutindo gw'abantu b'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Investing in education and empowerment for young girls is essential for sustainable development. As we look towards the future, it becomes increasingly clear that the potential of every girl must be recognized and nurtured.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza n'okutumbula abawala abato kya mugaso mu nkulaakulana ey'olubeerera. Nga tutunuulira ebiseera by'omu maaso, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obusobozi bwa buli muwala bulina okusiimibwa n'okukuzibwa.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan ki ilo rwom pa anyira matino pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo matye kamedde anyim. Ka watye ka neno anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni kero pa anyira weng omyero onong pwoc ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman ka aitigogong apesur nudidika erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naejok. Kwape sio esesenete ingaren, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit ajenun apedorosio nuka apesur ka aitopolor kes.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu onita ma alia azini ezoanzi nyiri eyini okpo fezu ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. Amani angu ndreria ewu drialeri vu, eri e'da kililiru kini le 'ba ma esu okpo ezoanzi dria eyini ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omuby'obwegyese n'okutunguura abaishiki, n'eky'omugasho omu ntunguuka erikugumaho. Ku turikureeba omu biro by'omumaisho, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu obushoboorozi bwa buri mwishiki bushemereire kumanywa n'okureebererwa.

eng_prompt: Many cultural institutions strive to engage the community by offering various programs. One way they do this is through exhibitions that provide free services for the public.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ebyobuwangwa bingi bigezaako okukwataganya abantu nga bigaba pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo. Engeri emu gye bakikolamu kwe kuyita mu myoleso egiwa abantu obuweereza obw'obwereere.
ach_prompt: Dul me tekwaro mapol tye ka yele me kelo yub mapat-pat I kabedo gi. Yo acel ma gitimo kwede man obedo ki yub me nyuto jami ma gitiyo kwede me miyo kony me nono bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Ipu iriongeta lu inonosio lu iswamaete kagogongu kanu aitodolikin itunga kowai lo aitolot ainapeta nu egelegela. Epone ediope loiswamaete kesi ngun ngesi kotoma aitodianareta nueinanakinete itunga aijaanakinio natitai.
lgg_prompt: Pari e'yo suruni 'diyi ondrepi karakara eyi okpo 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea otita ndundu eyi 'yezu. Geri azi alu yini ecozu 'diri 'yezu ri geri afa ndundu eyi e'dazu o'bi eyidri azakoma pirini 'diyi fezu o'bi eyidri risi.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'eby'obuhangwa ebingi nibigyezaho kwejumba omu by'obuhangwa kurabira omu puroguraamu z'emiringo mingi. Omuringo gumwe ogu barikukoramu eki n'okurabira omu myoreko erikuheereza abantu obuheereza obwa busha.

eng_prompt: In a diverse society, understanding and tolerance are essential for peaceful coexistence. Embracing our differences can lead to a more harmonious community.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu ab'enjawulo, okutegeera n'okugumiikiriza bikulu nnyo mu kubeera awamu mu mirembe. Okukkiriza enjawukana zaffe kisobola okuleetawo ekitundu eky'obumu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano tye ma pat pat, niang ki diyo cwiny obedo gin ma pire tek pi kuc bedo tye. Jolo apoka poka wa twero kelo ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuegelegela, amisiikin keda atitingikinit eraasi nuepolok noi kanu aimorikikina. Aicam atiaketait wok epedori ayangaun aimorikikina kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ndundu eyi ma alea, vata azini ti ecita eri orodriru aa'ta tualu asianzu si. E'yo ama esele cozu 'diyi atizu ri eco fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'emitwarize etarikushushana, okwetegyerezana n'okugumisiriza n'eby'omugasho omukutuura hamwe omu busingye. Okwikiriza entaaniso zaitu nikibaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In today's society, the role of men in family dynamics is more crucial than ever. It is essential for them to embrace their responsibilities and lead by example.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, omulimu gw'abasajja mu nkulaakulana y'amaka mukulu nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Kya mugaso nnyo gye bali okwaniriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe n'okukulembera nga bateekawo ekyokulabirako.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, tic pa coo I kwo me ot pire tek tutwal. Pire tek tutwal ni gumak tic gi dok gunyut lanen maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, epol noi aswam naka ikiliok kotoma okalia adepar kapakio nukokau. Erai ibore yenepol noi kesi acamun aswamukec kosodete aingarenikin keda awanyunet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, azi agupi eyini familia eyi ma alea ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Eri orodriru eyini azi eyini 'diyi 'duzu dika eyi ma ce dri eceta si.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, omurimo gw'abashaija omu maka ni mukuru munonga. N'eky'omugasho munonga okwetwa obujunanizibwa bwabo n'okwebembera n'eky'okureeberaho.

eng_prompt: It's important to stay informed about your well-being and make educated decisions. To do this effectively, you should actively look for reliable sources of information regarding health matters.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okumanya embeera yo n'okusalawo obulungi. Okukola kino obulungi, olina okunoonya ensibuko z'amawulire ezesigika ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me bedo ki ngec i kom kwo ni ki dok me moko tam maber. Me timo man maber, omyero iyeny kama itwero nongo iye ngec ma genne I kom lok me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenejok aijen nuikamunitos aijarakon kosodi aitolomun aseununeta nuisisia. Kanu aswam ngun ejok, ekot ijo aimo akiro nuka abeit nuikamunitos angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru aa'zu o'dukoti be mi ma edri ma dria dika le mi ma 'du e'yo onita be. E'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru, le mi ma nda geri 'bani ecozu e'yo nzezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kuguma nomanya ebirikukukwataho n'okusharamu kurungi. Okukora eki kurungi, oshemereire kuronda oburugo bw'amakuru burikwesigwa agarikukwata ahaby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In today's economy, many individuals are constantly seeking ways to save money. As a result, they are often drawn to options that require no financial commitment.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino, abantu bangi buli kaseera banoonya engeri y'okutereka ssente. N'ekivuddemu, batera okusikirizibwa eri enkola eziteetaagisa kwewaayo mu by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim me kare-ni, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me gwoko cente. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gimaro timo jami ma pe mito cente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio luka aimono ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aswam iboro lumam ekotosi kesi ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi sa'wa driasi geri nda robia ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo eyi 'yepi robia lepi ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya eby'erizooba, abantu nibaronda oburyo bw'okubiika sente. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakunda ebintu ebitarikwetenga sente.

eng_prompt: The field of immunology has made significant advancements in developing vaccines for various diseases. However, there remains a question about the extent to which all diseases can be prevented through immunization.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'okuziyiza endwadde kikoze enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kukola eddagala erigema endwadde ez'enjawulo. Newankubadde, wakyaliwo ekibuuzo ku ngeri endwadde zonna gye ziyinza okwewalibwamu okuyita mu kugema.
ach_prompt: Tenge me kwed i kom gengo kwidi tye ka dongo tutwal I yub me yubu yat agwera pi two mapat-pat. Kadi bed kumeno, lapeny pud tye I kom rwom ma two weng twero genge kwede ki yat agwera.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi aisisia naka adekasinei kanu adumun ikee luikisere adekasinei nuegelegela. Konye, eringa ejai aingiset naikamunit adoketait na epedorio aitikitik adekasinei kowai lo aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu azo atrizani 'diyi ma e'yo ondrezuri 'ye zota okporu e'yo aro soza azo ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi ma edeta ma alea. Kani si, zita azi nga kiri e'yo azo dria 'bani eco atri aro soza si ri ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'okurwanisa oburwaire kitungire entunguuka y'amaani omu kukora emibazi y'okusirika oburwaire butari bumwe na bumwe. Kwonka, hakiriho ekibuuzo ekirikukwata aha buremeezi oburikubaasa kuzibirwa kurabira omu kusirika.

eng_prompt: As the world faces an increasing number of viral outbreaks, it is crucial for individuals and communities to come together. By sharing knowledge and resources, we can better equip ourselves to combat these health threats.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi eyolekaganye n'omuwendo gw'okubalukawo kw'akawuka ogweyongera, kya mugaso nnyo eri abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu okujja awamu. Nga tugabana amagezi n'ebikozesebwa, tusobola okwetegekera okulwanyisa ebintu bino eby'obulabe eri obulamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka nongo nyaa pa two corona, pire tek tutwal pi dano ki kabedo mapatpat me ribbe kacel. Ka wapoko ngec ki jami ma mite, watwero lweny i kom peko me yot kom magi.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda eikor loka adekasinei, ejokuna noi itunga keda atutubena aimorikikin. Kowai lo aimor acoa keda iboro, ipedori oni aitiji atiokisio nu angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni e'yo azo korona niri ma e'dota ni tuzu tutu risi, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu azini ongulumu eyini emuzu tualu. Ondua azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi awaza vusi, ama eco ama ma ngulupi a'di 'dizu e'yo onzi 'diyi be ra.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurabana n'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obweyongyeire, n'eky'omugasho abantu n'ebyanga kukorera hamwe. Okugabana obwengye n'ebintu, nitubaasa kurwanisa gye ebirikuteganisa eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Many people have been debating the health effects of tobacco for years. With so much conflicting information out there, it's hard to know what to believe.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi babadde bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku bulabe bwa taaba eri obulamu okumala emyaka. Olw'okuba waliwo amawulire mangi agakontana, kizibu okumanya eky'okukkiririzaamu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gubedo ka lok i kom adwoki marac ma taa kelo i kom dano pi mwaki mapol. Ki ngec mapol tutwal matye katimme, tek tutwal me ngeyo ngo ma omyero i ye.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aipegeta nuikamunitos atiokisio nuka etaba kanu ikar luipu. Keda akiro nuipu nuegelegela, etiono aijen nu ebeit aiyuun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ebi agbatara gba e'yo onzi taba ni 'diyi ma dria eli karakara eyi ma alea. E'yo karakara eyi ecipi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea, eri ewaru nizu a'di afa 'bani a'i ri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi batwire nibahanuura aha kabi akari omu kureesa etaabe kumara emyaka mingi. Ahabw'amakuru maingi agarikuhakanisa, kigumire kumanya eki oshemereire kwikiriza.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the dedication and sacrifices made by those on the front lines become even more apparent. It is essential to acknowledge the invaluable contributions of both soldiers and health workers.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, okwewaayo n'okwefiiriza okukolebwa abo abali ku mwanjo kweyoleka nnyo. Kya mugaso okusiima emirimu egy'omuwendo egikolebwa abajaasi n'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, keto cwiny ki jalle pa joo matye I nyim lweny nen tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me pwoyo tic pa lumony ki lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, ainanakinet keda aijar naka ngul luejaasi toma orionget loingarenikinit kes ejenuna noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi aisiyalamikin aswam naejok na isirikaalei keda eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, ava feza azini afa feza 'ba a'di 'dipi e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea 'diyini 'diyi eca e'da saaru. Eri orodriru 'ba asikari ru azini azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma azi orodriru 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, okwehayo n'okwefeerereza okwakozirwe abo abari omu myanya y'okubanza nikweyongyera kureebeka. N'eky'omugasho okusiima obuhwezi bw'amahe n'abashaho.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, where misinformation spreads rapidly, it's crucial to rely on credible sources for accurate news. Many people are turning to established media outlets for their information, valuing their journalistic integrity.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, nga obubaka obukyamu busaasaana mangu, kya mugaso nnyo okwesigama ku nsibuko ezesigika okufuna amawulire amatuufu. Abantu bangi baddukira mu mikutu gy'amawulire eminywevu okufuna amawulire gaabwe, nga batwala obwesimbu bw'amawulire gaabwe nga bwa muwendo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok angea ma pe atir tye ka nyaa oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal me jenge I kom kabedo ma gen tye iye pi lok angea matir. Dano mapol tye ka cito bot odi poko ngec ma oywek pi nongo ngec gi, kun giworo tic gi macalo lucoo lok angeya.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ne ekorere akiro nukarokok katipet, ejokuna noi amunokina aiboisio nu eyuara kanu aikam iyemuto lu abeit. Eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin aiboisio nuka iyemuto kanu adumun akiro kec, ido eyangaritos kesi akiro nuka airot iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, o'duko enzoru 'diyi erepi mbeleru, eri orodriru asi'bazu geri 'bani asi'bazu 'diyi ma dria e'yo a'da 'diyi esuzu. Ba karakara eyi eyi oja eyi pari o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi vu eyini e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi esuzu eyini ani e'yo 'ba osisiani 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu kililiru risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, ahu amakuru g'ebishobobo garikujanjaara juba, n'eky'omugasho okwesiga oburugo oburikwesigwa, okutunga amakuru agahikire. Abantu baingi nibahindukira aha mikutu y'amahurire eriho obwahati, okutunga amakuru gaabo, ahabw'okugira ngu nibatwara eby'amahurire gaabo nk'eby'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, the spread of pathogens has become a significant concern for public health. As we navigate through various environments, we must remain vigilant about the potential for illness.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, okusaasaana kw'endwadde kufuuse okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi eri obulamu bw'abantu. Nga tutambula mu bifo eby'enjawulo, tulina okusigala nga tuli bulindaala ku busobozi bw'endwadde.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni ma kubbe tye, nya pa kwidi ma kelo two odoko peko madit tutwal pi yot kom pa lwak. Ka watye ka wot I kabedo ma pat pat, omyero wabed ma wangwa twolo pi peko me two.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina, awea naka adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka itunga. Kwape ilosi oni kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, ekot oni acoite nuikamunitos adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo azo erepi 'diyi ma ereta eca asi otiza amboru e'yo alata o'biyini 'diyi ma dria. Amani aciria angu ndundu eyi ma alea, le ama ma aa mile be e'yo azo eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, okujanjaara kw'endwara kuhindukire okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha magara g'abantu. Twaba nitutambura omu myanya etari emwe, twine kuguma tweteekateekire aha ndwara ezirikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: As global health challenges continue to evolve, countries must prioritize their public health strategies. Understanding the factors that contribute to disease outbreaks is essential for effective prevention and response.
lug_prompt: Ng'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna kweyongera okukyuka, amawanga galina okukulembeza enteekateeka zaago ez'ebyobulamu. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako okubalukawo kw'endwadde kya mugaso nnyo mu kuziyiza n'okukola ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Macalo peko me yot kom I wilobo tye kamede ki dongo, lobo mapat-pat omyero guket yub gi me yot-kom obed gin ma pire tek. Niang ngo ma kelo poto pa two obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gengo ki lweny i kom two.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos atiokisio nuka angaleu kotoma akwap kere, ekot akwapin aisingarenit nuka angaleu naka itunga. Amisiikin iboro lu eyangaununete abwangun na adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik keda aitemokin.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi wudrikurusiri ni mu drile, le kari eyi ma 'ba okpo e'yo eyini 'ye e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo fepi azo eyi ma e'dota ni 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo eyi atrizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara omu nsi yoona ku burikugumizamu nibuhinduka, amahanga gashemereire kwebembeza enteekateeka zaago ez'eby'amagara. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho okubarukaho kw'endwara n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira n'okukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, the ability to access and understand data is crucial for making informed decisions. Without accurate information, we risk navigating through uncertainty and confusion.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, obusobozi bw'okufuna n'okutegeera obubaka bukulu nnyo mu kukola okusalawo okulungi. Awatali mawulire matuufu, tuli mu katyabaga k'okutambulira mu butakakasa n'okutabulwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, kero me nongo ki niang lok angeya pire tek tutwal pi moko tam matye ki ngec matut. Labongo ngec matir, watye ki peko me bedo ki akala-kala ki anywena-nywena.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, apedorit adumunun ka amisikin akiro erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun aseununeta. Arai emamei akiro nu abeit, itereikina oni keda amamus aijen ka aitolitol akiro.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, ecozu e'yo yi isuzu azini vazu ri eri orodriru e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'yezu. O'duko kililiru kokoru, ama eco mu e'yo ewaru ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikutamburira ahonaaho, okubaasa kutunga n'okwetegyereza ebihandiiko n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kucwamu kurungi. Hatariho amakuru agahikire, nitubaasa kutambura omu butaine buhame n'okubuzabuzibwa.

eng_prompt: To prevent the spread of contagious diseases, it is crucial to implement strict health protocols. One of the most effective measures is to ensure that infected patients are kept away from those who are healthy.
lug_prompt: Okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, kikulu nnyo okussa mu nkola amateeka g'ebyobulamu amakakali. Ekimu ku biyinza okukolebwa kwe kukakasa nti abalwadde tebabeera kumpi n'abo abalamu.
ach_prompt: Me gengo nya pa two ma kobo oyot, pire tek tutwal me lubu cik ma kwako yot kom. Yo acel maber loyo weng en aye me neno ni lutwo pe gubedo cok ki jo ma komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi aitup ainapeta nuka angaleu. Adiopet koboro lu iswamaete ejok ngesi awanyun ebe mam adekak lu edekasi ejai nepepe keda ngul lu engalete.
lgg_prompt: Azo eyi ma ereta atrizu, eri orodriru azita okporu e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Eꞌyo ꞌbani eco ꞌye kililiru ꞌdiyi ma azi eri ꞌbani ꞌba azo be ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazu ꞌba azo be ꞌdiyi vurisi re.
nyn_prompt: Okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara. Kimwe ahabirikubaasa kukorwa n'okureeba ngu abarwaire batakwatanisa n'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: The outbreak of the virus has raised significant concerns among health officials worldwide. With its rapid transmission and high mortality rate, the threat posed by Ebola cannot be underestimated.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'akawuka kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna. Olw'okusaasaana amangu n'omuwendo gw'abafa omungi, akabi akali mu Ebola tekayinza kubuusibwa maaso.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two eni okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin lutic me yot kom I wilobo lung. Kit ma two ebola kobo oyot-oyot tutwal ki wel dano ma too oyot-oyot tutwal, pe watwero cayo rac pa two ebola.
teo_prompt: Abu abwangun naka ekorona koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu kotoma akwap kere. Keda awea na atipet keda atwakisia nuipu, mam epedorio aitidisiar aitukurianeta nuka ebola.
lgg_prompt: Azo 'da ma e'dota eji asi otiza okporu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea wudrikurusi ndulu. E'yo erini i erezu mbeleru azini 'ba odrapi 'diyi ma kalafe angiri risi, 'ba econi e'yo ewaru azo ebola niri ni eji ri ma omgbo esi ku.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'akakooko, kireesire okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bakuru b'ebyamagara omunsi yoona. Ahabw'okujanjaara kw'oburwaire bwa Ebola ahonaaho hamwe n'okufa kw'abantu baingi, akabi akarikuruga omuri Ebola tikarikubaasa kutwarwa nk'ak'ahansi.

eng_prompt: In times of loss, it is essential to honor the departed with dignity and respect. Ensuring their final resting place is secure is a fundamental part of this process.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okufiirwa, kya mugaso okussa ekitiibwa mu bafudde n'ekitiibwa n'ekitiibwa. Okukakasa nti ekifo kyabwe ekisembayo eky'okuwummuliramu kiri mu bukuumi kitundu kikulu mu nkola eno.
ach_prompt: Ikare me rwenyo dano, pire tek tutwal me woro ngat ma otoo ki woro. Neno ni kabedo gi me yweyo tye maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atwaniar, ejokuna noi ayongite ngul lu atwakata keda aibuses keda ayongit. Aanyun ebe eyuwara aiboisitikec naka awasia erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma ainapeta nu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru ma alia, eri orodriru inzita fezu 'ba drapi 'diyi dri inzita azini inzita si. Le 'ba ma ne ra kini pari eyini ava lizu asizuri ma ta mbazuri eri e'yo 'di ma azi okporu ni i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okufeerwa, ni kikuru okuheereza abafiire ekitinisa n'ekitiinisa. Okureeba ngu emyanya yaabo y'okuhumuriramu ehamiibwe n'ekicweka kikuru omu nkora egi.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that only non-profit organizations rely on donations to function. However, the financial needs of various entities can sometimes blur the lines between public funding and private support.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti ebitongole ebitali bya magoba byokka byesigama ku buyambi okukola. Newankubadde, ebyetaago by'ensimbi eby'ebitongole eby'enjawulo ebiseera ebimu bisobola okutabula enjawulo wakati w'obuyambi bwa gavumenti n'obw'obwannannyini.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni dul mapat-pat ma pe tye ki miti me nongo magoba keken aye jenge I kom lim ma dano miyo me tic. Kadi bed kumeno, miti me lim pa dul mapat-pat ikare mukene twero balo apokapoka ikin lim pa gamente ki kony pa wegine.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe iriongeta lu mam iswamaete ameda kes itwasamaete agangat. Konye, ipudesia luka ikapun luka atukona luegelegela epedorete aitolitol atiakatiaka kiding agangat naka apugan keda agangat naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara yi ega kini amuti orodri kokoru 'diyi lu yi ati afa feza ma dria azi ngazu. Kani si, e'yo robia lepi amuti ndundu eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eco sa'wa azi 'diyisi esele coza robia o'bi eyini ri ma eselea azini atita ngulupisi 'diyi pie ri eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu ebitongore ebitarikukora magoba nibyo byonka ebirikwesiga obuhwezi kukora. Kwonka, ebyetengo by'esente by'ebitongore ebitarikushushana obumwe nibibaasa kuremesa abantu kumanya entaaniso ahagati y'obuhwezi bwa gavumenti n'obw'abantu buntu.

eng_prompt: Understanding the complexities of human health requires a keen awareness of how various illnesses manifest. By recognizing the indicators of disease, individuals can seek timely medical attention and improve their chances of recovery.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu bw'abantu kyetaagisa okumanya engeri endwadde ez'enjawulo gye zeeyolekamu. Mu kumanya obubonero bw'endwadde, abantu basobola okufuna obujjanjabi mu budde n'okwongera ku mikisa gyabwe egy'okuwona.
ach_prompt: Niang peko matye I yotkom pa dano mito niang matut I kom kit ma two mapat-pat nen kwede. I ngeyo lanyut me two, dano twero nongo kony me yot kom con dok medo gum gi me cang.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin ationis naka angaleu naka itunga ekot aijen epone loitodununa adekasinei nuegelegela. Kowai lo aijen ijenuneta luka adekasinei, epedorete itunga adumun amukian kotoma apak ka aitojokar arerengesiokec naka angaleun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi vazu le 'ba ma ni geri azo ndundu eyini eyi e'dazu 'diyi ma dria sa'wa driasi. E'yo ecetaru azo ma dria 'diyi nizu risi, 'ba eyi eco aro esu sa'wa dria ra dika eyi ma drileba atita esuzu ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara g'abantu, nikyetenga okumanya oku endwara ezitarikushushana zikworeka. Abantu ku barikwetegyereza obubonero bw'endwara, nibabaasa kuronda obujanjabi bukiri kare kandi bakongyera aha mikisa yaabo y'okukira.

eng_prompt: Maintaining good hygiene is essential for overall health. One of the simplest yet most effective practices is to wash hands regularly.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu okutwalira awamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebyangu era ebikola obulungi kwe kunaaba engalo buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek pi yotkom. Yo acel ma yot dok tiyo maber loyo aye me lwoko cingi kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Aidar aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu epatana konye lu iswamaete ejok ngesi ailot akanin duc.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza eri orodriru aa'zu rua ala be dria. E'yo azi ewakokoru te azi ngapi muke ndeni 'diyi ma azi eri dri ojizu sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikwetengwa kwonka ogurikukora kurungi n'okunaaba omungaro obutoosha.

eng_prompt: Vaccination plays a crucial role in preventing the spread of infectious diseases. Without proper immunization, individuals may be at a higher risk of contracting illnesses that can have serious health consequences.
lug_prompt: Okugema kukola omulimu gwa maanyi nnyo mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa. Awatali kugemesa bulungi, abantu bayinza okubeera mu katyabaga k'okukwatibwa endwadde eziyinza okuba n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri obulamu.
ach_prompt: Gwer konyo tutwal me gengo nya pa two ma kobo. Labongo gwere maber, dano twero bedo ki gum madit me nongo two ma twero kelo adwogi marac i komgi.
teo_prompt: Erai aikis ekato lo epol ajokis kanu aitikitik awea na adekasinei nu ikopas. Arai mam ekato ejok, epedorete itunga adumun adekasinei nuepedorete ayangaun adekasinei nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza ni azi okporu nga e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu. Aro soza kililiru kokoru, 'ba yi eco ovu e'yo ewaru azo esuzuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira. Hatariho kusirika kurungi, abantu nibabaasa kuba bari omu kabi kahango k'okukwatwa endwara ezirikubaasa kurugwamu eby'akabi aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: When seeking accurate and reliable information, it's crucial to evaluate the credibility of your sources. Misinformation can easily spread, leading to confusion and misunderstanding.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba onoonya obubaka obutuufu era obwesigika, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya obwesige bw'ensibuko zo. Obubaka obukyamu busobola okusaasaana mangu, ekiviirako okutabulwa n'obutategeeragana.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka yenyo ngec matir dok ma gene, pire tek tutwal me niang kace itye ki gen I kom kama itye ka nongo iye ngec. Lok ma pe atir twero nyaa oyot tutwal, ma kelo anywena-nywena ki apoka-poka.
teo_prompt: Arai iuta jo aimo akiro nu abeit, ibusakinit jo aanyun abeit naka akirokon. Epedorete akiro nuka aisab aisiarakin atipet, ayangaun aitolitol ka amamus acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Eka o'dukoti kililiru azini asi'baza be 'diyi nda, eri orodriru geri mini e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma a'ita ma ale andrizu. O'duko enzoru 'diyi eco i ere ewakokoru, e'yo ejizu ewaru azini vata ako ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooyenda amakuru agahikire, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma obwesigwa bw'oburugo bwawe. Amakuru agatahikire nigabaasa kujanjaara juba, ekirikureetaho okubuzabuzibwa n'obutetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: It is crucial for educators and parents to recognize the importance of addressing the well-being of students. By fostering an environment that prioritizes health education, we can empower young people to make informed choices.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo abasomesa n'abazadde okutegeera obukulu bw'okukola ku mbeera y'abayizi. Bwe tukuza embeera ekulembeza eby'enjigiriza ku byobulamu, tusobola okuwa abavubuka amaanyi okukola okusalawo okulungi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lupwonye ki lunyodo me niang ber pa tic pi ber bedo pa lutino. Ka waketo rwom me kwan i kom yoto kom obed gin ma pire tek, ci wa twero miyo kero ki bulu me moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu esisianakinak keda auriak ajenun ajokis naka aitemokin nuka ajokis naka idwe. Kowai lo aitopolor aiboisit na isingarenit asioman naka angaleu, ipedori oni aitigogong atumunak aiswamaun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru imba'ba eyi tualu tipika eyi pie orodri sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu muke ri esuzu. E'yo 'ba ode eyini okpo fe eyini ecozu e'yo eyi pezu geri kililiru 'diyisi ri ma omgbo otuzu geri 'bani angu 'ba eyini imbata fezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria ri si.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho munonga abeegyesa n'abazaire kumanya omugasho gw'okukora aha magara g'abeegi. Kurabira omukureetaho embeera erikutwara obwegyese bw'eby'amagara nka kikuru, nitubaasa kuheereza eminyeeto amaani g'okucwamu gye.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials have prioritized the development and distribution of vaccines. As a result, the community now has access to effective Ebola vaccines.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu batadde essira ku kukola n'okugaba eddagala erigema. N'ekyavaamu, abantu kati basobola okufuna eddagala erigema Ebola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom yubu ki poko yat agwera. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak dong tye ki gum me nongo yat agwera me gengo two ebola.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, apodokinit eswamak luka angaleu aitolomun keda aikor ikee luikisere ekato. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kwana itunga adumun ikee luikisere adeka naka ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu aro soza ni 'diyi ma edeta azini awaza ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi eco di aro azo ebola niri atrizuri esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, abakuru omu by'amagara bateire amaani omu kukora n'okugaba emibazi y'okugyema. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu hati nibabaasa kutunga emibazi y'okusirika ebola.

eng_prompt: In a world where hard work often goes unnoticed, it's essential to acknowledge those who put in the extra effort. Celebrating achievements, big or small, fosters motivation and encourages continued dedication.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omukozi ennyo gy'atalabwa, kya mugaso okusiima abo abassaamu amaanyi ag'enjawulo. Okujaguza ebituukiddwaako, ebinene oba ebitonotono, kitumbula amaanyi n'okukubiriza okwewaayo okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano pe ngeyo tic matek tutwal, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo jo ma keto tek me tic matek. Kwero jami ma itimo, madongo onyo matino, weko ibedo ki miti dok cuku cwiny me mede ki tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na mam itunga ejenete aswam na agogongu, ejokuna noi aisiyalamikin ngul lu iswamaete kagogongu. Ainumunum aitodolinikineta, nuapolok arai nu ikidioko, isinyikokini itunga aswam kagogongu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru azi ngaza okporu ni muzu 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria ku ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba azi ngapi okporu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Ayiko zuza e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma dria, amboru kani werea 'diyi ma dria, eri ava enga dika eri ava fe 'bani asi 'bazu drile.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu okukora n'amaani buriijo kutarikureebwa, n'eky'omugasho okusiima abo abarikukoresa amaani gaabo. Okujaguza ebirugiremu, ebikuru n'ebikye, nikireetaho amaani n'obweziriki.

eng_prompt: Advancements in medical research have led to significant breakthroughs in our understanding of various health conditions. As a result, healthcare professionals are now better equipped to address both the treatment and prevention of many illnesses.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza ku byobujjanjabi ereeseewo okukulaakulana mu kutegeera embeera z'ebyobulamu ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abakugu mu byobulamu kati basobola bulungi okukola ku bujjanjabi n'okuziyiza endwadde nnyingi.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme I kwed me yot kom okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I niang ma watye kwede I kom two mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom kombedi tye ki jami weng ma mite me cango ki gengo two mapol.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aingic naka angaleu ayangau apol noi kotoma amisiikinikosi nuikamunitos adekasinei nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kwana ipirioitin luka angaleu aimuke ka aitikitik adekasinei nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni e'yo vuti ondaza arojo ni ma alia 'diyi eji e'yo angu ezoma ni ama ma vata ma dria e'yo alata ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi sa'wa 'disi afa dria eyini 'diyi be aro esuzu azini azo eyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu kucondooza ahaby'amagara, ereesireho entunguuka omu kwetegyereza ebikwatireine n'embeera z'ebyamagara ezitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu omu by'amagara hati baine eby'okukoresa kuragurira n'okuzibira endwara nyingi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health studies highlighting the genetic risks associated with sickle cell disease, many health organizations are recommending proactive measures for couples. This has led to a growing awareness of the importance of genetic testing in family planning.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza kw'ebyobulamu okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko okulaga obulabe bw'obuzaale obukwatagana n'obulwadde bwa nnalubiri, ebitongole by'ebyobulamu bingi bikubiriza abaagalana okubaako kyebakola. Kino kiviiriddeko okwongera okumanyisa ku mugaso gw'okukebera obuzaale mu nkola ya kizaalaggumba.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki ma nyutu peko me kwidi ma kubbe ki two sickle cell, dul mapat-pat me yot-kom mapol tye ka miyo tam bot joo ma onyome. Man oweko dano mapol tye ki ngec i kom ber pa pimo kwai lutino i yub me lago nywal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nuitodunitos nuka angaleu nuitodunitos atiokisio nu ikamanara keda adekasinei nuka adeka naka sickle cell, iriongeta luipu luka angaleu isinyikokitos itunga luedukokina aitikitik adekasinei. Einakini ngin itunga aijen nuikamunitos ajokis naka ainwakio naka aur kotoma aitikitik aur.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma dria e'yo ewaru 'bani esu azo sickle cell niri be 'diyi ma dria, amuti karakara e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di fe 'ba eyini aa'zu mile be e'yo orodri 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu geri anzi eyi ma esele cozu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kucondooza okuhweireho okurikworeka akabi akari omu buhangwa akarikukwatanisa n'endwara ya sickle cell, ebitongore by'ebyamagara bingi nibihabura abashwereine okukora ekirikwetengyesa. Eki kireesire abantu kweyongyera kumanya omugasho gw'okukyebera obuhangwa omu nteekateeka y'oruzaro.

eng_prompt: Effective public health strategies often rely on the active participation of local populations. By fostering strong communication and collaboration, communities can play a crucial role in preventing the spread of infectious diseases.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu ennungi zisinziira ku kwetaba kw'abantu b'omu kitundu. Mu kutumbula empuliziganya ennungi n'okukolagana, ebitundu bisobola okukola omulimu omukulu mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa.
ach_prompt: Yub me tic i kom yoto kom pa lwak I kare mapol jenge I kom bedo tye pa lwak. Dano ma ikabedo moni gitwero konyo tutwal me gengo nya pa two ma kobo.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokineta nuajokak nuka angaleu naka itunga itodunit ebe ibusakinit itunga luka atutubet ajaut toma. Kowai lo aitopolor einer keda aiswamanara, epedorete itunga aitolot aswam naepol noi kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas.
lgg_prompt: Otita e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru 'diyi tutuni aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo nzeza okporu azini ti icita ma omgbo otuza si, ongulumu eyi eco azi okporu nga e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu ra.

ach_prompt: Gwoko kwo ma opore ma obedo cam maber, rweyo lee kare ki kare, ki bedo ki wic maber twero konyo tutwal I yotkom. Dano mapol gi cayo lok ada ni yot kom pe obedo bedo labongo two keken.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, various platforms play a crucial role in disseminating information. Effective communication strategies are essential for reaching a wide audience and informing them about important issues.

eng_prompt: Effective public health measures are essential in controlling infectious diseases. Among these measures, medical treatments play a crucial role in reducing transmission rates.

lgg_prompt: Geri alata o'bi eyini kililiru 'diyi orodriru e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, arojo eyi azi okporu nga e'yo azo korona niri ma ereta ma omgbo esizu.
