eng_prompt: Maintaining good health is essential for overall well-being. One effective strategy to promote health and prevent illness is through proper personal hygiene practices.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obulamu obulungi kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi okutwalira awamu. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutumbula ebyobulamu n'okutangira endwadde kwe kuyita mu mpisa ennungi ez'obuyonjo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko yot kom pire tek tutwal pi kwo maber. Yo acel maber me ilo malo rwom me yot kom ki gengo two obedo gwoko lengo.
teo_prompt: Aidar angaleu ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar najokan. Adiopepone loajokan noi loka aitopolor angaleu ka aitikitik adekasinei ngesi aila.
lgg_prompt: Rua ala ma ta mbaza eri orodriru aa'ta muke ri ni. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu alata ma omgbo otuzu azini azo atrizu ri eri geri alata ma tambazu kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okukuuma amagara marungi n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okutunguura amagara n'okuzibira oburwaire n'okukoresa emiringo mirungi y'obuyonjo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the integration of cutting-edge technologies has transformed various industries. Among these, the medical sector has experienced significant improvements in patient care and treatment outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okugatta tekinologiya ow'omulembe kikyusizza amakolero ag'enjawulo. Mu bino, ekitongole ky'ebyobujjanjabi kifunye enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kulabirira abalwadde n'ebyava mu bujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, tic ki diro me tet manyen okelo aloka-loka I tic mapat-pat mapat-pat. I kin jami magi, tenge me yot kom dong odongo tutwal I gwoko lutwo ki adwoki me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, aimorikikina naka etatai loakwana ejulaki ikampunin luipu. Kotoma ngun, ewanyunitos erionget loka angaleu aitojokaario naepol noi kotoma aidar adekak keda amukian.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo tekenologia ni o'diru 'diyi oja okalamvu ndundu eyi ra. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, esele arojo niri esu otuta okporu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu azini aro esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okukwatanisa kwa tekinorogye ey'omurembe kuhindwire amakorero maingi. Omuri ebi, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kitungire entunguuka omu by'okureeberera abarwaire hamwe n'ebirikuruga omu kuragurirwa.

eng_prompt: As public health experts warn, the spread of infectious agents can have devastating effects on population health. It is crucial to understand the implications of viral outbreaks and their potential to disrupt daily life.
lug_prompt: Nga abakugu mu byobulamu bwe balabula, okusaasaana kw'obulwadde obusirikitu kusobola okukosa obulamu bw'abantu. Kikulu nnyo okutegeera ebiva mu kubalukawo kw'akawuka n'obusobozi bwakwo okukosa obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma ludiro me yot kom gi ciko kwede, nya pa kwidi ma kobo twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom pa lwak. Pire tek tutwal me niang adwoki me poto pa kwidi ki kero gi me balo kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape ikwenyaritos ipirioitin luka angaleu, awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas epedori aimusung angaleu naka itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin atiokisio nuka abwangun naka ekorona keda apedorokec naka aitolitol aijar naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba nita be e'yo alata ni ma dria angiri 'diyi ni bile ndu lileri le, e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta ni eco e'yo onzi eji o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria ra. Eri orodriru e'yo efupi azo korona niri ma e'dota ma dria 'diyi vazu tualu e'yo yini eco 'ye idri 'ba eyini aa'zu o'du driasi ri ezazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku abakugu omu by'amagara barikurabura, okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira nikureetaho akabi aha magara g'abantu. N'eky'omugasho munonga kwetegyereza ebirikubaasa kureetwa okubarukaho kw'obukooko n'oburemeezi obu burikubaasa kureeta omu bantu.

eng_prompt: When engaging in physical activities, comfort and functionality are key factors to consider. Choosing the right clothing can significantly enhance performance and enjoyment during sports.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba weenyigira mu by'emizannyo, obuweerero n'emirimu bye bintu ebikulu ebirina okulowoozebwako. Okulonda engoye entuufu kisobola okutumbula ennyo enkola n'okusanyuka mu mizannyo.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka timo jami mapat-pat me kom, ber bedo ki tic obedo jami mapigi tego ma omyero itam I komgi. Yero bongi ma opore twero medo rwom me tuku ki yom cwiny I kare me tuku.
teo_prompt: Neiswamaere aswamisio nuka akuan, ibusakinit aomoom nuikamunitos aijar ka aswam. Aseun igoen luedolitos epedori aitojokar eswamae loajokan keda aitelelio kotoma aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yeta rua ni 'diyi 'yezu 'bori ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua 'bazu kililiru azini azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi e'yo okporu 'bani egazu eyi ma dria 'diyi. Bongo kililiru 'diyi opezuri eco 'yeta ma omgbo otu tualu ayiko esuzu sawa avita ni 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nookora emirimo y'omubiri, okushemererwa n'okukora n'enshonga nkuru z'okuteekateekaho. Okutoorana ebijwaro ebihikire nikibaasa kwongyera amaani n'okushemererwa omu mizaano.

eng_prompt: Engaging in fun activities is essential for children's development. One of their favorite pastimes is playing games.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu bintu ebisanyusa kya mugaso mu nkulaakulana y'abaana. Ekimu ku bintu bye basinga okwettanira kwe kuzannya emizannyo.
ach_prompt: Timo jami ma yomo cwiny dano pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa lutino. Gin acel ma gimaro loyo aye tuko tuko.
teo_prompt: Ajaut toma aswamisinei nu eyalamasi erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apolo na idwe. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nueminasi kesi aswam ngesi abolia aboliasio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ayiko fezani 'diyi 'yezu ri eri orodriru anzi nyiri eyini zozu. Afa azi alu eyini le saaru ri eri avita eyi avizu.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu mirimo erikushemeza n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kw'abaana. Kimwe aha bintu ebi barikukunda kwejumba omu by'okweshemeza n'okuzaana emizaano.

eng_prompt: Many people are curious about the effectiveness of different exercise routines. With so many options available, it's important to understand which activities truly contribute to overall fitness.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baagala okumanya emigaso egiri mu kukola dduyiro ow'enjawulo. Olw'okuba waliwo ebintu bingi ebisobola okukolebwa, kikulu okumanya emirimu egiyamba omuntu okuba omulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo kit ma yub mapat-pat me rweyo lee tiyo kwede. Ki jami mapol tutwal matye, pire tek tutwal me niang jami mene ma kelo yot kom.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi itunga luipu ajenun ajokis naka aswamisio nuegelegela. Keda iponesio luipu luejaas, ejokuna noi amisiikin aswamisinei nu eyangaunete aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi le ni e'yo 'yeta rua e'yo rua ni 'diyi ma dria ra. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi karakara, eri orodriru e'yo 'yeta a'dani fepi aa'zu rua ala be 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibenda kumanya oburungi bw'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'eby'emizaano. Ahabw'oburyo bwingi oburiho, n'eky'omugasho kumanya emirimo erikureetaho amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, maintaining a balanced lifestyle is more important than ever. It is essential to recognize that our choices directly impact our physical and mental health.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'akakyuukakyuuka eya leero, okukuuma obulamu obwenkanya kya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Kikulu nnyo okukimanya nti bye tusalawo birina kye bikola ku bulamu bwaffe obw'omubiri n'obw'obwongo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, gwoko rwom me kwo maber pire tek tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me niang ni tam ma wamoko tye ki adwoki ne i komwa ki tamwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda esipidi loepol noi, ejokuna noi aidar aijar naejok adepar kapakio nukokau. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ebe aseununeta wok itolitolete angaleuwok naka akwan keda adam.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ewu andruri ma alea e'yo yi 'yepi mbele mbele 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba ma aa idri esele coza be ri ma ta mbazu ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Eri orodriru egazu kini e'yo amani pe 'diyi ama ma rua ala rua azini omi ma rua 'diyi 'ye onzi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, okurinda amagara marungi n'eky'omugasho munonga. N'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu okucwamu kwaitu nikukwata aha magara gaitu omu mubiri n'omu biteekateeko.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the involvement of citizens in decision-making processes is essential for ensuring transparency and accountability. Engaging the community fosters a sense of ownership and responsibility towards the nation's future.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kya demokulasiya, okwetaba kwa bannansi mu nkola z'okusalawo kwa mugaso okulaba nga waliwo obwerufu n'embalirira. Okukwataganya abantu kikuza enneewulira y'obwannannyini n'obuvunaanyizibwa eri ebiseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo tye pa anywali I kare me moko tam pire tek tutwal pi neno ni jami weng tye atir. Bedo tye pa lwak weko dano bedo ki ngec me bedo ki twero I kom anyim pa lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ibusakinit itunga ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aitolomun aseununeta kanu aitodun abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere akiro. Aitolomio na itunga eyangauni aomisioit naka apedor keda aswam nuikamunitos ingaren naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, kari anzi eyi ma suza e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo ada ni azini geri 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ni fe eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi ni azini eyi ma azi kari 'di ma ewu drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, okwejumba kw'abantu omu by'okucwamu n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra. Okwejumba omu bantu nikureetaho okwetegyereza n'obujunaanizibwa aha biro by'eihanga eby'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, cultures have found ways to honor their unique identities and shared values. These celebrations often reflect significant events, traditions, or achievements that unite people in joy and remembrance.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebyobuwangwa bifunye engeri z'okussa ekitiibwa mu ndabika yaabyo ey'enjawulo n'empisa ez'awamu. Ebikujjuko bino bitera okulaga emikolo emikulu, obuwangwa, oba ebituukiddwaako ebigatta abantu mu ssanyu n'okujjukira.
ach_prompt: Ikare weng me tekwaro, tekwaro gunongo yoo me woro lanyut gi mapat-pat ki ber bedo gi. Kwer magi ipol kare nyutu jami ma pigi tego, tekwaro, onyo jami ma otimme ma ribo dano I yom-cwiny ki poo I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, adumutu inonosio iponesio luka ayongit iponesiokec luitegelikina keda iponesiokec. Itodunitos ainumunum na iboro lu epolok, inonosio, arai bo aitodolinikineta nu imorikikinete itunga kotoma aiyalama keda aiitun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi esu geri inzita fezu e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi pie. Omu 'diyi e'da tutuni e'yo orodriru 'diyi, e'yo a'bini 'diyi, kani ku e'yo 'bani 'ye yi ecipi ayiko azini e'yo egazu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa bitungire oburyo bw'okuheereza ekitinisa abantu baabo n'emitwarize yaabo. Okujaguza oku nikukira kworeka emikoro y'omugasho, emigyenzo, nainga ebirugiremu ebirikukwatanisa abantu omu kushemererwa n'okwijuka.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, businesses are increasingly recognizing the importance of their impact on society and the environment. As a result, many organizations are actively seeking ways to enhance their reputation and build trust with consumers.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero ak'okuvuganya, bizinensi zeeyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'engeri gye zikwatamu abantu n'obutonde bw'ensi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole bingi byenyigidde mu kunoonya engeri y'okutumbula erinnya lyabyo n'okuzimba obwesige mu bakozesa.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, lutim biacara tye ka niang ber pa tic gi i kom lwak ki cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, dule mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me medo nying gi ki dongo gen ikin luwil gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka lolo, ejenete ibiasaran ajokis naka aswamukec mama ejaasi itunga keda isuban luka akwap. Kanuka ngun, eutasi iriongeta luipu aimo iponesio luka aitojokar ekirorikec ka adukun amunokina kama ejaasi agwelak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo baka seza ni ewu andruri ma alea, tujari eyi e'yo orodriru eyini eco 'ye ongulumu eyi ma alea tualu angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi geri nda eyini ecozu eyi ma ru otuzu dika eyi ma asi 'bazu 'ba eyini ayuzaru 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, eby'obushubuzi nibyeyongyera kumanya omugasho gw'okukora aha bantu hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore ebingi biriyo nibisherura oburyo bw'okwongyera eiziina ryabyo n'okwesiga abaguzi.

eng_prompt: When experiencing unexplained symptoms, individuals often seek medical advice to understand their health concerns. Accurate diagnosis is crucial for effective treatment and peace of mind.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe bafuna obubonero obutategeerekeka, banoonya obujjanjabi okutegeera ebyobulamu byabwe. Okuzuula obulwadde obulungi kya nkizo mu bujjanjabi obulungi n'emirembe mu birowoozo.
ach_prompt: Kace dano tye ki lanyut ma pe gingeyo, pol kare giyenyo kony pa daktar me niang peko me yotkom gi. Niang two maber pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat maber ki bedo ki kuc I adam.
teo_prompt: Karai edumununete ijenuneta lumam itetemitai, etapit itunga adumun aicoreta nuka amukian kanu amisiikin nuka angaleukec. Ajenun adekasinei ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian najokan ka ainapakina kotoma aomisio.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka eceta e'dapi ku 'diyi esu, eyi tutuni imbata nda dakitari vu e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi vazu. E'yo eti ondaza kililiru ri eri orodriru aro esuzu kililiru azini asi anzu esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikutunga obubonero obutarikwetegyerezibwa, nibatunga obuhabuzi kuruga aha bashaho, okubaasa kwetegyereza ebikwerarikiriza aha magara gaabo. Okucondooza kurungi n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurira kurungi n'okutunga obusingye bw'omutwe.

eng_prompt: Access to quality healthcare is essential for the well-being of any population. As a cornerstone of public health, hospitals play a crucial role in providing medical services and support.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kikulu nnyo eri obulamu obulungi bw'abantu bonna. Ng'omusingi gw'ebyobulamu, amalwaliro gakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuwa obujjanjabi n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo obedo gin ma pire tek pi kwo pa lwak. Macalo guti me gwoko yot kom pa lwak, odi yadi timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo kony ki kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na adoketait ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunga kere. Kwape atutubet naepol noi naka angaleu naka itunga, iswamaete adekisia aswam naepol noi kotoma aijanakin keda agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata muke ri esuzu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke 'ba dria niri ni. Arojo eyi ekile afa okporu e'yo rua ala ni o'bi eyini ri le, eyi azi okporu ni nga azakoma fele e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'amagara marungi g'abantu boona. Amadwariro, nk'eibaare ry'orurengo rw'eby'amagara g'abantu boona, nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuheereza obuheereza n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Maintaining proper hygiene is essential for public health. When individuals neglect basic cleanliness practices, they increase the risk of transmitting infections.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'abantu. Abantu bwe balagajjalira enkola z'obuyonjo ezisookerwako, bongera ku bulabe bw'okusiiga endwadde.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek pi yot kom pa lwak. Ka dano pe gi gwoko lengo gi gi medo gum gi me nongo two.
teo_prompt: Aidar aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka itunga. Arai mam itunga epalunit aila, iyatakinete kesi arereng naka awea na adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza eri orodriru alata o'bi eyini ri ni. Ba ka alata ma ta mba ku, eyi e'yo azo eyi ma ereta niri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okukuratira obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu. Abantu kubarikwehuzya emicwe y'obuyonjo, nibongyera akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with gossip and speculation, it's easy to get swept up in the latest stories. However, it's important to approach such claims with a critical eye.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde olugambo n'okuteebereza, kyangu okutwalibwa mu mboozi ezisembyeyo. Newankubadde, kya mugaso okutunuulira ensonga ng'ezo n'eriiso ery'obwegendereza.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki lok angeya ki byek, yot tutwal me nongo ngec manyen. Kadi bed kumeno, pire tek tutwal me neno lok enoni ki wang matut.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba akiro keda aomisio, epatana aingic akiro nuitetiak. Konye, ejokuna aitodolikin akiro ngun kopone loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo nzeza azini e'yo egaza be tre 'diyi ma alia, eri ewakokoru 'bani mi 'du e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma alia. Kani si, eri orodriru e'yo 'dile 'diyi 'yezu mile be.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire orugambo n'okuteebereza, kyanguhi kwejumba omu by'amakuru ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Kwonka, n'eky'omugasho okureeba enshonga nk'ezo n'amaisho marungi.

eng_prompt: Health officials have emphasized the importance of safety protocols when dealing with infectious diseases. Even after recovery, Ebola patients can still pose a risk to others.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okugoberera emitendera egy'obukuumi nga bakolagana n'endwadde ezisiigibwa. N'oluvannyuma lw'okuwona, abalwadde ba Ebola bakyasobola okuba ab'obulabe eri abalala.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me lubu cik me gwokke ki two ma kobo oyot-oyot. Kadi bed ni lutwo Ebola gucang, pud gi twero kelo peko ikwo pa dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis itogogongoto ajokis naka ainapeta nuka ayuwara kanu aitikitik adekasinei nu ikopas. Karaida engaleunete, eringa adekak luka ebola epedorete aimusung luce.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe okpo orodri e'yo tambaza ni 'diyi ma dria eyini azi ngazu azo eyi erepi 'diyi be. Ata 'bani atizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyi eco nga po'di eca e'yo onzi 'ba azi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara bahamize omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda baaba nibakora aha ndwara ezirikuturira. Nabwanyima y'okukira, abarwaire ba Ebola nibabaasa kuba ab'akabi aha bandi.

eng_prompt: The outbreak of Ebola in several regions has raised significant public health concerns. Understanding its transmission is crucial for effective prevention and control measures.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kwa Ebola mu bitundu ebiwerako kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu byobulamu by'abantu. Okutegeera engeri gye kisaasaanamu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira n'okuziyiza.
ach_prompt: Two ebola ma opoto I but lobo mapat-pat okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom yot-kom pa lwak. Niang kit ma two eni kobo kwede pire tek tutwal pi gengo ki gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Abwangun naka ebola kotoma aiboisio nuipu eyangaunit aiyalongong naka angaleu naka itunga. Amisiikin nuikamunitos awea na ekorona erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: Azo ebola niri ma e'dota angu karakara eyi ma alea ri eji asi otiza angiri e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo erini i erezuri ma vata eri orodriru geri 'bani ecozu eri atrizu azini atrizu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kwa Ebola omu bicweka bingi, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu by'amagara g'abantu. Okwetegyereza oku erikuturira n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuzibira n'okurwanisa.

eng_prompt: In health and wellness, taking proactive measures can significantly reduce the risk of illness. By adopting healthy habits and lifestyle choices, individuals can often avoid the need for medical intervention later on.
lug_prompt: Mu byobulamu n'obutebenkevu, okukola ebintu nga bukyali kisobola okukendeeza ennyo ku bulabe bw'endwadde. Mu kulonda emize emirungi n'engeri y'obulamu, abantu basobola okwewala obwetaavu bw'okufuna obujjanjabi mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I lok me yot kom, timo jami ma mite twero dwoko piny rwom me nongo two. Dano twero gwokke ki miti me nongo kony me yot kom ikare mukato.
teo_prompt: Kotoma angaleu ka aijar najokan, aitodolikin iboro luepedorete aitidisiar atiokisio nuka adekasinei. Kowai lo aitolomun iponesio luajokak keda aijar najokan, epedorete itunga aitikitik eipud loka amukian ekaulo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata ni azini aa'ta muke ri ma alea, 'yeta okporu 'diyi eco e'yo azo ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. Adriza alata be azini geri aa'zu edriru 'diyisi, 'ba eyi eco e'yo 'bani eyi ma aza kozu arojoa ri atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'amagara, okukora ebirikwetengyesa nikibaasa kukyendeeza munonga akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire. Kurabira omu kugira emicwe mirungi hamwe n'emitwarize mirungi, abantu nibabaasa kwetantara okukyeberwa omu irwariro bwanyima.

eng_prompt: Understanding the complexities of human health requires a deep dive into the various conditions that can affect the body. Each illness manifests differently, making it crucial to recognize the unique indicators associated with them.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obuzibu bw'obulamu bw'omuntu kyetagisa okunyonyogera mu mbeera ez'enjawulo ezisobola okukosa omubiri. Buli bulwadde bweyoleka mu ngeri ya njawulo, ekireetera okuba eky'omugaso okumanya obubonero obwenjawulo obubukwatagana nabwo.
ach_prompt: Niang peko me yotkom pa dano mito niang matut I kom jami mapat-pat ma twero balo kom dano. Two acel-acel nyute I yoo mapat-pat, ma weko pire tek tutwal me niang lanyut mapat-pat makubbe kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin ationis naka angaleu naka itunga ekot oni aingic akiro nuegelegela nuetiroritos akwan. Kangin adeka itodununei iponesio luegelegela, einakini ibore yenepol noi ajenun ijenuneta luitegelikina nu ikamanara keda kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru rua ma alata ma dria 'diyi vazu le e'yo ndundu rua ni 'diyi ma dria. Azo alu alu yi e'da yi ma ngulupisi, erini fezu eri orodriru e'yo ecepi yi ma eselea 'diyi onizu.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburemeezi oburi omu magara g'abantu nikyetengyesa okwetegyereza embeera nyingi ezirikubaasa kuteganisa omubiri. Buri ndwara neeyoreka omu muringo gw'omutaano, ekirikureetera okuba eky'omugasho kumanya obubonero bwayo.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the role of government becomes even more critical. Ensuring the safety and prosperity of citizens is a fundamental duty of those in power.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, omulimu gwa gavumenti gweyongera okuba omukulu. Okukakasa obukuumi n'okukulaakulana kwa bannansi mulimu gwa abo abali mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, tic pa gamente doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa anywali obedo tic ma pire tek pa joo matye I loc.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, epolor noi aswam naka apugan. Aanyun ebe eyuwara keda apol naka itunga erai aswam naepol noi naka ngul luejaasi toma apugan.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia, azi gameteni 'diyi eca orodriru tu. Ageitema fezu kari anzi eyini ri eri azi okporu 'ba opi dria 'diyiniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, omurimo gwa gavumenti nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Okureeba ngu abatuuragye batunga oburinzi n'obusinguzi, n'omurimo gw'abo abari omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about public health is crucial for preventing outbreaks. One effective approach is to provide information on how to recognize and manage health risks.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku byobulamu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira okubalukawo kw'endwadde. Engeri emu ennungi kwe kuwa obubaka ku ngeri y'okuzuula n'okukwatamu obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom pire tek tutwal me gengo poto pa two. Yo acel maber aye me miyo ngec i kom kit me niang ki gengo peko ma twero bedo tye i kom yotkom.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakino nuikamunitos angaleu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik abwangun na adekasinei. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok ngesi aijaikin akiro nuikamunitos eipone lo ajenun ka aitikitik atiokisio nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Imbata feza o'bi eyini e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo azo efupi 'diyi atrizu. Geri azi orodriru 'diyi ma azi eri o'duko fezu geri ecozu e'yo ewaru rua ala ni 'diyi esuzu azini eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'ebyamagara n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira okubarukaho kw'endwara. Omuringo gumwe murungi, n'okuheereza amakuru agarikukwata aha kumanya n'okurwanisa akabi aha magara.

eng_prompt: In areas with poor sanitation and limited access to clean water, the risk of infectious diseases increases significantly. One such disease that poses a serious threat is cholera, which can spread very fast in the community.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebirimu obuyonjo obubi n'okufuna amazzi amayonjo okutono, obulabe bw'endwadde ezisiigibwa bweyongera nnyo. Obulwadde obumu obw'obulabe ennyo bwe bwa kkolera, obusobola okusaasaana amangu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma lengo ki nongo pii maleng pe tye maber, gum me nongo two ma kobo medde tutwal. Two acel macalo man ma kelo peko madit tutwal en aye colera, ma twero nyaa oyot tutwal I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nu mam aila ejokuna ido mam epedorete adumunun akipi nu elaete, iyatas adekasinei nu ikopas noi. Adiopet adekasinei nuepedorete aitukurian itunga ngesi ekolera, loepedori aisiarakin katipet kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu alata muke ku 'diyi ma alea azini yi ala esuzu were 'diyi ma alea, e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ni tuzu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Azo azi alu e'yo onzi ejipi ri azo kolera niri i, eri eco i ere ongulumu eyi ma alea mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya etarimu buyonjo n'okutunga amaizi marungi, oburemeezi bw'endwara ezirikuturira nibweyongyera munonga. Oburwaire bumwe obw'akabi munonga ni kolera, oburikujanjaara juba omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Taking proactive measures for your health can significantly reduce the risk of illness. By adopting preventive strategies now, you can safeguard your well-being for the future.
lug_prompt: Okukola amangu ku bulamu bwo kisobola okukendeeza ennyo ku bulabe bw'endwadde. Bw'okozesa enkola z'okwetangira kati, osobola okukuuma obulungi bwo mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Timo jami ma mite pi gwoko yot komi twero dwoko piny rwom me nongo two. Ka I tiyo ki yoo me gengo two kombedi, I twero gwoko kwo ni I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Aingarakin kotoma aidar angaleukon itidisiari atiokisio nuka adekasinei. Kowai lo aitwasam iwaitin lu itikitikere kwana, ipedori ijo aidar aijar kon koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'duza okporu mi ma rua ma ta mbazuri eco e'yo azo ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. Geri mini ecozu e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi 'duzu sa'wa 'disi risi, mi eco mi ma edri ma ta mba ewu drialeri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukora ekirikubaasika aha magara gaawe, nikibaasa kukyendeeza munonga akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire. Waataho oburyo bw'okwerinda obwahati, noobaasa kurinda amagara gaawe omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: The strict measures implemented during the Ebola outbreak left a lasting impression on the population. As a result, many Ugandans believe that a similar level of discipline would emerge if faced with another severe health crisis.
lug_prompt: Amateeka amakakali agaateekebwa mu nkola mu kiseera ky'okubalukawo kwa Ebola gaaleka ekifaananyi eky'olubeerera ku bantu. N'ekivuddemu, Bannayuganda bangi balowooza nti omutindo gwe gumu ogw'empisa gwandivaayo singa boolekaganye n'obuzibu obulala obw'amaanyi obw'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Cik matek ma kiketo ikare me poto pa two ebola oweko adwogi marac tutwal I kom lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali me Uganda mapol tye ki niyee ni rwom me woro cik ma rom enoni twero bino kace ginongo peko me yot kom mukene.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin luitikitikitai lu aponi ibwaikinai kapak naka abwangun naka ebola apotu kojalakisi itunga aomisioit naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, eyuunitos itunga luipu luko Uganda ebe ebuni ainapeta ngun ajaun arai etereikina keda ationis naepol noi naka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo okporu 'bani 'ba sa'wa azo ebola niri ni e'dozurisi 'diyi fe o'bi eyini e'yo egazu sa'wa ezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara Ugandani 'diyi ega kini 'yeta 'dile 'diyi nga e'do ra 'ba ka e'yo rua alanisi onzi 'diyi isu ra ria.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'amaani eyateirweho obu ebola yabarukaho, ekasigaho ekiteekateeko ky'obuhangwa aha bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abanya Uganda baingi nibaikiriza ngu omutindo nigwo gumwe gw'emitwarize niguza kureebeka waaba oine oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: The recent outbreak of infectious diseases in neighboring countries has raised concerns among health officials. As a result, Uganda is always on high alert when it comes to diseases like Ebola.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa mu nsi eziriraanyeewo kuleeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, Uganda ebeera bulindaala nnyo bwe kituuka ku ndwadde nga Ebola.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two ma kobo ikin lobe ma orumuwa okelo lworo ikin lutic me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, Uganda ikare ducu bedo ma wanggi twolo ka odok ilok kom two macalo Ebola.
teo_prompt: Abwangun na adekasinei nu ikopas kotoma akwapin nu idunyare eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, ekapakina duc Uganda kanu adekasinei kwape nat ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo eyi erepi o'diru 'diyi ni e'dozu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ri eji asi otiza azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, kari Uganda niri ni aa mile be sa'wa driasi azo ekile ebola le 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikuturira omu mahanga agatuherereire, kireesireho okwerarikirira omu bakuru b'ebyamagara. N'ekyarugiremu, Uganda buriijo neeba eyeteekateekire aha ndwara nka Ebola.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of infectious diseases, health officials have announced a new initiative. The government is mobilizing resources to ensure the safety and well-being of its citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu balangiridde enteekateeka empya. Gavumenti ekungaanya ebintu okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bwa bannansi baayo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma kobo cocoki, lutic me yot kom guwaco ni tye yoo manyen me tic. Gamente tye ka jogo cente me gwoko kwo pa anywali ne.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adekasinei nu ikopas, alimosi eswamak luka angaleu ainapeta nuitetiak. Euta apugan aituk iboro kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara keda aijar naka itungake.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo eyi erepi 'diyi ni e'dozu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi azi e'yo azi o'diru ni 'bo. Gamete ni afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra ageitema azini aa'ta muke kari anzi erini 'diyiniri onezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikuturira, abakuru omu by'amagara barangirire enteekateeka nsya. Gavumenti eriyo nerundaana eby'okukoresa okureeba ngu abantu baayo baine oburinzi n'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Expecting mothers often benefit from the emotional and physical support of their partners during pregnancy. Involving male partners in antenatal care can strengthen their bond and enhance the overall experience of pregnancy.
lug_prompt: Bamaama abali embuto batera okuganyulwa mu buyambi bw'ebirowoozo n'obw'omubiri obw'ababeezi baabwe nga bali mbuto. Okwetaba kw'abasajja mu bujjanjabi bw'abakyala abali embuto kisobola okunyweza enkolagana yaabwe n'okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'embuto okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Mon ma oyac ipol kare ginongo ber pa kony ma aa ki bot lunyodogi ikare me yacu. Kelo coo I tic me gwoko mon ma oyac twero jingo wat ikin gi ki medo yomcwiny I kare me yacu.
teo_prompt: Angor nu epotiete imedaunenete kotoma agangat na epupok kec kapak kana apotu. Aimorikikin ikiliok toma amukian na epotiete epedori aitogogong eidicanekec ka aitojokar eswamae loka apotu.
lgg_prompt: Ayia okporovu ru 'diyi tutuni orodri esu atita e'yo egaza ni azini rua ma alia engazu yi ma agyipika yi vu sawa okporovururi ma alia. E'yo agupi eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea aro esuza okporovu eyini ri ma alea ri ni eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma aa'ta okporovu eyini ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi abaine enda, nibagasirwa munonga omu buhwezi bw'abakazi baabo n'abakazi baabo baaba baine enda. Okweta abashaija omu bujanjabi bw'abaishiki abaine enda, nikibaasa kuhamya enkoragana yaabo n'okureetaho okushemererwa omu bwire bw'okutwara enda.

eng_prompt: Health is a fundamental human right that transcends boundaries and beliefs. Regardless of one's background, everyone deserves access to quality healthcare.
lug_prompt: Ebyobulamu ddembe lya buntu erisinga ensalo n'enzikiriza. Ka kibeere nti omuntu ava wa, buli omu agwanidde okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Yotkom obedo twero pa dano ma pire tek ma pe jenge I kom wang lobo. Labongo paro pi kabedo ma ngat moni aa ki iye, dano weng omyero gunong kony me yot kom maber.
teo_prompt: Erai angaleu apedorosio nuka itunga nuepolok noi ido mam itoronia ikoruo keda aiyuunikec. Amamei aiboisit na elomunit itunganan, ekot nginitunganan adumun amukian na adoketait na abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata niri eri drilemgbo 'ba a'da eyini aa'zu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria ri i. Angu 'ba alu alu ni engazu 'diyi ma talasi, le 'ba dria ma esu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi muke 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'amagara n'obugabe bw'abantu oburikukirayo ensharo n'enyikiriza. Oihireho oburugo bw'omuntu weena, buri omwe ashemereire kutunga obujanjabi burungi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, various organizations have collaborated to address health issues affecting the community. Among them, the Buganda kingdom has taken a leading role in promoting education and awareness about sickle cell disease.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikwataganye okukola ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu eziruma abantu. Mu byo, Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukulembedde mu kutumbula ebyenjigiriza n'okumanyisa ku bulwadde bwa nnalubiri.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, dul mapat-pat gutiyo kacelo me tyeko peko me yot-kom matye ka yelo lwak. I kingi, ker me Buganda otelo wii yub me pwonyo ki rweyo lwak i kom two sickle cell.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eswamautu iriongeta luipu aimorikikin aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu nuetiroritos itunga. Kanejaas kesi, engarenikit ajakanut nako Buganda aitopolorite aisisia keda aijen nuikamunitos adekasinei nuka adeka naka sickle cell.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti ndundu eyi nga azi tualu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ongulumu eyi ma alea. Eyi ma eselea, kari opi Buganda niri 'du azi okporu onita ma omgbo otuzu azini imbata fezu azo sickle cell niri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho,ebitongore bingi bikwatanisize kukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara ezirikuteganisa abantu. Omuri byo, obugabe bwa Buganda bwebembeire omu kutunguura eby'obwegyese n'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha ndwara ya sickle cell.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, tensions have escalated between government authorities and the management of the International Specialized Hospital. As a result, Parliament officials have been denied access to the facility.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, obunkenke bweyongedde wakati w'abakulira gavumenti n'abaddukanya eddwaliro lya International Specialized Hospital. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu ba paalamenti bagaaniddwa okuyingira ekifo.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, telle omede ikin lutic pa gamente ki ludito me ot yat makilwongo ni International Specialized Hospital. Macalo adwogi ne, pe ki yee ki lutic me ot moko cik me donyo I ot moko cik.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, eyatakinos ingungeta kiding apedorosio nuka apugan keda eyaitene loka adekis naka akwapin kere. Kanuka ngun, mam ecamakitai eswamak luka airabet alomar toma aiboisit ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi osuta si 'diyi ma alia, erita ako ma omgbo tu drice'ba gamete ni 'diyi ma eselea driceza arojo International Specialized Hospital niri be. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oga azi'ba koloseni ni 'diyi dri fizu pari nde ma alia si.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, obunkenke bweyongyeire ahagati y'ab'obushoborozi omu gavumenti hamwe n'abarikukurira eirwariro rya International Specialized Hospital. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi b'eishengyero tibarikubaasa kuhika omu mwanya.

eng_prompt: As we discuss policies that impact families, it's essential to consider the needs of all parents. Ensuring that mothers feel supported while breastfeeding is a crucial step in promoting family-friendly practices in our legislative spaces.
lug_prompt: Nga twogera ku mateeka agakosa amaka, kikulu okulowooza ku byetaago bya buli muzadde. Okukakasa nti bamaama bawulira nga bawagirwa nga bayonsa ddaala lya mugaso mu kutumbula enkola ez'omukwano eri amaka mu bifo byaffe eby'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka lok I kom cik matye ki adwoki ne I kom gangi, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom miti pa lunyodo weng. Neno ni mege giwinyo ni ki konyogi ikare me doto lutino obedo yoo acel ma pire tek tutwal me tyelo kor yub me gwoko lutino.
teo_prompt: Kwape iutar oni aitemitem nuka ainapeta nuetiroritos ikalia, ejokuna aomoom nuka ipudesia luka auriak kere. Aanyun ebe epupete luatoto agangat kapak kana aitanak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor iponesio luajokak luka ikalia kotoma aiboisio wok nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo onzezu azita familia eyi ma aza kopi 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo egazu e'yo tipika eyini le 'diyi ma dria. Afa ayia eyini aa'zu atita be eyini mva endru ri fezu ri eri e'yo azi okporu eyini ecozu geri familia eyini aa'zu muke 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu amavile legiko ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nituhanuura aha biragiro ebirikukwata aha maka, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha byetaago by'abazaire boona. Okureeba ngu abazaire nibahebwa obuhwezi baaba nibayonsa, n'omuringo murungi gw'okureetaho enkora erikuhwera amaka omu ishengyero ryaitu.

eng_prompt: The organization aimed to build a highly skilled workforce, prioritizing qualifications and experience over personal connections. To ensure fairness in the hiring process, they implemented a rigorous selection protocol.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyagenderera okuzimba abakozi abakugu ennyo, nga bakulembeza ebisaanyizo n'obumanyirivu okusinga enkolagana z'abantu. Okukakasa obwenkanya mu nkola y'okupangisa, baateekawo enkola enkakali ey'okulonda.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo ki miti me yubu lutic matye ki ngec ma lamal tutwal, kun keto rwom me kwan ki ngec me tic mapigi tego loyo ngec ma ngat moni tye kwede. Me neno ni lok me coyo lutic tye maber, guketo cik matek tutwal I tic.
teo_prompt: Alosikinet naka atukot kangin arai aitolomun eswamak lu emisiaritos, aisingarenit aisisiaeta keda amisiarit adepar arucokina. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna kotoma ainapeta nuka aitac itunga, apotu kesi itolomutu ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da le azi'ba ondua be angiri be 'diyi si, e'yo onita ni azini nita ni 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu 'diyi ma esele cozu kililiru, eyi 'ba geri okporu 'bani 'ba eyi opezu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kikaba kigyendereire kwombeka abakozi abaine emyoga y'ahaiguru, barikwebembeza ebirikwetengwa n'obumanyirizi kukira okukwatanisa kwabo. Okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza omu nkora y'okupangisa abantu, bakataho engyenderwaho y'amaani y'okutoorana abakozi.

eng_prompt: As the holy month of Ramadan comes to a close, it's a time for celebration and reflection. Families and friends gather to mark the joyous occasion of Eid al-Fitr.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwezi omutukuvu ogwa Ramadhan gunaatera okuggwaako, kye kiseera okujaguza n'okufumiitiriza. Ab'enganda n'emikwano bakungaana okukuza olunaku lwa Eid al-Fitr olw'essanyu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dwe maleng me Ramadhan dong cok tum, obedo kare me kwero ki tam matut. Lugang ki lurem gure me kwero nino me Eid al-Fitr.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi elap loka Ramadan angetakin, erai apak naka ainumunum ka aomoom. Iriamununete ikalia keda ipapero ainumunum epucit loka Eid al-Fitr.
lgg_prompt: Mba alatararu Ramadani niri ni i deria, eri sa'wa ayiko zuzu azini e'yo egazu. Familia eyi tualu agyipika eyi pie okuta ayiko fepi Eid al-Fitr niri inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Okwezi okurikwera okwa Ramadhan kwahika aha muheru, n'obwire bw'okujaguza n'okuteekateeka. Amaka n'abanywani nibeteerana kujaguza omukoro gw'okushemererwa ogwa Eid al-Fitr.

eng_prompt: The hospital has recently expanded its internship training program to accommodate more aspiring medical professionals. As a result, a new cohort of medical interns is being admitted to the program.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko eddwaliro lyagaziya enteekateeka yaalyo ey'okutendekebwa mu by'obusawo okusobola okusuza abasawo abalala abagala. N'ekyavaamu, ekibinja ekipya eky'abasawo abatendekebwa bayingizibwa mu pulogulaamu.
ach_prompt: Cokcok-ki ot yat omedo rwom me pwonye meggi me pwonyo ludaktari ma gitye ki miti me doko ludaktari. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa ludaktari manyen ma gitye ka pwonye me doko daktari gitye ka gamo lutino i yub eni.
teo_prompt: Apolor pac adekis ainapeta ke nuka aituutoonor kanu ayangar ipirioitin luipu lu ekotosi araun imurok. Kanuka ngun, itunga luitetiak lu itutuoritai kanu araut imurok kes ecamakitai alomar toma ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da edri curu'do otita imbatani erini 'diyi ma omgbo ra lezu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba 'ba o'diru imbata esupi arojoa 'diyi 'du otita 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro rikagaziya enteekateeka yaaryo y'okutendeka abashaho abarikwenda kwejumba omu mirimo y'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, guruupu y'abantu abasya abarikwegyesibwa omu by'amarwariro, bariyo nibatwarwa omu puroguraamu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent studies highlighting the benefits of reproductive health education, health experts emphasize the importance of proactive measures. Access to effective family planning resources is crucial for empowering individuals to make informed choices about their futures.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko okulaga emigaso gy'okusomesa ku byobulamu bw'okuzaala, abakugu mu byobulamu bakkaatiriza omugaso gw'okukola ebintu mu bwangu. Okufuna ebikozesebwa mu nkola y'ekizaalaggumba ennungi kya mugaso nnyo mu kuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi okukola okusalawo okulungi ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki ma nyutu ber pa pwonyo lutino i kom yotkom me nywal, ludiro me yot kom giwaco ni pire tek tutwal me timo gin moni con. Nongo yoo me tic maber me lago nywal pire tek tutwal pi miyo kero ki dano me moko tam maber I kom anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuka aisisiaeta nuitodunitos ajokis naka aisisianakin nuka aur, apotu ipiriotin luka angaleu kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitikitik. Adumunun iboro lu itwasamao kanu aitikitik aur erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitigogong itunga aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos oingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru ecepi orodri onita e'yo anzi tiza niri ma dria 'diyi ma dria, 'ba nita be e'yo alata ma dria angiri 'diyi asi 'ba orodri e'yo 'duzu okporu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo geri anzi eyi ma esele cozu kililiru 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru okpo fezu 'ba eyi ma ngulupi eyini ani ecozu peta eyi pezu ewu ewu drialeri ma dria ra.

Okutunga obuheereza burungi oburikukwata aha nteekateeka y'oruzaro n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuhwera abantu kukora okucwamu kurungi ebirikukwata aha biro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health challenges faced by both nations, leaders from each country convened to discuss potential collaborative efforts. After extensive negotiations, a formal agreement was reached.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okugenda mu maaso amawanga gombi kwe gasanga, abakulembeze okuva mu buli ggwanga baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukolaganamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa okumala ebbanga ddene, baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya entongole.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim ma lobe aryo weng tye ka kato ki iye, lutela me lobo acel-acel gurwate me nywako tam i kom kit ma gitwero tic kwede kacel. Ingee winye madit tutwal, winye obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu atiokisio nuka angaleu nu ejaas akwapin ngun kere, apotu engarenok luka akwapin ngun kere iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu epedorete aswam nepepe. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu, aponi kodolokinai acamanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kari iri 'diyi ni dri fuzu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba enga'ba kari alu alu ma alia 'diyi tra yi e'yo nzezu e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo otuza ezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu ti ecita azita palaa.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho amahanga gombi, abebembezi kuruga omuri buri eihanga, bakabugana kuhanuura aha kukwatanisa okurikubaasa kubaho. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, endagaano ekahikiirira.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for effective health communication, we are organizing a workshop. Participants will learn innovative strategies to engage the community and promote health awareness.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'empuliziganya ennungi ey'ebyobulamu, tuteekateeka omusomo. Abeetabamu bajja kuyiga obukodyo obuyiiya okukwataganya abantu n'okutumbula okumanyisa ku byobulamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me lok I kom yotkom, watye ka yubu kacoke me pwonye. Dano ma obi bedo tye gubi pwonyo diro manyen me rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka einer loajokan loikamunit angaleu, iuta sio aitemokin airiamun. Epote itunga aisisiaun iwaitin luitetiak lu iswamaet itunga ka aitopolorite aijen naka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo nzeza kililiru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, ama otita imbatani ni otu. Ba emu'ba 'diyi nga geri o'diru 'diyi oni lezu o'bi eyi ma eselea azini imbata e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'empurizagana y'ebyamagara eyeyongyeire, turiyo nitutebekanisa omushomo. Abeejumbiremu nibaija kwega emiringo y'okutunguura abantu n'okureetaho okwetegyereza ahaby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, the involvement of men in family planning and reproductive health is crucial for achieving balanced decision-making. Understanding the dynamics of gender roles can shed light on how reproductive choices are made within communities.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, okwetaba kw'abasajja mu nkola y'ekizaalaggumba n'ebyobulamu by'okuzaala kwa mugaso nnyo mu kutuukiriza okusalawo okulungi. Okutegeera enkola y'emirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu kisobola okuwa ekitangaala ku ngeri okusalawo kw'okuzaala gye kukolebwamu mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, bedo tye pa coo I yub me lago nywal ki yot kom me nywal obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me moko tam matir. Niang kit ma tic pa mon ki coo tye kwede twero miyo ngec matut I kom kit ma yer me nywal time kwede I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, ajaut naka ikiliok toma aitikitik aur ka aur erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin aseununeta nuejokuka. Amisiikin nuikamunitos aswam naka ikiliok keda angor epedori aitodun epone loiswamaere aseununeta nuka aur kotoma atutubena.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, agupi eyini fizu e'yo anzi eyi ma esele cozu 'diyi ma alea tualu e'yo anzi eyi ma esele cozu 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'bani e'yo agupi eyini aa'zu oku eyi be 'diyi ma dria ri ma vata ma omgbo otu geri 'bani e'yo anzi eyi ma esele cozu ri ma dria ongulumu eyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous selection process involving multiple interviews and assessments, the board of directors has finally made their decision. The organization is excited to announce the appointment of a new leader who will guide them into the future.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsulwamu okw'amaanyi okwabaddemu okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo n'okukeberebwa, akakiiko ka badayirekita kasembye okusalawo. Ekitongole kisanyuse okulangirira okulondebwa kw'omukulembeze omuggya ajja okubalambika mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me yer matek tutwal ma obedo ki lapeny ki timo kwed mapol, dul pa ludor dul ne dong gumoko tamgi. Dul ne tye ki yom cwiny me miyo kwena ni kicimo latela manyen ma obi telo gi i kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainapeta nuepolok nuka aseo nuimoriarit aingitingit keda aingic iboro luipu, apotu lukapolok kiswamautu aseunetekec. Eyalama erionget alimor aseunet naka engarenon loitetet loebeit aingarenikin kes koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu okporu 'diyi ma vutia 'bani eyi ozizu azini eyi ma pamvu onezu 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba amuti ma drice'ba 'diyi asizu eyi ma peta 'du 'bo. Amuti 'da ayikosi e'yo 'bani drice'ba o'diru ni opezu eyi ma dricepi ewu drialeri ma alea ri oluzu.

eng_prompt: Access to proper menstrual hygiene products and education is crucial for empowering young girls. Without these resources, many may face challenges that hinder their ability to attend school regularly.
lug_prompt: Okufuna eby'obuyonjo mu nsonga z'ekikyala n'okusomesebwa bikulu nnyo mu kutumbula abawala abato. Awatali bikozesebwa bino, bangi bayinza okusanga okusoomoozebwa okulemesa obusobozi bwabwe okugenda mu ssomero buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Nongo jami ma konyo lutino anyira me gwoko lengo ikare me two dwee ki kwan pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lutino anyira. Labongo jami magi, polgi nongo peko ma gengo gi me bedo igangkwan kare ki kare.

eng_prompt: As the organization continues to navigate the complexities of healthcare reform, the need for strategic planning has become increasingly evident. To address these challenges, the executive team has decided to convene once again.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitongole kigenda mu maaso n'okutambula mu buzibu bw'enkyukakyuka mu byobulamu, obwetaavu bw'okuteekateeka mu ngeri ey'obukodyo bweyongedde okweyoleka. Okusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kuno, akakiiko akakulembeze kasazeewo okuddamu okutuula.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul ne tye ka mede ki tic matek me kelo aloka-loka I tenge me yot-kom, miti me bedo ki yub maber tye ka nen tutwal. Me tyeko peko magi, dul madoro tic omoko tamgi me rwate odoco.

eng_prompt: The current emergency unit is struggling to accommodate the rising influx of patients. As a result, healthcare officials are evaluating the facility's capacity and resources.

ach_prompt: Gang tic pa lutwo ma gitye ka poto atura kombedi tye ka yele me tic i kom wel lutwo matye ka donyo mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ka ngiyo kit ma ot yat tye kwede ki jami ma mite.

lgg_prompt: Pari azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu sawa 'disi ri ni dri ci e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu ri ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi arojo 'da ma okpo azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ale andri.

eng_prompt: To address the increasing demand for healthcare services, local authorities have proposed a plan to enhance the facilities available in community health centres. This initiative aims to provide more accessible care options for residents.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, ab'obuyinza ku byalo bateesezza enteekateeka ey'okutumbula eby'obujjanjabi ebiri mu malwaliro g'omu kitundu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abatuuze obujjanjabi obusoboka.
ach_prompt: Me tyeko miti madit matye pi kony me yot kom, lutela me tedero guyubu yub me medo rwom me jami ma mite I odi yadi ma ikabedo mapatpat. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo kony me yot kom ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo amukian, etolomutu apedorosio nuka atutubet ainapeta nu aitogogong aiboisio nu ejaas adekisia nuka atutubet. Alosikinet na erai ainakin itunga amukian na epatana adumun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba otita eyi arojo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted significant disparities in healthcare services for pregnant mothers. As a result, a comprehensive study is underway to understand the underlying issues affecting service quality.
lug_prompt: Alipoota ezaakaggwa ziraga enjawulo mu bujjanjabi bw'abakyala ab'embuto. N'ekivuddemu, okunoonyereza okujjuvu kugenda mu maaso okutegeera ensonga ezikosa omutindo gw'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I tenge me yot-kom pa mon ma oyac. Macalo adwogi ne, kwed matut tye kawot anyim me niang peko ma tye ka balo rwom me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu atiakatiaka naepol noi naka amukian naka angor nuepotiete. Kanuka ngun, eutai aswam aisisia naepol noi kanu amisiikin akiro nuepedorete aitolitol adoketait na ejanakine.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo eselecoza okporu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi okporovu eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo eti ondaza angiri ni mu drile e'yo ewaru azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma omgbo esipi 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka obutabanguko bw'amaani omu buheereza bw'eby'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho okucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho kwetegyereza enshonga ezirikukwata aha mutindo gw'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming event, organizers are calling for submissions from researchers and practitioners. These contributions will play a crucial role in shaping the discussions at the national Health Promotion Conference.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera omukolo ogujja, abategesi bayita okuwaayo okuva mu banoonyereza n'abakozi. Obuyambi buno bujja kukola kinene nnyo mu kuteekawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu lukungaana lw'eggwanga olw'okutumbula ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub matye kabino ni, luyub tye ka lwongo lukwed ki ludiro me miyo tam gi. Mic magi gubi konyo tutwal I yub me nywako lok I kacoke me ilo malo rwom me yot kom I lobo ni.

lgg_prompt: Otuta 'yeta emupi ri ni, 'ba otuta otupi 'diyi e'yo eyi ai engazu 'ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi vu azini 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi vu. Afa feza 'diyi nga azi okporu nga e'yo nzeza otita imbatani kari 'di ma alea e'yo alata ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera omukoro ogurikwija, abatebekanisa bariyo nibashaba ebihandiiko kuruga omu bacondoozi hamwe n'abakozi. Ebiheebwayo nibiija kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuteisa omu ruteerane rw'eihanga orw'okutunguura eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing health challenges faced by the nation, government officials convened to discuss strategies for improving public health. After extensive consultations and research, they have developed a comprehensive initiative aimed at enhancing health security across the country.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu eggwanga bye lyolekaganye nabyo, abakungu ba gavumenti baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ennyo n'okunoonyereza, bakoze enteekateeka yonna egendereddwamu okutumbula eby'obulamu okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kamede I lobo man, lutic pa gamente gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak. Ingee lok ki kwed mapol, guyubu yub matye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me gwoko yot kom I lobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu nu ejaas akwap, apotu eswamak luka apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokarere angaleu naka itunga. Akaulo naka aingitun keda aingic, etolomutu kesi ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar ayuwara naka angaleu kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kari ni dri fuzu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri 'bani ecozu o'bi eyi ma rua ala otuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza angiri azini vuti ondaza ma vutia, eyi e'do otita azi dria 'bani lezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma tambazu kari 'di ma alea ndulu.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health concerns, the Ugandan government has implemented new measures to enhance airport safety. As part of these efforts, they have acquired advanced technology to monitor travelers' temperatures.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okugenda mu maaso, gavumenti ya Uganda etaddewo enkola empya okutumbula eby'okwerinda ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, bafunye tekinologiya ow'omulembe okulondoola ebbugumu ly'abatambuze.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, gamente me Uganda okatti ki yoo manyen me medo rwom me gwoko ber bedo I bar dege. Macalo but tic man, gunongo diro manyen me ngiyo lyeto pa luwot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu, etolomu apugan naka Uganda iwaitin luitetiak kanu aitojokar ayuwara naka idegei. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, adumutu kesi etatai loakwana kanu aanyanar amwanis naka itunga lu alotok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete Uganda niri 'ba geri o'diru ndege pari ma ageitema otuzu. Okpo 'diyi ma azi ru, eyi esu afa ndundu eyi eyini ani aci'ba eyi ma rua driza onezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara ezirikugyenda omu maisho,gavumenti ya Uganda eteireho oburyo busya bw'okureeberera ebishaayi by'enyonyi. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, batungire tekinorogye y'omutindo gw'ahaiguru y'okukyebera obutagatsi bw'abagyenzi.

eng_prompt: Listeners are tuning in to hear about the latest developments in local healthcare. The host has invited several experts to share their insights on the challenges facing hospitals in the area.
lug_prompt: Abawuliriza bawuliriza okuwulira ku bigenda mu maaso mu byobulamu mu kitundu. Omutegesi ayise abakugu abawerako okugabana amagezi gaabwe ku kusoomoozebwa amalwaliro mu kitundu kwe gasanga.
ach_prompt: Luwiny tye ka winyo lok I kom jami matye katime I tenge me yot kom I kabedo gi. Lwak olwongo ludiro mapol me nywako tam gi i kom peko ma odi yadi tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Epupete itunga nuikamunitos akiro nuitetiak nuiswamasi kotoma angaleu. Anyaraunit eyaiton ipirioitin luipu aimor aomisio kec nuikamunitos atiokisio nu ejaas adekisia katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo eripi 'diyi e'yo o'duko efupi o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria. Ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi omve 'ba onita be angiri be 'diyi eyi ma egata awazu e'yo ewaru arojo angu 'da ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abahurikizi bariyo nibahurikiriza okuhurira ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu by'amagara omu byaro. Orikwakiira oruteerane ayesire abakugu baingi okubagana ebiteiso byabo ahaburemeezi obu amarwariro garikurabamu omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health challenges facing the nation, there is a critical need for blood donations to support hospitals and patients in need. Community leaders are calling for increased participation in blood donation drives to ensure a steady supply.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okugenda mu maaso eggwanga kwe lyolekaganye nakwo, waliwo obwetaavu obw'amaanyi obw'okugaba omusaayi okuyamba amalwaliro n'abalwadde abali mu bwetaavu. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu basaba okwongera okwenyigira mu kaweefube w'okugaba omusaayi okulaba nga gubeerawo buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim ma lobo man tye ka kato ki iye, tye miti madit tutwal me miyo remo me konyo odi yadi ki lutwo matye i peko. Lutela me kabedo gitye ka lego lwak me bedo tye ikare me miyo remo wek obed tye kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nu ejaas akwap, epol eipud loka ainanakin awokot kanu aigang adekisia keda adekak. Ekotosi engarenok lu atutubet aiyatakin ajaut toma ainapeta nuka ainanakin aokot kanu awanyun ebe ejai aokot duc.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kari ni dri fuzu azo be 'diyi ma dria, le 'ba ma fe ari arojo eyi ma aza kozu tualu 'ba azoru 'diyi pie. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi a'i 'ba eyini ari fezu 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu eyini ani ari ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho omu ihanga, hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okugaba eshagama kuhwera amarwariro n'abarwaire abatarikwebaasa. Abeebembezi b'ebyanga nibashaba abantu kwejumba omu mikoro y'okugaba eshagama, kugira ngu eshagama egumizemu kuheebwayo.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing malaria crisis in the region, community leaders have come together to address the urgent need for resources. As part of this initiative, a donation plan has been launched with Rotarian malaria partners.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'omusujja ekigenda mu maaso mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakwataganye okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ebintu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, enteekateeka y'obuyambi etongozeddwa ne bannamukago ba lotale abalwanyisa omusujja gw'ensiri.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me two malaria matye kawot anyim I but lobo eni, lutela me kabedo gi guribe kacel me tyeko peko me tic ki jami ma mite oyot-oyot tutwal. Macalo but yub man, kicako yub me miyo kony ki dul me Rotary ma tye ka lweny i kom two malaria.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis na eimidi na elosi akonye kotoma aiboisit, apotu engarenok luka atutubet imorikikinos kanu aitemokin eipud loka iboro. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kana, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuka agangat keda ipaupa luka eimidi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo malaria niri ni angu 'di ma alea ri ma aza kozu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi emu tualu e'yo afa 'bani le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do otuta afa fezu 'diyi ma dria amuti azi ngapi Rotarian malaria be 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'omushwija gw'ensiri ogurikugyenda omu maisho omu kyanga, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakwatanisa kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, enteekateeka y'okugaba obuhwezi etandikirweho n'abanyakibiina kya Rotary abarikurwanisa omushwija gw'ensiri.

eng_prompt: The Saraya company is known for its innovative skincare products. Recently, they announced plans to develop a new treatment specifically designed for jigger infestations.
lug_prompt: Kampuni ya Saraya emanyiddwa olw'ebintu byayo eby'obuyiiya eby'okulabirira olususu. Gyebuvuddeko, baalangirira enteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya obujjanjabi obupya obukoleddwa ku bulwadde bwa jigger.
ach_prompt: Kampuni me Saraya oywek pi jami ma giyubu me gwoko del komgi. Cocoki, gunyuto yub me yubu yat manyen ma kiyubu tutwalle pi kwidi.
teo_prompt: Ejenara ekampuni loka Saraya kanu aitolomun iboro luitetiak luka emukule. Apakio nu, apotu kesi kolimosi aitemonokineta nuka aitolomun amukian naitetet kanu adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni amuti Saraya niri e'yo afa o'diru enyirikoniri ma tambazu 'diyisi. O'du 'diyi ma alia, eyi azi otita eyi aro o'diru 'bani ede e'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni ya Saraya nemanywa ahabw'ebintu byayo eby'omutaano by'okureeberera omubiri. Enyimaho, bakarangirira enteekateeka y'okutandikaho omubazi gw'okuragurira obukooko.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for advanced medical care, healthcare systems are implementing new training programs for medical professionals. This initiative aims to enhance local expertise and improve patient outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'omulembe, ebitongole by'ebyobujjanjabi bitadde mu nkola pulogulaamu empya ez'okutendeka abakugu mu byobujjanjabi. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obukugu mu kitundu n'okutumbula embeera z'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo, dul mapat-pat me yot-kom tye ka kati ki yub me pwonye manyen pi lutic yoto kom. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom me ngec ki diro pa lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian naepol noi, eutai aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aituutoonor eswamak lu adekis. Alosikinet na erai aitogogong acoa na itunga ka aitojokar eswamae lo adekak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi ri ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, amuti e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi otita imbatani o'diru 'diyi e'do azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu ondua angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini geri 'ba azoru 'diyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obujanjabi obw'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibataho puroguraamu nsya z'okutendeka abakugu omu by'amagara. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okutunguura obukugu omu byaro n'okutunguura entunguuka y'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: In an innovative effort to address both waste management and women's health needs, local entrepreneurs are exploring sustainable alternatives for feminine hygiene products. One promising solution involves utilizing agricultural byproducts to create eco-friendly sanitary options.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'obuyiiya ow'okukwasaganya enkwata y'ebisasiro n'ebyetaago by'abakyala eby'obulamu, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu banoonyereza ku ngeri endala ez'obuwangaazi ez'ebikozesebwa mu buyonjo bw'abakyala. Ekimu ku bisobola okugonjoola ekizibu kino kwe kukozesa ebintu ebiva mu bulimi n'obulunzi okutondawo enkola z'obuyonjo ezitali za bulabe eri obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I yub manyen me tic i kom kit me tic i kom yugi ki peko me yot kom pa mon, lutim biacara me tedero gitye ka yenyo yoo mukene me tic i kom jami ma mon tiyo kwede me gwoko lengo. Yoo acel matye ki gen me cobo peko man obedo tic ki jami ma aa ki ipoto me yubu yoo me gwoko lengo ma pe balo cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam naitetet naka aitemokin nuka agasia keda nuka angaleu naka angor, eutasi agwelanarak luka atutubet aingic iwaitin lu itwasamaere iboro luka angor. Adiopebon naepedori aitemokin ngun imoriarit aitwasam iboro lu akoru kanu aitolomun iponesio luajokak luka aila.
lgg_prompt: Okpo o'diru 'bani ngazu e'yo okurunya ma tambazu azini e'yo rua ala ni oku eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma alea, 'ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu afa ayuzaru oku eyini 'diyi ayuzu sa'wa driasi 'diyi onda. E'yo azi ecopi e'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru ri ma azi eri afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ayuzu geri alata ni angu ama agei ri ma ta mbapi muke 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeberera kasasiro hamwe n'ebyetaago by'abakazi, abashuubuzi b'omubyaro bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okukoresa ebintu by'abakazi eby'obuyonjo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kumaraho oburemeezi n'okukoresa ebintu ebitarikuruga omu buhingi n'oburiisa, okureetaho eby'obuyonjo ebirikubaasa kurinda obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: Health officials and researchers are convening to address the rising concerns over recent disease outbreaks. Collaborative efforts are being made to identify effective strategies and preventive measures.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu n'abanoonyereza batuula okukola ku kweraliikirira okweyongera olw'okubalukawo kw'endwadde gyebuvuddeko. Amaanyi ag'awamu gakolebwa okuzuula enkola ennungi n'engeri z'okuziyiza.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom kacel ki lukwed tye kacokke me lok I kom peko matye kamedde pi poto pa two ma okato cocoki. Gitye ka tic kacelo me nongo yoo me gengo two.
teo_prompt: Iriamununos eswamak luka angaleu keda angicak kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka abwangun naka adekasinei. Iswamao iboro lu aimorikikina kanu ajenun iwaitin lu iswamaete ka aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi pie eyi tra e'yo asi otiza eyini tupi e'yo azo eyini e'dozu o'diru 'diyi ma dria ri ma aza kozu. Ba okpo 'ba tualu 'diyi 'ba geri azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi esuzu azini geri 'bani ecozu eyi atrizu ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara hamwe n'abakyondoozi bariyo nibateerana kukora ahaby'okwerarikirira ebirikweyongyera ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara. Okukwatanisa kuriyo nikukorwa okureeba oburyo burungi n'emiringo y'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: In light of recent outbreaks and the challenges faced in response efforts, health officials are conducting a thorough review of past strategies. This evaluation aims to identify key areas for enhancement in future Ebola preparedness initiatives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'obulwadde buno gyebuvuddeko n'okusoomoozebwa okusangibwa mu kaweefube w'okubuziyiza, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bali mu kwekenneenya enkola ezaakolebwa emabega. Okukebera kuno kugendereddwamu okuzuula ebitundu ebikulu eby'okutumbula mu nteekateeka z'okwetegekera Ebola mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma otime cokcok-ki ki peko ma dano tye ka nongo ikare me lweny i kom two, lutic me yot kom tye ka ngiyo kit ma gityeko tic kwede con. Yub man tye me niang kabedo mapigi tego ma omyero kimed iye yub me lweny i kom two ebola i kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo abwangunor adekasinei pac keda atiokisio nu etereikina keda aswamisio, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu airereor iwaitin lu iswamatai kapakio nukokau. Alosikinet naka airereonor akiro ngun ngesi ajenun aiboisio nuibusakinit aitojokar kanu akapakina kanuka ebola koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yo si azini e'yo ewaru 'bani esu e'yo nde ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi geri andra drio 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo eti ondaza 'diri lezu angu okporu 'bani eco otu e'yo otuta azo ebola nirisi ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikushangwa omu kukora ahaburwaire, abakuru omu by'amagara bariyo nibashwijuma gye enkora eyabaireho enyimaho. Ekigyendererwa ky'okushwijuma n'okumanya emyanya y'omugasho y'okutunguura omu nteekateeka y'okwetebekanisiza Ebola omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Health officials in Uganda have been closely monitoring the situation as reports of a potential outbreak emerged. Today, they announced that a case of Ebola has been confirmed in Kasese district.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu Uganda babadde balondoola embeera nga alipoota z'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bwe zaavaayo. Leero balangiridde nti abalwadde ba Ebola bazuuliddwa mu disitulikiti y'e Kasese.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom I lobo Uganda gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede I kare ma adwogi me poto pa two obedo tye. Tin gunyuto ni ki nongo ngat acel matye ki two ebola i Kasese.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu ko Uganda ongicata ejok ejautene ngol naarai apotu iripotan luka abwangun. Lolo, aponi kolimorai ebe aponi kodumunai itunganan yen ejatatar keda adeka naka ebola ko Kasese.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alatani kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'yo nderi ma pamvu andri e'yo o'duko efupi e'yo azo efupi ra 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria. Andru, eyi azi kini 'ba esu 'ba azi azo ebola niri be Kasese distrikitia ni.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara omu Uganda batwire nibareebuuza embeera ahabw'okugira ngu hariho ripoota ezirikworeka okubarukaho kw'endwara. Eriizooba, batumire ngu omurwaire wa ebola ahamiibwe omu disiturikiti ya Kasese.

eng_prompt: Ebola is a severe viral infection that can lead to life-threatening symptoms. Early recognition of its signs is crucial for effective treatment and containment of the virus.
lug_prompt: Ebola bulwadde bwa kawuka obw'amaanyi obusobola okuviirako obubonero obuteeka obulamu mu matigga. Okuzuula obubonero bwayo nga bukyali kya mugaso nnyo mu kujjanjaba obulungi n'okuziyiza akawuka.
ach_prompt: Ebola obedo two marac tutwal ma kwidi kelo ma twero kelo lanyut ma keto kwo pa dano kama rac tutwal. Niang lanyut ne con pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat ki gengo kwidi eni.
teo_prompt: Erai ebola adeka naepol noi naepedori ayangaun awanyununeta nuepedorete aitukurian aijar. Ajenun sek ijenuneta ke ejok kanu aimuke ka aitikitik ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azo ebola niri azo azi okporu omvele viral infection ru ecopi fepi eceta idri 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ejipi ra ni i. Wura erini e'dazu drioru ri eri orodriru aro fezu kililiru azini azo 'da ma ereta atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ebola n'endwara y'amaani erikubaasa kureeta obubonero bw'akabi aha magara. Okumanya obubonero bwayo bukiri kare n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurira n'okurwanisa akakooko.

eng_prompt: After months of anticipation and community discussions, the selection process for the new leadership team has finally concluded. The hospital administration announced the names of the individuals who will guide the institution into its next phase of development.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okusuubira n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu, okusunsula abakulembeze abapya kuwedde. Abakulembeze b'eddwaliro balangiridde amannya g'abantu abajja okulungamya ekitongole kino mu mutendera gwakyo oguddako ogw'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me kuro ki nywako lok ikin lwak, yub me yero lutela manyen dong otum. Lutela me ot yat guwaco nying dano ma gubi doro yub me dongo ot yat eni I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aomisio keda ipegeta luka itunga, adaun aitodolikin aseo naka etimu loitetet loka engarenok. Abu eyaitene lo adekis kolimo ikiroria luka itunga luebeit aingarenikin adekis ngin toma adoketait naetupakini naka apol.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo egazu tualu e'yo o'yoza ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu amuti driceza ni o'diru 'diyiniri asizu 'bo. Driceza arojo 'da niri azi ru 'ba arojo 'da ma dricepi 'diyi arojo 'da ma zota ma ongmbo emupi ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okutegyereza hamwe n'okuhanuura omu bantu, omurimo gw'okutoorana abebembezi abasya gwahwaire. Abeebembezi b'eirwariro, bakarangirira amaziina g'abantu abarikuza kuhabura eirwariro omu ntunguuka erikukurataho.

eng_prompt: Health officials in Congo reported a new case of Ebola virus in a female patient. Despite receiving medical care, her condition deteriorated rapidly.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu Congo baategeezezza ku mulwadde omukazi omupya alina akawuka ka Ebola. Wadde yafuna obujjanjabi, embeera ye yeeyongera okwonooneka.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom I lobo Congo guwaco ni tye dano manyen ma tye ki two ebola I kin lutwo ma mon. Kadi bed ni en onongo kony me yat, kwone odoko rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis ko Congo olimosi ebe ejaasi adekan naberu keda adeka naka ebola. Karaida abu ngesi kodum amukian, abu ejauteneke kibiror noi.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni kari Congo niri ma alea 'diyi olu e'yo 'ba azo ebola niri be oku azi ni ma dria. Erini tro aro esuzu ra ti, eri ma wura eza i mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara omuri Kongo bakagamba aha murwaire w'omukazi oine oburwaire bwa Ebola. N'obu yaatungire obujanjabi, embeera ye ekasisikarira kimwe.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated research and impactful contributions to public health, the professor's efforts have finally been recognized. Colleagues and students gathered to celebrate this significant achievement.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'anoonyereza era ng'akola n'amaanyi mu by'obulamu bw'abantu, okufuba kwa pulofeesa kuwedde ne kusiimibwa. Bannange n'abayizi baakuŋŋaanye okujaguza obuwanguzi buno obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me timo kwed ki timo jami mapol I kom yotkom pa lwak, tic pa lapwony madit ne dong otyeko nongo pwoc. Lutic luwotgi kacel ki lutino gucokke me kwero gin ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aingic keda aswam naejok kanu angaleu naka itunga, aponi kowanyunai aswam naka epurofesa. Apotu ipaupa keda esisiak kotukokinos ainumunum aitodolikineta nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara e'yo vuti ondazani 'diyi ma vutia azini azi onyiru erini nga e'yo alata o'bi yiniri ma dria 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba fe asizu asi 'baza okpo erini 'diyi dri ra. Azi'ba eyi tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie eyi tra eyi ayiko zu e'yo orodriru 'di inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okucondooza n'okukora n'amaani omu by'amagara g'abantu, amaani ga purofeesa gakahendera gamanywa. Abakozi bagyenzi n'abeegi baketeerana kujaguza obuhanguzi obu.

eng_prompt: In the face of a global health crisis, the dedication and resilience of health workers have shone through. Their tireless efforts to promote hygiene and safety measures have played a crucial role in protecting communities.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna, obumalirivu n'obumalirivu bw'abasawo bweyolekedde. Kaweefube waabwe ow'obutaweera okutumbula eby'obuyonjo n'obukuumi akoze omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko me yot kom matye I wilobo, miti ki tek cwiny pa lutic yoto kom onyuto maber tutwal. Tute matek tutwalgi me tyelo kor yub me gwoko lengo ki ber bedo okonyo tutwal I gwoko kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Koingaren naka ationis naka angaleu naka akwap kere, ainakina keda agogong naka eswamak luka angaleu ewanyunitai. Aswam kec naepol noi naka aitopolorite nuka aila keda ayuwara iswamat noi kotoma ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi wudrikurusiri ma drilea, asi 'baza azini asi 'baza 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyiniri e'da i. Okpo eyini 'ba e'yo alata ni 'diyi otuzu ri nga azi okporu ongulumu eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara omunsi yoona, okwehayo n'okugumisiriza kw'abashaho kweyorekire. Amaani gaabo g'okutunguura eby'obuyonjo n'eby'okwerinda, gakozire omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda ebyanga.

eng_prompt: Effective family planning relies heavily on clear and open dialogue between partners. When misunderstandings arise, it can create significant challenges in achieving shared goals.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ekizaalaggumba ennungi yeesigama nnyo ku kuteesa okulongoofu era okw'amazima wakati w'abaagalana. Bwe wabaawo obutategeeragana, kisobola okuleetawo okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kutuukiriza ebigendererwa eby'awamu.
ach_prompt: Yub me lago nywal ma tiyo maber jenge tutwalle I kom nywako lok maber I kin lunyom. Ka telle tye, man twero kelo peko madit tutwal I cobo miti ma dano weng tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo alanakin aur lo iswamae ejok ejai kotupitete aineranara na ecai kiding ikiliok keda angor. Arai ejai amamus acamanar, epedori ngin ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anzi eyi ma esele cozu kililiru ri ni aa e'yo nzeza kililiru azini ngmboru 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Erita ako ka efu, eri eco e'yo ewaru eji e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okukora enteekateeka y'oruzaro, eyegamira munonga okuganiira ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi. Obutetegyerezana ku burikurugaho, nibubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of polio cases in the region, health officials have implemented a vaccination campaign. To ensure the safety and immunity of the youngest population,
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'abalwadde ba poliyo mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bataddewo kaweefube w'okugema.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two akweya i kare ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gucako yub me gwero dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka polio kotoma aiboisit, etolomutu eswamak luka angaleu ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo polio niri ma e'dota angu 'di ma alea ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita aro soza niri 'bo.
