eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a significant increase in cholera cases in the region. In response to this alarming trend, local authorities are mobilizing resources to combat the spread of the disease.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baategeezezza nti abalwadde ba kkolera beeyongedde nnyo mu kitundu. Mu kwanukula embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bakunga ebintu okulwanyisa okusaasaana kw'obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two kolera omede tutwal I twok piny eni. Pi peko man, lutela me tedero tye ka jogo jami me lweny i kom nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi adekak ekolera katutubet. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, eutasi apedorosio nuka atutubet aituk iboro kanu aitikitik awea naka adeka.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo kolera niri be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea ra. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra a'di 'dizu azo 'da ma ereta be.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba kolera omu kyanga. Ahabw'enshonga egi, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bariyo nibarundaana ebintu by'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in malaria cases, officials are intensifying their efforts to combat the disease. The Health Ministry continues to advocate for a malaria-free country.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde b'omusujja gw'ensiri gye buvuddeko, abakungu bongedde amaanyi mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa ekirwadde. Minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekyagenda mu maaso n'okulwanirira ensi etaliimu musujja.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two malaria, lutic tye ka medo kero gi me lweny i kom two eni. Jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom tye ka medde ki lweny pi gengo two malaria I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nuka eimidi, eutasi eswamak aiyatakin aswamukec kanu aitiji adeka. Inyikokini erionget loka angaleu aswam kagogong kanu alemar eimidi kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo malaria niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi okpo 'ba a'di 'dizu azo 'da be. Okalamvu alataniri ni mu drile a'di 'dizu e'yo azo malaria niri ni kari 'di ma alea ku ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'omushwija gw'ensiri, abakungu beyongyeire amaani omu kurwanisa oburwaire. Minisiture y'eby'amagara neegumizamu kurwanirira eihanga kurekyeraho omushwija gw'ensiri.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in logistics and technology have significantly enhanced the efficiency of medical supply chains. As a result, there is an improvement in the transportation of blood samples.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana eyaliwo gye buvuddeko mu by'entambula ne tekinologiya erongoosezza nnyo enkola y'okugaba obujjanjabi. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo okulongooka mu ntambuza ya sampolo z'omusaayi.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otime I kare ma okato cokcok-ki I tenge me tic ki tet manyen okonyo tutwal I yub me miyo kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me wot pa remo ma kipimo tye kamedde.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana nes etojokaar noi epone loka aikor amukian. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi epone loka aitolot aokot nu inwakunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni azini e'yo tekenologiani 'diyi otu geri 'bani aro eyi awazu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani ari o'bizu 'diyi ojizu ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'obujanjabi n'ebya tekinorogye, eyongyeire amaani omu kukora emirimo y'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, entambura ya sampolo z'eshagama eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of quality maternity care. As a result, several organizations have stepped up to enhance services and support for expectant mothers.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okutegeera okweyongera ku bukulu bw'okulabirira abakyala abazaala obulungi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bivuddeyo okutumbula obuweereza n'obuyambi eri bamaama abali embuto.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa gwoko mon ma oyac. Macalo adwogi ne, dule mapol gu aa malo me ilo malo rwom me kony ki kony pi mon ma oyac.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenuna noi ajokis naka aidar angor nu epotiete. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta luipu kolomutu kanu aikeuna ejanakine keda agangat mama ejaasi angor nuepotiete.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodriru azakoma fele okporovu eyini ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi efu azakoma fele okporovu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okureeberera abakazi abaine enda. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bingi birugireyo kutunguura obuheereza n'obuhwezi bw'abakazi abaine enda.

eng_prompt: We are excited to announce the upcoming national health promotion conference, where experts will gather to share innovative ideas and research. To contribute your insights, please ensure you submit your abstract for consideration.
lug_prompt: Tuli basanyufu okulangirira olukungaana olujja olw'okutumbula ebyobulamu mu ggwanga lyonna, abakugu mwe bajja okukungaana okugabana ebirowoozo ebipya n'okunoonyereza. Okuwaayo amagezi go, kakasa nti oweereza mu bufunze bwo okwekenneenya.
ach_prompt: Watye ki yom cwiny me cwalo lok angeya I kom kacoke ma obubino me tyelo kor lok me yot kom, kama ludiro gubi gure iye me nywako tam manyen ki kwed. Me miyo ngec mamegi, tim ber inen ni icwalo coc mamegi me niang iye.
teo_prompt: Iyalama sio alimor airiamun na ebunit kanu aitopolorite angaleu, ne ebeit ipirioitin atukonokin aimor aomisio nuitetiak ka aingic. Kanu aijaikin aomisio kon, kilipitai ijo aijukar akirokon kanu airereonor.
lgg_prompt: Ama ovu ayikosi e'yo otuta e'yo alata ni kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri ma e'yo ecezu, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi ni mu okuta 'yezu egata o'diru 'diyi awazu azini e'yo vuti ondaza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo mini egale 'diyi fezu, kirikirisi le mi ma fe e'yo mini 'ba e'yo nde ma dria 'diyi 'bani egazu yi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nitushemererwa kurangirira oruteerane rw'eihanga orurikwija, ahu abakugu barikuza kwegaita kugabana ebiteekateeko n'okucondooza. Okuheereza ebiteekateeko byawe, habaho okureeba ngu ohayo ebiteiso byawe by'okushwijuma.

eng_prompt: Many young individuals face pressure to engage in sexual activity at an early age. To promote healthier choices and outcomes, it is essential to encourage responsible behaviors.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bangi boolekagana n'okunyigirizibwa okwetaba mu bikolwa eby'okwegatta ku myaka emito. Okutumbula okusalawo okulungi n'ebinaavaamu, kya mugaso okukubiriza enneeyisa ey'obuvunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Bulu mapol nongo lyeto me donyo I tim me butu imit ma nongo pud gitino. Pi ilo malo rwom me yero jami matye ki yot kom, pire tek tutwal me cuku cwiny dano me timo jami maber.
teo_prompt: Atumunak luipu etereikina keda aiyalongong naka alomar toma aelo eringa edisiak. Kanu aitopolor aseununeta nu engalete, ejok aisinyikokit iponesio luajokak.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode karakara eyi okpo esu e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi 'yezu de eyi ma eli nga were. E'yo 'duza alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru adriza kililiru 'diyi ekazu.
nyn_prompt: Eminyeeto emingi neetunga okugyemeserezibwa kwejumba omu by'okuteerana bakiri bato. Okureetaho okucwamu kurungi n'ebirikurugamu, n'eky'omugasho okureetaho emicwe mirungi.

eng_prompt: In many communities, the responsibility for health and well-being often falls on the household head. This individual plays a crucial part in implementing practices that promote a healthy environment for their family.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ebyobulamu n'obulamu obulungi butera kugwa ku mutwe gw'amaka. Omuntu ono akola omulimu munene mu kuteeka mu nkola enkola ezitumbula embeera ennungi eri ab'omu maka ge.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tic me gwoko yotkom ki kwo pa dano ipol kare bedo iwi luwi odi. Dano man tye ki tic mapire tek tutwal me keto yub me gwoko yot kom pa gangi gi itic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, ejai apedor naka angaleu keda aijar mama ejaasi lukapolok luka ekale. Iswamai ngin itunganan aswam naepol noi kanu aitegear iponesio luepedorete aitojokar aijar naka ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo rua ala ni azini aa'ta muke ri niri e'de drile aku eyini ri ma dria. Ba 'di ni azi okporu nga e'yo 'yeta angu ama agei 'diyi ma alata otupi familia yini 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, obujunanizibwa bw'okureeberera amagara n'amagara marungi, buriijo nibugwa aha mutwe gw'amaka. Omuntu weena naakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuta omunkora emiringo erikureetaho amagara marungi omu maka ge.

eng_prompt: Health officials have launched a nationwide vaccination campaign to combat the resurgence of preventable diseases. As part of this initiative, the country is preparing for a Measles-Rubella free community.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu batandise kaweefube w'okugema mu ggwanga lyonna okulwanyisa okuddawo kw'endwadde eziziyizibwa. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, eggwanga lyetegekera ekitundu ekitaliimu Mulangira-Kikutiya.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gu cako yub me gwero dano pi gengo two mapat-pat matwero gengo. Macalo but yub man, lobo ne tye ka yubbe me kwanyo two anyo ki Rubella ki I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Ageutu eswamak lu adekis ekato kanu aitikitik adekasinei nu epedorio aitikitik. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, euta akwap aitemonokin aiboisit naemamei adeka naka akwap keda Rubella.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do otita aro soza niri kari 'di ma alea ndulu a'di 'dizu azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi ma omgbo esizu dika ri be. Otita 'di ma azi ru, kari ni otuta 'ye ongulumu azo kajuka ni azini rubella niri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara batandikireho ehururu y'okugyema abantu omu eihanga ryona, okubaasa kurwanisa endwara ezirikubaasa kwetantarwa. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, eihanga n'etebeekanisiza abantu okurekyeraho obusheru na Rubella.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health concerns and rising illness rates, public health officials are emphasizing the importance of preventive measures. To address these issues, the Ministry of Health is outlining various activities aimed at promoting wellness in the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu gyebuvuddeko n'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu essira baliteeka ku bukulu bw'enkola z'okwetangira. Okukola ku nsonga zino, minisitule y'ebyobulamu eteekawo emirimu egy'enjawulo egigendereddwamu okutumbula obulamu obulungi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki mede pa wel dano matye ka nongo two, lutic me yot kom tye ka cuko cwiny dano me tic ki yoo mapat-pat me gengo two. Me tyeko peko magi, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom tye ka kati ki yub mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda aiyatakin na adekasinei, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aitogogong ajokis naka aitikitik adekasinei. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, euta erionget loka angaleu aitolomun aswamisinei nuegelegela nuepedorete aitojokar angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria azini ongmbo azo ni tuzu 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba alatani o'bi eyini 'diyi okpo 'ba e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, okalamvu alataniri ni e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye lezu alata ongulumu eyi ma alea ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara n'okweyongyera kw'oburwaire, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashagika omugasho gw'okukora emiringo y'okuzibira. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, minisiture y'eby'amagara eriyo neekora emirimo etari emwe n'emwe erikugyenderera okushongyera amagara marungi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Health officials and researchers are convening to address the ongoing challenges posed by infectious diseases. Their focus includes strategies for prevention, treatment, and public awareness campaigns.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu n'abanoonyereza batuula okukola ku kusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso okwaleetebwa endwadde ezisiigibwa. Essira balitadde ku ngeri y'okuziyiza, okujjanjaba n'okumanyisa abantu.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom kacel ki lukwed tye kacoke me neno peko ma two ma kobo kare ki kare kelo. Gin ma gitye ka keto cwinygi iye obedo yoo me gengo, cango ki miyo ngec bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Iriamununos eswamak luka angaleu keda angicak kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itolomunitos adekasinei nu ikopas. Imoriaritos kesi iwaitin lu itikitikere, aimuke ka aisisianakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi pie eyi oku e'yo ewaru azo eyi erepi 'diyi ni eji 'diyi ma aza kozu. Asi 'baza yiniri ma alia geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi atrizu, aro esuzu azini imbata fezu o'bi eyidri 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara hamwe n'abakyondoozi bariyo nibateerana kukora ahaburemeezi oburikureetwa endwara ezirikuturira. Ebiteekateeko byabo birimu enkora y'okuzibira, okuragurira hamwe n'okumanyisa abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has made significant strides in improving healthcare services for patients with serious illnesses. This progress includes enhancing the availability of specialized care and essential medications.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda ekoze enkulaakulana mu kutumbula ebyobulamu eri abalwadde abalina endwadde ez'amaanyi. Enkulaakulana eno erimu okutumbula obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo n'eddagala ery'omugaso.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lobo Uganda otimo jami mapol me ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom pi lutwo ma komgi lit. I kin dongo lobo man obedo medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom ki yadi ma mite pi kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eswamau Uganda apol noi kotoma aitojokar amukian naka adekak lu adekasinei nuarokok. Imoriaritos apol naka aiyatakin adumunet naka amukian na itegelikina keda ikee lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri esu zota okporu e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'ba azo onzi be 'diyi dri. E'yo drile suza 'di ma alia ri ma eselea geri 'bani 'ba eyi ma tambazu azini aro orodriru 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda etungire entunguuka y'amaani omu kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara ahabarwaire abaine endwara z'amaani. Entunguuka egi erimu okwongyera obuheereza bw'eby'amagara n'emibazi y'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Access to essential healthcare services is crucial for improving the overall well-being of communities. In particular, underserved populations often face significant barriers to obtaining necessary medical care.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula embeera y'abantu okutwalira awamu. Okusingira ddala abantu abatalina bujjanjabi batera okusanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu kufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak. Tutwalle, dano ma pe ki kony gi ipol kare ginongo peko madit tutwal me nongo kony me yot kom ma mite.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitojokar aijar na itunga. Kacut, itunga lu mam ijanakino ejok etapit adumunun amukian na ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta eri orodriru ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri otuzu. Tutunisi, 'ba azakoma esupi ku 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru eyi be eyini ani atita arojo ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara ni kikuru munonga omu kutunguura entuura y'abantu. Okukira munonga, abantu abatarikuhikwaho obuheereza burungi, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga obujanjabi oburikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing humanitarian challenges, international organizations are increasing their presence in the region. Among them, the United Nations General Assembly is focusing on collaborative efforts to address pressing issues in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'abantu okugenda mu maaso, ebitongole by'ensi yonna byeyongedde okubeerawo mu kitundu. Mu byo, olukiiko lw'amawanga amagatte lussa essira ku kukolera awamu okugonjoola ebizibu eby'amangu mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, dul mapat-pat me lobo mapat-pat tye ka mede ki ticgi I but lobo man. I kingi, dul me United Nations General Assembly tye ka keto cwinygi I kom tic kacel me tyeko peko matye I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, iyatakitos iriongeta luka akwapin ace ajaut kec katutubet. Kanejaas kesi, ejai Atukot Naka Akwapin kere aibwaikin agogongu kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi koUganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eyi ma azi angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otu. Yi ma eselea, amuti United Nations General Assembly niri asi 'ba e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo okporu kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho,ebitongore by'amahanga goona biriyo nibyeyongyera omu kicweka ekyo. Omuri byo, orukiiko rw'amahanga geeteeraine nirugyenderera okukwatanisa kukora aha nshonga z'amaani omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: Rising rates of Non-Communicable Diseases are a growing concern for our communities and health systems. It's essential for each of us to take proactive steps to promote healthier lifestyles and support prevention efforts.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde obusiigibwa okuva ku muntu omu okudda ku mulala bweyongera okweraliikiriza ebitundu byaffe n'ebyobulamu. Kikulu nnyo buli omu ku ffe okubaako ky'akolawo okutumbula obulamu obulungi n'okuwagira kaweefube w'okubutangira.
ach_prompt: Rwom me medde pa two ma pe kobo ikin dano obedo peko madit tutwal I kabedo wa ki yub me yot kom. Pire tek tutwal ni wan weng omyero watim jami weng ma twere me tyelo kor kwo me yot kom ki cwako yub me gengo two.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nu mam ikopas erai aiyalongong naepol noi kanejaas itunga keda nuka angaleu. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanginitunganan aswam kagogongu kanu aitopolor aijar najokan ka aigang nu aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo tupi tupi azo 'bani eyi erepi eyi ma eselea ku 'diyiniri eri asi otiza tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea tualu geri arojo eyini 'diyi pie. Eri orodriru ama alu alu ni e'yo 'yezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi otuzu azini atita fezu e'yo azo atrizu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'endwara ezitarikuturira, nikyerarikiriza abantu baitu hamwe n'ebitongore by'ebyamagara. N'eky'omugasho buri omwe omuriitwe okukora kyona ekirikubaasika okureetaho amagara marungi n'okushagika amaani g'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing disparities in healthcare access, global leaders convened to address the urgent need for a comprehensive health system. After extensive consultations and research, a roadmap to Universal Health Coverage has been developed.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obutali bwenkanya obweyongera mu kufuna obujjanjabi, abakulembeze b'ensi yonna baatuula okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkola y'ebyobulamu ey'awamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ennyo n'okunoonyereza, enteekateeka y'ebyobulamu eri abantu bonna ekoleddwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me apoka-poka matye kamedde I yoo me nongo kony me yot-kom, lutela me wilobo gubedo ka lok I kom miti ma tye pi yub me yot-kom ma dano weng twero nongo. Ingee lok ki kwed mapol, yoo me nongo kony me yot kom pa dano weng dong kiyubu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nueyatakin kotoma adumunun amukian, apotu engarenok luka akwap kere iriamunos aitemokin eipud loka amukian naka itunga kere. Akaulo naka aingisingisio keda aingic naepol, aponi kitolomunai ainapeta nuepedorete ayangaun angaleu naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma esuta ma alea ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba wudrikuru ni 'diyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ma dria. E'yo nzeza angiri azini vuti ondaza ma vutia, 'ba e'do geri 'bani ecozu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu kuheereza abantu obujanjabi, abebembezi b'ensi yoona bakabugana kukora aha kyetengo ky'amaani eky'okukora ahaby'amagara g'abantu boona. Bwanyima y'okwebuuza n'okucondooza munonga, enteekateeka y'okureetaho obuheereza bw'ebyamagara omu bantu boona ekozirwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising health concerns across the country, government officials have been working diligently to develop a comprehensive strategy. As part of this initiative, the nationwide health sensitization program will be launched.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera okwetooloola eggwanga, abakungu ba gavumenti babadde bakola n'obunyiikivu okukola enteekateeka enzijuvu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, enteekateeka y'okumanyisa abantu ku byobulamu mu ggwanga lyonna ejja kutongozebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede I lobo man, lutic pa gamente gubedo ka tic matek me yubu yoo me tic. Macalo but yub man, kibicako yub me rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom ilobo ni lung.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu kotoma akwapuwok, eutasi eswamak luka apugan aswam kagogongu kanu aitolomun ainapeta. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aitegear ainapeta nuka aisisianakin itunga nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu otita azi ngazu dria. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga otita imbata fezu e'yo rua alanisi kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri e'do.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire okwetoroora eihanga, abakozi ba gavumenti batwire nibakora n'amaani okutandikaho enkora nungi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, enteekateeka y'okwegyesa eihanga ryona ahaby'amagara neija kutongozibwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for improved maternal healthcare services, local officials have announced plans for a significant development project. This initiative aims to enhance access to quality care for expectant mothers in underserved areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi bw'abakyala abali embuto, abakungu b'ebyalo balangiridde enteekateeka za pulojekiti y'enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo eri bamaama abali embuto mu bitundu ebitaweebwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi miti me medo rwom me miyo kony me yot kom bot mon ma oyac, lutic me tedero guwaco ni tye yub me dongo lobo. Yub man tye me medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom pi mon ma oyac i kabedo ma pe ki kony ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian naka angor nu epotiete, alimosi eswamak luka atutubet ainapeta nuka apol. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar adumunun amukian naka angor nu epotiete kotoma aiboisio nu mam ijanakino.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu azakoma fele okporovu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi otita eyi otita angu ezoma ni okporu ni eyi 'yezu. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu azakoma fele okporovu eyini ri ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu angu 'bani azakoma fele ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda, abakungu b'ebyaro batongoize enteekateeka y'entunguuka y'amaani. Ekigyendererwa n'okutunguura omutindo gw'eby'amagara g'abakazi abarikuzaara omu myanya etarikuheebwa obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing challenges faced by the agricultural sector, officials have been evaluating various strategies to enhance food security. After extensive consultations with local communities, the decision was made to implement targeted assistance programs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso okusoomoozebwa ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi, abakungu babadde beekenneenya obukodyo obw'enjawulo obw'okwongera ku bungi bw'emmere. Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ennyo ku bantu b'omu kitundu, okusalawo kwakolebwa okussa mu nkola enteekateeka z'obuyambi ezitunuuliddwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko matye I tenge me pur, lutic gubedo ka neno yoo mapat-pat me medo rwom me cam. Ingee lok ki lwak me tedero, kimoko tam me keto yub me miyo kony I tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas erionget loka akor, eutasi eswamak airereonor iponesio luegelegela luka aitojokar inyamat. Akaulo naka aineranara keda itunga luka atutubet, aponi itolomunai aseunet naka aitegear ainapeta nuka aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru esele agrikica niri ni esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi ebi geri ndundu eyini ecozu nyaka esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo nzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie, 'ba 'du e'yo otita azakoma fezu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abakungu batwire nibashwijuma oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'okurya. Bwanyima y'okwebuuza aha bantu b'omubyaro, hakabaho okusharamu kutaho enteekateeka y'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Many people are curious about the historical milestones of African nations. One significant event in Uganda's history is its struggle for independence from colonial rule.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baagala okumanya ebikulu mu byafaayo by'amawanga ga Afirika. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu byafaayo bya Uganda kwe kulwanirira kwefuga okuva mu bufuzi bw'amatwale.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo jami ma otimme I tekwaro pa lobe me Afrika. Gin acel ma pire tek ma otimme I tekwaro pa Uganda obedo lweny me nongo loc ken ki I te loc pa luwang lobo.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi itunga luipu aijen nuikamunitos akiro nukolo nuka akwapin nuko Africa. Idiopebore yenepol noi kotoma akiro nukolo nuko Uganda ngesi ejie ke kanu aipugaikin bon kama ejaasi apuganisinei nuka akolo.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi le saaru e'yo orodriru kari Africa ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu kari Uganda niri ma adi ma alea ri eri a'di 'dizu driwala esuzu engazu opi nyaza ogara'ba eyini risi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibenda kumanya ebyabaireho omu byafaayo by'amahanga ga Afirika. Ekikuru omu byafaayo bya Uganda n'okurwanirira okwetegyeka okuruga omu butegyeki bw'amatware.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing humanitarian crises around the world, it is crucial for nations to extend their support to those in need. Providing refuge to individuals fleeing violence and persecution is not only a moral obligation but also a testament to our shared humanity.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bizibu by'abantu ebigenda mu maaso okwetooloola ensi, kikulu nnyo amawanga okugaziya obuyambi bwago eri abo abali mu bwetaavu. Okuwa obubudamu abantu abadduka obutabanguko n'okuyigganyizibwa si buvunaanyizibwa bwa mpisa bwokka naye era bukakafu bw'obuntu bwaffe obwa wamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim I wilobo lung, pire tek tutwal ni lobo mapat-pat omyero gumi kony bot jo matye I peko. Miyo gwok ki dano ma gitye ka ngwec ki tim gero ki aunauna pe obedo tic maber keken ento bene obedo lanyut ni wan dano acel.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nu elosi akonye kotoma akwap kere, epolok noi akwapin aisiekikin agangat kec mama ejaasi ngul luipudasi. Aijaikin aiboisit na aiboi nejaas itunga lu ekerete amumu keda aiticanio mam erai ibore yenibusakinit aswam bon konye erai ajenanut na itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru kari eyini atita eyini ri fezu 'ba e'yo alea 'diyi dri. Ba angu ta mbazu fezu 'ba e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi isu'baa 'diyi dri ri ovuni lu e'yo adriza ala ma dria ri i ku te eri vini e'yo eceza amani aa'zu 'ba ada eyi ru ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho omunsi yoona, ni kikuru amahanga kuheereza obuhwezi bwago abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi. Okuheereza obuhungiro abantu abarikuhunga obwimukiriro n'okuhiiganisibwa, tikirikworeka butunu ngu turi abantu buntu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a surge in reports of counterfeit documents circulating throughout the country. As a result, many individuals in Uganda are resorting to creating their own national identity cards.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongerayongera mu alipoota z'ebiwandiiko ebijingirire mu ggwanga lyonna. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi mu Uganda basazeewo okwekolera endagamuntu zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, wel waraga ma pe obedo ada omede tutwal I lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol I lobo Uganda gitye ka yele me yubu lanyut mamegi nyo ID.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apolor iripotan luka apapula nuka aisab kotoma akwap. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu luko Uganda aitolomun akaadin kec nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia, o'duko e'yo kokobi inzoru 'diyini acizu kari ma alia 'diyi ma ongmbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'do eyi ma kokobi kari ni 'diyi ede eyi ma ngulupi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'ebihandiiko ebitahikire omu ihanga ryona. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi omu Uganda nibatandika kwetungira endanga muntu zaabo.

eng_prompt: Proper maintenance and regular inspections are essential to ensure that a septic system functions safely and efficiently. When installed correctly, a well-built septic tank can effectively manage waste without posing any risks to the environment or public health.
lug_prompt: Okuddaabiriza obulungi n'okukebera buli kaseera bikulu okulaba ng'amazzi amakyafu gakola bulungi. Ttanka y'amazzi amakyafu bw'eteekebwa bulungi, esobola okukwasaganya obulungi kasasiro awatali kuteeka mu bulabe obutonde bw'ensi oba obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Gedo maber ki ngiyo piny kare ki kare obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni pii ma aa ki icing dano tiyo maber dok maber. Ka ki keto maber, tank ma kiyubu maber twero tic maber tutwal ki yugi labongo kelo peko mo keken I kom cwec ma orumuwa onyo yotkom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin ejok keda aanyanar duc ejok kanu awanyun ebe iswamai epone loka aitosom akipi nuka ekwam ejok. Arai ipikakin ejok, epedori etogo loedukitai ejok aitikitik agasia komam eyangauni atiokisio mama ejaasi akwap keda angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Afa omvele septic system ruri ma tambaza kililiru azini andrita sawa driasi ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini eri azi nga kililiru azini kililiru. Ba ka angu 'da si kililiru, angu 'bani si kililiru 'diyi eco okurunya ma aza ko kililiru e'yo onzi 'yepi angu ama agei ri ma dria ri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeberera kurungi n'okukyebera buri kaire n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu enkora y'amaizi g'omunda neekora kurungi. Tanka y'amaizi erikwombekwa kurungi ku erikwombekwa kurungi, neebaasa kukora kurungi aha kasasiro hatariho kabi aha buhangwa bw'ensi nainga amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a growing sense of insecurity among residents in the countryside. Many are expressing concerns about their safety as crime rates continue to escalate.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga obutali butebenkevu obweyongera mu batuuze b'omu byalo. Bangi balaze obweraliikirivu olw'obukuumi bwabwe ng'obumenyi bw'amateeka bweyongera okulinnya.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni lworo tye kamede ikin lwak me caro. Dano mapol tye ki lworo i kom ber bedo gi pien rwom me timo bal tye ka medde.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos pac itodunitos amamus na ayuara kanejaas itunga luko ocaloi. Itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongo kanu ayuwara kec naarai iyata abilibilio naka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba aa'pi angu calu ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ageitema ako ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba karakara eyi asi otiza e'da ageitema eyini ma dria e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo ni tutu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka obunkenke obweyongyeire omu bantu b'omubyaro. Abantu baingi niberarikirira eby'okwerinda kwabo ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In many jurisdictions, laws dictate how a deceased person's estate is divided among heirs. In the case of a spouse's death, the surviving partner often has a legal claim to a significant portion of the estate.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, amateeka galagira engeri eby'obugagga by'omugenzi gye bigabanyizibwamu mu basika. Mu mbeera y'okufa kw'omufumbo, omufumbo asigaddewo atera okuba n'obwetaavu mu mateeka ku kitundu ekinene ku by'obugagga.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, cik nyutu kit ma jami pa ngat ma otoo ki poko kwede bot lunyodone. Ka lacoo oneko dakone onyo dakone, dako matye makwo pol kare bedo ki twero me nongo but jami pa cware onyo dakone mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, itodunitos ikisila epone loebeitor itunganan yenatwan aimor iborokec. Kowai lo atwanare naka ekiliokit keda aberu, ejaasi itunganan yenejarit keda apedor naka aijaun ikapun luipu noi.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, azita eyi geri 'bani agu drapi 'da ma lonyi awazu 'ba erivile 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo 'ba alu ni drazu ri ma alea, agu idripi idripi ri ma e'yo azita palaa ri afa lonyi 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ri ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu matware maingi, ebiragiro nibiragiira oku eby'obugaiga by'omugyenzi birikugabanyizibwamu. Omushaija n'omukazi ku barikufa, omushaija n'omukazi abaraabe bakiriho, buriijo nibaba baine obugabe bw'okutunga ekicweka kihango ky'ebyobugaiga.

eng_prompt: Exile has been a common fate throughout history, often imposed on individuals for political or social reasons. In some cases, people choose to leave their homeland in search of safety or a better life.
lug_prompt: Okuwang'angulwa kibadde kya bulijjo mu byafaayo byonna, ebiseera ebisinga kikakasibwa ku bantu olw'ensonga z'ebyobufuzi oba ez'embeera z'abantu. Ebiseera ebimu abantu basalawo okuva mu nsi zaabwe okunoonya obukuumi oba obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Loro lobo obedo gin ma dano mapol timo I kare macon, pol kare ki keto I kom dano pi tyen lok me cungu iwi bye onyo kwo pa lwak. I kare mukene, dano yero me weko lobogi me cito ka yenyo kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Aibwot erai ibore yenetapit noi kotoma akiro nukakolo, etapit duc aipikakin itunga kanuka akiro nuka epolitikis keda nuka itunga. Kapakio ace, eseunete itunga anyoun kotoma akwapukec kanu aimo ayuwara keda aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ofuzu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri ebi adri e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu kari amve 'diyi ma alea ri sa'wa driasi, e'yo politiki ni azini e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyisi. Sa'wa azi 'diyisi, 'ba eyi pe kari eyini aku 'diyi kuzu muzu angu muke ndeni 'diyi ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Okuruga omu buzaahe kitwire kiri eky'omutaano omu byafaayo byona, buriijo nikigyemeserezibwa abantu ahabw'eshonga z'eby'obutegyeki nainga ez'embeera z'abantu. Obumwe abantu nibasharamu kuruga omu mahanga gaabo kuronda oburinzi n'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Investing in local industries is essential for economic growth. By focusing on manufacturing, we can significantly reduce unemployment rates in the country.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu makolero g'omu kitundu kya mugaso nnyo mu kukulaakulanya eby'enfuna. Bwe tussa essira ku by'amakolero, tusobola okukendeeza ennyo ebbula ly'emirimu mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I biacara me tedero pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo. Ka waketo cwiny I kom yubu jami, ci watwero dwoko piny rwom me bedo peke pa tic I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma acuman nu okwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka ikapun. Kowai lo apodokinit aitolom iboro, ipedori oni aitidisiar amamus na aswamisinei kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza okalamvu ogogo 'diyi ma alia ri eri orodriru zota e'yo robianiri ni. Asi 'bazu e'yo afa edezu 'diyi ma dria, ama eco azi ako ma omgbo kari ma alia ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu makorero g'omwihanga n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya. Okuta amaani omu by'amakorero, nitubaasa kukyendeeza munonga eibura ry'emirimo omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the spread of misinformation has become a significant concern for society. As a result, authorities are increasingly focused on regulating the information landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okusaasaana kw'amawulire amakyamu kufuuse kizibu kya maanyi eri abantu. N'ekivuddemu, ab'obuyinza beeyongedde okussa essira ku kulungamya embeera y'amawulire.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, nyayo lok goba odoko peko madit tutwal I kin lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela tye ka keto cwiny gi tutwalle I kom doro lok angeya.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, awea na akiro nuka aisab erai ibore yenepol noi lo epodokinit itunga. Kanuka ngun, isingarenitos apedorosio aitikitik akiro.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, o'duko enzoru 'diyi ma ereta eca asi otiza angiri ni ru o'bi yi dri. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba eyi asi 'ba e'yo o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okujanjaara kw'amakuru agatahikire, kihindukire eky'okwerarikirira munonga omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi beeyongyeire kuta amaani omu kureeberera eby'amakuru.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the dignity and freedom of individuals is essential for a just society. By upholding these principles, we can foster a more equitable and harmonious world.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma ekitiibwa n'eddembe ly'abantu kinene nnyo mu kitundu ekirimu obwenkanya. Bwe tunywerera ku misingi gino, tusobola okuleetawo ensi ey'obwenkanya era ey'obumu.
ach_prompt: Gwoko woro ki bedo agonya pa dano obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo ma dano tye iye. Ka walubu cik magi, watwero kelo lobo ma opore dok tye ki winye.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong aibuses keda ailajara naka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aiboisit naejok. Kowai lo aitogogong ikisila lu, ipedori oni aitopolor akwap na ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo inzita fezu azini driwala fezu 'ba yi dri ri eri orodriru ongulumu kililiru ni ni. E'yo 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama eco wudrikuru e'yo adaru azini aa'ta tualuri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu baine ekitiinisa n'obugabe, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburinganiza omu bantu. Twahamira aha misingye egi, nitubaasa kureetaho ensi erimu oburinganiza n'obutereera.

eng_prompt: Car accidents can happen in the blink of an eye, often leaving little time for drivers to react. The high speeds and chaotic nature of highways increase the risks involved in such incidents.
lug_prompt: Obubenje bw'emmotoka busobola okubaawo mu kaseera katono, ebiseera ebisinga buleka obudde butono eri abavuzi b'emmotoka okukola. Okuvuga endiima n'obutabanguko ku nguudo ennene byongera ku bulabe obuli mu bubenje obw'engeri eno.
ach_prompt: Can me gudu twero timme oyot-oyot tutwal ma weko kare ki ludwo mutoka bedo nok tutwal me timo gin mo. Ngwec ki cipid madit kacel ki kuku kuku I gudu madongo medo gum me nongo peko me gudu.
teo_prompt: Epedorete akangasia nuka amotokan atakanun katipet, ijalakini duc iderepan apak naedit. Esipidi loepol noi keda amumu na orotin luapolok iyatakini ationis na akangasia kwangun.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi mutukari eyini 'diyi eco i 'ye mbeleru, sa'wa driasi 'ba mutukari onzupi 'diyini sa'wa kuzu e'yo 'yezu were. Ongu nzuza okposiri azini e'yo ngiringiri ni nzila dria 'diyi ma alia 'diyi e'yo drileonzi 'dile 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Butandu z'ebiiruka nizibaasa kubaho omu bwire butari bwa hare, ekirikureka obwire bukye bw'abavugi kukora. Okwiruka munonga hamwe n'obutabanguko aha nguuto nibyongyera akabi akari omu butandu nk'ezo.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved the budget for upgrading our infrastructure. As a result, we are investing in advanced equipment to enhance our road construction processes.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kayisizza embalirira y'okutumbula ebizimbe byaffe. N'ekivuddemu, tussa ssente mu bikozesebwa eby'omulembe okutumbula enkola zaffe ez'okuzimba enguudo.
ach_prompt: Kancil me boma madit omoko byek me lim me ilo malo rwom me jami ma konyo lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ka keto cente I yub me yubu jami ma rwom gi malo me medo rwom me yubu gudi.
teo_prompt: Abu ekansulo loka eibuga itigogong ebajet kanu aisiteteun aiboisio wok. Kanuka ngun, iuta sio aipikakin ikapun toma acuman nuegelegela kanu aitojokar epone loka aiduk irotin.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri ai bajeti afa amavile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, ama lonyi vuti aleza 'ba afa ayuzaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria geri amani nzila eyi sizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize embaririra y'okutunguura ebyombeko byaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, turiyo nituta esente omu kukora ebyoma by'omurembe kwenda kwongyera amaani omu kukora enguuto.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about budget allocations, concerns have been raised regarding the funding needs of various sectors. As a result, members of parliament are always requesting for money.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakakolebwa ku mbalirira, okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku byetaago by'ensimbi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ababaka ba paalamenti bulijjo basaba ssente.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom byek me lim, lworo obedo tye I kom lim ma mite pi tenge mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lumemba me parliament ipol kare gi lego cente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos ebajet, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanu ikapun lu ekotos iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc imeeban luka airabet ailip ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alia otita ajeni 'diyi ma dria, 'ba e'bi asi otiza eji e'yo robia lezu esele ndu ndu yi driri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, memba koloseni ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi robia ai.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi, ebikwatiraine n'embaririra y'eihanga, hariho okwerarikirira ahabyetaago by'esente omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abakiiki omwishengyero buriijo nibashaba esente.

eng_prompt: The debate on the proposed legislation has sparked intense discussions among the lawmakers. As the session progresses, the fate of the motion hangs in the balance.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiteeso ky'etteeka kuleetedde okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu babaka ba palamenti. Olutuula bwe lugenda mu maaso, enkomerero y'ekiteeso yeesigamye ku bbendera.
ach_prompt: Laro lok I kom cik ma kimito kelo laro lok I kin luwang lwak I ot moko cik. I kare ma kacoke tye ka mede anyim, ngo ma obitimme I kom lok eni pud tye I peko.
teo_prompt: Abu epeget loikamunit ekisil ngol koyangau epeget loepol noi kama ejaasi imeeban luka airabet. Kwape elosi airiamunet ngin, mam epone loebeitor aitodolikin aomisioit ngin epedori aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara e'yo 'bani lezu azita 'da ma dria ri fe agbatara okporu 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo erizuri ni muzu drile, e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'di ma dria ri nga ovu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura aha mateeka agateirweho, kireesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu bany'eishengyero. Obu orukiiko rwabaire nirugyenda omu maisho, ebiro by'omumaisho by'ekiteiso kikaba kitarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs of the community, local officials have been discussing plans for new infrastructure. One proposal that has gained traction is the development of a multi-purpose facility.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde bateesa ku nteekateeka z'ebizimbe ebipya. Ekiteeso ekimu ekifunye amaanyi kwe kukulaakulanya ekifo eky'emirimu egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak i kom kony me yot kom, lutic me tedero gubedo ka nywako lok i kom yub me gedo manyen. Yub acel ma oywek tutwal obedo yubu ot yat ma tiyo tic mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo aiyatakin lo amukian naka itunga, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aitemitem nu aitemonokin iboro luitetiak. Adiopet aomisioit naepol noi ngesi aitolomun aiboisit na itwasamaere iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi agbatara gba otita afa ndundu eyi sizu o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Egata azi alu 'ba eyini esu saaru ri eri angu 'bani ecozu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara ebyeyongyeire omu bantu, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibagamba aha nteekateeka y'okwombeka ebyombeko ebisya. Ekiteeso kimwe ekiretsireho amaani n'okutandikaho eirwariro ry'emirimo mingi.

eng_prompt: The recent reforms in the judicial system have emphasized the importance of equality and accountability. As a result, citizens are increasingly aware of their rights and the legal framework that governs them.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa mu kitongole ekiramuzi gye buvuddeko zikakasizza obukulu bw'obwenkanya n'obuvunaanyizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi beeyongera okumanya ku ddembe lyabwe n'enkola y'amateeka ebalifuga.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki I tenge me ngolo kop oketo cwiny I kom ber pa bedo ki twero marom. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali tye ka mede ki ngeyo twero gi ki cik ma doro gi.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nueyapiete pac kotoma orionget loka ikatubok itogogongitos ajokis naka eirianu keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ejenete itunga apedorosio kec keda ikisila lu eyaitere kes.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru okalamvu e'yo lizani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'ba asi orodri trotroru azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi eyi ma nita drilemgbo eyini 'diyi ma dria azini geri azita eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka ezibaireho omu kitongore ekirikujunanwa, zikooreka obukuru bw'oburinganiza n'embaririra. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye beeyongyeire kumanya obugabe bwabo hamwe n'ebiragiro ebirikubategyeka.

eng_prompt: Many families dream of having a backyard oasis, complete with a sparkling swimming pool. However, the reality of pool ownership comes with significant risks that should not be overlooked.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galoota okubeera n'oluggya lw'awaka oluliko ekidiba ekiwugirwamu. Newankubadde, obutuufu bw'obwannannyini bw'ekidiba bujja n'obulabe obw'amaanyi obutalina kubuusibwa maaso.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ki lek me bedo ki gang ma tye ki pii me kwang maleng. Kadi bed kumeno, lok ada me bedo wegge pool bino ki peko madongo ma pe omyero kica omak I komgi.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi ikalia luipu ajaut keda atutubet nakokalia keda aiboisit naiduwere. Konye, abeit naka ajaut keda aiboisit naidarere itiang elomunit keda atiokisio nuepolok nu mam ibusakinit apalunit.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi orobi eyi ma aku dria aku dria 'diyi ma alea angu yi sazu ndrizaru 'diyi pie. Kani si, e'yo a'da angu yi alizu 'diyi ma e'iru ri ni emu e'yo onzi okporu 'bani ecozu adizu ku 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigaroota ngu gabe n'omwanya gw'okwibira. Kwonka, amazima g'okuba mukama w'ekidiba nikiija n'oburemeezi bw'amaani obutashemereire kwehuzya.

eng_prompt: The legal proceedings have been ongoing for several months now. Both parties are awaiting a final decision from the judge.
lug_prompt: Emisango gibadde gigenda mu maaso okumala emyezi egiwerako. Enjuyi zombi zirindiridde ensala esembayo okuva eri omulamuzi.
ach_prompt: Pido ne obedo kawot anyim pi dwe mapol dong. Dul aryo weng gitye kakuru tam pa langol kop.
teo_prompt: Inyikokinitos imusagon ngun kwana adaun ilapio luipu. Eutasi ipatei kere aidar aseunet nakawasia kama ejai atubon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dwani ni 'diyi ebi mu drile ca mba karakara 'bo. Kalati iri 'diyi te e'yo asizuri 'duzu engazu 'ba e'yo lipiri vu.
nyn_prompt: Omushango gutwire nigugyenda omu maisho kumara ameezi maingi. Enjuyi zoona ziriyo nizirinda encwamu y'ahamuheru kuruga aha muramuzi.

eng_prompt: In light of declining revenue from traditional sources, officials are exploring alternative funding strategies. Recent economic shifts have prompted a reevaluation of the current tax system.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kukendeera kw'omusolo okuva mu nsibuko ez'edda, abakungu banoonyereza ku ngeri endala ez'okusonda ssente. Enkyukakyuka mu by'enfuna gye buvuddeko ziviiriddeko okuddamu okwekenneenya enkola y'emisolo eriwo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dwogo piny pa lim ma aa ki bot dul macon, lutic tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me nongo lim. Alokaloka ma otimme I tenge me lim I kare ma okato cokcok-ki okelo alokaloka I yub me mucoro matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitidisiar ikapun lu itwasamao kotoma aiboisio nukolo, eutasi eswamak aingic iponesio ice luka aigang ikapun. Aijulanakineta nuka ikapun lu atuboros eyangautu airereonor bobo esolo.
lgg_prompt: Robia esuza engazu angu oku 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi onda. Ojata e'yo robia ni ma alia o'diru 'diyi fe 'bani geri musoro ofezu curu'do 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeera kw'esente kuruga omu burugo obwa ira, abakungu bariyo nibasherura oburyo obundi bw'okutunga sente. Empindahinduka y'eby'entaasya eherize kubaho, ereesireho okugaruka kushwijuma enkora y'emishoro eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: In today's world, safety concerns for children have become increasingly prominent. Experts emphasize the importance of teaching kids about personal safety and awareness.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, okufaayo ku bukuumi bw'abaana kweyongedde nnyo. Abakugu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okusomesa abaana ku by'okwerinda n'okumanyisa.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, lworo me gwoko lutino tye kamedde tutwal. Ludiro giwaco ni pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lutino i kom gwoko kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, epol noi aiyalongong naka ayuwara naka idwe. Apotu ipirioitin isinyikokisi ajokis na aisisianakin idwe nuka ayuwara ka aijen.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, asi otiza e'yo ageitema ni anzi nyiri eyini 'diyi ma dria ri eca curu'do okporu. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi 'ba okpo orodri anzi nyiri eyini imbata fezu e'yo eyi ma tambazu eyi ma ngulupi si azini imbata fezu eyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, okwerarikirira eby'okwerinda kw'abaana kweyongyeire. Abakugu nibaha amaani omugasho gw'okwegyesa abaana eby'okwerinda n'okumanyisa abantu.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have surfaced regarding disputes over property ownership in the countryside. Tensions have escalated as various factions claim rights to the land.
lug_prompt: Amawulire agafulumye gyebuvuddeko gakwata ku butakkaanya ku bwannannyini bw'ettaka mu byalo. Obunkenke bweyongedde ng'ebiwayi eby'enjawulo byewozaako ku ttaka.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma okato cokcok-ki okatti I kom laro lok I kom rwom me ngom I caro. Lworo omede pien dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat tye ka waco ni gitye ki twero i kom ngom ne.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai iripotan luitetiak nuikamunitos ingungeta luka itunga luejaasi keda alupok kocaloi. Apolor atiokisio kwape igurupun luegelegela ekotosi apedorosio nuka alupok.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi efu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo nyaku ma eipika eyini aa'zu angu caloru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra amuti ndundu eyini e'yo 'yozu kini eyi ma drilemgbo angu 'da ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Hariho ripoota ezirikukwata aha ntongane z'obwannannyini bw'eitaka omu byaro. Obunkenke bweyongyeire ahabw'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana kwehaho obugabe ahaitaka.

eng_prompt: Despite having a comprehensive legal framework, many citizens feel that justice is often elusive. This disconnect between legislation and enforcement raises concerns about the effectiveness of governance in the country.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga balina enkola y'amateeka enzijuvu, bannansi bangi bawulira nti obwenkanya tebutera kubaawo. Okwawukana kuno wakati w'amateeka n'okukwasisa amateeka kuleetawo okweraliikirira ku buwanguzi bw'enfuga mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cik tye maber tutwal, anywali mapol tamo ni ngolo kop atir ipol kare bedo tek tutwal. Apoka-poka man ikin cik ki keto itic cik kelo lworo I kom tela maber I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda ainapeta nuka ikisila, eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam etapit itunga adumun etube loajokan. Amamus na aiswamanara kiding ikisila keda aitup ikisila eyangauni aiyalongong kanuikamunitos apugan naejok kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni 'diyi ma ta tro ovuzu dria ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi ega kini e'yo liza kililiru ri eri ewaru. E'yo esele coza azita eyi ma eselea azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma eselea ri ni asi otiza eji e'yo driceza kililiru kari 'di ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho engyenderwaho y'ebiragiro, abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu oburingaaniza buriijo tiburikureebeka. Okuremwa kukwatanisa ahagati y'ebiragiro n'okureetaho oburemeezi, nikireetaho okwerarikirira ahabw'oburungi bw'obwebembezi omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Staying informed about current events is essential for understanding the world around us. One of the best ways to achieve this is by engaging with reliable news sources regularly.
lug_prompt: Okubeera ng'omanyi ebigenda mu maaso kikulu nnyo mu kutegeera ensi etwetoolodde. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukolagana n'ensibuko z'amawulire ezesigika buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki ngec I kom jami matye katimme kombedi pire tek tutwal me niang I kom lobo ma orumuwa. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man en aye me lok ki lucoo lok angea ma gene kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda acoa naikamunit akiro nuiswamasi kwape kwana erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amisikin akwap naejok. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aiswamanar keda aiboisio nuka iyemuto nuka abeit duc.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu o'dukoti be e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru wudrikuru ama ageia 'diyi vazu. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri e'yo nzezu geri 'bani ecozu asi'bazu e'yo efu'ba 'diyi pie ri si.
nyn_prompt: Okumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho n'eky'omugasho omu kwetegyereza ensi etwetorwaire. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo oburungi gw'okukora eki n'okukoragana n'amahurire agarikwesigwa buri kaire.

eng_prompt: As countries implemented strict travel restrictions to curb the spread of the virus, many found themselves stranded far from home. This left countless Ugandans in a difficult position, unable to return to their families and communities.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi ziteekawo obukwakkulizo obw'amaanyi ku ntambula okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka, bangi beesanga nga basibidde wala nnyo okuva ewaabwe. Kino kyaleka Bannayuganda bangi nnyo mu mbeera enzibu, nga tebasobola kudda mu maka gaabwe ne mu bitundu gye babeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo mapat-pat oketo kigeng matek tutwal I kom wot me gengo nya pa two corona, dano mapol onongo gitye kama bor ki gangigi. Man oweko anywali me Uganda mapol tutwal I peko matek tutwal, ma pe gitwero dok I gangigi ki kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Neautar akwapin aitegear ikisila luitikitikete alosit kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu ebe elukunitos koreriakec. Abu ngin kojalak itunga luipu luko Uganda kotoma ojautene loetiono, mam apedorete abongor mama ejaasi ikalia kec keda atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Kari yini e'dozu azita acita ma dria okporu 'diyi ma vuti obizu azo 'da ma ereta atrizu, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi si aku eyivile 'diyi vurisi re. E'yo 'di ku 'ba Ugandani karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea eyini ani egozu familia eyivile 'diyi vu azini ongulumu eyivile 'diyi vu ku.
nyn_prompt: Obu amahanga gaataireho ebiragiro by'amaani aha by'engyenda okubaasa kuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka korona, baingi bakashangwa bari hare n'amaka gaabo. Eki kikasiga abanya Uganda baingi omu mbeera egumire, batarikubaasa kugaruka omu maka gaabo n'omu byaro byabo.

eng_prompt: In today's society, many women are reevaluating their relationships and seeking fulfillment beyond traditional roles. This shift has led to a growing trend where some married women are drawn to the allure of wealth and luxury.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, abakyala bangi baddamu okwetegereza enkolagana yaabwe n'okunoonya okumatizibwa okusukka emirimu egy'ennono. Enkyukakyuka eno ereeseewo omuze ogweyongera ng'abakazi abafumbo abamu basikirizibwa obugagga n'okwejalabya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwo me kareni, mon mapol tye ka ngiyo kit ma gibedo kwede ki luwotgi dok gitye ka yenyo yomcwiny ma kato tic macon. Alokaloka man oweko mon mukene ma gunyome gimaro lonyo ki jami me rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, eutasi angor nuipu airereor eidicanekec kosodete aimo aitodolikinio adepar aswamisinei nuka einono. Eyangaunit aijulanakineta ngun eipone lo iyata noi lo angor nu edukokina lu ekotosi abar keda iboro luibusiak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, oku karakara eyi e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ale andri dika eyi afa eyini lele 'diyi nda aga azi eyivile 'diyi ra. Ojata 'diri fe e'yo azi tupi tupi oku 'bani 'dule 'diyi ma azi eyini asi 'bazu lonyi ma dria tualu afa ajekokoru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, abakazi baingi bariyo nibagaruka bashwijume enkoragana yaabo kandi basherure okushemererwa okurikukira emirimo y'obuhangwa. Empindahinduka egi ereesireho omuringo oguriyo nigweyongyera ogu abakazi abashweirwe barikushendashendwa eby'obugaiga n'eby'oburungi.

eng_prompt: Human trafficking remains a pervasive issue worldwide, with vulnerable populations often targeted for exploitation. In particular, reports indicate that many girls are subjected to illegal transportation to Arab nations.
lug_prompt: Okukukusa abantu kukyali kizibu mu nsi yonna, n'abantu abateesobola bakozesebwa. Okusingira ddala, alipoota ziraga nti abawala bangi batwalibwa mu ngeri emenya amateeka mu mawanga g'Abawalabu.
ach_prompt: Kwalo dano obedo peko madit tutwal I wilobo lung, dano ma goro ipol kare ki nywaro tic kwedgi. Ki lok ada, ripot nyutu ni anyira mapol ki cwalo gi ilobo Arab labongo twero.
teo_prompt: Akoko na itunga eringa erai ationis naepol noi kotoma akwap kere, ido itunga lumam epedoritos aitwasam ejok. Kacut, itodunitos iripotan ebe apesur nuipu eyanganario toma akwapin nuka imusugun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba ada eyi oguzu ri nga po'di e'yo azi wudrikuru ma alea ndulu ni i, 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi 'ba e'yo 'bani eyi ayuzu 'diyi. E'yo dria si, o'duko ece kini 'ba ezoanzi karakara yi oji kari Arabini 'diyi ma alia azita kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okubuzaho abantu n'oburemeezi bw'amaani omu nsi yoona, abantu abatarikwebaasa nibakira kutwarwa kubi. Okukira munonga, ripoota nizooreka ngu abaishiki baingi nibatwarwa omu mahanga g'abaharabu.

eng_prompt: The challenges faced by those in the military often shape their experiences in ways that civilians may not fully understand. From rigorous training to the demands of deployment, the soldier's journey is marked by unique sacrifices and responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Ebisoomooza abo abali mu magye bye basanga bitera okukyusa bye bayitamu mu ngeri abantu ba bulijjo gye batayinza kutegeera mu bujjuvu. Okuva ku kutendekebwa okw'amaanyi okutuuka ku byetaago by'okusindikibwa, olugendo lw'omujaasi lujjudde okwefiiriza n'obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Peko ma lumony nongo ipol kare loko kwogi I yoo ma dano ata-ni pe twero niang maber. Nicake ki pwonye matek tutwal naka wa I jami ma mite I kare me cwalo lumony I tic, wot pa lamony tye ki jami mapol ma omyero otim.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuetereikina keda ngul luejaasi toma ajore etapit aijulakin akirokec koponesio lumam itunga luka apugan epedorete amisikin. Anyoun kotoma aituutoorio naepol noi kitoni ationis na aijukario, alosit naka isirikaalei ejaasi keda aswamisinei nuitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru asikari eyini esu 'diyi e'yo eyini esu 'diyi oja sa'wa driasi geri 'ba asikari ru ku 'diyini ecozu vazu kililiru ku 'diyisi. E'dozu imbata okporu si kpere e'yo 'bani asikari eyi ma ti pezu 'diyi ma alea, asikari eyi ma acita eyi e'da e'yo eyini eyi owizu 'diyi si tualu azi eyini 'ye 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi obu abo abari omu mahe barikutunga, buriijo nibuhindura ebibarikurabamu omu muringo ogu abantu ba buriijo batarikubasa kwetegyereza. Kuruga aha kutendekwa kw'amaani kuhisya aha byetengo by'okutwarwa omu mahe, orugyendo rw'omuserukare nirujunanizibwa aha kwefeerereza n'obujunaanizibwa bwe.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the government has prioritized enhancing public safety and reducing crime rates. As part of this initiative, they have implemented advanced surveillance technology throughout urban areas.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti ekulembezza okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu n'okukendeeza ku buzzi bw'emisango. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, batadde tekinologiya ow'omulembe ow'okulondoola mu bibuga byonna.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom gwoko ber bedo pa lwak ki dwoko piny rwom me timo bal. Macalo but yub man, guketo diro me bedo ki wang mabit tutwal I kabedo me boma mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, abu apugan isingarenit aitojokar ayuwara naka itunga keda aitidisiar abilibilio naka ikisila. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu kesi ibwaikisi acoa naepol noi naka aingic aiboisio nuka itaunin.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, gamete 'ba asi e'yo ageitema o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo onzi ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, eyi e'do e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi onezu 'diyi ayu angu tawuni eyini 'diyi ma alea dria.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed alarming practices within the healthcare system. Whistleblowers have come forward with shocking claims about unethical activities occurring in government hospitals.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga ebikolwa eby'entiisa mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu. Abawa amawulire bavuddeyo n'ebigambibwa ebiwuniikiriza ku bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa ebigenda mu maaso mu malwaliro ga gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim maraco tutwal I tenge me yot kom. Lumii ngec i kom tim maraco mapat-pat matye katimme I odi yadi pa gamente okatti ki lok ma kelo lworo madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit aswamisio nuarokok noi nuka angaleu. Apotu lu alimonorete akiro nuikamunitos aswamisio nuarokok nuiswamasi kadekisia nuka apugan.

eng_prompt: When hiking in mountainous areas, it's important to be aware of the potential dangers that can arise. One of the most critical safety tips is to avoid precarious locations.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olinnya ensozi mu bitundu by'ensozi, kikulu okumanya akabi akayinza okuvaamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okwerinda kwe kwewala ebifo eby'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka ngwec I kabedo ma got tye iye, pire tek tutwal me ngeyo peko ma twero bino. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko kwo en aye me gwokke ki kabedo ma peko tye iye.
teo_prompt: Auta jo alosit aiboisio nu imoru, ibusakinit jo aijen atiokisio nu epedorete alomun. Adiopet kotoma akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos ayuwara ngesi ainac aiboisio nuetioko.

eng_prompt: Historically, various nations have formed alliances based on shared interests and values. One such example is the diplomatic ties that have developed between Uganda and Israel over the years.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support democratic processes and ensure fair competition, funding for political parties has become a significant aspect of the electoral system. This financial assistance aims to level the playing field and promote diverse political representation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira enkola za demokulasiya n'okukakasa okuvuganya okw'obwenkanya, okuvujjirira ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi kifuuse ekintu ekikulu mu nkola y'ebyokulonda. Obuyambi buno obw'ensimbi bugendererwamu okuteekawo omwenkanonkano n'okutumbula abakiise mu byobufuzi eby'enjawulo.

Obuhwezi obu obw'esente, nibugyenderera okureetaho oburingaaniza n'okureetaho oburingaaniza omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: The ongoing disputes over land ownership have created significant tension between various stakeholders. As a result, the government has been struggling to find a resolution to these complex issues.
lug_prompt: Enkaayana ezigenda mu maaso ku bwannannyini ku ttaka zireeseewo okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi wakati w'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti ebadde erwana okufuna eky'okugonjoola ensonga zino enzibu.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges and criticisms it faces, I believe that justice can prevail in our legal institutions. Many people may have lost hope, but I choose to remain optimistic about the rule of law in Uganda.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tye peko ki koko mapol, atye ki niyee ni ngolo kop atir twero bedo tye I dul ma doro lok kom cik. Dano mapol twero bedo ni gurwenyo gen, ento an ayero me bedo ki gen I kom tela pa cik I lobo Uganda.

eng_prompt: In a legal system that values justice and fairness, individuals should not be held without cause. Therefore, if you are innocent, the police are obligated to release you.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka etwala obwenkanya n'obwenkanya nga bikulu, abantu tebalina kukwatibwa awatali nsonga. N'olwekyo, bw'oba tolina musango, poliisi erina okukusumulula.

eng_prompt: In response to growing public discontent with the current government, a group of activists and former politicians have come together to launch a fresh political movement. Their aim is to represent the voices of the youth and marginalized communities in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obutali bumativu bw'abantu obweyongera ku gavumenti eriwo, ekibinja ky'abalwanirizi b'eddembe n'abaali bannabyabufuzi bakwataganye okutandikawo ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekipya. lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku gamete curu'dorisi ri ma e'yosi, ongulumu 'ba a'di 'dipi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi pie tualu 'ba andra politiki ni 'diyi pie tualu amuti politiki ni o'diru ni e'dozu. eng_prompt: Today marks a significant milestone in our journey together. It's a moment to reflect on our achievements and the hard work that brought us here.

lgg_prompt: Andru e'yo azi okporu ama vile aci tualuri ma alia ni'i. Eri sa'wa 'bani egazu e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini azi okporu amani ejipi 'dia 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in cases, government officials have decided to take drastic measures. As a result, borders are going to be closed.

eng_prompt: In any relationship, it's natural for differing opinions to arise. However, with open communication and a willingness to understand each other, solutions can be found.
lug_prompt: Mu mukwano gwonna, kya butonde okuba n'endowooza ez'enjawulo. Naye bwe wabaawo empuliziganya ennungi era nga buli omu mwetegefu okutegeera munne, ensonga zisobola okugonjoolwa.

lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea, eri e'yo adani egata ndundu eyini efuzu. Kani si, e'yo nzeza ngmboru azini avasi 'ba yi ma eselea vazu, 'ba eco e'yo nde ma aza ko ra.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a troubling rise in violence and lawlessness in our communities. Many young people, feeling disenfranchised and desperate, are turning to crime as a means of survival and power.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu bikolwa eby'obukambwe n'obumenyi bw'amateeka mu bitundu byaffe. Abavubuka bangi, nga bawulira nga tebakyalina ddembe era nga baweddemu essuubi, baddukira mu bumenyi bw'amateeka ng'engeri y'okubeerawo n'okufuna obuyinza.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, tim gero ki turo cik omede tutwal I kabedo wa. Bulu mapol, ma gitye ka winyo ni pe gitye ki twero ki gen, gitye ka cako timo bal macalo yoo me kwo ki bedo ki twero.

lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea ra. Ba ode karakara eyi, eyini aa'zu drilemgbo kokoru azini ava ako be, eyi e'do e'yo onzi 'ye geri eyini ecozu aa'zu edriru azini okpo esuzu 'diyiru.

lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga enkola etaataaganya mu bumenyi bw'amateeka mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Ng'okusoomoozebwa kw'abantu kweyongera, omuwendo gw'abantu abeenyigira mu bikolwa ebimenya amateeka gulabika nga gweyongedde.

nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'obukozi bw'ebibi omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Oburemeezi bw'abantu ku burikuguma nibweyongyera, omuhendo gw'abantu abarikwejumba omu bikorwa ebitahikire nigweyongyera.

eng_prompt: It is crucial for individuals living with HIV to adhere to their treatment schedules. Regular medication intake helps maintain their health and prevents the virus from progressing.

eng_prompt: The relationship between law enforcement and the community has become increasingly strained in recent years. Incidents of excessive force and misconduct have raised serious concerns about the methods used to maintain public safety.

lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu nkungaana ez'enjawulo ezeekuusa ku mbaga ngeri nnungi nnyo ey'okugaziya ebirowoozo byo. Ebikujjuko bino bitera okulaga obuwangwa obw'enjawulo, emisono, n'ebirowoozo by'otoyinza kusanga mu ngeri ndala.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye I yub mapat-pat makubbe ki nyom twero bedo yoo maber tutwal me medo ngec ma itye kwede. Yub magi ipol kare nyutu tekwaro, kit, ki tam mapat-pat ma pe iromo nongo I yoo mukene.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, staying informed is easier than ever. With a variety of options available, accessing news has become both convenient and affordable.

lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile niri fe bile ndu liza e'yo oli okporu ni emuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Ozoo iniru 'diyi ni ecaria, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu eyi ozoo emupi ri ni.

eng_prompt: When it comes to love and companionship, the perspectives people hold can vary widely. This diversity in viewpoints often leads to rich discussions about what makes relationships successful.
lug_prompt: Bwe kituuka ku kwagala n'omukwano, abantu balina endowooza ez'enjawulo. Endowooza zino ez'enjawulo zitera okuviirako okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biki ebifuula omukwano okuba ogw'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: Ka odok ilok me mar ki bedo ki lurem, tam pa dano twero bedo pat-pat tutwal. Tam mapat-pat man ipol kare kelo nyamo lok matut I kom ngo ma weko winye bedo maber.
