eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has made significant strides in political and economic development. As a result, many observers note a marked improvement in the country's overall security and governance compared to its neighbors.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda efunye enkulaakulana mu byobufuzi ne mu byenfuna. N'ekivuddemu, abatunuulizi bangi balaba enkulaakulana mu by'okwerinda n'obukulembeze bw'eggwanga okutwalira awamu bw'ogeraageranya ne baliraanwa baayo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lobo Uganda odongo tutwal I lok me cungu iwi-bye ki biacara. Macalo adwogi ne, lunen mapol gitye kaneno alokaloka madit tutwal I gwoko kuc ki tela pa lobo man ka iporo ki lobo mukene matye cok kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eswamau Uganda apol naepol noi kotoma politikis keda edumune loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ewanyunitos asesenak luipu ebe ejai aitojokaar kotoma akwapuwok kotoma ayuwara keda epugae itiriani keda idunyetakec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri esu zota okporu e'yo politiki ni azini e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu ndre'baa 'diyi ndre e'yo angu agei temani azini driceza kari 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra aga eri ma jo ejele ru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda etungire entunguuka y'amaani omu by'obutegyeki n'eby'entaasya. N'ekyarugiremu, abareebi baingi nibareeba entunguuka y'amaani omu by'okwerinda n'obwebembezi bw'eihanga okugyeragyeranisa n'amahanga agarikuri haihi.

eng_prompt: The story of the Uganda Martyrs is often associated with the Buganda region, where many of the events took place. However, their sacrifice and faith extended beyond this area, encompassing individuals from various regions of Uganda.
lug_prompt: Emboozi y'abajulizi ba Uganda etera okukwataganyizibwa n'ekitundu kya Buganda, ebintu bingi gye byabeererawo. Kyokka, okwefiiriza kwabwe n'okukkiriza kwabwe byasukka mu kitundu kino, nga bizingiramu abantu okuva mu bitundu bya Uganda eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ododo pa lucaden remo me Uganda ipol kare kubbe ki kabedo me Buganda, kama jami mapol otimme iye. Kadi bed kumeno, jalle ki niye gi okato I kabedo man, ma obedo I kin dano ma aa ki I but lobo Uganda mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuikamunitos ngul luapotu kotwaka kanuka aiyuunikec etapit arucokina keda aiboisit nako Buganda, ne ajaikina akiro ngun. Konye, apotu ainanakineta kec keda aiyuunikec kipuakata adepar aiboisio nu, aimoriarit itunga lu aiboisio nuegelegela ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba Uganda Martyrs ru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi tutuni yi eci angu Buganda niri be, angu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ni pari 'duzu 'diyi ma alia. Kani si, e'yo yini yi owizu azini a'ita yiniri ca angu 'di ma drilea drile, 'ba yi ma eselea engazu angu Uganda ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Ekitebyo ky'abajurizi ba Uganda buriijo nikikwatagana n'ekyanga kya Buganda, ahu ebintu bingi byabeireho. Kwonka, okwehayo kwabo n'okwikiriza kwabo bikaruga omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: Despite its rich natural resources and vibrant culture, Uganda faces significant challenges in economic growth and infrastructure development. As a result, many of its citizens struggle with poverty and limited access to essential services.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga Uganda erina eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka bingi n'obuwangwa obulungi, eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'enfuna n'enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi baayo bangi balwanagana n'obwavu n'obutafuna buweereza obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni Uganda tye ki lonyo me cwec ma orumuwa ki tekwaro mabeco, Uganda tye ki peko mapol tutwal I dongo lobo ki dongo lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, pol pa anywali ne gitye ka lweny ki can ki peko me nongo kony ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi keda iboro luibusiak noi luka Edeke keda einono loejok, etereikina Uganda keda atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka apol naka ikapun keda aitopol iboro. Kanuka ngun, ejaas itunga luipu keda ican keda amamus adumunun iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni tro ovuzu lonyi nyakuni 'diyi be angiri tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie ra ti, eri dri fu e'yo ewaru 'diyi be zota e'yo robiani azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezota ma alea. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi erini 'diyi ma karakara yi dri ci alio be azini geri eyini ecozu afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu were.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho eby'obuhangwa bingi n'obuhangwa burungi, Uganda eine oburemeezi bw'amaani omu ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'entunguuka y'ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuze baayo abaingi nibarwanagana n'obworo hamwe n'okutunga obuheereza bukye.

eng_prompt: In many communities, economic hardships have become increasingly prevalent, leaving families struggling to make ends meet. As a result, the resources available for children's education and well-being have significantly diminished.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, ebizibu by'ebyenfuna byeyongedde, ne bireka amaka nga galwana okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, ebikozesebwa mu kusoma kw'abaana n'obulamu obulungi bikendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, peko me can lim tye ka medde ameda, weko gangi tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lim matye pi kwan pa lutino ki bedo maber pa lutino ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, eyatakinos atiokisio nuka ikapun, ido ijalakini ikalia ainingosit adumun iboro luipudasi kesi. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto iboro luejaas kanu asioman naka idwe ka aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra, dika eyi familia eyi ku dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, lonyi sukulu anzi eyini ri ma omgbo azini geri eyini aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya bweyongyeire kureetera amaka kurwana kureberera ebyetaago byago. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'okukozesa ebirikuba biriho omu kwegyesa abaana n'okutunguura emituurire yaabo, bikyendeire munonga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to increase government revenue and improve public services, local authorities have announced new tax regulations. As part of these changes, property owners will be required to contribute to the city's finances.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku musolo gavumenti gw'efuna n'okutumbula obuweereza bw'abantu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo balangiridde amateeka amapya agakwata ku misolo. Ng'ekimu ku nkyukakyuka zino, bannannyini bizimbe bajja kwetaagibwa okuwaayo ku by'ensimbi by'ekibuga.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo cente ma gamente nongo ki medo rwom me miyo kony bot lwak, lutela me tedero gu kati ki cik manyen me mucoro. Macalo but aloka-loka magi, kibi lego wegi odi me miyo kony me lim bot city.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aiyatakin ikapun luka apugan ka aitojokar ejanakine lo itunga, alimor apedorosio nuka atutubena nuitetiak nuka isolosinei. Kwape ediope kotoma aijulanakineta nu, ebeit ikulepek itogoi aijaikin ikapun luka esite.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu robia gamete ni esu ri ma omgbo otuzu azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi azi azita musara ni o'diru 'diyi. Ojata 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba nga le 'ba angu e'ipiru 'diyi ma fe robia aku ambori ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera emishoro ya gavumenti n'okutunguura obuheereza bwa gavumenti, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro batumire ebiragiro ebisya ebirikukwata aha mishoro. Nk'emwe aha mpindahinduka ezi, bakama b'ebyombeko nibaija kushabwa kuhayo aha sente z'orurembo.

eng_prompt: The healthcare system in our country has seen significant disparities in compensation for medical professionals. Many physicians are drawn to private institutions due to the financial incentives offered.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ebyobulamu mu ggwanga lyaffe ebaddemu enjawulo mu nsasula y'abasawo. Abasawo bangi basikirizibwa mu matendekero ag'obwannannyini olw'ebbeeyi y'ensimbi eziweebwayo.
ach_prompt: Yub me miyo kony me yot kom I lobo wa tye ki apoka-poka madit tutwal I kom cul pa lutic yoto kom. Daktari mapol gicito I gangi kwan ma pe jenge I kom gamente pi cente ma kimiyo botgi.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo amukian kakwap wok ewanyunit atiakatiaka naepol noi kotoma aitac eswamak lu adekis. Etapit imurok luipu alosit toma oriongeta lumam eraasi luka apugan kanuka ikapun lu ijaikitai kes.
lgg_prompt: Arakala alata ni kari amavileri ma alea ri ndre e'yo esele coza okporu ni 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma ofeta ma alea. Dakitari karakara eyi mu arojo gamete ma pala ku 'diyi ma alea e'yo robia eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'amagara omu eihanga ryaitu, eretsireho entaaniso y'amaani omu kushashura abashaho. Abashaho baingi nibaza omu matendekyero agatari ga Gavumenti, ahabw'obusinguzi bw'esente obu barikuheebwa.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing concerns about teacher retention and job satisfaction, the education department held a series of meetings to discuss potential reforms. After careful consideration of the budget and feedback from educators, the decision was made to increase the salaries of teachers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku kusigaza abasomesa n'obumativu ku mirimu, ekitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza kyatuuza enkiiko eziwerako okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nnongoosereza eziyinza okukolebwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku mbalirira n'ebiteeso okuva mu basomesa, okusalawo kwakolebwa okwongeza emisaala gy'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye I kom bedo pa lupwonye ki bedo ki yom cwiny I kom ticgi, dul me pwonye obedo ki kacoke mapol me nywako lok I kom aloka-loka matwero time. Ingee ngiyo kor byek me lim ki tam pa lupwonye, kimoko tam me medo mucara pa lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo nuikamunitos aidar isisianakinak keda aiyalama kotoma aswamukec, abu erionget loka aisisia kitolot airiamununeta nuipu kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta nuibusakinit aswam. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuka ebajet keda aomisio nuka esisianakinak, aponi itolomunai aseunet naka aiyatakin eropit loka isisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni mupi drile e'yo 'ba imba'ba eyi ma ta mbazu azini eyini aa'zu ayikosi azi si ri ma dria, okalamvu onita niri 'ye mitingi karakara eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ojata eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Ba ega e'yo bajeti ma dria kililiru azini egata engazu imba'ba eyivu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo oya imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obwegyese kikakora enkiiko nyingi okuhanuura aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho, ahabw'okwerarikirira okurikugyenda omu maisho aha bikwatiraine n'okusigaza abegyesa n'okumarwa n'emirimo yaabo. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza embaririra hamwe n'ebiteiso kuruga omu beegyesa, bakasharamu kwongyera emishaara y'abegyesa.

eng_prompt: Every year, thousands of people gather to honor the legacy of the Uganda Martyrs. This day serves as a significant reminder of faith and sacrifice in the country's history.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu bakungaana okussa ekitiibwa mu lunyiriri lw'abajulizi ba Uganda. Olunaku luno lukola ng'ekijjukizo eky'amaanyi eky'okukkiriza n'okwewaayo mu byafaayo by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gure mwaka ki mwaka me woro nying lucaden remo me Uganda. Nino man poyo wi dano i kom niye ki jalle pa dano I tekwaro me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kangol karu, etukonokinos ilukumin luka itunga kanu ayongite aiitun atwanare naka ngul luapotu kotwaka kanuka aiyuunikec. Erai aparan na aanyunet naepol noi naka aiyuun keda aijar naka itunga kotoma akiro nukolosek nuka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, 'ba alifu karakara eyi oku eyi inzita fezu 'ba Uganda Martyrs ru 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. O'du 'di ni azi nga ekile e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu azini yi owizu e'yo kari ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu nibeteerana okuheereza ekitinisa abajurizi ba Uganda. Eizooba eri n'ekiijusyo ky'okwikiriza n'okwehayo omu byafaayo by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The rapid deforestation of our forests has raised significant environmental concerns. Many experts warn that the consequences of such actions could be catastrophic for ecosystems and biodiversity.
lug_prompt: Okusaanyaawo kw'ebibira mu bwangu kuleeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku butonde bw'ensi. Abakugu bangi balabula nti ebinaava mu bikolwa ng'ebyo biyinza okuba eby'akabi eri obutonde n'ebiramu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa bunga oyotoyot tutwal okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa. Ludiro mapol gi ciko ni adwogi me tim ma kit meno twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa ki jami ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Atubutubio na ikito nes eyaunit aiyalongong naepol noi na ejautene lo akwap wok. Ikwenyaritos ipirioitin luipu ebe epedorete nuelomunete kotoma aswamisio kangun araun nuarokok noi mama ejaasi isuban keda itiang luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Pati eyi ma ogaza okposi ri eji asi otiza angiri angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma dria. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi fe bile ndu liza kini e'yo 'yeta 'dile 'diyi ni 'diyi eco ovu e'yo onzi 'yepi angu ama agei 'diyi ma dria azini afa idriru 'diyi pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutema emiti omu bwire butari bwa hare, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Abakugu baingi nibarabura ngu ebireije kuruga omu bikorwa nk'ebyo nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi aha bihangirwe hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ebihangirwe.

eng_prompt: I've been trying to cut back on my expenses lately. Unfortunately, my budget doesn't allow for any extra purchases.
lug_prompt: Mbadde ngezaako okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya yange ennaku zino. Eky'ennaku, embalirira yange tesobozesa kugula bintu birala.
ach_prompt: Abedo katemo me dwoko piny wel cente ma atiyo kwede ikare-ni. Ki gum marac, byek me lim ma atye kwede pe romo wilo jami mukene.
teo_prompt: Atamit eong aitidisiar itiaisinei ka apakio nu. Nukaiturur, mam ebajet ka epedori agwel iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi o'bi ma afa ayuza ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo esi o'du 'diyi ma alia ra. Drile onziru, bajeti mavileri feni drileba afa jeza azi 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ningyezaho kukyendeeza aha nshohoza yangye ebiro ebi. Eky'obusaasi, embaririra yangye terikwikiriza okugura ebintu ebindi.

eng_prompt: In a somber ceremony attended by dignitaries and citizens alike, the nation prepares to say its final goodbyes. Tributes have poured in from around the world, honoring his legacy and contributions to the country.
lug_prompt: Mu mukolo ogw'ennaku ogwetabwamu abakungu n'abatuuze, eggwanga lyetegekera okusiibula. Abantu bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna bamutendereza olw'ebirungi by'akoze n'ebyo by'akoledde eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I yub me cwer cwiny ma obedo tye ikin ludito ki anywali me lobo man, lobo ne tye ka yubbe me weko ticgi me agiki. Dano mapol guketo cwinygi I kome ki I but lobo mapat-pat me woro nying mege ki jami ma en otimo pi lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loaronon loajaikina engarenok keda itunga lukokwap, ekapakina akwap aisiyalamikin kesi. Apotu itunga luka akwap kere ituroto ngesi kanuka aswamuke keda aswamuke mama ejai akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Omu candiru 'ba inzile inzi 'diyi ni tualu 'ba kari ni 'diyi pie ri ma alea, kari 'di otu i asizuri nzezu. E'yo inzita fezani 'diyi efuki engazu wudrikuru ma kalasi dria, inzita fezu erini 'diyi ma dria azini azi erini nga kari ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu mukoro gw'obusaasi ogwabaire gurimu abakuru hamwe n'abantu ba buriijo, eihanga ryeteekateekire kusiibuura abantu baayo. Abantu baingi okwetorora ensi yoona, nibaheereza ekitinisa omurimo gwe n'ebi yakozire ahabw'eihanga rye.

eng_prompt: After the funeral service, the family gathered to discuss the final arrangements for their loved one. They knew that choosing a burial site was an important decision that would honor the deceased's memory.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuziika, ab'omu maka baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka ezisembayo ez'omugenzi waabwe. Baali bakimanyi nti okulonda ekifo eky'okuziikamu kyali kikulu nnyo era kyandireetedde abafu okujjukirwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee lega me yik, lugang ne gugure me nywako lok I kom yub me agiki pi dano gi me amara. Onongo gingeo ni yero kabedo me yik obedo tam ma pire tek ma weko dano bedo ki woro i kom lato.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidayo, apotu itunga luka ekale kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit aswam kanuka aminakec. Ejenete kesi ebe aseun aiboisit na aidaere arai aseunet naepol noi naepedori ayongite aiitun loatwan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dra niri ma vutia, familia eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu otita asizu eyi ma 'ba leletu 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi nii ra kini angu 'bani eyi sazu ri opezu ri e'yo azi okporu eyini ecozu inzita fezu 'ba drapi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushaba kw'okuziika, ab'eka bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nteekateeka y'ahamuheru y'omuntu waabo. Bakaba nibamanya ngu okuronda omwanya gw'okuziika n'ekintu ky'omugasho ekirikuha omugyenzi ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: Residents have been expressing growing concerns about their safety lately. Local authorities have reported a troubling rise in violent crime statistics.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde balaga obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi bwabwe ensangi zino. Ab'obuyinza mu byalo bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obw'effujjo.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ka nyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom ber bedo gi I kare-ni. Lutela me tedero guwaco ni rwom me timo bal tye ka medde tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ayuwara kec apakio nu. Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena olimosi ebe iyata noi abilibilio naka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'da asi otiza eyini eyi ma agei tema ma dria curu'do ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece kini kalafe e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire niberarikirira eby'okwerinda kwabo ebiro ebi. Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: In response to growing public concern over food safety, officials have announced new measures to ensure consumer protection. Recent reports of contaminated products have prompted the need for stricter regulations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi bw'emmere, abakungu balangiridde enkola empya okukakasa obukuumi bw'abaguzi. Amawulire agafulumye gyebuvuddeko ku bintu ebikyafu galeetedde obwetaavu bw'okussaawo amateeka amakakali.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo madit ma lwak tye kwede pi gwoko cam, lutic gunyuto yoo manyen me gwoko luwil. Lok ma okati cokcok-ki I kom jami ma obale okelo miti me keto cik matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka itunga nuikamunitos ayuwara naka inyamat, alimosi eswamak iwaitin luitetiak lu ayuarite agwelak. Akiro nuitodunitos ebe ejaas iboro luejaasi keda ekorono eyangaunit eipud loka aitikitik ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu orisi e'yo nyaka eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria risi, azi'ba eyi azi geri o'diru eyini ani 'ba afa ayupi 'diyi ma ta mbazu. O'duko efupi o'diru afa ondiru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi fe e'yo lezu azita okporu 'diyi ma ovu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira kw'abantu ahaby'okurya, abakuru batumire engyenderwaho nsya z'okurinda abarikubikoresa. Amahurire agarikugambwaho obwahati agarikukwata aha bintu ebirikuba biine oburofa, garetsireho ekyetengo ky'okutaho ebiragiro by'amaani.

eng_prompt: It's important to express our thoughts and feelings during special times of the year. A simple gesture like sending warm wishes can strengthen our connections with others.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okwogera ebirowoozo byaffe n'enneewulira zaffe mu biseera eby'enjawulo mu mwaka. Ekikolwa ekitono ng'okuweereza okulamusa kisobola okunyweza enkolagana yaffe n'abalala.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me tito tam ki kit ma wawinyo kwede ikare me mwaka. Tic mo matidi calo cwalo mot twero jingo wat I kinwa ki jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi alimun aomisiowok keda aomisiowok kotoma apakio nuapolok nuka ekaru. Aswamisioit naedit kwape aijukar akiro nuka aijaun aijar naejok epedori aitogogong eidicane wok keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru ama ma egata azini ama ma e'yo ecezu sa'wa ndu ndu eli ma alia. E'yo azi werea ekile e'yo aleza ma ti peza le ri eco ama ma eselea 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ma okpo enga ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kworeka ebiteekateeko byaitu n'enyehurira zaitu omu bwire bw'omwaka. Akakoryo kakye nk'okushaba okurungi, nikahamya enkoragana yaitu n'abandi.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic spread rapidly across the globe, governments implemented strict measures to curb the virus's transmission. One of the first actions taken was to limit large gatherings, including religious services.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongedde okusaasaana mu nsi yonna, gavumenti zaateekawo enkola ez'amaanyi okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Ekimu ku bintu ebyasooka okukolebwa kwe kukomya enkungaana ennene, nga mw'otwalidde n'okusaba kw'eddiini.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka nyaa oyot-oyot tutwal I wilobo lung, gamente oketo cik matek tutwal me gengo nya pa two eni. Acel me kin jami ma gukwongo timone obedo gengo gure pa dano mapol, ma I kingi obedo lega.
teo_prompt: Neautar adeka naka ekorona aisiarakin katipet kotoma akwap kere, apotu apuganisinei kitolomutu ikisila luitikitikete awea naka ekorona. Adiopet koboro lusodit lu aponi kiswamaunai arai aitikitik atukonokin na itunga luipu, aimoriarit aijaanakinio na ediini.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni i erezu mbeleru wudrikuru ma alea risi, gamete eyi 'du e'yo okporu eyi azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. E'yo 'bani 'du oko 'diyi ma azi ri okuta ongmbo angiri si 'diyi ma omgbo esizu tualu e'yo dini ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwabaire nibujanjaara omu nsi yoona,gavumenti zikataho emiringo y'amaani y'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko. Kimwe ahabikorwa eby'okubanza kukorwa, n'okuzibira enteerane z'abantu baingi, otwariiremu n'okushaba kw'ediini.

eng_prompt: With its diverse landscapes and rich cultural heritage, Uganda is becoming an increasingly popular destination for travelers. From stunning national parks to vibrant local markets, there is much to explore in this East African gem.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebifo byayo eby'enjawulo n'ebyobuwangwa eby'obugagga, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekimanyiddwa ennyo eri abatambuze. Okuva ku tterekero ly'ebisolo eryewuunyisa okutuuka ku butale obujjudde abantu, waliwo bingi eby'okunoonyerezaako mu nsi eno ey'omu buvanjuba bwa Afirika.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ka doko kabedo ma oywek tutwal ki lulim piny. Nicake ki I kabedo me gwoko lee mamwonya tutwal me oo I cuk matye ki dano mapol, tye jami mapol tutwal ma omyero inen I lobo man me Afrika kunyango.
teo_prompt: Keda aiboisio nuegelegela keda inonosio luegelegela, erai Uganda aiboisit naeminasi itunga luipu alosit. Anyoun kotoma aiboisio nuibusiak nuidarere itiang kitoni osokonin lu aiboisit, ipu iboro luibusakinit jo aingic kotoma aiboisit kana naka East Africa.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie tualu e'yo a'bi eyini 'diyi pie, kari Uganda niri ni eca angu 'ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini leleri ru. E'dozu angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ndrizaru 'diyi vurisi kpere cu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi pie, e'yo angiri 'bani ecozu e'yo onizu angu 'di ma alea East Africa-a.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburungi bw'ensi n'ebyobuhangwa byaayo, Uganda eriyo neeyongyera kuba omwanya murungi gw'abarambuzi. Kuruga aha irindiro ry'enyamiishwa eririkutangaaza kuhisya aha butare burungi, hariho bingi by'okucondooza omuri burugwa izooba bwa Afirika.

eng_prompt: During a recent interfaith dialogue, differing interpretations of sacred texts emerged. As a result, religious leaders are having a misunderstanding.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa amadiini gyebuvuddeko awo, enjatula ez'enjawulo ez'ebyawandiikibwa ebitukuvu zaavaayo. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'enzikiriza balina obutategeeragana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lok ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kin dini mapat-pat, niango mapat-pat I kom coc maleng okatti. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela dini tye ki tele ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aineranara naka aiyuunikec pac, apotu iponesio luegelegela luka aijulakin akiro nuka aiyuunikec kolomutu. Kanuka ngun ejaas engarenok lu idiinin keda amamus acamanara.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu dini eyi ma eselea o'diru ri ma alea, e'yo ndundu 'bani e'yo 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi efu amve. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma eselea erita ako ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugaaniira kw'amadiini agahererukire kubaho, okutaputa ebitabo ebirikwera kukarugaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ediini baine obutetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: As severe weather patterns become more frequent, infrastructure vulnerabilities are increasingly exposed. In particular, the integrity of aging structures is put to the test during extreme conditions.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'obudde embi yeeyongera, obunafu bw'ebizimbe bweyongera okweyoleka. Okusingira ddala, obugumu bw'ebizimbe ebikadde bigezesebwa mu mbeera embi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma piny tye ka lokke marac tutwal, peko me tic mapat-pat tye ka time I kabedo mapat-pat. Tutwalle, gwoko gedo ma otii ki keto I atematema ikare ma jami tye marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape etapit ejautene loepol noi loka ekuse loka ikwamin, epedorete aiboisio nuetioko ajenun. Kacut, eponio ainwakio apedorit naka adukena nuemojongito kotoma ojautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni onzi 'diyi ni ecazu 'dika, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma e'yo ewaru 'diyi e'da yi drile. Tutunisi, 'ba afa jo oku 'diyi ma okpo o'bi sa'wa e'yo onzi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'obwire y'amaani ku erikweyongyera, oburemeezi bw'ebyombeko nibweyongyera. Okukira munonga, obusingye bw'ebyombeko ebikuru nibugyemeserezibwa omu bwire bw'embeera mbi.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about pollution and littering, local officials have implemented new initiatives. Community members have also voiced their desire for a more sustainable and attractive urban environment.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bucaafu n'okusuula kasasiro, abakungu b'ebyalo bataddewo enteekateeka empya. Abantu b'omu kitundu nabo balaze obwagazi bwabwe olw'obutonde bw'ekibuga obuwangaazi era obusikiriza.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom balo kabedo ki bolo yugi, lutic me tedero gukati ki yoo manyen mapat-pat. Lwak bene gunyutu miti gi me neno ni kabedo ma itedero tye maber dok ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka ekwam keda aicak agasia, etolomutu eswamak luka atutubet ainapeta nuitetiak. Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu eipudakec kanu aiboisit naejok noi naka eibuga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo ni tuzu e'yo angu ezapi azini okurunya o'bezu 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo azi o'diru 'diyi 'ye. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo eyini lezu angu eyini aa'zu tawuni eyi ma alea ri ma aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha nshonga y'obutwa hamwe n'okusuura kasasiro, abakungu b'ebyaro bateire omu nkora enteekateeka nsya. Abantu b'omubyaro nabo boorekire ekyetengo kyabo ky'obuhangwa bw'orurembo.

eng_prompt: Every relationship comes with its own set of challenges and rewards. When it comes to marriage, couples often experience a unique blend of joy and hardship.
lug_prompt: Buli mukwano gujja n'okusoomoozebwa n'empeera zaago. Bwe kituuka ku bufumbo, abaagalana batera okufuna essanyu n'ebizibu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Wat acel-acel bino ki peko ki adwogi maber. Ka odok ilok me nyom, joo ma onyome ipol kare gi nongo yomcwiny ki peko mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kangol eidicane ebuni keda atiokisio ke keda ainanakineta ke. Arai kedolokina toma odukone, etapit duc itunga luedukokina ajaut keda aiyalama keda atiokisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi emu e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi pie tualu feta eyini esu 'diyi pie. Ka eca e'yo aje akuniri ma dria, 'ba eyi esu ayiko eyi ma eselea e'yo ewaru eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Buri mukago nigwija n'oburemeezi bwagwo hamwe n'ebihembo byagwo. Kukirikuhika aha bushwere, abashwereine nibatunga okushemererwa n'oburemeezi bw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing rates of violence and discrimination, it is crucial to address the vulnerabilities faced by women and girls in our society. Ensuring their safety and well-being should be a top priority for policymakers.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obutabanguko n'obusosoze, kikulu nnyo okukola ku bizibu abakyala n'abawala bye basanga mu kitundu kyaffe. Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bwabwe kirina okubeera ekintu ekikulu eri abakola amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki rwom me tim gero ki apoka-poka matye kamede, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko ma mon ki anyira ginongo I kabedo wa. Luyub cik omyero guket cwinygi me gwoko kwo gi obed gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor amumu keda atiakatiaka, erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas angor keda apesur kotoma atutubetekosi. Aitogogong ayuwara kec keda aijar kec nes ibusakinit araut nuepolok noi kanejaas luitolomete ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri azini opendu ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru oku azini ezoanzi eyini esu ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Le 'ba azita sipi 'diyi ma 'du e'yo eyini aa'zu ageitema be azini aa'zu muke ri ma ovu e'yo okporu eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko n'okushoroora ebyeyongyeire, ni kikuru kukora aha buremeezi bw'abakazi n'abaishiki omu bantu baitu. Abakozi b'ebiragiro bashemereire kwebembeza okurinda n'okutereeza amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: When choosing a location for your new home, it's essential to consider the potential challenges and hazards of the environment. Many people underestimate the difficulties that come with living in areas prone to flooding or wildlife encounters.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olonda ekifo ky'ogenda okuteekamu amaka go, kikulu okulowooza ku bizibu n'obulabe obuli mu butonde bw'ensi. Abantu bangi tebatwala buzibu obuva mu kubeera mu bitundu ebirimu amataba n'ensisinkano z'ebisolo by'omu nsiko.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yero kabedo pi gang ni manyen, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom peko ki peko ma twero bedo tye I kabedo ma orumuwa. Dano mapol pe tamo I kom peko ma bino macalo adwogi me bedo I kabedo ma pong pa pii onyo rwatte ki lee lum tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aseun aiboisit naka orekon loitetet, ejokuna aomoom atiokisio keda atiokisio nuka alupok. Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma aiboi aiboisio nuepedorete ebulone airiamun keda itiang lukokutwi.
lgg_prompt: Angu mini aku mini o'diru ri opezuria, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru angu ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi e'da e'yo ewaru emu'ba aa'zu angu e'yo yi tiza ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootoorana omwanya gw'okutuuramu eka yaawe ensya, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha buremeezi n'oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa. Abantu baingi tibarikufayo ahaburemeezi oburikuruga omu kutuura omu myanya erikubaasa kurabwamu amataba nainga enyamiishwa.

eng_prompt: As the nation prepares for the upcoming election, many are eagerly anticipating the key messages that will be delivered. Analysts and citizens alike are speculating on the topics that will dominate the presidential address.
lug_prompt: Nga eggwanga lyetegekera okulonda okujja, bangi beesunga obubaka obukulu obujja okuweebwa. Abeekenneenya n'abatuuze bonna bateebereza ku nsonga ezigenda okufuga okwogera kwa pulezidenti.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka yubbe pi yer matye kabino anyim, dano mapol gitye ka kuro kwena mapigi tego ma kibinyuto. Lunywak tam kacel ki lwak gitye ka byeko lok ma ladit lobo obiloko iye.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekapakina akwap kanu aseo na ebunit, eutasi itunga luipu aidar akiro nuepolok nu ebeit aijaikin. Engicete itunga keda itunga akiro nuikamunitos akiro nu ebeit lokapolon akwap einer.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni otuta 'yeria opeta emupi 'diyi ni, 'ba karakara eyi asi 'baza be o'dukoti okporu 'bani nga o'duko fe 'diyi ma dria. Ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi tualu kari anzi eyi pie eyi e'yo ega e'yo drile kari ni 'diyi ni ngazu e'yo nzezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku eihanga ririkweteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwiija, baingi nibategyereza obutumwa bukuru oburaheebwe. Abacencuzi hamwe n'abatuuragye nibateebereza aha nshonga ezirikwija kwebembera orubazo rw'omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant push for local businesses to participate in national development initiatives. As a result, Ugandan companies are increasingly seeking opportunities to engage in large-scale infrastructure projects funded by the government.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okusindiikiriza okw'amaanyi eri abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu okwenyigira mu nteekateeka z'enkulaakulana y'eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, kampuni za Uganda zeeyongera okunoonya emikisa okwenyigira mu pulojekiti z'ebizimbe ennene ezivujjirirwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kicuko cwiny lutim biacara me tedero me bedo tye I yub me dongo lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me lobo Uganda tye ka yenyo gum me timo tic madongo ma gamente aye miyo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aisinyikokinio naepol noi mama ejaasi ibiasaran luka atutubet ajaut toma aswamisio nuka apol naka akwap. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikampunin luko Uganda aimo arerengusio nuka aswam ipurojektin luapolok luigangit apugan.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, okpo 'ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni fizu e'yo angu ezoma ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, amuti Ugandani 'diyi curu'do drileba nda fizu otita afa ndundu eyi sizu omgbo angirisi gamete ni robia fezu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hatwireho omuhimbo gw'amaani gw'abashubuzi b'omubyaro kwejumba omu nteekateeka z'entunguuka y'eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni za Uganda nizeeyongyera kusherura emigisha y'okwejumba omu purogyekiti empango ezirikushashurirwa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: The presence of street children in urban areas often highlights deeper social issues that need to be addressed. It is disheartening to see vulnerable youth struggling for survival in such a bustling environment.
lug_prompt: Okubeerawo kw'abaana b'oku nguudo mu bibuga kitera okulaga ensonga z'embeera z'abantu enkulu ezeetaaga okukolebwako. Kinakuwaza okulaba abavubuka abateesobola nga balwana okweyimirizaawo mu mbeera ezirimu abantu abangi bwe batyo.
ach_prompt: Bedo pa lutino ma gibedo iteng gudi ipol kare nyutu peko madongo ma omyero ki tyek. Tye me cwer cwiny tutwal me neno bulu matye ki peko magitye ka lweny me kwo I kabedo ma dano dwong iye tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ajaut naka idwe lu orotin kaiboisio nu otaun itodunit atiokisio nuepolok nu ekot aitemokin. Erai ibore yenepipil noi asesen atumunak lu icanas lu itereikina keda aijar kotoma aiboisio nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri nzila dria 'diyi ma aa'ta angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ni e'da e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria 'bani ecozu eyi ma aza kozu ra 'diyi. Eri candiru 'ba ode e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ndrezu dri ciria angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'dile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okubaho kw'abaana b'ahanguuto omu myanya y'endembo, nikyoreka oburemeezi bw'amaani oburikwetenga kukorwaho. Nikimaramu amaani okureeba eminyeeto etarikubaasa erikurwanirira amagara gaayo omu myanya erimu abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In a world where information is constantly changing, staying informed about current events is essential. For those interested in Uganda, traditional media remains a reliable source for real-time news.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli amawulire agakyuka buli kaseera, okubeera omumanyi ku bigenda mu maaso kya mugaso. Eri abo abaagala okumanya ebikwata ku Uganda, emikutu gy'empuliziganya egy'edda gikyasobola okuyamba abantu okufuna amawulire mu kiseera ekituufu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ngec tye ka loke tere tere, bedo ki ngec I kom jami matye katimme kombedi pire tek tutwal. Pi jo matye ki miti I kom lok angea me Uganda, odi poko ngec macon pud tye yoo acel ma genne me nongo lok angea I cawa kikome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ijulakinor akiro duc, ejokuna noi aijen nuiswamasi kwape kwana. Kanejaas ngul lu ekotosi akiro nuko Uganda, eringa ewai lo iyemuto erai lo emunoi akiro kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru o'duko ni i ojazu sawa driasi ri ma alea, aa'zu e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru. Ba ava be Ugandaa 'diyi dri, geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi nga po'di geri 'bani asi'bazu e'yo efupi sa'wa dria 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu amahurire agarikuguma nigahinduka, okumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho n'eky'omugasho munonga. Abo abarikwenda kumanya ebirikukwata ahari Yuganda, emikutu y'ebyempurizagana ey'obuhangwa neekora nk'oburugo bw'amahurire.

eng_prompt: Due to growing environmental concerns and opposition from local communities, the government has decided to reassess the impact of the proposed project. As a result, the construction of a dam on Murchison Falls has been put on hold.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi okweyongera n'okuziyizibwa okuva mu bantu b'omu kitundu, gavumenti esazeewo okuddamu okwekenneenya ebiyinza okuva mu pulojekiti etegekeddwa. N'ekyavaamu, okuzimba ebbibiro ku biyiriro bya Murchison kuyimiriziddwa.
ach_prompt: Pi lworo ma tye i kom cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki jemo ma aa ki bot lwak, gamente dong omoko tamme me ngiyo adwoki pa yub eni. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me gedo dam I wang pii me Murchison Falls kijuko woko.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo na akwap keda aitepegio kanejaas itunga luka atutubet, aseun apugan airereor epone loepedoria epurojekt ngol aswam. Kanuka ngun, ebwoikinitai adukio naka edam kocilet loka Murchison.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ama agei ri ma ta mbaza ni tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi tualu 'ba angu ma alea 'diyi ma ageti otiza be, gamete asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'bani lezu otita 'da ma 'yeta ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba atri e'yo damu sizu Murchison Falls ma dria ri ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'okuhakanisibwa kw'abantu b'omubyaro, gavumenti eshaziremu kugaruka kushwijuma oburemeezi bwa purogyekiti. N'ekyarugiremu, okwombeka daamu aha Murchison Falls kwemereziibwe.

eng_prompt: The Ugandan government has been facing significant budgetary challenges in recent years. As a result, it has increasingly relied on external funding sources to support its development initiatives.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda ebadde esanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu mbalirira mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, yeeyongedde okwesigama ku nsi z'ebweru okuwagira enteekateeka zaayo ez'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Gamente me Uganda obedo kanongo peko me lim I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, omede ki jenge I kom yoo me nongo lim ki I lobo ma woko me tyelo kor yub me dongo lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Etereikina apugan nako Uganda keda atiokisio nuka ebajet kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, etojokaar ngesi noi kotoma aiboisio nuka akwapin nukokinga kanu aigang apoloke.
lgg_prompt: Gamete Uganda niri ebi e'yo ewaru bajeti ni 'diyi esu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eri e'bi asi'ba drile geri robia esuzu engazu amve 'diyi ma dria e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda etwire neetunga oburemeezi bwingi omu mbariirira omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu, eyeyongyeire kwesiga oburugo bw'esente kuruga aheeru kushagika enteekateeka zaayo z'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported an alarming increase in cases in several regions. As a result, the public should be aware of another Ebola outbreak.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde mu bitundu ebiwerako. N'ekyavaamu, abantu balina okumanya okubalukawo kwa Ebola okulala.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak omyero gubed ki ngec i kom poto pa two ebola mukene.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka adekak kotoma aiboisio nuipu. Kanuka ngun, ekot itunga aijen nuikamunitos abwangun bobo naka ebola.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu angu kala karakara eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, le o'bi eyi ma ni e'yo azo ebola niri ma efuta dika ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire omu byanga bingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu bashemereire kumanya okubarukaho kwa Ebola okundi.

eng_prompt: The people of the realm gathered in the great hall, their faces filled with concern and uncertainty. Whispers of unrest spread like wildfire, as many feared the consequences of a leaderless land.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu bwakabaka baakuŋŋaanira mu kisenge ekinene, ffeesi zaabwe nga zijjudde okweraliikirira n'obutali bukakafu. Okuwuuma kw'obutabanguko kwasaasaana ng'omuliro gw'omu nsiko, nga bangi batya ebiyinza okuva mu nsi etaliimu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Dano me ker ne gugure I ot madit, wang gi opong ki lworo ki lworo. Dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom adwogi me bedo I lobo ma peke ki latela.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka ajakanut kotukokinos kotoma aiboisit naepol noi, ileleba oreetekec keda aiyalongong. Apotu akiro nuka amumu kisiarakinos kwape akim naka ekitoi, naarai ekuriaka itunga luipu nuepedorete atakanun kotoma akwap naemamei engarenon.
lgg_prompt: O'bi angu opi nyazaniri ma alia 'diyi tra yi jo ale aliza ambori ma alia, yi ma andretia 'diyi ga asi otiza azini asi otiza si. O'duko ngiringiri ni 'diyi ere eyi ekile aci asea ri le, 'ba karakara eyi 'ye orisi e'yo ecopi i 'yepi kari drice'ba kokoru 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'obugabe baketeerana omu kishengye kihango, amaisho gaabo gaijwire okwerarikirira n'okwerarikirira. Orugambo rw'obutabanguko rukajanjaara nk'omuriro gw'omu kishaka, abantu baingi bakaba nibatiina ebireije kuruga omu eihanga eritaine mwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about gun violence and public safety, lawmakers have been debating new regulations. After extensive discussions, the administration has reached a consensus on a crucial measure.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku butabanguko bw'emmundu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, ababaka babadde bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku mateeka amapya. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, abakulembeze batuuse ku nzikiriziganya ku nsonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom tim gero I kom muduku ki ber bedo pa lwak, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gubedo ka laro lok I kom cik manyen. Ingee nywako lok mapol, lutela guwinye I kom ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka amumu naka imudun keda ayuwara naka itunga, eutasi imeeban luka airabet aitemitem ikisila luitetiak. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu, abu eyaitene kodolok acamanar kanu aitemokin iboro lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi e'yo ngiringiri osu ni 'diyi ma dria azini ageitema o'bi eyini ri ma dria, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ebi agbatara gba azita o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, driceza 'da esu ti ecita e'yo azi okporu ni ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha butabanguko bw'embundu hamwe n'okwerinda kw'abantu, ab'eishengyero batwire nibahanuura aha biragiro ebisya. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, abebembezi bahikire aha kwikirizana aha nshonga nkuru.

eng_prompt: Staying informed about local events and news is essential for residents and visitors alike. One of the best ways to do this is through reliable sources of information.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisibwa ku bibaddewo mu kitundu n'amawulire kya mugaso nnyo eri abatuuze n'abagenyi. Engeri emu ey'okukola kino kwe kuyita mu nsibuko z'amawulire ezesigika.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki ngec I kom jami matye katimme I tedero ki lok angea pire tek tutwal pi lwak ki wele. Yo acel maber loyo me timo man obedo nongo ngec ma genne.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuiswamasi katutubet ka iyemuto erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas itunga keda ipejok. Epone ediopebon loka aswam ngun ngesi aitodolikin akiro nuka abeit.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu o'dukoti be e'yo angu ma alia 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri tualu omu eyi pie. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri 'bani ecozu e'yo nzezu geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okumanya ebirikukwata ahabintu ebirikubaho hamwe n'amakuru, n'eky'omugasho aha batuura gye hamwe n'abagyenyi. Omwe aha mihanda mirungi y'okukora eki n'okukoresa oburugo bw'amakuru oburikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks, fueled by conflicting reports and diplomatic miscommunications. As a result, officials decided to take immediate action to prevent further complications.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki eziwera olw'amawulire agakontana n'empuliziganya embi. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okutangira ebizibu ebirala.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede pi cabit ma okato angec, malubbe ki lok mapat-pat ma aa ki bot luwang gamente mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo oyot-oyot me gengo peko mukene.
teo_prompt: Apolor akiro ngun adaun isabitin luipu, kanu iripotan luegelegela keda amamus einer ejok. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamak koseutu aswam katipet kanu aitikitik atiokisio acie.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi e'bi tu sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo o'duko eyi ma eselea azini e'yo nzeza onzi 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi e'yo ewaru 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi, ahabw'amahurire gatarikukwatanisa hamwe n'empurizagana etahikire. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho okubaasa kuzibira oburemeezi obundi.

eng_prompt: City officials have been analyzing traffic patterns and public transport usage for several months. As a result, they are exploring various strategies to improve mobility and enhance the urban environment.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ekibuga babadde beekenneenya entambula y'ebidduka n'entambula ey'olukale okumala emyezi egiwerako. N'ekivuddemu, banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula entambula n'obutonde bw'omu bibuga.
ach_prompt: Lutic me city gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma mutoka tye ka wot kwede ki kit ma lwak tiyo kwede pi dwe mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me wot ki medo rwom me kabedo ma orumowa.
teo_prompt: Isisiaete eswamak luka esite iponesio luka amotokan keda elose lo itunga adaun ilapio luipu. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aingic iwaitin luegelegela kanu aitojokar alosit ka aitojokar aiboisio nuka itaunin.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba aku ambu city ni 'diyi ebi e'yo nzila ni 'diyi ma ale andri azini geri o'bi eyini acizu 'diyi ma ayuta ma ale andri mba karakara. E'yo 'disi, eyi geri ndundu eyi onda acipa ma omgbo otuzu azini angu tawuni eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu rurembo batwire nibashwijuma emihanda y'ebiiruka n'entambura y'abantu boona okumara ameezi maingi. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura entambura n'obuhangwa bw'endembo.

eng_prompt: Many individuals prioritize their daily responsibilities over their health, often neglecting regular checkups. As a result, they tend to seek medical attention only when symptoms become severe.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bakulembeza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obwa buli lunaku okusinga obulamu bwabwe, emirundi egisinga balagajjalira okukeberebwa buli kaseera. N'ekivuddemu, batera okunoonya obujjanjabi ng'obubonero bweyongedde.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gi tero tic gi me nino ducu calo gin ma pire tek loyo yotkomgi, man weko gi cayo bedo ka pime kare ki kare. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gi cito ka nongo kony me yot kom ka lanyut tye marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu isingarenitos aswamisinei kec nuka nginiparan adepar angaleukec, mam epalunitos ainwakio. Kanuka ngun, elosenenete kesi amoun amukian arai epol aanyuneta.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'yo eyini 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi 'du okporu aga eyi ma rua ala ma dria, eyini ani eyi ma rua o'bizu ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni aro nda lu e'yo eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi ka eca okporu ria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibatwara obujunanizibwa bwabo obwa buriizooba nka bukuru kukira amagara gaabo, barikwehuzya okukyeberwa buri kaire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatera kuronda obujanjabi oburikworeka obumanyiso bw'oburwaire ku burikweyongyera kuba obw'amaani.

eng_prompt: Authorities are investigating a series of abductions that have raised alarm in the community. Witnesses reported seeing a suspicious van parked near the locations of the incidents.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza banoonyereza ku kuwambibwa kw'abantu okw'omuddiring'anwa okuleese okweraliikirira mu kitundu. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baalaba kabangali eteeberezebwa ng'esimbye okumpi n'ebifo we byabeererawo.
ach_prompt: Lutela tye ka kwedo lok me mako dano ma okelo lworo ikin lwak. Lucaden guwaco ni guneno mutoka ma obedo cok ki kama jami ne otimme iye.
teo_prompt: Eutasi apedorosio aingic akiro nuikamunitos aikamanario na itunga lu eyangautu aiyalongong kotunga. Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu amotoka naipikakinitai eidunya keda aiboisio nueswamauna ngun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'yo vuti ondaza 'ye e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu 'diyi ma dria eyini ani ori fezu ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi ndre mutukari 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada ni pa so angu e'yo 'da ni i'yezu 'diyi ma ageia.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibacondooza okubuzaho abantu okureesire okwerarikirira omu bantu. Abajurizi bakagira ngu bakareeba ekiiruka ekitarikwetegyerezibwa kiyimire haihi n'omwanya ahu ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: To be considered for a position on the supreme court, candidates must demonstrate a deep understanding of the law and a proven track record in the legal field. This level of expertise is essential for making informed decisions on complex cases that can shape the nation's legal landscape.
lug_prompt: Okulowoozebwako ku kifo ku kkooti ensukkulumu, abeesimbyewo balina okulaga okutegeera okw'amaanyi ku mateeka n'ebyafaayo ebikakasiddwa mu by'amateeka. Omutindo guno ogw'obukugu gwa mugaso nnyo mu kukola okusalawo okulungi ku misango emizibu egirina kye gikola ku mateeka g'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Me nongo kabedo I court madit loyo weng, lucungu omyero gunyut ni gingeyo cik maber dok bene gubedo ki ngec matut I lok me cik. Rwom me ngec man pire tek tutwal pi moko tam matye ki ngec matut I kom lok matego ma twero yubu cik me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin aiboisit naka ekooti loka apolon, ekot abwoak aitodun ebe ejenete kesi nuikamunitos ikisila keda akiro nuiswamata kesi kotoma okisila. Epolok noi adoketait na naka acoa kanu aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos imusagon luetioko luepedorete aitodolikin akiro nuka ikisila kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba ma ega e'yo 'ba pa tupi supreme court ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra, le 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma e'da e'yo yi vazu azita ma dria kililiru azini e'yo yi 'yepi e'yo azita ma dria 'diyi ma dria ra. Ondua 'diri orodriru e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'duzu e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kutwarwa aha ntebe omu kooti enkuru, abesimbireho bashemereire kworeka ngu nibamanya gye ebiragiro kandi baine n'ebyafaayo omu mirimo y'ebiragiro. Obukugu obu n'obw'omugasho omu kukora encwamu nungi aha mishango egumire erikubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu biragiro by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The anticipation is building as students and faculty eagerly await the results. This year's selection process has been particularly competitive, highlighting the exceptional talent within our school.
lug_prompt: Obwagazi bweyongedde ng'abayizi n'abasomesa balindirira ebyava mu bigezo. Okusunsula kw'omwaka guno kubaddemu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi, okulaga ebitone eby'enjawulo mu ssomero lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Gen tye ka dongo ikare ma lutino kwan ki lupwonye tye kakuru adwogi peny. Yub me yero lutino kwan me mwaka ni obedo ki pyem matek tutwal, ma onyuto diro pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Eutasi esisiak keda esisiak aidar akiro nuelomunete. Apol abolobol noi kotoma aitolomunio naka esisiak luka ekaru kalo, itodunitos atalantan nuka esomero wok.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza ni tu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea imba'ba eyi pie asi driasi agata eyi te. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu eli 'disi ri ebi ovu a'bala ru, e'dapi feta Munguni fe 'diyi sukulu amavileri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi n'abeegyesa bategyereize ebyarugire omu bigyezo. Enkora y'okutoorana ab'omwaka ogu, etungire okuhayahayana kw'amaani, ekirikworeka emyoga y'omutaano omu eishomero ryaitu.

eng_prompt: In a recent report released by the government, the financial contributions of individuals and corporations were analyzed. As a result, the top taxpayers in the country have been named.
lug_prompt: Mu alipoota eyafulumizibwa gavumenti gye buvuddeko, obuyambi bw'ensimbi obw'abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole byekenneenyezebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abawi b'omusolo abasinga mu ggwanga batongozeddwa.
ach_prompt: I adwogi tic ma gamente okatti kwede cokcok-ki, kitimo kwed I kom lim ma dano ki dul mapat-pat omiyo. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo nying lucul mucoro madwong loyo weng I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oripoti loabu apugan kitolomu pac, aponi owanyunai agangat naka ikapun kama ejaasi itunga keda ikampunin. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolimunai ikiroria luka itunga lueinanakinete isolosinei luipu kakwap wok.
lgg_prompt: O'duko gamete ni ofu o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba andri robia 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni azini amuti yi ni fele 'diyi ma ale andri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba musoro ofepi okporu ndeni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma ru 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omuri ripoota eyaherize kushohozibwa gavumenti, obuhwezi bw'abantu n'ebitongore omu by'empiiha bukashwijumwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikushashura emishoro omu ihanga erikukirayo obwingi, batirwe amaziina gaabo.

eng_prompt: After receiving a tip-off from an anonymous source, detectives began to piece together the events leading up to the crime. The community has been on edge, eager for answers as rumors swirl about the circumstances surrounding the tragic incident.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubaka okuva ew'omuntu atamanyiddwa mannya, bambega baatandika okukwataganya ebyaliwo ebyaviirako obumenyi bw'amateeka. Abantu babadde ku bunkenke, nga baagala okufuna eby'okuddamu ng'olugambo luwuuma ku mbeera eyeetoolodde ekikangabwa ekyo.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo ngec kibot ngat ma pe ki ngeyo nyinge, lutim kwed gucako yubu jami ma okelo bal enoni. Lwak gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal, ki miti me nongo lagam I kom lok mapat-pat makwako peko ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumun alimoret kama ejai itunganan yenimam ekirorike, apotu ipolisin kogeutu aimorikikin akiro nuapotu koyangautu abilibilio naka ikisila. Ekapakina itunga noi adumun abongokinet naarai elelete akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun nuapotu kotakanutu.
lgg_prompt: O'duko esuzu engazu 'ba azi ru ku ni vu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi e'do e'yo yi 'yepi e'yo onzi 'da ma dri cepi 'diyi 'ba tualu. Ongulumu eyi ebi ovu asi driasi, ava be omvita eyi esuzu e'yo nzeza eyi ma dria e'yo eyi 'yepi e'yo onzi 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga amakuru kuruga ahari omuntu otarikumanywa eiziina rye, bambega bakatandika kukwatanisa ebyabaireho ebirikubaasa kureetaho obukozi bw'ebibi. Abantu babaire bari aha rutezyo, barikwetenga eby'okugarukwamu, nk'oku engambo zaabaire nizigyenda omu maisho aha bintu ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been growing concern about the effectiveness of financial aid distributed during election campaigns. Many believe that these funds could be better allocated to address pressing community needs.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweraliikirira kungi ku bukugu bw'obuyambi bw'ensimbi obugabibwa mu kampeyini z'okulonda. Bangi balowooza nti ensimbi zino zandibadde zikozesebwa bulungi okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu eby'amangu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo obedo tye I kom kit ma kony me lim ma ki poko ikare me bito kwir tiyo kwede. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni cente man omyero ki tii kwede me cobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos agangat na ikapun na ekorio kapakio nuka aseo. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epedorio aitwasam ikapun lu kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'bi tu e'yo 'bani robia awazu sa'wa opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini 'ba eco robia 'diyi ayu kililiru e'yo ongulumu eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hatwireho okwerarikirira ahabw'obuhwezi bw'esente oburikugabwa omu kampiini z'oburuuru. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu esente ezi nizibaasa kukoresibwa kurungi kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: Many students are exploring their options for financing higher education. As a result, various financial institutions have begun offering new programs.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi banoonyereza ku ngeri gye bayinza okusasuliramu mu matendekero aga waggulu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ensimbi eby'enjawulo bitandise okuwa pulogulaamu empya.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me nongo cente pi kwan gi me rwom ma malo. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi tic me lim mapol gucako miyo yub manyen.
teo_prompt: Eutasi esisiak luipu aingic eipone lo epedorete kesi adumun ikapun kanu asioman naka okuju. Kanuka ngun, ageutu iriongeta lu ikapun aijaikin ainapeta nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu onita uruleruri ma alea 'diyi onda. E'yo 'disi, angu ndundu robia ta mbazu 'diyi e'do otita o'diru 'diyi 'ye 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi bariyo nibaronda oburyo bw'okushashurira amashomero agahaiguru. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore by'esente bingi bitandikire kuheereza puroguraamu nsya.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the town as citizens grew increasingly frustrated with the magistrate's controversial decisions. When the verdict was announced, it became clear that not everyone would accept the outcome peacefully.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu kibuga nga bannansi beeyongedde okunyiiga olw'okusalawo kw'omulamuzi okwalimu enkaayana. Ensala bwe yalangirirwa, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti si buli omu nti ajja kukkiriza enkomerero mu mirembe.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I town pien anywali ne gubedo ki cwer cwiny I kom ngolo kop mapat-pat pa langol kop. Ikare ma kingolo kop ne, nen atyer kamaleng ni pe dano weng biyee adwogi ne I kuc.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong otaun naarai apotu itunga itakadikisi noi kanu aseunet naka atubon. Nealimorere etube, apotu kojenutu ebe mam itunga kere ecamunitos akiro ngun koipone kaloajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ri e'bi tu tawuni 'da ma alea kari anzi eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma dria. Ba ka e'yo liza 'da azi, eri eca e'da kini 'ba dria econi e'yo nde a'i asianzuru si ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba bugumire nibweyongyera omu rurembo ahabw'okugira ngu abantu bakaba batarikusiima encwamu y'omuramuzi. Encwa y'omushango ku yarangirwe, kikarebeka butunu ngu ti buri omwe ngu naija kwikiriza ebyarugiremu omu busingye.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy hearing, the judge reviewed the evidence and determined that the suspects posed no flight risk. As a result, the court decided to release them pending trial.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira omusango okumala ebbanga eddene, omulamuzi yeetegereza obujulizi n'asalawo nti abateeberezebwa tebaali mu katyabaga k'okudduka. N'ekyavaamu, kkooti yasalawo okubayimbula nga bwe balindirira okuwozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo lok pi kare malac, langol kop ongiyo caden dok omoko ni jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi ni pe giromo ngwec. Macalo adwogi ne, court omoko tamme me gonyo gi ma pwod pe ki winyo pido gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apupio na apak naepol, abu ekatubon koany ajenanut kosodi ajenun ebe mam luitepesenitai epedorete akerit. Kanuka ngun, abu ekooti ocam alacakin kes itoni ne awanyunere emusago.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri andri afa e'dapi kini 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi econi apa ku. E'yo 'disi, dwani 'du e'yo yi ofuzu de nga po'di 'ba obi yi ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira omushango,omuramuzi akashwijuma obujurizi yaashanga ngu abarikuteekwateekwaho bakaba bataine kabi k'okutoroka. N'ekyarugiremu,kooti ekasharamu kubarekura ku barikutegyereza okuhurira orubanja rwabo.

eng_prompt: After years of rigorous testing and clinical trials, researchers have finally received approval from regulatory authorities. This breakthrough could revolutionize treatment options for patients suffering from the targeted condition.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga bagezaako, abanoonyereza bafunye olukusa okuva mu b'obuyinza. Okuvumbulwa kuno kuyinza okukyusa engeri z'okujjanjaba abalwadde ababonaabona n'embeera eziragiddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me pimo ki pimo I ot yat, lukwed dong gunongo twero ki bot dul ma doro lok kom yoto kom. Alokaloka man twero kelo aloka-loka I yoo me tic I kom lutwo matye ki two eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ainwakio keda ainwakio, apotu angicak kodumutu acamanar kama ejaasi lukapolok. Aticepak ebuni aisisiaet ngin aijulakin epone loka aimuke adekak lu edekasi adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia, 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi esu asizu rukusa engazu 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi vu. E'yo 'di eco ojata eji geri aro esuzu 'ba azo be 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukyebera n'okukyebera, abacondoozi baherize kutunga orusa kuruga omu b'obushoborozi. Okujumbura oku nikubaasa kureetaho empindahinduka omu marwariro g'abarwaire abarikubonabonesibwa oburemeezi obu barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous testing and analysis, the research team was excited to share their findings. Participants in the clinical trials reported significant improvements in their symptoms.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and ongoing challenges, experts are gathering to address pressing issues in healthcare. Viewers are encouraged to tune in for an in-depth analysis of the current situation.

lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo ewaru mupi drile 'diyi pie, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi tra eyi e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ba ai 'ba angu ndre'ba 'diyi emuzu e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu geri kililiru si e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakugu bariyo nibateerana kukora aha nshonga z'amaani omu by'amagara. Abareebi nibahigwa kuhurikiza embeera eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: As the nation grapples with ongoing health challenges, experts are stepping forward to share their knowledge. One such expert, a renowned doctor, will provide an insight into the health sector on television.
lug_prompt: Nga eggwanga lirwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulamu okugenda mu maaso, abakugu bavaayo okugabana amagezi gaabwe. Omu ku bakugu ng'abo, omusawo omututumufu, ajja kuwa amagezi ku byobulamu ku terefayina.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, ludiro tye kabino anyim me nywako ngec gi. Ladiro acel macalo enoni, ma obedo daktar ma oywek tutwal, obinyuto lok matut I kom tenge me yot kom I telebijon.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuka angaleu, eutasi ipirioitin aimor acoa kec. Epirioit ngol, emuron lo ejenara noi, ebuni aitetem akiro nuka angaleu kotelebision.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi pie, 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi efu drile yini ondua yini 'diyi awazu. Ba onita be angiri 'dile 'diyi ma azi, dakitari 'bani nile tu ni nga e'yo nze e'yo esele alatani 'diyi ma dria televisioni ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eihanga ririkurwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakugu bariyo nibarugayo kugabana obwengye bwabo. Omwe aha bakugu nk'abo, omushaho orikumanywa munonga, naija kugamba aha by'amagara aha terevijoni.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing demand for skilled healthcare professionals, a new initiative has been proposed. This initiative emphasizes the importance of mentorship in developing the next generation of medical practitioners.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obwetaavu bw'abasawo abakugu, enteekateeka empya eteereddwawo. Enteekateeka eno ekkaatiriza obukulu bw'okubuulirira mu kukulaakulanya omulembe oguddako ogw'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki mede pa miti pa lutic yoto kom ma ludiro, yub manyen kikelo. Yub man nyutu ber pa miyo tam ki daktari me kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos eipud loepol noi loka ipirioitin lu adekis lu emisiaritos, etolomun aomisioit naitetet. Isinyikokinit ainapeta ngun ajokis naka aicoreta kanu aitolomun eswamak lu adekis lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria tuzu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba fe egata e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ni okpo fe orodri 'bani imbata fezu 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ezozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakugu omu by'amagara kweyongyera, enteekateeka ensya eteirweho. Ekigyendererwa eki nikigumya omugasho gw'okuhabura omu kutendeka abashaho ab'omurembe ogurikukurataho.

eng_prompt: In a remarkable achievement for the nation, a talented journalist has been recognized for their outstanding contributions to investigative reporting. This accolade highlights the growing impact of Ugandan media on the global stage.
lug_prompt: Mu buwanguzi obw'ekitalo eri eggwanga, munnamawulire alina ekitone asiimiddwa olw'ebirungi by'akoze mu kunoonyereza. Okusiimibwa kuno kulaga enkulaakulana y'emikutu gy'amawulire mu Uganda ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna.
ach_prompt: I tic maber tutwal ma lobo man otimo, kimiyo pwoc ki lucoo lok angeya ma gitye ki talanta pi ticgi maber tutwal I lok me kwed. Pwoc man nyutu kit ma odi poko ngec me lobo Uganda tye ka dongo kwede I wilobo lung.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitodolikinio naejok noi naka akwap, aponi isiyalamikinai arotak iyemuto luejaasi keda atalanta kanu aswam kec naepol noi kotoma airot iyemuto. Itodunit ainanakinet ngin apolou na ewai lo iyemuto ko Uganda kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi onyiru kari ni isu ri ma alea, 'ba fe 'ba osisia ni talanta be 'diyi dri awa'difo eyini azi onyiru eyini nga e'yo eti ondaza ma dria 'diyisi. Awa'difo 'di ece orodri kari Uganda niri ma e'yo oyuzani tupi wudrikurusiri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhikiirira okw'omutaano ahabw'eihanga, abanyamakuru abaine etaraanta, batungire okusiimwa ahabw'emirimo yaabo ey'omutaano omu by'amahurire g'okucondooza. Ekitiinisa eki nikyoreka omugasho gw'amahurire ga Uganda oguriyo nigweyongyera omu nsi yoona.

eng_prompt: In response to a recent increase in measles cases, health officials have prioritized immunization efforts. As part of this initiative, Uganda is conducting a nationwide Measles-Rubella Campaign.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'abalwadde b'olunkusense gye buvuddeko, abasawo batadde essira ku kugema. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, Uganda eri mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa olukusense-Kikutiya mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two anyo, lutic me yot kom guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom gwero dano. Macalo but yub man, lobo Uganda tye ka cako yub me lweny i kom two anyo ki Rubella.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nuka adeka naka akwap, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kisingarenitos nuka aikis ekato. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, euta Uganda aitolot ekampein loka adeka na akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo kajuka niri ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo aro soza niri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, kari Uganda niri ni e'yo mile oziza azo kajuka ni azini rubella niri 'ye kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'obusheru, ab'eby'amagara bateire amaani omu kusirika. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, Uganda eriyo neekora ehururu y'obusheru na Rubella omwihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs in the region, local authorities have been working tirelessly to improve access to essential medical supplies. As part of this initiative, a new medical kit has been launched in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo babadde bakola butaweera okutumbula okufuna ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi ebikulu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba ebipya bitongozeddwa mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kony me yot kom I but lobo eni, lutela me tedero gubedo katic matek tutwal me medo rwom me nongo jami ma mite pi yoto kom. Macalo but yub man, kikelo jami tic me ot yat manyen I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian kotoma aiboisit, iswamaete apedorosio nuka atutubet agogongu kanu adumun iboro lu itwasamao kanu amukian. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kana, aponi kitegearai iboro luitetiak luka amukian ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu angu 'di ma alea risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru afa arojo ni orodriru 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do afa ayuzaru arojoa o'diru 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara ebyeyongyeire omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro batwire nibakora n'amaani okutunguura eby'okukoresa omu marwariro. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, akatimba k'eby'amagara akasya katongoziibwe omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming public health initiative, a series of workshops have been organized. These sessions aim to equip staff with the necessary skills and knowledge to effectively manage the vaccination efforts.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera enteekateeka y'ebyobulamu ejja, emisomo egy'enjawulo gitegekeddwa. Emisomo gino gigendererwamu okuwa abakozi obukugu n'amagezi ageetaagisa okusobola okuddukanya obulungi kaweefube w'okugema.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub me yot kom matye kabino anyim, kacoke mapol mapat-pat kiyubu. Yub eni tye me miyo diro ki ngec ma mite ki lutic me doro yub me gwero dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin nuikamunitos angaleu naka itunga, itemonokinitai airiamunun nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta nu erai aijaikin eswamak acoa ka acoa na ekato.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani karakara 'diyi 'ba otu otita imbatani e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria ri otuzu. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi azi'ba eyini ondua azini ondua lele 'diyi fe eyini ani ecozu e'yo aro soza niri ma aza kozu kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera enteekateeka y'eby'amagara erikwija, emishomo mingi etebekanisiibwe. Enteerane ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abakozi obukugu n'obwengye oburikwetengwa, kugira ngu babaase kukora kurungi omurimo gw'okusirika.

eng_prompt: Rubella, also known as German measles, is a contagious viral infection that poses significant risks during pregnancy. Vaccination before conception is crucial to prevent potential complications for both the mother and the developing fetus.
lug_prompt: Rubella, era amanyidwa nga German measles, bulwadde obusiigibwa akawuka nga buleta akabi ak'amaanyi mu kiseera ky'olubuto. Okugema nga tannafuna lubuto kya mugaso nnyo okutangira ebizibu eri maama n'omwana ali mu lubuto.
ach_prompt: Rubella, ma bene kilwongo ni German measles, obedo two ma kobo dok kelo peko madit tutwal ikare me yacu. Gwer ma pwod peya dako oyac pire tek tutwal me gengo peko ma twero bedo tye I kom mego ki latin ma pud tye i ic.
teo_prompt: Rubella, da ejenara kwape adeka naka akwap, erai adeka naka ekorona na ikopas noi kapak naka apotu. Ekato eringa apotu opotu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik atiokisio nuka angor keda imukerun.
lgg_prompt: Rubella ru, omvele German measles ru, eri azo omvele viral infection ruri'i, dika eri e'yo onzi okporovu eyini 'diyi ejipi. Aro soza de nga po'di okporovu esuni ku ri eri orodriru e'yo onzi ecopi ecapi okporovu ma rua 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Rubella, ekirikumanywa nka obusheru bwa German, n'oburwaire oburikuturira munonga kandi oburikubaasa kureeta akabi kahango omu bwire bw'okutwara enda. Okusirika otakatungire enda n'eky'omugasho munonga okurwanisa oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho aha bakazi n'abaana abarikuzaarwa.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the rising number of malaria cases has sparked urgent calls for action. Health organizations and governments are joining forces to launch a comprehensive initiative aimed at eradicating this deadly disease.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde b'omusujja gw'ensiri kuleeseewo okusaba okw'amangu okukolebwako. Ebitongole by'ebyobulamu ne gavumenti bikolera wamu okusobola okumalawo ekirwadde kino eky'obulabe.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, medde pa wel dano matye ki two malaria okelo lega me timo gin mo oyot oyot. Dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom kacel ki gamente tye ka ribbe me cako yub me lweny i kom two man marac-ci.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakin enaaba loka itunga lu ejatatar keda eimidi nes eyangaunit ainapeta nuka atipet. Iriongeta luka angaleu keda apuganisinei ejai aimorikikin agogongu kanu aitegear ainapeta nuepedorete aikisar adeka na.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kalafe tupi 'ba azo malaria niri be 'diyi fe 'ba eyi ai e'yo 'yezu mbeleru. Amuti alata ni 'diyi tualu gamete eyi pie okpo 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu lezu azo onzi 'di drozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire b'omushwija gw'ensiri, kireesireho okushaba kw'amaani. Ebitongore by'eby'amagara hamwe na gavumenti, nibikorera hamwe okutandikaho enteekateeka y'okumaraho oburwaire obu.

eng_prompt: As we approach a significant time in our nation's history, it's important to recognize those who embody the spirit of our independence. This week marks a celebration of our freedom, and we have proud representatives showcasing our culture and values.
lug_prompt: Nga tusemberera akaseera ak'omugaso mu byafaayo by'eggwanga lyaffe, kya mugaso okusiima abo abalina omwoyo gw'obwetwaze. Wiiki eno ejaguza eddembe lyaffe, era tulina abakiise abeenyumiriza mu kwolesa obuwangwa n'empisa zaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka cok ki kare ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro pa lobo wa, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo jo ma gukelo cwiny me locken I lobo wa. Cabit man obedo kare me kwero bedo agonyawa, dok watye ki luwang wa ma cwiny gi yom me nyutu tekwaro wa ki jami ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete sio apak naepol noi kotoma akiro nukolo nuka akwapuwok, ejokuna noi ajenun ngul luejaasi keda etau loka aipugaikin bon. Erai esabiti lo ainumunum ailajarawok, ido ijaasi oni keda abwoikinitok luepolok lu itodunitos inonosio wok keda iponesio lukajokak.
lgg_prompt: Amani cazu sawa azi orodriru ni ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba e'dapi amani driwala isuzu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Sabiti 'disi ama driwala inzi, dika ama ovu 'ba pa sopi ama ma paria 'diyi be afusi e'dapi ama vile a'bi azini e'yo orodriru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikuhika aha bwire bw'omutaano omu byafaayo by'eihanga ryaitu, n'eky'omugasho kumanya abo abarikujwekyera okwetegyeka kwaitu. Saabiiti egi neejaguza obugabe bwaitu, kandi twine abajwekyerwa abarikworeka eby'obuhangwa n'emitwarize yaitu.

eng_prompt: Vaccination is a crucial step in preventing infectious diseases in children. One of the key vaccines recommended for early childhood is the Measles-Rubella vaccine.
lug_prompt: Okugema ddaala lya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira endwadde ezisiigibwa mu baana. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okugema abaana abato kwe kugema obulwadde bw'olukusense-Kikutiya.
ach_prompt: Gwer obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me gengo two ma kobo ikin lutino. Yat agwera acel ma pire tek ma mite pi lutino matino obedo yat agwera me gengo two Anyo ki Rubella.
teo_prompt: Erai aikis ekato epone loajokan noi loka aitikitik adekasinei nu ikopas kanejaas idwe. Adiopet ekato lo isinyikokitai kanu idwe ludidik ngesi ekato loka adeka naka akwap keda Rubella.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri e'yo azi okporu ni azo eyi esupi anzi nyiri eyi ma eselea 'diyi atrizu. Aro soza okporu 'bani fe anzi nyiri drioru 'diyini ri ma azi eri aro soza azo kajuka ni azini rubella niri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika n'omuringo gw'amaani omu kuzibira endwara ezirikuturira omu baana. Gumwe aha mubazi gw'okugyema ogurikuhaburwa abaana bato n'ogw'okusirika obusheru na Rubella.

eng_prompt: In light of recent misinformation circulating on social media, health officials are urging the public to verify information before sharing. The ministry has taken a strong stance on the issue, emphasizing the importance of accurate information regarding immunization.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bubaka obukyamu obubunye ku mikutu emigattabantu gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abantu okukakasa obubaka nga tebannabugabana. Minisitule ekutte ennyiriri ez'amaanyi ku nsonga eno, ng'essa essira ku bukulu bw'obubaka obutuufu obukwata ku kugema.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok ma pe atir ma okato cokcok-ki I kabedo me nywako lok me intanet, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego lwak me niang lok ma peya gupoko. Minictry ocung matek tutwal I kom lok eni kun waco ni pire tek me bedo ki ngec matir I kom gwero dano.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nuarokok nuejaasi toma olago, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga airereor akiro eringa emorete. Ejaasi erionget keda epone loegogong noi loikamunit akiro nuka aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko enzoru o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ai o'bi eyi e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu raka de nga po'di eyi awini eyi awa ku. Okalamvu alataniri 'du e'yo okporu e'yo 'di ma dria, erini asi 'bazu orodri o'dukoti kililiru aro soza ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'amakuru g'ebishobobo agarikugyenda omu maisho aha mikutu ya boona, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu kubanza bahamya amakuru gaabo batakagabaniise. Minisiture ekataho enteekateeka y'amaani aha nshonga egi, erikworeka omugasho gw'okutunga amakuru agahikire agarikukwata aha kusirika.

eng_prompt: Many people are interested in pursuing careers in public service, drawn by the opportunity to make a difference in their communities. As a result, it's important to clarify the financial aspects of the application process.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baagala okwenyigira mu mirimu gya gavumenti olw'omukisa gw'okuleetawo enjawulo mu bitundu byabwe. N'ekivuddemu, kya mugaso okutangaaza ku nsonga z'ensimbi ezikwata ku kusaba.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki miti me donyo I tic pa gamente pien gum me kelo aloka-loka ikabedo gi oyomo cwiny gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pire tek tutwal me tito jami ma kwako lim I kare me penyo pi tic.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi itunga luipu aswam kotoma aswam naka apugan naarai ekotosi kesi aswam ibore yenitegelikina kotoma atutubenakec. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna aitijenar akiro nuka ikapun nuka ailip.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ava be e'yo azi ngazu o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea eyini ani drileba eyini ecozu ojata ejizu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi. E'yo 'disi, eri orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ecezu geri 'bani waraga sizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibenda kwejumba omu mirimo ya gavumenti, ahabw'omugisha gw'okukora empindahinduka omu byanga byabo. N'ekyarugiremu, n'eky'omugasho okushoborora enshonga z'esente ezirikukwata aha kushaba kwawe.

eng_prompt: As the sun rose over the vibrant landscapes of Uganda, citizens gathered in towns and cities, filled with pride and anticipation. The air buzzed with excitement as preparations for the annual festivities began, marking a significant moment in the nation's history.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali ebuuka mu bifo bya Uganda ebirabika obulungi, bannansi baakuŋŋaanira mu bubuga n'ebibuga, nga beenyumiriza era nga beesunga. Empewo yajjudde essanyu ng'enteekateeka z'ebikujjuko ebikolebwa buli mwaka zitandika, nga kino kye kiseera ekikulu mu byafaayo by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka ryeny I kabedo mapat-pat me lobo Uganda, anywali me lobo man gugure I taun mapat-pat ma opong ki awaka ki gen. Cwiny dano opong ki yom-cwiny ikare ma yub me kwero nino madit me mwaka ki mwaka ocake, ma obedo kare ma pire tek tutwal I tekwaro me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Neadolia akolong kotoma aiboisio nuka Uganda, apotu itunga kotukokinos otaunin keda aiboisio nuapolok, ileleba keda aiyalama keda aiyalama. Apol noi aiyalama kotoma okwam kwape aitemonokineta nuka ainumunum kangin ekaru, nuapolok noi kotoma akiro nukolo nuka akwap.
