lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria angu Uganda ni 'diyi ma dria, kari anzi eyi tra eyi tawuni eyi ma alea azini aku ambo eyi ma alea, eyini aa'zu afusi azini asi 'baza be. Angu ma alia ayiko tu ekile otuta omu eli vusi 'diyi ni e'doria, e'yo orodriru kari ma adi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurabira omu myanya mirungi y'eihanga rya Uganda, abatuuragye baketeeranira omu ndembo n'endembo, baijwire ekiniga n'okushemererwa. Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga ahabwokuba enteekateeka z'okujaguza eza buri mwaka zikaba zitandikire, ekyabaire kiri eky'omugasho omu byafaayo by'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health crises affecting its population, the Ugandan government has taken proactive measures to address these challenges. As part of its commitment to public health, Uganda has contributed money to help fight three major health epidemics.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera okukosa abantu baayo, gavumenti ya Uganda ekoze enteekateeka okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka zaayo ez'ebyobulamu, Uganda ewaddeyo ssente okuyamba okulwanyisa endwadde ssatu ez'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kamede ma tye ka yelo dano, gamente me Uganda otimo jami mapol me lweny i kom peko magi. Macalo but yub me gwoko yotkom pa lwak, Uganda omiyo cente me lweny i kom two adek madongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu nu eyatakinete itunga, abu apugan nako Uganda kiswama nu epedori kere kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu. Kwape ediope kotoma ainakina ke mama ejaasi angaleu naka itunga, ejaiki Uganda ikapun kanu aitiji adekasinei auni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete Uganda niri 'du e'yo okporu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Kari Uganda niri fe robia a'di 'dizu azo onzi okporu na eyi be.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda, ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire omu bantu baayo, eteireho oburyo bw'okukora aha buremeezi obu. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka yaayo y'okureeberera eby'amagara, Uganda ehereizeyo esente z'okurwanisa endwara ishatu z'amaani.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing mental health crisis, it is crucial to implement supportive measures for those in distress. Providing a safe and confidential environment can encourage individuals to seek help and share their struggles.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'obwongo obweyongera, kikulu nnyo okussaawo engeri z'okuyambamu abo abali mu buzibu. Okuteekawo embeera ey'obukuumi era ey'ekyama kisobola okukubiriza abantu okunoonya obuyambi n'okugabana ebizibu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me two wic matye kamede, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me konyo dano matye I peko. Miyo kabedo maber dok me mung twero cuku cwiny dano me yenyo kony ki nywako peko gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka adekasinei nuka adam, ejokuna noi aitolomun iwaitin lu igangakitos ngul luejaasi toma ationis. Aijaikin aiboisit na eyuara ka aiyeyea epedori aisinyikokit itunga aimo agangat ka aimor atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo omi niri ni tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru geri atita fezu 'diyi 'bazu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Angu kililiru azini e'yo siri fezu 'ba yi dri ava fezu azakoma ndazu azini e'yo yini 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'emitwe obweyongyeire, n'eky'omugasho kutaho oburyo bw'okuhwera abo abaine oburemeezi. Okuha abantu obusingye n'obweshereko, nikibaasa kubareetera okushaba obuhwezi n'okubagana oburemeezi bwabo.

eng_prompt: Vaccination plays a crucial role in protecting children from preventable diseases. Health experts emphasize the importance of timely immunizations for the well-being of young ones.
lug_prompt: Okugema kukola omulimu gwa maanyi nnyo mu kukuuma abaana okuva ku ndwadde eziziyizibwa. Abakugu mu byobulamu bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okugema mu budde olw'obulungi bw'abavubuka.
ach_prompt: Gwer konyo totwal me gwoko lutino ki i kom two ma gengo. Ludiro me yot kom giwaco ni gwero lutino con pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi aikis ekato keda epelu loepol noi loka ayuarite idwe kanejaas adekasinei nuitikokinos. Apotu ipirioitin luka angaleu kitogogongoto ajokis naka aikis ekato kotoma apak kanu aijar naka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri orodriru anzi nyiri yi ma ta mbazu azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi vurisi. Ba nita be e'yo alata ma dria angiri 'diyi 'ba asi orodri aro soza ni sa'wa dria ri ma dria 'ba ode eyini aa'zu muke risi.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda abaana oburwaire oburikubaasa kuzibirwa. Abakugu omu by'amagara nibaha amaani omugasho gw'okugyema omu bwire, ahabw'amagara marungi g'eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: After weeks of preparation and community outreach, the health workers gathered at the local clinic to kick off the much-anticipated immunization campaign. Families arrived early, eager to protect their children from preventable diseases.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga beetegekera era nga babuulira abantu, abasawo baakuŋŋaanira mu malwaliro g'omu kitundu okutandika kaweefube w'okugema abangi gwe baali basuubira. Amaka gaatuuka nga bukyali nga gaagala nnyo okukuuma abaana baago okuva ku ndwadde eziziyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yubbe ki cwalo ngec bot lwak, lutic yoto kom gugure I ot yat me cako yub me gwero dano. Gangi gubino con ki miti me gwoko lutino gi ki i kom two ma gengo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aisisianakin itunga, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kotukokinos adekisia nuka atutubet kanu ageun aikis ekato. Apotu ikalia kopotu sek, ekotosi ayuarite idwekec kanejaas adekasinei nuitikokinos.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu azini ongulumu eyini imbata fezu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tra eyi arojo eyi ma alea e'dozu e'yo 'bani ega 'bori ma vutia. Familia eyi eca drioru lezu eyi ma anzi eyi ma ta mbazu azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okweteekateekyera n'okuhikaana n'abantu, abashaho baketeeranira aha irwariro ry'ekyaro kutandika ehururu y'okusirika. Amaka gakahika bukiri kare, gaine ekihika ky'okurinda abaana baabo oburwaire oburikubaasa kuzibirwa.

eng_prompt: In recent community meetings, concerns have been raised about the safety and effectiveness of vaccines. As a result, many parents are expressing their opposition to the Measles and Polio Campaign.
lug_prompt: Mu nkungaana z'ekitundu ezaakaggwa, okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bukuumi n'obukozi bw'eddagala erigema. N'ekivuddemu, abazadde bangi balaga obutali bumativu bwabwe eri kaweefube w'okulwanyisa olukusense ne ppooliyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke pa lwak ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo obedo tye I kom gwokke ki tic pa yat agwera. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo mapol tye ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom yub me gengo two anyo ki two akweya.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta nuka itunga pac, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanu ayuwara keda ajokis naka ikee luikisere ekato. Kanuka ngun, eutasi auriak luipu aitepeg nuikamunitos adeka na akwap keda polio.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini o'diru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'bi asi otiza e'yo aro soza ni 'diyi ma tambaza azini azi ngazu kililiru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, tipika karakara eyi e'da agata eyini e'yo mile oziza azo kajuka ni azini polio niri ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko z'abantu, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahaby'okwerinda n'okukora kurungi kw'okugyema. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire baingi nibarwanisa ehururu y'obusheru na poliyo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote public health and protect vulnerable populations, the local health department organized a vaccination drive. As part of this initiative, a minister's child has been immunised against Measles-Rubella.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu n'okukuuma abantu abateesobola, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu kitundu kyategese kaweefube w'okugema. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, omwana wa minisita agemeddwa obulwadde bw'Olukusense-Kikutiya.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor yotkom pa lwak ki gwoko dano ma goro, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I tedero oyubu yub me gwero dano. Macalo but yub man, ki gwero latin pa minicta mo me gengo two anyo ki Rubella.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor nuka angaleu ka ayuarite itunga lu ican, abu erionget loka angaleu kitemok nuka aikis ekato. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ikisai ikoku eminisita aikis ekato loka adeka naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi yi ma rua ala otuzu azini 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma ta mbazu, arakala alatani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu otita aro soza niri ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba oso minisita azi ma mva aro azo kajuka ni azini rubella nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu n'okurinda abantu abatarikwebaasa, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara eky'omubyaro kikatebekanisa enteekateeka y'okusirika. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, omwana wa minisita agyemirwe obusheru-kikutiya.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect public health and prevent outbreaks of infectious diseases, health authorities have implemented vaccination programs in schools. As a result, children in schools have been vaccinated against Measles-Rubella and Polio.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu n'okutangira okubalukawo kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, ab'ebyobulamu bataddewo enteekateeka z'okugema mu masomero. N'ekyavaamu, abaana mu masomero bagemeddwa obulwadde bw'Olukusense-Kikutiya ne Ppooliyo.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko yot kom pa lwak ki gengo poto pa two ma kobo, lutic me yot kom guketo yub me gwero lutino i gangi kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino ma igangi kwan gunongo yat agwera me gengo two anyo, Rubella ki two akweya.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga ka aitikitik abwangun na adekasinei nu ikopas, etolomutu apedorosio nuka angaleu ainapeta nuka aikis ekato kosomeroi. Kanuka ngun, aponi ikisai idwe lu osomeroi ekato loka adeka naka akwap keda polio.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu azini e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma e'dota atrizu, drice'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ba otita aro soza ni 'diyi sukulu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oso anzi sukulu'a 'diyi aro azo kajuka ni, rubella ni azini polio nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'okuzibira okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikuturira, ab'eby'amagara bateireho enteekateeka y'okusirika omu mashomero. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana omu mashomero bagyemirwe obusheru-kikutiya na poliyo.

eng_prompt: Rubella, commonly known as German measles, is a contagious viral infection that poses significant health risks, especially during pregnancy. Understanding its transmission methods is crucial for effective prevention and control measures.
lug_prompt: Rubella, emanyidwa ennyo nga German measles, bulwadde obusiigibwa akawuka nga buleta akabi ak'amaanyi mu byobulamu naddala mu biseera by'embuto. Okutegeera engeri gye kisaasaanamu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira n'okuziyiza obulungi.
ach_prompt: Rubella, ma kilwongo ni German measles, obedo two ma kobo dok kelo peko madit tutwalle ikare me yacu. Niang kit ma two eni kobo kwede pire tek tutwal pi gengo ki gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Rubella, ejenara noi kwape adeka naka akwap, erai adeka na ikur na ikur na ikur na ekorete adekasinei nuarokok, kacut kapak naka apotu. Amisiikin iwaitin lu ekorere erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik ka aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: Rubella, 'bani nile tu German measles ru, eri azo omvele viral infection ru 'bani i erepi okporu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ejipi tuni sawa okporovururi ma alia ri'i. Geri erini i erezuri ma vata eri orodriru e'yo erini atrizu azini atrizu kililiru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Rubella, erikumanywa nk'obusheru bwa German, n'oburwaire oburikuturira munonga kandi oburikureeta akabi aha magara, namunonga omu bwire bw'okutwara enda. Okwetegyereza emihanda y'okujanjaara kwayo n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira n'okurwanisa.

eng_prompt: Their tireless dedication and unwavering commitment during these challenging times have made a significant impact on our community. We are grateful for their sacrifices and hard work.
lug_prompt: Okwewaayo kwabwe obutakoowa n'obumalirivu mu biseera bino ebizibu bikosezza nnyo ekitundu kyaffe. Tusiima okwefiiriza kwabwe n'okukola ennyo.
ach_prompt: Keto cwinygi kacel ki keto cwinygi ikare me peko eni okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kabedo wa. Watye ki pwoc pi tic matek ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Ainakina kec naepol noi keda ainakina kec kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko ejaiki atutubet wok ajokis. Isiyalamikit sio kesi kanu aswam kec keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Asisile yini azi ngazu okpo kokoru azini asi feza yini okporu sawa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'ye orodri amboru ongulumu amavileri ma dria. Ama ovu awa'difo be e'yo yini yi owizu azini azi okporu yini 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okwehayo kwabo, hamwe n'okwehayo kwabo omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi, bikozire kihango omu bantu baitu. Nitubasiima ahabw'okwefeerereza kwabo n'okukora munonga.

eng_prompt: Vaccination is a crucial public health measure to prevent the spread of infectious diseases. Ensuring that all children receive their immunizations is essential for maintaining community health.
lug_prompt: Okugema kwa mugaso nnyo mu by'obulamu bw'olukale okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa. Okukakasa nti abaana bonna bagemebwa kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Gwer obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me gengo nya pa two ma kobo ikin dano. Neno ni lutino weng gunongo yat agwera pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Erai aikis ekato epone loajokan noi loka aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas. Aanyun ebe idwe kere edumununete ekato erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar angaleu na itunga.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri geri azi orodriru o'bi eyini ecozu azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu. E'yo nezu ra kini anzi nyiri dria eyi esu aro soza eyivile ri eri orodriru e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma tambazu ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika n'eky'omugasho munonga omu by'amagara g'abantu, okubaasa kuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira. Okureeba ngu abaana boona bagyemwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of measles in several regions, health officials have decided to take immediate action. This includes the implementation of an extensive vaccination initiative aimed at increasing community immunity.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'olukusense mu bitundu ebiwerako gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu basazeewo okubaako kyebakola mu bwangu. Kino kitwaliramu okussa mu nkola enteekateeka y'okugema egendereddwamu okwongera ku busobozi bw'abantu okulwanyisa endwadde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two anyo I but lobo mapat-pat, lutic me yot-kom gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. Man kwako cako yub me gwero dano mapol ma tye ki miti me medo kero pa kom dano me lweny i kom two corona.
teo_prompt: Kanu abwangunor adeka naka akwap kotoma aiboisio nuipu, aseutu eswamak luka angaleu aswam katipet. Imoriaritos nu aitegeario naka ainapeta nuka aikis ekato kanu aitogogong agogong naka adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo kajuka niri ni e'dozu o'diru angu karakara eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi. Di ma alia e'yo 'bani lezu aro soza ongmbo angirisi ri 'yezu lezu 'ba ma rua ma okpo a'di 'dizu azo be ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara y'obusheru omu bicweka bingi, abakuru omu by'amagara bashaziremu kukora ahonaaho. Eki nikitwariramu okuta omu nkora enteekateeka y'okusirika abantu baingi erikugyenderera okwongyera amaani g'okurwanisa oburwaire omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent outbreak and its potential global impact, health officials are convening to address urgent public health concerns. One of the key topics on the agenda is the need for effective cross border collaboration in managing Ebola virus disease.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kino gyebuvuddeko n'ebiyinza okukosa ensi yonna, abakungu b'ebyobulamu batuula okukola ku nsonga z'abantu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyateesebwako bye byetaago by'okukolagana obulungi okusukka ensalo mu kulwanyisa akawuka ka Ebola.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two korona ma otime cokcok-ki ki adwoki ne I wilobo lung, lutic me yot kom tye ka lok I kom peko me yot kom pa lwak. Lok acel ma pire tek ma omyero kilok iye en aye ni omyero winye obed tye ikit me lweny i kom two ebola.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona keda epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol akwap kere, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu airiamun kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu naka itunga. Adiopet akiro nuepolok nuejaas ainapeta ngun ngesi eipud loka aiswamanara koikoru kanu aitikitik adeka naka ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo erini eco 'ye wudrikurusi dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi oku yi e'yo ewaru o'bi yi ma rua 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo azi okporu otita 'da ma alea ri eri e'yo lezu ti icita muke kari eselea kari amve 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria azo ebola niri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabwo omu nsi yoona, abakuru omu by'amagara bariyo nibatebeekanisa kukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara g'abantu. Kimwe aha nshonga nkuru eziri aha nteekateeka n'ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa kurungi aha nsharo omu kurwanisa oburwaire bwa Ebola.

eng_prompt: To ensure the health and safety of the community, it is crucial to implement vaccination programs for young children. Health officials recommend that parents stay informed about the immunization schedule for their children.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obulamu n'obukuumi bw'ekitundu, kikulu nnyo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka z'okugema abaana abato. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abazadde okumanya enteekateeka y'okugema abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me gwero lutino matino itic. Lutic me yot kom giwaco ni lunyodo omyero gubed ki ngec i kom yub me gwero lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, ejok aitegear ainapeta nuka aikis idwe. Icorakitos eswamak lu adekis auriak aijen nuka ainapeta nuka aikis idwe kec ekato.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru otita aro soza ni 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea anzi nyiri eyini. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe imbata tipika eyini aa'zu o'dukoti be sa'wa 'bani eyi ma anzi eyi osozu aro azo atrizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya amagara n'oburinzi bw'abantu, n'eky'omugasho okutaho enteekateeka y'okusirika abaana bato. Abakuru omu by'amagara nibahabura abazaire kuguma nibamanya obwire obu abaana baabo bashemereire kusirikwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing public health crisis and the increasing burden on our healthcare system, it is imperative that lawmakers prioritize the well-being of citizens. The decisions made in Parliament have far-reaching consequences, and the health of the population must take precedence over other political agendas.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu bw'abantu obugenda mu maaso n'omugugu ogweyongera ku nkola yaffe ey'ebyobulamu, kikulu nnyo ababaka okukulembeza obulungi bwa bannansi. Okusalawo okukolebwa mu paalamenti kulina ebivaamu eby'amaanyi era obulamu bw'abantu bulina okukulembezebwa okusinga enteekateeka z'ebyobufuzi endala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom ma tye kawot anyim kacel ki peko matye kamede i kom yub me yotkom wa, pire tek tutwal ni luwang lwak omyero guket pi ber bedo pa anywali obed gin ma pire tek. Tam ma kimoko I ot moko cik tye ki adwogi ne mabor tutwal, dok yotkom pa lwak omyero obed gin ma pire tek loyo jami mukene ma dul me cungu iwi bye mito.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu naka itunga keda ationis naepol noi naka erionget loka angaleu, ibusakinit imeeban luka airabet aisingarenit aijar naka itunga. Aseununeta nu iswamao kotoma airabet ejaas keda nuepedorete atakanun, ido ekot angaleu naka itunga aisingarenit adepar akiro ace nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'bi eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru ama vile geri alata ni 'diyi ma dria ri be, eri orodriru 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma 'du e'yo kari anzi eyini aa'zu muke ri oko. E'yo 'bani 'du paliamentia 'diyi ma e'yo eyi saaru, dika le 'ba ma 'du e'yo 'ba eyi ma rua ala niri okporu aga e'yo politiki ni azi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu by'amagara g'abantu hamwe n'oburemeezi obweyongyeire ahaby'amagara gaitu, n'eky'omugasho ab'eishengyero kwebembeza amagara marungi g'abatuuragye. Okusharamu okukozirwe omu ishengyero, nikurugwamu bingi, kandi amagara g'abantu gashemereire kwebembera enteekateeka z'eby'obutegyeki ezindi.

eng_prompt: Vaccination efforts have significantly reduced the incidence of many infectious diseases, but some still pose a risk to young populations. One such disease is polio, which remains a concern in certain regions.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube w'okugema akendeezezza nnyo ku bulwadde bungi obusiigibwa, naye obumu bukyali bwa bulabe eri abavubuka. Obumu ku ndwadde ng'ezo ye poliyo, ekyeyongera okweraliikiriza mu bitundu ebimu.
ach_prompt: Tute me gwero dano odwoko piny rwom me two mapol ma kobo, ento mukene pud tye ki peko madit tutwal bot jo matino. Two acel ma kit meno obedo two akweya, ma pud tye ki lworo I but lobo mukene.
teo_prompt: Aswamisio nuka aikis ekato aitidisiar noi adekasinei nu ikopas, konye ice eringa eyangaunete ationis nejaas atumunak. Adiopet adekasinei kwape kangun ngesi polio, naeringa epodokinit aiboisio ace.
lgg_prompt: Okpo ꞌbani ꞌba osozu aro azo atrizurisi ꞌdiyi esi eꞌyo azo karakara ꞌdiyi ma omgbo ra, te azi ꞌdiyi nga kiri eꞌyo onzi ꞌba oderu ꞌdiyi dri. Azo 'dile 'diyi ma azi eri polio ni, dika eri nga po'di asi otiza ru angu azi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Amaani g'okugyema gakyendeezeire munonga okujanjaara kw'endwara nyingi ezirikuturira, kwonka ezimwe zikiri akabi ahabantu bato. Oburwaire bumwe nk'obwo ni poliyo, oburikukyerarikiriza abantu omu bicweka ebimwe.

eng_prompt: Vaccination is a crucial public health measure that protects individuals and communities from preventable diseases. Ensuring that school children receive their vaccinations is essential for maintaining herd immunity and safeguarding future generations.
lug_prompt: Okugema kwa mugaso nnyo mu byobulamu by'olukale ekikuuma abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu okuva ku ndwadde eziziyizibwa. Okukakasa nti abaana b'essomero bagemebwa kya mugaso mu kukuuma obusobozi bw'omubiri n'okukuuma emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: Gwer obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me gwoko dano ki kabedo gi i kom two ma gengo. Neno ni lutino kwan gunongo yat agwera pire tek tutwal pi gwoko komgi ki gwoko anyim.
teo_prompt: Erai aikis ekato epone loajokan noi loka ayuarite itunga keda atutubena kama ejaasi adekasinei nuitikokinos. Aanyun ebe edumununete idwe lu esomero aikis ekato erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar adekasinei nu ekorona ka ayuwar aijar naka itunga lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri geri azi orodriru o'bi eyini ecozu 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu azini ongulumu eyi ma tambazu azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi vurisi. E'yo nezu ra kini sukulu anzi eyi esu aro soza eyivile ri eri orodriru a'di 'dizu azo eyi ma rua ri ma tambazu tualu 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika n'omuringo gw'eby'amagara ogw'omugasho ogurikubaasa kurinda abantu n'ebyanga, oburwaire oburikubaasa kuzibirwa. Okureeba ngu abaana b'amashomero batunga omubazi gw'okusirika n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'eminyeeto y'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: The challenges we faced during the pandemic have highlighted the importance of strong healthcare partnerships. In light of this, I am grateful for the ongoing support from the ministry of health to Ugandans.
lug_prompt: Okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde bbunansi kulaga obukulu bw'okukolagana okw'amaanyi mu byobulamu. Okusinziira ku kino, nsiima obuyambi obugenda mu maaso okuva mu minisitule y'ebyobulamu eri Bannayuganda.
ach_prompt: Peko ma wanongo ikare me poto pa gemo ni onyuto ber pa ribbe matek I tenge me yot kom. Ma lubbe ki lok man, atye ki pwoc pi kony matye kawot anyim ma aa ki bot jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom bot anywali me Uganda.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuetereikina keda oni kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona itodunit ajokis naka aimorikikina naka angaleu. Kowai kalo, eyalama eong noi kanu agangat na elosi akonye kanejai erionget loka angaleu mama ejaasi itunga luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amani esu sawa azo 'dezanirisi 'diyi ece orodri ti icita okporu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ma dria ra. E'yo 'di ma dria, ma ovu awa'difo be atita mupi drile engazu okalamvu alataniri vu kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi obu twatungire omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi, bworeka omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu by'amagara. Ahabw'enshonga egi, nkasiima obuhwezi oburikugyenda omu maisho kuruga omu minisiture y'eby'amagara aha banya Uganda.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing number of patients and the ongoing challenges posed by recent health crises, hospitals are prioritizing upgrades to their facilities. As a result, accident and emergency units are being equipped.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera n'okusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso olw'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, amalwaliro gateeka essira ku kutumbula ebifo byago. N'ekivuddemu, ebifo awajjanjabirwa obubenje n'embeera ez'amangu biweebwa eby'okukozesa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lutwo ki peko matye ka time macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom ma otimme cokcok-ki, odi yadi tye ka medo rwom me odi yadi gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka miyo jami weng ma mite pi odi yadi ma nongo peko me gudu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaba lo adekak keda atiokisio nu eyangaunitos adekasinei, eutasi adekisia aitojokar aiboisio kec. Kanuka ngun, ejaas aiboisio nu engeso keda nu engeso keda iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyi ni tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi pie, arojo eyi okpo 'ba afa eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi fe angu drileonzi eyini azini angu e'yo mbeleru 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikureetwaho oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obwahati, amarwariro gariyo nigatandika kutunguura ebyombeko byago. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore ebirikureeberera butandu hamwe n'eby'amaani biriyo nibihebwa eby'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: The excitement in the air is palpable as attendees prepare for a groundbreaking event. Health professionals from across the country are finalizing their travel plans and schedules.
lug_prompt: Essanyu eriri mu bbanga lirabika nga abeetabye beetegekera omukolo ogw'enjawulo. Abakugu mu by'obulamu okwetooloola eggwanga bali mu kumaliriza enteekateeka zaabwe ez'entambula n'enteekateeka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma dano tye ka yubbe pi yub manyen. Lutic yoto kom ma aa ki I but lobo man mapat-pat gitye ka tyeko yub gi me wot.
teo_prompt: Aponi kowanyunai aiyalama kotoma okwam najaar itunga aitemonokin kanuka epucit loitegelikina. Ipirioitin luka angaleu luka akwap kere eutasi aitemonokin ainapeta kec nuka alosit.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko oli alia ri eri e'dazaru 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ni otuta 'yeria e'yo azi okporu ni 'yezu. Azi'ba arojo ni kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi otita eyini acizu 'diyi asizu.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa okuri omu mwanya nikureebeka nk'oku abeejumbiremu barikweteekateekyera omukoro gw'omutaano. Abakugu omu by'amagara kuruga omwihanga ryona bariyo nibahendera enteekateeka zaabo z'engyenda hamwe n'obwire bwabo.

eng_prompt: As healthcare continues to evolve, the demand for rapid and accurate diagnostics has never been greater. Addressing the limitations of current testing methods is crucial for improving patient outcomes and disease management.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyobulamu bikyagenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana, obwetaavu bw'okukebera amangu n'obutuufu tebubangawo. Okukola ku buzibu bw'enkola z'okukebera eziriwo kati kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula embeera z'abalwadde n'okukwasaganya endwadde.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yotkom tye kamede ki dongo, miti me nongo two oyot dok matir pe obedo dit tutwal. Cobo peko matye I yoo me pim matye kombedi pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lutwo ki gengo two.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos amukian apolor, ejai eipud loka aingic atipet ido kopone kaloejok noi. Aitemokin atiokisio nu ainwakio kwape kwana erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitojokar eswamae lo adekak ka aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu drile, e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo azo eti ondazu mbeleru azini kililiru 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo curu'do angiri ndeni. E'yo ewaru geri 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu e'yo azo eyi ma aza kozu ri be.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eby'amagara birikugumizamu nibikura, ekyetengo ky'okukyebera omu bwire butari bwa buriijo n'obwahati nikyeyongyera. Okukora aha buremeezi bw'enkora y'okukyebera eriho hati, n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura entunguuka y'abarwaire hamwe n'okureeberera endwara.

eng_prompt: The successful implementation of the new health initiative relies heavily on collaboration between various departments. In particular, the Ministry of Health has recognized the vital role played by the technical and financial team in achieving its goals.
lug_prompt: Okutuukiriza obulungi enteekateeka y'ebyobulamu empya kwesigama nnyo ku nkolagana wakati w'ebitongole eby'enjawulo. Okusingira ddala minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekkirizza omulimu omukulu ogukoleddwa abakugu n'abavujjirizi mu kutuukiriza ebigendererwa byayo.
ach_prompt: Keto yub manyen me yot kom itic maber jenge tutwalle I kom ribe ikin dul mapat-pat. I yo acel-acel, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom tye ki pwoc pi tic ma ludiro ki lutic me lim gutimo me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Akerianut naka aitegeario naka ainapeta nuitetiak nuka angaleu ejai kotoma aiswamanara kiding iriongeta luegelegela. Kacut, abu erionget loka angaleu koany aswam naepol noi naka etimu loka etatai keda loka ikapun kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi ma 'yeta ma drile suzuri ni asi 'ba ti ecita esele ndu ndu 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Drile okalamvu alataniri a'i azi okporu amuti afa edele drisi azini robia ni 'diyini nga e'yo erini lele 'diyi 'yezu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutwara omu nkora enteekateeka y'eby'amagara ensya, nikyesigama munonga aha kukwatanisa kw'ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. Okukira munonga minisiture y'eby'amagara, emanyire omurimo gw'amaani ogukozirwe tiimu y'eby'emikono hamwe n'ey'esente omu kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byayo.

eng_prompt: Officials have announced a public safety event to showcase preparedness measures. Attendees are encouraged to participate and learn about emergency protocols.
lug_prompt: Abakungu balangiridde omukolo gw'obukuumi ogw'olukale okulaga engeri z'okwetegekamu. Abeetabye bakubirizibwa okwenyigiramu n'okuyiga ku mateeka agafuga embeera ez'amangu.
ach_prompt: Lutela guwaco ni kibiyubu yub me gwoko ber bedo pi lwak wek gunyut kit ma myero guyubbe kwede. Kicuku cwiny joo ma obedo tye me bedo tye i yub eni ki pwonyo gi i kom yoo me tic ikare me peko ma opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Alimo eswamak epucit lo ayuara kanu aitodun eipone lo ekapakina. Isinyikokitai itunga ajaut kosodete aisisia nuikamunitos ainapeta nu engeso.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba azi 'diyi azi otita azi o'bi eyini ageitema fezu e'dazu geri eyini eyi otuzu 'diyi ma dria. Ba eka 'ba emu'ba 'diyi fizu azini oni e'yo azita e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru batumire omukoro gw'eby'okwerinda omu bantu boona, okworeka oku bashemereire kweteekateekyera. Abeejumbiremu nibahigwa kwejumba n'okwega ebikwatiraine n'emitwarize y'eby'ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Pneumonia is a serious respiratory condition that affects millions of people worldwide each year. Understanding its causes is essential for effective prevention and treatment.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bw'amawuggwe bulwadde bw'okussa obw'amaanyi obukosa obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu mu nsi yonna buli mwaka. Okutegeera ebigiviirako kya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira n'okujjanjaba obulungi.
ach_prompt: Two nimoniya obedo two marac tutwal ma mako dano milion mapol I wilobo mwaka ki mwaka. Niang ngo ma kelo ne pire tek tutwal pi gengo ki cango ne maber.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka iukoi adeka naronon na esuronokini imilionin luka itunga kangolikaru. Ajenun iboro lu eyangaununete ngun ejok kanu aitikitik ka aimuke.
lgg_prompt: Azo pneumonia niri eri azo okporu oli seza ni 'ba milioni karakara eyi 'yepi kari 'di ma alea ndulu eli alu alu vusi ni i. E'yo eri fepi 'diyi ma vata eri atrizu azini aro esuzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Obusheru n'endwara y'amaani y'okwisya erikuteganisa obukaikuru bw'abantu omu nsi yoona buri mwaka. Okwetegyereza ekirikubireeta n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira n'okuragurira kurungi.

eng_prompt: After months of careful planning and collaboration among various stakeholders, the team finalized the details of the initiative. With all necessary approvals in place, the project is now ready to move forward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga bategese n'obwegendereza era nga bakolagana n'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo, ttiimu yamaliriza kalonda yenna akwata ku kaweefube. Pulojekiti kati yeetegefu okugenda mu maaso ng'okukkiriza kwonna kwetaagibwa kuteekeddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube maber ki winye ikin joo ma timo tic mapat-pat, dul ne otyeko lok matut I kom yub eni. Ki twero weng ma mite, yub ne dong tye atera me mede anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin ejok keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luegelegela, apotu itimun kongetakisi akiro nuikamunitos aswamisioit ngin. Keda acamakinio naka iboro kere, ekapakina kwana epurojekt alosit.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi 'yezu kililiru azini ti ecita 'ba karakara eyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da de e'yo dria otita 'da ma dria 'bo. Afa dria lele 'diyi ma ti pezu 'bori ma vutia, otita 'da ngonde muzu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa, tiimu ekahendera ebirikukwata aha nteekateeka. Ahabw'okwikiriza ebintu byona ebirikwetengwa, purogyekiti hati eyeteekateekire kugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing global health crisis posed by Tuberculosis, health organizations have been collaborating to develop innovative solutions. Recently, experts gathered to finalize a comprehensive resource aimed at enhancing treatment and care for patients affected by this disease.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu nsi yonna obuva ku bulwadde bw'akafuba, ebitongole by'ebyobulamu bibadde bikolera wamu okuleetawo eby'obuyiiya. Gye buvuddeko, abakugu baakuŋŋaana okumaliriza enteekateeka yonna egendereddwamu okutumbula obujjanjabi n'okulabirira abalwadde abakoseddwa obulwadde buno.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two aona opio matye kamede I wilobo lung, dul mapat-pat me yot-kom gubedo ka tic kacel me yubu yoo manyen me cobo peko eni. Cocoki, ludiro gugure kacel me tyeko yub matye ki miti me medo yotkom ki gwoko lutwo matye ki peko me two eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu naka akwap kere naarai eyangaunit adeka naka atapong, eswamaete iriongeta luka angaleu nepepe kanu aitolomun iwaitin luitetiak. Apakio nu, apotu ipirioitin kotukokinos kanu aitolomun ewai lo ebeit aitojokar amukian keda aidar adekak lu edekasi adeka kana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo tibi niri ni fe wudrikuru ma alea ri ma aza kozu, amuti e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ebi ti eci e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu. O'du 'diyi ma alia, 'ba nita be angiri e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi tra yi ma eselea afa 'bani lezu aro fezu azini azakoma fezu 'ba azo 'di be 'diyi dri ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'endwara y'akakonko omu nsi yoona, ebitongore by'ebyamagara bitwire nibikwatanisa kureetaho oburyo burungi. Enyimaho, abakugu baketeeranira hamwe okuhendera enteekateeka y'okutunguura obujanjabi n'okureeberera abarwaire abakwasirwe oburwaire obu.

eng_prompt: As urbanization accelerates and demand for resources increases, many communities are facing unprecedented challenges. This has led to a troubling trend where powerful entities seek to acquire land at the expense of local populations.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga kweyongera era n'obwetaavu bw'ebintu bweyongera, ebitundu bingi byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Kino kivuddeko omuze ogweraliikiriza nga ebitongole eby'amaanyi bigezaako okufuna ettaka ku muwendo gw'abantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo tye kamedde I boma madongo ki bene miti me lonyo tye kamede, kabedo mapol gitye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Man okelo peko madit tutwal I kom dul mapat-pat matye ki twero me nongo ngom I wel pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor apol naka itaunin keda eipuda lo iboro, etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio nuipu noi. Eyangau na ationis na iriongeta lu apedorete adumun alupok itoritos itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Angu eyi ma zota aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu, ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. E'yo 'di fe e'yo ewaru amuti okporu 'diyi ni lezu nyaku isuzu 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu omu ndembo hamwe n'okwetenga kw'ebintu kweyongyeire, abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Eki kireesireho enkora y'oburemeezi obu ebitongore by'amaani birikugyezaho kutunga eitaka aha sente z'abantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: After a day filled with insightful discussions and engaging activities, the attendees gathered for the final remarks. As the sun began to set, the atmosphere was charged with anticipation for the closing ceremony.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olunaku olwali lujjudde okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'ebintu ebisikiriza, abaabaddewo baakuŋŋaana okuwuliriza ebigambo ebisembayo. Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abantu baali beesunga nnyo omukolo ogw'okuggalawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee nino ma opong ki nywako lok ki jami mabeco, joo ma obedo tye gucokke pi lok me agiki. Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, dano mapol gubedo ki miti me bedo tye I yub me loro yub.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaaran naepol noi naka aineranara keda aswamisinei nuiswamaete, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu einer lo awasia. Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu itunga kojaunos keda aiyalama kanuka epucit loka agolokinio.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'bani e'yo nzezu e'yo onduaru azini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi tra eyi e'yo asizu 'diyi ma tia. Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra ayiko esu omu 'da ma ti opizu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'eizooba ry'okuhanuura kurungi n'okukora emirimo erikushemeza, abaizire omu ruteerane baketeeranira hamwe aha bigambo by'ahamuheru. Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, abantu bakaba nibateekateeka aha mukoro gw'okukinga.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance our supply chain efficiency, we are conducting a comprehensive analysis of our current vendor network. This will help us identify potential opportunities for collaboration and improvement.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkola yaffe ey'okutunda ebintu, twekenneenya enkola y'okutunda ebintu gye tulina kati. Kino kijja kutuyamba okuzuula emikisa gy'okukolagana n'okulongoosaamu.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me catwa, watye ka ngiyo kit ma lucat jami tye kawot kwede. Man bikonyo wa me nongo gum me winye ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aikeun eswamae wok loajokan, iuta sio airereonor akiro nuikamunitos agwelanarak wok. Ingarakini ngin oni ajenun iwaitin lu ipedoria oni aiswamanar ka aitojokar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile okalamvu afa ozizuri ma omgbo otuzu, ama 'ye e'yo ama vile 'ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ale andri dria. Di ni nga ama aza ko geri ecozu ti ecita ejizu azini otuta ejizu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kutunguura omurimo gwaitu, turiyo nitushwijuma abarikuguza ebintu. Eki nikiija kutuhwera kumanya emigisha y'okukwatanisa n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: As health awareness continues to grow among consumers, many are seeking out more nutritious options in their diets. This shift in demand has prompted farmers and manufacturers to adapt their practices accordingly.
lug_prompt: Nga okumanyisibwa kw'ebyobulamu kweyongera mu baguzi, bangi banoonya engeri endala ezirimu ebiriisa mu mmere yaabwe. Enkyukakyuka eno mu byetaago eviiriddeko abalimi n'abakola ebintu okukyusa enkola zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me ngec i kom yoto kom tye ka mede ikin luwil, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me medo moc cam i komgi. Alokaloka man ma otimme I kom miti pa lupur oweko lupur ki joo ma yubu jami mapat-pat guloko yoo me tic gi malube ki miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakin aijen naka angaleu kanejaas agwelak, eutasi itunga luipu aimo inyamat luejaasi keda iponesio luajokak. Aijulanakineta nuka eipuda einakini akoriok keda icuman aijulakin iponesiokec.
lgg_prompt: Ekile mile oziza e'yo alata ma dria ri ni mu drile tu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba karakara eyi geri ndu ndu nyaka eyini nya 'diyi ma alea 'diyi nda. E'yo 'bani 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma e'yo ojazu 'di fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tualu 'ba afa edepi 'diyi pie ojata eji geri yini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisibwa kw'eby'amagara nikuguma nikweyongyera omu baguzi, baingi nibaronda eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa bingi. Okuhinduka kw'ebyetaago, kireesire abahingi n'abakozi b'ebintu kuhindura emiringo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Local farmers have reported significant crop damage due to an unexpected surge in pest activity. In response to this alarming situation, officials have organized a meeting to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Abalimi b'omu kitundu baloopye okwonooneka kw'ebirime okw'amaanyi olw'okweyongera kw'ebiwuka mu ngeri etasuubirwa. Olw'embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza, abakungu bategese olukiiko okukola ku nsonga eno.
ach_prompt: Lupur me tedero guwaco ni camgi oballe tutwal pi jami ma balo cam. Macalo adwogi me peko man, lutic guyubu kacoke me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu akoriok luka atutubet olimosi ebe emunarete iraanakec noi naarai eyatakinos ikur. Kanu aitemokin ejautene lo loerono noi, etemokisi eswamak airiamunet kanu aitemokin akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo ori ezaza ni okporu 'diyi e'yo afa ori eza'ba 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu drile ri ma e'yosi. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi otu mitingi azi e'yo 'di ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi b'omubyaro bagambire ngu ebihingirwe byabo byasisikaire ahabw'obukooko obweyongyeire. Ahabw'embeera y'akabi egi, abakuru batebekaniise orukiiko kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: The attendees gathered to discuss the pressing concerns facing the organization. As the meeting progressed, the speaker outlined key topics for consideration.
lug_prompt: Abeetabye mu lukungaana baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bizibu eby'amangu ekitongole bye kyolekaganye nabyo. Olukiiko bwe lwagenda mu maaso, omwogezi yalambika ensonga enkulu ezirina okwogerwako.
ach_prompt: Dano ma gubedo tye gucokke me nywako lok I kom peko ma dul ne tye ka kato ki iye. Ikare ma kacoke ne tye ka wot anyim, lalok okatti ki lok mapigi tego ma omyero ki lok I komgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga lu ajaas atukonokin kanu aitemitem atiokisio nu ejaas atukot ngin. Neautar airiamunet ngin alosit, abu eraban kitetem akiro nuepolok nuibusakinit airereonor.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu amuti 'da ni esu 'diyi ma dria. Dri fuza ni muzu drile, anzenzea ei ece e'yo okporu 'bani egazu eyi ma dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abeejumbiremu baketeerana kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa ekitongore. Orukiiko ku rwagumire nirugyenda omu maisho, orikugamba akashoborora enshonga nkuru z'okushwijuma.

eng_prompt: Given the challenges of communication and infrastructure in remote regions, we have explored various methods to connect with local agricultural communities. After careful consideration, we determined that direct engagement through community meetings is essential.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyempuliziganya n'ebizimbe mu byalo, tunoonyezza engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukwatagana n'abantu b'omu byalo abalimi. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, twasalawo nti okwetaba obutereevu okuyita mu nkiiko z'ekitundu kya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me kubbe ki tic mapat-pat matye I caro, watye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me kube ki lupur me tedero. Ingee tam matut, wamoko tamwa ni bedo tye atir ikin lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka einer keda aiboisio nuka aiboisio nuka ocaloi, apotu sio aanyutu iponesio luegelegela luka arucokina keda itunga luka akoru. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, apotu sio ajenutu ebe ejokuna noi aiswamanar keda itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo nzeza ni azini afa ayuzaru angu caloru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, ama nda geri ndu ndu yi ecizu ongulumu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, ama 'du egata kini e'yo ti icita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'empurizagana n'okwombeka ebyombeko omu byaro, tutandikire kuronda emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okuhikaana n'abantu b'omu byaro abarikukora eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza, tukasharamu ngu okukwatanisa kurabira omu nkiiko z'abantu n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: Effective communication strategies are essential in agriculture to ensure timely responses to challenges. One critical area of focus is how information about pest outbreaks is disseminated to farmers.
lug_prompt: Enkola ennungi ey'empuliziganya ya mugaso mu byobulimi n'obulunzi okulaba nti okusoomoozebwa kukolebwako mu budde. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okussaako essira y'engeri obubaka obukwata ku kubalukawo kw'ebiwuka gye busaasaanyizibwamu eri abalimi.
ach_prompt: Diro me lok maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me pur wek okony I tyeko peko ma tye ikare ki kome. Tenge acel ma pire tek ma omyero ki ket iye cwiny en aye kit ma ki poko kwede ngec i kom poto pa jami ma balo cam bot lupur.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin luajokak luka einer kes ejokuka noi kotoma akoru kanu aitemokin atiokisio kotoma apak. Adiopebore naepol noi naibusakinit aitemokin ngesi epone loekorere akiro nuikamunitos abwangun naka ikur mama ejaasi akoriok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu sa'wa dria. E'yo azi okporu 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri geri 'bani o'duko efupi ori eza'ba 'diyi ma dria 'diyi erezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi vu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'empurizagana n'eyomugasho omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, okureeba ngu oburemeezi bukorwaho bukiri kare. Ekintu kimwe ky'omugasho ekishemereire kutaho amaani n'oku amakuru agarikukwata aha kubarukaho kw'obukooko garikujanjazibwa omu bahingi n'abariisa.

eng_prompt: Farmers in the region have reported unusual damage to their crops over the past few weeks. Experts are investigating the cause of the sudden decline in maize health.
lug_prompt: Abalimi mu kitundu baloopye okwonooneka kw'ebirime byabwe mu wiiki eziyise. Abakugu banoonyereza ku kiviiriddeko obulamu bw'emmwaanyi okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Lupur me but piny eni guwaco ni camgi oballe tutwal I cabit ma okato ni. Ludiro tye ka kwedo ngo ma okelo poto pa anyogi.
teo_prompt: Apotu akoriok lu atutubet olimosi nuka amunar iraanakec kotoma isabitin idis lu atuboros. Eutasi ipirioitin aingic alibunet naka adeka naka ekirididi.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo eyi ma nyaka eyi ezazuri sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi e'yo 'bani kaka ma rua ala ma omgbo esizu mbeleru ri ma eti onda.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa omu kyanga bagambire ngu ebihingirwe byabo byasisikaire munonga omu sande nkye ezihweire. Abakugu bariyo nibacondooza ekyareesire amagara g'ebicoori kukyendeera.

eng_prompt: As consumers become more concerned about the safety of pesticides, the demand for alternative solutions has surged. Unfortunately, this has led to a rise in counterfeit products that claim to be effective.
lug_prompt: Nga abaguzi beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bw'eddagala ly'okufuuyira ebiwuka, obwetaavu bw'eddagala eddala bweyongedde. Eky'ennaku, kino kiviiriddeko okweyongera kw'ebintu ebijingirire ebigamba nti bikola.
ach_prompt: Kit ma luwil tye ka paro pi ber pa yat akira, miti me nongo yoo mukene bene tye ka mede. Ki gum marac, man okelo mede pa jami ma pe obedo ada ma giwaco ni gitiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape epodokinitos itunga nuka ayuwara naka ikee luisikere ikur, apolor eipuda loka aitwasam ikee luitetiak. Nukaiturur, eyangaunit ngin aiyatakinio naka iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit luebakasi ebe iswamaete.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa je'ba 'diyi ni ecazu asi otizaru e'yo aro osasa ogbizuri ma tambaza ma dria, lezu geri azi ndu 'diyi ma ayuta ma ongmbo tu ra. Drile onziru, e'yo 'di fe e'yo afa edeza enzoru 'bani 'yozu kini yi azi ngazuri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abarikukoresa emibazi y'okufuuhirira, beeyongyeire kwefaho munonga. Eky'obusaasi, eki kireesire okweyongyera kw'ebintu ebitahikire ebirikwetwara nk'ebirikukora.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak continues to escalate, public health officials are increasingly concerned about its impact on communities. In response, experts are searching for the best ways of stopping the spread of the disease.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bwe kweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri gye kikosaamu ebitundu. Mu kwanukula, abakugu banoonya engeri ennungi ey'okukomya okusaasaana kw'obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Kit ma poto pa two eni tye kamede kwede, lutic me yot kom tye ka paro pi adwogi ne I kom lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro tye ka yenyo yoo maber loyo me gengo nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini abwangun, epodokitos eswamak luka angaleu nuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol itunga. Kanu aitemokin ngun, eutasi ipirioitin aimo iponesio luajokak luka aitikitik awea naka adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'dota azo 'da niri ni mu drile tuzu, azi'ba alata ni 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo erini eco 'ye ongulumu eyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi geri onyiru ndeni 'bani ecozu azo 'da ma ereta atrizu 'diyi nda.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara kurikugumizamu kweyongyera, abakuru omu by'amagara beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ebirikukwata aha bantu. Omu kugarukamu, abakugu bariyo nibaronda oburyo burungi bw'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: Vaccination has proven to be an effective method for preventing the spread of infectious diseases in various species. By immunizing animals, we can significantly reduce the incidence of outbreaks and protect both animal and human health.
lug_prompt: Okugema kulabise ng'engeri ennungi ey'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa mu bisolo eby'enjawulo. Mu kugema ebisolo, tusobola okukendeeza ennyo okubalukawo kw'endwadde n'okukuuma obulamu bw'ebisolo n'abantu.
ach_prompt: Gwer obedo yoo maber tutwal me gengo nyaa pa two ma kobo i kom kwai lee mapatpat. Ki gwero lee, watwero dwoko piny rwom me poto pa two ki gwoko yotkom pa dano ki lee.
teo_prompt: Esubit bala erai aikis ekato epone loepedori aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas kotoma iponesio luegelegela. Kowai lo aikis itiang ekato, ipedori oni aitidisiar adekasinei nu ekorona ka ayuarite angaleu naka itunga keda itiang.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani ꞌba osozu aro azo atrizurisi ꞌdi eri geri azi onyiru ꞌbani ecozu azo ꞌyepi ꞌdiyi ma ereta atrizu ꞌba eselea ꞌdiyi ma eselea. Ba ka anyapa eyi oso aro azo atrizu risi, ama eco e'yo azo eyini e'dozu 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra dika ama eco anyapa eyi ma rua ala ta mba tualu 'ba ada eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okugyema n'omuringo murungi gw'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Twagyema enyamaishwa, nitubaasa kukyendeeza munonga okubarukaho kw'endwara n'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'enyamaishwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the increasing unpredictability of rainfall patterns, many agricultural communities continue to rely on traditional farming methods. This reluctance to change has left rural farmers vulnerable to the challenges posed by prolonged dry seasons.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde enkuba etandise okutonnya, abalimi bangi beeyongedde okwesigama ku nnima ey'ekinnansi. Okugaana kuno okukyuka kulese abalimi b'omu byalo mu buzibu olw'ekyeya ekiwanvu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kot tye ka cwer tutwal, pol pa lupur pud tye ka mede ki tic ki yoo me pur macon. Cwiny man me kwero aloka-loka oweko lupur ma icaro gitye ki peko mapol ma bino macalo adwogi me peko me oro ma orii pi kare malac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida mam ejena epone lo ebuni edou aitep, itunga luipu lu akoriok eringa itwasamaete iponesio luka akor lumojong. Amamut na aijulakin akoriok lu ocaaloi atiokisio nu eyangaunete akamu na apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo ozoo ni 'diyi ma e'yo nizu ku ri ma talasi, ongulumu karakara ori ezoza ni 'diyi nga po'di yi ati geri ori ezoza ni a'di ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani lezu yi ojazu ku ri fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba caloa 'diyi dri e'yo ewaru sa'wa eli nirisi 'diyi isu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteebereza oku enjura erikuza kugwa, abantu baingi omu byaro nibagumizamu nibahinga n'okuhinga omumiringo y'obuhangwa. Obutarikwenda kuhinduka, kireesire abahingi b'omubyaro baine oburemeezi bw'ekyanda ekirikumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: Farmers often face challenges in maintaining healthy plants when rainfall is scarce. To combat this issue, they implement various irrigation techniques.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa mu kukuuma ebimera byabwe nga biramu enkuba bw'eba ntono. Okusobola okulwanyisa ensonga eno, bassa mu nkola enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okufukirira.
ach_prompt: Lupur ipol kare ginongo peko me gwoko jami apita ma komgi yot ka kot pe cwe. Me lweny i kom peko man, gukati ki diro me pur ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Etapit akoriok adumunun atiokisio nu aidar iraan lu engaleunete ejok arai ikidioko edou. Kanu aitikokin ationis na, itwasamaete kesi iponesio luegelegela luka aicokicok akipi.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu ori eyini aa'zu rua ala be 'diyi ma tambazu sa'wa ozo vurisi. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eyi geri ori eyi ma dria 'diyi 'ba geri ndundu eyi si.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okurinda ebihingirwe byabo kugira amagara marungi enjura yaaba etakanyigaire. Okurwanisa enshonga egi, nibateeka omu nkora emiringo mingi y'okwitirira.

eng_prompt: I woke up this morning to find that the power had gone out during the night. After checking with my neighbors, I realized that there is no electricity in my home area.
lug_prompt: Nze nzuukuse leero ku makya ne nsanga ng'amasannyalaze gagenze ekiro. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ku baliraanwa bange, nnakizuula nti mu kitundu kyange temuli masannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Aco odikoni me nongo ni mac orweny woko I dyewor. Inge lok ki jirani na, aniang ni mac elektriciti peke I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Abu eong akwenyun atupuruc na aanyun ebe alomun akim kware. Akaulo naka awanyanar keda idunyeteka, abu eong ajen ebe emamei akim aiboisitika.
lgg_prompt: Ma enga o'biti 'dosi esuzu kini aci fu inisi ra. Ma vile jo ejele yi be 'bori ma vutia, ma esu ra kini aci angu ma vile akua ri ma alia yo.
nyn_prompt: Naimuka omu kasheeshe k'erizooba kushanga ngu amashanyarazi gakarugaho nyekiro. Ahanyima y'okukyebera na bataahi bangye, nketegyereza ngu tihariho mashanyarazi omukyanga kyangye.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the need for skilled labor in agriculture, local governments have initiated various educational programs. One of the key initiatives is the establishment of farm schools to enhance training and knowledge in farming practices.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'abakozi abakugu mu bulimi, gavumenti z'ebitundu zitandiseewo pulogulaamu z'okusomesa ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikoleddwa kwe kutandikawo amasomero g'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi okutumbula okutendekebwa n'amagezi mu nnima n'obulunzi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma gamente me tedero oniang miti pa lutic ma ludiro i tenge me pur, gamente mapat-pat okatti ki yub mapat-pat me pwonyo dano. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo cako gangi kwan me pur pi medo rwom me pwony ki ngec i kom pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos kotoma akoru, etegeasi apuganisinei nu okwap ainapeta nu asioman nuegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio nuepolok ngesi adukun isomeroi lu akoru kanu aitopolor aitutuoro ka acoa na akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba nita be agirikica ma dria 'diyi ma esuzu ra risi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do otita onita ni karakara eyi. Otita okporu 'diyi ma azi eri sukulu agirikica ni 'diyi sizu imbata azini ondua geri agirikica 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti z'ebyaro, ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'abakozi abaine obukugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, zitandikireho puroguraamu z'eby'obwegyese nyingi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebikozirwe n'okutandikaho amashomero g'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, kugira ngu abantu batungye obwegyese n'obwengye omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: The demand for water storage solutions has surged due to ongoing drought conditions and increasing population growth. As a result, water tank dealers are experiencing a significant boost in sales and customer interest.
lug_prompt: Obwetaavu bw'okutereka amazzi bweyongedde olw'ekyeya ekigenda mu maaso n'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera. N'ekivuddemu, abasuubuzi ba ttanka z'amazzi bafuna okweyongera mu kutunda n'obwagazi bw'abaguzi.
ach_prompt: Miti me gwoko pii omede pi peko me ceng matye kawot anyim ki mede pa wel dano. Macalo adwogi ne, lucat tank me pii tye ka nongo dongo pa cat ki miti pa luwil.
teo_prompt: Apolor eipud loka aidar akipi kanu akamu na elosi akonye keda apol naka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi agwelanarak luka ataagin nuka akipi aitojokar agwelanar kec keda eipud loka agwelak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu yi ma tambazu 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra e'yo eli ni muzu drile azini kalafe 'ba eyini tuzu ri ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba afa ozipi tangi yi ni 'diyi ozipi 'diyi ma ongmbo tu tu tualu 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma ava be.
nyn_prompt: Ekyetengo ky'ebikwato by'okurinda amaizi kyeyongyeire ahabw'ekyanda ekirikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikuguza tanka z'amaizi bariyo nibatunga entunguuka omu by'obushubuzi hamwe n'okwenda kw'abaguzi.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas, residents have been struggling with a severe lack of access to clean drinking water. To address this critical issue, local authorities have implemented various initiatives aimed at improving water supply.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi, abatuuze babadde balwanagana n'obutafuna mazzi mayonjo ga kunywa. Okukola ku nsonga eno enkulu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bataddewo enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula amazzi.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, lutedero gubedo ka lweny matek tutwal ki peko me nongo pii maleng me amata. Me tyeko peko man matek tutwal, lutela me tedero gukati ki yoo mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me pii.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, eutasi itunga ainingosit keda amamus na akipi nu elaete nu aimat. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, etolomutu apedorosio nuka atutubena nuepedorete aitojokar akipi.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi dri ci e'yo yi mvuza alaru 'diyi esuzu kurisi. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye eyini ani ecozu yi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, abatuuragye batwire nibarwanagana n'obutabaasa kutunga amaizi marungi g'okunywa. Okukora aha nshonga egi, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bateire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'amaizi.

eng_prompt: After extensive research and collaboration with agricultural experts, we were excited to receive a new shipment of crops. The organization has given us disease-resistant cassava stems.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okukolagana n'abakugu mu byobulimi, twasanyuka nnyo okufuna ekibinja ekipya eky'ebirime. Ekitongole kituwadde ebikoola bya muwogo ebitakwatibwa ndwadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok matut ki winye ki ludiro me pur, cwiny wa obedo yom me nongo cam manyen. Dul eni omiyo itwa tyen gwana ma two pe mako.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic noi keda aiswamanara keda ipirioitin luka akor, apotu sio eyalamikinos noi kanu adumun ikorion luitetiak. Abu erionget ijaik sio ikito luka emuogo lumam edekasi adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza angiri ma vutia tualu ti ecita be 'ba nita be e'yo agirikica ni ma dria angiri 'diyi pie, ama ndra ayikosi 'bani afa ofule ori o'diru 'diyi esuzu. Amuti 'da fe ama dri gbanda pati azo eyi pie ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga n'okukwatanisa n'abakugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, tukashemererwa kutunga ebihingirwe bisya. Ekitongore kituhaire ebiti bya muhogo ebitarikukwatwa oburwaire.

eng_prompt: When dealing with tick infestations, it's important to choose the right methods for control. Many pesticides are designed for specific pests and may not be effective or safe for use against ticks.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba okolagana n'okulumbibwa kw'enkwa, kikulu okulonda enkola entuufu ey'okuziyiza. Eddagala ly'ebiwuka erisinga lyakolebwa ku biwuka ebimu era liyinza obutaba lya mugaso oba nga teririna bulabe eri enkwale.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka lweny i kom kwidi, pire tek tutwal me yero yoo matir me lweny i komgi. Yat akira mapol kiyubu pi jami akira mukene dok bene pe twero tic maber me lweny i kom kwidi.
teo_prompt: Neipedoria jo aitikitik ikur, ejokuna aseun iwaitin luedolitos lu itikitikere. Icie ikee luisikere ikur iswamao kanuka ikur luitegelikina ido mam aticepak iswamaete ejok kanuka ikur.
lgg_prompt: Eka e'yo 'ye e'yo ombi eyini 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru geri kililiru eyini ecozu eyi atrizu 'diyi opezu. Ba ede aro ogbizaru ori eza'ba 'diyi ma dria karakara 'diyi afa ori eza'ba azi 'diyi ma dria dika eyi econi azi nga muke ku.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nookora aha ndwara y'enkwa, n'eky'omugasho kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okuzibira. Emibazi mingi y'obukooko ekozirwe okurwanisa obukooko butari bumwe na bumwe kandi terikubaasa kukora kurwanisa obukooko.

eng_prompt: With the rising incidence of tick-borne diseases, it is crucial for livestock owners to take preventive measures. Effective pest control is essential to ensure the health and productivity of their herds.
lug_prompt: Olw'obungi bw'endwadde ezireetebwa enkwale, kikulu nnyo bannannyini bisolo okukola ebintu ebiziyiza. Okufufuggaza ebiwuka mu ngeri ennungi kya mugaso okukakasa obulamu n'ebibala by'ebisolo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ki mede pa two ma kwidi kelo, pire tek tutwal ki wegi dyangi me timo jami mapat-pat me gengo kwidi. Lweny i kom anyai pire tek tutwal me neno ni dyangi gi tye ma komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Keda eyatakinet naka adekasinei nu ikur, ejokuna noi ikulepek ibaren aitikitik adekasinei. Aitiji ikur ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun angaleu keda aswam naka ibaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo o'bu eyini eji 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, eri orodriru 'ba anyapa e'ipi ru 'diyi ma 'ye e'yo eyi atrizu. E'yo afa ori eza'ba 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini eyi ma ti eyi ma rua ala azini afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu endwara ezirikurabanisibwa enzigye nizeeyongyera, n'eky'omugasho bakama b'amatungo okukora emiringo y'okuzibira. Okuzibira kurungi obukooko n'eky'omugasho okureeba ngu amatungo gaabo gaine amagara marungi n'obuhingi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent inspections, local authorities have raised concerns about the sanitation practices in various meat-selling establishments. As a result, health officials are taking action to address these issues.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kwekebejjebwa okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko, ab'obuyinza mu byalo balaze obweraliikirivu ku bukyafu mu bifo eby'enjawulo ebitunda ennyama. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakola ku nsonga zino.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngiyo tic ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gunyutu lworo I kom gwoko lengo I kacat mapat-pat me cato ringo. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ka timo gin mo me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aanyanario naka akiring pac, apotu apedorosio itodutu aiyalongongo kanu aiboisio nuegwelanarere akiring. Kanuka ngun, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aswam nu aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andrizu eturisi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyi e'yo alata ni angu eza ozizu 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo 'du e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okucondooza okwabaireho obwahati, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro boorekire okwerarikirira aha bikwatireine n'eby'obuyonjo omu maduuka agatari gamwe na gamwe agarikuguza enyama. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibakora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of livestock diseases, the government mobilized resources to ensure the health and safety of animals. As a result, veterinary officers have supported animal keepers across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'endwadde z'ebisolo gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti yakunga ebintu okukakasa obulamu n'obukuumi bw'ebisolo. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo b'ebisolo bayambye abalunzi b'ebisolo okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two i kom dyangi cokcok-ki, gamente ocoko lim me neno ni kwo ki ber bedo pa dyangi tye maber. Macalo adwogi ne, ludaktari me lee gukonyo lugwok lee I but lobo man mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adekasinei nu ibaren, abu apugan ingalau iboro kanu awanyun angaleu keda ayuwara na ibaren. Kanuka ngun, igangitos imurok lu itiang lu idwe kakwap wok kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo anyapa eyini e'dozu o'diru 'diyisi, gamete tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi nezu ra kini anyapa eyi ma rua ala azini eyi ma ta mba. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba anyapa eyini 'diyi fe atita 'ba anyapa ta mbapi kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara z'amatungo,gavumenti ekakoresa eby'okukoresa kureeba ngu amatungo gaba gye. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho b'enyamaishwa bahwereire abariisa b'enyamaishwa okwetoroora eihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, self-sufficiency is a key aspect of daily life. As a result, residents often cultivate their own gardens to ensure a steady supply of fresh produce.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okweyimirizaawo kintu kikulu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze batera okulima ennimiro zaabwe okukakasa nti wabaawo ebirime ebiggya buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, nongo jami ma mite piri keni obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me nino ducu. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero ipol kare gipuru poto gi me neno ni cam tye mapol.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, aitodolikin iboro lu itwasamao erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijar naka nginiparan. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga akoru amisirin kec kanu awanyun ebe ejai inyamat luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, e'yo 'ba eyini ecozu eyi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu ri eri e'yo azi orodriru eyi ma edri o'du driasi ni i. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi amvu eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ezo eyini ani ani ecozu nyaka efupi o'diru 'diyi esuzu sa'wa driasi beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, okwebaisaho n'ekintu kikuru omu magara gaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye nibahinga emisiri yaabo, okureeba ngu batunga ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve crop yields and reduce pesticide use, the organization has been collaborating with local agricultural experts. This partnership aims to provide farmers with the necessary knowledge and tools for effective pest management.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amakungula n'okukendeeza ku kukozesa eddagala, ekitongole kibadde kikwatagana n'abakugu mu byobulimi mu kitundu. Omukago guno gugendererwamu okuwa abalimi amagezi n'ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa okusobola okulwanyisa obulungi ebiwuka.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kac ki dwoko piny rwom me tic ki yat akira, dul ne obedo ka tic ki ludiro me pur. Dul man tye ki miti me miyo ngec ki jami tic ma mite pi lupur me lweny i kom jami ma balo cam.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar esake ka aitidisiar aitwasam ikee luisikere ikur, iswamat erionget keda ipiriotin luka akor. Alosikinet naka aimorikikina kangin ngesi ainakin akoriok acoa ka iboro lu itwasamao kanu aitikitik ikur.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba ori eyi ma ezota ma omgbo otuzu dika aro ogbizaru 'diyi ma ayuza ma omgbo esizu, amuti 'da ebi ti eci 'ba onita be e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma dria angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Ti ecita 'di le 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri ondua azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fe eyini ani afa ori eza'ba 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura amasharuura g'ebihingirwe n'okukyendeeza okukoresa emibazi y'obukooko, ekitongore kitwire nikikora n'abakugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Enkoragana egi negyenderera okuheereza abahingi n'abariisa obwengye n'ebikwato ebirikwetengwa, kugira ngu babaase kurwanisa gye obukooko.

eng_prompt: Uganda's diverse agricultural landscape supports a variety of crops, but few are as economically significant as coffee. The country's favorable climate and rich soil make it an ideal location for coffee cultivation.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu by'ebyobulimi eby'enjawulo mu Uganda bisobozesa ebirime eby'enjawulo, naye bitono nnyo eby'omugaso mu byenfuna nga kaawa. Embeera y'obudde ennungi mu ggwanga n'ettaka eggimu bigifuula ekifo ekirungi okulimirako emmwanyi.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki jami apura ma pat pat ma weko jami apita mapol dongo, ento manok keken aye tye ki magoba macalo mwanyi. Lobo man tye ki piny ma ber ki ngom ma opong ma weko obedo kabedo maber me puru mwanyi.
teo_prompt: Apolou na akoru nako Uganda igangit iraan luegelegela, konye ikidioko lu epol ajokis kwape nat emwanyi. Ejautene loajokan loka ikwamin keda alupok nuejokuka ijaikini akwap ngin aiboisit najokan noi naka akoru emwanyi.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma angu ori ezoza ni ndundu 'diyi nyaka ndundu eyi ma ta mba te eyi ma orodri robia esuzu kawa le 'diyi were. Angu mile kari 'di ma alia onyiru tu azini nyaku onyiru tu 'diyi fe eri angu muke ndeni kawa ezozuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bya Uganda nibishagika ebihingirwe bitari bimwe na bimwe, kwonka bikye n'eby'omugasho omu by'entaasya nk'omwani. Embeera y'obwire nungi omu ihanga hamwe n'eitaka rirungi, nibireetera eihanga kuba omwanya murungi gw'okuhingiramu omwani.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges and changing demographics, local leaders are facing increasing pressure to collaborate effectively. To ensure sustainable growth and development, it is essential for district governments to prioritize the needs of their constituents.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'okukyuka kw'omuwendo gw'abantu, abakulembeze b'ebitundu boolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa okweyongera okukolagana obulungi. Okukakasa enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera, kya mugaso gavumenti za disitulikiti okukulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu baayo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye cokcok-ki ki lok pa wel dano, lutela me tedero tye ka nongo lyeto me winye maber. Me neno ni dongo lobo ki dongo lobo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi gamente me districts me keto miti pa lubol kwir gi obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nupac keda aijulanakineta nuka itunga, etereikina engarenok luka atutubena keda agogongu naepol noi kanu aiswamanara ejok. Kanu awanyun apol keda apol na ejok, ejokuna apuganisinei nuka idisitriktan aisingarenit ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ojata ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri fu e'yo eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea geri kililiru 'diyisi. E'yo zota azini angu ezoma ni aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea, eri orodriru gamete distrikiti ni 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo 'ba angu yini opi nyaza ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ni 'diyi okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiho obwahati hamwe n'empindahinduka y'abantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okukwatanisa kurungi. Okureeba ngu entunguuka neyeyongyera, ni kikuru gavumenti za disiturikiti kwebembeza ebyetaago by'abantu baabo.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about public sector compensation, many employees have expressed concerns about their financial well-being. As a result, civil servants often ask for salary increments.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku kuliyirirwa kw'abakozi mu bitongole bya gavumenti, abakozi bangi balaze obweraliikirivu ku mbeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, abakozi ba gavumenti batera okusaba okwongezebwa omusaala.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom cul pa lutic pa gamente, lutic mapol gunyutu lworo I kom kit ma lim gi tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic pa gamente ipol kare gi penyo pi medo mucara gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos atacakinio naka itunga, apotu eswamak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ikapunukec. Kanuka ngun, ilipete duc eswamak luka apugan aiyatakin eropitikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea, azi'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo robia eyini esu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba gameteni 'diyi sawa driasi oya otuza a'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi, abakozi baingi boorekire okwerarikirira ahaby'empiiha byabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi ba gavumenti nibashaba kwongyezibwa emishaara.

eng_prompt: The topic of salary adjustments has become increasingly contentious in recent years. Many people feel strongly about how pay raises should be distributed across different sectors and professions.
lug_prompt: Ensonga y'okukyusa emisaala yeeyongedde okusika omuguwa mu myaka egiyise. Abantu bangi balina endowooza ya maanyi ku ngeri okwongeza omusaala gye kulina okugabanyizibwamu mu bitongole n'emirimu egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lok me kelo aloka-loka I mucara omede ki kelo apoka-poka I mwaki ma okato ni. Dano mapol tye ki tam matek tutwal I kom kit ma myero kimed kwede mucara I tenge mapat-pat ki tic mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akirot naka aijulanakineta nuka iropito erai na epeget noi kokaru lu atuboros. Epodokitos itunga luipu noi nuikamunitos eipone lo ebeitor aiyatakin ikapun kotoma aswamisinei nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma musara eyi ojazu ri ma dria ri eca e'yo agata ako ru eli agapi 'diyi ma alea. Ba karakara eyi asi'baza okporu be geri 'bani ecozu musara otuzu 'diyi awazu esele ndundu eyi ma eselea azini azi ndundu eyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Enshonga y'okuhindura emishaara eyeyongyeire kuhakanisa omu myaka egi. Abantu baingi nibateekateeka munonga oku emishaara eshemereire kweyongyera omu bitongore ebitarikushushana hamwe n'emirimo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing negotiations with the university administration, faculty members have decided to take a stand. Frustrated by years of stagnant wages, they have collectively chosen to halt their teaching duties.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula enteeseganya ezigenda mu maaso n'abakulembeze ba ssetendekero, abasomesa basazeewo okubaako kye bakola. Olw'obutafuna musaala okumala emyaka, basazeewo okuyimiriza emirimu gyabwe egy'obusomesa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me winye matye kawot anyim ki lutela me gang kwan me yunibaciti, lupwonye gumoko tam gi me cung matek. Pi cwer cwiny pi mucara ma obedo tye pi mwaki mapol, gin gumoko tamgi me juko tic gi me pwony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemitem ipegeta lu elosi akonye keda eyaitene loka eunibasite, aseutu esisiak aibwo. Apotu kesi kongeroto aswamukec kwape esisianakinak naarai mam etacio eropit adaun ikar luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni mupi drile driceza univasiti niri be risi, imba'ba eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu. E'yo oya eyini aa'zu ku eli karakara eyi ma alea risi, eyi 'du eyi ma eselea e'yo eyini lezu eyi ma azi imbazu ri atrizu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enteeseganya ezirikugyenda omu maisho n'abebembezi ba Yunivasite, abegyesa bashaziremu kutaho enteekateeka yaabo. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'emishaara y'emyaka mingi etarikushashurwa, boona hamwe bacwiremu kwemereza emirimo yaabo y'obwegyesa.

eng_prompt: Many local councillors work tirelessly to address community issues and represent the interests of their constituents. However, their current compensation does not reflect the demands and responsibilities of their roles.
lug_prompt: Bakansala b'ebyalo bangi bakola butaweera okugonjoola ensonga z'ekitundu n'okukiikirira ebyetaago by'abalonzi baabwe. Newankubadde, okubaliyirira kwabwe okuliwo kati tekulaga byetaago n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero mapol gitiyo matek me cobo peko me kabedo gi ki cung pi miti pa lubol kwir gi. Kadi bed kumeno, culgi kombedi pe nyutu miti ki tic gi.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete ikansilan luipu agogongu kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga ka abwoikin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec. Konye, etiai lo atacakinio kes kopana mam itodunit iboro keda aswamisinei kec.
lgg_prompt: Kansila angu ndundu eyi ma alea karakara 'diyi azi nga okposi e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu dika eyi pa tu e'yo eyini le 'ba angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma paria. Kani si, ofeta eyini esu curu'do ri e'da e'yo eyini le azini azi eyini 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ba kansara b'ebyaro abingi nibakora n'amaani okutereeza eshonga z'abantu n'okujwekyera ebyetengo by'abantu abu barikujwekyera. Kwonka, okushumbuusibwa kwabo obwahati tikurikworeka ebyetengo n'obujunaanizibwa bw'emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: The ongoing debates and disagreements within the council have created a sense of uncertainty among residents. As decisions remain unresolved, the community feels increasingly disconnected from their leaders.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'obutakkaanya obugenda mu maaso mu lukiiko bireeseewo obutali bukakafu mu batuuze. Ng'okusalawo kukyagenda mu maaso, abantu beeyongera okuwulira nga tebakyalina kakwate na bakulembeze baabwe.
ach_prompt: Laro lok ki telle matye kawot anyim I kancil okelo lworo ikin lwak. I kare ma pe kicobo peko me moko tam, lwak giwinyo ni pe gitye ki kubbe ki lutela gi.
teo_prompt: Ipegeta keda amamus acamanar kotoma ekansulo ayangau amamus acamanar kanejaas itunga. Kwape mam itemokitai aseununeta, epupete itunga ebe emamei arucokina keda engarenok kec.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara azini erita ako mupi drile kanisulu ma alia 'diyi fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni aa'zu e'yo kokoru. E'yo 'bani 'dule 'diyi ma aza ko kokoru, ongulumu eyi ega eyi ma eselea drice'ba eyivile 'diyi pie yo.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura n'obutakwatanisa omu kakiiko, kireesireho okwerarikirira omu batuuragye. Ahabw'okugira ngu ebiteiso nibiba bitarikushobororwa, abantu nibahurira batarikukwatanisa n'abebembezi baabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent community challenges and changing demographics, it has become essential for local leaders to come together. Collaborative discussions are necessary to address the pressing needs of residents effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ekitundu gyebuvuddeko n'okukyuka kw'omuwendo gw'abantu, kifuuse kikulu nnyo abakulembeze b'ebyalo okwegatta. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'awamu kwetaagisa okusobola okukola ku byetaago by'abatuuze eby'amangu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye kacel ki lok pa wel dano, pire tek tutwal ni lutela me tedero gubed kacel. Nywako lok ikin lwak pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka atutubet keda aijulanakineta nuka itunga, erai ibore yenepol noi engarenok luka atutubet aimorikikin. Ineresinei lu aimorikikina ejokuka kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma kalafe ni i ojazu 'diyi pie, eri eca curu'do orodriru drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini emuzu tualu. E'yo nzeza tualu ri eri orodriru e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
