nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu n'empinduka y'omuhendo gw'abantu, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho abebembezi b'ebyaro kukorera hamwe. Okuganiira hamwe nikikuru munonga, okubaasa kukora ahabyetaago by'abatuuragye omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the growing demands on local services and the increasing population, it is essential to reassess funding priorities. Adequate financial support is crucial for districts to effectively meet the needs of their communities.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza mu kitundu n'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera, kya mugaso okuddamu okwetegereza ensimbi ezirina okukulembeza. Obuyambi bw'ensimbi obumala bukulu nnyo eri disitulikiti okusobola okutuukiriza obulungi ebyetaago by'ebitundu byaayo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dongo pa miti pa lwak I kom kony ma tye ikabedo mapatpat ki wel dano matye kamede, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma omyero ki ket lim I tic. Kony me lim ma oromo pire tek tutwal pi districts me cobo miti pa lwak gi.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo eyatakinor eipud loka aijaanakinio naka itunga luka atutubet keda enaaba loka itunga, ejokuna noi airereor iboro luingarakinete ikapun. Agangat na ikapun na edolit ejok kanu idisitriktan aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele o'bi eyini angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo tuzu tualu 'ba eyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri be risi, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani lezu robia esuzu 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. Atita robia ni capirisi ri eri orodriru distrikiti eyini ecozu e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago by'obuheereza omu byaro hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma omuringo gw'okushashurira. Obuhwezi bw'esente oburikumara n'obw'omugasho munonga aha disiturikiti, okubaasa kuhikiiriza kurungi ebyetengo by'abantu baayo.

eng_prompt: Despite making significant strides in various fields, the gender gap in professional advancement remains a pressing issue. Many organizations continue to struggle with achieving gender parity at the highest levels of management.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu bintu eby'enjawulo, ekituli mu nkulaakulana mu by'ekikugu kikyali kizibu kya maanyi. Ebitongole bingi bikyalwana okutuuka ku mwenkanonkano mu bakulembeze ab'oku ntikko.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dongo lobo tye I tenge mapat-pat, apoka-poka matye I kin mon ki coo I lok me dongo rwom me kwan pud tye peko madit tutwal. Dule mapol pud tye ka tute matek me neno ni mon ki coo gubedo marom I rwom me tela ma malo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamatai apol noi kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, eringa eidicane loejai kiding ikiliok keda angor kotoma apol erai ationis naepol noi. Inyikokinitos iriongeta luipu ainingosit adumun eirianu lo angor kotoma aiboisio nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ni tro ovuzu pari ndundu eyi ma alea ra ti, esele coza agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie zota onita ma alea ri ma alea ri nga po'di e'yo azi okporu ni i. eng_prompt: In order to enhance the effectiveness of local governance, it is essential to evaluate the current compensation structures for elected officials. Increasing the financial support for District councillors could lead to better resource allocation and community engagement.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obulungi bw'obukulembeze bw'ebitundu, kya mugaso okwekenneenya enkola eriwo ey'okuliyirira abakungu abalonde. Okwongera obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri bakansala ba disitulikiti kiyinza okuviirako okugabanya obulungi eby'obugagga n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me tela I tedero, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma kiculu kwede lutic ma kiyero gi. Medo kony me lim ma kimiyo ki lutela me distrik twero weko ki poko jami ki lwak maber.

lgg_prompt: E'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru geri 'bani azi'ba ope'ba 'diyi ofezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu. eng_prompt: In many communities, public perception of local government officials often reflects a sense of disillusionment with their roles. As a result, councillors are looked at as low-income civil servants.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, endowooza y'abantu ku bakungu ba gavumenti z'ebitundu etera okulaga obutali bumativu n'emirimu gyabwe. N'ekivuddemu, bakansala batunuulirwa ng'abakozi ba gavumenti abafuna ssente entono.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tam pa lwak I kom lutic pa gamente matino ipol kare nyutu cwer cwiny I kom tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, kancila kineno gi calo lutic pa gamente matye ki cente manok.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, aomisioit naka itunga mama ejaasi eswamak luka apugan itodunit amamut aiyalama keda aswamukec. Kanuka ngun, esesenete ikansilan kwape eswamak lu edumunenete ikapun idis.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges faced by local businesses, it is crucial for leaders to take proactive measures. By prioritizing community needs, district officials can foster sustainable growth and development.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu kwe basanga gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okubaako kye bakolawo. Abakungu ba disitulikiti bwe bakulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu, basobola okutumbula enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma biacara me tedero tye ka kato ki iye cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gutim gin mo. Ki keto miti pa lwak obed gin ma pire tek, lutic me district twero medo rwom me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda ibiasaran luka atutubet, erai ibore yenepol noi kanu engarenok aswam nuepedorete kesi aswam. Kowai lo aisingarenit ipudesia luka itunga, epedorete eswamak luko disitrikt aitopolor apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria tujari ogogo 'diyini esu 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini e'yo 'duzu okporu. Azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ka e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi 'du okporu, eyi eco zota azini angu ezoma ma omgbo otu ra.

lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kuleeseewo okweraliikirira ku bwesimbu bw'obukulembeze bw'ebitundu. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi beeyongera okweraliikirira ku bukugu bw'abakungu baabwe abalonde.

teo_prompt: Aingic napac ayangau aiyalongong kanuikamunitos apugan na okwap. Kanuka ngun, iyalongongosi itunga aiyalongong kanu eswamae loejok loka eswamakakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, kari anzi eyi asi otiza be drile azi'ba eyini ope 'diyiniri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the increasing number of traffic-related fatalities has raised significant concerns among policymakers and communities. As a result, various initiatives have been launched to promote safer driving practices and raise awareness about the dangers of reckless behavior on the road.

eng_prompt: Effective communication on the road is crucial for ensuring the safety of all drivers and pedestrians. By providing clear guidance and warnings, road signs and symbols play a vital role in promoting safe driving behaviors.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ku luguudo nkulu nnyo mu kukuuma abavuzi b'ebidduka n'abatembeeyi. Mu kuwa obulagirizi obulambulukufu n'okulabula, obupande bw'oku nguudo n'obubonero bikola omulimu omukulu mu kutumbula enneeyisa y'okuvuga obulungi.
ach_prompt: Kube maber I gudu pire tek tutwal pi gwoko ludwo mutoka ki luwot. I yo me miyo tira ki cik matye atir, lanyut me gudu konyo tutwal I tyelo kor kit me dwoyo mutoka maber.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan korot erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara iderepan keda lu alotok. Kowai lo aijaikin aicoreta ka aikwenyar, ijenuneta luka irotin iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aitopolor iponesio luka airenge ejok.

eng_prompt: Recent statistics have shown a troubling increase in road incidents across the city. Many experts believe that the root cause lies in the prevalence of reckless driving behaviors.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the safety of young children while navigating busy streets is a top priority for schools and parents alike. One effective measure to enhance their safety is the implementation of designated pedestrian pathways.

teo_prompt: Aiyangaun ayuara na idwe ludidik korotin lu epuakata noi erai ibore yenepol noi isomeroi keda auriak. Idiopebore yenepedori aitojokar ayuwara kec ngesi aitolomun irotin lu itunga lu elosete keda akeje.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anzi nyiri eyini aa'zu muke eyini aciria nzila 'bani acizu 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo okporu sukulu eyini tualu tipika eyini 'diyi pie. Geri azi orodriru eyini ecozu eyi ma tambazu ri geri 'bani 'ba acipi pasi 'diyini 'diyi 'bazu eyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: Before getting behind the wheel, it's essential to ensure you have all necessary documentation in order. One crucial item to carry with you is your driving permit.

eng_prompt: In many communities, local transportation methods play a crucial role in raising awareness about safety issues. One such method is the use of bodabodas, which can effectively reach a wide audience.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, entambula y'omu kitundu ekola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kumanyisa abantu ku nsonga z'obukuumi. Engeri emu ng'eyo kwe kukozesa bodaboda, ezisobola okutuuka obulungi ku bantu abangi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, yoo me wot konyo tutwal I rweyo lwak i kom lok me gwoko kuc. Yo acel ma kit meno obedo tic ki bodaboda, ma twero oo bot lwak mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, ewai lo elose lo atutubet iswamai ejok noi kowai lo aisisianakin itunga nuka ayuwara. Adiopet iwaitin kwape kangun ngesi aitwasam ibodabodan, lu epedorete adolokin itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, geri 'bani acizu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi okporu nga imbata fezu e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria. Geri 'dile 'diyi ma azi bodaboda eyi ayuzu, eyini ani ecozu cazu 'ba karakara eyivu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, eby'engyenda nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'eby'okwerinda. Omuringo gumwe nk'ogwo n'okukoresa bodaboda, ezirikubaasa kuhika aha bantu baingi.

eng_prompt: With the increasing number of vehicles on the road, the risk of accidents involving pedestrians has become a significant concern. It is essential to educate the public about safe practices while navigating busy streets.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'emmotoka ogweyongera ku nguudo, obuzibu bw'obubenje obuzingiramu abatembeeyi bufuuse buzibu bwa maanyi. Kya mugaso okusomesa abantu ku nkola ez'obukuumi nga batambulira ku nguudo ezirimu abantu abangi.
ach_prompt: Ki wel mutoka matye kamede I gudu, gum me nongo awano me gudi matye I kom luwot ki tyengi dong odoko peko madit tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lwak i kom kit me tic maber ka gitye ka ngwec I gudu ma dano dwong iye.
teo_prompt: Keda enaaba loepol noi loka amotokan korot, epol noi ationis naka akangasia nuka alotok. Erai ibore yenepol noi aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos iwaitin lu eyuara kapak kana airenge korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local entrepreneurs, various associations have been established to empower small business owners. One such initiative focuses on providing financial assistance to bodaboda riders, enabling them to expand their operations.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu, ebibiina eby'enjawulo bitandikiddwawo okutumbula bannannyini bizinensi entonotono. Ekimu ku bintu ebyo kwe kuwa abavuzi ba boodabooda obuyambi mu by'ensimbi kibasobozese okugaziya emirimu gyabwe.

teo_prompt: Kanu aigangit agwelanarak luka atutubet, adukun atukona nuegelegela kanu aigangit agwelanarak ludidik. Adiopet koboro kwape kangun ngesi aijaikin agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi ibodabodan, kanu aingarakin kes aitanyanyar aswamukec.

eng_prompt: To ensure pedestrian safety, it is essential to maintain clear and visible road markings. One important aspect of this maintenance is the regular repainting of zebra crossings.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abatembeeyi, kya mugaso okukuuma obupande bw'oku nguudo nga bulambulukufu era nga bulabika bulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa mu kuddaabiriza ensozi kwe kuzisiiga langi buli luvannyuma lwa kiseera.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko luwot ma woto ki tyengi, pire tek tutwal me keto alama ma nen maber I gudu. Gin acel ma pire tek ma omyero kitim me yubu gudu en aye me roco rangi pa gudu matye ka ngolo gudu kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ayuara naka alotok, ejok aidar aanyuneta nuka erot nuecaete. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu aitemonokin erai ailelebikin eriagi aiboisio nu itwasamaere itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba acipi pasi 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru, eri orodriru afa nzila dria 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini e'dazaru. E'yo azi orodriru 'bani angu 'da ma tambazu ri eri 'bani angu 'bani acizu zebra crossing ru 'diyi ma wura ojazu o'diru ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya oburinzi bw'abatambuzi b'ebigyere, n'eky'omugasho kuguma oine obubonero bw'enguuto oburikwetegyerezibwa gye kandi burikureebeka. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho gw'okugarura busya enguuto n'okugaruka kuzisiiga erangi buri kaire.

eng_prompt: To enhance road safety and protect both riders and pedestrians, it is essential for all road users to collaborate effectively. One key group that plays a significant role in this effort is the bodaboda community, which has a high presence on the roads.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obukuumi bw'enguudo n'okukuuma abavuzi b'ebidduka n'abatembeeyi, kya mugaso eri abo bonna abakozesa enguudo okukolera awamu obulungi. Ekibiina ekimu ekikulu ekikola omulimu ogw'amaanyi mu kaweefube ono be ba bodaboda, abalina okubeerawo okungi ku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Me medo ber bedo I gudu ki gwoko ludwoc ki luwot, pire tek tutwal ni lutic ki gudi weng omyero gutii kacelo. Dul acel ma pire tek ma tye ki tic madit tutwal I yub man obedo dul pa bodaboda, ma welgi dwong tutwal I gudu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara na irotin ka ayuarite erengeak keda lu alotok, ejokuna itunga kere lu itwasamaete irotin aiswamanara ejok. Egurupu ediope loepol lo iswamai ejok kotoma aswam kana erai itunga luka ibodabodan, luejaasi keda itunga luipu noi korotin.
lgg_prompt: Nzila ma tambaza ma omgbo otuzu azini 'ba onzu'ba azini 'ba acipi pasi 'diyi ma tambazu, eri orodriru 'ba dria nzila ayupi 'diyini ti ecizu kililiru. Ongulumu azi alu okporu azi okporu ngapi okpo 'di ma alia 'diyi ongulumu bodaboda eyini aa'zu nzila dria 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'okwerinda aha nguuto n'okurinda abavugi n'abarikugyenda n'ebigyere, nikikuru abarikukoresa enguuto kukwatanisa kurungi. Guruupu emwe enkuru erikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu nteekateeka egi n'aba bodaboda, abaine abantu baingi aha nguuto.

eng_prompt: Many rural communities experience higher rates of traffic accidents due to a lack of awareness and education about road safety. Unlike urban areas, where campaigns and resources are more readily available, these regions often remain underserved in terms of safety initiatives.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu byalo bangi bafuna obubenje bw'ebidduka bungi olw'obutaba na bumanyirivu n'okusomesebwa ku bukuumi ku nguudo. Okwawukanako n'ebitundu by'omu bibuga, nga kampeyini n'ebikozesebwa bisangibwa mangu, ebitundu bino tebitera kuweereza bulungi mu nsonga z'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma icaro gi nongo peko me gudi mapol tutwal pi bedo peke pa ngec ki pwony i kom gwokke ki peko me gudu. Ka iporo ki kabedo me boma, kama bito kwir ki jami tic tye iye oyot, kabedo magi pol kare pe gi nongo kony malube ki yub me gwoko kuc.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lukocaloi ejaas keda akangasia nuipu noi naarai emamei aisisianakino keda aijen nuikamunitos ayuara na irotin. Kilema aiboisio nu otaun, ne epatana adumun ikampeins keda iboro, mam duc aiboisio nu ejaas keda ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi drileonzi nzila dria 'diyi esu kalafe angiri si e'yo mile oziza ni azini imbata nzila ma tambaza ma dria ri ma ako si. Ka tro aa'zu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ku, angu ti odaza ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ni ovuzu ewakokoru, angu 'diyi ma alea 'ba azi nga e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ebyaro bingi nibitunga butandu nyingi ahabw'okuburwa okumanyisibwa n'okwegyesibwa ahaby'okwerinda aha nguuto. Okutashushana n'emyanya y'endembo, ahu kampeyini n'eby'okukoresa biriho, ebicweka ebi tibirikuhwerwa omu by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: As the number of private bodaboda operators continues to rise, ensuring the safety of both riders and passengers has become increasingly important. Implementing proper regulations can help mitigate accidents and promote responsible driving practices.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abavuzi ba bodaboda ab'obwannannyini bweyongera okulinnya, okukakasa obukuumi bw'abavuzi n'abasaabaze kyeyongedde okuba eky'omugaso. Okuteeka mu nkola amateeka amatuufu kisobola okuyamba okukendeeza ku bubenje n'okutumbula enkola z'okuvuga obulungi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel ludwo boda boda ma pe jenge I kom gamente tye ka mede kwede, gwoko ludwo boda boda ki luwot odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Keto cik maber itic twero konyo me dwoko piny rwom me peko me gudi ki dongo kit me dwoyo mutoka maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka iderepan luka ibodabodan, ajokunar noi ayuwar naka iderepan keda itunga. Aitodolikin ikisila luajokak ingarakini aitidisiar akangasia ka aitopolor iwaitin lu airenge ejok.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba bodaboda onzupi yi ma ngulupisi 'diyiniri ni mu drile turia, e'yo 'ba bodaboda onzupi 'diyi ma tambazu azini 'ba aci'ba 'diyi pie ri eca curu'do orodriru. Azita kililiru 'diyi ma vuti obiza eco azakoma fe drileonzi eyi ma omgbo esizu dika eco vini geri mutukari onzuza kililiru 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abavugi ba bodaboda ab'obuntu nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, okureeba ngu abavugi n'abagyenzi boona baine obukuumi, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Okuta ebiragiro omu nkora nikibaasa kuhwera omu kukyendeeza butandu n'okureetaho engyenderwaho nungi y'okuvuga.

eng_prompt: Engaging the community in road safety initiatives can foster a sense of responsibility and collective action. By combining educational efforts with hands-on activities, we can address multiple issues that affect public health and safety.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu nteekateeka z'obukuumi bw'enguudo mu kitundu kisobola okutumbula obuvunaanyizibwa n'ebikolwa eby'awamu. Bwe tugatta amaanyi g'ebyenjigiriza n'emirimu gy'emikono, tusobola okukola ku nsonga nnyingi ezikwata ku bulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Kelo lwak I yub me gwoko gudu twero weko dano bedo ki ngec me tic kacel. Ka waribo yub me pwony ki tic cing, watwero cobo peko mapol ma balo yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikin itunga toma akiro nuikamunitos ayuara na irotin epedori aitopolor apedor ka aswam nepepe. Kowai lo aimorikikin aswamisio nuka aisisia keda aswamisio nuka akanin, ipedori oni aitemokin atiokisio nuipu nuetiroritos angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini 'bazu e'yo nzila eyini aa'zu muke ri ma alea ri ni e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu. E'yo onita ni 'diyi tualu 'yeta drisi 'diyi pie, ama eco e'yo karakara eyi ma aza ko e'yo o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okweta abantu omu nteekateeka y'okwerinda enguuto, nikibaasa kureetaho obujunanizibwa n'okukorera hamwe. Twagaita eby'obwegyese n'emirimo y'emikono, nitubaasa kukora aha nshonga nyingi ezirikuteganisa amagara n'obuhwezi bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Supporting our community is essential for sustainable growth. One effective way to achieve this is by prioritizing local businesses in our purchasing decisions.
lug_prompt: Okuwagira ekitundu kyaffe kya nkizo mu nkulaakulana ey'olubeerera. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukulembeza bizinensi za wano mu kusalawo kwe tukola mu kugula ebintu.
ach_prompt: Kony lwak ma ikabedo wa pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo matye kawot anyim. Yo acel maber tutwal me cobo man obedo keto biacara me tedero obed gin ma pire tek ikare me wilo jami.
teo_prompt: Aingarakin itunga wok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol na ejok. Epone ediope loepedoria oni aitodolikin ngun ngesi aisingarenit ibiasaran luka atutubet kotoma aseununetawok nuka agwel iboro.
lgg_prompt: Atita fezu ongulumu amavile 'diyini ri eri orodriru zota ewu drile ri ni. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri geri amani tujari ogogo 'diyi 'duzu okporu e'yo amani afa jezu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okuhwera abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okwebembeza eby'obushubuzi eby'omwihanga omu kugura ebintu byaitu.

eng_prompt: Investing in modern infrastructure is essential for fostering a vibrant sports culture. By providing top-notch facilities, we can encourage greater participation and enthusiasm for various athletic events.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu bikozesebwa eby'omulembe kya mugaso mu kutumbula obuwangwa bw'ebyemizannyo. Nga tuwa ebifo eby'omutindo ogwa waggulu, tusobola okukubiriza okwetaba okw'amaanyi n'obunyiikivu mu mizannyo egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gedo me rwom ma malo pire tek tutwal pi dongo tekwaro me tuku. Ka wamiyo jami ma rwom gi malo, watwero cuku cwiny dano me bedo tye I pyem ngwec mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma aduketa nuakwana erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolorite aboliasio. Kowai lo aijaikin aiboisio nuka adoketait naepol, ipedori oni aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma aboliasio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu afa ayuzaru ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Afa ayuzaru wura urusi 'diyi fezurisi, ama eco ava fe 'ba eyini fizu tualu ava be e'yo avita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu by'okwombeka eby'omurembe n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'emizaano. Twaheereza ebyombeko by'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, nitubaasa kureetaho okwejumba n'okushemererwa omu mizaano etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: Access to education is a fundamental right that should be guaranteed to all children, regardless of their circumstances. In many parts of the world, children in refugee camps face significant barriers to learning and development.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebyenjigiriza ddembe lya musingi eririna okukakasibwa eri abaana bonna, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera zaabwe. Mu bitundu by'ensi bingi, abaana mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu kusoma n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Nongo kwan obedo twero ma pire tek ma omyero ki mii ki lutino weng labongo paro pi kwo gi. I but lobo mapol, lutino ma gitye I kem pa luring ayela ginongo peko madit tutwal I kwan ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Adumunun asioman erai apedor naka itunga kere, araida ejaasi kesi toma ojautene loejok. Kotoma aiboisio nuipu nuka akwap, itereikina idwe luejaasi toma okabin keda ainingosia nuepedorete aitikitik asioman keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Onita ma esuta eri drilemgbo azi okporu lepi 'ba ma fe anzi nyiri dria eyini aa'zu geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi vusi. Wudrikuru ma kala karakara eyi ma alea, anzi nyiri aa'pi angu emunyale eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo onita ni azini zota ni 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obwegyese n'obugabe bw'omutaano obushemereire kuhebwa abaana boona, oihiremu embeera zaabo. Omu bicweka bingi eby'ensi, abaana b'omu kampu z'empungi, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwega n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: In order to stimulate the economy and support community growth, it is essential to prioritize local businesses in government procurement processes. By investing in homegrown industries, we can foster innovation and resilience within our workforce.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula ebyenfuna n'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ekitundu, kya mugaso okukulembeza bizinensi z'omu kitundu mu nkola za gavumenti ez'okugula ebintu. Bwe tuteeka ssente mu makolero ga wano, tusobola okutumbula obuyiiya n'obuvumu mu bakozi baffe.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me lim ki dongo lobo pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me keto biacara me tedero bedo gin ma pire tek ikare me wilo jami pa gamente. Ka waketo lim I biyacara ma kiyubu ki kany, watwero kelo diro manyen I kin lutic wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun ka aigangit apol naka itunga, ejokuna noi aisingarenit ibiasaran luka atutubet kotoma agwelanar naka apugan. Kowai lo aipikakin ikapun toma acuman nu itolomunitai ore, ipedori oni aitopolor acoasinei nuitetiak kotoma eswamak wok.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu ongulumu eyini zozu, eri orodriru tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyini okpo fezu e'yo gamete ni afa eyi jezu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo lonyi vuti alezuri 'bazu okalamvu akua 'diyi ma alea risi, ama eco e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otu azi'ba amavile 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entatsya hamwe n'okushagika entunguuka y'abantu, niky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'obushubuzi eby'omubyaro omu mirimo ya gavumenti y'okugura ebintu. Twata esente omu makorero ag'omwihanga, nitubaasa kureetaho okujumbura n'obwegyendesereza omu bakozi baitu.

eng_prompt: Efficient infrastructure is crucial for humanitarian efforts, especially in times of crisis. A well-developed transportation system can significantly enhance the response capabilities of aid organizations.
lug_prompt: Emizimbo emirungi gya mugaso nnyo mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu naddala mu biseera by'obunkenke. Enkola y'entambula ennungi esobola okwongera ku busobozi bw'ebitongole ebigaba obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Odi tic mabeco pigi tego tutwalle ikare me peko. Yoo me wot ma kiyubu maber twero medo kero pa dule ma miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Ingarakinete iboro lu ejokuka noi kanu aingarakin itunga kacut kotoma apakio nuetioko. Ewai lo elose lo itojokaritai ejok epedori aitojokar apedorosio nuka iriongeta lu engarakinete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi orodriru e'yo azakoma fezu 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu tuni sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyi ma alea. Geri acizu kililiru 'diyi eco amuti azakoma fepi 'diyi ma okpo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyombeko birungi n'ebyomugasho omu kuhwera abantu okukira munonga omu bwire bw'oburemeezi. Enkora nungi y'eby'engyenda neebaasa kwongyera amaani omu kukora kw'ebitongore ebirikuhwera abantu.

eng_prompt: In conflict zones and areas affected by natural disasters, access to food and essential nutrients becomes severely limited. As a result, many displaced individuals struggle to meet their basic dietary needs.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebirimu entalo n'ebitundu ebikoseddwa obutyabaga, okufuna emmere n'ebiriisa ebikulu kikendeera nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi ababundabunda balwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe eby'omubiri.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma lweny tye iye ki kabedo ma peko ma poto atura otimme iye, nongo cam ki moc cam mapigi tego bedo tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol ma oryemogi ki I gangi gi nongo peko me nongo cam ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nu ejie keda aiboisio nu etereikina keda atiokisio nu akwap, etiono noi adumun inyamat keda iboro luipudasi itunga. Kanuka ngun, etionikinitos itunga luipu lu ekerete kotoma aiboisio kec aitodolikin ipudesia kec luka ainyam.
lgg_prompt: Angu e'yo a'di ni 'diyi pie azini angu e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ni 'yepi 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alea, geri nyaka esuzu azini nyaka orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eca ewaru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu kokoru 'diyi dri ci afa yini lele nyaka nyazaru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'entaro hamwe n'emyanya y'ebihikiirizi, okutunga eby'okurya hamwe n'eby'okurya ebirikwetengwa nikukyerererwa munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, nibarwana kumaraho ebyetengo byabo by'eby'okurya.

eng_prompt: Access to healthcare resources can be limited in rural areas, making it challenging for residents to receive timely medical attention. As a result, innovative solutions are needed to empower individuals to take charge of their health.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi mu byalo kiyinza okuba ekizibu, ekizibuwaza abatuuze okufuna obujjanjabi mu budde. N'ekivuddemu, eby'obuyiiya byetaagibwa okusobozesa abantu kinnoomu okwetikka obuvunaanyizibwa bw'obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom twero bedo tek I caro, ma weko bedo tek tutwal ki lwak me nongo kony me yot kom ikare ki kome. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo me tic manyen mite pi miyo kero ki dano me gwoko yotkom gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun na iboro lu amukian erai na etiono kocaaloi, einakini ainingosit itunga adumun amukian kotoma apak. Kanuka ngun ekotoi aitemonokineta nuitetiak kanu aitigogong itunga aidar angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri eco ovu ewaru, erini fezu ewaru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu sa'wa dria. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma esu geri o'diru 'bani ecozu 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni okpo fezu eyi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu myanya y'ebyaro, nikigumira abatuuragye okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omubwiire. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho ekyetengo ky'okutunga oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: As violence escalated in South Sudan, many families found themselves caught in the crossfire, forcing them to flee their homes in search of safety. Neighboring countries, particularly Uganda, braced for an increase in displaced individuals seeking refuge from the ongoing conflict.
lug_prompt: Ng'obutabanguko bweyongera mu South Sudan, amaka mangi geesanga nga gakwatiddwa mu muliro, ne gawalirizibwa okudduka mu maka gaabwe okunoonya obukuumi. Ensi eziriraanyeewo, naddala Uganda, zeetegekera okweyongera kw'abantu ababundabunda nga banoonya obubudamu okuva mu lutalo olugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tim gero omedde I lobo South Sudan, lugangi mapol gunongo peko ma oweko guringo gangi gi me yenyo gwok. Lobo ma orumuwa, tutwalle Uganda, oyubbe pi medde pa wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi me nongo gwok ki I lweny matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor amumu ko South Sudan, apotu ikalia luipu kodumutu ebe ejaasi kesi toma akiro nuarokok, abuikin kes akerit oreriakec aimo ayuwar. Akwapin nu idunyare, kacut Uganda, apotu okapakina kanu aiyatakin na itunga lu ekerete aiboi kanuka ingungeta lu elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi kari South Sudan niri ma alea ri si, familia karakara eyi esu eyi e'yo eyi ma eselea, eyini ani eyi apazu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea tambaza ndazu. Kari jo ejele ru 'diyi, tutuni Uganda, otu yi 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu angu ndazu e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro ku bwayeyongyeire omuri South Sudan, amaka maingi gakahikwaho oburemeezi, ekyabagyemesereize okuruga omu maka gaabo kuronda oburinzi. Amahanga agatuherereire, okukira munonga Uganda, gaketeekateekyera okweyongyera kw'abantu abarikuza kuronda obuhungiro ahabw'entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, many countries face an influx of displaced individuals seeking safety and support. To address the urgent needs of these vulnerable populations, various International Organizations mobilize resources and assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, ensi nnyingi zisanga abantu bangi ababundabunda nga banoonya obukuumi n'obuyambi. Okusobola okukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'abantu bano abateesobola, ebitongole by'ensi yonna ebyenjawulo bikunga ebintu n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, lobo mapol nongo dano mapol ma orwenyo gangi gi ka yenyo gwok ki kony. Me cobo miti pa dano ma peko tye i komgi, dul mapat-pat me lobo mapat-pat tye ka jogo jami ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka atiokisio, ejaas akwapin nuipu keda itunga luipu luemamete oreria kec aimo ayuwara keda agangat. Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ican, iriamununete iriongeta luka akwapin ace iboro keda agangat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, kari karakara eyi esu 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma emuta angu tambaza esuzu azini atita esuzu. E'yo ewaru 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti karakara kari eselia 'diyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra azini azakoma fe.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, amahanga maingi nigatunga abantu baingi abarikuruga omu maka gaabo barikuronda oburinzi n'obuhwezi. Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu abo abatarikwebaasa, ebitongore by'amahanga goona nibishorooza eby'okukoresa n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing global refugee crisis, it is crucial to address the needs of vulnerable populations. One of the most pressing issues is ensuring that children who have fled their homes receive a quality education.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'abanoonyiboobubudamu mu nsi yonna, kikulu nnyo okukola ku byetaago by'abantu abateesobola. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga obukulu kwe kukakasa nti abaana abadduse mu maka gaabwe bafuna obuyigirize obw'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko pa luring ayela matye kawot anyim I wilobo, pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa dano ma goro. Lok acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye neno ni lutino ma oringo gang gi gunongo pwony maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka ikerai kotoma akwap kere, ejokuna noi aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lumam epedoritos aingarakin. Adiopet kotoma akiro nuepolok noi ngesi awanyun ebe idwe lu ekerete oreriakec edumunenete asioman na abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru emunyale eyini aa'zu wudrikurusiri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo azi okporu tu ri eri nezu ra kini anzi apapi aku yini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi onita muke ri esu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'empungi oburiho omunsi yoona, nikikuru kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abatarikwebaasa. Kimwe aha nshonga z'amaani n'okureeba ngu abaana abairukire omu maka gaabo batunga obwegyese burungi.

eng_prompt: In today's challenging economic climate, many young refugees face significant barriers to employment. Providing them with practical skills like carpentry and welding can empower them to build a sustainable future.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna enzibu leero, abavubuka bangi abanoonyiboobubudamu basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu kufuna emirimu. Okubawa obukugu obw'omugaso ng'okubajja n'okwokya ebyuma kisobola okubawa amaanyi okuzimba ebiseera by'omu maaso ebiwangaala.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma can lim tye matek tutwal, luring ayela matino mapol nongo peko madit tutwal me nongo tic. Miyo botgi diro me tic cing calo payo bao ki wango nyonyo twero minigi kero me gedo anyim maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun, etereikina atumunak luipu lu ikerai keda ainingosia nuipu kanu adumun aswamisinei. Aijaikin kes acoa kwape nat aike ka aicwe acuma epedori ainakin kes agogongu kanu aiduk ingaren naejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru curu'do e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia, emunyale ode karakara eyi e'yo azi esuzu 'diyi esu. Ondua 'bani fe eyidri ekile afa edele mbawu si azini aci eveza le 'diyi fe eyini okpo ewu drialeri sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu buremeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwa hati, empungi ez'eminyeeto nizitunga emirimo. Okubaha emyoga y'emikono nk'okubaija n'okwosya ebyoma, nikibaasa kubahwera kwombeka nyensya nungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health crisis and the need for social distancing, educational institutions are facing unprecedented challenges. To ensure that students continue to receive quality education, innovative solutions must be explored.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso n'obwetaavu bw'okwewa amabanga, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gasanga okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Okusobola okukakasa nti abayizi beeyongera okufuna ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo, eby'obuyiiya birina okunoonyezebwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim ki miti me bedo mabor ki dano mukene, gangi kwan tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Me neno ni lutino kwan gumede ki nongo rwom me kwan maber, omyero ki nen yoo me tic manyen.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na angaleu na elosi akonye keda eipud loka alaikina, etereikina isomeroi keda atiokisio nuipu noi. Kanu awanyun ebe inyikokinitos esisiak adumun asioman na adoketait, ekot aingic iwaitin luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile azini lezu 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi, angu onita ni 'diyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu. Lezu nezu ra kini sukulu anzi eyi mu drile onita muke ri esu, le 'ba ma esu geri ndundu eyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okwerinda amabanga, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gariyo nigatunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Okureeba ngu abeegi bagumizamu nibatunga obwegyese burungi, hashemereire kubaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: Access to education is a fundamental right for all children, regardless of their circumstances. For refugee children, this opportunity is crucial not only for their personal development but also for the well-being of their families.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebyenjigiriza ddembe lya baana bonna awatali kufaayo ku mbeera yaabwe. Eri abaana abanoonyiboobubudamu, omukisa guno gwa mugaso si mu nkulaakulana yabwe yokka wabula ne mu mbeera y'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Nongo kwan obedo twero pa lutino weng labongo paro pi kit ma kwo gi tye kwede. Pi lutino ma luring ayela, gum man pire tek tutwal pe pi dongo gi keken ento bene pi bedo maber pa gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun asioman erai apedor naka idwe kere araida ejaasi kesi toma ojautene loejok. Kanejaas idwe ikerai, erai arereng na naepol noi mam bon kanu apoloukec bon konye kanu aijar naka ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Onita esuzu eri drilemgbo okporu anzi nyiri dria eyini aa'zu geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi vusi. Anzi nyiri emunyale ru 'diyi dri, drileba 'diri ma orodri ovuni lu zota yiniri ni ku te vini familia yini 'diyi ma edri ni.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obwegyese n'obugabe bw'abaana boona, oihiremu embeera zaabo. Abaana b'empungi, omugisha ogu n'ogw'omugasho munonga ahabw'entunguuka yaabo n'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: As global conflicts continue to displace millions, the need for comprehensive support systems has never been more urgent. Investing in refugee programs not only aids those in crisis but also strengthens our communities as a whole.
lug_prompt: Ng'obukuubagano mu nsi yonna bweyongera okusengula obukadde n'obukadde, obwetaavu bw'obuyambi obw'awamu tebubanga bwangu nnyo. Okusiga ensimbi mu nteekateeka z'abanoonyiboobubudamu tekikoma ku kuyamba abo abali mu buzibu naye era kinyweza ebitundu byaffe okutwaliza awamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lweny me wilobo tye kamede ki kobo dano mapol tutwal, miti me yub me miyo kony mapol pe obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Keto lim I yub pa luring ayela pe konyo jo matye I peko keken ento bene jingo kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos ingungeta luka akwap airujasia itunga luipu, mam ejai eipud loka agangat naepol noi. Aipikakin ikapun toma ainapeta nuka ikerai mam ingarakini ngul lu ejaas ationis bon konye itojokaritos aiboisio wok kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'di 'diza wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ni mu drile 'ba karakara eyi ofuzu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi, le 'ba ma fe atita e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri ma okpo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo ma Robia 'bazu otita emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea ri ni lu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza ko ku te eri vini ongulumu eyi ma okpo enga.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro bw'ensi yoona ku burikugumizamu nibufurura abantu nyamwingi, ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi kihindukire ky'amaani munonga. Okuta esente omu nteekateeka z'empungi tikirikuhwera abo bonka abaine oburemeezi, beitu nikongyera n'amaani omu byanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: Many refugees face significant challenges in integrating into new societies, often lacking the necessary qualifications for employment. As a result, developing vocational skills can provide them with essential tools for economic independence and social integration.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kwegatta mu bitundu ebipya, emirundi egisinga nga tebalina bisaanyizo byetaagibwa okufuna emirimu. N'ekivuddemu, okukulaakulanya obukugu mu by'emikono kisobola okubawa ebikozesebwa ebikulu okusobola okweyimirizaawo mu byenfuna n'okwegatta mu mbeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Luring ayela mapol ginongo peko madit tutwal ikare me donyo I kabedo manyen, pol kare gi peke ki kwan ma mite pi nongo tic. Macalo adwogi ne, dongo diro me tic cing twero minigi jami tic mapigi tego me nongo lonyo ki ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ikerai luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kanu aimorikikin toma aiboisio nuitetiak, mam duc ejaasi keda apapulai nu ekotoi kanu adumun aswamisinei. Kanuka ngun, aitolomun acoa naka akanin epedori aijaikin kes iboro luepedorete aingarakin kes adumun ikapun ka aimorikikin keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Emunyale karakara eyi e'yo ewaru esu eyini aa'zu ongulumu o'diru 'diyi ma alea eyini ani ecozu azi esuzu ku risi. E'yo 'disi, ondua afa edele drisi 'diyiniri ezozu ri eco eyi ma dria afa orodriru eyini ecozu eyi ma ngulupi esuzu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea azini eyi ma aa'ta o'bi eyi pie ri fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Empungi enyingi nizitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwegaita aha bantu b'omu byaro ebitsya, ahabw'okuba tizirikwetenga ebirikwetengyesa kutunga emirimo. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunguura emyoga y'eby'emikono nikibaasa kubaheereza eby'okukoresa by'omugasho omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okukwatanisa n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is crucial that funds designated for recovery efforts are used responsibly and transparently. Mismanagement of these resources can lead to devastating consequences for affected communities.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kya mugaso nnyo nti ensimbi ezaateekebwawo okuzzaawo emirimu zikozesebwa mu bujjuvu era mu bwerufu. Okukozesa obubi ebintu bino kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri abantu abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal ni kitii ki cente ma ki keto pi yub me roco dano i yo maber dok i ada. Nywaro tic ki jami magi twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kabedo ma peko eni tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, ejokuna noi aitwasam ikapun lu itwasamao ejok. Amamus na iboro lu epedori ayangaun atiokisio nejaas itunga lu etereikina.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru 'ba ma ayu robia 'bani fele e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu ri geri kililiru si. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ayuta geri onzi si ri eco fe e'yo onzi eyi 'yezu ongulumu e'yoni esu 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu esente ezirikuheebwa abantu, zikoresibwa kurungi kandi omu buringaaniza. Okukoresa kubi ebintu ebi nikibaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi by'amaani aha bantu abarikuteganisibwa.

eng_prompt: To maintain high educational standards, it is essential to regularly evaluate the effectiveness of teaching methods and resources. Implementing systematic reviews helps identify areas for improvement and fosters a culture of accountability.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza ogwa waggulu, kya mugaso bulijjo okwekenneenya obulungi bw'enkola z'okusomesa n'ebikozesebwa. Okuteeka mu nkola okwetegereza okw'omutendera kiyamba okuzuula ebifo eby'okulongoosaamu n'okutumbula obuwangwa bw'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko rwom me kwan I rwom mamalo, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma yoo me pwonyo ki jami tic tye maber kwede. Keto yub me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede konyo me niang kabedo ma omyero kitim iye aloka-loka ki bene medo rwom me miyo kor tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar adoketait na asioman naikiara, ejokuna duc airereor eswamae lo aisisianakin keda iboro lu itwasamao. Aitodolikin airereonor iboro ingarakini ajenun aiboisio nuibusakinit aitojokar ka aitopolor eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Onita ma wura ma ta mbazu uru, eri orodriru geri onita ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu sa'wa driasi. Geri 'bani e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu geri kililiru si ri ni azakoma fe angu 'bani ecozu eyi otuzu ra 'diyi esuzu dika eri fe 'ba eyini geri eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese ogw'ahaiguru, n'eky'omugasho buri kaire kushwijuma oburungi bw'emiringo y'okwegyesa hamwe n'ebintu ebirikukoresibwa. Okukoresa enkora y'okushwijuma buri kaire nikihwera omu kumanya emyanya y'okutereezaho n'okureetaho engyenderwaho y'okureetaho embaririra.

eng_prompt: To enhance the overall efficiency of the school day, effective scheduling and support systems are put in place. One key aspect of this is the implementation of teacher accommodation facilitation.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obulungi bw'olunaku lw'essomero okutwalira awamu, enteekateeka ennungi n'enkola z'obuyambi ziteekebwawo. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka y'okusula kw'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me tic pa nino me gang kwan, ki keto yub ki yoo me konyo lutino. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lok man obedo keto yub me bedo pa lupwonye itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae loajokan loka esomero, itemonokinitai ainapeta nuegelegela ka iponesio luigangitos. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu erai aitegeario na ireria lu isisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: O'du sukuluni 'diyi ma okpo otuzu, 'ba otita kililiru azini geri atita fezu 'diyi 'ba angu 'da ma alea. E'yo azi okporu 'di ma azi eri geri imba'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura omutindo gw'eizooba ry'eishomero, enteekateeka nungi hamwe n'obuhwezi nibiteebwaho. Enshonga enkuru omuri eki n'okutandikaho enteekateeka y'oburaaro bw'abegyesa.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential to show compassion and solidarity with those who are fleeing danger. Embracing diversity and offering support can strengthen our communities and enrich our society.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kya mugaso okulaga okusaasira n'okwegatta n'abo abadduka akabi. Okukkiriza enjawulo n'okuwa obuyambi bisobola okunyweza ebitundu byaffe n'okugaggawaza ekitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal me nyutu kica ki ribe ki joo matye ka ngwec ki peko. Jolo jami ma pat pat ki miyo kony twero jingo kabedo wa ki lonyo kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, ejokuna aitodun asianut keda aimorikikina keda ngul lu ekerete kotoma atiokisio. Aicam iboro luegelegela ka aijaikin agangat epedori aitogogong atutubenawok ka aitojokar aiboisio wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru aa'zu asi ndriza be azini aa'ta tualuri be 'ba e'yo ewaru ni apa'baa 'diyi pie. Afa ndundu eyi ai'zu azini atita fezu 'diyi eco ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma okpo enga dika eyi ma edri otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru kworeka esaasi n'okukwatanisa n'abo abarikuhunga akabi. Okukwatanisa n'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'okuheereza obuhwezi, nikibaasa kuhamya ebyanga byaitu n'okutunguura ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: In the wake of displacement, many refugee communities faced food insecurity and struggled to rebuild their lives. To address this challenge, various organizations initiated agricultural projects aimed at empowering these individuals through sustainable farming practices.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusengulwa, ebitundu by'abanoonyiboobubudamu bingi byafuna ebbula ly'emmere era byalwana okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabyo. Okusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kuno, ebitongole eby'enjawulo byatandika pulojekiti z'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi ezigendereddwamu okutumbula abantu bano nga bayita mu nnima eziwangaala.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ki ryemo luring ayela ki I kabedogi, pol pa luring ayela gunongo peko me nok pa cam dok gulwenyo matek me gedo kwo gi odoco. Me tyeko peko man, dul mapat-pat gucako yub mapat-pat me pur ma obedo ki miti me tyelo kor dano magi kun gitiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me pur.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aibwot, apotu ikerai luipu odumutu amamus na inyamat kosodete aitam aiduk bobo aijar kec. Kanu aitemokin ainingosit na, apotu iriongeta luegelegela kitegeasi ipurojektin lu akoru lu ekotosi aitigogong itunga lu itwasamaete akoru na ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani emunyale eyi ofuzu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi, angu karakara emunyale eyini aa'zu 'diyi esu e'yo nyaka ako niri ra dika eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyi ma edri sizu o'diru. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, amuti ndundu eyi e'do otita agirikica ni 'diyi 'bazu okpo fezu 'ba 'diyi dri geri agirikica eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okufururwa, abantu b'omubyanga by'empungi bingi bakabonabona ahabw'eibura ry'eby'okurya kandi bakarwana kwombeka amagara gaabo. Okukora ahaburemeezi obu,ebitongore bingi bikatandikaho purogyekiti z'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ezirikugyenderera okutunguura abantu abo barikuraba omu mihanda y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikugumaho.

eng_prompt: Fostering mutual understanding and cooperation is essential for the integration of refugees into their new environments. By actively participating in local activities, these communities can create a sense of belonging and shared purpose.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enzikiriziganya n'enkolagana kya mugaso nnyo mu kugatta abanoonyiboobubudamu mu mbeera zaabwe empya. Nga beetaba mu mirimu gy'ebitundu, ebitundu bino bisobola okuleetawo enneewulira y'okubeera awamu n'ekigendererwa eky'awamu.
ach_prompt: Kony me niang ki winye ikin dano obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi luring ayela me donyo I kabedo gi manyen. I yo me bedo tye I tic ma ikabedo gi, kabedo magi twero kelo winyo ni gubedo dano acel dok bene gitye ki miti acel.
teo_prompt: Aitopoloria apuponoro keda aiswamanara erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aimorikikin ikerai aiboisio kec nuitetiak. Kowai lo ajaikina toma aswamisinei nuka atutubet, epedorete itunga luka atutubet ngin aimorikikin keda iponesio luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vata azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru emunyale eyini aa'zu angu eyini aa'zu o'diru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'yeta angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea risi, ongulumu 'diyi eco e'yo aa'zu eyi ma eselea azini e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'empungi kuza omu myanya yaabo misya. Ahabw'okwejumba omu mirimo y'ekyaro, ebyanga ebi nibibaasa kureetaho enkoragana n'ekigyendererwa kimwe.

eng_prompt: As the population continues to grow and age, the demand for medical services has surged significantly. This increasing pressure on healthcare systems has highlighted critical shortages in medical personnel.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu beeyongera okukula n'okukaddiwa, obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi bweyongedde nnyo. Okweyongera kw'okunyigirizibwa kw'ebyobulamu kulaga ebbula ly'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano tye ka medde ki dongo ki tii, miti me kony me yot kom bene omede tutwal. Rwom me lyeto matye I kom yub me yot kom eni onyuto can pa lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini enaaba loka itunga aiyatakin, apolor noi eipuda lo amukian. Apolou na naepol noi naka amukian itodunit ebe ikidioko noi eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe ni mu drile tuzu azini eli tuzu, lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria ri ece e'yo 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma ako ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu abantu bagumiizemu kweyongyera n'okukura, ekyetengo ky'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara kyeyongyeire munonga. Okweyongyera kw'oburemeezi ahaby'amagara kworeka eibura ry'abashaho.

eng_prompt: To attract more healthcare professionals to underserved areas, it's essential to offer competitive benefits. One effective strategy could be providing essential support services, such as housing.
lug_prompt: Okusikiriza abakugu b'ebyobulamu abalala mu bitundu ebitaweebwa bulungi, kya mugaso okuwa emiganyulo egivuganya. Enkola emu ennungi eyinza okuba okuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa ng'amayumba.
ach_prompt: Me kelo lutic yoto kom i kabedo ma pe ki kony ma oromo, pire tek tutwal me miyo kony me pyem. Yoo acel maber loyo weng twero bedo miyo kony ma mite tutwal calo odi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayangaun ipirioitin luipu luka angaleu aiboisio nu mam ijanakino ejok, ibusakinit aitolomun iboro lueboloboloete. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok erai aijanakin agangat kwape nat itogoi.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'bani azi ngazu ku 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru orodri abala ni 'diyi fezu. Otita azi orodriruni eco ovu azakoma fele e'yo orodriru 'diyi fezu ekile jo le 'diyi le.
nyn_prompt: Okureeta abakugu omu by'amagara omu myanya etarikuheebwa obuheereza, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza obuheereza oburikwetengwa. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukora kurungi n'okuheereza obuhwezi nk'amaju.

eng_prompt: The healthcare industry is facing a significant shortage of specialized medical professionals. As a result, the number of qualified surgeons available to perform critical procedures has dwindled.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'ebyobulamu kyolekedde ebbula ly'abasawo abakugu. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo gw'abasawo abakugu mu kulongoosa gukendedde.
ach_prompt: Tenge me yot kom tye ki peko me nok pa ludaktari ma ludiro. Macalo adwogi ne, wel ludaktari matye ki ngec me timo yango mapigi tego dong odok piny.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi erionget loka angaleu keda ekadakada loka ipirioitin luitutoonorere. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto imurok lu epedorete ajengio.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu alatani 'diyi dri fu e'yo 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma ako be. E'yo 'disi, kalafe dakitari onita be asita okporu 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma kalafe esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara kiine eibura ry'abashaho abakugu. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhendo gw'abashaho abatendekirwe kukora emirimo y'amaani gukyendeire.

eng_prompt: To ensure the longevity and safety of infrastructure, it is crucial to monitor the construction process closely. This vigilance helps identify any potential issues before they become significant problems.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obuwangaazi n'obukuumi bw'ebizimbe, kya mugaso okulondoola enkola y'okuzimba. Obwegendereza buno buyamba okuzuula ebizibu byonna ebiyinza okubaawo nga tebinnafuuka bizibu bya maanyi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni gedo orii pi kare malac, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede. Bedo ma wangwa twolo konyo me niang peko mo keken mapud pe odoko peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyangaikini keda ayuwara naka aduko, ejokuna noi aanyanar epone loka aiduk. Ingarakinit acoa na ajenun atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun erongo araun atiokisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma aa'ta sa'wa ezu azini ageitema be ri nezu, eri orodriru geri afa sizu 'diyi ma pamvu onezu kililiru. E'yo mile oziza 'di ni azakoma fe e'yo ecopi ecapi ewaru 'diyi esuzu de nga po'di eyi ecani e'yo okporu 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebyombeko bigumireho, n'eky'omugasho kureebuuza kurungi omurimo gw'okwombeka. Okwegyendesereza oku nikuhwera omu kumanya oburemeezi bwona oburikubaasa kubaho butakabaire oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: To ensure long-term economic stability, it is crucial for the government to reassess its financial strategies. By prioritizing sustainable funding sources, we can foster growth without increasing debt.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu, kya mugaso nnyo gavumenti okuddamu okwetegereza enkola yaayo ey'ebyensimbi. Bwe tukulembeza ensibuko z'ensimbi eziwangaala, tusobola okutumbula enkulaakulana nga tetwongedde mabanja.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lok me lim tye maber pi kare malac, pire tek tutwal ni gamente omyero otam I kom yoo me lim ma en tiyo kwede. Ka waketo cwiny wa I kom yoo me nongo lim ma rii, watwero medo dongo lobo labongo medo banya.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapakina naka ikapun kotoma apak naepol, ejokuna apugan airereor iponesioke luka ikapun. Kowai lo aisingarenit ewai lo ikapun, ipedori oni aitopolor apol komam iyatakinete apesenin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia niri ma tambazu sa'wa ezu, eri orodriru gamete ni geri erini robia esuzu 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. Geri robia esuzu ewu drile ri ma alea risi, ama eco zota ma omgbo otu mari ma omgbo otu kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'entaasya bigumireho, ni kikuru gavumenti kugaruka yeteekateekye aha nkora yaayo omu by'empiiha. Twaronda oburugo burungi bw'okutungamu sente, nitubaasa kureetaho entunguuka tutaine eibanja ry'amaani.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents of police misconduct and a lack of transparency have fueled concerns among citizens. As a result, many individuals feel that their safety and rights are not adequately protected by those sworn to serve and protect.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko eby'enneeyisa ya poliisi embi n'obutaba na bwerufu byongedde okweraliikirira mu bannansi. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bawulira nti obukuumi n'eddembe lyabwe tebikuumibwa abo abeeyama okuweereza n'okukuuma.
ach_prompt: Tim maraco pa abili kacel ki bedo peke pa ada okelo lworo ikin lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol giwinyo ni jo ma gukwonge me tic ki gwoko ber bedo gi ki twero gi pe ki gwoko gi maber.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos iponesio luarokok luka ipolisin keda amamus aica eyangaunitos aiyalongong kanejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, eomitos itunga luipu ebe ayuwarakec keda apedorosiokec mam eyuwaritai ejok kanejaas ngul luisumunitai aijanakin ka ayuarite.
lgg_prompt: E'yo polisi eyini aa'zu adriza onzi si azini e'yo ada kokoru 'diyi fe asi otiza kari anzi eyi ma eselea ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi ega kini 'ba oyo so'baa azi ngazu azini tambazu 'diyi awini eyi ma agei tema azini drilemgbo eyi ma ta mba kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Eby'emicwe mibi ya poriisi hamwe n'eibura ry'oburingaaniza, bikareetaho okwerarikirira omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu eby'okwerinda n'obugabe bwabo tibirikurindwa kurungi abo abu barahiire kuheereza n'okurinda.

eng_prompt: The decline of wildlife populations due to illegal hunting has far-reaching consequences. As iconic species vanish from their natural habitats, the allure of eco-tourism diminishes significantly.
lug_prompt: Okukendeera kw'omuwendo gw'ebisolo by'omu nsiko olw'okuyigga okutali mu mateeka kirina ebivaamu eby'amaanyi. Ng'ebika by'ebisolo ebimanyiddwa bibula mu bifo byabyo eby'obutonde, okusikiriza kw'obulambuzi bw'obutonde kukendeera nnyo.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa wel lee lum pi dwaro lee iwi alii tye ki adwogi marac tutwal. Kit ma kwai lee mapat-pat ma oywek tye ka rweny ki kabedo gi, miti pa lulim piny tye ka dwogo piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adisiar na iponesio luka itiang lukokutwi kanuka ameja itiang lukokutwi ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Kwape eutasi iponesio luka itiang luitegelikina aibiror kotoma aiboisio kec, ekidiokoto aiboisio nuka elatok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma kalafe esizu e'yo 'bani anyapa asea 'diyi o'dizu azita palaa ku 'diyisi ri ma e'yo onzi. E'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ni avizu angu yini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea risi, e'yo 'ba mile otiza angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukyendeera kw'omuhendo gw'enyamaishwa z'omu kishaka ahabw'okuhiiga omu buryo butahikire, kiine ebihikiirizi bingi. Eby'obuhangwa ebirikumanywa munonga ku birikuhwaho omu myanya yaabyo y'obuhangwa, oburungi bw'eby'oburambuzi bw'obuhangwa nibukyendeera munonga.

eng_prompt: In times of social unrest, emotions can run high, leading individuals to take matters into their own hands. It is crucial to recognize the potential consequences of such actions, as they can escalate quickly and result in tragic outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutabanguko mu bantu, enneewulira zisobola okudduka waggulu, ekiviirako abantu okutwalira ensonga mu ngalo zaabwe. Kikulu nnyo okumanya ebiyinza okuva mu bikolwa ng'ebyo kubanga bisobola okusajjuka amangu ne bivaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kuku-kuku ikin lwak, kit ma dano winyo kwede twero bedo lamal tutwal, ma weko ngat acel acel cako tic pire kene. Pire tek tutwal me niang adwoki pa tim ma kit meno, pien twero nya oyot dok kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka amumu, epol epone loepedoriata itunga ayangar akiro akanin kec bon. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun atiokisio nuepedorete alomun kotoma aswamisio kangun, naarai epedorete kesi aiyatakin atipet kosodete ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi eco tu uru fezu 'ba eyini e'yo eyi 'duzu eyi ma dria. Eri orodriru e'yo ecopi 'yepi e'yo 'dile 'diyi ma dria ra 'diyi onizu ra a'dusikuni eyi eco eca e'yo onzi eyi ma alea mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko omu bantu, ebiteekateeko nibibaasa kweyongyera, ekirikureetera abantu kutwarira enshonga omu ngaro zaabo. N'eky'omugasho kumanya ebirikubaasa kuruga omu bikorwa nk'ebyo, ahabw'okuba nibibaasa kweyongyera ahonaaho kandi birugyemu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: In the cutthroat world of corporate competition, tensions can escalate quickly. As rivalries intensify, some individuals resort to extreme measures to eliminate their competition.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'okuvuganya okw'amaanyi okw'amakampuni, obunkenke busobola okweyongera amangu. Okuvuganya bwe kweyongera, abantu abamu baddukira mu bikolwa eby'amaanyi okumalawo okuvuganya kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki pyem matek tutwal I kin dul mapat-pat, telle twero medde oyot-oyot tutwal. Ka pyem tye kamede, dano mukene tiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me tyeko pyemgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol noi naka abolobol naka ikampunin, epedorete ingungeta aiyatakin katipet. Neipolor abolobol, epote icetunga aitwasam iponesio luitegelikina kanu alemar abolobol kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru a'bala okporu amuti yini 'diyi ma aliari ma alia, e'yo erita ako ni 'diyi eco tu uru mbeleru ra. E'yo baka seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, 'ba azi 'diyi e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye yi ma baka seza atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'empaka z'amaani eza kampuni, obunkenke nibubaasa kweyongyera juba. Okuhayahayana kwayeyongyera, abantu abamwe nibatandika kukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe okumaraho okuhayahayana kwabo.

eng_prompt: In a competitive market where success often breeds jealousy, navigating the business landscape in Uganda can be perilous. Many entrepreneurs find that their achievements can lead to unexpected rivalries and hostility.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'okuvuganya obuwanguzi gye butera okuzaala obuggya, okutambulira mu mbeera ya bizinensi mu Uganda kiyinza okuba eky'akabi. Abasuubuzi bangi bakizuula nti ebituukiddwaako biyinza okuleetawo okuvuganya n'obukyayi ebitasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: I cuk ma pyem tye matek tutwal kama loc pol kare kelo nyeko, wot I kabedo me biacara I lobo Uganda twero bedo gin marac tutwal. Lutim biacara mapol ginongo ni jami ma gutimo twero kelo pyem ki gero ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naepol noi naepedoriata akerianut aidoun, etiono noi aitolot ebiasara ko Uganda. Itunga luipu luitolosete ibiasaran esesenete ebe aitodolikineta kec eyangauni abolobol keda amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni 'di ma alea, drile suza ni 'ba eyi ma eselea, tujari 'yezu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri eco adri e'yo ewaru ni i. Ba tujari 'ye'ba karakara eyi esu kini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi eco fe baka seza azini a'di 'diza eyini ega kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'okuhayahayana ahu obusinguzi burikukira kureetaho eihari, okutambura omu by'obushubuzi omu Uganda nikibaasa kuba eky'akabi. Abashuubuzi baingi nibashanga ngu ebirikubaasika nibibaasa kurugwamu okuhayahayana n'obwinazi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in incidents involving guest safety at various hotels. As a result, many travelers are expressing concerns about their well-being while staying away from home.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera mu bikolwa ebikwata ku bukuumi bw'abagenyi mu wooteeri ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abatambuze bangi balaga obweraliikirivu ku bulamu bwabwe nga tebali waka.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, tim maraco ma kwako gwoko wele I otel mapat-pat omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, luwot mapol tye ka nyutu lworo I kom kwo gi ka gitye mabor ki gang.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakinos noi akiro nuikamunitos ayuwara naka ipejok kooterin luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, itunga luipu lu alotok itodunitos aiyalongongokec kapak kana iboyete koreriakec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba omuru 'diyi ma tambazu hoteli ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asi otiza e'da eyi ma edri ma dria eyini aa'ria aku si ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'ebihikiirizi ebirikukwata aha by'okwerinda kw'abagyenyi omu hoteeri ezitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, abagyenzi baingi nibereka okwerarikirira aha magara gaabo baaba bari hare n'omuka.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has seen a troubling rise in violent crime linked to organized groups. Authorities are struggling to combat the increasing sophistication of these criminal networks.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda ebaddemu ebikolwa eby'obukambwe bingi ebikwatagana n'ebibinja by'abamenyi b'amateeka. Ab'obuyinza balwana okulwanyisa obubinja bw'abamenyi b'amateeka buno obweyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda oneno medde pa tim aranyi ma kubbe ki dul mapat-pat. Lutela tye ka tute matek me lweny i kom dul pa lutim bal magi matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit Uganda aiyatakino naka imusagon lu amumu lu ikamanara keda igurupun lu itemonokitai. Eutasi apedorosio aitiji abilibilio naka iriongeta luka abenyak.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, Uganda isu e'yo onzi 'ye'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. Okpo e'ipi eyi a'di 'di a'di 'dizu ongulumu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma omgbo tupi tutu ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda ereebire okweyongyera kw'ebihagaro ebirikukwata aha guruupu ezitebekanisiibwe. Ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibarwana kurwanisa enkora y'ebihagaro eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, tensions in the community have escalated, leading to widespread unrest and chaos. As frustrations boiled over, groups began to take matters into their own hands, resulting in tragic consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, obunkenke mu kitundu bweyongedde, ekiviiriddeko obutabanguko n'obwegugungo. Nga obwennyamivu bweyongera, ebibiina byatandika okutwalira ensonga mu ngalo, ekyavaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, telle I kin lwak omede tutwal, ma oweko lweny ki kuku kuku obedo tye I kabedo mapol. I kare ma cwer cwiny ocake, dul mapat-pat ocako tero lok I cingi, ma okelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta kotoma atutubet kangin, eyangaunit amumu keda amumu naepol noi. Kwape apolor aiyalongong, apotu igurupun kogeutu ayangar akiro akanin kec, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo asi omiza ni ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo tu ra, erini fezu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu karakara. E'yo ewaru eyini aa'zu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi e'do e'yo 'du eyi ma dria eyi ma dria eyini ani e'yo onzi eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu sabiiti ezihweireho, obunkenke omu bantu bweyongyeire, ekyarugiremu obutabanguko n'obutabanguko. Okwerarikirira ku kwayeyongyeire, guruupu zikatandika kutwarira enshonga omu ngaro zaabo, ekyarugiremu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: In a fair and just legal system, it is essential to uphold the principle of due process. This foundational concept ensures that every individual is treated with respect and dignity throughout legal proceedings.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka ey'obwenkanya n'obwenkanya, kya mugaso okunyweza omusingi gw'enkola entuufu. Enkola eno ey'omusingi ekakasa nti buli muntu ayisibwa n'ekitiibwa mu misango gyonna egikolebwa mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: I yub me ngolo kop matye atir, pire tek tutwal me lubu cik me ngolo kop i yo matir. Cik man weko dano weng kitero gi ki woro dok ki woro ikare weng me winyo lok i kot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila lu ejokuka, ejokuna noi aitogogong ainapeta nuka ainapeta nuajokak. Itodunit aomisioit ngin ebe ibusakinit ayait nginitunganan keda ayongit ka aibuses kotoma apak naka imusagon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza kililiru azini kililiru ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'di ni fe 'bani 'ba dria ma 'ye inzita azini inzita si sa'wa dria e'yo liza ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ebiragiro ey'oburingaaniza n'oburingaaniza, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira engyenderwaho y'oburingaaniza. Ekiteekateeko eki nikireebeka ngu buri muntu naatwarwa n'ekitiinisa n'ekitiinisa omu mirimo y'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In many urban areas, the proliferation of gang violence has raised concerns about the sources of illegal firearms. Investigations have revealed that some gangs exploit vulnerabilities in security protocols to acquire weapons.
lug_prompt: Mu bibuga bingi, okweyongera kw'obutabanguko bw'ekibinja ky'abamenyi b'amateeka kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku nsibuko z'emmundu ezitali mu mateeka. Okunoonyereza kuzudde nti ebibinja by'abamenyi b'amateeka ebimu bikozesa obunafu obuli mu mateeka g'ebyokwerinda okufuna ebyokulwanyisa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me boma madongo, medde pa tim gero i kin dul pa lutim aranyi okelo lworo i kom kama jami lweny ma turu cik aa ki iye. Kwed onyuto ni dul pa lutim aranyi mukene gitiyo ki goro matye I cik me gwoko kuc me nongo jami lweny.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu nu otaun, eyataki amumu naka igurupun aiyalongong nuikamunitos aiboisio nu idumunere imudun lumam ekisil ecamakinit. Aingic itodunit ebe igurupun ice itwasamaete aibucare kotoma ainapeta nuka ayuwara kanu adumun iboro lujis.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru karakara eyi ma alea, ngiringiri ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri eji asi otiza e'yo 'bani osu eyi esuzu geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi ri ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini ongulumu azi 'diyi e'yo ewaru e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ayu nyafe eyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi omu ndembo, okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko bw'ebibinja by'abantu, kireesireho okwerarikirira aha burugo bw'embundu ezitarikwikirizibwa. Okucondooza kworeka ngu ebibinja ebimwe nibikoresa oburemeezi oburi omu biragiro by'eby'okwerinda kutunga ebikwato.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the rise in violence and crime in the region has raised concerns among local authorities. Investigations have revealed that a significant number of firearms circulating in the area are linked to organized criminal activities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweyongera kw'obutabanguko n'obuzzi bw'emisango mu kitundu kireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakulembeze b'ebyalo. Okunoonyereza kuzudde nti omuwendo gw'emmundu ezitambuzibwa mu kitundu gwekuusa ku bikolwa by'abamenyi b'amateeka ebitegekeddwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, medde pa tim gero ki bal I but piny eni okelo lworo ikin lutela me tedero. Kwed onyuto ni wel muduku mapol matye I kabedo eni kubbe ki tim aranyi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apol naka amumu keda abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma aiboisit kangin eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas apedorosio nuka atutubet. Aingic itodunit ebe imudun luipu luejaasi toma aiboisit kangin ejai arucokina keda aswamisinei nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo onzi ma omgbo tupi angu 'di ma alea ri eji asi otiza drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini osu kalafe angiri acipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eci i 'yeta 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko n'ebihagaro omu kyanga kireesire okwerarikirira omu b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro. Okucondooza kworeka ngu ebikwato by'embundu ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu kicweka ekyo, biine akakwate n'ebibiina by'enkozi z'ebibi.

eng_prompt: Effective collaboration between law enforcement and community members fosters trust and communication. This partnership plays a crucial role in addressing local concerns and enhancing public safety.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana ennungi wakati w'abakuumaddembe n'abantu b'omu kitundu kitumbula obwesige n'empuliziganya. Enkolagana eno ekola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukola ku nsonga z'ebitundu n'okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin dul ma gwoko cik ki lwak weko dano bedo ki gen ikin gi dok weko lok bedo tye ikin gi. Ribbe man konyo tutwal I tyeko peko ma tye I tedero ki ilo malo rwom me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Aiswamanara naejok kiding ipolisin keda itunga luka atutubet eyangauni amunokina keda einer. Iswamai aimorikikina na aswam naepol noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga ka aitojokar ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita kililiru 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri ni asi'baza azini e'yo nzeza ma omgbo otu. Ti ecita 'di ni azi okporu nga e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu azini o'bi eyi ma ageitema otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa kurungi ahagati y'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro, nikureetaho obwesigye n'empurizagana. Enkoragana egi neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora aha nshonga z'abantu n'okureetaho eby'okwerinda omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In moments of crisis, it's crucial to prioritize safety and order. Instead of resorting to chaos, individuals should seek help from authorities who are trained to handle such situations.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kikulu okukulembeza obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Mu kifo ky'okuddukira mu butabanguko, abantu balina okunoonya obuyambi okuva mu b'obuyinza abatendekeddwa okukola ku mbeera ng'ezo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo ki ber bedo ikare weng. Me kaka donyo I kuku kuku, dano omyero guyeny kony ki bot lutela ma ki pwonyo gi me tic I kom peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, ejokuna noi aisingarenit ayuwara keda ainapakina. Aiboisit na alosit toma amumu, ekot itunga adumun aingarakinio kanejaas apedorosio nu itutuoritai kanu aitemokin ngun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru e'yo ageyitema ni azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi 'duzu okporu. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi 'yezu ri ma paria, le 'ba ma nda azakoma engazu drice'ba imbata esupi e'yo 'dile 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru kwebembeza eby'okwerinda n'obutebekana. Omu mwanya gw'okwejumba omu butabanguko, abantu bashemereire kusherura obuhwezi kuruga omu b'obushoborozi abatendekirwe kukora aha nshonga nk'ezo.

eng_prompt: When traveling or engaging in official activities, it's crucial to have proper identification on hand. This ensures that you can verify your identity when required.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba otambula oba okwenyigira mu mirimu emitongole, kikulu nnyo okuba n'endagamuntu entuufu. Kino kikakasa nti osobola okukakasa endagamuntu yo bwe kiba kyetagisa.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka wot onyo I timo tic mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki lanyut mamegi nyo ID matye I cingi. Man weko ineno ni itwero moko ni in anga kace mite.
teo_prompt: Neautar jo alosit arai bo aswam aswamisinei nuapolok, ejokuna noi ajaut keda apapula naka aiwadikaeta. Einakini ngin ijo aanyun ebe ipedori jo aitogogong akirokon arai ipudai.
lgg_prompt: Eka aci kani 'ye e'yo azi 'diyi ma alia ci, eri orodriru ovuzu kokobi e'dazuri be ci. Di ni fe mini ecozu mi ma e'da ndrezu ka le ria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootambura nainga orikwejumba omu mirimo y'obutegyeki, n'eky'omugasho kugira ebihandiiko by'okureeberaho ebirikwetengwa. Eki nikihamya ngu noobaasa kuhamya endagamuntu yaawe waaba nooyetenga.

eng_prompt: Despite the urgency of the situation, the complexities involved in gathering evidence often slow down the process. As a result, families and communities are left in a state of uncertainty and frustration.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde embeera eri mu bwangu, obuzibu obuli mu kukungaanya obujulizi butera okulwawo enkola. N'ekivuddemu, amaka n'ebitundu bisigala mu mbeera y'obutali bukakafu n'okunyiiga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, peko matye I coko caden pol kare weko tic bedo yot. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi ki kabedo gi bedo I peko me lworo ki cwer cwiny.
teo_prompt: Karaida epol atipet ejautene, ationis na aituk aitogogongoret etapit aitidisiar ainapeta ngun. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi ikalia keda atutubena keda amamus aijen keda aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ni tro ovuzu mbeleru ra ti, e'yo ewaru e'yo ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'diyi e'yo nde ma ongmbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, familia eyi tualu ongulumu eyi pie eyi aa e'yo eyi ma dria ku dika eyi aa candi ru.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bw'amaani, oburemeezi oburi omu kurundaana obujurizi, buriijo nibutwara obwire bukye. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka n'abantu b'omubyaro nibasigara omu mbeera y'obutetegyerezibwa n'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: Tensions over land ownership have escalated in recent years, leading to violent confrontations between rival groups. As disputes intensify, communities find themselves caught in a cycle of conflict and instability.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwannannyini ku ttaka bweyongedde mu myaka egiyise, ekiviiriddeko okulwanagana okw'amaanyi wakati w'ebibinja ebivuganya. Enkaayana bwe zeeyongera, ebitundu byeesanga mu butabanguko n'obutali butebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Lweny I kom twero me ngom omede tutwal I mwaki ma okato, ma okelo lweny I kin dul mapat-pat matye ka pyem I kingi. Ka telle tye kamede, kabedo mapatpat nongo gitye I peko me lweny ki kuku kuku.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta luikamunitos alupok iyatakinos kokaru lu atuboros, ido eyangaunitos ingungeta lu amumu kiding igurupun lu eboloboloete. Kwape iyata ingungeta, etereikina itunga keda ingungeta keda amamus ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'yo nyaku ma e'ipiru ri ma dria ri ma omgbo tu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, erini fezu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi amuti a'di 'dipi 'diyi ma eselea. Erita ako eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ahabw'obwannannyini bw'eitaka bweyongyeire omu myaka egi, ekyarugiremu okurwanagana kw'amaani ahagati y'ebibiina ebirikuhayahayana. Obutaikirizana ku burikweyongyera, ebyanga nibishangwa omu butabanguko n'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, groups have formed strong identities based on shared beliefs and values, fostering a sense of loyalty among their members. However, when these divisions become too pronounced, they can escalate into conflict and violence.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebibinja bikoze endagamuntu ez'amaanyi nga zisinziira ku nzikiriza n'empisa ez'awamu, ekikuza enneewulira y'obwesigwa mu bammemba baabyo. Newankubadde, okwawukana kuno bwe kweyoleka ennyo, kusobola okuvaamu obukuubagano n'obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, dul mapat-pat guyubu lanyut ma tek ma jenge I kom niyee kacel ki jami ma pigi tego ma weko dano bedo ki gen ikin gi. Kadi bed kumeno, ka apoka-poka eni odoko dit tutwal, twero doko lweny ki tim gero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, eswamautu igurupun ajenuneta nuegogong kotupitete aiyuunikec keda iponesiokec, itolomunenete aiyuunikec mama ejaasi imebanakec. Konye, arai epol atiakatiaka, epedorete kesi aijulakin araun ingungeta keda amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driorisi dria, ongulumu eyi e'do e'yo eyi ma eselea okporu e'yo eyini a'ita eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria, e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea. Kani si, esele coza 'diyi ka eca okporu tu, eyi eco zo e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, guruupu zitungire endagamuntu y'amaani kurugirira aha nzikiriza hamwe n'emitwarize, ekirikureetaho obwesigwa omu bantu baabo. Kwonka, okwebaganisamu oku kwayeyongyera, nikubaasa kurugamu entaro n'obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: Recent conflicts over land ownership have escalated tensions in several communities. To ensure peace and stability, it is crucial for officials to address these disputes promptly.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano obwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bwannannyini ku ttaka bweyongedde okusika omuguwa mu bitundu ebiwerako. Okukakasa emirembe n'obutebenkevu, kya mugaso abakungu okugonjoola enkaayana zino mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Lweny ma okato cokcok-ki I kom twero me ngom omedo telle I kin lwak mapol. Me neno ni kuc ki ber bedo tye, pire tek tutwal ki lutic me tyeko telle magi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta lu atuboros nuikamunitos alupok eyangautu aiyalongong kotoma atutubena nuipu. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aipuc ka ainapakina, ejokuna eswamak aitemokin atiokisio nu katipet.
