lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'yo nyaku ma e'ipiru 'diyi ma dria o'diru 'diyi otu asi omiza ongulumu karakara yi ma eselea ra. Asianzu azini asianzu ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru azi'ba yini e'yo 'di ma aza kozu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Entongane ezabaireho ebiro ebi ahabw'obwannannyini bw'eitaka, zireesireho obunkenke omu bantu baingi. Okureeba ngu hariho obusingye n'obutebekana, n'eky'omugasho ab'eby'obutegyeki kukora aha nshonga ezi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: When purchasing property, it's essential to establish clear ownership rights. One of the most important documents in this process is a land title.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba ogula ettaka, kikulu okuteekawo eddembe ly'obwannannyini erimanyiddwa obulungi. Ekimu ku biwandiiko ebikulu mu nkola eno ye kyapa ky'ettaka.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka wilo jami, pire tek tutwal me niang maber twero pa weggi. Karatac acel ma pire tek tutwal I kare man obedo waraga me ngom.
teo_prompt: Neigwelere iboro, ejokuna aitolomun apedorosio nuka ikulepek. Adiopet kotoma apapulai nuepolok noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi apapula naka alupok.
lgg_prompt: Angu jezaria, eri orodriru e'yo drilemgbo 'ba e'iruri ma dria 'diyi 'bazu kililiru. Kokobi azi alu orodriru e'yo 'di ma alia ri nyaku ma kokobi.
nyn_prompt: Waaba noogura ebintu, ni kikuru kumanya obugabe bwabyo. Emwe aha bihandiiko ebikuru omu nkora egi n'ekyapa ky'eitaka.

eng_prompt: In order to protect the integrity of our natural resources, it is essential to establish guidelines for land use. Effective management practices must be implemented to ensure that all stakeholders understand their rights and responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obulungi bw'ebyobugagga byaffe eby'obutonde, kya mugaso okuteekawo ebiragiro ku nkozesa y'ettaka. Enkola z'enzirukanya ennungi zirina okuteekebwa mu nkola okulaba nga bonna abakwatibwako bategeera eddembe lyabwe n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo, pire tek tutwal me keto cik ma doro tic ki ngom. Yoo me tic maber omyero ki ket itic wek dano weng ongee twero gi ki tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite isuban luka Edeke, ejok aitolomun ainapeta nuka aitwasam alupok. Ibusakinit aitegear iponesio luajokak luka eyaitene kanu awanyun ebe ejenete itunga kere apedorosiokec keda aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyakuni amavile 'diyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru azita e'dozu e'yo nyaku ayuza ni 'diyi ma dria. Le 'ba ma o'ba geri azi ocezu kililiru 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba dria e'yo 'yepi 'diyi va drilemgbo azini azi yini 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okubangira eby'obuhangwa byaitu, n'eky'omugasho okutaho engyenderwaho y'okukoresa eitaka. Enkora nungi y'obwebembezi, eshemereire kutebwa omu nkora, okureeba ngu boona abu kirikukwataho nibeetegyereza obugabe bwabo n'obujunaanizibwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing economic landscape, it is essential for communities to explore sustainable sources of income. By engaging in commercial agriculture, they can enhance food security and boost local economies.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebikyuka amangu, kya mugaso nnyo eri ebitundu okunoonya ensibuko z'ensimbi ez'olubeerera. Nga beenyigira mu bulimi obw'ensimbi, basobola okutumbula emmere n'okutumbula eby'enfuna by'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok me lim tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lwak me yenyo yoo me nongo lim. Kace gucako pur me nongo cente, gitwero medo rwom me cam ki dongo biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loakwana, ejokuna noi itunga aimo iwaitin lu idumunet ikapun. Kowai lo alomar akoru na agwelanar, epedorete kesi aitojokar inyamat ka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru ongulumu eyini geri eyini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ndazu. E'yo ori ezoza tujari 'yezu 'diyisi, eyi eco nyaka ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma lonyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu eby'entaasya biriyo nibihinduka munonga, n'eky'omugasho abantu okuronda oburugo bw'entaasya burikugumaho. Barikwejumba omuby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'obushubuzi, nibabaasa kwongyera ahaby'okurya n'okutunguura entaasya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about the importance of land ownership and its implications is crucial in fostering peaceful communities. Education on land rights can empower individuals and prevent conflicts over land disputes.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku bukulu bw'obwannannyini ku ttaka n'ebivaamu kikulu nnyo mu kukuza ebitundu eby'emirembe. Okusomesebwa ku ddembe ly'ettaka kusobola okutumbula abantu n'okutangira obukuubagano ku nsonga z'ettaka.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom ber pa bedo rwed ngom ki adwoki ne pire tek tutwal I dongo kuc ikin lwak. Pwonyo dano i kom twero me ngom twero weko dano bedo ki kero me gengo lweny i kom lok me ngom.
teo_prompt: Aitopoloun aijen nuikamunitos ajokis naka alupok keda atiokisio nuka alupok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aiboisio nu inapara. Aisisianakino naikamunit apedorosio nuka alupok epedori aitigogong itunga ka aitikitik ingungeta lu alupok.
lgg_prompt: Imbata feza e'yo orodri nyaku ma eipika niri ma dria azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru ongulumu asianzuru 'diyi ezozu. Onita drilemgbo nyaku dria 'diyi ma dria ri eco 'ba eyi ma okpo enga dika e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu omugasho gw'obwannannyini bw'eitaka hamwe n'ebirikubaasa kurugamu, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obusingye omu bantu. Okwegyesa abantu ebikwatiraine n'obugabe bw'eitaka, nikibaasa kuhwera abantu okwetantara entongane ahabw'entongane z'eitaka.

eng_prompt: In times of division and unrest, the role of cultural leaders becomes increasingly vital. They have the power to influence minds and foster understanding among diverse groups.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enjawukana n'obutabanguko, omulimu gw'abakulembeze b'ennono gweyongera okuba omukulu. Balina amaanyi okukyusa ebirowoozo n'okutumbula okutegeera mu bibiina eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me apoka-poka ki lweny, tic pa lutela tekwaro doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Gitye ki kero me doro tam pa dano ki kelo winye ikin dano ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiakatiaka ka amumu, epol noi aswam naka engarenok lu atekerin. Ejaasi kesi keda apedor naka aijulakin aomisio nuka itunga ka aitopoloria apuponoro kiding igurupun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa esele coza ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea, azi drice'ba suruni 'diyiniri eca curu'do orodriru. Yi ma okpo e'yo 'ba yi ma omi ojazu azini vata ejizu ongulumu ndundu yi ma eselea ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu n'obutabanguko, omurimo gw'abebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Biine amaani g'okuhindura ebiteekateeko n'okureetaho okwetegyerezana omu guruupu ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: Disputes over inherited property have become increasingly common in our community. As tensions rise, families find themselves torn apart by conflicting interests and claims.
lug_prompt: Enkaayana ku by'obugagga ebyasikirwa zeeyongedde mu kitundu kyaffe. Obunkenke bweyongera, amaka geesanga nga gatataganyizibwa olw'ebigendererwa n'ebigambibwa ebikontana.
ach_prompt: Lweny I kom jami ma dano oleyo ki bot lunyodogi tye ka mede tutwal I kabedo wa. Ka telle tye kamedde, gangi nongo gitye kacwer pi miti ki miti mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta lu ikamunitos iboro lu iurunitai kiyatakinos kotoma atutubetekosi. Arai iyata ingungeta, ewanyunete ikalia ebe etiakakinos kanuka ipudesia keda ipudesia luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'yo lonyi 'bani esu 'diyi ma dria 'diyi curu'do tu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea tutu. E'yo ewaru eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, familia eyi eyi esu eyi ma esele co e'yo eyini le azini e'yo eyini le 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Entongane aha bintu eby'obusika, zigumire nizeeyongyera omu byanga byaitu. Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera, amaka nigashangwa gateganitsibwe ahabw'ebigyendererwa ebitarikushushana hamwe n'ebigyendererwa ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In times of social unrest and polarization, it is crucial for influential figures to foster unity and understanding. By prioritizing collaboration over conflict, they can help build stronger, more resilient communities.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutabanguko mu bantu n'okweyawulayawula, kya mugaso nnyo eri abantu ab'amaanyi okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana. Nga bakulembeza enkolagana okusinga obukuubagano, basobola okuyamba okuzimba ebitundu ebinywevu era ebigumira embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny ki apoka-poka I kin lwak, pire tek tutwal pi dano ma oywek me kelo ribe ki winye. Ka guketo winye obedo gin ma pire tek me kaka lweny, gitwero konyo me yubu kabedo ma tek dok ma tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amumu keda atiakatiaka, ejokuna noi itunga luapolok aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro. Kowai lo aisingarenit aiswamanara itia ingungeta, epedorete kesi aingarakin aiduk aiboisio nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni azini esele coza ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba okporu 'diyi ni ti ecita azini vata ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo ti icita niri 'duzu okporu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma drilea risi, eyi eco ongulumu okporu azini okporu 'diyi si ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko n'okwebaganisamu, n'eky'omugasho abantu b'amaani okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana. Kubarikutwara okukwatanisa nka kikuru kukira entaro, nibabaasa kuhwera omu kwombeka ebyanga ebihami kandi ebirikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed troubling patterns of misconduct within the legal system. As a result, public trust in the judiciary has significantly eroded.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti waliwo emize emibi mu kitongole ky'amateeka. N'ekivuddemu, obwesige bw'abantu mu kitongole ekiramuzi bukendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim maraco mapol tutwal I tenge me cik. Macalo adwogi ne, gen pa lwak I kom lungol kop odok piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunitos iponesio luarokok luka ikisila. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto amuno naka itunga mama ejaasi ikatubok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo adriza onzi 'diyi geri azita ma vuti obiza ni 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, o'bi eyi ma asi'baza e'yo liza ma dria ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka emicwe mibi omu biragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, obwesigye bw'abantu omu kitongore ekirikucwera emanja bukyendeire.

eng_prompt: In regions where diverse ethnic groups coexist, tensions often escalate due to historical grievances and competition for resources. To foster peace and stability, cultural leaders must unite and address these underlying issues collaboratively.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebirimu amawanga ag'enjawulo, obunkenke butera okweyongera olw'okwemulugunya kw'ebyafaayo n'okuvuganya ku by'obugagga. Okutumbula emirembe n'obutebenkevu, abakulembeze b'ennono balina okwegatta n'okukola ku nsonga zino ezisookerwako nga bakolagana.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma kaka mapat-pat bedo iye kacelo, telle ipol kare mede pi koko me tekwaro ki pyem pi lonyo. Me kelo kuc ki ber bedo, lutela tekwaro omyero guribe dok gutii i kom peko magi kacel.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuejaasi atekerin nuegelegela nepepe, iyata duc ingungeta kanuka akiro nukolo keda abolobol naka iboro. Kanu aitopolor aipuc ka ainapakina, ekot engarenok lu atekerin aimorikikin kosodete aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Angu suru ndundu eyini aa'zu tualu 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo ewaru ewu driorisi 'diyi ma e'yosi azini baka seza afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria ri si. Asianzu azini asianzu ejizu, le drice'ba suruni 'diyi ma eciti tualu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza ko tualu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka ahu amahanga gatarikushushana garikutuura hamwe,obunkenke nibweyongyera ahabw'okwetomboitwa kw'ebyafaayo hamwe n'okuhayahayana ahaby'obugaiga. Okureetaho obusingye n'obutebekana, abebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa bashemereire kukwatanisa kandi bakore aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: In many regions, longstanding tribal conflicts have led to devastating consequences for communities. It is essential to find peaceful resolutions to these disputes to foster understanding and cooperation.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, entalo z'amawanga ezimaze ebbanga eddene zivuddeko ebizibu eby'amaanyi mu bitundu. Kya mugaso okugonjoola enkaayana zino mu mirembe okutumbula okutegeera n'okukolagana.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, lweny me kaka ma obedo tye pi kare malac okelo peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapatpat. Pire tek tutwal me tyeko telle magi I yoo me kuc wek winye ki winye obed tye.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, ingungeta luka atekerin luejaasi apak naepol eyangaunitos atiokisio nuarokok nejaas itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin atiokisio nu kainapakin kanu aitopolor aiswamanara keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, ngiringiri suru suru eyini aa'pi sa'wa ezu 'diyi eji e'yo onzi eyi ongulumu eyini. Eri orodriru e'yo ngiringiri 'diyi ma aza kozu asianzuru si e'yo vata azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, entaro z'enganda ezimazire obwire buraingwa, zireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bantu. N'eky'omugasho okusherura oburyo bw'okutereeza entongane ezi omu busingye, okureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Recent audits have revealed significant discrepancies in the financial reports submitted by various district committees. Concerns have been raised about the transparency and accountability of their financial practices.
lug_prompt: Okubalirirwa kw'ebitabo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwalaga obutakwatagana mu lipoota z'ebyensimbi ezaaweebwayo obukiiko bwa disitulikiti obw'enjawulo. Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bwerufu n'embalirira y'enkola zaabwe ez'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ngiyo kor tic ki lim ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I kom adwoki me lim ma komitti me districts mapat-pat omiyo. Lworo obedo tye I kom ada ki tic ki kor tic gi me lim.
teo_prompt: Angicio naka ikapun kotoma odisitriktan itodunitos amamut acamanar kotoma iripootan luka ikapun lu ijukunitos ikomitin luka idisitriktan luegelegela. Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu aica ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatotor kesi ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andri o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu ri e'da e'yo onzi 'diyi o'duko siza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria komiti distrikiti ni ndundu eyini fe 'diyi ma alea. Asi otiza efu e'yo e'yo ada ma dria azini geri yini robia ayuzuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okushwijumwa kw'ebitabo okwabaireho obwahati, kworeka obutaikirizana omu ripoota z'esente ezirikuheebwayo obukiiko bwa disiturikiti butari bumwe na bumwe. Hariho okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza n'embaririra y'emirimo yaabo y'esente.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed a troubling pattern of unethical behavior among public servants. As a result, many local council officials have been sighted as being involved in corruption scandals.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti abakozi ba gavumenti beeyisa mu ngeri etali ya mpisa. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu ba gavumenti z'ebitundu bangi batunuuliddwa nga abeenyigira mu mivuyo gy'obuli bw'enguzi.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyutu ni lutic pa gamente tye ki tim maraco mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me tedero mapol kineno gi macalo joo ma timo tim me camcana.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunitos iponesio lumam iswamaete ejok kanejaas eswamak luka apugan. Kanuka ngun, eswamak luipu luka ekansulo luka atutubet ewanyunitai ebe ejaas toma akiro nu ecamusana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da adriza onzi azi'ba gameteni 'diyi ma eselea ci. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ebi azi'ba local council ni karakara 'diyi ndre e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka emichwe mibi omu bakozi ba gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi baingi aha bukiiko bw'ebyaro nibareebwa nk'abarikwejumba omu bushomankuzi.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become a pervasive issue in many districts, undermining public trust and hindering development. To restore integrity and accountability, decisive action is necessary.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi bufuuse kizibu mu disitulikiti nnyingi, ekityoboola obwesige bw'abantu n'okulemesa enkulaakulana. Okuzzaawo obwesimbu n'obuvunaanyizibwa, ekikolwa eky'amaanyi kyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Camucana dong odoko peko madit tutwal I dicitrwik mapol, ma balo gen pa lwak ki gengo dongo lobo. Me dwoko ber bedo ki kor tic, omyero kimok tam matek.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka apiyai erai ationis naepol noi ko disitriktan luipu, ido itolitoli amuno naka itunga ka aitikitik apol. Kanu ainyakun nuka abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, ekot aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo eca curu'do e'yo azi disitrikiti karakara eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi, erini asi 'bazu o'bi eyi ma dria ku dika eri angu ezoma atrizu. Le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo okporu e'yo ada ma dria azini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: To ensure transparency and accountability in financial management, it is essential to implement systematic oversight measures. One effective strategy is to conduct regular audits at the district level to curb corruption.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira mu nzirukanya y'ebyensimbi, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola ennambulukufu ey'okulondoola. Enkola emu ennungi kwe kukola okubalirira buli kaseera ku mutendera gwa disitulikiti okusobola okukomya obuli bw'enguzi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic ki lim tye atir, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede. Yoo acel maber en aye me ngiyo kor tic ki lim ikare ki kare I rwom me dicitrwik me lweny i kom camcana.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, ibusakinit aitegear ainapeta nuka aimaniman. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok ngesi airereonor ikapun ko disitrikt kanu aitikitik amidicio naka apiyai.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu e'yo ada be azini e'yo nzezu geri robia ayuzuri ma dria, eri orodriru geri 'bani ecozu e'yo nde ma pamvu onezu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Otita azi orodriru ni eyi ma azi eyi ma pamvu onezu sa'wa driasi distrikiti eyi ma alea e'yo anyamgbolo niri atrizu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent investigations revealing widespread misconduct, there is growing public demand for accountability among elected officials. Many citizens believe that serious consequences are necessary to restore trust in local governance.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga nti waliwo emize emibi mingi, waliwo obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera obw'obuvunaanyizibwa mu bakungu abalonde. Bannansi bangi balowooza nti ebinaavaamu bibi nnyo okusobola okuzzaawo obwesige mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki ma onyuto tim maraco mapol tutwal, dano mapol tye ka mito ni lutic ma kiyero gi omyero gunyut kor tic gi. Lwak mapol gitye ki niyee ni adwogi marac tye pi dwoko gen I kom tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aingic napac itodunit ebe ejai iponesio luarokok luipu, ejai eipuda lo itunga kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere eswamak lu eseunitai. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ibusakinit ainapeta nuepolok kanu ainyakun amunokina toma apugan na okwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru e'dapi e'yo adriza onzi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra ri ma e'yosi, o'bi eyi le 'ba opeta eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ece e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra. Kari anzi karakara eyi ai ra kini e'yo eyi 'yepi okporu 'diyi orodriru asi'baza ejizu driceza angu 'da ma alea ri ma alea.

eng_prompt: Effective financial management is crucial for the growth and sustainability of sports organizations. Unfortunately, many entities in the sports sector struggle with proper allocation and oversight of their funds.
lug_prompt: Enkwata y'ensimbi ennungi ya mugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana n'okuwangaala kw'ebitongole by'ebyemizannyo. Eky'ennaku, ebitongole bingi mu by'emizannyo birwanagana n'okugaba obulungi n'okulondoola ensimbi zaabyo.
ach_prompt: Tic ki lim maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo ki dongo pa dul mapat-pat me tuku. Ki gum marac, dul mapat-pat mapol I tenge me tuku gitye ki peko me tic ki limgi maber.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin ikapun ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda aijar naka iriongeta luka aboliasio. Nukaiturur, ejaas iriongeta luipu luka aboliasio keda ationis na aitwasam ikapun kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru amuti avita ni 'diyi ma zota ni. Drile onziru, amuti karakara esele avita niri ma alea 'diyi dri ci geri eyini robia eyivile 'diyi ayuzu kililiru ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In light of recent budgetary concerns and community feedback, it has become increasingly important for local leaders to ensure transparency in their financial practices. Stakeholders are demanding clearer insights into how funds are allocated and spent.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'embalirira gyebuvuddeko n'ebiteeso by'abantu, kyeyongedde okuba eky'omugaso eri abakulembeze b'ebyalo okukakasa obwerufu mu nkola zaabwe ez'ebyensimbi. Abakwatibwako baagala amagezi amatuufu ku ngeri ensimbi gye zigabanyizibwamu n'okusaasaanyizibwamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me byek me lim ma otimme cokcok-ki ki tam pa lwak, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ki lutela me tedero me neno ni lok ada tye I kom tic gi me lim. Lwak tye ka mito ni gunyut maber kit ma ki poko ki tic ki lim.

nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha nshonga y'embaririra eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'ebi abantu barikugarukamu, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho abebembezi b'ebyaro, okureeba ngu hariho amazima omu nkora yaabo y'esente. Abantu abarikukwatanisa nibenda okumanya oku esente zirikukoresibwa n'oku zirikukoresibwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing economic challenges faced by our community, local leaders are exploring innovative solutions to address the pressing issue of poverty. One potential strategy involves reallocating existing resources to support targeted initiatives that foster economic growth and stability.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okugenda mu maaso mu kitundu kyaffe, abakulembeze b'ebyalo banoonya engeri empya ez'okugonjoolamu ekizibu ky'obwavu. ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim matye ka time I kabedo wa, lutela me tedero tye ka yenyo yoo me cobo peko me can. Yoo acel matwero bedo tye me loko jami ma tye me konyo yub mapat-pat ma kelo dongo lobo ki ber bedo.

Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukorwa, n'okugaruraho eby'obugaiga ebiriho, okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'obutebekana.

eng_prompt: To combat corruption effectively, it is essential to implement strict measures against those who abuse their power. One crucial step in this process is ensuring that any illicit gains are confiscated.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulwanyisa obulungi obuli bw'enguzi, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola enkakali ku abo abakozesa obubi obuyinza bwabwe. Emu ku mitendera emikulu mu nkola eno kwe kukakasa nti ebintu byonna ebifunibwa mu bumenyi bw'amateeka bikwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Me lweny maber i kom camcana, pire tek tutwal me keto yoo matek i kom joo ma nywaro tic ki twero gi. Yub acel ma pire tek tutwal I yoo man obedo neno ni jami weng ma ki nongo iwi alii kimako gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitiji amidicio naka apiyai ejok, ibusakinit aitegear ainapeta nuegogong mama ejaasi ngul luitosomaete apedorosiokec. Ationis adiope naepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe ikamaritai iboro luedumununio koipone kalo mam ebeitor.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'dizu e'yo anyamgbolo niri be kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yezu 'ba okpo yini ayu'ba 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba afa dria 'bani esu geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi 'diyi obi ci.

eng_prompt: In recent months, several high-profile investigations have raised questions about the integrity of public servants. As a result, rumors and allegations have begun to circulate, leading to a wave of scrutiny against certain officials.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, okunoonyereza okw'amaanyi kuleeseewo okubuusabuusa ku bwesimbu bw'abakozi ba gavumenti. N'ekivuddemu, olugambo n'ebigambibwa bitandise okusaasaana, ekiviiriddeko okukeberebwa kw'abakungu abamu.

teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apotu aingic naepol koinakisi aingiseta nuikamunitos aiyuwara naka eswamak luka apugan. Kanuka ngun, ageunos akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro nu akiro
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eti ondaza okporu 'diyi eji e'yo azi'ba gameteni 'diyi ma e'yo ada ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo onzi azini e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi e'do aci ra, e'yo 'di fe 'bani azi'ba azi 'diyi ma ale andrizu.

eng_prompt: Investigating corruption often proves to be a daunting task for authorities. Many times, the intricate web of deceit makes it difficult to uncover the truth.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza ku buli bw'enguzi kitera okuba ekizibu eri ab'obuyinza. Ebiseera ebisinga, obulimba obutali bumu bulemesa okuzuula amazima.
ach_prompt: Kwed I kom camcana ipol kare bedo tic matek tutwal ki lutela. I kare mapol, kubbe pa lok goba weko bedo tek tutwal me niang lok ada.
teo_prompt: Aingic amidicio naka apiyai erai duc aswam na etiono noi kanejaas apedorosio. Apakio nuipu, epone loepol noi loka aisab einakini etiono aitodun abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo niri ma eti ondazu ri eri sa'wa driasi azi okporu 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyini. Sa'wa karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo enzoru 'diyi ni fe ewaru e'yo ada eyi ofuzu.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous allegations and public outcry, the legal system often struggles to hold corrupt officials accountable. This is primarily because most corruption cases get thrown out of court due to lack of evidence.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo ebigambibwa bingi n'okwemulugunya kw'abantu, enkola y'amateeka etera okulwana okuvunaana abakungu abalya enguzi. Kino kiri bwe kityo kubanga emisango gy'obuli bw'enguzi egisinga gigobwa mu kkooti olw'obutaba na bujulizi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni adot tye mapol tutwal ki koko pa lwak, cik pol kare nongo tek tutwal me ngolo kop i kom lucamcana. Man pole tye pien pol pa bal me camcana ki bolo gi woko ki I kot pi bedo peke pa caden.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aitoroneta keda aimony naka itunga, etapit duc ikisila ainingosit aitepesen eswamak lu ekorapusion. Erai na na naarai emamiatatar imusagon luka ecamusana adieket naarai emamete nuitogogongito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yo eyi ma dria karakara azini o'bi eyi ma o'duko si ra ti, geri e'yo liza ni 'diyi sa'wa driasi dri ci 'ba anyamgbolo ru 'diyi 'duzu e'yo 'yezu. Diri tutuni a'disiku 'ba kesi anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma pari dro kotia si e'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi ma ako si.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the prevalence of corruption poses significant challenges to organizations across various sectors. To combat this issue effectively, leveraging innovative financial technologies can provide enhanced transparency and accountability.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, obuli bw'enguzi obuyitiridde buleeta okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri ebitongole mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. Okusobola okulwanyisa ensonga eno obulungi, okukozesa tekinologiya w'ebyensimbi ow'omulembe kisobola okwongera ku bwerufu n'embalirira.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, rwom me camcana tye ka kelo peko madit tutwal I dul mapat-pat I tenge mapat-pat mapat-pat. Me lweny i kom peko man maber, tic ki diro manyen me tic ki lim twero medo ada ki kor tic ki lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejai amidicio naka apiyai ainingosit naepol noi mama ejaasi atukona nuka iriongeta luegelegela. Kanu aitiji ationis na ejok, aitosom etatai loakwana loka ikapun epedori ayangaun acoa na abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, anyamgbolo ma omgbo ni e'yo ewaru eji amuti esele ndu ndu 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, geri o'diru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma ayuza eco e'yo ada azini geri 'bani robia ayuzuri ma dria ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, obushomankuzi niburemesa ebitongore omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. Okurwanisa enshonga egi kurungi, okukoresa tekinorogye y'eby'empiiha, nikibaasa kureetaho amazima n'embaririra.

eng_prompt: In today's political climate, the pressure to maintain a pristine public image often leads to intense scrutiny of officials. This environment can foster a culture of suspicion and fear, where individuals may resort to unfounded accusations to undermine their opponents.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi ey'ennaku zino, akazito k'okukuuma ekifaananyi ky'abantu ekirongoofu kitera okuviirako abakungu okwekebejjebwa ennyo. Embeera eno esobola okutumbula obuwangwa bw'okwekengera n'okutya, nga abantu baddukira mu kulumiriza okutaliiko musingi okutyoboola abavuganya baabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me cungu iwi bye me kareni, lyeto me gwoko nying maber I kin lwak ipol kare kelo ngiyo kor lutic. Kabedo man twero kelo tekwaro me bedo ki akala-kala ki lworo, kama dano acel-acel twero cako koko ma peke ki tyen lok matir me cayo joo ma pyem kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka epolitikis loka lolo, eipuda lo aidar ekiror loajokan lo itunga eyangauni aingic naepol noi naka eswamak. Epedori ejautene lo aitopolor einono lo aiyuun ka akuriau, ne epedorete itunga aitodun aitoroneta numam iswamaete kanu aitolitol ngul lu itepegitos kes.
