eng_prompt: As the votes were tallied and the atmosphere grew tense, many residents gathered to hear the outcome. The unexpected turn of events during the campaign left everyone on edge, leading to speculation about the legitimacy of the results.
lug_prompt: Obululu bwe bwabadde bubalibwa era embeera ne yeeyongera okusika omuguwa, abatuuze bangi baakuŋŋaanye okuwulira ebyava mu kulonda. Enkyukakyuka etasuubirwa mu kakuyege yaleka buli omu ku bunkenke, ekyaviirako okuteebereza ku bwenkanya bw'ebyava mu kulonda.

eng_prompt: Despite the rising number of reported infections, many parents are concerned about the lack of communication from school officials. As a result, there is growing frustration among the community regarding the district's handling of health protocols.

ach_prompt: I ngee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I kome, en dong oo I miti ne me kwan. Pi mar madit ma en tye kwede pi kwan ki keto cwinye I kwan, en odonyo I gang kwan me yunibaciti ma oywek tutwal I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu ngesi kodolok alosikineteke naka asioman. Keda amin naka aisisia keda ainakina kanu asioman ke, abu ngesi koloma toma oUnibasiti loajokan kakere koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza be 'bori ma vutia, eri ca asizu e'yo erini le onita ma alia 'diyi ma alia ra. Leta onitani azini asi feza erini onita ma dria risi, eri fi univasiti azi okporu ndeni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, ahamuheru akahika aha kigyendererwa kye ky'okushoma. Ahabw'okukunda kwe kwega n'okwehayo aha mishomo ye, akeehandiikisa omu yunivaasite erikukirayo ekitiinisa omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: From a young age, she was captivated by the power of knowledge and the impact it could have on people's lives. Her experiences as a volunteer tutor only deepened her commitment to helping others learn and grow.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu myaka emito, yakwatibwako nnyo amaanyi g'okumanya n'engeri gye kikwata ku bulamu bw'abantu. Obumanyirivu bwe ng'omusomesa ow'obwannakyewa bwongedde obweyamo bwe okuyamba abalala okuyiga n'okukula.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kare ma en pud tidi, en obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom teko pa ngec ki adwogi ne I kom kwo pa dano. Ngec ma en obedo kwede macalo lapwony ma pe jenge I kom gamente omedo mitine me konyo jo mukene me pwonyo ki dongo.
teo_prompt: Ageun editeu, abu ngesi ikamunitos agogong naka acoa keda epone loepedoria ngesi aijulakin aijar naka itunga. Abu akeswam kwape esisianakinan loakokuju koinak ngesi apodokinit aingarakin luce aisisia ka apoloun.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu eli werea ri ma alea, eri ma asi ndra okpo ondua niri ma dria tualu e'yo erini eco 'ye 'ba eyi ma edri ma dria 'diyi pie. E'yo erini esu erini aa'zu imbapi owitaru ri ru ri fe lu asi 'baza erini 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza kozu onizu azini zozu ri ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga akiri muto, akakundwa amaani g'obwengye n'omugasho ogu burikubaasa kugira aha magara g'abantu. Obumanyirizi bwe nk'omwegyesa w'obwannakyeereza, bukongyera aha kwehayo kwe kuhwera abandi kwega n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: After years of studying and gaining experience in education, she felt a strong calling to make a difference in her community. With a passion for teaching and empowering others, she began her journey at the Uganda Christian University.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'asoma era ng'afuna obumanyirivu mu by'enjigiriza, yawulira ng'akubirizibwa okukola enkyukakyuka mu kitundu kye. Olw'okwagala ennyo okusomesa n'okuzzaamu abalala amaanyi, olugendo lwe yalutandikira ku Uganda Christian University.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me kwan ki nongo ngec I lok me kwan, en owinyo lwongo matek me kelo aloka-loka I kabedo ne. Ki miti madit tutwal me pwonyo ki tyelo kor jo mukene, en ocako wot mege I Uganda Christian University.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka asioman keda adumun amisiarit kotoma asioman, abu ngesi kopup aiwororio naepol noi naka aitolomun aijulanakineta kotoma atutubeteke. Keda amina naepol noi naka aisisianakin ka aitigogong luce, abu ngesi kogeu alositeke ko Unibasiti loko Uganda Christian.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini sukulu lazu azini e'yo onita nisi 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri etumu omveta okporu 'bani eri omvezu ojata ejizu ongulumu erivileri ma alea. Leta erini imbata fezu azini okpo fezu 'ba azi 'diyi dri risi, eri e'do aci ivileri univasiti Uganda Christian University niri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okushoma n'okutunga obukugu omu by'obwegyese, akahurira ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okukora empindahinduka omukyanga kye. Ahabw'okukunda kwe kwegyesa n'okugaruramu abandi amaani, akatandika orugyendo rwe ahari yunivaasite ya Uganda Christian University.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the need for community support and resources, she dedicated herself to addressing local issues. Her vision inspired others to join her in creating a sustainable solution for their neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa mu kitundu, yeewaayo okukola ku nsonga z'ekitundu. Okwolesebwa kwe kwazzaamu abalala amaanyi okumwegattako mu kutondawo eky'okugonjoola ekizibu eky'olubeerera mu kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I nge niang miti pa lwak me miyo kony ki jami ma mite, en oketo cwinye me cobo peko me tedero. Ginanyuta mege okonyo jo mukene me ribbe kwede me yubu yoo me cobo peko matye pi kare malac pi kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loka agangat keda iboro luka itunga, abu ngesi koinak akekuan aitemokin atiokisio nuka atutubet. Abu aomisioitike kisinyikok luce aimorikikin keda ngesi aitolomun iboro luibusakinit aitemokin kanu aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Erini esuzu e'yo lezu atita ongulumu eyini ri ma dria, eri owi i e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo erini dre ri fe ava 'ba azi 'diyi dri yi ecizu eri be e'yo azi ecopi ovuzu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi edezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi n'eby'obugaiga kuruga omu bantu, akeehayo kukora aha nshonga z'ekyaro. Ekiteekateeko kye kikahiga abandi okumwegaitaho omu kureetaho oburyo burungi bw'okutereeza ebyaro byabo.

eng_prompt: After months of searching and applying, she finally received a call that could change her career. Excitement bubbled within her as she read the email detailing the position.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi ng'anoonya n'okusaba, yafuna essimu eyali esobola okukyusa omulimu gwe. Yasanyuka nnyo bwe yasoma e-mail eyali eraga ekifo ekyo.
ach_prompt: Inge dwee mapol me yenyo ki penyo pi tic, lacen en onongo cim ma twero loko ticce. Cwiny nyakoni obedo yom adada I kare ma en tye ka kwano email ma otito lok matut I kom tic ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aimo ka ailip, abu ngesi kodum esimu loepedori aijulakin aswamuke. Abu ngesi iyalama noi kotoma aisiom akiroke nuka elago nuikamunitos adoketaitike.
lgg_prompt: Mba ndazu azini waraga sizu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu simu 'bani ecozu eri ma azi ojazu ra. Ayiko fu eri ma alia erini e'yo email ni pari 'da ma dria ri laria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuronda n'okushaba, akahendera yaatunga esimu eyabaire neeza kuhindura omurimo gwe. Akashemererwa munonga bwanyima y'okushoma email erikushoboorora gye omurimo.

eng_prompt: Her colleagues admired her unwavering dedication and strong work ethic. Every task she undertook was approached with a sense of purpose and determination.
lug_prompt: Banne beewuunya nnyo obumalirivu bwe n'enneeyisa ye ennungi mu mulimu. Buli mulimu gwe yakola yagukola n'ekigendererwa era n'obumalirivu.
ach_prompt: Lutic luwote gubedo ki yomcwiny pi tic matek ma en otimo. Tic mo keken ma en otimo, en otimo ki mit kom.
teo_prompt: Apotu ipaupake ituroto ainakina ke keda iponesioke luka aswam. Kangol aswam naiswamat ngesi aponi kitodolikinai keda apeleikinet.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma agyipika eyi ndra ayikosi e'yo erini azi ngazu okporu 'diyisi. Azi dria erini 'ye 'diyi 'ye asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Bagyenzi be bakamusiima ahabw'okwehayo kwe n'omuringo murungi gw'okukoramu. Buri murimo gwona ogwabaire nigukorwa, gukaba nigukorwa n'ekigyendererwa n'amaani.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a close-knit community, she often witnessed the struggles and triumphs of her neighbors. Inspired by their stories, she felt a strong calling to make their voices heard.
lug_prompt: Ng'akulira mu kitundu ekirimu enkolagana ey'oku lusegere, yalabanga entalo n'obuwanguzi bwa baliraanwa be. Olw'okubudaabudibwa emboozi zaabwe, yawulira omulanga ogw'amaanyi okuwulira amaloboozi gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Pien odongo I kabedo matye ki wat macok, en obedo kaneno lweny ki loc pa jirani ne. Lok meggi okonye me winyo lwongo matek tutwal me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu apoloun kotoma atutubet naejaasi keda aimorikikina, abu ngesi kosesen atiokisio keda akerianut naka idunyetake. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi akiro kec, abu ngesi kopup aiwororio naepol noi naka aitodiar iporotookec.
lgg_prompt: Erini zozu ongulumu ti ecita be tu 'diyi ma alea, eri ndre e'yo a'di 'diza azini drile suza jo ejele erivile 'diyiniri ra. E'yo yini olu 'diyisi ava esuzu, eri etumu omveta okporuni yi ma o'duko erizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukurira omu kyanga ekirikukwatanisa, akakira kureeba entaro n'obusinguzi bwa bataahi be. Ahabw'okuhuumurizibwa emboozi zaabo, akahurira okwetwa kw'amaani kureetera eiraka ryabo kuhurirwa.

eng_prompt: After years of advocating for community issues and raising awareness about local concerns, she felt compelled to take her passion for change to the next level. Inspired by the lack of representation, she decided to run for office and make her voice heard.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'alwanirira ensonga z'ekitundu n'okumanyisa abantu ku nsonga ezikwata ku kitundu, yawulira ng'alina okutwala obwagazi bwe eri enkyukakyuka ku ddaala eddala. Olw'obutaba na bakiise, yasalawo okwesimbawo aleete eddoboozi lye okuwulirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny pi peko me kabedo gi ki rweyo lwak i kom peko me kabedo gi, en owinyo ni omyero oter mitine me kelo aloka loka I rwom ma lamal. Pi peko me bedo peke pa luwang lwak, en omoko tamme me cung I yer wek dwane owinyre.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aigang akiro nuka atutubet keda aisisianakin itunga nuka atiokisio nuka atutubet, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi ayangar amina ke naka aijulakin akiro toma adoketait naetupakini. Aponi kisinyikokinai kanu amamus na abwoikinit, abu ngesi koseu aibwo kanu aitodiar eporotoke.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani a'di 'dizu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria azini imbata fezu e'yo angu eyini 'diyi ma dria 'bo ri ma vutia, eri ega kini le i ma leta ojata ejizu ri ma omgbo otu. Erini ava esuzu 'ba pa tupi eri ma paria 'diyi ma ako si, eri 'du e'yo pa tuzu ofisi ma alia erini ani i ma o'duko erizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikurwanirira enshonga z'ekyanga hamwe n'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata ahabyaro bye, akahurira naagyemeserezibwa kutwara rukundo ye y'empinduka aha rurengo orundi. Ahabw'obutajwekyerwa, akasharamu kwesimbaho kugira ngu eiraka rye rihurikwe.

eng_prompt: After a competitive election campaign filled with passionate debates and community engagement, the results were finally announced. With overwhelming support from her constituents, she was ready to take on her new role.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukuba kampeyini z'okulonda ezaabaddemu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, ebyavaamu byalangirirwa. Olw'obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva mu balonzi be, yali mwetegefu okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa bwe obupya.
ach_prompt: Ingee pyem me bito kwir ma opong ki laro lok ki lwak, adwogi yer ne dong kicwalo woko. Ki cwak madit tutwal ma aa ki bot lubol kwir mege, en onongo tye atera me timo ticce manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolobol naka ikampeins keda epeget loepol noi keda aimorikikin itunga, aponi kolimorai akiro nuelomunitos. Keda agangat naepol noi kama ejaasi itungake, akapakina ngesi aswam aswamuke naitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara opetaa ni okporu 'diyi ma vutia, e'yo agbatara ni okporu 'diyi pie tualu e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi pie, 'ba azi asizu e'yo agata ni 'diyi ra. Atita angiri engazu 'ba erini opi nyapi 'diyi vu risi, eri de ngonde azi erini o'diruri 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ehururu y'okuhayahayana erimu okuhanuura kw'amaani hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, ebyarugiremu bikarangirirwa. Ahabw'obuhwezi bwingi kuruga omu bantu be, akaba ayeteekateekire kutwara omurimo gwe omusya.

eng_prompt: Her reputation for outsmarting opponents was well-known, instilling fear in anyone who dared to challenge her. Many had witnessed her victories and were hesitant to face her in any competition.
lug_prompt: Yali amanyiddwa nnyo olw'okuwangula abo be yali avuganya nabo, era ekyo kyatiisa nnyo omuntu yenna eyamuvuganya. Bangi baali balabye obuwanguzi bwe era tebaali beetegefu kumuvuganya mu kuvuganya kwonna.
ach_prompt: Nying mege me ryeko loyo jo ma obedo ka pyem kwedgi onongo ngene tutwal, ma oweko lworo omako ngat mo keken ma obedo ki tekcwiny me pyem kwede. Dano mapol guneno loc ma en oloyo dok gubedo ki lworo me pyem kwede I pyem mo keken.
teo_prompt: Ajenara ngesi noi kanu aitelekaar ngul lueboloboloete keda ngesi, ido abu koinak itunganan yenetapit aitepeg ngesi akurianu. Apotu itunga luipu kowanyutu aitelekaareke ido apotu kongeroto aibwo keda ngesi kotoma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni eri ma ru 'ba ageti otipi eri be 'diyi ma dria onduaru tu, erini ori fezu 'ba ci asi 'bapi eri ma dria 'diyi dri. Ba karakara eyi ndre ndra e'yo erini agazu 'diyi ra dika eyi ndra asi otiza be eyini muzu abala 'yezu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Akamanyirwe munonga nk'omunyabwengye arikusinga abarikumuhakanisa, ekyamureeteire kutiina omuntu weena owaabaire aine obumanzi bw'okumuhakanisa. Baingi bakaba bareebire obusinguzi bwe kandi bakaba batiina kumuhakanisa omu mpaka zoona.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the local political landscape shifted dramatically, leading to a consensus among party members. As a result, she became a member of parliament without being opposed.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu kitundu yakyuka nnyo, ekyaviirako okukkaanya mu bammemba b'ekibiina. N'ekyavaamu, yafuuka omubaka wa paalamenti nga tavuganyiziddwa.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, lok me cungu iwi-bye I tedero olokke tutwal, ma okelo winye ikin lumemba me dul me cungu iwi-bye ne. Macalo adwogi ne, en odoko lamemba me parliament labongo pyem ki ngat mo keken.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, abu epolitikis loka atutubet kijulak noi, ido abu koyangau acamanar kiding imeeban luka epate. Kanuka ngun, abu ngesi koraun emeeba loka airabet komam etepeganitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, e'yo politiki ni angu 'da ma alea ri oja i okporu, erini fezu ti ecita ni ecazu 'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, eri eca memba koloseni ni 'bani ageti oti kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, embeera y'eby'obutegyeki omu byaro ekahinduka munonga, ekyarugiremu okukirizana omu ba memba b'ekibiina. N'ekyarugiremu, akahinduka omukiiki omwishengyero hatariho owamuhakanisa.

eng_prompt: As a leader deeply committed to her community, she has witnessed the struggles and hardships they face daily. Driven by a vision for a brighter future, she is determined to implement meaningful changes.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze eyeewaddeyo ennyo eri ekitundu kye, alabye entalo n'ebizibu bye basanga buli lunaku. Olw'okuba alina ekiruubirirwa eky'okuba n'ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebirungi, mumalirivu okukola enkyukakyuka ez'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela ma oketo cwinye tutwal I kom lwak mege, en oneno lweny ki peko magitye ka kato ki iye nino ki nino. Ki miti me neno anyim maber, en omoko tamme me kelo alokaloka matye ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon lo ekapakina noi mama ejaasi itunga luka atutubeteke, ewanyunit ngesi atiokisio keda atiokisio nu ejaas kesi nginiparan. Keda aomisioit naka aijar naejok koingaren, ekapakina ngesi aitodolikin aijulanakineta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba azi asi fepi ongulumu erivileri ni ru, eri ndre e'yo a'di 'diza azini e'yo ewaru yini dri fuzu yi be o'du driasi 'diyi ra. Egata ewu drialeri ni muke risi, eri asi 'ba e'yo ojata orodriruni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi orikukunda munonga abantu be, akareeba entaro n'oburemeezi obubarikurabamu buriizooba. Ahabw'okwenda kureeba ebiro bya nyensya birungi, amaririire kukora empindahinduka ez'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Her empathy is unmatched, allowing her to connect with others on a deeper level. Friends often turn to her for advice, knowing she truly listens and cares.
lug_prompt: Obusaasizi bwe tebuliiko gwe bugeraageranya, ekimusobozesa okukwatagana n'abalala ku ddaala ery'omunda. Mikwano gye gitera okudda gy'ali okumuwa amagezi, nga bakimanyi nti ddala awuliriza era afaayo.
ach_prompt: Kica ma en tye kwede pe rom ki pa ngat mukene, man weko en bedo ki kubbe ki jo mukene I rwom ma lamal tutwal. Lureme ipol kare gidok bote pi nongo tam, kun gingeyo ni en winyo lokgi dok paro pigi.
teo_prompt: Emina ngesi itunga noi, ijaikini ngesi arucokina keda luce kotoma adoketait naepol noi. Etapit ipapero alosit nejai ngesi kanu aicoreta, ejenete ebe epupokinit ngesi ka apodokinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ndeni, eri fe erini ti ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie angu aliru 'diyi ma alea. Agyipi eyi aci eri vu imbata esuzu, eyini nii ra kini eri e'yo eri azini asi 'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Okusaasibwa kwe tikurikubaasa kugyeragyeranisibwa, ekirikumwikiriza kukwatanisa n'abandi aha rurengo rw'amaani. Banywani be nibakira kumushaba obuhabuzi, barikumanya ngu naahurikiza kandi naabafaho.

eng_prompt: Her extensive experience in customer service has equipped her with valuable skills. Whether it's resolving conflicts or providing support, she excels in understanding others' needs.
lug_prompt: Obumanyirivu bwe obw'amaanyi mu kuweereza bakasitoma bumuwadde obukugu obw'omuwendo. Ka kibeere kugonjoola butakkaanya oba okuwa obuyambi, asinga mu kutegeera ebyetaago by'abalala.
ach_prompt: Ngec madit ma en tye kwede I tic ki luwil omiye diro ma pire tek tutwal. Kadi bed ni tye ka cobo peko onyo miyo kony, en tye ki kero me niang miti pa jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Amisiarit ke naepol noi kotoma aijanakin agwelak einakinit ngesi acoa naejok noi. Arai itemonokinete ingungeta arai bo aijanakin agangat, iswamai ngesi kagogong noi kotoma amisiikin ipudesia luka luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini esu tu aje'ba eyi ma aza kozu ri fe erini ondua orodriru 'diyi. Ka tro ovu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kani ku atita fezu, eri aga e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obumanyi bwe bwingi omu kuheereza abaguzi bumuhereize emyoga y'omugasho. Yaaba n'okugonjoora entongane nainga okuheereza obuhwezi, nayetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo by'abandi.

eng_prompt: In a world where inequality persists, she believes that fostering connections is key to driving meaningful change. Her mission is to empower individuals by broadening their access to resources and networks.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli obutali bwenkanya, alowooza nti okukulaakulanya enkolagana kye kisumuluzo ky'okutambuza enkyukakyuka ey'amakulu. Ekigendererwa kye kwe kuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi nga bagaziya enkola yaabwe ey'okukozesa ebintu n'emikutu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma rwate peke iye, en tye ki niyee ni kelo kubbe obedo gin ma pire tek me kelo aloka loka maber. Miti mege tye me tyelo kor dano kun medo kero gi me nongo kony ki kubbe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naemamei airiamara, iyuunit ngesi ebe aitopolor aiswamanara nes elacet loka aitodolikin aijulakinet naejok. Alosikineteke erai aitigogong itunga kopone lo aitanyanyar eipone lo adumunun iboro keda iponesio luka elago.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru esele coza ni mu drile ri ma alea, eri a'ira kini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu ri eri fungua ojata orodriru ni ejizu ri'I. Eri ma asisile lezu 'ba yi dri okpo fezu geri eyini geri eyini ecozu afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi etarimu buringaniza, naateekateeka ngu okureetaho empurizagana n'eky'omugasho omu kureetaho empinduka. Ekigyendererwa kye n'okwongyera abantu amaani obwo arikwongyera aha buheereza bwabo n'emikutu yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a world where inequality persists, she believes that everyone deserves the opportunity to thrive. Her passion for social justice drives her to advocate for essential resources for all.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli obutali bwenkanya, alowooza nti buli omu agwanidde omukisa okukulaakulana. Okwagala kwe eri obwenkanya bw'embeera z'abantu kumuleetera okulwanirira ebyetaago by'abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma rwate peke iye, en tye ki niyee ni dano weng omyero gunong gum me dongo. Mar ma en tye kwede pi lok matir I kin lwak oweko en tye ka lweny pi jami ma mite pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naemamei airiamara, iyuunit ngesi ebe ekot nginitunganan arereng naka apol. Amina ke kanuka etube loajokan nes isinyikokini ngesi aigangit nuka iboro lu itwasamao kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo esele coza niri ni mu drile ri ma alea, eri a'ira kini le 'ba dria ma esu drileba zozu ra. Leta erini e'yo liza kililiru o'bi yi ma eselea ri ma dria ri ni eri ma ti oji a'di 'dizu afa orodriru 'diyi ma dria 'ba dria yi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi etarimu buringaniza, naateekateeka ngu buri omwe ashemereire kutunga omugisha gw'okutunguuka. Okukunda kwe eby'oburingaaniza nikimureetera kurwanirira eby'obugaiga eby'omugasho ahari boona.

eng_prompt: As a dedicated public servant, the parliamentarian balances the demands of political life with personal responsibilities. Despite a busy schedule, they prioritize spending quality time with their loved ones.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukozi wa gavumenti eyeewaddeyo, omubaka wa paalamenti atereeza ebyetaago by'obulamu bw'ebyobufuzi n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe obw'obuntu. Wadde nga balina eby'okukola bingi, bakulembeza okumala ebiseera n'abaagalwa baabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo latic pa gamente ma odyere, lamemba me parliament tye ki kero me timo tic mapat-pat me cungu iwi-bye kacel ki tic ma mege. Kadi bed ni gitye ki jami mapol me atima, gimaro bedo ki jo ma gimaro.
teo_prompt: Kwape eswaman lo ekapakina, epedori emeeba loka airabet aitirian aijar naka epolitikis keda aswamisinei ke. Karaida ipu aswamisio, isingarenitos kesi aitosom apak naejok keda luminan kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba gameteni asi fepiri ru, azi'ba koloseni ni 'da ni e'yo politiki ni 'diyi 'ye tualu azi i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie. Sa'wa yini aa'zu ri ma talasi, eyi sa'wa eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini leletu 'diyi pie ri 'du okporu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omukozi wa gavumenti, omukiiki omwishengyero naabaasa kutereeza ebyetaago by'eby'obutegyeki hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa bwe. N'obu baakuba baine bingi by'okukora, nibakulembeza kumara obwire burungi n'abakundwa baabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the community has focused on revitalizing its local economy. As a result, many residents have turned to farming and other agricultural practices.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kitadde essira ku kuzzaawo ebyenfuna byakyo. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi baddukidde mu kulima n'ennima endala.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ilo malo rwom me lim I kabedo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol gucako pur ki pur mukene.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apodokinit itunga aisiteteun edumune loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, alomasi itunga luipu akoru keda icie iponesio luka akor.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'da 'ba asi e'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do amvu 'ya 'yeta amvu 'yaza ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho,ekyanga kiteire amaani omu kugarura busya eby'entaasya yaakyo. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi batandikire kuhinga n'okuriisa n'okukoresa emiringo endiijo y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Despite their hard work and dedication, the local farmers struggle to maintain their crops. One of the main challenges they face is the lack of access to high-quality seed options.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bakola nnyo era nga beewaddeyo, abalimi b'omu kitundu balwana okukuuma ebirime byabwe. Ekimu ku bisinga okubasomooza kwe butafuna nsigo za mutindo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lupur me tedero gitiyo matek me gwoko cam gi. Peko acel madit ma ginongo obedo peko me nongo kodi ma rwom gi malo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu, eutasi akoriok luka atutubet ainingosit aidar iraanakec. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi ngesi amamus na adumunun ikinyom lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini okporu azini asi feza yiniri ma talasi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri ci ori yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo ewaru alu eyini esu ri eri geri eyini ecozu ori wura muke 'diyi esuzu ku ri i.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okukora munonga n'okwehayo kwabo, abahingi b'omubyaro nibarwana kurinda ebihingirwe byabo. Kimwe ahaburemeezi bw'amaani obu barikutunga, n'obutabaasa kutunga embibo nungi.

eng_prompt: The agricultural sector in Uganda has been facing significant challenges due to the prevalence of low-quality products. Recent studies have revealed alarming statistics regarding the authenticity of seeds available to farmers.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'ebyobulimi mu Uganda kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi olw'ebintu ebiri ku mutindo ogwa wansi. Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwalaga ebibalo ebitiisa ebikwata ku butuufu bw'ensigo eziriwo eri abalimi.
ach_prompt: Tenge me pur I lobo Uganda obedo kanongo peko madit tutwal pi jami ma rwom gi lapiny. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto lok mapol ma kelo lworo I kom kodi ma lupur tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo akoru ko Uganda etereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok kanuka iboro luikidioko adoketait. Aingic napac itodunitos akiro nuarokok nuikamunitos abeit naka ikinyom lu ejaas akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Esele agrikica ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ebi e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo afa edeza wura muke ku 'diyiniri ma e'yosi. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da kalafe ori 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri 'diyi ma e'yo adaru.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu Uganda kitwire nikitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani ahabw'ebintu by'omutindo gw'ahansi. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ebihandiiko ebirikutangaaza ebirikukwata aha mbuto ezi abahingi barikubaasa kutunga.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to increase their crop yields, farmers were lured by the promise of high-quality seeds at a fraction of the usual price. Unfortunately, they failed to verify the source and quality of the seeds before making their purchases.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku makungula gaabwe, abalimi baasendebwasendebwa ekisuubizo ky'ensigo ez'omutindo ogwa waggulu ku bbeeyi eya bulijjo. Eky'omukisa omubi, baalemererwa okukakasa ensibuko n'omutindo gw'ensigo nga tebannagula.
ach_prompt: I temo matek tutwal me medo kac gi, lupur gubedo ki miti me nongo kodi ma rwom gi malo I wel matidi loyo weng. Ki gum marac, gukwero niang kama kodi ne oa ki iye ki rwomgi mapwod pe guwilo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam naepol noi aiyatakin esakec, apotu akoriok kisinyikokisi keda aisumuneta nuka ikinyom luejokuka noi keda itiaisinei luikidioko. Nukaiturur, apotu kesi ipikosi aanyun ne elomunit ikinyom ka adoketaitikec eringa egwela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni lezu ori efiza yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, 'ba 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi obe e'yo 'bani lezu ori wura onyiru 'diyi isuzu aje were si ri si. Drile onziru, eyi awini geri ori 'da eyini engazu ri esu ku dika eyi awini eyi ma wura esu de nga po'di eyi awini eyi je ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugyezaho kw'amaani kw'okwongyera amasharuura g'ebihingirwe byabo, abahingi bakasindikibwa okuraganisa kw'embibo y'omutindo gw'ahaiguru ahamuhendo mukye. Eky'obusaasi, bakaremwa kuhamya oburugo n'omutindo gw'embibo, batakaguzire.

eng_prompt: In recent months, reports of counterfeit seeds flooding the market have raised concerns among local agricultural communities. To address this pressing issue, experts decided to hold an informative event for farmers.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, alipoota z'ensigo ez'ebicupuli ezibooga mu katale zireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bantu b'omu byalo abalimi. Okusobola okukola ku kizibu kino eky'amangu, abakugu baasalawo okutegeka olukung'aana olw'okuyigiriza abalimi.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lok ma aa ki I kom kodi ma pe obedo ada I cuk okelo lworo ikin lupur me tedero. Me tyeko lok man ma pire tek tutwal-li, ludiro gumoko tamgi me yubu yub me pwonyo lupur.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, akiro nuikamunitos ikinyom lumam eraasi luka abeit lu elelete osokoni eyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas akoriok luka atutubet. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, apotu ipirioitin itolototo aisisianakino na akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, o'duko e'yo ori enzoru 'diyi ma dria cu ma alia 'diyi eji asi otiza ongulumu 'ba amvu 'yapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo okporu 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi 'du e'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, ripoota z'embibo egingiriire omu katare zireesire okwerarikirira omu bantu b'omubyaro. Okukora aha nshonga egi, abakugu bakasharamu kutaho omukoro gw'okushomesa abahingi n'abariisa.

eng_prompt: The concept of human rights has evolved over centuries, reflecting the fundamental principles of dignity and equality. These rights serve as a universal standard, ensuring that all individuals are treated with respect and fairness, regardless of their background.
lug_prompt: Endowooza y'eddembe ly'obuntu ebaddewo okumala ebyasa bingi, ekiraga emisingi emikulu egy'ekitiibwa n'okwenkanankana. Eddembe lino likola nga omutindo gw'ensi yonna, okukakasa nti abantu bonna bayisibwa n'ekitiibwa n'obwenkanya, awatali kufaayo ku nsibuko yabwe.
ach_prompt: Lok me twero pa dano olokke pi cencwari mapol, ma nyutu cik ma igi lac me woro ki bedo marom. Twero magi tiyo macalo rwom ma dano weng omyero gubed kwede, neno ni kitero dano weng ki woro ki ber bedo, labongo paro pi kama gi aa ki iye.
teo_prompt: Apolor apedorosio nuka itunga kokaru lu atuboros, itodunit ainapeta nuka angosibib keda airiamara. Iswamaete apedorosio nu kwape ainapeta nuka akwap kere, aanyun ebe itunga kere eyaitai keda ayongit ka ayongite, araida elomunit kesi kokinga.
lgg_prompt: Egata drilemgbo 'bani 'ba ada eyi ma dria ri e'bi i oja ewu karakara eyi ma alea, e'dazu e'yo okporu inzita ni azini trotro ri ma dria. Drilemgbo 'diyi azi nga ekile wura wudrikurusi ndulu ni lezu nezu ra kini 'ba 'ba dria yi 'ye inzita si azini kililiru, yini engazu ngua ri ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Ekiteekateeko ky'obugabe bw'abantu kihindukire kumara ebyasha bingi, ekirikworeka emisingye y'ekitiinisa n'oburingaaniza. Obugabe obu nibukora nk'omutindo gw'ensi yoona, okureeba ngu abantu boona nibatwarwa n'ekitiinisa n'oburingaaniza, oihiremu oburugo bwabo.

eng_prompt: In any professional environment, fostering a culture of collaboration and understanding is essential for success. This foundation allows us to work effectively together and achieve our common goals.
lug_prompt: Mu kifo kyonna eky'ekikugu, okutumbula obuwangwa bw'okukwatagana n'okutegeeragana kya mugaso eri obuwanguzi. Omusingi guno gutusobozesa okukolera awamu obulungi n'okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe eby'awamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken me tic, dongo tekwaro me ribe ki winye obedo gin ma pire tek pi nongo loc. Dul man weko watiyo maber kacel ki cobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit adio na epirioit, aitopolor einono lo aiswamanara ka apuponoro nes ejok kanu akerianut. Ingarakini atukot ngin oni aswam nepepe kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Angu azi ngazani ciria, e'yo ti icita ni azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Afa omvele foundation ruri ni fe ama dri azi ngazu tualu kililiru e'yo amani lele 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'eby'emikono yoona, okureetaho enkora y'okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Ekitongore eki nikitubaasisa kukorera hamwe kurungi, n'okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu.

eng_prompt: To ensure the success of our project, it's crucial that we gather diverse perspectives and resources. Identifying key players in the industry will help us move forward effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obuwanguzi bwa pulojekiti yaffe, kikulu nnyo okukungaanya endowooza n'ebikozesebwa eby'enjawulo. Okuzuula abazannyi abakulu mu mulimu kijja kutuyamba okugenda mu maaso obulungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic wa owoto maber, pire tek tutwal ni wacok tam ki jami ma pat pat. Niang lutic ma pigi tego I tenge enoni bikonyo wa me medde anyim maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ebuni epurojekt wok akerianar, ejokuna noi aimorikikin aomisio nuegelegela keda iboro luegelegela. Ajenun aboliak lu epol ajokis kotoma okampuni ingarakini oni alosit ngaren ejok.
lgg_prompt: Otita amavileri ma drile suzu, eri orodriru amani egata ndundu eyi trazu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. Ba okporu okalamvu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma esuta ni nga ama aza ko muzu drile geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obusinguzi bwa purogyekiti yaitu, n'eky'omugasho okurundaana enteekateeka n'ebintu bitari bimwe. Okureeba abazaani abakuru omu by'obushubuzi nikiija kutuhwera kugyenda omu maisho kurungi.

eng_prompt: In any agricultural policy framework, it is essential to recognize the voices of those directly impacted by the decisions. Ensuring that stakeholders are included fosters a more equitable and effective approach to farming practices.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yonna ey'enkola y'ebyobulimi, kya mugaso okumanya amaloboozi g'abo abakwatibwako obutereevu okusalawo. Okukakasa nti abakwatibwako bakwatibwako kitumbula enkola ey'obwenkanya era ennungi mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: I yub mo keken makwako lok me pur, pire tek tutwal me niang dwon pa joo ma moko tamgi ogudo komgi. Neno ni joo ma lok tye I komgi gubedo tye weko yoo me pur bedo ber dok ma opore.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka akoru, ejokuna ajenun iporotoi luka ngul luetiroritos aseununeta. Aanyun ebe imoriaritai itunga kere luejaasi toma akoru itopolori ewai loajokan lo akoru.
lgg_prompt: Azita dria agirikica ma dria 'diyi ma alia, eri orodriru o'duko 'ba e'yo 'dule 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. E'yo 'ba dria e'yo amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yo ndrezu ri ni geri 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu kililiru azini kililiru 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora yoona y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, n'eky'omugasho kumanya eiraka ry'abo abarikuteganisibwa encwamu. Okureeba ngu boona abu kirikukwataho beejumbwamu, nikireetaho oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: As part of the agricultural development program, a series of workshops were organized to educate local farmers. These sessions focused on legal frameworks and resources available to support their livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitundu ku nteekateeka y'okukulaakulanya ebyobulimi, emisomo egy'enjawulo gyategekebwa okusomesa abalimi b'omu kitundu. Ebiseera bino byassa essira ku mateeka n'ebikozesebwa ebiriwo okubeezaawo obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub me dongo rwom me pur, kacoke mapol kiyubu me pwonyo lupur me tedero. Kacokke magi oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom cik ki jami ma tye me konyo kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nuka aitopol akoru, aponi itemokinai airiamun kanu aisisianakin akoriok luka atutubet. Apotu airiamununeta ngun kisingarenata nuka ikisila keda iboro lu ejaas kanu aigang aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Otita agirikica ezozu ri ma azi ru, 'ba otu otita imbatani karakara eyi imbata fezu 'ba amvu 'yapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. E'yo 'yeza 'diyi 'ba asi geri azita ni 'diyi ma dria tualu afa ndundu eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, emishomo mingi ekatebekanisibwa kwegyesa abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro. Emishaara egi ekata amaani aha nkora y'ebiragiro hamwe n'ebintu ebirikubaasa kuhwera abantu baabo.

eng_prompt: In recent months, reports of counterfeit agricultural products have surged, posing a significant threat to crop yields. To combat this issue, local agricultural organizations organized workshops to inform farmers about the dangers of fake seeds.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, alipoota z'ebyamaguzi by'ebyobulimi ebijingirire zeeyongedde, ekireeseewo akabi ak'amaanyi ku makungula. Okusobola okulwanyisa ensonga eno, ebitongole by'ebyobulimi eby'omu kitundu byategeka emisomo okutegeeza abalimi ku kabi akali mu nsigo ez'ebicupuli.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lok I kom jami apita ma pe obedo ada omede tutwal, ma man okelo peko madit tutwal I kom kac pa cam. Me lweny i kom peko man, dul ma doro lok kom pur guyubu kacoke me pwonyo lupur i kom rac pa kodi ma pe obedo ada.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apolor akiro nuikamunitos iboro luka akor lumam eraasi luka abeit, nuepedorete aimusung iraan luka iraan. Kanu aitikokin ationis na, apotu iriongeta luka akoru kitemokisi airiamun kanu aitijenikin akoriok nuka atiokisio nuka ikinyom lumam eraasi luka abeit.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, o'duko e'yo afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ma wura onzi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra, e'yo 'dipi ori eyi ma ori eyi ezazu. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti agirikica ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu otita imbatani 'diyi 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri e'yo onzi ori inzoru 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, ripoota z'ebintu by'eby'obuhingi ebitahikire, byeyongyeire, ekirikuteganisa amasharuura g'ebihingirwe. Okurwanisa enshonga egi,ebitongore by'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'omubyaro, bikatebekanisa emishomo y'okumanyisa abahingi n'abariisa akabi k'embibo egingiriire.

eng_prompt: For years, the farmers toiled under harsh conditions, believing they had no power to change their circumstances. Little did they realize that there were laws in place to protect their interests and ensure their voices were heard.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyaka, abalimi baakola mu mbeera enzibu, nga balowooza nti tebalina buyinza kukyusa mbeera yaabwe. Baali tebamanyi nti waaliwo amateeka agakuuma ebigendererwa byabwe n'okukakasa nti amaloboozi gaabwe gawulirwa.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, lupur gutiyo matek tutwal I kwo matek tutwal, kun gitamo ni pe gitye ki kero me loko kwo gi. Onongo pe gingeo ni cik tye me gwoko miti gi ki neno ni ki winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ikar luipu, apotu akoriok kiswamata kotoma ojautene loaronon, aomit ebe emamete kesi keda apedor naka aijulakin ejautene kec. Mam kesi ajenete ebe ejaas ikisila lu eyuwarete ipudesia kec ka awanyun ebe epupokino iporotoikec.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi nga azi okporu e'yo ewaru ma alea, yini egarisi kini eyi ma okpo e'yo eyi ma edri ojazu yo. Eyi nini ndra ra kini azita eyi ci eyi ma egata eyi ma ta mbazu azini nezu ra kini 'ba eri o'duko eyivile 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka mingi, abahingi bakakora munonga omu mbeera mbi, barikwikiriza ngu tibaine maani g'okuhindura embeera zaabo. Bakaba batarikumanya ngu hariho ebiragiro by'okurinda ebyetengo byabo n'okureeba ngu eiraka ryabo rihurirwa.

eng_prompt: The local farmers attended a workshop on sustainable agriculture practices. As part of the session, experts shared valuable resources for improving crop yields.
lug_prompt: Abalimi b'omu kitundu beetabye mu musomo ogukwata ku nnima ey'obuwangaazi. Ng'ekitundu ky'olutuula, abakugu baagabana ebintu eby'omugaso okutumbula amakungula g'ebirime.
ach_prompt: Lupur me tedero gubedo tye I kacoke me pwonye I kom diro me pur matye anyim. Macalo but kacoke enoni, ludiro gupoko jami ma pigi tego me medo rwom me kac pa cam.
teo_prompt: Apotu akoriok luka atutubet kojaikinos toma airiamun na ikamunitos akoru na eyapie. Kwape ediope kotoma airiamunet kangin, apotu ipirioitin kimorata iboro luingarakinete aitojokar akoru na iraan.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi mu otita imbatani 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma dria geri agirikica eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo erizuri ma azi ru, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi awa afa orodriru 'bani ecozu ori eyi ma ori ezozu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi b'omubyaro bakeejumba omu mushomo ogurikukwata aha buhingi n'oburiisa oburikubaasa kugumaho. Nk'ekicweka ky'orukiiko, abakugu bakabagana ebintu by'omugasho by'okutunguura amasharuura g'ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower the local agricultural community, the district leaders organized a workshop aimed at educating farmers about legal protections and resources available to them. Participants gathered eagerly, hoping to gain valuable insights that would enhance their understanding of their rights.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula abalimi b'omu kitundu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baategeka omusomo ogugendereddwamu okusomesa abalimi ku bukuumi bw'amateeka n'ebikozesebwa ebiriwo gye bali. Abeetabamu baakuŋŋaana n'essanyu, nga basuubira okufuna amagezi ag'omugaso agajja okwongera ku kutegeera kwabwe ku ddembe lyabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor lupur me tedero, lutela me district guyubu kacoke me pwonyo lupur i kom cik ma gwokogi ki jami ma gitye kwede. Dano ma gubedo tye gucokke ki miti madit tutwal, ki gen me nongo ngec ma pire tek ma twero medo niang gi i kom twero gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong itunga lu akoriok, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt itemokisi airiamun kanu aisisianakin akoriok nuikamunitos ayuwara keda iboro lu ejaas kesi. Apotu itunga lu ajaas atukokinos keda eipud, aomitos ebe epedorete kesi adumun acoa naepol noi naikamunit apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri okpo fezu, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi otu otita imbatani 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri imbata fezu e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma dria tualu afa eyini lele 'diyi pie. Ba emu'ba 'diyi tra eyi avasi, asi 'baza be e'yo orodriru eyini ecozu eyi ma drilemgbo eyi vazu ra 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura abantu b'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu byaro, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakatebekanisa omushomo ogwabaire nigugyenderera okwegyesa abahingi n'abariisa ebikwatireine n'ebiragiro hamwe n'ebintu ebi barikubaasa kutunga. Abeejumbiremu baketeeranira hamwe n'omuhimbo, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaza kutunga ebirikubayamba kwetegyereza obugabe bwabo.

eng_prompt: By implementing a comprehensive training program and optimizing their workflow processes, the team was better equipped to tackle challenges. This transformation empowered them to streamline their efforts and focus on their goals.
lug_prompt: Mu kussa mu nkola enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa okutwalira awamu n'okulongoosa enkola z'emirimu gyabwe, ttiimu yabadde n'ebikozesebwa okusobola okwanganga okusoomoozebwa. Enkyukakyuka eno yabawa amaanyi okulongoosa mu kaweefube waabwe n'okussa essira ku biruubirirwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: I keto yub me pwonye maber I tic ki yubu kit ma tic gi woto kwede, dul ne onongo tye ki jami weng ma mite me lweny i kom peko. Alokaloka man omiinigi kero me yubu tic gi ki keto cwiny gi i kom yub gi.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitegear ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro ka aitojokar aswamukec, apotu itimun kopedosi aitemokin atiokisio. Abu aijulanakineta ngin ijaik kes agogongu na aitemonokin aswamukec kosodete aitodolikin alosikinetekec.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani 'diyi 'bazu azini geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi otuzu risi, amuti 'da esu afa eyini le 'diyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ojata 'di fe eyini okpo okpo eyini okpo eyini 'diyi otuzu dika eyini asi 'bazu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuta omunkora enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu n'okutereeza emirimo yaabo, tiimu ekaba eyeteekateekire kurwanisa oburemeezi. Empindahinduka egi ekabaha amaani g'okukoresa amaani gaabo n'okuta amaani aha bigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: As the agricultural sector faces increasing challenges, the prevalence of counterfeit seeds has become a significant concern for farmers. In response, various organizations have mobilized to raise awareness and provide education on this pressing issue.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi kyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okweyongera, okweyongera kw'ensigo ez'ebicupuli kufuuse okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi eri abalimi n'abalunzi. Mu kwanukula, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikungaanye okumanyisa n'okusomesa ku nsonga eno ey'amangu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tenge me pur tye ka nongo peko mapol, pol pa kodi ma pe obedo ada dong odoko peko madit tutwal bot lupur. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat guribbe me rweyo lwak ki pwonyo dano i kom lok man ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina erionget loka akor keda atiokisio nuiyatakinos, apol naka ikinyom lumam eraasi lukabeit erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas akoriok. Kanu aitemokin ngun, iriamunos iriongeta luipu aisisianakin itunga akiro nuikamunitos ationis na.
lgg_prompt: Esele agirikica niri ni e'yo ewaru eyi esu tualuri ma alea, ori enzoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni eca asi otiza ru 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, amuti karakara eyi tra eyi imbata fezu azini imbata fezu e'yo okporu 'di ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibitunga oburemeezi obweyongyeire, okujanjaara kw'embibo egingiriire nikyerarikiriza abahingi n'abariisa munonga. Omu kugarukamu,ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe bikoreriine okumanyisa abantu n'okubaha obwegyese aha nshonga egi erikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: Farmers rely heavily on high-quality seeds to ensure a successful harvest. Unfortunately, the market is increasingly flooded with counterfeit products that undermine agricultural yields.
lug_prompt: Abalimi beesigama nnyo ku nsigo ez'omutindo okusobola okukungula obulungi. Eky'ennaku, akatale keeyongedde okujjula ebintu ebijingirire ebityoboola amakungula g'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Lupur gijenge tutwalle I kom kodi ma rwom gi malo me neno ni kac gi tye maber. Ki gum marac, cuk tye ka pong ki jami ma pe obedo ada ma balo kac pa lupur.
teo_prompt: Emunokina akoriok noi ikinyom lu ejokuka kanu awanyun ebe ekoriete kesi ejok. Nukaiturur, elelebunos osokoni keda iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit lu itidisiaret isakan luka akoru.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi yi ati ori onyiru 'diyi ma dria tu yini ani okuzu kililiru beni. Drile onziru, cu ma alia afa edeza enzoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra afa ofule agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo esipi ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi nibagyendera munonga aha mbibo z'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, okureeba ngu basharuura kurungi. Eky'obusaasi, akatare keeyongyeire kwijuzibwa ebintu ebitahikire ebirikuremesa eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to boost their profits, the company developed a new line of seeds marketed as revolutionary. However, the reality behind their flashy advertisements was far from the truth.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku magoba gaabwe, kampuni yakola ensigo empya ezaatundibwa nga ez'enkyukakyuka. Kyokka, amazima agaali emabega w'okulanga kwabwe kwali wala nnyo n'amazima.
ach_prompt: I tute matek tutwal me medo magoba gi, dul ne oyubu kodi manyen ma kicato calo gin manyen tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, lok ada ma obedo I nge cato wilgi obedo mabor ki lok ada.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam naepol noi aitojokar ameda, abu ekampuni kitolomu ikinyom luitetiak luitodiaritai kwape luitegelikina. Konye, akiro nuka abeit nuikamunitos alimonoreta kec mam araasi nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu tualu orodri yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, amuti nde e'do ori azi o'dini 'bani ozile e'yo o'diru ni ru. Kani si, e'yo adani e'yo 'bani 'ba yi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri ndra e'yo ada vurisi re.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugyezaho kw'amaani kw'okwongyera amagoba gaabo, kampuni ekakora embibo nsya ezirikuguzibwa nk'ez'omutaano. Kwonka, amazima agabaire gari enyima y'ebirango byabo, gakaba gari hare n'amazima.

eng_prompt: Many farmers rely on high-quality seeds to ensure a successful harvest and improve their livelihoods. However, the proliferation of counterfeit seeds has become a significant challenge in agricultural communities.
lug_prompt: Abalimi bangi beesigama ku nsigo ez'omutindo okusobola okukungula obulungi n'okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu. Newankubadde, okusaasaana kw'ensigo ez'ebicupuli kifuuse okusoomooza okw'amaanyi mu bitundu by'abalimi.
ach_prompt: Lupur mapol gijenge I kom kodi ma rwom gi malo me neno ni kac gi tye maber ki medo rwom me kwo gi. Kadi bed kumeno, nya pa kodi ma pe obedo ada obedo peko madit tutwal I kin lupur.
teo_prompt: Apotu akoriok luipu ogiroto ikinyom lu ejokuka kanu awanyun ebe ekoriete ejok ka aitojokar aijar kec. Konye, awea na ikinyom luarokok erai ainingosit naepol noi kanejaas akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ma pari yi yi ati ori onyiru 'diyi ma dria yini ani ori okuzu kililiru azini geri yini aa'zu ri otuzu. Kani si, ori efi onzi 'diyi ma omgbo ni eca curu'do e'yo ewaru 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: As the drought persisted and the soil remained parched, the village elders gathered to discuss the dire situation. They feared that planting the seeds would lead to further loss and hardship for the community.
lug_prompt: Ekyeya bwe kyagenda mu maaso n'ettaka ne likalu, abakadde b'ekyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbeera embi. Baali batya nti okusimba ensigo kijja kwongera okufiiriza n'okubonyaabonya ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng omede ki cwer dok ngom odong otwo, ludito me caro gugure me nywako lok I kom peko matye. Gubedo ki lworo ni pito kodi eni obumedo can ki can i kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu akamu inyikok keda alupok amamut, apotu luapolok luka ecaalo kiriamunos kanu aitemitem ejautene loaronon. Akuriaka kesi ebe aira ikinyom ngun eyangauni aibiror keda atiokisio nejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli ni mu drile azini nyaku ni ovuzu a'wizaru, 'ba 'wara calo ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo onzi 'da ma dria. Eyi 'ye orisi kini ori 'da eyi saza ni nga fe ongulumu eyini e'yo avizu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi esuzu drile.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwagumiizemu kandi eitaka rikaguma rikomire, abakuru b'ekyaro bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mbeera y'akabi. Bakaba nibatiina ngu okubyara embibo nikiija kwongyera okufeerwa n'oburemeezi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Many church leaders have noticed a decline in donations during the pandemic. Some congregants are expressing concerns about their financial situations, leading to a shift in their giving practices.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'ekkanisa bangi balabye okukendeera kw'obuyambi mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde bbunansi. Abakrisitaayo abamu balaga obweraliikirivu ku mbeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi, ekibaleetedde okukyusa mu ngeri gye bagabiramu.
ach_prompt: Lutela kanica mapol guneno ni lim ma kimiyo ojwik tutwal I kare man me two korona. Lucristayo mukene gitye ka nyutu lworo I kom kit ma lim gi tye kwede, ma man okelo aloka loka I yoo gi me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok luipu luka ekanisa owanyutu aibiror naka agangat kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona. Itunga ice luka ekanisa itodunitos aiyalongongo kanu ejautenekec loka ikapun, ido ngin ijaikini kesi aijulakin iponesiokec luka ainanakin.

nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'ekanisa baingi, bareebire okucendeera kw'obuhwezi omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi. Abakurisitaayo abamwe nibereka okwerarikirira ahabw'embeera yaabo y'esente, ekirikubareetera kuhindura omu mihanda yaabo y'okugaba.

eng_prompt: In every moment of life, we find evidence of his presence and influence. Whether in the bloom of spring or the chill of winter, his essence permeates the world around us.
lug_prompt: Mu buli kaseera k'obulamu, tusanga obujulizi bw'okubeerawo kwe n'obuyinza bwe. Ka kibeere mu bimuli by'omusana oba mu bunnyogovu bw'obutiti, obulamu bwe buyitiridde mu nsi etwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me kwo, wanongo lanyut me bedo tye ki twero ma en tye kwede. Kadi bed ni obedo I kare me cwer pa piny onyo I kare me koyo pa piny, kit ma en tye kwede tye I lobo ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kangolipak naka aijar, idumuni oni aitogogongoret naka ajaut ke keda apedoroke. Karaida kotoma aturo naka akwap arai kotoma akwap naelilim noi, ejai ngesi toma akwap wok kere.
lgg_prompt: Sawa dria idri ma alia, ama afa ecepi kini eri ci azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ci 'diyi isu ra. Ka tro ovu e'deta driasiri ma alia kaniku ambiza ambizaruri ma alia, e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi wudrikuru ama ma ageia 'diyi ma alia dria.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing public health concerns, many citizens had been eagerly awaiting updates on restrictions. After weeks of discussions and consultations with health officials, the government finally reached a decision.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu mu bantu okugenda mu maaso, bannansi bangi babadde balindirira n'obwagazi ebipya ku bukwakkulizo. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okwebuuza ku bakungu b'ebyobulamu okumala wiiki eziwera, gavumenti yatuuka ku kusalawo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, anywali mapol obedo kakuru ngec manyen I kom kigeng matye. Ingee cabit mapol me nywako lok ki lutic me yotkom, gamente dong omoko tam.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka angaleu naka itunga, autasi itunga luipu aidar akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos ikisila. Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aineranara keda eswamak luka angaleu, abu apugan kodolok aseunet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'bi eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma e'yosi, kari anzi karakara eyi ebi o'dukoti eyi te asi driasi e'yo 'bani 'ba atrizu 'diyi ma dria. Sabiti 'bani e'yo onzezu azini e'yo ozizu 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, gamete eca asizu e'yo azi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara g'abantu ezirikugyenda omu maisho, abatuuragye baingi babaire bategyereize amakuru ag'omutaano agarikukwata aha bukwakurizo. Bwanyima y'esande z'okuhanuura n'okwebuuza aha bakuru b'ebyamagara, gavumenti ekahendera yaahika aha kusharamu.

eng_prompt: As the sun set behind the hills, the pastor gathered his congregation for a final message. With passion in his voice, he emphasized the importance of sharing their faith with others.
lug_prompt: Ng'enjuba egwa emabega w'obusozi, omusumba yakunga abantu be okuwuliriza obubaka obusembayo. Ng'alina obwagazi mu ddoboozi lye, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okugabana enzikiriza yaabwe n'abalala.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng tye ka poto ingom cere, lakwat olwongo lwak me ot lega ne pi lok me agiki. Ki mit kom madit tutwal I dwane, en oloko I kom ber pa nywako niyene ki jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kau naka imoru, abu epasita kitukok ikuristayon kanuka akiro nuka awasia. Keda amina kotoma oporotoke, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aimor aiyuunikec keda luce.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria 'be ma vutia, atalaoni tra i vile 'ba aita ni 'diyi o'duko asizuri 'yezu. Eri ma o'duko asi driasi, eri 'ba asi orodri yini yi ma a'ita awazu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurabira enyima y'enshozi, pasita akakunga abantu be kugamba obutumwa bw'ahamuheru. N'omuhimbo omu iraka rye, akagamba aha mugasho gw'okugabana enyikiriza yaabo n'abandi.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the urgent need for clean water in the community, local leaders partnered with the church to launch a comprehensive outreach program. Through fundraising and volunteer efforts, they aimed to address the water crisis affecting many families.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'amazzi amayonjo mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakwataganye n'ekkanisa okutongoza enteekateeka y'okubunyisa amawulire. Nga bayita mu kusonda ssente n'obwannakyewa, baaluubirira okugonjoola ekizibu ky'amazzi ekikosa amaka mangi.
ach_prompt: Pien guniang ni pii maleng mite tutwal ikabedo gi, lutela me tedero guribbe ki kanica me cako yub me konyo dano weng. I yo me jogo cente kacel ki tic pa dano ma odyere, gubedo ki miti me tyeko peko me pii matye ka yelo gangi mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipuda loepol noi loka akipi nu elaete kotoma atutubet, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos keda ekanisa kanu aitegear ainapeta nuka adolonokin. Kotoma aituk ikapun keda aswam naka aiyeyea, apotu kesi kopedosi aitemokin ationis naka akipi naetirori ikalia luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ala esuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea mbeleru ri ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eci eyi kanisa eyi pie otita imbatani 'ba dria eyini ri e'dozu. Geri robia trazu azini okpo 'ba owi'ba 'diyi vurisi, eyi 'ba asi e'yo ewaru yi ma dria familia karakara eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'amaizi marungi omu bantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakakoragana n'ekanisa kutandikaho enteekateeka y'okuhitsya amaizi. Barikurabira omu kurundaana esente hamwe n'okwehayo, bakagyezaho kumaraho oburemeezi bw'amaizi oburikuteganisa amaka maingi.

eng_prompt: During the community meeting, the pastor emphasized the importance of engaging the youth in meaningful activities. Inspired by his words, the pastor's wife decided to launch a new initiative to foster creativity and teamwork among the young members.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu, omusumba yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuyingiza abavubuka mu mirimu egy'omugaso. Ng'akubirizibwa ebigambo bye, mukyala w'omusumba yasalawo okutongoza enteekateeka empya ey'okutumbula obuyiiya n'okukolera awamu mu bammemba abato.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lwak, lakwat owaco ni pire tek tutwal me weko bulu timo jami mabeco. Lokke okonyo dako pa lakwat me cako yub manyen me dongo diro ki tic kacelo ikin lumemba matino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, abu epasita kitogogong ajokis naka aitolom atumunak aswamisinei nuejokuka. Aponi isinyikokinai akiroke, abu aberu epasita kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aisinyikokit atumunak aswam nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini 'da ma alea, atalao 'da fe okpo orodri 'ba ode eyini 'yeta orodriru 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria. E'yo erini nze 'diyisi ava esuzu, atalaoni vile okuri asi e'do e'yo azi o'diruni e'yo ondua ni 'diyi otuzu azini azi ngazu tualu 'ba ode 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga, Paasita akashoboorora omugasho gw'okureeta eminyeeto omu mirimo y'omugasho. Ahabw'ebigambo bye, omukazi w'omushumba akasharamu kutandikaho enteekateeka nsya y'okureetaho obuhangwa n'okukorera hamwe omu ba memba bato.

eng_prompt: The congregation has been eagerly anticipating the renovations for months. With the growing community, the church decided it was time to expand the pastor's living space.
lug_prompt: Ab'ekkanisa babadde beesunga okuddaabirizibwa okumala emyezi. Olw'okukula kw'abantu mu kitundu, ekkanisa yasalawo nti kye kiseera okugaziya ekifo omusumba we yali abeera.
ach_prompt: Lucristayo gubedo kakuru yub me roco odigi pi dwe mapol. Ki dongo pa lwak, kanica omoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me medo kabedo pa latela dini.
teo_prompt: Auta ikuristayon aidar aisiteteunio kanu ilapio. Keda apol naka itunga, abu ekanisa koseu ebe erai apak na aitanyanyar aiboisit naka aiboi naka epasita.
lgg_prompt: Ba kanisa'a 'diyi ebi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi edezu o'diru 'diyi te mba karakara. Ongulumu eyini zoria, kanisa 'da 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo angu atalao eyini aa'zu ri ma ale sizu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibategyereza okuhunduuza ebizimbe kumara ameezi maingi. Ahabw'abantu kweyongyera, ekanisa ekasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okushanjuura oburaaro bw'abashumba.

eng_prompt: After months of lockdown due to the pandemic, the government announced a phased reopening of various sectors. Among the measures taken to revive the economy, religious institutions were included in the list of places allowed to resume operations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'omuggalo olw'ekirwadde bbunansi, gavumenti yalangirira okuggulawo ebitongole eby'enjawulo mu mitendera. Mu bikolwa ebyakolebwa okuzzaawo ebyenfuna, amatendekero g'eddiini gaateekebwa ku lukalala lw'ebifo ebikkirizibwa okuddamu okukola.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe ma kiloro piny pi poto pa gemo, gamente ocwalo kwena me yabo tenge mapat-pat. I kin jami ma kitimo me roco tic me lim, ki keto gangi lega I kin kabedo ma ki yee ni gucak ticgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka agolokinio naka akwap kanuka adeka naka ekorona, abu apugan kolimo ebe eponio apukor iriongeta luegelegela. Kotoma iwaitin lu itolomunitai kanu aisiteteun edumune loka ikapun, aponi kipikakinai aiboisio nuka ediini kwape aiboisio nu ecamakitai aswam.
lgg_prompt: Mba angu ti opiza azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi 'bori ma vutia, gamete azi e'yo esele ndu ndu yi ma ti zizu. Geri 'bani 'du e'yo robia esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba 'ba pari e'yo aitanisi 'diyi angu 'bani lezu azi ngazu 'diyi ma eselea.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, etapit angor nu epotiete aimo amukian naka aidoun. Kanuka ngun, adukun adekis napolon etimu loka ipirioitin luemisiaritos kanu aitemonokin iwaitin luetioko luka aidoun.

nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyaitu, abakazi abaine enda, nibakira kuronda obuhwezi bw'omutaano baaba nibazaara. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro erihango ritandikireho tiimu y'abashaho abakugu kukora aha nshonga z'okuzaara.

eng_prompt: In a safe and supportive environment, young women feel empowered to share their personal experiences. This intimate setting encourages honest conversations about topics that are often considered taboo.
lug_prompt: Mu kifo ekirimu obukuumi n'obuwagizi, abakyala abato bawulira nga baweereddwa amaanyi okugabana ku bye bayitamu. Embeera eno ey'omukwano ekubiriza okunyumya okw'amazima ku nsonga ezitera okutwalibwa nga za tabu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo maber dok ma konyo, mon matino giwinyo tek cwiny me nywako jami ma otimme I kwogi. Kabedo man me bedo ki wat macok ki dano cuku cwiny dano me nywako lok ada I kom lok ma pol kare kineno calo gin ma tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naeyuwara ido igangit, epupete angor ngun agogongu aimor akiro kec. Isinyikokini aiboisit na aitetem akiro nukabeit nuikamunitos akiro numam itunga ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Angu kililiru azini atita fepi 'diyi ma alea, oku ode eyi okpo esu e'yo eyini esu eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi oluzu. E'yo 'di ni ava fe e'yo nzeza e'yo adasi 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani ega 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omumbeera y'oburinzi n'obuhwezi, abakazi bato nibahurira baine amaani g'okugamba ebyabaireho aha magara gaabo. Eki nikihiga abantu kugamba amazima aha nshonga ezirikutwarwa nk'ezitari za buriijo.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, timely registration is crucial for businesses looking to secure their place and capitalize on emerging trends. Without proper registration, companies may find themselves at a disadvantage compared to their more proactive counterparts.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akavuganya, okwewandiisa mu budde kya mugaso nnyo eri bizinensi ezinoonya okukuuma ekifo kyazo n'okukozesa emisono egivaayo. Awatali kwewandiisa bulungi, amakampuni gayinza okwesanga mu mbeera embi bw'ogeraageranya ne bannaago gaago abakola ennyo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, coone ikare ki kome pire tek tutwal pi biacara ma mito gwoko kabedogi ki nongo magoba ki I kom jami matye katime. Labongo coone maber, dul mapat-pat twero nongo peko ka iporo ki luwotgi ma tiyo matek.
teo_prompt: Kosokoni loka lolo loepol abolobol, aiwadikaun kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ibiasaran luekotosi aitogogong aiboisit kec ka aitwasam iboro luitolomete kesi. Arai mam iwadikauna ejok, epedorete ikampunin ajaut keda atiokisio itiriani keda ipaupakec lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea, ru siza sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru tujari eyini lezu angu eyini aa'zu ri ma ta mbazu azini orodri esuzu e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Registration kililiru kokoru, amuti yi eco yi esu e'yo ewaru ma alia aga amuti yini azi ngapi kililiru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana, okwehandikisa omu bwire n'eky'omugasho munonga omu bizinesi ezirikwenda kurinda omwanya gwazo n'okukoresa ebintu ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Hatariho okwehandikisa kurungi, kampuni nizibaasa kwebona zitari mu mbeera nungi wagyeragyeranisa n'ezindi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments in the energy sector, stakeholders gathered to discuss potential collaborations. Key representatives from various oil companies in northern Uganda were invited to share their insights and plans.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigenda mu maaso mu kitongole ky'amasannyalaze, abakwatibwako baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkolagana. Abakiise abakulu okuva mu kampuni z'amafuta ez'enjawulo mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda baayitiddwa okugabana ebirowoozo byabwe n'enteekateeka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I tenge me mac, joo ma timo tic mapat-pat gugure me nywako tam I kom kit me tic kacel. Ki lwongo lucungu pi dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom moo I kumalo me Uganda me nywako tam gi ki yub gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu kotoma orionget loka akim, apotu itunga luipu kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nuka aiswamanara. Aponi iwororai abwoikinitok luka ikampunin luka akinyet ko nyakoi nako Uganda aimor aomisio kec keda aitemonokineta kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni okalamvu aci niri ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba omve 'ba pa tupi amuti odu ni kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi eyi ma egata eyi awazu tualu otita eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho omu by'amashanyarazi, abarikukwataho bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha kukwatanisa okurikubaasa kubaho. Abajwekyerwa abakuru kuruga omu kampuni z'amajuta omu matemba ga Uganda, bakeetwa kugabana ebiteekateeko byabo n'enteekateeka zaabo.

eng_prompt: In the competitive market of Western Uganda, businesses are increasingly focused on building strong partnerships. To ensure quality and reliability, they are seeking out reputable suppliers.
lug_prompt: Mu katale akavuganya mu Buggwanjuba bwa Uganda, bizinensi zeeyongedde okussa essira ku kuzimba emikwano egy'amaanyi. Okusobola okukakasa omutindo n'obwesigwa, banoonya abatunzi ab'ettutumu.
ach_prompt: I cuk me kupyem matek tutwal I kupoto ceng me Uganda, lutim biacara tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom bedo ki lurem matek. Me neno ni rwom ki gen tye maber, gitye ka yenyo lucat ma oywek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni ko too nako Uganda, ekotosi ibiasaran adukun ipaupa luegogong. Kanu awanyun adoketait najokan ka amunokina, eutasi kesi aimo agwelanarak luejenara.
lgg_prompt: A'bala cuu ni kari Uganda niri ma woko etu ni 'deria ri ma alea ri ma alea, tujari eyi asi 'ba tualu amuti okporu 'diyi sizu. Aa'zu kililiru azini asi'baza be, yi 'ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi nda 'ba ru ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu katare k'amahanga g'oburengyerwa-izooba bwa Uganda akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, eby'obushubuzi nibyeyongyera kuta amaani omu kukwatanisa n'abantu b'amaani. Okuhamya omutindo n'obwesigwa, nibaronda abarikuguza ebintu abaine eiziina rirungi.

eng_prompt: Residents of the newly established district have been facing severe water shortages for months. In response to growing concerns, local officials held a meeting to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze mu disitulikiti empya eyatondebwawo babadde boolekedde ebbula ly'amazzi okumala emyezi. Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko okukola ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Lutedero me dicitrwik manyen ni gubedo ki peko me nok pa pii pi dwe mapol. Macalo adwogi me lworo matye kamede, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me tyeko lok eni.
teo_prompt: Itunga luko disitrikt loitetet etereikina keda ekadakada loka akipi adaun ilapio. Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongong, apotu eswamak luka atutubet iriamunos aitemokin akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi distrikiti 'bani e'do o'diru 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi dri ci e'yo yi ako ni mba eyi ma alea. E'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye ba disiturikiti ensya, batwire nibatunga eibura ry'amaizi kumara ameezi maingi. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira, abakuru b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming initiatives aimed at fostering business growth, industry leaders have emphasized the importance of participation. To ensure access to valuable resources and support, companies must take proactive steps to secure their registration.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nteekateeka ezigenda okukolebwa okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi, abakulembeze b'amakolero bakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwenyigiramu. Okusobola okufuna ebintu eby'omugaso n'obuyambi, kampuni zirina okubaako kye zikola okusobola okwewandiisa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yub mapat-pat matye kabino macalo adwogi me dongo biacara, lutela me biacara guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me bedo tye. Me nongo kony ki kony ma pire tek, dul mapat-pat omyero gutim jami weng ma twere me nongo coc gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nu ebeit aswam kanu aitopolor apol naka ebiasara, apotu engarenok luka agwelanar kitogogongoto ajokis naka ajaut toma. Kanu awanyun ebe epedorete ikampunin adumunun iboro ka agangat, ekot kes aswam kagogongu kanu aiwadikaun.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani lezu tujari ma zota ma omgbo otuzu ꞌdiyi ma dria, driceꞌba okalamvu ꞌdi ma alia ꞌdiyi asi ꞌba orodri ꞌbani fizu alenia ꞌdiyiniri ma dria. Afa orodriru 'diyi esuzu tualu atita be, le amuti eyi ma 'du e'yo eyi ma ru sizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enteekateeka ezirikugyenda omu maisho, ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obushubuzi, abebembezi b'eby'obushubuzi, bahamize omugasho gw'okwejumbamu. Okureeba ngu za kampuni nizitunga obuhwezi n'ebintu by'omugasho, zishemereire kubanza zaayehandiikisa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local entrepreneurs, the chamber of commerce is hosting a series of workshops. These sessions aim to provide essential resources and guidance for aspiring business owners.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu, ekitongole ky'ebyobusuubuzi kitegese emisomo egy'enjawulo. Entuula zino zigendereddwamu okuwa ebintu ebikulu n'obulagirizi eri abo abaagala okuba bannannyini bizinensi.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo lutim biacara me tedero, dul makilwongo Chamber of Commerce tye ka yubu kacoke me pwonye mapol. Yub eni tye me miyo kony ki tam ki joo ma mito bedo ki biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigangit agwelanarak luka atutubet, euta atukot naka agwelanar aitolot airiamunun nuipu. Alosikinet naka airiamuneta nu erai aijaikin iboro ka aicoreta nejaas lu ekotosi agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu atita fezu 'ba tujari 'ye'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri, amuti e'yo tujari ni 'diyi ondrepi chamber of Commerce ni otita imbatani karakara eyi 'ye. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi afa orodriru azini imbata fezu 'ba lepi tujari 'ye'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abashubuzi b'omubyaro, ekitongore ky'eby'obushubuzi kiriyo nikikora emishomo mingi. Enteerane ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza eby'okukoresa n'obuhabuzi abarikwenda kugira bizinesi.

eng_prompt: In order to build trust and foster collaboration with the community, it is essential for leaders to communicate openly about their decision-making processes. This includes providing clear information regarding how land compensation is determined and implemented.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuzimba obwesige n'okutumbula enkolagana n'abantu, kyetaagisa abakulembeze okwogera mu lwatu ku ngeri gye basalawo. Kino kizingiramu okuwa amawulire amategeerekeka ku ngeri okuliyirira ettaka gye kusalawo n'okuteekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Me dongo gen ki winye ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me lok I adaa I kom kit ma gimoko kwede tam. Man kwako miyo ngec matye atir I kom kit ma ki ngolo kwede cul pi ngom ki bene kit ma ki keto kwede itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu adukun amunokina ka aisinyikokit aiswamanara keda itunga, ejokuka engarenok einer nuikamunitos ainapeta kec nuka aitolomun aseununeta. Imoriaritos ngun aijaikin akiro nuecaete nuikamunitos epone loitemokinet keda aitegeario naka atacakinio naka alupok.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu asi'baza sizu tualu ti ecita ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini e'yo nzezu e'yo eyini peta pezu 'diyi ma dria. Di ma alia o'dukoti feza kililiru geri 'bani e'yo 'bani 'ba ofezu nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kwombeka obwesigye n'okukwatanisa n'abantu, niky'omugasho abebembezi kugamba butunu aha nkora yaabo y'okusharamu. Eki nikitwariramu okuheereza amakuru marungi agarikukwata aha ku okurihiirira eitaka kurikukorwa n'okuta omu nkora.

eng_prompt: The local organization has secured funding to support community development initiatives. As part of their plan, they aim to create job opportunities for residents.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ky'ekitundu kifunye ensimbi okuyambako mu nkulaakulana y'ekitundu. Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa byabwe, baluubirira kutondawo mirimu eri abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Dul me tedero onongo cente me tyelo kor yub me dongo lobo. Macalo but yub meggi, gitye ki miti me yubu tic pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Adumu erionget loka atutubet ikapun kanu aigang apol naka atutubet. Kwape ediopet kotoma ainapeta kec, ekotosi kesi aitolomun aswamisinei nejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Amuti angu 'da ma alea 'da esu robia atita fezu otita angu ezoma ni ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini. Otita yiniri ma azi lezu azi fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'ekyaro kitungire esente z'okutunguura ebyaro. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka yaabo, bagyendereire kureetera abatuuragye emirimo.

eng_prompt: Effective management practices are essential for fostering a positive workplace environment. To achieve this, organizations must prioritize the development of comprehensive guidelines and procedures.
lug_prompt: Enkola z'obukulembeze ennungi za mugaso mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ku mirimu. Okutuukiriza kino, ebitongole birina okukulembeza okufulumya ebiragiro n'enkola enzijuvu.

lgg_prompt: Geri azi ocezu kililiru 'diyi orodriru angu azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ezozu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le amuti eyi ma 'ba okpo e'yo driceza fezu azini geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okwebembera emirimo n'ey'omugasho omukureetaho embeera nungi aha mirimo. Okuhikiiriza eki,ebitongore bishemereire kwebembeza okukora engyenderwaho n'emitendera.

eng_prompt: The hiring process will begin next week, and we are excited to welcome new team members. To ensure a smooth selection, we have outlined specific qualifications for applicants.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okuyingiza abakozi ejja kutandika wiiki ejja era tuli basanyufu okwaniriza bammemba ba ttiimu abapya. Okusobola okukakasa nti okulonda kugenda bulungi, tutaddewo ebisaanyizo eby'enjawulo eri abasaba.
ach_prompt: Yub me coyo lutic obi cake I cabit mabino, dok cwiny wa yom me jolo lumemba manyen me tim. Me neno ni yer owoto maber, watye ki jami ma mite pi jo ma tye ki miti me penyo pi tic.
teo_prompt: Ebeit aitolom itunga ageun osabiti ngol, ido iyalama sio aijaun itunga luitetiak luka etimu. Kanu awanyun ebe epatana aseun, itodunit sio iboro luibusakinit itunga kere aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi sizu ri ni nga e'do wiki drusirisi, dika ama ayikosi 'ba amuti 'da ma alea o'diru 'diyi ai'zu. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu kililiru ri ma dria, ama e'da afa 'bani lele 'ba waraga sipi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutasyamu abakozi nikwija kutandika esande erikwija, kandi twine okushemererwa kw'okutangirira ba memba ba tiimu abasya. Okureeba ngu okuronda nikugyenda kurungi, tutaireho ebirikwetengyesa abarikushaba.

eng_prompt: Recently, several businesses have been exploring opportunities in emerging markets across Uganda. Among them, a company has expressed a particular interest in establishing operations in Masaka.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko, bizinensi ez'enjawulo zibadde zinoonyereza ku mikisa mu butale obujja mu Uganda. Mu byo, kkampuni emu eraga nti eyagala nnyo okutandikawo emirimu mu Masaka.
ach_prompt: Cokcok-ki, biacara mapol gubedo ka yenyo gum me donyo I cuk matye ka dongo I lobo Uganda. I kingi, dul mo onyuto miti matek tutwal me cako ticgi I Masaka.
teo_prompt: Apakio nu, eutasi ibiasaran luipu aingic arerengesio nuka agwelanar kotoma osokonin luegelegela ko Uganda kere. Kanejaas kesi, abu ekampuni kitodu eipud loka ageun aswam ko Masaka.
