nyn_prompt: Obwahati, bizinesi nyingi zitandikire kuronda emigisha omu butare oburiyo nibutunguka okwetoroora Uganda. Omuri byo, hariho ekitongore ekyorekire ngu nikyenda kutandika kukorera omuri Masaka.

eng_prompt: In order to foster better communication and understanding with the communities they operate in, companies must prioritize transparency. This includes ensuring that all stakeholders can access information in a language they comprehend.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula empuliziganya ennungi n'okutegeeragana n'ebitundu mwe bakolera, kampuni zirina okukulembeza obwerufu. Kino kizingiramu okukakasa nti abakwatibwako bonna basobola okufuna amawulire mu nnimi ze bategeera.
ach_prompt: Me kelo kubbe ki niang maber ikin lwak, dul mapat-pat omyero guket lok ada obed gin ma pire tek. Man kwako neno ni joo weng matye ki twero me nongo ngec i leb ma gi niang.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor einer loajokan ka apuponoro keda itunga lu iswamaete kesi, ekot ikampunin aisingarenit nuka aica. Imoriaritos nu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun akiro kotoma angajep naepedori kesi amisikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu yini azi ngazu yi ma alia 'diyi pie, le amuti yi ma 'ba e'yo ada okporu. Di ma azi lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria e'yo 'yepi 'diyi eco o'duko esu ti yini va 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho empurizagana nungi n'okwetegyerezana n'abantu abu barikukoreramu, kampuni zishemereire kwebembeza amazima. Eki nikitwariramu okureeba ngu boona abu kirikukwataho babaasa kutunga amakuru omu ndimi ezibarikwetegyereza.

eng_prompt: When discussing sensitive topics, it's important for leaders to consider the impact of their words. Effective communication can foster understanding and unity among community members.
lug_prompt: Bwe baba bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ezitali nnungi, kikulu abakulembeze okulowooza ku biyinza okuva mu bigambo byabwe. Empuliziganya ennungi esobola okutumbula okutegeera n'obumu mu bantu b'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Kace gitye ka lok i kom lok mapigi tego, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me tamo I kom adwoki pa lokgi. Lok maber twero kelo winye ki ribe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitemitem akiro nuepolok, ibusakinit engarenok aomoom nuepedorete akiro kec aitodolikin. Einer loajokan epedori aitopolor acamanara keda aimorikikina kanejaas itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini e'yo eyini nze 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eco 'ba ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea vata azini ti ecita eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubarikuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani, n'eky'omugasho abebembezi kuteekateeka aha bikwatiraine n'ebigambo byabo. Okugamba kurungi nikubaasa kureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa omu bantu b'omubyanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote community engagement and education, the organizers have decided to incorporate various initiatives into the upcoming event. One of the key components will be a program focused on raising awareness among attendees.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okukwatagana kw'abantu n'okusomesebwa, abategesi basazeewo okuteekamu enteekateeka ez'enjawulo mu mukolo ogujja. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu kijja kuba pulogulaamu etunuulidde okumanyisa abantu abajja.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tic ki pwony pa lwak, luyub ne gumoko tamgi me keto yub mapat-pat I yub matye kabino ni. Acel me kin jami ma pigi tego bibedo yub me rweyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopoloritor aisisianakino keda aisisianakino naka itunga, aseutu luitemonokinak aitolomun iponesio luegelegela toma opucit lo ebunit. Adiopet kotoma atutubena nuapolok eraun ainapeta nu isisianakinete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma eselea azini onita ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba otupi 'diyi 'du e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu omu emupi 'diyi ma alea indi. Afa okporu 'diyi ma azi alu ni nga ovu otita azi 'bani asi 'bazu mile oziza ma dria 'ba emupi 'diyi ma eselea ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho obwegyese n'okushomesa abantu, abatebekanisa basharamu kuta ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe omu mukoro ogurikwija. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru nibiija kuba puroguraamu y'okumanyisa abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support girls' education and promote menstrual health, the organization launched a community initiative. As part of this program, they aimed to provide essential resources to help young girls manage their menstrual hygiene.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira okusoma kw'abawala n'okutumbula obulamu bw'abakyala mu nsonga z'ekikyala, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka y'ekitundu. Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa by'enteekateeka eno, baaluubirira okuwa abawala ebikozesebwa okusobola okukuuma obuyonjo bwabwe nga bali mu nsonga z'ekikyala.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwan pa lutino anyira ki medo rwom me yot kom gi ikare me two dwee, dul enoni ocako yub me konyo lwak. Macalo but yub eni, miti gi obedo me miyo jami ma mite pi konyo lutino anyira me gwoko lengo gi ikare me two dwe gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang asioman naka apesur ka aitopoloria angaleu naka elap, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuka itunga. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, alosikinet kec arai aijanakin iboro luingarakinete apesur aidar ailaikec kapak naka elap.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ezoanzi eyini atita fezu onita ma alea azini e'yo rua ala ni eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da e'do otuta ongulumu eyini 'diyi. Otita 'di ma azi lezu afa orodriru 'diyi fezu ezoanzi nyiri eyini eyini ani eyi ma alata mbazuri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika eby'obwegyese bw'abaishiki n'okutunguura amagara g'abaishiki, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'ekyanga. Nk'emwe aha puroguraamu egi, bakagyezaho kuheereza abaishiki ebintu ebirikubaasa kubahwera kurinda obuyonjo bwabo baaba bari omu nshonga.

eng_prompt: After hearing about the challenges faced by girls during their menstrual cycles, the student council organized a fundraiser to provide sanitary products. With the success of their campaign, they were eager to expand their efforts beyond their own class.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ku kusoomoozebwa abawala kwe basanga mu nsonga z'ekikyala, akakiiko k'abayizi kaategeka okusonda okugaba eby'obuyonjo. Olw'obuwanguzi bwa kampeyini zaabwe, baali beetegefu okugaziya amaanyi gaabwe okusukka ekibiina kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo peko ma anyira nongo ikare me two dwee, lutela pa lutino guyubu yub me jogo cente me poko jami ma konyo lutino bedo leng. Ki cobo miti me bito kwir gi, gubedo ki miti me tyelo kor tic gi iwi gang kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na apupun atiokisio nuetereikina keda apesur kotoma aparasia nu elap, apotu lukapolok luka esisiak kitemokisi aituk ikapun kanu aikor iboro lu elaete. Keda akerianut naka ikampeinsikec, ekotosi kesi aitanyanyar aswamukec mama ejaasi atukotokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizu e'yo ewaru ezoanzi eyini esu sa'wa eyini eyi ma mbazurisi 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi otu robia trazu afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu. E'yo yini ti odazaniri ma drile suzuri ma e'yosi, yi avasi okpo eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu aga kilasia eyivile 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira oburemeezi obu abaishiki barikutunga omu nshonga zaabo z'ekiro, akakiiko k'abeegi kakatebekanisa okurundaana esente z'okugaba ebintu by'okweyonja. Ahabw'obusinguzi bw'ehururu zaabo, bakaba baine ekihika ky'okushanjuura amaani gaabo aheeru y'ekiraasi kyabo.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by underprivileged families, the organization launched a community initiative. Their goal was to ensure that every child had access to essential educational resources.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa amaka agataliiko mwasirizi kwe gasanga, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka y'ekitundu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kukakasa nti buli mwana afuna ebikozesebwa mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko ma gangi ma goro nongo, dul ne ocako yub me konyo lwak. Mitigi obedo me neno ni lutino weng gunongo jami ma mite pi kwangi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda ikalia lu icanasi, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuka itunga. Alosikinetekec arai awanyun ebe kangin ikoku edumuni iboro lu isisiaete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru familia alioru 'diyi ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, amuti 'da e'do otuta ongulumu eyini 'diyi. Asisile yiniri ndra nezu ra kini mva dria isu afa onita ni orodriru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi oburikushangwa amaka agatarikwebaasa,ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'ekyanga. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikaba kiri okureeba ngu buri mwana yaatunga eby'okukozesa omu kwega.

eng_prompt: In an effort to encourage good behavior and academic excellence, the principal announced a new initiative. As part of this program, he will pay school fees for the best well-behaved pupils.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukubiriza empisa ennungi n'okusoma obulungi, omukulu w'essomero yalangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, ajja kusasulira abayizi abasinga okweyisa obulungi ebisale by'essomero.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me cuku cwiny lutino me bedo ki kit mabeco ki timo maber i gang kwan, ladit gang kwan ocwalo lok angeya manyen. Macalo but yub man, en obi culu kwan pa lutino kwan ma kitgi beco loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit itunga ajaut keda iponesio luajokak keda asioman najokan, abu apolon esomero kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, ebuni ngesi aitac isirigin lu esomero kanuka idwe lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba eyi ma adriza otuzu azini onita ma omgbo otuzu, dricere azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eri nga sukulu fizi ofe sukulu anzi adriza be muke ndeni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho emicwe mirungi n'obwegyese burungi, mukuru w'eishomero akarangirira enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, naija kushashurira abeegi abarungi ebishare by'eishomero.

eng_prompt: In response to the challenges posed by the pandemic, the government implemented various support measures for essential workers. Among these initiatives, educators were prioritized for financial assistance to help improve their living conditions.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi, gavumenti yassaawo enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okuyamba abakozi abakulu. Mu nteekateeka zino, abasomesa be baakulemberwamu okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuyambako okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Me cobo peko ma two korona okelo, gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me konyo lutic mapigi tego. I kin yub magi, lupwonye onongo kony me lim ma pire tek me konyo ilo malo rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuelomunitos kanuka adeka naka ekorona, abu apugan itolomu iponesio luegelegela luka aigang eswamak. Kotoma aswamisio nu, aponi kisingarenikinai isisianakinak adumun agangat na ikapun kanu aitojokar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni ejile 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba geri ndundu atita fezu azi'ba orodriru 'diyi dri. Otita 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba 'ba imba'ba eyini drileba fe atita robia niri fezu eyini ani geri eyini aa'zu ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obureesirweho endwara ruranda nsi,gavumenti ekakora emiringo mingi y'okuhwera abakozi b'omugasho. Omu nteekateeka ezi, abegyesa nibo babandize kutunga obuhwezi bw'esente, okubaasa kutunguura emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that supportive work environments significantly enhance job satisfaction among educators. As a result, fostering a sense of community and collaboration within schools is essential.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti embeera y'emirimu ey'obuwagizi eyongera ku bumativu bw'abasomesa mu mirimu. N'ekivuddemu, okutumbula enneewulira y'ekyalo n'okukolagana mu masomero kya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni kabedo me tic maber medo yomcwiny ikin lupwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, dongo rwom me ribbe ikin gangi kwan pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe aiboisio nu igangitos isisianakinak iswamaete ejok. Kanuka ngun, ejok aitopolor aimorikikina keda aiswamanara kiding isomeroi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini angu azi ngazu atita fepi 'diyi fe imba'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi azi si. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu sukulu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu embeera y'emirimo erikushagika, neeyongyera aha kumarwa kw'abegyesa aha mirimo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okureetaho okukwatanisa omu mashomero n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: The school is implementing a new initiative aimed at enhancing student engagement and academic performance. As a key stakeholder, the headteacher will also benefit from this project.
lug_prompt: Essomero liri mu kuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okutumbula okwenyigira kw'abayizi n'okukola obulungi mu byensoma. Ng'omukwatibwako omukulu, omukulu w'essomero naye ajja kuganyulwa mu pulojekiti eno.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan ne tye katic ki yub manyen ma tye ki miti me medo miti pa lutino kwan ki rwom me kwan gi. Macalo ngat ma pire tek, ladit gangkwan bene obi nongo ber pa yub man.
teo_prompt: Ejai esomero aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotore aitojokar eswamae loka esisiak. Kwape itunganan yen epol ajokis, ebuni apolon esomero aimedaun kotoma opurojekt kalo.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ni e'yo azi o'diru 'ye sukulu anzi eyi ma ava otuzu azini agata eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ekile 'ba okporu e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi ru, dricere ni nga vini orodri esu engazu otita 'di vu ra.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero ririyo nirita omunkora enteekateeka nsya erikugyenderera okwongyera aha kwejumba kw'abeegi n'okukora gye omu mishomo yaabo. Nk'omuntu mukuru, mukuru w'eishomero nawe naija kugasirwa omu purogyekiti egi.

eng_prompt: Many prominent figures in the community have ties to the local school. One such individual is the village chairperson, who has fond memories of their time there.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abamanyifu mu kitundu balina akakwate ku ssomero ly'omu kitundu. Omu ku bantu ng'abo ye ssentebe w'ekyalo, alina ebintu bingi ebirungi by'ajjukira mu kiseera kye yabeerayo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma oywek i kabedo gi tye ki wat ki gang kwan me tedero. Ngat acel ma kit meno obedo won kom me caro, ma wiye po I kom kare ma gubedo kunu.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luejenara noi kotoma atutubet ejaasi keda arucokina keda esomero loka atutubet. Idiopetunganan ngol ngesi apolon eicolong lo ocaalo, lo iitunit aiitunet naejok noi naka apakikec ngina.
lgg_prompt: Ba inzile inzi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi eci i sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Ba alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi ogua e'i caluniri, e'yo yini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egapi saaru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'amaani omu kyanga baine akakwate n'eishomero ryabo. Omwe aha bantu nk'abo ni mukuru w'entebe y'ekyaro, oine ebirikukwata aha bwire obu yabaire ariho.

eng_prompt: In recognition of the hard work and dedication of our educators, we have established a new incentive program. This initiative aims to motivate both teachers and students to strive for academic excellence.
lug_prompt: Mu kusiima omulimu n'obumalirivu bw'abasomesa baffe, tutaddewo enteekateeka empya ey'okusikiriza. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukubiriza abasomesa n'abayizi okulwanirira obulungi mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Macalo pwoc pi tic matek ki keto cwiny pa lupwonye wa, wakelo yub manyen me miyo kony bot lupwonye. Yub man tye ki miti me cuku cwiny lupwonye ki lutino kwan me tute matek me timo peny maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiyalamikin aswam na aswam ka ainakina naka esisianakinak wok, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet na erai aisinyikokit isisianakinak keda esisiak aswam agogongu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ama vile emba'ba 'diyiniri ma e'yo egazu, ama e'do otuta azi o'diruni. E'yo 'di le imba'ba eyi tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie okpo fe eyini ani azi ngazu muke ndeni sukulu'a.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okusiima okukora n'okwehayo kw'abeegyesa baitu, tutandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okushemeza abantu. Ekigyendererwa ky'enteekateeka egi n'okureetera abegyesa n'abeegi amaani g'okukora kurungi omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of dedication and hard work, the school recognized her efforts during the annual awards ceremony. Her innovative teaching methods and commitment to student success had made a significant impact on the entire community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'obumalirivu n'okukola ennyo, essomero lyasiima kaweefube we ku mukolo gw'okugaba awaadi buli mwaka. Enkola ye ey'okusomesa ey'obuyiiya n'obumalirivu bwe eri obuwanguzi bw'abayizi byakola kinene ku kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me keto cwiny ki tic matek, gang kwan opwoyo tic matek ma en otimo I kare me miyo mic mwaka ki mwaka. Yoo me pwonye manyen ma en obedo kwede kacel ki keto cwinye I kom kato pa lutino okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam keda agogongu, abu esomero isiyalamik aswamuke kotoma opucit loka airop. Apotu iwaitin lu isisianakinete ngesi keda ainakina ke kanu eswamae loajokan loka esisiak kiswamata ejok noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini azi ngazu asi driasi azini azi ngazu avasi 'bori ma vutia, sukulu 'da fe erini awa'difo okpo erini 'diyi ma dria omu dria dria feza eli vusi ri ma alea. Geri erini imbazu o'diru 'diyi tualu asi 'baza erini sukulu anzi eyi ma drile suza ma dria 'diyi 'ye ojata okporu ongulumu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani, eishomero rikamusiima aha mukoro gw'okumuha ebirabo buri mwaka. Enkora ye y'okwegyesa n'okwehayo kwe kuhwera abeegi kukora kurungi, bikakora kihango omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: Achieving your goals requires dedication and effort. Remember, the foundation of your future success lies in the knowledge and skills you acquire today.
lug_prompt: Okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byo kyetaagisa okwewaayo n'okufuba. Jjukira nti omusingi gw'obuwanguzi bwo obw'omu maaso guli mu kumanya n'obukugu bw'ofuna leero.
ach_prompt: Cobo miti mamegi mito keto cwiny ki tute matek. Wii opo ni guti me cobo miti ni I kare me anyim tye I ngec ki diro ma inongo tin.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin alosikinetekon ekot ainakina keda agogongu. Kiituni ebe, atukot naka akerianut kon koingaren ejai toma acoa keda acoa na idumununei ijo ilolo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mini lele 'diyi esuzu ri le ava feza azini okpo 'bazu drinia. Mi ma ega ra kini e'yo mini ecozu drile suzaru ewu drialeri ma alea ri eri ondua azini ondua mini esu andru 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: The foundation of a strong educational system lies in the quality of its educators. Investing in teacher training and support is essential for fostering student success.
lug_prompt: Omusingi gw'ebyenjigiriza ebinywevu guli mu mutindo gw'abasomesa baayo. Okusiga ensimbi mu kutendeka abasomesa n'okubawagira kyetaagisa nnyo mu kutumbula obuwanguzi bw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Guti me yub me kwan matek tye I rwom pa lupwonye ne. Keto lim I yub me pwonyo ki konyo lupwonye pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Atukot naka asioman na egogong ejai toma adoketait na isisianakinak ke. Aipikakin ikapun toma aitutuonoro ka agangat na isisianakinak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria eswamae lo esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Geri onita ni okporu ri ma vuti enga imba'ba erini 'diyi ma wura si. Robia 'bazu imbata imba'ba eyini ri ma alea ri eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omusingye gw'enkora y'eby'obwegyese ey'amaani n'omutindo gw'abegyesa baayo. Okuta esente omu kutendeka abegyesa n'okubahwera, n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kutunguura abeegi.

eng_prompt: Many young girls face significant challenges in balancing their education with unexpected life changes. One of the most pressing issues they encounter is the risk of becoming pregnant during their teenage years.
lug_prompt: Abawala abato bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kugeraageranya okusoma kwabwe n'enkyukakyuka ezitasuubirwa mu bulamu. Ekimu ku bizibu eby'amangu bye basanga kwe kufuna embuto mu myaka gyabwe egy'obutiini.
ach_prompt: Anyira matino mapol ginongo peko madit tutwal ikare me kwan ki alokaloka ma pe gitye kakuro. Lok acel madit tutwal ma ginongo obedo peko me yac ikare me mwaka apar ki wiye.
teo_prompt: Apesur nuipu etereikina keda ainingosia nuepolok noi kanu aitirian asioman kec keda aijulanakineta nu mam aomitai. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuepolok noi nuetereikina keda kesi ngesi ationis naka apotu kotoma ikarukec luka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Ezoanzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini eyi ma onita ma omgbo otuzu eyi ma edri ma alea. E'yo azi okporu eyini esu ri eri e'yo eyini ecozu ecazu okporovu ru eli eyini 'diyi ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abaishiki bato abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwega kwabo n'empindahinduka ezitarikuteekateekwaho omu magara gaabo. Kimwe aha nshonga z'amaani ezibarikubugana n'oburemeezi bw'okutwara enda bakiri eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: As social distancing measures were implemented, traditional gatherings and activities were restricted, leading to a shift in social dynamics. In this new environment, many found themselves in closer proximity to those they might not have interacted with as frequently before.
lug_prompt: Nga enkola z'okwewa amabanga ziteekebwa mu nkola, enkungaana z'ennono n'emirimu byawerebwa, ekyaleterawo enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'embeera z'abantu. Mu mbeera eno empya, bangi beesanga nga bali kumpi n'abo bebatatera kukwatagana nabo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ki keto cik me bedo mabor ki dano itic, ki juku gure ki tic me tekwaro, ma okelo aloka loka I kwo pa dano. I kabedo manyen man, dano mapol onongo gitye cok ki jo ma onongo pe girwate kwedgi I kare macon.
teo_prompt: Kwape aponi kitolomunai ikisila luka alaikina, aponi kimikai atukonokin keda aswamisinei nuka einono, ido abu koyangau aijulanakineta kotoma ojautene loka itunga. Kotoma aiboisit na naitetet, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu kesi eidunya keda ngul lumam kesi epedoritos einer keda kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi, 'ba atri okuta eyi tualu 'yeta a'bini 'diyi pie, e'yo 'di fe ojata e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma alea. Angu o'di 'di ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi eyi ma agei 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ku 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obu enkora y'okwerinda eyatandikire, enteerane n'emirimo y'obuhangwa ekazibirwa, ekyarugiremu empindahinduka omu mitwarize y'abantu. Omumbeera ensya egi, baingi bakeshanga bari haihi n'abo abu babaire batarikukorengana nabo nk'oku kyabaire kiri kare.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that when parents actively engage in their children's education, it fosters a positive learning environment. This collaboration between home and school can lead to significant improvements in student outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti abazadde bwe beenyigira mu kusoma kw'abaana baabwe, kitumbula embeera ennungi ey'okuyiga. Enkolagana eno wakati w'amaka n'essomero esobola okuviirako okulongoosa mu nsoma y'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni ka lunyodo gubedo tye ikwan pa lutino gi, man weko lutino gi pwonyo maber. Ribe man ikin gang ki gang kwan twero kelo dongo pa rwom me kwan pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe arai iswamaete auriak kagogong kotoma asioman naka idwekec, itojokari aisisia ejok. Aimorikikina na kiding ore keda esomero epedori ayangaun aitojokar eswamae lo idwe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini tipika eyi ka fi e'yo anzi eyivile 'diyini onita ma alea okporu, eri angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otu. Ti ecita 'di aku eyi ma eselea sukulu eyi pie ri eco fe sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu abazaire ku barikwejumba omu kwegyesa abaana baabo, nikureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Enkoragana egi ahagati y'eishomero n'amaka neebaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu bigyezo by'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In a heartwarming gesture of gratitude, the alumni gathered to discuss ways to give back to their alma mater. They decided that providing resources for current students would be the most impactful contribution.
lug_prompt: Mu kulaga okusiima okubuguumiriza, abayizi abaasomerako mu yunivasite baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuddizaamu essomero lyabwe. Baasazeewo nti okuwa abayizi abaliwo ebyetaago kye kintu ekisinga okuba eky'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo lanyut me pwoc ma yomo cwiny tutwal, lutino kwan macon gugure me nywako tam i kom kit me miyo kony bot gang kwan gi. Gumoko tamgi ni miyo kony bot lutino kwan matye kombedi obedo gin maber loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aanyunet naka aiyalama, apotu esisiak luakolo kotukokinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorete kesi ainyakakin mama ejaasi atukotokec. Apotu kesi ocamutu ebe aijaikin iboro lu isisianakinete esisiak lukwana erai aswam naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo awa'difo fezaniri ma alia, 'ba sukulu depi 'bo 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu afa fezu sukulu eyivile 'diyi dri ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu sukulu anzi curu'do 'diyi dri ri nga adri feta orodriru ndeni ri i.
nyn_prompt: Nk'akamanyiso k'okusiima, abaaherize emishomo yaabo, baketeerana kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okugarurira ab'eishomero ryabo. Bakasharamu ngu okuheereza abeegi ab'obwahati eby'okukoresa, nikyo kirikukirayo kuba eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by our community, we reached out for support. Thankfully, a generous donor has stepped forward to help us during this critical period.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa ekitundu kyaffe kwe kisanga gyebuvuddeko, twafuna obuyambi. Ekirungi, omugabi w'obuyambi ow'omutima omugabi ayimiriddewo okutuyamba mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak wa tye kanongo cokcok-ki, wacwalo kony botgi. Ki gum maber, lami kony ma cwinye yot okatti anyim me konyowa I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga wok, apotu sio adolokisi agangat. Arereng najokan, apotu lukojokotau kopotu aingarakin sio kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu amavileri ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, ama esu atita ra. Awa'difo be, 'ba afa fe'baa asi driasi ni efu ama aza kozu sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu baitu batungire, tukashaba obuhwezi. Eky'omugisha murungi, omuhweezi w'obuhwezi arugireyo kutuyamba omu bwire obu obw'akabi.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance the learning experience, it is essential to equip students with the necessary resources. By ensuring access to essential educational materials, we can significantly improve their academic outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'okusoma, kya mugaso okuwa abayizi ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa. Bwe tukakasa nti bafuna ebikozesebwa mu kusoma ebikulu, tusobola okulongoosa ennyo ebyava mu kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me kwan, pire tek tutwal me miyo jami ma mite ki lutino kwan. Ka waneno ni lutino tye ka nongo jami ma mite pi kwangi, watwero medo rwom me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae lo aisisia, ejokuna noi aijaikin esisiak iboro lu ekotoi. Kowai lo aanyun ebe epedorete kesi adumunun iboro lu itwasamao kosomero, ipedori oni aitojokar eswamae kec.
lgg_prompt: Onita ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini afa lele 'diyi fezu. Geri amani ecozu afa onita ni orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri si, ama eco eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'okwega, n'eky'omugasho okuheereza abeegi eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa. Okureeba ngu nibatunga ebikwato by'omugasho omu mashomero, nitubaasa kutunguura munonga emishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: We were feeling overwhelmed and unsure about our journey into parenthood. Your support and guidance made all the difference for us.
lug_prompt: Twali tuwulira nga tuzitoowereddwa era nga tetuli bakakafu ku lugendo lwaffe olw'okufuuka abazadde. Obuwagizi bwo n'obulagirizi byatuyamba nnyo.
ach_prompt: Wabedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom wotwa me doko lunyodo. Kony ki tira ni okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Apupi sio epol noi ido mam ijeni nuikamunitos alosit kosi araun auriak. Agangat ka aicoranakinetekon abu ijaik sio atiaketait naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ama ri ama ma omi ga tre azini ama aa ni e'yo ama vile aci ecazu tipika ru ri ma dria ku. Atita mini azini imbata mini 'diyi 'ba ojata amani dria.
nyn_prompt: Tukaba nituhurira ngu titurikwetegyerezibwa ahabw'orugyendo rwaitu rw'okuba abazaire. Obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza bwawe bikakora empindahinduka ahabwaitu.

eng_prompt: Despite the school's efforts to improve student outcomes, the latest test scores revealed a significant decline. This decline raised concerns among administrators about the factors affecting classroom instruction.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde essomero lyafuba okutumbula ensoma y'abayizi, obubonero bw'ebigezo obwasembyeyo bulaga okukendeera okw'amaanyi. Okukendeera kuno kwaleetawo okweraliikirira mu bakulembeze ku nsonga ezikosa okusomesa mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gang kwan ne otute matek me yubu rwom me timo peny pa lutino, adwoki me peny manyen onyuto ni lutino tye ka dok piny tutwal. Rweny pa rwom eni okelo lworo ikin ludito gang kwan i kom ngo matye ka balo pwony me ot kwan.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat esomero kagogongu kanu aitojokar eswamae lo idwe, apotu ainwakio naka esomero kitodutu aibiror naka eswamae. Abu aibiror ngin koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas engarenok kanuikamunitos iboro luetiroritos aisisianakino naka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ni tro okpo 'ba sukulu anzi eyi ma agata otuzu ra ti, agata o'diru obeta eyi ma alea 'diyi e'da e'yo eyi ma omgbo esizu ra. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza drice'ba eyi ma eselea e'yo onzi 'yepi onita kilasia ri be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'eishomero okutunguura ebyarugire omu bigyezo by'abeegi, ebyarugire omu bigyezo nibyoreka okukyendeera kw'amaani. Okukyerererwa oku kukareetaho okwerarikirira omu bakuru aha nshonga ezirikuteganisa eby'okwegyesa omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: As agricultural practices evolve, farmers are constantly seeking new ways to diversify their income streams. One promising avenue that has gained attention in recent years is the art of beekeeping.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkola z'obulimi n'obulunzi zikulaakulana, abalimi buli kaseera banoonya engeri empya ez'okwongera ku nnyingiza yaabwe. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo mu myaka egiyise kwe kulunda enjuki.
ach_prompt: Ka yub me pur tye ka dongo, lupur tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo cente gi. Yoo acel matye ki gen madit tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni obedo gwoko kic.
teo_prompt: Kwape itolomunono iponesio luka akor, eutasi akoriok aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aiyatakin edumune kec loka ikapun. Epone ediopebon loepedori aswam noi kotoma okaru lu atuboros ngesi aipit awo.
lgg_prompt: Geri agirikica ni 'diyi ni zoria, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi nda eyini ani geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi ecopi drileba fepi tu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo anyu tambazu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Emikorere y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ku erikweyongyera, abahingi n'abariisa nibaronda emiringo misya y'okwongyera aha ntatsya yaabo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikutangaaza ogureesireho amaani omu myaka egi, n'okuriisa enjoki.

eng_prompt: Despite their enthusiasm for starting a beekeeping business, they quickly realized they were lacking in essential skills. As they began to research the requirements, it became clear that proper education was crucial for their success.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baali baagala nnyo okutandikawo bizineesi y'okulunda enjuki, baakiraba mangu nti baali tebalina bukugu bumala. Bwe baatandika okunoonyereza ku byetaago, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti okusoma okulungi kwali kukulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cwinygi obedo yom me cako biacara me gwoko kic, gunongo ni gipeke ki diro ma mite. Ikare ma gucako kwedo jami ma mite, nen atyer kamaleng ni kwan maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekotosi kesi aitegear ebiasara loka aipit awo, apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe emamiatatar kesi keda aitutuoro. Neageuna kesi aingic iboro lu ekotoi, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe asioman najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut kec.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma ava tujara anyu ta mbazaniri e'dozu ra ti, eyi esu mbeleru eyi vu ondua orodriru 'diyi yo. Yi ni e'doria e'yo vuti ondazu afa lele 'diyi ma dria, eca e'da kini onita muke ri eri orodriru yini drile suza esuzu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu baakubaire baine ekihika ky'okutandikaho bizinesi y'okuriisa enjoki, bakareeba ngu tibaine myoga y'omugasho. Ku batandikire kucondooza ebirikwetengwa, kikarebeka butunu ngu obwegyese burungi n'obw'omugasho aha businguzi bwabo.

eng_prompt: After reading several articles about the importance of pollinators, he became fascinated with the idea of keeping bees. Inspired by a local beekeeper's success, he decided it was time to deepen his knowledge in the field.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusoma ebitundu ebiwerako ebikwata ku bukulu bw'ebisolo ebikuŋŋaanya envumbo, yakwatibwako nnyo olw'ekirowoozo ky'okulunda enjuki. Ng'akubirizibwa obuwanguzi bw'omulunzi w'enjuki, yasalawo nti kye kiseera okwongera ku bumanyirivu bwe mu mulimu guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwano pwony mapol I kom ber pa jami ma balo kic, en obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom gwoko kic. Ki cuku cwiny I kom loc pa lakwat kic me tedero, en omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me medo ngecce I tic meno.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aisiom akiro nuipu nuikamunitos ajokis naka aituk awo, abu ngesi komina aipit awo. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi kanu akerianut naka epitak awo, abu ngesi kotema ebe erai apak na aiyatakin acoake kotoma aswam kangin.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo karakara eyi lazu orodri 'ba anyu ofupi 'diyiniri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri eca ava be e'yo anyu tambazu ri ma dria. Erini ava esuzu drile suza 'ba anyu ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri si, eri 'du e'yo kini sa'wa 'di eri ma ondua angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushoma ebihandiiko bingi ebirikukwata aha mugasho gw'okufuuhirira enjoki, akatandika kukunda enteekateeka y'okuriisa enjoki. Ahabw'okushagikwa obusinguzi bw'omuhingi w'enjoki, akasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okwongyera kumanya omuby'enjoki.

eng_prompt: Participants were encouraged to explore sustainable practices and their impact on the environment. Through hands-on activities, they learned the importance of ecological balance.
lug_prompt: Abeetabamu baakubiriziddwa okunoonyereza ku nkola eziwangaala n'engeri gye zikosaamu obutonde bw'ensi. Okuyita mu bikolwa eby'emikono, baayiga obukulu bw'okutebenkeza obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Kicuku cwiny joo ma obedo tye me yenyo yoo me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki adwogi ne I kom cwec ma orumuwa. I kare ma gutimo ticgi, gupwonyo ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Aponi isinyikokinai itunga airereonor iponesio luajokak keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol isuban luka akwap. Kotoma aswamisio nuka akanin, apotu kesi kisisiautu ajokis naka aidar isuban keda itiang.
lgg_prompt: Ba ai 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'yo angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma eti ondazu tualu geri eyini ecozu angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi pie. Geri 'yeta drisi 'diyisi, eyi oni orodri angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu tro tro ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeejumbiremu bakahigwa okushwijuma emiringo y'okutereeza eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Barikurabira omu mirimo y'emikono, bakeega omugasho gw'okureeberera kurungi eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After struggling with traditional beekeeping methods for years, my brother decided to invest in a modern beehive system. Since making the switch, he has seen remarkable improvements in his honey production and overall hive health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana n'enkola z'okulunda enjuki ez'edda okumala emyaka, muganda wange yasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu nkola ey'omulembe ey'okukuumamu enjuki. Okuva lwe yakyusa omubisi gw'enjuki, alabye okulongooka mu bungi bw'omubisi gw'enjuki n'obulamu bwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny ki diro me gwoko kic macon pi mwaki mapol, omera omoko tamme me keto lim I yub me gwoko kic ma ite kare ni. Nicake ma en oloko moo kic man, en oneno alokaloka madit tutwal I rwom me moo kic ma en nongo ki yotkom ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainingosit keda iwaitin luka aipit awo kanu ikar luipu, abu onaceka koseu aitolomun epone loitetet loka aidar awo. Ageun na aijulakin esike, ewanyunit ngesi aitojokaario naepol noi naka esike keda angaleuke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'di 'dizu geri anyu tambazu oku 'diyi be eli karakara 'bori ma vutia, ma adrini asi 'du lonyi 'bazu geri anyu tambazu ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi ma alia. E'dozu erini anyu ojazu 'bori ma vutia, eri ndre e'yo onyiru anyu erini ofuzu azini eri ma rua ala ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurwana n'emitwarize y'obuhangwa y'okuriisa enjoki kumara emyaka mingi, murumuna wangye akasharamu kutandikaho enkora y'omurembe y'okuriisa enjoki. Kuruga obu yaakora empindahinduka, akareeba entunguuka y'amaani omu by'obwoki bwe hamwe n'amagara gye.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing litter problem in their neighborhood, a group of friends decided to take action. Motivated by their love for the environment, they sought ways to make a positive impact.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukimanya nti ekizibu kya kasasiro kyeyongedde mu kitundu kyabwe, ekibinja ky'emikwano baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Nga bakubirizibwa okwagala kwabwe eri obutonde bw'ensi, baanoonya engeri z'okukyusaamu.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko me balo yugi matye kamede I kabedo gi, lurem mogo gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Pi mar ma gitye kwede pi cwec ma orumuwa, guyenyo yoo me timo jami mabeco.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ationis na agasia na iyata noi kotoma aiboisit kec, apotu ipaperokec koseutu aswam ibore. Aponi kisinyikokinai amina kec kanuka alupok, apotu kesi komooto iponesio luajokak luka aitojokaar akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru okurunya ma omgbo ni tuzu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma esuta si, ongulumu azi agyipika eyini 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. E'yo leta yini angu ama agei ri ma dria ri si, eyi nda geri eyini ecozu e'yo muke 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bwa kasasiro obweyongyeire omu kicweka kyabo, guruupu y'abanywani bakacwamu kukoraho. Ahabw'okukunda eby'obuhangwa, bakasherura oburyo bw'okukora ebirungi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, various community programs have been established to engage young people in meaningful ways. These initiatives aim to empower and integrate youths from diverse backgrounds, particularly those living in refugee camps.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, pulogulaamu z'ekitundu ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okusikiriza abavubuka mu ngeri ez'amakulu. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera okutumbula n'okugatta abavubuka okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo naddala abo ababeera mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, kicako yub mapat-pat me konyo bulu me timo jami mabeco. Yub eni tye ki miti me tyelo kor bulu ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat tutwalle joo ma bedo I kem pa luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, etolomun ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aisisianakin atumunak iponesio luajokak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitigogong ka aimorikikin atumunak luka aiboisio nuegelegela kacut ngul lu iboyete okabin.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'do otita ongulumu eyini ndundu 'diyi 'ba ode eyi ejizu geri orodriru 'diyi ma alea. Otita 'diyi ma asisile okpo fezu azini ti ecita ejizu 'ba ode engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie tuni 'ba aa'pi angu emunyale eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, puroguraamu z'ebyanga zitandikirweho okureetera eminyeeto kukora emirimo y'omugasho. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okutunguura n'okugarukanisa eminyeeto erikuruga omu myanya etari emwe na emwe, okukira munonga abo abarikutuura omu kampu z'empungi.

eng_prompt: Many people are turning to natural remedies for their health needs. One such remedy that has gained popularity is honey, particularly the kind produced by bees.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baddukira mu bujjanjabi obw'obutonde olw'ebyetaago byabwe eby'obulamu. Ekimu ku ddagala ng'eryo erimanyiddwa ennyo lye mubisi gw'enjuki naddala ogufulumizibwa enjuki.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka tic ki yat ma lubanga aye ocweyo pi yoto komgi. Yat acel ma oywek tutwalle obedo moo kic.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aitwasam ikee lu akwap kanu angaleukec. Adiopet ekia lo ejenara noi ngesi esike, kacut lo itolomununei awo.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi aro nyakuni 'diyi ayu e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi ma aza kozu. Aro azi alu 'dile 'bani esu ewu driasi ri eri anyu, tutuni anyu yini edele 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda emibazi y'obuhangwa kukora ahaby'amagara gaabo. Omubazi gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga n'obwoki, okukira munonga oburikukorwa enjoki.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the declining bee population and its impact on local agriculture, community leaders decided to take action. They organized a series of workshops to educate residents about the importance of beekeeping and its benefits.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukimanya nti omuwendo gw'enjuki gukendeera n'engeri gye gukosaamu ebyobulimi mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baategeka emisomo egy'enjawulo okusomesa abatuuze ku bukulu bw'okulunda enjuki n'emigaso gyayo.
ach_prompt: Lutela me kabedo gunongo ni wel kic tye ka dwogo piny ki adwoki ne i kom pur, ci gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo. Guyubu kacoke mapol me pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa gwoko kic ki ber pa gwoko kic.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok luka atutubet kowanyutu ebe ekidiokoto awo keda epone loepedoriata kesi akoru akoru, apotu kopedosi aswam ngun. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamunun kanu aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka aidar awo keda ajokis na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyu ma kalafe ni esizu azini e'yo erini 'ye e'yo agirikica ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria risi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi otu otita imbatani karakara eyi imbata fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini orodri anyu tambaza niri ma dria tualu orodri erini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetegyereza okukyendeera kw'omuhendo gw'enjoki hamwe n'oburemeezi bwazo omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakacwamu kukora. Bakatebekanisa emishomo y'okwegyesa abantu omugasho gw'okuriisa enjoki hamwe n'emigasho yaago.

eng_prompt: Many people are looking for sustainable hobbies that can also benefit the environment. One such activity that has gained popularity is beekeeping, which is surprisingly accessible for beginners.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya eby'okwesanyusaamu ebiwangaala ebiyinza n'okuganyula obutonde bw'ensi. Omulimu ogumu nga guno ogumanyiddwa ennyo kwe kulunda enjuki, ekyewuunyisa nti kyangu eri abatandisi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo jami me atima ma twero kelo ber pa cwec ma orumuwa. Tic acel ma oywek tutwal obedo gwoko kic, ma obedo yot tutwal ki lucako.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo aswamisinei nuepedorete aimedaun akwap. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio kwape kangun naepol noi ngesi aipit awo, naejok noi kanu itunga luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa driasi ecopi angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma orodri ejipi ra 'diyi nda. E'yo azi alu 'dile 'bani esu ewu drile ri anyu tambaza niri'I, eri e'yo osuta si ewakokoru 'ba e'dopi 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: The new recruits have just completed their initial assessments. Now, they will be trained for a specific period of time.
lug_prompt: Abapya abayingiziddwa baakamala okwekebejjebwa kwabwe okwasooka. Kati, bajja kutendekebwa okumala ekiseera ekigere.
ach_prompt: Dano ma ki coyo gi manyen ni pud gutyeko timo peny gi me acel-acel. Kombedi kibi pwonyo gi pi kare mo.

eng_prompt: Effective management of agricultural operations relies heavily on accurate data collection. By maintaining detailed records, farmers can make informed decisions that enhance productivity and sustainability.
lug_prompt: Enzirukanya ennungi ey'emirimu gy'obulimi yeesigamye nnyo ku kukungaanya ebiwandiiko ebituufu. Mu kukuuma ebiwandiiko ebijjuvu, abalimi basobola okukola okusalawo okulungi okutumbula amakungula n'okuyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Doro tic me pur maber jenge tutwalle I kom coko ngec matir. Ka ki gwoko coc matut, lupur twero moko tam matye ki ngec ma weko kac mede ki dongo.

eng_prompt: By fostering open dialogue and encouraging collaboration, we can bridge the gap between the two groups. This initiative aims to address their differences and promote a sense of community.
lug_prompt: Nga tukuza okuteesa okw'olwatu n'okukubiriza enkolagana, tusobola okuziba ekituli wakati w'ebibinja ebibiri. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okugonjoola enjawukana zaabwe n'okutumbula enneewulira y'obumu.

eng_prompt: Many refugees face significant challenges in rebuilding their lives after displacement. One viable option for self-sufficiency is engaging in agricultural activities.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe oluvannyuma lw'okusengulwa. Engeri emu ey'okweyimirizaawo kwe kwenyigira mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: Luring ayela mapol ginongo peko madit tutwal ikare me roco kwo gi ikare ma ki ryemogi ki I kabedogi. Yo acel maber me nongo jami ma mite piri keni obedo timo tic me pur.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ikerai luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma aiduk bobo aijar kec akaulo naka aibwot. Epone ediope loepedoria itunga aijar bon ngesi ajaut toma akiro nu akoru.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, equipping young people with essential tools is more important than ever. By fostering resilience, critical thinking, and effective communication, we can empower them to navigate life's challenges successfully.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, okuwa abavubuka ebikozesebwa ebikulu kya mugaso okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Bwe tubayamba okuba abamalirivu, okulowooza obulungi n'okuwuliziganya obulungi, tusobola okubawa amaanyi okusobola okwaŋŋanga okusoomoozebwa kw'obulamu n'obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma aloka-loka tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, miyo jami tic mapigi tego bot bulu pire tek tutwal. Ka wapwonyo lutino me bedo ki kero, tam maber, ki lok maber, watwero minigi kero me lweny i kom peko me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, epolok noi aijaikin atumunak iboro lu itwasamao. Kowai lo aitopoloun apedor, aomisio nuepolok, keda einer loajokan, ipedori oni aigang kes aitodolikin atiokisio nu aijar.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, 'ba ode eyini afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi fezu ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Afa omgbo angirisi, egata kililiru, azini e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi ma ezota si, ama eco yi dri okpo fe e'yo ewaru idri ma alia 'diyi ma ti ojizu drile suzaru ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, okuheereza eminyeeto eby'okukoresa n'eky'omugasho munonga. Twabahwera kugira amaani, okuteekateeka kurungi, n'empurizagana nungi, nitubaasa kubahwera kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and promote environmental awareness, local organizations have launched a new initiative. Their goal is to engage the community in sustainable practices and encourage eco-friendly habits.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okumanyisa abantu ku butonde bw'ensi, ebitongole by'ebitundu bitongozza enteekateeka empya. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kuyingiza abantu mu bikolwa eby'obutebenkevu n'okukubiriza emize egiyamba obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki medo rwom me rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa, dul mapat-pat me tedero gucako yub manyen. Miti gi tye me weko lwak gubed ki yoo me kwo maber dok ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aisisianakin itunga nuka ejautene lo akwap, etolomutu iriongeta luka atutubet ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinetekec erai aisinyikokit itunga aswam iboro luepedorete aidar ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be azini mile oziza angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Asisile yiniri ongulumu eyi 'bazu e'yo ecopi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ma alea tualu geri ecozu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi, ebitongore by'ebyaro bitandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okureetera abantu kukora emirimo erikureeberera obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In response to the overwhelming support from the community, local officials have decided to expand their environmental initiatives. The success of the initial tree planting efforts has inspired a broader outreach program.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva mu bantu, abakungu b'ebyalo basazeewo okugaziya enteekateeka zaabwe ez'obutonde bw'ensi. Obuwanguzi mu kaweefube w'okusimba emiti asoose buviiriddeko enteekateeka y'okubunyisa amawulire.
ach_prompt: Pi kony madit tutwal ma aa ki bot lwak, lutic me tedero gumoko tam gi me medo yub gi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Adwogi maber pa yub me pito yadi ma okwongo okelo yub madit me cwalo ngec bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu agangat naepol noi kama ejaasi itunga, aseutu eswamak aiyatakin ainapeta kec nuka ekwam. Akerianut naka aira ikito ageun aitolomun ainapeta nuipu.

eng_prompt: Farmers anxiously monitor the weather patterns as the dry season approaches. Without sufficient rainfall, the land becomes parched and unyielding.
lug_prompt: Abalimi beetegereza embeera y'obudde n'obweraliikirivu ng'ekyeya kisembera. Enkuba bw'etonnya ekimala, ettaka lifuuka ekkalu era eritabala.

eng_prompt: To ensure optimal growth and survival, it's crucial to time the planting of seedlings with the seasonal changes. The wet season provides the necessary moisture for young plants to establish their roots effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okukula obulungi n'okuwangaala, kya mugaso okusimba endokwa mu budde n'enkyukakyuka mu sizoni. Ebiseera by'enkuba biwa ebimera ebitonotono obubugumu obwetaagisa okusimba emirandira gyabyo obulungi.

eng_prompt: After years of outdated facilities and limited resources, the hospital finally secured funding for much-needed improvements. The new design promises a more comfortable and supportive environment for new mothers and their families.

eng_prompt: The organization is dedicated to fostering growth and innovation across various sectors. Their diverse team brings expertise and creativity to tackle challenges in multiple domains.

eng_prompt: A memorial event was organized to raise awareness about maternal health issues. The gathering aimed to shed light on the tragic loss of lives in the face of preventable complications.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gw'okujjukira gwategekebwa okumanyisa abantu ku nsonga z'obulamu bwa bamaama abali embuto. Olukungaana lwali lugendereddwamu okutangaaza ku kufiirwa obulamu mu ngeri ey'ekikangabwa olw'ebizibu ebiyinza okwewalibwa.

lgg_prompt: Ba otu omu e'yo ayia eyini 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ri mile oziza ma omgbo otuzu e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria. Asisile okuta 'da niri lezu e'yo nzezu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma edri avizu e'yo ewaru 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: Charitable giving has become an essential part of many individuals' and organizations' missions. As a result, they actively seek opportunities to support various causes and make a positive impact in their communities.
lug_prompt: Okugaba obuyambi kifuuse ekitundu ekikulu mu mirimu gy'abantu n'ebitongole bingi. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya emikisa okuwagira ensonga ez'enjawulo n'okukola ebirungi mu bitundu byabwe.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the safety and well-being of patients is a top priority for healthcare facilities. To achieve this, essential services like water and power must be consistently available throughout the hospital.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abalwadde kye kintu ekikulu mu malwaliro. Okutuukiriza kino, ebyetaago ebikulu ng'amazzi n'amasannyalaze birina okubeerawo buli kaseera mu ddwaliro lyonna.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa lutwo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I odi yadi. Me cobo man, kony ma pire tek calo mac ki pii omyero obed tye kare ki kare I ot yat weng.

lgg_prompt: Rua alata azini alata 'ba azoru 'diyiniri ndrezu ri eri e'yo okporu arojo eyini 'diyi ni. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le azakoma okporu ekile yi pile azini aci pile 'diyi ma aa arojo 'da ma alea sa'wa driasi ci.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abarwaire baba gye n'eky'omugasho munonga omu marwariro. Okuhikiiriza eki, ebyetaago nk'amaizi n'amashanyarazi bishemereire kuguma biriho omwirwariro ryona.

eng_prompt: The community's generosity plays a vital role in ensuring that our healthcare facilities can provide essential services. Every contribution helps maintain and improve the quality of care for our patients.
lug_prompt: Obugabi bw'abantu bukola kinene nnyo mu kukakasa nti amalwaliro gaffe gasobola okuwa obuweereza obwetaagisa. Buli kuwaayo kuyamba okukuuma n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obujjanjabi eri abalwadde baffe.
ach_prompt: Cwiny me miyo kony pa lwak konyo tutwal I neno ni odi yadi wa twero miyo kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Mic mo keken ma kimiyo konyo me gwoko ki ilo malo rwom me gwoko lutwo wa.

eng_prompt: During moments of transition, it's important to acknowledge the contributions of those involved. A handover ceremony serves as a perfect opportunity to celebrate achievements and share tokens of appreciation.

ach_prompt: Ikare me aloka-loka, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo tic pa joo ma obedo tye. Yub me weko tic obedo kare maber tutwal me kwero jami ma otimme ki poko mic me pwoc.
