nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'empinduka, n'eky'omugasho okusiima obuhwezi bw'abo abu kirikukwataho. Omukoro gw'okuhayo obutegyeki n'omugisha murungi gw'okujaguza ebikozirwe n'okugabana ebiconco by'okusiima.

eng_prompt: As the demand for healthcare continues to rise, many communities are facing significant challenges in accessing quality services. Stakeholders are increasingly seeking innovative solutions to enhance patient care and streamline operations.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi bweyongera okulinnya, ebitundu bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo. Abakwatibwako beeyongedde okunoonya enkola ez'obuyiiya okutumbula obujjanjabi bw'abalwadde n'okwanguya emirimu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me nongo kony me yot kom tye ka medde ameda, kabedo mapol tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal I nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo. Lwak tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me gwoko lutwo ki yubu tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo amukian, etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio kanu adumun amukian na abeit. Eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu itojokarere adekak ka aitapatan aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tutu risi, ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu. Ba ambo ndundu eyi curu'do geri ndundu eyi nda e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo eyi 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetaago by'eby'amagara nibigumizamu kweyongyera, abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga obuheereza burungi. Abarikukwataho beyongyeire kuronda oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'okureeberera abarwaire n'okutereeza emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Many companies are recognizing the importance of giving back to society as part of their business strategy. By engaging in ethical practices and supporting local initiatives, they can foster positive relationships with their stakeholders.
lug_prompt: Kkampuni nnyingi zitegedde obukulu bw'okuddiza ekitundu ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa byazo eby'obusuubuzi. Nga beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'empisa n'okuwagira enteekateeka z'ekitundu, basobola okutumbula enkolagana ennungi n'abakwatibwako baabwe.
ach_prompt: Kampuni mapol tye ka niang ber pa miyo jami ki lwak macalo yoo me timo biacara gi. Ki timo jami mabeco ki cwako yub me tedero, gitwero dongo wat maber ki joo ma gitye ka tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ejenete ikampunin luipu ajokis naka ainyakakin itunga kwape ediopet koboro luiswamaete kesi. Kowai lo aswam iboro lu ejokuka ka aigangite ainapeta nuka atutubet, epedorete kesi aitopolor eidicane loajokan keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi e'yo orodriru afa fezu ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria ri esu geri eyini tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma azi ru. Yeta kililiru 'diyi 'yezu azini atita fezu e'yo angu ma alia 'diyi dri, eyi eco aa'ta muke 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni nyingi nizimanya omugasho gw'okugarurira abantu nk'emwe aha nkora yaazo. Barikwejumba omu mirimo y'emitwarize n'okushagika enteekateeka z'ebyaro, nibabaasa kureetaho enkoragana nungi n'abantu abu kirikukwataho.

eng_prompt: Many companies today are recognizing the importance of giving back to the community and addressing social issues. Engaging in ethical practices not only enhances their brand image but also fosters trust among consumers.
lug_prompt: Kampuni nnyingi leero zitegeera omugaso gw'okuddiza abantu n'okukola ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu. Okwenyigira mu bikolwa eby'empisa tekikoma ku kutumbula kifaananyi kyabwe naye era kikulaakulanya obwesige mu bakozesa.
ach_prompt: Kampuni mapol kombedi gitye ka niang ber pa miyo jami ki lwak ki cobo peko me kwo pa lwak. Donyo I tim mabeco pe medo nying gi keken ento bene kelo gen ikin luwil.
teo_prompt: Ikampunin luipu ilolo ejenete ajokis naka ainyakakin itunga keda aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga. Aswam iboro lu ejokuna mam itojokari ekirorikec bon konye eyangauni amunokina kanejaas agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi curu'do orodri afa fezu ongulumu eyini dika e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri esu. E'yo 'yeta kililiru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma 'yeta feni lu yi ma wura otuzu ku te eri vini asi'baza eji 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma eselea indi.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni nyingi obwahati nizimanya omugasho gw'okugarurira abantu n'okukora aha nshonga z'abantu. Okwejumba omu mirimo y'emitwarize n'emitwarize, tikirikumaraho kutunguura eiziina ryabo, kureka n'okureetaho obwesigye omu bakoresa.

eng_prompt: To ensure optimal patient care and reduce wait times, healthcare facilities must prioritize adequate staffing levels. A well-functioning hospital relies on a sufficient number of qualified medical professionals to meet the demands of its community.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obujjanjabi obulungi eri abalwadde n'okukendeeza obudde bw'okulinda, amalwaliro galina okukulembeza omutindo gw'abakozi ogumala. Eddwaliro erikola obulungi lyesigama ku muwendo gw'abasawo abakugu ogumala okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitundu kyalyo.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko lutwo maber ki dwoko piny kare me kur, odi yadi omyero gu ket cwiny gi i kom wel lutic ma oromo. Ot yat ma tiyo maber jenge I kom wel lutic yoto kom ma oporre me cobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun amukian najokan noi naka adekak ka aitidisiar apak naka aidar, ekot adekisia aijaikin eswamak luedolitos. Adekis na iswamai ejok emunokina keda ipirioitin lu edolitos kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini sa'wa 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma omgbo esizu, le arojo eyi ma 'ba okpo azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma kalafe angiri si. Arojo azi ngapi kililiru ri ni asi'ba 'ba azi ngapi kililiru 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ma dria ecozu e'yo o'bi eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abarwaire bareebererwa kurungi n'okukyendeeza obwire bw'okurinda, amarwariro gashemereire kutaho abakozi barikumara. Eirwariro eririkukora kurungi, niryesigama aha muhendo gw'abashaho abakugu, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu baryo.

eng_prompt: As societies develop and improve healthcare, families often feel more secure in having children. Consequently, this trend can result in higher birth rates over time.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bwe bikulaakulana n'okutumbula ebyobulamu, amaka gatera okuwulira nga galina obukuumi mu kuzaala abaana. N'olw'ekyo, embeera eno eyinza okuvaamu omuwendo gw'abaana abazaalibwa ogweyongedde okumala akaseera.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak dongo dok giyubu yotkom gi, gangi giwinyo agwoka ikare me nywal. Macalo adwogi ne, tim man twero weko wel lutino ma nywal bedo lamal I nge kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kwape itopoloor itunga ka aitojokar amukian, epupete ikalia ayuwara noi kotoma aidoun idwe. Kanuka ngun, epedori aswamisioit ngin ayangaun aur naepol noi kotoma apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini zozu azini e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi otuzu, familia eyi aa ageitema be saaru eyini anzi eyi osizu. Ka'dini, e'yo 'di eco fe anzi eyi ma osiza ma ongmbo ni tuzu sa'wa driasi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga kubirikutunguuka n'okutunguura eby'amagara, amaka nigakira kwehurira gaine oburinzi omu kuzaara abaana. N'ahabw'ekyo, enkora egi neebaasa kurugwamu okuzaara kw'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Access to quality healthcare is a critical issue for many women, particularly during pregnancy and childbirth. Understanding the barriers they encounter can help improve maternal health outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kizibu nnyo eri abakyala bangi naddala mu biseera by'embuto n'okuzaala. Okutegeera ebizibu bye basanga kiyinza okuyamba okulongoosa ebyobulamu bya bamaama abali embuto.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom maber obedo peko madit tutwal pi mon mapol tutwalle ikare me yacu ki nywal. Niang peko ma mege nongo twero konyo me yubu yot kom mege.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na abeit erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas angor, kacut kapak naka apotu ka aidoun. Ajenun atiokisio nu ewanyunitos kesi ingarakini aitojokar angaleu naka nuatoto.
lgg_prompt: Rua alata muke ri esuzu ri eri e'yo azi okporu ni oku karakara eyini, tutuni sa'wa okporovu ni azini mva osizu ri ma alea. E'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi vazu ri eco azakoma fe e'yo rua ala ayia eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'enshonga y'amaani aha bakazi baingi, namunonga omu bwire bw'okutwara enda n'okuzaara. Okwetegyereza oburemeezi obu abakazi barikutunga, nikibaasa kuhwera omu kutunguura eby'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda.

eng_prompt: Access to quality healthcare is essential for maintaining community well-being. As a result, health centres play a crucial role in delivering a wide range of services to diverse populations.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kikulu mu kukuuma obulungi bw'ekitundu. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro gakola omulimu munene mu kutuusa obuweereza obw'enjawulo eri abantu ab'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo kony ma pat pat bot lwak ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na adoketait ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aijar na itunga. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete adekisia aswam naepol noi kanu aijaikin ejanakine mama ejaasi itunga luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata muke ri esuzu ri eri orodriru ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, arojo eyi azi okporu 'ye azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ejizu o'bi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda entuura nungi y'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhitsya obuheereza omu bantu b'emiringo mingi.

eng_prompt: In the United States, the political landscape is largely dominated by two major parties. As a result, individuals seeking the presidency often align themselves with one of these established organizations.
lug_prompt: Mu United States, ebyobufuzi bisinga kufugibwa bibiina bibiri ebinene. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abeesimbawo ku bwa pulezidenti batera okwegatta ku emu ku bibiina bino.
ach_prompt: I lobo Amerika, dul me cungu iwi-bye madongo aryo aye loyo. Macalo adwogi ne, dano matye ka cungu I yer pa ladit lobo ipol kare gimoko tam gi I kom dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Ko United States, epate iarei luapolok kesi epolok noi kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu ekotosi araun lukapolok akwap etapit aiswamanar keda iriongeta lu.
lgg_prompt: Kari United States niri ma alea, amuti politiki ni okporu 'diyi ma okpo amuti politiki ni okporu 'diyi ma eselea iri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba pa tupi purezidenti ru 'diyi yi eci yi amuti 'dile 'diyi ma azi be.
nyn_prompt: Omuri United States, eby'obutegyeki nibisingurwa ebibiina bibiri ebikuru. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abarikwenda kwesimba aha ntebe y'omwebembezi w'eihanga, nibakira kukwatanisa n'emwe aha bitongore ebi.

eng_prompt: As political parties seek to determine their candidates for upcoming elections, they must consider the most effective methods for engaging their members. One approach that has gained traction is the implementation of party primary elections.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bigezaako okuteekawo abesimbyewo baabyo mu kulonda okujja, birina okulowooza ku ngeri ezisinga obulungi ez'okusikirizaamu bammemba baabyo. Engeri emu abantu gye beeyisizzaamu kwe kussaawo okulonda okw'okusunsulamu kw'ebibiina.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka yenyo lucungu gi pi yer matye kabino ni, omyero gutam I kom yoo maber loyo me kelo lumemba gi I yer. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye me kelo yer pa dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi ipatei aseun abwoak kec kanu aseo naebunit, ekot kes aomoom iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aiswamanar imebanakec. Adiopet ewai lo ejenuna noi ngesi aitodolikin aseo naka epate.
lgg_prompt: Amuti politiki ni 'diyi ka le 'ba yini pa tuzu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ti pe, le yi ma ega geri onyiru ndeni 'bani ecozu 'ba yini 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi 'bani 'ye saaru ri eri e'yo 'bani opeta amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'yezu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Obu ebibiina by'obutegyeki birikugyezaho kuronda abesimbireho omu karuuru akarikwija, bishemereire kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okureeta ba memba baabo omu karuuru. Omuringo gumwe oguretsireho amaani n'okuteera akaruuru k'eby'obutegyeki k'ebibiina by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and challenge, many seek guidance and strength from a higher power. It is essential to recognize the divine influence that shapes our leaders and their decisions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okusoomoozebwa, bangi banoonya obulagirizi n'amaanyi okuva eri amaanyi aga waggulu. Kya mugaso nnyo okutegeera obuyinza bwa katonda obubumba abakulembeze baffe n'okusalawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, dano mapol giyenyo kony ki teko ki bot lubanga. Pire tek tutwal me niang teko pa lubanga ma yubo lutela wa ki tam ma gimoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko ka atiokisio, emoete itunga luipu aicoreta keda agogongu kama ejai apedorosio nuapolok. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun agogong naka Edeke naetolomununei engarenok wok keda aseununeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, 'ba karakara eyi imbata azini okpo nda engazu okpo uru 'diyi vu. Eri orodriru e'yo Mungu ni drice'ba ama vile 'diyi ma dri cepi azini e'yo yini 'dule 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'oburemeezi, baingi nibaronda obuhabuzi n'amaani kuruga ahari Ruhanga. N'eky'omugasho kumanya obushoborozi bwa Ruhanga oburikubumba abebembezi baitu n'encwamu zaabo.

eng_prompt: In any society, the evolution of its political landscape often raises questions about the level of maturity achieved. Understanding the characteristics that define mature politics can provide valuable insights into the health of a democracy.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, enkulaakulana y'embeera y'ebyobufuzi etera okuleetawo ebibuuzo ku mutindo gw'okukula ogutuukiddwaako. Okutegeera engeri z'ebyobufuzi ebikula bisobola okuwa amagezi ag'omugaso ku bulamu bwa demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, aloka-loka me cungu iwi-bye ipol kare kelo lapeny I kom rwom me dongo pa dano. Niang jami ma nyutu ni lok me cungu iwi bye ma otii twero miyo ngec ma pire tek tutwal I kom kit ma loc alwak tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, aijulanakineta nuka epolitikisikec eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos adoketait naka apol. Amisiikin iponesio lu itodunitos nuka epolitikis lo apol epedori aijaikin oni acoa naepol noi kanuikamunitos angaleu naka aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni ojazu ri ni e'yo eyi eji e'yo 'ba eyini zozu ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo e'dapi kini e'yo politiki ni 'diyi zopi 'bo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata eco fe ondua orodriru e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona, entunguuka y'embeera y'eby'obutegyeki buriijo nereetaho ebibuuzo aha rurengo rw'okukura kw'abantu. Okwetegyereza ebintu ebirikworeka eby'obutegyeki ebikuru, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya ebirikukwata ahamagara ga demokurasiya.

eng_prompt: Every choice we make, big or small, reflects our values and beliefs. It's important to be mindful of how we present ourselves in our daily interactions.
lug_prompt: Buli kusalawo kwe tukola, ka kube kunene oba kutono, kwoleka empisa zaffe n'enzikiriza zaffe. Kikulu okufaayo ku ngeri gye tweyolekamu mu nkolagana yaffe eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Tam weng ma wamoko, madongo onyo matino, nyutu jami ma pigi tego ma watye kwede. Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom kit ma wawinye kwede ikare ma watye I kwowa me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kangol aseunet na iswamai oni, epol arai edit, itodunit iponesio ka aiyuunetekosi. Erai ibore yenepol noi apodokinit epone loitodunitotor oni iponesio wok luka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria amani pe 'diyi, amburu kani werea 'diyi, e'da ama ma egata azini a'ita yi. Eri orodriru aa'zu mile be geri amani ama ma ngulupi e'dazu ama ma eselea o'du driasi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri kusharamu oku turikukora, okukuru nainga kukye, nikyoreka emitwarize yaitu n'ebi turikwikiriza. N'eky'omugasho okwetegyereza oku turikweyoreka omu mirimo yaitu eya burizooba.

eng_prompt: The rising rates of unemployment have become a pressing issue, particularly affecting the younger generation. As we look for solutions, it's crucial to address the root causes and explore effective strategies.
lug_prompt: Okugenda mu maaso kw'ebbula ly'emirimu kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi naddala eri abavubuka. Nga bwe tunoonya eby'okugonjoola, kya mugaso nnyo okukola ku biviiriddeko n'okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Rwom me can tic matye kamede tye peko madit tutwalle bot jo matino. Ka watye ka yenyo yoo me cobo peko, pire tek tutwal me neno tyen lok ma okelo peko ki nongo yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Apol naka amamus na aswamisinei erai ationis naepol noi, kacut itunga ludidika. Kwape iuta sio aimo aitemokineta, ejokuna noi aitemokin atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun ka aingic iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako ni tupi tutu ri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru, tutuni 'ba oderu 'diyi bi. Amani e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu ri ndaria, eri orodriru e'yo e'yo ndundu eyi fepi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini geri azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'eibura ry'emirimo, kihindukire enshonga y'amaani, okukira munonga erikuteganisa eminyeeto. Twaba nitusherura oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga, n'eky'omugasho munonga okukora aha nshonga ezirikubireetaho n'okusherura oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, having the right qualifications is essential for success. Developing a diverse set of skills can open up numerous opportunities for individuals seeking to advance their careers.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, okubeera n'ebisaanyizo ebituufu kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okukulaakulanya obukugu obw'enjawulo kusobola okuggulawo emikisa mingi eri abantu abanoonya okutumbula emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek me nongo tic, bedo ki kwan ma oporre pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc. Dongo diro ma padi padi twero yabo gum mapol tutwal ki dano ma mito medo rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei lolo, ejokuna noi ajaut keda apapulai nuka aswam kanu akerianut. Aitopoloun acoasinei nuegelegela epedori apukor arerengesio nuipu nejaas itunga lu ekotosi aitopolor aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, ovuzu kokobi kililiru 'diyi be ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Ondua ndundu eyi ma ezota ni eco drileba karakara eyi ma ti zi 'ba eyi ma ngulupi eyi lepi eyi ma azi eyi otupi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana aha mirimo, okuba n'ebirikwetengwa n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Okutunguura emyoga etari emwe neebaasa kwiguraho emigisha mingi ahabantu abarikwenda kutunguura emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite significant economic growth in recent years, many communities in Uganda continue to struggle with basic needs. Addressing the root causes of inequality is essential for improving the living conditions of the most vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde eby'enfuna byakulaakulana mu myaka egiyise, ebitundu bingi mu Uganda bikyalwanagana n'ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo. Okukola ku nsibuko y'obutafaanagana kya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera y'obulamu bw'abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me lim omede tutwal I mwaka ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo mapol I lobo Uganda pud tye ka canne ki jami ma mite pi kwo. Cobo peko ma kelo apoka-poka ikin dano pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Karaida apolor noi ikapun kokaru lu atuboros, eringa itunga luipu luko Uganda eutasi ainingosit keda iboro lu itwasamao. Aitemokin iboro lu eyangaununete amamus airiamara ejok kanu aitojokar aijar naka itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota angiri e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, ongulumu karakara Ugandaa 'diyi nga kiri dri ciria afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi pie. E'yo e'yo esele coza ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru geri 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'amaani omu by'entaasya omu myaka egi, abantu baingi omu Uganda nibagumizamu kurwana n'ebyetaago by'omubiri. Okukora aha nshonga ezirikureeta obutaingana n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura emituurire y'abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Economic hardship can drive individuals to desperate measures. In times of financial crisis, some may resort to theft as a means of survival.
lug_prompt: Obuzibu bw'ebyenfuna busobola okuleetera abantu okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Mu biseera by'obuzibu bw'ensimbi, abamu baddukira mu bubbi ng'engeri y'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Peko me can lim twero weko ngat moni timo jami ma pe twere. Ikare me can lim, jo mukene gi cako kwo macalo yoo me kwo.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuka ikapun epedorete ayangaun itunga toma aswamisio nuepedorete kesi aswam. Kapak naka atiokisio nuka ikapun, epedorete icetunga aibiror kwape epone loka aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco fe 'ba yi dri e'yo onzi 'yezu ra. Sa'wa e'yo ewaru robia ma alia 'diyisi, 'ba azi 'diyi eco e'do ogu 'ye geri yini ecozu yi ma idri ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya nibubaasa kureetera abantu kukora ebitarikwetengyesa. Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'esente, abamwe nibatandika kwiba nk'omuringo gw'okwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a more engaged and active citizenry, it is essential for political organizations to prioritize the needs and voices of their constituents. By doing so, they can create a more inclusive and representative political landscape.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukulaakulanya bannansi abeenyigidde era abanyiikivu, kya mugaso eri ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okukulembeza ebyetaago n'amaloboozi g'abakiise baabwe. Mu kukola ekyo, basobola okutondawo embeera y'ebyobufuzi erimu abantu bonna era erimu abakiise.
ach_prompt: Me kelo anywali matye ki miti dok ma tiyo matek, pire tek tutwal ki dul me cungu iwi bye me keto miti ki dwon pa lubol kwir gi obed mukwongo. I timo meno, gitwero kelo yub me cungu iwi bye matye ki dano weng dok ma cung pigi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor itunga lu iswamaete ejok, ejokuka noi kanu iriongeta luka politikis aisingarenit ipudesia keda iporotoi luka itunga luka atutubenakec. Kowai kalo aswam ngun, epedorete kesi aitolomun ewai lo abwoikinit itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Lezu kari anzi eyi ma aa'ta kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru amuti politiki ni 'diyini e'yo eyini le azini o'duko 'ba eyini opi nyapi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria ri 'bazu okporu. Eyi ka 'di 'ye, eyi eco e'yo politiki ni 'ba dria ma eselea azini 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho abantu abarikukora n'amaani omu by'obutegyeki, ni kikuru ebibiina by'obutegyeki kwebembeza ebyetengo n'amaraka g'abantu abu birikujwekyera. Omu kukora ekyo, nibabaasa kureetaho enkora y'eby'obutegyeki erimu abantu boona kandi erikujwekyera abantu boona.

eng_prompt: In order to achieve effective governance and maintain public trust, leaders must adhere to a set of principles and standards. Without a strong sense of discipline, political decisions can become erratic and self-serving.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okufuna obukulembeze obulungi n'okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu, abakulembeze balina okugoberera emisingi n'emitindo. Awatali mpisa ya maanyi, okusalawo kw'ebyobufuzi kuyinza okufuuka okw'obutabanguko n'okweyagaliza.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti me tela maber ki gwoko gen pa lwak, lutela omyero gulub cik ma igi lac. Labongo woro cik matek tutwal, moko tam me cungu iwi bye twero bedo tek tutwal dok konyo dano keken.
teo_prompt: Kanu adumun epugae loajokan ka aidar amuno naka itunga, ekot engarenok aitup ainapeta keda adoketait. Arai emamei aicoreta nuegogong, epedorete aseununeta nuka politikis araun nuepolok noi ido epedorete aimedaun bon.
lgg_prompt: Driceza muke ri esuzu azini asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ma ta mbazu, le drice'ba eyi ma obi e'yo azini wura eyi ma dria. Adriza kililiru kokoru, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi eco eca e'yo kokoru dika eyi ma ngulupi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutunga obwebembezi burungi n'okurinda obwesigye bw'abantu, abebembezi bashemereire kukuratira emisingye n'emitindo. Hatariho emicwe mirungi, ebiteiso by'eby'obutegyeki nibibaasa kuba ebitaine mugasho kandi ebirikweyendeza.

eng_prompt: Health officials are expressing concern over the recent surge in respiratory illnesses. As a result, hospitals are preparing for a potential influx of patients.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balaze obweraliikirivu olw'okweyongera kw'endwadde z'okussa gye buvuddeko. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro geetegekera okuyingira kw'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka nyutu lworo gi pi two ma mako yweyo ma omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi tye ka yubbe pi wel lutwo matye kabino.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos eswamak lu adekis aiyalongong kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nu eyengane. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adekisia aitemonokin kanuka adekak luipu.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza e'da e'yo azo oli seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, arojo eyi eyi otuta 'ye 'ba azoru 'diyi ma emuta eyini.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'endwara z'okwisya ezabeire nizeyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro gariyo nigeteekateekyera abarwaire abarikwija.

eng_prompt: In recent years, many hospitals have faced increasing patient demand due to a rise in population and health issues. As a result, the infrastructure of these facilities has struggled to keep pace with the growing needs of the community.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise amalwaliro mangi gafunye obwetaavu bw'abalwadde obweyongera olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'ensonga z'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, ebizimbe bino biremereddwa okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera buli lukya.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, odi yadi mapol tye ki miti madit tutwal I kom lutwo pi wel dano matye kamede ki peko me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, gedo me odi magi tye ka tute matek me lubu miti pa lwak matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina adekisia nuipu keda eipuda lo adekak kanu enaaba lo itunga keda atiokisio nuka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit aduketa nu aiboisio nu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, arojo karakara eyi esu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi tualu e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, afa ayuzaru pari 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri ci aa'zu e'yo ongulumu eyini lele tu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, amarwariro maingi gatungire omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyombeko by'ebyombeko ebi bigumire kukuratira ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: When a patient requires specialized care that is not available at their current facility, it may be necessary for the hospital to consider transferring them. Additionally, factors such as capacity, patient condition, and insurance coverage can influence the decision to refer a patient to another hospital.
lug_prompt: Omulwadde bw'aba yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo obutasangibwa mu ddwaliro ly'alimu, kiyinza okwetaagisa eddwaliro okulowooza ku ky'okumukyusa. Okwongerako, ebintu nga obusobozi, embeera y'omulwadde, ne yinsuwa bisobola okusinziirwako okusalawo okusindika omulwadde mu ddwaliro eddala.
ach_prompt: Ka latwo mito kony me diro ma pe nonge I ot yat ma en tye iye kombedi, twero bedo gin ma pire tek pi ot yat me tamo I kom kobo ne. Medo i kom meno, jami macalo kero, kit ma latwo tye kwede, ki incuarenc twero weko kimoko tam me kobo latwo I ot yat mukene.
teo_prompt: Arai ekoto adekan amukian na itegelikina na mam ejaas adekis, aticepak ibusakinit adekis aijulakin kes. Kilema, iboro kwape nat apedor, ejautene lo adekak, keda aitac ikapun luka insurance epedorete aitodolikin aseunet naka aijukar adekak adekis acie.
lgg_prompt: Ba azoru 'diyi ka le azakoma wura ndusi 'bani esu arojo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ku ria, arojo eyi eco e'yo 'du eyi ojazu arojo azi ma alea ra. Azi dika, e'yo ekile 'ba azoru 'diyi ma okpo be, wura azoru 'diyi pie, azini e'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ti pezu arojo nduni ma alia 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omurwaire ku arikwetenga okuragurirwa okw'omutaano okutarikubaasika omu eirwariro eri arikuragurwamu, eirwariro niribaasa kwetenga kumuhindura. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, enshonga nk'obushoboorozi, embeera y'omurwaire hamwe na inshuwarensi, nibibaasa kureetaho okusharamu kw'okutwara omurwaire omwirwariro erindi.

eng_prompt: Advancements in telemedicine have made it possible for healthcare providers to monitor patients remotely. As a result, many individuals can receive necessary care without the need for hospital visits.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu by'obujjanjabi obw'oku ssimu esobozesezza abasawo okulondoola abalwadde nga bali wala. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi basobola okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa nga tebeetaaga kugenda mu ddwaliro.
ach_prompt: Diro me tic i kom lutwo I telebijon okonyo lutic yoto kom me ngiyo kit ma lutwo tye ka wot kwede ki kama bor. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol twero nongo kony ma mite labongo cito I ot yat.
teo_prompt: Apol naka amukian kotelebision abu ijaik eswamak lu adekis aanyanar adekak kotelebision. Kanuka ngun, epedorete itunga luipu adumun amukian na ekotoi komam elosete adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni geri 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi atizu oli aliasi 'diyi fe 'ba arojo'a 'diyini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma pamvu onezu engazu re. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi aro esu eyini ani mu arojo eyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'emibazi erikukoresa esimu, eshoboroire abashaho okurambura abarwaire kuruga hare. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibatunga obujanjabi oburikwetengwa batarikwenda kuza omu irwariro.

eng_prompt: In today's healthcare landscape, ensuring that patients receive timely and effective treatment is more important than ever. As medical advancements continue to evolve, healthcare providers are exploring innovative methods to deliver care.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulamu eya leero, okukakasa nti abalwadde bafuna obujjanjabi mu budde era obulungi kya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Ng'enkulaakulana mu by'obujjanjabi yeeyongera okukulaakulana, abasawo banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya ez'okutuusa obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom me kare-ni, neno ni lutwo gunongo kony me yot kom i kare ki kome pire tek tutwal. Kit ma dongo lobo me yot kom tye kamede kwede, lutic yot kom tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me miyo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma amukian naka lolo, ejokuna noi aanyun ebe edumunenete adekak amukian kotoma apak. Kwape ejai apol naka amukian, eutasi itunga luka angaleu aingic iwaitin luitetiak luka aitodolikin amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata ni ewu andruri ma alea, le 'ba ma ne ra kini 'ba azoru 'diyi aro esu sa'wa dria azini kililiru ri eri orodriru aga oku driorisi. E'yo angu ezoma ni e'yo rua alanisi ri ni mu drile, 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Omu marwariro g'erizooba, okureeba ngu abarwaire batunga obujanjabi omu bwire, n'eky'omugasho munonga. Nk'oku eby'amagara birikugumizamu nibikura, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibasherura oburyo burungi bw'okuheereza obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing pandemic, it is crucial for all employees to adhere to health guidelines. Implementing strict protocols will help ensure a safe working environment for everyone.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo abakozi bonna okugoberera ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu. Okussa mu nkola amateeka amakakali kijja kuyamba okukakasa embeera y'emirimu ennungi eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal pi lutic weng me lubu cik me yot kom. Keto cik matek itic bikonyo me neno ni tic tye maber pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, epolok noi eswamak kere atupakinit aicoreta nuka angaleu. Aitodolikin ainapeta nuegogong ingarakini awanyun ebe eyuwara aiboisit naka aswam kanuka nginitunganan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru azi'ba dria yini azita alata ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Azita okporu 'diyi ma vuti obiza ni nga fe angu azi ngazu kililiru 'ba dria driri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho hati, abakozi boona bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'eby'amagara. Okuta ebiragiro by'okukuratira omu nkora nikiija kuhwera omu kureeba ngu buri omwe yaakora gye.

eng_prompt: In the high-pressure environment of healthcare, attention to detail is crucial for preventing the spread of infections. Unfortunately, some workers neglect basic safety protocols, putting themselves and their patients at risk.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'obunkenke bw'ebyobulamu, okufaayo ku buli kantu kikulu nnyo mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde. Eky'omukisa omubi, abakozi abamu basuulirira enkola z'obukuumi ezisookerwako, ne bateeka obulamu bwabwe n'obw'abalwadde baabwe mu katyabaga.
ach_prompt: I kare me lyeto madit tutwal I tenge me yot kom, keto cwiny I kom jami weng pire tek tutwal me gengo nya pa two. Ki gum marac, lutic mukene pe gi lubu cik me gwoko ber bedo, ma weko gin ki lutwo gi bedo kama rac.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka amukian, epolok noi apodokinit akiro nukajokak kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei. Nukaiturur, epalunitos eswamak ice ainapeta nuka ayuwara, ibwaikitete kesi keda adekak kec ationis.
lgg_prompt: Angu e'yo rua alanisi okporu 'diyi ma alea, asi 'baza e'yo dria ma dria ri eri orodriru azo eyi ma ereta atrizu. Drile onziru, azi'ba azi 'diyi azita e'yo agei tema ni 'diyi adi eyi ma ngulupi azini 'ba eyini azoru 'diyi pie e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bwingi omu by'amagara, okufayo aha bintu byona n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira okujanjaara kw'oburwaire. Eky'obusaasi, abakozi abamwe nibarekyerera ebiragiro by'okwerinda, ekirikubareetera oburemeezi n'abarwaire baabo.

eng_prompt: As the rates of infections continue to rise alarmingly, public health officials are urgently seeking effective strategies. The community is becoming increasingly concerned about the potential impact on healthcare systems and overall public safety.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abakwatibwa obulwadde bweyongera okulinnya mu ngeri eyeeraliikiriza, abakungu b'ebyobulamu banguyiriza okunoonya enkola ennungi. Abantu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri gye kiyinza okukosaamu ebyobulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ka nongo two tye ka medde ameda, lutic me yot kom tye ka yenyo yoo maber tutwal. Lwak tye ka mede ki bedo ki lworo I kom adwoki ne I kom yub me yot kom ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekasinei, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok. Eutasi itunga aiyalongong noi kanuikamunitos epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol nuka angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo esupi 'diyiniri ni tutu, azi'ba alatani 'diyi geri kililiru 'diyi nda mbeleru. Ongulumu eyi curu'do asi otiza be e'yo ecopi 'yepi geri alata ni 'diyi ma dria azini ageitema o'bi eyini ri ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukwatwa oburwaire nigugumizamu nigweyongyera munonga, ab'ebyamagara bariyo nibasherura oburyo burungi. Abantu beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ebirikubaasa kukwata ahaby'amagara hamwe n'okwerinda kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: As healthcare facilities face overwhelming demand, innovative solutions are needed to accommodate more patients. One promising approach is the use of temporary structures to expand treatment areas.
lug_prompt: Ng'amalwaliro gafuna obwetaavu bungi, eby'obuyiiya byetaagibwa okusobola okusuza abalwadde bangi. Engeri emu ennungi kwe kukozesa ebizimbe eby'ekiseera okugaziya ebifo awajjanjabirwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma odi yadi tye ka nongo miti madit tutwal, yoo manyen tye kamitte me konyo lutwo mapol. Yoo acel matye ki gen madit tutwal obedo tic ki odi ma giyubu pi tutunu me medo kabedo me nongo yat.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina amukian keda eipuda loepol noi, ekotoi aitolomunun iwaitin luitetiak kanu aidar adekak luipu. Epone ediope loejokuna ngesi aitwasam adukena nu apak naedit kanu aitanyanyar aiboisio nu amukian.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojo eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tu risi, le 'ba ma esu geri ndundu eyi 'bazu arojo eyi ma alea 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri eri geri 'bani ecozu jo ewule 'diyi ayuzu angu aro esuzu 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu amarwariro gaine ekyetengo ky'amaani, hariho ekyetengo ky'okutunga oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera abarwaire baingi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikureeta amatsiko n'okukoresa ebyombeko by'obwire bukye, okwongyera aha myanya y'okuraguriramu.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the efforts of your team can significantly boost morale and motivation. It's important to acknowledge their hard work and dedication.
lug_prompt: Okusiima kaweefube wa ttiimu yo kisobola okutumbula ennyo empisa n'okukubiriza. Kya mugaso okusiima emirimu gyabwe egy'amaanyi n'obumalirivu.
ach_prompt: Miyo pwoc pi tic matek pa lutic megi twero medo tek cwiny gi. Pire tek tutwal me pwoyo tic matek ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Aitijenar aswam na etimu kon epedori aitogogong eswamae loajokan. Erai ibore yenepol aisiyalamikin aswam kec na aswam kagogong ka ainakina kec.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba mi vile amuti ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo aꞌizuri eco ꞌba ma adriza ma omgbo otu tualu asi ꞌbaza be. Eri orodriru awa'difo fezu azi okporu eyini nga 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okusiima amaani ga tiimu yaawe, nikibaasa kwongyera amaani n'omuhimbo. N'eky'omugasho okusiima okukora kwabo n'okwehayo kwabo.

eng_prompt: It's important to consider all possible factors when evaluating patient outcomes during a pandemic. While coronavirus has been a significant concern, we must also acknowledge the impact of other underlying health conditions.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okulowooza ku nsonga zonna ezisoboka nga twekenneenya ebinaava mu balwadde mu kaseera k'ekirwadde bbunansi. Newankubadde akawuka ka kolona kabadde kanyiiza nnyo, tulina n'okukkiriza obuzibu bw'embeera z'obulamu endala.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom jami weng ma twero timme kace itye ka neno kit ma lutwo tye ka kato kwede I kare me poto pa gemo. Kadi bed ni two korona obedo peko madit tutwal, omyero bene wange adwoki pa peko me yot kom mukene.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom akiro kere nuepedorete aingic epone loebeitor adekan aswam kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona. Karaida erai ekorona ibore yenepol noi, ekot oni aijen atiokisio ace nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo dria ecopi ra 'diyi 'duzu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria sawa azo 'dezanirisi. Ka tro azo coronavirusniri ovu asi otizaru tu, le ama ma ai vini e'yo azo azi 'diyi ni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okureeba enshonga zoona ezirikubaasa kubaho waaba nooshwijuma entunguuka y'omurwaire omu bwire bw'ekigwereerezi. N'obu korona ebaire neerarikirira munonga, tushemereire kumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera y'eby'amagara endiijo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant increase in claims for damages and losses from various sectors. As a result, the government spends quite a lot of money on compensations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu kusaba kw'okuliyirira ebyonoonese n'okufiirwa okuva mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti esaasaanya ssente nnyingi nnyo mu kuliyirira.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel dano ma gipenyo pi cul pi jami ma oballe ki jami ma gurwenyo I tenge mapat-pat omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tiyo ki cente madit tutwal me culu dano.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi ailip naka ikapun lu amunaros keda ikapun lu atwaniar kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, itosomai apugan ikapun luipu noi kanu atacakinio.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma ofe afa ezale 'diyi ma dria azini afa avile 'diyi ma dria engazu esele ndu ndu yi vu ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni robia ayu omgbo angirisi 'ba eyi ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'okushaba kw'okurihirirwa n'okufeerwa kuruga omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti neshohoza esente nyingi munonga omu kurihirira abantu.

eng_prompt: Conflict and instability in a region can disrupt supply chains and hinder economic growth. As a result, companies often struggle to maintain productivity and profitability during times of war.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano n'obutali butebenkevu mu kitundu bisobola okutaataaganya enkola y'okutunda n'okukendeeza ku nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. N'ekivuddemu, amakampuni gatera okulwana okukuuma ebivaamu n'amagoba mu biseera by'entalo.
ach_prompt: Lweny ki kuku kuku I but lobo moni twero balo yub me cato jamigi ki weko dongo lobo bedo tek. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat ipol kare gi nongo peko me tic ki nongo magoba ikare me lweny.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma aiboisit epedorete aitolitol akorio naka iboro kosodete aitikitik apol naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etiono ikampunin aidar eswamae kec keda ameda kapakio nuka ejie.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi eco e'yo 'bani afa eyi awazu 'diyi eza ra dika eyi eco zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri atri ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci afa eyini 'ye 'diyi ma ta mbazu tualu orodri eyini esu 'diyi pie sa'wa a'di nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Entongane n'obutabanguko omu kyanga nibibaasa kutabangura eby'obushubuzi n'entunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nizirwana kurinda emirimo yaazo n'amagoba gaazo omu bwire bw'entaro.

eng_prompt: In Uganda's legal framework, various key positions play crucial roles in advising the government on legal matters. One of the most significant roles is held by the attorney general, who provides essential legal guidance to the administration.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka mu Uganda, ebifo eby'enjawulo ebikulu bikola emirimu emikulu mu kuwa gavumenti amagezi ku nsonga z'amateeka. Omulimu ogusinga obukulu gukwatibwa ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, awa obulagirizi obwetaagisa mu mateeka eri gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I cik me lobo Uganda, kabedo mapigi tego mapat-pat timo tic mapire tek me miyo tam ki gamente I kom lok makwako cik. Tic acel ma pire tek tutwal obedo pa lapilida madit, ma miyo tira ma pire tek bot gamente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila luko Uganda, ejaasi aiboisio nuipu nuepolok noi kanu aicor apugan nuikamunitos akiro nuka ikisila. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nuepolok ejaasi keda epulida lokapolon, lo ijaikini aicoreta nuka ikisila mama ejaasi apugan.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma azita eyi ma alea, pari okporu karakara eyi azi okporu ni nga gamete ni imbata fezu e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma dria. Azi okporu tu 'diyi ma azi attorney general ni, driceza 'da ni imbata azita palaa 'diyi fe ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu biragiro bya Uganda, emirimo y'amaani neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhabura gavumenti aha nshonga z'ebiragiro. Omwe aha mirimo y'omugasho munonga, nigukorwa ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti, orikuhereza obwebembezi obuhabuzi bw'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: When seeking approval for a project, it's important to follow proper protocols. One effective way to ensure clarity and formality is to document your request.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oyagala pulojekiti ekkirizibwe, kikulu okugoberera emitendera emituufu. Engeri emu ey'okukakasa obwerufu n'obutebenkevu kwe kuwandiika okusaba kwo.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka yenyo twero pi yub moni, pire tek me lubu cik. Yo acel maber me neno ni jami weng tye kakare en aye me coyo kwac mamegi.
teo_prompt: Arai ikoto ijo aitigogongio kanu epurojekt, ibusakinit jo atupakin ainapeta nuajokak. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aanyun ebe ecai ka ecai erai aiwadik akirokon.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka otita azi ma drile ngaria, eri orodriru azita kililiru 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Geri azi orodriru mini ecozu nezu ra kini e'yo mini a'izu 'diyi e'da kililiru azini kililiru ri eri mini e'yo mini a'izu 'diyi osizu va ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooyenda kwikirizibwa kukora purogyekiti, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira engyenderwaho nungi. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureeba ngu okushaba kwawe kukahikiirira n'okuhandiika ebi orikushaba.

eng_prompt: In legal terminology, understanding the roles of the parties involved in a lawsuit is crucial. One key participant in this process is the individual who initiates the legal action.
lug_prompt: Mu njogera y'amateeka, okutegeera emirimu gy'abantu abakwatibwako mu musango kikulu nnyo. Omu ku bakwatibwako abakulu mu nkola eno ye muntu yennyini atandikawo okutwala omusango mu mbuga z'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I lok makwako cik, niang tic pa joo matye I adot obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Ngat acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man en aye ngat ma ocako tic I kot.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo ikisila, amisiikin aswam naka itunga lu emusago erai ibore yenepol noi. Ediopetunganan loepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi itunganan yenebeit ageun aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni 'diyi ma alia, azi 'ba e'yo liza ma alia 'diyi ni 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru. Ba azi okporu fipi e'yo 'di ma alia ni 'ba e'yo azita palaa ri e'dopi ni'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bigambo by'ebiragiro, okwetegyereza emirimo y'abantu abarikwejumba omushango n'eky'omugasho munonga. Omuntu mukuru orikwejumba omu nkora egi, niwe muntu weena orikutandikaho omurimo gw'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In a successful organization, the role of a leader extends beyond mere authority. True leadership is about fostering an environment where team members feel valued and supported.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole ekituuse ku buwanguzi, omulimu gw'omukulembeze gusukka ku buyinza bwokka. Obukulembeze obutuufu bukwata ku kukuza embeera nga bammemba ba ttiimu bawulira nga ba muwendo era nga bawagirwa.
ach_prompt: I dul ma timo maber, tic pa latela pe obedo twero keken. Tela me ada obedo pi kelo kabedo ma lumemba me dul tic giwinyo ni pigi tek dok kicwako gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget loekerianara, aswam naka engarenon adepar apedor. Engarenone loajokan erai aitolomun ejautene lo ejenete itunga luka etimu ebe ejokuka ido igangitai.
lgg_prompt: Amuti drile suzaru 'diyi ma alea, azi drice'ba ni ri ma azi aga lu okpo feza ma dria ri ra. Driceza a'da ri eri e'yo angu 'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu orodriru azini atita be 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore ekirikukora kurungi,omurimo gw'omwebembezi nigukira aha bushoborozi. Obwebembezi obwabuzima n'obw'okureetaho embeera erikworeka ngu ba memba b'akakiiko nibahebwa ekitiinisa n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become a pervasive issue within the political system, undermining public trust. As investigations reveal alarming patterns, it becomes clear that financial misconduct is rampant among officials.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi bufuuse ensonga ejjudde mu nkola y'ebyobufuzi, ekityoboola obwesige bw'abantu. Okunoonyereza bwe kulaga enkola eyeeraliikiriza, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obutali bwenkanya mu by'ensimbi buyitiridde mu bakungu.
ach_prompt: Camucana odoko peko madit tutwal I tenge me cungu iwi bye dok man balo gen pa lwak. Kit ma kwed tye ka nyutu kwede kit ma jami tye ka time kwede, nen atyer kamaleng ni tim me camucana tye ka nyaa ikin lutic.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka apiyai erai ationis naepol noi kotoma politikis, ido itolitol amunokina naka itunga. Kwape itodunitos aingic iboro luitukurianete, ecai cut ebe ejai abilibilio na ikapun noi kanejaas eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo niri eca curu'do e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea tre, erini fezu o'bi eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria ku. E'yo eti ondaza ni e'dazu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo robia ayuza onzi 'diyi ma omgbo azi'ba eyi ma eselea tutu.
nyn_prompt: Obushomankuzi buhindukire enshonga erikujanjaara omu by'obutegyeki, erikushiisha obwesigye bw'abantu. Nk'oku okucondooza kurikworeka enkora erikwerarikiriza, nikyoreka butunu ngu okushomankuza omu by'empiiha kweyongyeire omu bakungu.

eng_prompt: Navigating the complexities of public administration can be quite challenging. Many citizens often express frustration over the slow pace of decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Okutambulira mu buzibu bw'enzirukanya y'emirimu esobola okuba okusoomooza. Bannansi bangi batera okulaga obwennyamivu olw'okukendeera kw'enkola z'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Lweny i kom peko me tela pa lwak twero bedo tek tutwal. Anywali mapol ipol kare nyutu cwer cwinygi pi yoo me moko tam matye ka wot mot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin ationis na eyaitene lo apugan erai na etiono noi. Itunga luipu itodunitos amamut aiyalama kanu aiyap naka aitolomunun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru driceza o'bi eyini ri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eco adri ewaru. Kari anzi karakara eyi e'da sa'wa driasi candi e'yo 'bani e'yo 'duzu e'yere 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyendesereza oburemeezi bw'obwebembezi bw'eihanga nikibaasa kugumira kimwe. Abatuuragye abaingi nibakira kworeka oburemeezi ahabw'okukyerererwa kw'okukora okusharamu.

eng_prompt: In a world where trust is often taken for granted, many people find themselves disillusioned by the empty words of others. As time goes on, it becomes clear that some promises are never fulfilled.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obwesige gye butwalibwa ng'ekintu ekikulu, abantu bangi baggwamu amaanyi olw'ebigambo by'abalala ebitaliimu nsa. Ekiseera bwe kigenda kiyitawo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebisuubizo ebimu tebituukirizibwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano pe giparo pi bedo ki gen, dano mapol nongo cwinygi otur pi lok ma pe atir pa jo mukene. Ka kare woto anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni cikke mukene pe ki cobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na mam eyangaritai amuno kwape ibore yenitegelikina, itunga luipu itakadikinete kanuka akiro nuemamei itunga. Kwape elosi apak, ecai cut ebe mam isumunenete ice itodolikino.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani asi 'bazu 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria ku ri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi ma asi eza e'yo 'ba azi 'diyiniri si. Sa'wa ni muzu drile, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo 'bani owizu 'diyi ma azi eyi 'yeni i ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ei abantu barikukira kutwara obwesigye nk'ekintu kikye, abantu baingi nibashemererwa ahabw'ebigambo by'abandi ebitaine mugasho. Obwire ku burikugyenda omu maisho, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu ebiraganiso ebimwe tibirikuhikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: In the midst of chaos, their actions spoke volumes about their true nature. Fearless and driven by a singular purpose, they showed no mercy to those who stood in their way.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butabanguko, ebikolwa byabwe byayogera bingi ku ngeri zaabwe entuufu. Nga tebalina kutya era nga bakubirizibwa ekigendererwa kimu, tebaalaga kusaasira eri abo abaayimirira mu kkubo lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kuku kuku enoni, timgi onyuto kitgi. Labongo lworo dok ki miti acel, pe gunyuto kica bot jo ma ocung i yo gi.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka amumu, apotu aswamisiokec kinerata nuipu nuikamunitos iponesiokec luka abeit. Amamete akurianu ido kanu apeleikinet adiope, mam kesi apotu itodutu aitim mama ejaasi ngul luebwoitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri 'da ma talasi, e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi nze e'yo eyi ma adriza a'da ri ma dria angiri. Ori kokoru azini driceza e'yo azi ma dria si, eyi awini asi ndriza e'da 'ba pa tupi eyi ma geri ma alea 'diyi vu ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'akavuyo, ebikorwa byabo bikagamba bingi ahari bo. Bataine kutiina kandi barikugyenderera ekigyendererwa kimwe, tibaragirire embabazi abo boona abaabaire nibahakanisa.

eng_prompt: Effective delegation is crucial for maximizing team productivity and ensuring that projects are completed successfully. Understanding the strengths and weaknesses of team members can help leaders make informed decisions about task assignments.
lug_prompt: Okugaba emirimu mu ngeri ennungi kwa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkola ya ttiimu n'okukakasa nti pulojekiti ziwedde bulungi. Okutegeera amaanyi n'obunafu bwa bammemba ba ttiimu kiyamba abakulembeze okusalawo obulungi ku mirimu.
ach_prompt: Miyo tic ki lutic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi medo rwom me tic pa lutic ki neno ni yub weng otum maber. Niang kero ki goro pa lumemba me dul tic twero konyo lutela me moko tam maber i kom tic ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Ainanakin itunga aswam ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin eswamae lo itunga ka awanyun ebe etubete ipurojektin ejok. Amisiikin agogong keda agogong naka itunga luka etimu ingarakini engarenok aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos aswam.
lgg_prompt: Azi feza kililiru ri eri orodriru azi ngaza amuti niri ma omgbo otuzu azini otita eyi ma dezu kililiru. E'yo 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi ma okpo azini okpo ako yi vazu ri eco drice'ba yi ma aza ko e'yo 'duza kililiru 'diyi 'yezu azi fele 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Obujunaanizibwa burungi n'obw'omugasho omu kukora emirimo ya tiimu n'okureeba ngu purogyekiti zahwa kurungi. Okwetegyereza amaani n'obunafu bwa ba memba ba tiimu nikibaasa kuhwera abebembezi okusharamu kurungi aha mirimo ei bashemereire kukora.

eng_prompt: As the number of displaced individuals continues to rise globally, tensions between refugees and local populations have become increasingly evident. Understanding the underlying factors that contribute to these conflicts is essential for fostering harmony and integration.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu abasengulwa gweyongera okulinnya mu nsi yonna, okusika omuguwa wakati w'abanoonyiboobubudamu n'abantu b'omu kitundu kweyongedde. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako obukuubagano buno kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obumu n'obumu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel luring ayela tye ka medde I wilobo lung, telle ikin luring ayela ki lutedero tye ka medde. Niang tyen lok ma oweko lweny obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo winye ki ribbe.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaba lo ikerai kotoma akwap kere, apol noi ingungeta kiding ikerai keda itunga luka atutubet. Ajenun iboro lu eyangaununete ingungeta lu epolok noi kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyiniri ni mu drile tuzu wudrikurusi dria, asi otiza emunyale eyi ma eselea 'ba angu ma alea 'diyi pie ri eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo e'yo a'di 'diza 'diyi fepi 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru ti ecita azini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo nigugumizamu kweyongyera omunsi yoona, obunkenke ahagati y'empungi n'abantu b'omubyaro bweyongyeire. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureeta entaro ezi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho obusingye n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Every choice you face can shape your future in unexpected ways. Take a moment to reflect on the potential consequences before acting.
lug_prompt: Buli kusalawo kw'oyolekaganye nakwo kusobola okukyusa ebiseera byo eby'omu maaso mu ngeri etasuubirwa. Twala akaseera olowooze ku biyinza okuvaamu nga tonnabaako ky'okola.
ach_prompt: Moko tam weng ma itye kwede twero yubu kwo ni me anyim I yoo ma pe iromo byekone. Ter kare me tam I kom adwogi ne mapwod pe itimo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kangin aseunet na itereikina keda ijo epedori aitolomun ingaren kon koipone kalo mam iwomit jo. Koinak apak aomoom nuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete alomun eringa iswama.
lgg_prompt: Opeta dria mini esu 'diyi eco mi vile ewu drialeri oja geri mini egarisi ku 'diyi ma alia ra. Le mi ma 'du sa'wa azi egazu e'yo ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria rakaka de nga po'di mi 'yeni e'yo ku.
nyn_prompt: Buri ncwamu ei orikubaasa kukora neebaasa kuhindura ebiro byawe by'omumaisho omu miringo etarikuteekateekwaho. Twara akaire koona oteekateekye aha birikubaasa kurugamu otakakozire.

eng_prompt: Fostering a sense of unity and understanding is essential for a harmonious society. By embracing kindness and respect, we can create an environment where everyone feels valued.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana bikulu nnyo mu mbeera z'abantu ez'emirembe. Bwe tukwatiriza ekisa n'ekitiibwa, tusobola okutondawo embeera buli omu gy'awulira nga wa muwendo.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo kit me ribe ki winye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo wa. Ka wajolo kica ki woro, watwero kelo kabedo ma dano weng winyo ni pigi tek.
teo_prompt: Aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aimorikikina kotunga. Kowai lo aijaun asianut keda ayongit, ipedori oni aitolomun ejautene lo epupiata itunga kere ebe ejokuna.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru ongulumu aa'pi tualuri ni. Asi ndriza azini inzita a'izasi, ama eco angu azi 'ba dria ni aa'zu orodriru ni ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana n'eky'omugasho omu bantu. Twakunda embabazi n'ekitiinisa, nitubaasa kureetaho embeera ahu buri omwe arikuhurira aine omugasho.

eng_prompt: In times of division and uncertainty, effective leadership becomes crucial. By fostering a sense of community and shared purpose, leaders can inspire collaboration and understanding among diverse groups.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enjawukana n'obutali bukakafu, obukulembeze obulungi buba bwa mugaso nnyo. Abakulembeze basobola okuleetawo enkolagana n'okutegeeragana mu bibiina eby'enjawulo nga bakubiriza abantu okuba obumu n'okuba n'ekigendererwa eky'awamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me apoka-poka ki peko, tela maber pire tek tutwal. Lutela twero kelo ribe ki niang I kin dul mapat-pat I yoo me medo rwom me ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiakatiaka keda amamus acamanar, erai engarenone loajokan ibore yenepol noi. Kowai lo aitopolor aimorikikina keda alosikinet, epedorete engarenok aisinyikokin aiswamanara keda apuponoro kiding igurupun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ti ecita ako ni 'diyi ma alea, driceza muke ri eri orodriru tu. Geri ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu risi, drice'ba eyi eco ti ecita azini vata eji amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu, obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho munonga. Abeebembezi nibabaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana ahagati y'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: Effective management is crucial in addressing potential problems early on. If left unchecked, even minor concerns can escalate into significant challenges.
lug_prompt: Enzirukanya ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kukola ku bizibu ebiyinza okubaawo nga bukyali. Singa ebintu ebitonotono birekebwa, bisobola okufuuka ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Doro tic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko ma twero bedo tye con. Ka pe kigengo, kadi peko matino tino twero doko peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Erai eyaitene loajokan lo epolok noi kanu aitemokin atiokisio sek. Arai mam itemokitai, epedorete aiyalongongo na ikidioko araun ainingosit naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo ewaru ecopi 'diyi ma aza kozu drioru. Ba ka e'yo nde ma aza ko ku, e'yo ewaru werea 'diyi eco eca e'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi ru ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho omu kukora aha bizibu ebirikubaasa kubaho bukiri kare. N'oburemeezi bukye ku burekyeirweho, nibubaasa kuhinduka oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with diverse cultures and beliefs, it's essential to reflect on our relationships with those around us. Understanding the importance of harmony and respect is crucial for fostering a sense of community.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obuwangwa n'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo, kya mugaso okufumiitiriza ku nkolagana yaffe n'abo abatwetoolodde. Okutegeera obukulu bw'obumu n'okussa ekitiibwa kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki tekwaro ki dini ma pat pat, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom wat ma tye ikinwa ki jo ma orumuwa. Niang ber pa winye ki woro obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dongo cwiny me ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda inonosio keda aiyuuneta nuegelegela, ejokuna noi aomoom nuikamunitos eidicanekosi keda ngul luejaasi keda oni. Amisiikin ajokis naka aimorikikina keda ayongit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolorite aomisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia suruni azini a'ita ndu ndu 'diyisi, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo ama ma eselea 'ba ama agei 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria. Onita orodri ti ecita ni azini inzita niri ma dria ri eri orodriru tu e'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire eby'obuhangwa n'enyikiriza ezitari zimwe, niky'omugasho okuteekateeka aha nkoragana yaitu n'abo abatwetorwaire. Okwetegyereza omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okuheereza abantu ekitiinisa, nikikuru munonga omukureetaho obumwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the moral compass of a community is often tested. It is essential for those in positions of power to take a stand against violence and injustice.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, empisa z'ekitundu zitera okugezesebwa. Kya mugaso nnyo abo abali mu bifo eby'obuyinza okulwanyisa obutabanguko n'obutali bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, rwom me kwo pa lwak ipol kare kipimo. Pire tek tutwal pi joo matye ki twero me cung matek i kom tim gero ki ngolo kop alenga.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, inwakio duc iponesio luka itunga luka atutubet. Erai ibore yenepol noi ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuapolok aitepeg amumu keda amamus aipuga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, 'ba ongulumu eyi ma adriza o'bi sa'wa driasi. Eri orodriru 'ba pari opi nyaza ni ma alia 'diyi ni pa sozu ngiringiri azini e'yo liza kililiru ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, emicwe y'abantu neekyezibwa. N'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi kurwanisa obwimukiriro n'obutari buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: Cultural leaders play a vital part in shaping the identity and values of a community. Their influence can foster creativity, promote inclusivity, and drive social change.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'ennono bakola omulimu munene mu kukola enkula y'abantu n'empisa z'ekitundu. Obuyinza bwabwe busobola okutumbula obuyiiya, okutumbula abantu bonna, n'okutambuza enkyukakyuka mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Lutela tekwaro gitiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal I yubu kit ma dano ma ikabedo moni tye kwede. Ticgi twero kelo diro manyen, kelo dano weng, ki kelo aloka loka I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete engarenok lu atekerin aswam naepol noi kanu aitolomun ajenanut keda iponesio luka itunga. Epedorete kesi aitopolor acoasinei nuitetiak, aitopolorite itunga kere, ka aitopolor aijulakineta kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba suruni 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Yi ma okpo eco e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otu, e'yo 'ba dria ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu azini ojata ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omukuhamya abantu n'emitwarize yaabo. Omugasho gwabo nigubaasa kureetaho okujumbura, okureetaho empindahinduka omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In a world where trust is fragile and betrayal runs deep, the desire for vengeance can consume even the closest of allies. As grievances fester, the bonds that once united them begin to unravel.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli obwesige obutonotono n'okulya mu nsi olukwe, okwagala okwesasuza kusobola okusaanyaawo ne mikwano gyaffe egy'oku lusegere. Okwemulugunya bwe kweyongera, enkolagana eyali ebagatta etandika okukendeera.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma gen tye magoro dok tim me turu gamente tye matek tutwal, miti me culu mucara twero balo kadi wa lurem macok. Ka cwer cwiny tye kamedde, wat ma onongo oribo gi ikare macon cako bale.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naemamei amunokina ido naepol noi amengerikit, epedori eipud loka ailem aiyar itunga luejaasi keda eidicane loepol noi. Neipolor angurian, egeunete aimorikikina na ajai nepepe keda kesi aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia asi'baza ni ovuzu okpo kokoru azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi o'dizu 'diyi ma eselea, leta arioti ofeza niri eco ata 'ba eyi ma agyipi eyi ma agei 'diyi ezazu ra. Erita ako eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, aa'ta eyini aa'zu tualu ri ni e'do e'de ra.

eng_prompt: Understanding the dynamics of human relationships is crucial for fostering harmony. Many factors can lead to disagreements and misunderstandings in social interactions.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enkola y'enkolagana y'abantu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obumu. Ensonga nnyingi zisobola okuvaako obutakkaanya n'obutategeeragana mu nkolagana y'abantu.

lgg_prompt: E'yo geri 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma vata eri orodriru ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo karakara eyi eco fe erita ako azini vata ako eyi ma eselea ra.

eng_prompt: In every society, certain individuals emerge as influential figures who shape values and traditions. These cultural leaders play a vital role in guiding the community's identity and fostering a sense of belonging.
lug_prompt: Mu buli kitundu, abantu abamu bavaayo ng'abantu ab'amaanyi abakola empisa n'ennono. Abakulembeze b'ebyobuwangwa bano bakola omulimu munene mu kulambika endagamuntu y'ekitundu n'okutumbula enneewulira y'okubeerawo.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena kere, ejaas icetunga kwape itunga luepolok luitolomete iponesio ka inonosio. Iswamaete engarenok lu atekerin aswam naepol noi kanu aitodun aijen naka itunga ka aitopoloria aomisioitikec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria eyi ma alea, 'ba azi 'diyi efu 'ba okporu e'yo a'da ni azini e'yo suruni 'diyi 'bapi 'diyi ru. Drice'ba suruni 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: In a world often filled with challenges and negativity, the importance of kindness and compassion cannot be overstated. Communities thrive when individuals come together to support one another and promote positive change.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo onzi 'diyi pie tre, 'ba econi orodri asi ndriza ni azini asi ndriza ni 'diyi ma omgbo 'ba ku. Ongulumu eyi tu uru 'ba eyi ka emu tualu atita fezu eyi ma eselea azini ojata muke 'diyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi n'oburemeezi, omugasho gw'embabazi n'okusaasira tigurikubaasa kugambwa munonga. Ebyanga nibitunguuka abantu ku barikukwatanisa okuhwera n'okureetaho empinduka.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks as prices soared and supplies dwindled. Frustrated by the lack of support from local authorities, the market vendors finally reached their breaking point.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera okumala wiiki ng'emiwendo girinnya ate ng'ebintu bikendeera. Olw'obutaba na buyambi okuva mu bakulembeze b'ebyalo, abasuubuzi b'omu katale baatuuka ku ssa lyabwe.

teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu naarai apolor noi itiaisinei ido ikidioko iboro. Kanuka amamus na agangat kanejaas apedorosio nuka atutubet, apotu agwelanarak luka esokoni kodolokisi adoketaitikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi e'bi tu sabiti eyi ma alea e'yo afa eyi ma aje ni tuzu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu risi. E'yo atita ako ni engazu drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu risi, 'ba afa ozipi cu'a 'diyi eca asizu eyi ma okpo ako si.

eng_prompt: In the criminal justice system, various types of sentences can be imposed based on the severity of the crime. Among these, the most severe is the death penalty, which carries significant moral and legal implications.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'obwenkanya, ebibonerezo eby'enjawulo bisobola okuteekebwawo okusinziira ku bunene bw'omusango. Mu bino, ekisinga obukambwe bwe kibonerezo ky'okufa, ekirina obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu mpisa ne mu mateeka.

nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okureetaho obumwe n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu baitu. Okushoroora abantu kurugirira aha mireebekyere yaabo n'embeera yaabo y'obuhangwa, kushemereire kukorwaho kandi kuhwaho.

lgg_prompt: E'yo azita onyoza niri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo dria orodriru 'diyi trazu 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Diri ne ra kini 'ba nga e'yo li kililiru dika 'ba nga e'yo 'ye 'ba kililiru 'diyi ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: The legislative process involves several stages of debate and review. Once a proposal gains sufficient support, it moves forward for a vote.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okussaawo amateeka erimu emitendera egy'enjawulo egy'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okukebera. Ekiteeso bwe kifuna obuwagizi obumala, kitwalibwa mu kalulu.

teo_prompt: Ejaasi ainapeta nuka ikisila keda ainapeta nuipu nuka ipegeta keda airereonor. Arai edumuni aomisio agangat na edolitos, elosi aseo.

eng_prompt: Understanding the structure of the Ugandan government is essential for grasping how economic policies are formulated. One key component of this structure is the ministry responsible for managing the country's financial resources.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enkola ya gavumenti ya Uganda kya mugaso okutegeera engeri enkola z'ebyenfuna gye zikolebwamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno ye minisitule evunaanyizibwa ku kuddukanya eby'ensimbi by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma gamente me Uganda tye kwede pire tek tutwal pi niang kit ma kiyubu kwede cik me lim. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo jang gamente ma doro tic ki lim me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin epone loka apugan nako Uganda ejok kanu amisiikin epone loiswamaere ikisila luka ikapun. Idiopebore yenepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi erionget lo ikamunitos nuka ikapun luka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Geri gameteni Ugandaari ma e'yo vazu ri eri orodriru geri 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezu ri vazu. Afa azi okporu angu 'da ma alea ri eri okalamvu e'yo robia ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu ri i.

eng_prompt: The legal system is designed to protect society from harmful actions. Among the most serious of these actions is the act of taking another person's life.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'amateeka ekoleddwa okukuuma abantu okuva ku bikolwa eby'obulabe. Ekimu ku bikolwa bino eby'obulabe kwe kutta omuntu omulala.
ach_prompt: Cik tye me gwoko lwak ki i kom tim maraco. I kin tim magi ma rac loyo weng en aye kwanyo kwo pa ngat mukene.
teo_prompt: Itemonokinitai ikisila kanu ayuarite itunga kama ejaasi aswamisio nuarokok. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio nuarokok noi ngesi aikisar aijar naka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Ba ede geri azita ni 'diyi o'bi yi ma ta mbazu e'yo onzi 'diyi vurisi. E'yo onzi tu 'diyi ma eselea ri e'yo 'bani 'ba azi ma idri 'duzu ri'i.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'ebiragiro eteirweho okurinda abantu okurekyeraho ebikorwa bibi. Omubikorwa ebirikukirayo oburemeezi n'okwihaho amagara g'omuntu ondiijo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societies have grappled with the issue of violence and its impact on communities. In response to the growing need for safety and order, lawmakers have sought to create regulations that protect individuals from harm.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebitundu bibadde birwanagana n'ensonga y'obutabanguko n'engeri gye bukosaamu ebitundu. Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obukuumi n'obutebenkevu, ababaka ba palamenti bafubye okussaawo amateeka agakuuma abantu okuva ku bulabe.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, lwak gubedo ka lweny ki lok me tim gero ki adwogi ne I kom lwak. Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo, luwang lwak I ot moko cik otemo me kelo cik ma gwoko dano ki I peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etereikina itunga keda ationis naka amumu keda epone loetiroritor ngesi itunga. Kanu aitemokin eipud loka ayuwara keda ainapakina, ekotosi imeeban luka ikisila aitolomun ikisila lu iyuwarete itunga kama ejaasi aimusungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi e'bi dri ci e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie tualu e'yo eyini 'ye ongulumu eyi ma dria 'diyi pie. nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'eshonga y'obutabanguko hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabwo aha bantu. Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'eby'okwerinda n'obutebekana, ab'eishengyero bashaziremu kutaho ebiragiro ebirikubarinda akabi.

eng_prompt: As rumors spread about the rise in unexplained disappearances, many began to speculate on the motives driving such dark actions. Some community members whispered that there might be a sinister agenda at play, suggesting a connection to those in power.
lug_prompt: Olugambo bwe lwasaasaana ku kweyongera kw'okubula kw'abantu mu ngeri etategeerekeka, bangi baatandika okuteebereza ku bigendererwa ebiviirako ebikolwa ebyo eby'ekizikiza. Abantu b'omu kitundu abamu baagamba mu kasirise nti wayinza okubaawo enteekateeka embi eriwo, ekiraga nti balina akakwate n'abo abali mu buyinza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angeya omede I kom rweny pa dano, dano mapol gucako byeko tyen lok matye I kom tim maraco enoni. Lwak mukene gubedo ka wilo wigi ni twero bedo ni tye miti marac matye katime, ma nyutu kubbe ki joo matye I loc.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekorasi akiro nuikamunitos aibiror naka itunga, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aomoom nuikamunitos alosikineta nuka aswamisio nuarokok. Apotu itunga ice kotemasi ebe aticepak ejai ainapeta nuarokok nuiswamasi, itodunit ebe ejaasi kesi keda arucokina keda ngul luejaasi apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko ni i erezu e'yo 'bani 'ba avizu e'yo kokoru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu ri ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo onzi 'dile 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria.
