Abantu b'omukyanga bakagamba omu kashushu ngu nihabaasa kuba hariho enteekateeka mbi erikukorwa, ekirikumanyisa okukwatanisa n'abo abari omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many cultures have viewed practices associated with witchcraft as dangerous and malevolent. This belief has often been fueled by fear and misunderstanding of the unknown.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebyobuwangwa bingi bitunuulidde ebikolwa ebikwatagana n'obulogo nga eby'obulabe. Enzikiriza eno ebadde ejjudde okutya n'obutategeera bikwata ku bitamanyiddwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare weng me tekwaro, tekwaro mapol oneno tim me jok macalo gin marac tutwal. Niye man pol kare tye macalo adwogi me lworo ki niang marac I kom ngo ma pe ngene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, esesenete inonosio luipu aswamisio nu ikamanara keda ecudet kwape nuarokok ido nuarokok. Erai duc aiyuun na eyangaunit akuriau ka amamus amisikin nu mam ejena.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, e'yo suruni karakara 'diyi ndre e'yo yi ecipi ojo be 'diyi ekile onzi azini onzi ru. A'ita 'diri ebi ovu sawa driasi okpo fezu ori azini vata ako e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa bingi bitwire nibitwara ebikorwa by'oburogo nk'eby'akabi n'obwinazi. Enzikiriza egi etwire neeyongyerwamu amaani ahabw'okutiina n'okwetegyereza kubi ebitarikumanywa.

eng_prompt: Change is possible for everyone, regardless of their past choices. With determination and support, individuals can seek a path toward righteousness.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka esoboka eri buli muntu, awatali kufaayo ku bye yasalawo emabega. N'obumalirivu n'obuwagizi, abantu basobola okunoonya ekkubo eribatuusa mu butuukirivu.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka twere pi dano weng, labongo paro pi gin ma gutimo con. Ki tek cwiny ki kony, dano acel acel twero yenyo yoo me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Epedorete itunga kere aijulakin, araida ejaasi kesi keda aseununeta nukokau. Keda agogongu keda agangat, epedorete itunga aimo erot lo elosi toma ailajaara.
lgg_prompt: Ojata eco i 'ye 'ba dria dria eyini aa'zu e'yo eyini pe drio 'diyi ma alea ra ti. Asi 'baza azini atita be, 'ba alu alu eco geri e'yo ada vu ri nda ra.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka neebaasika ahari buri omwe, oihiremu ebi yaakozire enyima. N'amaani n'obuhwezi, abantu nibabaasa kuronda omuhanda gw'okuhikiirira.

eng_prompt: In life, we often encounter various responsibilities that require our attention and commitment. Understanding the nature of these responsibilities is essential for managing our time and priorities effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu, tutera okusanga obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo obwetaaga okufaayo kwaffe n'okwewaayo. Okutegeera engeri y'obuvunaanyizibwa buno kya nkizo mu kuddukanya obulungi ebiseera byaffe n'ebyo bye tukulembeza.
ach_prompt: I kwo, ipol kare wanongo tic mapol ma mito ni waket cwiny wa i komgi. Niang kit tic magi pire tek tutwal pi tic ki cawawa ki jami ma wamito timo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar, itereikina oni keda aswamisinei nuipu nu ekotosi oni apodokinit ka ainakina. Amisiikin epone loka aswamisinei nu ejok kanu aitwasam apak wok ejok.
lgg_prompt: Idri ma alia, ama sawa driasi e'yo ndundu ama ma asi fezu azini asi feza lepi 'diyi isu. Azi 'diyi ma wura vazu ri eri orodriru sa'wa amavile ri ma tambazu kililiru tualu e'yo okporu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara, nitukira kuhikwaho obujunanizibwa butarikushushana oburikwetenga okuta omutima n'okwehayo kwaitu. Okwetegyereza obujunanizibwa obu nikikuru munonga omu kukoresa kurungi obwire bwaitu n'ebi twine kwebembeza.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societies have often resorted to extreme measures in their quest for power and control. In many cultures, the belief in appeasing deities through ritualistic acts has led to the dark practice of human sacrifices.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu babaddenga baddukira mu bikolwa eby'amaanyi nga banoonya obuyinza n'obuyinza. Mu buwangwa bungi, enzikiriza mu kusanyusa bakatonda nga bayita mu bikolwa eby'ekinnansi eviiriddeko enkola embi ey'okusaddaaka abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, lwak gubedo ka tic ki yoo mapat-pat me yenyo twero ki twero. I tekwaro mapol, niyee me kweyo cwiny lubanga kun gitiyo ki yub mapat-pat okelo tim marac me tyero dano macalo gitum.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etapit itunga aitwasam iponesio luitegelikina kanu adumun apugan keda apedor. Kotoma inonosio luipu, aomisioit naka aitapatan iponesio luka iponesio luka ajokis ayangau aswamisio nuarokok nuka ainanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu eyi e'bi e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye eyini lezu okpo esuzu. E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, a'ita mungu eyi ma asi omiza ma dria geri e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyisi ri fe 'yeta onzi 'bani 'ba eyi o'dizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibakoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe kuronda obushoborozi n'obutegyeki. Omu by'obuhangwa bingi,okwikiriza omukuhuumuriza bakatonda kurabira omu migyenzo, kireesireho enkora mbi y'okusherekyerera abantu.

eng_prompt: Many ancient cultures believed that offering sacrifices to their deities was essential for maintaining harmony and favor. However, in modern interpretations, some view these practices as dark and associated with malevolent forces.
lug_prompt: Obuwangwa bungi obw'edda bwalowooza nti okuwaayo ssaddaaka eri bakatonda baabwe kyali kyetaagisa okusobola okukuuma obumu n'okusiimibwa. Newankubadde, mu nnyonyola ez'omulembe guno, abamu balaba enkola zino nga ez'ekizikiza era nga zikwatagana n'amaanyi amabi.
ach_prompt: Tekwaro mapol macon tye ki niyee ni tyero gityer bot lubanga meggi obedo gin ma pire tek me gwoko winye ki cwak. Kadi bed kumeno, I gonyo lok ma ite kare ni, jo mukene gineno tim magi macalo gin ma col dok kubbe ki teko maraco.
teo_prompt: Inonosio luipu luka apakio nukolo iyuunitos ebe ainanakin ainanakineta mama ejaasi iponesiokec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aimorikikina keda acamanar. Konye, kotoma amisiikin nuakwana, esesenete ice aswamisio nu kwape nuarokok ido ikamanara keda agogong nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: A'bi karakara andra drio 'diyi a'i ra kini afa feza mungu yini 'diyi dri ri eri orodriru ti ecita ma ta mbazu azini ayiko esuzu. Kani si, e'yo eceza ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azi 'diyi 'yeta 'diyi ndre ekile ini ru azini yi ecipi okpo onzi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa bingi ebya ira bikaba nibyikiriza ngu okuhayo ebitambo ahari ruhanga waabo kikaba kiri eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'okusiimwa. Kwonka, omu nshonga z'omurembe, abamwe nibareeba ebikorwa ebi nk'eby'omwirima kandi bikakwatanisa n'amaani mabi.

eng_prompt: In many jurisdictions, the legal age of adulthood is set at eighteen years. As a result, individuals who have not yet reached this age are subject to specific laws and regulations.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'amateeka bingi, emyaka gy'obukulu mu mateeka giteekebwa ku myaka kkumi na munaana. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abatannatuuka ku myaka gino bagobererwa amateeka n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I twok piny mapol, mwaka me bedo dano madit I te cik tye apar wiye aboro. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma pwod pe oo I mwaka man tye ite cik mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, erai ikar itomonakanyauni luka itunga luapolok. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu mam itodolikisi ekaru kalo ejai ikisila lu itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, eli 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu 'ba mbapi 'bo 'diyi niri eli mudri drini aro. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eli 'di ma vutia 'diyi azita azini azita ndu 'diyi ma palaa.
nyn_prompt: Omu matware maingi, emyaka y'obukuru omu biragiro neeteebwa aha myaka ikumi na munaana. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abatakahikize emyaka egi, nibagyendera aha mateeka n'ebiragiro ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In many cultures around the world, traditional practices play a significant role in marriage customs. One such practice is the payment of dowry, which is particularly prominent in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi okwetooloola ensi, enkola z'obuwangwa zikola omulimu munene mu nnono z'obufumbo. Ekimu ku bikolwa ng'ebyo kwe kusasula ebirabo, ekimanyiddwa ennyo mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol I wilobo lung, tekwaro konyo totwal I tekwaro me nyom. Tim acel ma kit meno obedo culu cente me nyom, ma oywek tutwalle I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu kotoma akwap kere, iswamaete inonosio lu atekerin epelu loepol noi. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio ngun ngesi aitac ikapun luka idwe, ido ejenara noi ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ma alia, e'yo a'bini 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo aje akuniri ma alia. Yeta 'dile 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ofezu, e'yo 'di tuni kari Uganda niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nganda nyingi okwetorora ensi yoona, emigyenzo y'obuhangwa neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu migyenzo y'obushwere. Ekikorwa kimwe nk'ekyo, n'okushashura obuhereeza, ekirikumanywa munonga omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: Gender equality is a fundamental principle that underpins a just society. It is essential to recognize the value and potential of every individual, regardless of their gender.
lug_prompt: Obwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu musingi ogusinziirwako ekitundu eky'obwenkanya. Kya mugaso okutegeera omugaso n'obusobozi bwa buli muntu, awatali kufaayo ku kikula kye.
ach_prompt: Rwom me bedo marom ikin mon ki coo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo wa. Pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa dano weng labongo paro pi coo onyo mon.
teo_prompt: Airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor erai ainapeta nuepolok nuepedorete aitodolikin itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ajokis naka itunga kere, araida ikiliok arai angor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri eri e'yo okporu ongulumu kililiru 'diyiniri'i. Eri orodriru 'bani orodri azini okpo 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutwarira kimwe abakazi n'abashaija n'abakazi n'omusingye gw'oburingaaniza omu bantu. N'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho n'obushoboorozi bwa buri muntu, oihiremu omushaija n'omukazi.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about the social and health implications of early marriages is crucial for the well-being of our youth. It is essential to engage in open discussions that highlight the risks associated with such practices.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku buzibu obuva mu kufumbirwa amangu mu mbeera z'abantu n'ebyobulamu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu bw'abavubuka baffe. Kya mugaso okwenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'olwatu okulaga akabi akali mu bikolwa ng'ebyo.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom adwoki marac ma nyome con kelo i kom kwo pa bulu obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa bulu wa. Pire tek tutwal me nywako lok I adaa ma nyutu rac pa tim enoni.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakino nuikamunitos atiokisio nu itunga keda nuka angaleu na adukokin idwe eringa edisiak erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka atumunak wok. Erai ibore yenepol noi alomar toma oineresinei luitegelikina lu itodunitos atiokisio nu ikamanara keda aswamisio ngun.
lgg_prompt: Imbata feza e'yo ewaru 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu drioru 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru ama vile 'ba ode eyini aa'zu muke ri ni. Eri orodriru e'yo nzezu e'yo ewaru 'yeta 'dile 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha magara n'embeera y'abantu, ahabw'okushwerwa bakiri bato, n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'oburungi bw'eminyeeto yaitu. N'eky'omugasho kwejumba omu kuhanuura okurikworeka akabi akarikuruga omu bikorwa nk'ebyo.

eng_prompt: Child marriage remains a pressing issue that affects millions of young girls worldwide, undermining their rights and potential. To create a brighter future for these children, it is imperative that those in positions of power take decisive action.
lug_prompt: Okufumbirwa kw'abaana abato kukyali nsonga ya mangu ekosa obukadde n'obukadde bw'abawala abato mu nsi yonna, ekityoboola eddembe lyabwe n'obusobozi bwabwe. Okutondawo ebiseera by'abaana bano eby'omu maaso ebitangaavu, kyetaagisa nnyo abo abali mu bifo eby'obuyinza okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Nyom pa lutino obedo peko madit tutwal ma tye ka yelo lutino anyira milion mapol I wilobo lung, ma balo twero gi ki kero gi. Pi kelo anyim maber pi lutino magi, pire tek tutwal ni joo matye ki twero omyero gutim gin mo.
teo_prompt: Adukio na idwe eringa erai ationis naepol noi naetirori apesur nudidika imilionin luipu kotoma akwap kere, ido itolitoli apedorosiokec keda apedorosiokec. Kanu aitolomun ingaren na ejok kanu idwe lu, ibusakinit ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuapolok aswam kagogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ezoanzi nyiri eyi 'duzu aku si ri ni nga po'di e'yo azi okporu 'ba ezoanzi nyiri milioni karakara eyi 'yepi wudrikuru ma alea ndulu ni eyi ma drilemgbo azini e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ezazu. E'yo ewu drialeri 'bazu onyiru anzi 'diyi dri, eri orodriru 'ba okpo alea 'diyi ma 'ye e'yo okporu.
nyn_prompt: Okushwera abaana bakiri bato n'enshonga y'amaani erikuteganisa obukaikuru bw'abaishiki abato omunsi yoona, ekirikutwara obugabe bwabo n'obushoboorozi bwabo. Okureetaho nyensya nungi y'abaana aba, n'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'obushoborozi kukora eky'amaani.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various cultures have practiced different forms of marriage, leading to diverse family structures. One such arrangement is polygamy, which involves a man having multiple wives simultaneously.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebyobuwangwa eby'enjawulo bibadde bikozesa engeri ez'enjawulo ez'obufumbo, ekiviiriddeko enkola z'amaka ez'enjawulo. Emu ku nteekateeka ng'ezo kwe kuwasa abakazi abangi, nga kino kizingiramu omusajja okuwasa abakazi abangi omulundi gumu.
ach_prompt: Ikare weng me tekwaro, tekwaro mapat-pat gubedo ki yub mapat-pat me nyom, ma okelo yub mapat-pat me gang. Yub acel ma kit meno obedo bedo ki mon mapol, ma obedo bedo ki mon mapol I cawa acel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, ejaasi inonosio luegelegela keda iponesio luegelegela luka edukone, eyangaunitos iponesio luegelegela luka ekale. Adiopet kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi aimany angor nuipu, ido imoriarit ekilokit ajaut keda angor nuipu kotoma apak adiope.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyi 'ye e'yo aje akuniri ma wura ndundu 'diyi, e'yo fepi familia eyi ma esele cozu ndundu. Otuta 'dile 'diyi ma azi eri oku 'duzu tre, e'yo 'di ma alea agupi ma oku eyi karakara sa'wa aluri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa ebitarikushushana bikozire emiringo y'obushwere etarikushushana, ekyarugiremu enkora y'amaka etarikushushana. Enteekateeka emwe nk'egyo n'okushwera abakazi baingi, ekirikutwariramu omushaija kugira abakazi baingi omurundi gumwe.

eng_prompt: Parenting involves making difficult decisions and providing support through various challenges. It is essential for parents to equip their children with the knowledge and skills needed to navigate the complexities of life.
lug_prompt: Okuzaala kizingiramu okusalawo ebizibu n'okuwa obuyambi mu kusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo. Kya mugaso nnyo abazadde okuwa abaana baabwe amagezi n'obukugu obwetaagisa okutambula mu bizibu by'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Bedo lanyodo kwako moko tam matek ki miyo kony ikare me peko mapatpat. Pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo me miyo ngec ki diro ma mite pi lutino gi me kato ki I kwo matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aurunet imoriarit aitolomun aseununeta nuetioko ka aijanakin agangat kotoma atiokisio nuegelegela. Erai ibore yenepol noi auriak aijaikin idwekec acoa ka acoa na ekotoi kanu aitodolikin atiokisio nu aijar.
lgg_prompt: Tipika eyi ma ezota ma alea e'yo ewaru eyi 'yezu azini atita fezu e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi ma alea. Eri orodriru tipika eyini anzi eyivile 'diyi dri ondua fezu eyini ani ecozu e'yo ewaru edri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okuzaara nikitwariramu okukora encwamu egumire n'okuheereza obuhwezi omu buremeezi butari bumwe na bumwe. N'eky'omugasho abazaire kuheereza abaana baabo obwengye n'emyoga ebirikwetengwa okurabira omu bizibu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: Teenage pregnancy remains a significant concern in many communities, often leading to various social and economic challenges. To address this issue, it is essential to educate young people about effective family planning options.
lug_prompt: Embuto mu bavubuka zikyali kizibu kya maanyi mu bitundu bingi, ekitera okuvaako okusoomoozebwa mu mbeera z'abantu n'ebyenfuna. Okukola ku nsonga eno, kya mugaso okusomesa abavubuka ku ngeri ennungi ez'ekizaalaggumba.
ach_prompt: Yacu pa anyira matino pud tye peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapol, ma pol kare kelo peko mapol I kwo pa dano ki biacara. Me tyeko peko man, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo bulu i kom yoo me lago nywal ma tiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Alingakin apotu na apesur nudidika erai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubena nuipu, ido eyangauni atiokisio nuka ikapun keda nuka itunga. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ejok aisisianakin atumunak nuikamunitos iponesio luajokak luka alanakin aur.
lgg_prompt: Mva esuza eli be mudri driorisi ri nga po'di asi otiza angiri ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, dika eri e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi eji o'bi eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eri orodriru imbata fezu 'ba ode eyini geri ndundu anzi eyi ma esele cozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutwara enda omu myaka y'obushogoyo nikyerarikiriza munonga abantu, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi omu by'entaasya hamwe n'embeera z'abantu. Okukora aha nshonga egi, n'eky'omugasho kwegyesa eminyeeto aha buryo burungi bw'okuteekateekyera amaka.

eng_prompt: In a world driven by economic interests, the influence of financial resources shapes decisions and actions. Whether in business or personal relationships, the power of money often dictates priorities and outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekulemberwa okwegomba kw'ebyenfuna, amaanyi g'eby'ensimbi gakyusa okusalawo n'ebikolwa. Ka kibeere mu bizinensi oba mu nkolagana y'omuntu ku bubwe, amaanyi ga ssente gatera okusalawo eby'okukulembeza n'ebinaavaamu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano maro timo biacara, lim aye doro tam ki tim pa dano. Kadi bed itye I biacara onyo I kin dano, teko pa cente ipol kare nyutu ngo ma omyero iket obed mukwongo ki adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda ipudesia luka ikapun, epone loepedoriata ikapun aitolomun aseununeta keda aswamisio. Karaida kotoma obiasara arai bo eidicane lo itunganan, apedor naka ikapun ngesi itodunit iboro luebeit aisingarenit keda iboro luebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani e'yo lonyi ni 'diyi ma dri cezu ri ma alea, e'yo lonyi ni 'diyi ma okpo ni e'yo peta pezu azini e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Ka tro ovu tujari ma alia kani yi ma eselea, okpo sende niri ni tutuni e'yo okporu azini e'yo efupi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikwebemberwa eby'entatsya, eby'entatsya nibiteganisa ebiteiso n'ebikorwa. Yaaba omu by'obushubuzi nainga omukukwatanisa kw'abantu, amaani g'esente nigareetaho ebikuru n'ebirikurugamu.

eng_prompt: As we explore the different stages of human development, it's important to understand the characteristics and challenges faced by young individuals. One key group that often comes to mind is adolescents, who are navigating a unique phase of life.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tunoonyereza ku mitendera egy'enjawulo egy'okukula kw'omuntu, kikulu okutegeera engeri n'okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga. Ekibinja ekimu ekikulu ekitera okujja mu birowoozo bye bavubuka, abatambulira mu mbeera ey'enjawulo mu bulamu.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka kwedo rwom me dongo pa dano, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ki peko ma bulu nongo. Dul acel ma pire tek ma pol kare bino I wic obedo bulu, ma gitye ka wot I kare me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Neisisia oni adokena nuegelegela nuka apol naka itunga, ejokuna noi amisiikin iponesio keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda atumunak. Egurupu ediope loepol loebuni aomoom ngesi atumunak, luejaasi toma ojautene loitegelikina kotoma aijar.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ni esu 'diyi vazu. Ongulumu azi okporu 'bani e'yo egapi sa'wa driasi 'diyi 'ba zopi zopi zozo 'diyi, eyi aa'pi e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi idri ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma emitendera etari emwe n'emwe y'entunguka y'omuntu, nikikuru kwetegyereza emicwe hamwe n'oburemeezi obu eminyeeto erikushanga. Guruupu emwe enkuru erikukira kwija omu biteekateeko n'eminyeeto, erikuraba omu mbeera y'omutaano omu magara gaayo.

eng_prompt: The challenges faced by adolescents today are compounded by various social and economic factors. One significant issue that arises from these challenges is the increasing rate of teenage pregnancies.
lug_prompt: Okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga leero kwongeddwako ensonga z'embeera z'abantu n'ebyenfuna eby'enjawulo. Ensonga emu enkulu okuva mu kusoomoozebwa kuno kwe kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abawala abafuna embuto.
ach_prompt: Peko ma bulu nongo ite kare ni tye ikin jami mapol ma kelo peko ikwo pa dano ki can lim. Lok acel ma pire tek mabino macalo adwogi me peko magi obedo mede pa wel lutino anyira ma yac.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuetereikina keda atumunak ilolo iyatakitai keda iboro luegelegela luka ikapun keda luka itunga. Ationis adiope naepol noi naelomunit kotoma atiokisio nu ngesi apol naka apotu na apesur nudidika.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba oderu 'diyini dri fuzu yi be andru 'diyi ma azi eyi e'yo ongulumu ni azini e'yo robia ni ndundu 'diyisi. E'yo azi okporu efu'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi vurisi ri eri e'yo anzi esuza ezoanzi nyiri eyini ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi obu eminyeeto erikushanga obwahati, nibweyongyera ahaburemeezi bw'abantu n'eby'entaasya. Enshonga enkuru erikuruga omu buremeezi obu n'omuhendo gw'abaishiki okutwara enda bakiri bato ogweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In many jurisdictions, actions that violate the sanctity of a person's dignity or property are taken very seriously. Legal systems often categorize such violations under various criminal offenses, including defilement.
lug_prompt: Mu buyinza bungi, ebikolwa ebityoboola obutukuvu bw'ekitiibwa ky'omuntu oba ebintu bitwalibwa nga bikulu nnyo. Enkola z'amateeka zitera okugabanya okutyoboola ng'okwo mu misango egy'enjawulo omuli n'okusobya ku mwana atanneetuuka.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tim ma balo woro pa ngat moni onyo jami pa ngat moni kitero gi calo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Rwom me cik ipol kare poko bal ma kit meno I kin bal mapat-pat, ma I kingi obedo butu imit.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, eyangaritai aswamisio nuebilibilete angosibib naka itunganan arai iborokec kwape nuepolok noi. Etapit duc ikisila aipikakin abilibilio naka ikisila kwape kangun kwape imusagon luegelegela, aimoriarit aibu aisiol.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo 'bani 'ba azi ma inzile inzi ku 'diyi 'du okporu. Geri azita ni 'diyi tutuni e'yo onzi 'dile 'diyi 'ba e'yo azita onyoza ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the challenges faced by young women in our society. As a result, various groups and initiatives have emerged to address these issues and provide support.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru oku ode eyini esu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani egazu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti azini otuta ndundu efu e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu azini atita fezu.

eng_prompt: Entering into a lifelong commitment is a significant decision that requires careful consideration. It is essential for individuals to assess their personal readiness before embarking on this journey.
lug_prompt: Okuyingira mu kweyama okw'obulamu bwonna kusalawo kwa mugaso era kwetaaga okulowoozebwako n'obwegendereza. Kya mugaso nnyo buli muntu okukebera obwetegefu bwe nga tannatandika lugendo luno.

teo_prompt: Alomar toma aisumunet naka aijar kere erai aseunet naepol noi naibusakinit aomoom ejok. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga aanyun ebe ekapakina kesi eringa egeuna alosit.

eng_prompt: Understanding the unique functions and goals of an organization is crucial for its success. This clarity allows for effective resource allocation and strategic planning.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera emirimu egy'enjawulo n'ebiruubirirwa by'ekitongole kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwakyo. Obwerufu buno busobozesa okugabanya obulungi eby'obugagga n'okuteekateeka obulungi.
ach_prompt: Niang tic ki miti pa dul moni pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti ne. Niango man weko ki poko jami ki yubbe maber.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin aswamisio nuegelegela keda alosikineta nuka erionget erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut ke. Acai na ingarakini aikor iboro ejok ka aitemonokin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Azi ndundu amuti ni 'diyi ma vata azini e'yo yini lele 'diyi ma vata eri ma drile suza ni. E'yo 'di ni fe 'bani afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu kililiru azini otuta kililiru 'diyi 'yezu.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, many voters are questioning the effectiveness of the current electoral process. One key aspect under scrutiny is the role of political primary elections in shaping candidates for the general election.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'okulonda esembera, abalonzi bangi babuusabuusa obulungi bw'enkola y'okulonda eriwo. Ensonga emu enkulu eri mu kwekenneenyezebwa gwe mulimu gw'okulonda kw'ebyobufuzi okw'okusunsulamu mu kubumba abesimbyewo mu kulonda kwa bonna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kare me bolo kwir tye cok, lubol kwir mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom yub me bolo kwir matye kombedi. Gin acel ma pire tek ma gitye ka ngiyo en aye tic pa bolo kwir me tedero I yub pa lucungu I yer madit.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, eutasi aseak luipu abuonokin nuikamunitos aitodolikineta nuka aseo. Adiopebore naepol noi naengicitai ngesi aswam naka aseo naka epuraimare kanu aitolomun abwoak luka aseo napolon.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba karakara voti 'bepi 'diyi e'yo ega geri opetaa ni curu'do ri ma orodri ma dria ku. E'yo azi okporu 'bani andri ri eri azi opeta politiki ni okori ni 'ba pa tupi opeta 'ba driasi 'diyi sizu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, abateezi b'akaruuru abaingi nibabangaanisa oburungi bw'enkora y'eby'oburuuru eriho hati. Ekintu kimwe ekikuru ekirikukyeberwa n'omugasho gw'akaruuru k'eby'obutegyeki ak'okubanza omu kutebeekanisa abesimbireho omu karuuru ka boona.

eng_prompt: In democratic societies, the process of selecting leaders and representatives is governed by established rules and regulations. These rules dictate the timing and procedures for conducting elections.
lug_prompt: Mu mawanga agalimu demokulasiya, enkola y'okulonda abakulembeze n'abakiise efugibwa amateeka n'ebiragiro ebiteekeddwawo. Amateeka gano galagira obudde n'enkola y'okutambuzaamu okulonda.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, yub me yero lutela ki luwang lwak tye malube ki cik ma kiketo. Cik magi nyutu kare ki yoo me timo yer.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuapolok, epone loeseunere engarenok keda abwoikinitok itodunitere ikisila keda nuitupitono. Itodunitos ikisila lu apak ka iponesio luka aitolot aseo.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, geri 'bani drice'ba eyi opezu azini 'ba eyi ma paria 'diyi opezu 'diyi azita eyi ma palaa. Azita 'diyi sa'wa azini geri 'bani opeta eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: When someone expresses concern about a potential danger, how should we interpret their words? Is it meant to protect us, or does it carry an underlying menace?
lug_prompt: Omuntu bw'alaga obweraliikirivu ku kabi akayinza okubaawo, tulina kutegeera tutya ebigambo bye? Kigendereddwamu kutukuuma, oba kirimu akabi ak'omunda?
ach_prompt: Kace ngat moni onyuto lworo i kom peko matwero bino, omyero waniang lokke nining? Tyeka obedo me gwokowa, onyo tyeka tye ki peko matye?
teo_prompt: Arai itodu itunganan aiyalongong kanuka atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun, epone bo ani ebeitor oni amisiikin akirokec? Erai kereka alosikinet naka ayuwar oni, arai bo ejai ationis naepol noi?
lgg_prompt: Ba azini ka e'da asi otiza e'yo ewaru ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria, ama ma va e'yo nzeza 'diyi ngoni? Eri le ama ma ta mba, kani eri e'yo azi onzi 'yepi ra?
nyn_prompt: Omuntu ku arikworeka okwerarikirira aha kabi akarikubaasa kubaho, tushemereire kushwijuma tuta ebigambo bye? Nikigyenderera kuturinda, nainga n'eky'akabi?

eng_prompt: In many activities, individuals or teams strive to outperform each other. This dynamic creates an environment where skills and strategies are put to the test.
lug_prompt: Mu mirimu mingi, abantu ssekinnoomu oba ttiimu bafuba okukola obulungi okusinga bannaabwe. Enkyukakyuka eno ereetawo embeera obukugu n'obukodyo mwe bigezesebwa.
ach_prompt: I tic mapol, dano acel-acel onyo dul mapat-pat tute matek me timo tic maber loyo luwotgi. Alokaloka man kelo kabedo kama diro ki diro me tic tye ka temo.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, it is essential for all organizations to operate within the framework of established regulations. This ensures fairness and accountability in the political process.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, kyetaagisa ebitongole byonna okukolera mu mateeka agaateekebwawo. Kino kikakasa obwenkanya n'embalirira mu nkola y'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, pire tek tutwal pi dule weng me tic malube ki cik ma kiketo. Man weko yub me cungu iwi-bye bedo ber dok dano weng gimiyo kor tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ejokuna noi kanu iriongeta kere aswam kotupitete ikisila luipikakinitai. Einakini ngin ewai loajokan ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma politikis.

eng_prompt: In any functioning society, the presence of authority is crucial for ensuring safety and security. One of the primary roles of law enforcement agencies is to uphold the rules and regulations that govern our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna ekikola obulungi, okubeerawo kw'ab'obuyinza kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma n'okukuuma. Ogumu ku mirimu emikulu egy'ebitongole ebikuumaddembe kwe kunyweza amateeka n'ebiragiro ebifuga ebitundu byaffe.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na iswamai ejok, ejokuna noi ajaut naka apedorosio kanu awanyun ebe ejai ayuwara. Adiopet kotoma aswam naepol noi naka atukona nuka ikisila ngesi aitogogong ikisila keda ainapeta nu eyaitos itunga wok.

nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona ekirikukora gye, okubaho kw'obushoborozi n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kureetaho obusingye n'oburinzi. Omwe aha mirimo mikuru y'ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro n'okurinda amateeka n'ebiragiro ebirikutegyeka ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: It is important to understand the legal regulations surrounding alcohol consumption. Many countries have established age limits to protect the health and safety of young individuals.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okutegeera amateeka agakwata ku kunywa omwenge. Amawanga mangi gataddewo ekkomo ku myaka okukuuma obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu abato.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the legal framework establishes specific age requirements for participation in elections. As a result, individuals must reach a certain age to exercise their right to vote.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi amateeka galagira emyaka omuntu gy'alina okuweza okusobola okwenyigira mu kulonda. N'ekivuddemu, abantu balina okutuuka ku myaka egimu okukozesa eddembe lyabwe ery'okulonda.

teo_prompt: Kakwapin nuipu, itolomunitos ikisila ikaru lu ebeit itunganan ajaikin toma aseo. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit itunga adolokin ikaru ice kanu aitwasam apedorosiokec naka aise.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, azita eyi e'da eli 'ba eyini ecozu fizu opeta eyi ma alea ri ra. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba eyi ma ca eli azi eyini ecozu voti 'bezu.

ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Ticgi madit tye me neno ni lwak tye maber.

eng_prompt: After a successful campaign and strong support from her constituents, she is determined to build on her achievements. With the upcoming election approaching, her focus is on maintaining her position.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya akalulu okulungi n'obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva mu balonzi be, mumalirivu okuzimba ku by'atuuseeko. Ng'okulonda okujja kusembera, ebirowoozo bye biri ku kukuuma ekifo kye.
ach_prompt: Ingee bito kwi maber ki cwak matek ma aa ki bot lubol kwir mege, en omoko tamme me mede ki jami ma en otimo. Ki cok pa yer matye kabino ni, en oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom gwoko dog ticce.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ekampein loekerianara noi keda agangat naepol kanejaas itungake, ekapakina ngesi aitogogong aswamisioitike. Kwape eyapie aseo, epodokinit ngesi aitogogong adoketaitike.
lgg_prompt: Ti odaza drile suzaru azini atita okporu engazu 'ba erini opi nyapi 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi 'ba e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Opeta emupi 'diyi ma o'diru, eri asi 'ba pari erini ovuzuri ma ta mbazuri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Numerous reports emerged highlighting irregularities and discrepancies in voter registration and polling practices. As citizens voiced their concerns, it became increasingly clear that the integrity of the election was at stake.
lug_prompt: Alipoota nnyingi zaavaayo nga ziraga obutali butebenkevu n'obutakwatagana mu kuwandiisa abalonzi n'enkola z'okulonda. Nga bannansi balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obwesimbu bw'okulonda bwali mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic mapol okatti ma onyuto bal ki apoka-poka ma obedo tye ikare me coyo lubol kwir ki yub me bolo kwir. I kare ma anywali me Uganda obedo ka nyutu lworo gi, nen atyer kamaleng ni ber bedo pa yer ne tye kama rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripootan luipu kitodutu aibucanaro keda atiokisio nuka aiwadikao naka aseak keda ainapeta nuka aicak abootin. Neautar itunga alimor aiyalongongokec, apotu kojenutu ebe ejai ationis na aseo.
lgg_prompt: O'duko karakara efu ecepi e'yo onzi azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani 'ba voti 'bezu 'diyi ma ru osizu azini e'yo 'bani 'ba voti 'bezu 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Kari anzi eyini e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi 'yoria, eri eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo ada opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo onzi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota nyingi zikooreka oburemeezi n'obutaikirizana omu kuhandikisa abateezi b'akaruuru hamwe n'enkora y'okuteera akaruuru. Abatuuragye ku baayorekire okwerarikirira kwabo, kikarebeka butunu ngu oburingaaniza bw'akaruuru bukaba buri omu kabi.

eng_prompt: In some communities, traditional beliefs and economic pressures can lead to difficult choices for families. As a result, many parents in rural areas feel compelled to prioritize marriage for their daughters at a young age.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebimu, enzikiriza z'obuwangwa n'okunyigirizibwa mu byenfuna bisobola okuviirako amaka okusalawo okukaluba. N'ekivuddemu, abazadde bangi mu byalo bawalirizibwa okukulembeza okufumbirwa kwa bawala baabwe ku myaka emito.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mukene, niyee me tekwaro ki peko me lim twero weko moko tam tek tutwal pi gangi. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo mapol I caro giwinyo ni omyero gunyom lutino anyira gi con.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena ace, iyuunito lu atekerin keda atiokisio nuka ikapun eyangaununete aseununeta nuetioko mama ejaasi ikalia. Kanuka ngun, auriak luipu kocaaloi epupete ebe ibusakinit kesi aisingarenit adukonokin apesur kec eringa edisiak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo a'ita a'di ni 'diyi azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi eco fe familia eyini e'yo 'duzu ewaru ra. E'yo 'disi, tipika karakara angu calu ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ega kini eyi ma ezoanzi eyi 'du agupia de eyi ma eli nga were.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebimwe, enyikiriza y'obuhangwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya, nibibaasa kureetera amaka okusharamu kubi. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire baingi omu byaro nibahurira nibagyemeserezibwa kushwera abaishiki baabo bakiri bato.

eng_prompt: When children are neglected and left to fend for themselves, it creates a dangerous environment for their development. In cases where parental irresponsibility leads to harm, such parents should be punished.
lug_prompt: Abaana bwe balagajjalirwa ne balekerwa okwerabirira, kitondawo embeera embi eri okukula kwabwe. Mu mbeera ng'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'abazadde buviirako obuzibu, abazadde ng'abo balina okubonerezebwa.
ach_prompt: Ka ki cayo lutino dok kiwekogi me gwokke kengi, man kelo peko madit tutwal I dongo gi. Kace bedo lanyodo ma pe ki twero kelo peko, lunyodo ma kit meno omyero gunong pwod.

lgg_prompt: Ba ka anzi nyiri eyi adi dika eyi ku eyi ma ta mbazu eyi ma ngulupi si, eri angu onzi eji eyi ma zota ni. E'yo tipika eyini aa'zu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, le tipika 'dile 'diyi ma esu panga ra.

eng_prompt: The ongoing health crisis has disrupted education systems worldwide, leading to significant challenges for students. As a result, many families are facing difficult decisions regarding their children's schooling.

lug_prompt: Ensonga egenda yeeyongera etuuse ku ddaala ery'amaanyi, ekosa ebitundu ewala n'ewala. Okusobola okukola obulungi ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, tulina okukwataganya ebyetaago byaffe n'obukodyo.

teo_prompt: Adolu ationis ngin adoketait naepol noi, ido emunarit aiboisio nuelwaka noi. Kanu aitemokin ainingosit na ejok, ekot oni aimorikikin iboro wok keda iwaitin wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di ca curu'do e'yo okporu ni ma alia, erini ongulumu eyi 'yezu angu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, le ama ma eci afa amani 'diyi tualu geri amani ecozu e'yo nde 'yezu 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing acceptance of diverse forms of relationships. As societal norms evolve, many people are beginning to embrace unconventional marriages.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okukkiriza engeri ez'enjawulo ez'omukwano. Ng'empisa z'ekitundu zikyuka, abantu bangi batandise okwaniriza obufumbo obutali bwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye kaketo cwinygi I kom yub mapat-pat me bedo ki lurem. Kit ma cik me kabedo tye ka loke kwede, dano mapol tye ka cako jolo nyom ma pat ki macon.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor acamanara naka iponesio luegelegela luka eidicane. Kwape ijulakinor iponesio luka itunga, eutasi itunga luipu ageun aijaun edukone lo mam erai loka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ai e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu ri ni i ojazu risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do aku eyi 'du geri ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beyongyeire kwikiriza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'omukago. Nk'oku emicwe y'abantu erikweyongyera, abantu baingi batandikire kwikiriza obushwere obutari bwa buriijo.

eng_prompt: In many communities, the upbringing of children is deeply intertwined with spiritual beliefs and traditions. As a result, families often look to their faith leaders for advice on how to instill these values in their children.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okukuza abaana kukwataganye nnyo n'enzikiriza z'eby'omwoyo n'obulombolombo. N'ekivuddemu, amaka gatera okutunuulira abakulembeze b'enzikiriza zaago okufuna amagezi ku ngeri y'okuyigirizaamu abaana baabwe empisa zino.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, dongo pa lutino kubbe ki dini ki tekwaro. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi ipol kare gi cito bot lutela dini gi pi nongo tam i kom kit me pwonyo lutino gi ki jami magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, epoloete idwe keda aiyuunikec keda inonosio. Kanuka ngun, etapit ikalia alosit mama ejaasi engarenok luka ediini kec kanu aicoreta nuikamunitos epone loka aisisianakin idwekec iponesio lujokuka.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, anzi eyi ma ezota e'yo aitanisi azini e'yo suruni 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, familia eyi sa'wa driasi drice'ba eyivile e'yo aitanisi 'diyi vu asi omiza esu geri eyini ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Despite the progress made in gender equality, the harsh reality remains that many still suffer in silence. Countless stories of abuse and violence against females continue to emerge, highlighting a pervasive issue in society.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu, abantu bangi bakyabonaabona mu kasirise. Emboozi nnyingi ez'okutulugunya n'okutulugunya abakyala zeeyongera okuvaayo, ekiraga ensonga ejjudde mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni alokaloka mapol otime I lok me bedo marom ikin mon ki coo, lok ada ma rac pud tye ni dano mapol pud tye ka deno can ling ling. Ododo mapol tutwal me nywaro ki tim gero i kom mon tye kawot anyim, ma nyutu peko ma onya tutwal I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas apol toma airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor, eringa itunga luipu icanasi kotoma aililing. Akiro nuipu nuikamunitos aitisiliario keda amumu naka angor kes inyikokinitos alomun, itodunit ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni tro ovuzu trotro e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria ra ti, e'yo ewaru 'ba karakara eyi ni nga po'di dri ci e'yere. O'duko e'yo candi fezani azini ngiringiri oku yi ma rua 'diyiniri ma kalafe karakara yi e'da e'yo ongulumu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho entunguuka omu by'oburinganiza bw'abashaija n'abakazi, ekikuru n'okugira ngu baingi nibabonabona omu kasirise. Ebitebyo bingi ebirikukwata aha kubonabonesibwa n'okunyangarazibwa kw'abakazi, nibigyenda omu maisho, ebirikworeka oburemeezi oburi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In many societies around the world, traditional gender roles continue to influence various aspects of life. In Uganda, these roles are particularly evident in the institution of marriage, where cultural norms often prioritize male authority.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi okwetooloola ensi, emirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu gikyakosa ebintu eby'enjawulo mu bulamu. Mu Uganda, obuvunaanyizibwa buno bweyolekera nnyo mu nteekateeka y'obufumbo, ng'ennono zitera okukulembeza obuyinza bw'abasajja.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol I wilobo lung, tic tekwaro pa mon ki coo tye ka mede ki kelo alokaloka I kwo pa dano. I Uganda, tic magi nen tutwalle I yub me nyom, kama tekwaro ipol kare keto cungu iwi twero pa coo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu kotoma akwap kere, iswamaete ikiliok keda angor iboro luegelegela kotoma aijar. Ko Uganda, itodunitos aswamisio nu noi kotoma odukonekec, ne ipolokitotor inonosio nuka inonosio apedorosio nuka ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma alea, azi oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie 'diyi mu drile e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu. Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo 'diyi e'da kililiru tutuni aku siza ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi ni tutuni okpo fezu agupi eyini ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi okwetorora ensi yoona, emirimo y'abashaija n'abakazi erikugumizamu neekora aha mitwarize y'abantu. Omu Uganda, obujunaanizibwa obu nibweyoreka munonga omu kitongore ky'obushwere, ahu emicwe y'obuhangwa erikukira kwebembeza obushoborozi bw'abashaija.

eng_prompt: As societal norms evolve and technology reshapes communication, couples are navigating new dynamics in their relationships. Many young people today approach marriage with different expectations and values than previous generations.
lug_prompt: Nga empisa z'abantu zikyuka ne tekinologiya akyusa empuliziganya, abaagalana batambuza entambula empya mu nkolagana yaabwe. Abavubuka bangi leero boolekedde obufumbo n'ebisuubirwa n'emitindo egy'enjawulo okusinga emirembe egyayita.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kit me kwo pa dano tye ka loke kwede ki diro me tet manyen tye ka loko kit me lok, joo ma onyome gitye ka nongo yoo manyen me winye ikin gi. Bulu mapol I kare-ni gicito I nyom ki miti mapat-pat ka iporo ki kare macon.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor iponesio luka itunga keda etatai loakwana, eutasi itunga luedukokina aitodolikin iponesio luitetiak luka eidicanekec. Atumunak luipu lolo elosete toma odukonekec keda aomisio nu egelegela adepar lu apakio nukokau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ni i ojazu azini e'yo tekenologiani e'yo nzezu 'diyi ojazu o'diru, 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi e'yo o'diru eyi 'ye eyi ma eselea. Ba ode karakara ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi e'yo aje ma alia 'diyi ma egata azini orodri eyini 'diyi ndundu aga ewu agapi 'bo 'diyi.

eng_prompt: It is essential to recognize the inherent dignity and worth of every individual. We must challenge any notion that dehumanizes or objectifies people based on gender.

ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang woro ki ber pa dano acel-acel. Omyero wakwer tam mo keken ma balo rwom me kwo pa dano malubbe ki coo onyo mon.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun angosibib keda ajokis naka nginitunganan. Ibusakinit oni aitepeg adio aomisioit naepedori aitidisiar itunga kotupitete ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru 'bani inzita 'ba alu alu ma alia 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Le ama ma ga agata egata ci 'ba eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kumanya ekitinisa n'omugasho gwa buri muntu. Twine kuhakanisa enteekateeka yoona erikusharamu abantu ekitiinisa kurugirira ahakikura kyabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, the inherent value of every individual has been a fundamental belief in many cultures and religions. This principle emphasizes that all people, regardless of gender, should be treated with dignity and honor.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, omugaso oguzalwawo buli muntu abadde enzikiriza enkulu mu buwangwa n'amadiini mangi. Omusingi guno gukkaatiriza nti abantu bonna, awatali kufaayo ku kikula kyabwe, balina okuyisibwa n'ekitiibwa n'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, ber pa ngat acel acel obedo niyee ma pire tek I tekwaro ki dini mapol. Cik man cuko cwiny ni dano weng, labongo paro pi coo onyo mon, omyero ki ter gi ki woro.

eng_prompt: Many individuals struggle to overcome the challenges posed by their early environments. As a result, their life choices and opportunities are often heavily influenced by their circumstances.

eng_prompt: Completing a project of this magnitude requires immense dedication and perseverance. Many obstacles can arise along the way, testing one's resolve and commitment.
lug_prompt: Okumaliriza pulojekiti ennene bwetyo kyetaagisa obumalirivu n'obumalirivu obw'ekitalo. Ebizibu bingi bisobola okujja mu kkubo, okugezesa obumalirivu n'obumalirivu bw'omuntu.

eng_prompt: The rising trend of early marriages in our community poses significant risks to the health and education of young individuals. To address this issue effectively, local leaders must take decisive action.
lug_prompt: Omuze ogweyongera ogw'okufumbirwa amangu mu kitundu kyaffe guteeka obulamu n'okusoma kw'abaana abato mu matigga. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno obulungi, abakulembeze b'ebyalo balina okubaako kye bakolawo.

teo_prompt: Epone lo iyata noi loka alinganakin edukone kotoma atutubetekosi eyangauni ationis naepol noi mama ejaasi angaleu keda asioman naka atumunak. Kanu aitemokin ationis na ejok, ekot engarenok luka atutubena aswam kagogong.

eng_prompt: After the polls closed, the election officials gathered the volunteers to discuss the day's events. The atmosphere was tense as they prepared to share their observations and experiences.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulonda okuggalwa, abakungu b'ebyokulonda baakuŋŋaanya bannakyewa okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byaliwo ku lunaku. Embeera yabadde ya bunkenke nga bwe beetegekera okugabana bye balabye n'ebyo bye bayitamu.

teo_prompt: Akaulo na agolokinio naka aicak abootin, apotu eswamak luka aseo kitukokinos itunga kanu aitemitem nuiswamasi aparan ngin. Ajai aiyalongong noi kapak kana aitemonokinere kesi aimor akiro kec keda akiro nuapotu kesi kojenutu.
lgg_prompt: Voti 'beza ma ti opizu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba opetaa ni 'diyi tra 'ba owitaru 'diyi agbatara gbazu e'yo o'du 'da ni 'diyi ma dria. Angu nderi ndra asi otiza ru yini yi oturia e'yo yini ndre 'diyi awazu azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: During the chaotic demonstration, tensions escalated quickly as protesters clashed with law enforcement. As a result of the confrontations, some people were injured during the process.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekalakaasa okw'akavuyo, obunkenke bwalinnya mangu nga abekalakaasi balwanagana n'abakuumaddembe. Olw'okulwanagana okwaliwo, abantu abamu baafuna ebisago mu kiseera ekyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me jemo, telle omede oyot-oyot ikare ma lujemo gubedo ka lweny ki abili. Macalo adwogi me lweny ne, dano mukene gunongo awano ikare me lweny ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aidiya kangin, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos katipet naarai apotu ediyak ogiroto keda ipolisin. Kanuka ingungeta, apotu icetunga imusungunos kapak kana.

nyn_prompt: Omu kwesharinga okw'akaimukiriro, obunkenke bukarugaho ahabw'abeshaaringi kurwanagana n'ab'eby'obutegyeki. Ahabw'obutabanguko, abantu baingi bakahutaara omu bwire obwo.

eng_prompt: As the election day approached, tensions ran high among the officials tasked with overseeing the voting process. They faced numerous challenges, including last-minute changes to regulations and a surge in voter turnout.
lug_prompt: Olunaku lw'okulonda bwe lwasembera, okusika omuguwa kweyongera mu bakungu abaaweebwa omulimu gw'okulondoola okulonda. Baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa kungi, omuli enkyukakyuka mu mateeka ku ssaawa esembayo n'okweyongerayongera mu muwendo gw'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nino me bolo kwir tye cok, telle obedo tye ikin lutic ma onongo omyero gunen kit ma bolo kwir tye kawot kwede. Gunongo peko mapol, ma I kingi obedo aloka-loka I cik I dakika me agiki ki mede pa wel lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apaaran naka aseo, apotu ingungeta okerata kiding eswamak lu ekotoi aanyanar aseo. Apotu kesi odumutu atiokisio nuipu, aimoriarit aijulanakineta nuka idakikan luatuboros keda aiyatakinio naka aseak.
lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri si, asi otiza tu azi'ba azi ngapi e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma pamvu onepi 'diyi ma eselea. Eyi esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi, eyi ma eselea ojata eyi sa'wa asizu ri ma alea azini 'ba emu'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru ku ryahikire, obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru omu bakuru abaabaire baine obujunaanizibwa bw'okureeberera enteekateeka y'okuteera akaruuru. Bakashanga oburemeezi bwingi, otwariiremu okuhindura ebiragiro aha shaaha y'ahamuheru hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the election approached, the local officials began to review the voter registration lists. They discovered that a significant number of individuals had registered to vote despite not living in the area.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwasembera, abakungu b'ebyalo baatandika okwekenneenya enkalala z'abalonzi. Baakizuula nti abantu bangi beewandiisa okulonda wadde nga tebabeera mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yer tye cok, lutic me tedero gucako ngiyo nying lubol kwir. Gunongo ni wel dano mapol onongo gu coo ne me bolo kwir kadi bed ni pe gibedo ikabedo enuni.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aseo, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kogeutu airereor ikiroria luka aseak. Apotu kesi kodumutu ebe itunga luipu iwadikaunos kanu aise karaida mam iboyete katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ni ecazu ogogo risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do ru siza 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyiniri ma ale andri. Eyi esu kini kalafe angiri 'ba eyi ma ru si voti 'bezu ra eyini tro aa'zu angu 'da ma alea ku ra ti.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku bwahikire, abakuru b'ebyaro bakatandika kushwijuma orukarara rw'abateezi b'akaruuru. Bakashanga ngu abantu baingi bakaba beehandikiise kuteera akaruuru n'obu baraabe batabaire nibatuura omu kyanga ekyo.

eng_prompt: Everyone was gathered in the park, enjoying the sunny afternoon, when the commotion began. It was hard to ignore the whispers and gasps as the truth unfolded before our eyes.

ach_prompt: Dano weng gugure i park kun nongo gitye ka nongo mit pa ceng I dyeceng ma woo ocake. Obedo tek tutwal me kwero winyo dwon pa dano ka lok ada tye katimme I wangwa.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kere kotukokinos aiboisit naidarere itiang, alelakinete akolong naemwanar akolong, kapak kana ageunor amumu. Ationikinit apalunit akiro nuka aiwe ka aiyengun najaar abeit akonyewok.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria tra yi pari anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia, yini ayiko esuzu etuka etu alasi, sawa 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi e'doria. Eri ndra ewaru ama ni e'yo 'bani o'yozu o'duko si azini o'duko si 'diyi ma ti pezu ku e'yo a'da ni e'dazu ama ma milea.
nyn_prompt: Buri omwe akaba akunganiire omu paaka, arikukunda omushana gw'omwebazyo obu akaimukiriro katandika. Kikaba kigumire kwehuzya okwetomboitwa hamwe n'okwetomboitwa, amazima gakatunguka omu maisho gaitu.

eng_prompt: As the clock struck noon, voters began to line up outside the polling station, eager to cast their ballots. Suddenly, an unexpected commotion erupted, drawing everyone's attention away from the booths.
lug_prompt: Essaawa bwe yakubye ssaawa mukaaga ez'emisana, abalonzi baatandika okusimba ennyiriri wabweru w'ekifo awalonderwa, nga beesunga okukuba akalulu. Amangu ago, akajagalalo akaali tekasuubirwa kabalukawo, ne kaggya buli omu ku kizimbe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma cawa ogoyo cawa abicel, lubol kwir gucako cung I lain I ngee kabedo me bolo kwir, ma cwinygi obedo yom me bolo kwir. Cutcut, woo ma pe byek tye I komgi ocake, ma okwanyo tam pa dano weng ki I kom kabedo.
teo_prompt: Neadolio esawa loaparan, apotu aseak kogeutu aibwo kokinga naka aiboisit naeseere, ekotosi aicak abootin. Apotu itunga lu mam eomitai ebe ebuni aswam ngun, koinakisi itunga kere aibwo kotogokec.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ni tuzu etu agandua, 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi e'do yi oti pari voti 'bezuri ma alia amve, ava be voti 'bezu. Sawa 'disi, o'duko azi 'bani ega kokoru ni e'do, 'ba dria ma mile engazu pari 'duzu 'diyi vurisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Eshaaha ku zaahikire shaaha mukaaga z'ekiro, abateezi b'akaruuru bakatandika kusimba enyiriri aheeru y'emyanya y'okuteereramu akaruuru, barikwetenga kuteera akaruuru. Ahonaaho, hakabaho akaimukiriro akatari kuteekateekwaho, kikaiha amaani g'omuntu weena kuruga omu kishengye.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, local authorities decided to allow minors to express their opinions on community issues. This unprecedented move aimed to engage younger citizens in civic matters and encourage their participation in democracy.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baasalawo okukkiriza abaana abatanetuuka okwogera endowooza zaabwe ku nsonga z'ekitundu. Kino kyali kigendererwamu okukubiriza abavubuka okwenyigira mu nsonga z'obwannakyewa n'okwenyigira mu demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me yee ki lutino matino me miyo tamgi I kom lok ma kwako kabedo gi. Yub man ma peya otimme obedo ki miti me kelo anywali matino I tic pa lwak ki cuku cwiny gi me bedo tye I tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, apotu apedorosio ocalo ocamutu acamakinit idwe aitetem aomisiokec nuikamunitos akiro nuka atutubet. Alosikinet naka aswamisioit ngin erai kanu aisinyikokin atumunak ajaut toma akiro nuka itunga ka aisinyikokit kesi ajaut toma aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, drice'ba angu ma alia 'diyi 'du e'yo lezu anzi eli capiku 'diyi dri yi ma egata ecezu e'yo ongulumu ni 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'di lezu 'ba ode eyi 'bazu e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea eyini ani eyi ma ava engazu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakacwamu kwikiriza abaana bato kugamba ebiteekateeko byabo aha nshonga z'ekyanga. Ekigyendererwa ky'okukora eki kikaba nikigyenderera okureetera abantu bato kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki n'okureetaho obugabe bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Amidst growing tensions and allegations of misconduct, the election officials faced increasing scrutiny over the integrity of the ballot counting process. As the final tally was announced, suspicions began to mount about the legitimacy of the results.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke obweyongera n'ebigambibwa nti waliwo emize emibi, abakungu b'ebyokulonda baayolekaganye n'okukeberebwa okw'amaanyi ku bwesimbu bw'enkola y'okubala obululu. Omuwendo ogwasembayo bwe gwalangirirwa, okubuusabuusa kwatandika okulinnya ku butuufu bw'ebyava mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle tye ka mede ki adot me tim maraco, lutic me bolo kwir gubedo ka neno kit ma ki kwano kwede kwir. Ikare ma kicwalo lok angeya me agiki, byek obedo tye I kom adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiyalongongo keda aitoroneta nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok, apotu eswamak luka aseo odumutu aingic naepol noi kanu aimar abootin. Nealimorere enaaba lokawasia, apotu aomisio kogeutu aiyatakin kanuikamunitos abeit naka akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma talasi azini e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ba 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba opetaa ni 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani voti lazu kililiru ri ma ale andrizu ra. Bani kalafe asizuri azizu 'boria, 'ba e'do e'yo ega e'yo 'da ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'emicwe mibi, abakuru omu by'oburuuru bakabonabonesibwa ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'okubara oburuuru. Nk'oku omuhendo gw'ahamuheru gwarangirwe, okubanganisa kukatandika kweyongyera ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'ebyarugire omu bigyezo.

eng_prompt: Amidst the chaos and numerous scandals that plagued their campaign, the candidates remained resilient and focused on their message. As the votes were counted, it became clear that their determination had paid off.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kavuyo n'emivuyo egy'enjawulo egyabadde mu kampeyini zaabwe, abeesimbyewo baasigala banywevu era nga beemalira ku bubaka bwabwe. Obululu bwe bwabadde bubalibwa, kyalabika bulungi nti obumalirivu bwabwe bwavaamu ebibala.
ach_prompt: I kare me kuku-kuku ki tim maraco mapol ma obedo tye I kare me bito kwirgi, lucungu ne gubedo ki tek cwiny dok guketo cwinygi I kom kwena gi. Ikare ma kitye ka kwano kwir, nen atyer kamaleng ni miti gi ocobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajai amumu keda abilibilio naka ikapun kotoma okampeinikec, apotu abwoak iswamata kagogong ido apodokinit akirokec. Neautar aimar abootin, apotu kojenutu ebe apotu kesi kopedosi aitodolikin aomisioitikec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini e'yo onzi karakara yini ti odaza yini ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi awi okporu azini asi 'ba e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria. Voti 'bani lazu 'boria, eri eca e'dazaru kini asi 'baza yiniri fe drileba ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'akavuyo n'emishango mingi eyabaire eriho omu kampiini zaabo, abesimbireho bakaguma baine amaani kandi bakata omutima aha butumwa bwabo. Oburuuru ku bwabaire nibubarwa, kikarebeka butunu ngu okwehayo kwabo kukashashurwa.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of the chaotic election, tensions ran high as accusations flew from all sides. Frustrated by the outcome, he sought a scapegoat to deflect responsibility.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akalulu akaabaddemu akavuyo, obunkenke bwavaayo ng'okulumiriza kugenda mu maaso okuva ku buli ludda. Olw'okunyiiga olw'ebyavaamu, yanoonya engeri y'okwewala obuvunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: I ngee lweny ma obedo tye ikare me yer, lworo omede ki koko ma aa ki bot dano weng. Pi cwer cwiny I kom adwogi ne, en oyenyo yoo me gengo timo bal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu naka aseo, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos noi naarai apotu itunga luka aiboisio kere kitoronata. Apotu itakadikisi ngesi kanu akiro nuelomunitos, abu ngesi kodum itunganan yenepedori aisac aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni opetaa ma vutia 'diyi ma vutia, asi otiza tu uru e'yo 'bani tozu engazu kala dria 'diyi vurisi. E'yo efupi 'bori ma e'yosi, eri nda 'ba azi ecozu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obutabanguko omu karuuru, obunkenke bukaruga ahaiguru ahabw'okubeeherera kuruga omumatemba goona. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'ebyarugiremu, akasherura omuringo gw'okwetantara obujunanizibwa.

eng_prompt: Determined to make a difference, he tirelessly campaigned for support and rallied the community around his vision. His passion for the parish drove him to seek every opportunity to connect with the residents and address their needs.
lug_prompt: Ng'amaliridde okuleetawo enjawulo, yakola kakuyege awatali kukoowa okufuna obuwagizi n'okukunga abantu okwetoloola okwolesebwa kwe. Okwagala kwe eri ekigo kyamuleetera okunoonya buli mukisa okukwatagana n'abatuuze n'okukola ku byetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me kelo aloka-loka, en obedo ka bito kwi labongo ilo cinge me nongo cwak ki cuku cwiny lwak me lubu tamme. Mar ma en tye kwede pi paric oweko en tiyo ki kare mo keken me kube ki lutedero ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Keda ekapakina aitolomun aijulanakineta, abu ngesi kiswama kagogong kanu adumun agangat kosodi atukokin itunga kotoma aomisioitike. Amina ke kanuka eparish abu koinak ngesi aimo arereng naka arucokina keda itunga ka aitemokin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza be ojata ejizu, eri 'ye ti odaza atita esuzu okposi dika eri tra ongulumu eyi e'yo erini ega 'diyi ma dria. Leta erini parisi 'da ma dria ri fe erini drileba dria ndazu e'yo nzezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie azini e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumariirira kureetaho empindahinduka, akakoresa amaani omu kuronda obushagiki n'okurundaana abantu okwetoroora enteekateeka ye. Rukundo ye y'omuruka ekamureetera kuronda buri mugisha gw'okukwatanisa n'abatuuragye n'okukora ahabyetaago byabo.

eng_prompt: After noticing suspicious activity in the neighborhood, the concerned resident decided to take action. They gathered all the relevant information and contacted the authorities for assistance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebikolwa ebiteeberezebwa mu kitundu, abatuuze abeeraliikirivu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baakungaanya amawulire gonna agakwatagana ne batuukirira ab'obuyinza okufuna obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Inge neno jami ma pe tye kakare ma tye katimme I kabedo ne, dano ma onongo gitye ki lworo ni gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Gu gamo ngec weng ma mite dok gu lok ki lutela pi kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun aswamisio nu eomitai ebe ejai aiboisit kangin, abu etunganan lo epodokinit ngun koseu aswam nuikamunitos ngun. Apotu kesi otukutu akiro kere nuikamunitos ngun kosodete adolokin apedorosio kanu aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi tra o'dukoti dria orodriru 'diyi eyi ma dria eyini ani eyi ecizu drice'ba eyi pie azakoma esuzu.
