eng_prompt: Recent scandals and controversies surrounding key members have raised concerns among supporters. As a result, many began to question the integrity and values upheld by the party.
lug_prompt: Emivuyo n'obukuubagano obwaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo mu bammemba abakulu bireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bawagizi. N'ekyavaamu, bangi baatandika okubuusabuusa obwesimbu n'empisa z'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Koko ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ikin lumemba madongo okelo lworo ikin lucwak. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo ki woro ma dul me cungu iwi-bye ne tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuarokok keda ingungeta nuikamunitos imeban luapolok eyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas egangitok. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu abuonokin nuikamunitos ajokis naka epate.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi azini ngiringiri 'ba okporu memba ru 'diyi ma ageia 'diyi eji asi otiza 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo adasi azini e'yo orodriru amuti politiki ni 'da ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi n'obutaikirizana obwakyerereirwe abanyakibiina kikareetaho okwerarikirira omu bashagiki. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi bakatandika kubanganisa obwesigwa n'emitwarize y'ekibiina.

eng_prompt: Throughout the years, he has consistently volunteered for various campaigns and events. His unwavering support for the party's ideals is evident in everything he does.
lug_prompt: Emyaka gyonna, abadde akola nga nnakyewa mu kampeyini n'emikolo egy'enjawulo. Obuwagizi bwe obutakyukakyuka eri ebigendererwa by'ekibiina bweyolekera mu buli kimu ky'akola.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, en obedo ka tic macalo latic me nono I yub mapat-pat me bito kwir ki yub mapat-pat. Cwake matek tutwal I kom miti pa dul me cungu iwi bye ne nen I jami weng ma en timo.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru kere, iswamat ngesi kwape aijaanakinan kanuka ikampeins keda iboro luegelegela. Agangat ke naepol noi mama ejaasi ipudesia luka epate ewanyunitai kotoma akiro kere nuiswamai ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'diyi ma alea dria, eri ebi ovu 'ba owi'ba e'yo ti odaza ni azini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea. Eri ma atita okporu e'yo amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma dria ri e'da e'yo dria erini 'ye 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka yoona, atwire naahayo obuhwezi aha kampeyini n'emikoro etari emwe. Obushagiki bwe aha bigyendererwa by'ekibiina, nibweyoreka omuri buri kimwe eki arikukora.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising within the party as disagreements over policy direction have surfaced. In a recent meeting, the party leader expressed frustration over the lack of unity among certain members.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kibiina olw'obutakkaanya ku ngeri y'okutambuzaamu emirimu. Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, omukulembeze w'ekibiina yalaga obwennyamivu olw'obutali bumu mu bammemba abamu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I dul me cungu iwi bye ne pien telle I kom cik mapat-pat tye ka time. I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, latela me dul me cungu iwi-bye ne onyuto cwer cwinye pi bedo peke pa winye ikin lumemba mogo.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma opate kanu amamut acamanar kanu ainapeta. Kotoma airiamunet napac, abu engarenon loka epate kitodu anyunyura kanu amamus na aimorikikina kanejaas imeban ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni ri ebi tu amuti politiki ni 'da ma alea tu e'yo erita ako ni e'dozu 'bori ma e'yosi. Mitingi azi ebipi 'bo ri ma alea, drice'ba amuti politiki ni 'da niri ece candi erini aa'zu ti ecita koko 'ba amuti nde ma alea 'diyi ma eselea risi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kibiina, ahabw'obutakwatanisa aha nkora y'eby'obutegyeki. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, omwebembezi w'ekibiina akooreka obusaasi ahabw'obutakwatanisa omu bantu bamwe.

eng_prompt: The COVID-19 pandemic has disrupted education systems worldwide, leading to unprecedented challenges for educators. Many teachers have struggled to adapt to remote learning while managing their own health and safety concerns.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe kitaataaganyizza ebyenjigiriza mu nsi yonna, ekireetedde abasomesa okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Abasomesa bangi bafubye okumanyiira okusomera ewala ate nga bakwasaganya ebyobulamu n'obukuumi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two korona obalo yub me kwan I wilobo lung, ma okelo peko mapol tutwal bot lupwonye. Lupwonye mapol gunongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki kwan ma aa ki kama bor kun nongo gitye ka gwoko yot komgi ki ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Abu adeka naka COVID-19 itolitol nuka asioman kotoma akwap kere, ido ayangau ainingosia nuipu noi nejaas isisianakinak. Apotu isisianakinak luipu iswamata kagogong kanu aijulakin asioman nako kinga konye epodokinitos nuka angaleu kec keda ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Azo COVID-19 niri eza e'yo onita ni 'diyi wudrikurusi ndulu, erini fezu e'yo ewaru 'ba imba'ba eyini 'diyi dri. Imba'ba karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyini ani muzu onita onizu angu zozu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ya COVID-19 etabukire eby'obwegyese omunsi yoona, ekireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha beegyesa. Abeegyesa baingi bagumire okumanyiira okwegyera hare, obwo barikureeberera eby'amagara gaabo n'eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: After facing numerous challenges in their community, the residents gathered to discuss their options. Many felt overwhelmed and believed that external support was necessary to address their pressing needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusanga okusoomoozebwa okungi mu kitundu kyabwe, abatuuze baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu. Bangi baawulira nga bazitoowereddwa era ne balowooza nti obuyambi okuva ebweru bwetaagisa okukola ku byetaago byabwe eby'amangu.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo peko mapol I kabedo gi, lutedero gucokke me nywako tam gi. Dano mapol gubedo ki lworo dok gutamo ni kony ma aa ki woko mite pi tyeko peko gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumunun atiokisio nuipu kotoma atutubetekec, apotu itunga lu atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nu epedorete kesi aswam. Apotu itunga luipu opupoto ebe epol aingarakinio kama ejaasi akwapin nukokinga kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyivileri ma alea karakara 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi esu e'yo eyi ma dria ambamba dika eyi ai ra kini atita engazu amve ri eri orodriru e'yo eyini le mbeleru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga oburemeezi bwingi omu kyanga kyabo, abatuuragye baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo. Baingi bakeehurira baremereirwe kandi bakaikiriza ngu obuhwezi kuruga aheeru nibwetaagwa kukora ahabyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: Many educational institutions in Uganda are expanding their reach to provide personalized learning experiences. As a result, private teachers' organizations have emerged to cater to the growing demand for tailored education.
lug_prompt: Amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi mu Uganda gagaziye obuwanvu bwago okusobola okusomesa buli omu ku bubwe. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'abasomesa eby'obwannannyini bivuddeyo okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusomesa ku mutindo.
ach_prompt: Gangi kwan mapol I lobo Uganda tye ka medo rwom me kwan gi me miyo pwony ma lubbe ki miti pa lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa lupwonye ma pe jenge I kom gamente gubino ka miyo pwony ma mite pi lutino.
teo_prompt: Isomeroi luipu luko Uganda eutasi aiyatakin aiboisio kec kanu aisisianakin itunga akiro nuiswamaete kesi bon. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta lu isisianakinak lu mam eraas lu apugan kitolomutu kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Pari onita ni karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi angu eyini esu ri ma omgbo otu eyini ani e'yo onita ni 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi fezu. E'yo 'disi, amuti imba'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi e'do curu'do e'yo 'bani lezu onita 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero maingi omuri Yuganda, gariyo nigongyera aha buheereza bwago, kugira ngu gashome kurugiirira aha muntu weena. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'abegyesa eby'abantu buntu bitandikire kukora aha byetaago by'okwegyesa abantu.

eng_prompt: After much discussion about the group's future direction, it became clear that a more structured approach was needed. To ensure effective management and organization, the members decided to establish a committee.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ekibiina gye kiddukanyizibwamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti enkola entegeke obulungi yeetaagibwa. Okusobola okukakasa obukulembeze obulungi n'entegeka, bammemba baasalawo okutondawo akakiiko.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom yoo me tic pa dul ne I kare me anyim, onen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me tic ma kiyubu maber obedo kamitte. Me neno ni tela ki yub tye maber, lumemba gumoko tam gi me cako committee.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi nuikamunitos epone loebeitor egurupu aswam koingaren, aponi kojenunai ebe ibusakinit aitodolikin epone loitemokinitai. Kanu awanyun eyaitene loajokan ka ainapeta, apotu imeban itolomutu ekomiti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia geri amuti 'da ni ngazu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria, eca e'da kililiru kini le 'ba ma e'do e'yo 'ye kililiru. E'yo driceza kililiru azini otuta kililiru ri nezu, memba eyi 'du e'yo committee ni e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga aha nkora y'ekibiina omu biro by'omumaisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okukora ebintu omu muringo oguhikire. Okureeba ngu hariho obwebembezi n'entebekanisa nungi, ba memba bakasharamu kutaho akakiiko.

eng_prompt: Many families have struggled to adapt to the sudden changes brought on by the global crisis. As businesses closed and schools shifted to online learning, the challenges began to mount.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwanye okumanyiira enkyukakyuka ez'amangu ezireeteddwa ekizibu ky'ensi yonna. Bizineesi bwe zaggalwawo n'amasomero ne gatandika okusoma ku mutimbagano, okusoomoozebwa kweyongera.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol gunongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki aloka-loka ma obino macalo adwogi me peko me two korona. I kare ma biyacara oloro dok gangi kwan ocako kwan kun gitiyo ki intanet, peko ne omede.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ikalia luipu ajenun aijulanakineta nu eyaunit adeka naka ekorona. Neagolokinere ibiasaran kosodete isomeroi aijulakin aisisia kolago, apotu atiokisio kogeutu aiyatakin.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru ojata mbeleru e'yo ewaru wudrikuru ma alea 'diyiniri 'yezu. Tujura yini opizu azini sukulu yini ojazu onita geri oli aliasiri vu, e'yo ewaru 'diyi e'do tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi gatungire oburemeezi bw'okumanya empindahinduka ezareesirweho oburemeezi bw'ensi yoona. Eby'obushubuzi ku byakingire kandi amashomero gakahindukira aha kwegyera aha mikutu, oburemeezi bukatandika kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: The recent changes in educational standards have prompted a reevaluation of teaching methods. As a result, many educators are now recognizing the importance of strategic lesson planning.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka ezaakabaawo mu mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza ziviiriddeko okuddamu okwekenneenya enkola z'okusomesa. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa bangi kati bakitegedde obukulu bw'okuteekateeka obulungi eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka ma otime I rwom me kwan I kare-ni okelo aloka-loka I yoo me pwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye mapol dong gitye ka niang ber pa yub maber me pwonyo lutino.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka adoketait naka asioman nes eyangaunit airereonor iwaitin lu isisianakino. Kanuka ngun, ejenete kwana isisianakinak luipu ajokis naka aitemonokin aisisiaeta.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru geri onitaniri ma alia 'diyi fe 'bani geri 'bani imbazu 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo 'disi, imba'ba karakara eyi curu'do e'yo orodriru otita kililiru 'bani 'ba eyi imbazu 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka y'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese, ereesireho okugaruka kushwijuma emiringo y'okwegyesamu. N'ekyarugiremu, abegyesa baingi hati nibamanya omugasho gw'okukora enteekateeka nungi y'okwegyesa.

eng_prompt: Many educators are struggling to make ends meet due to low salaries and rising living costs. As a result, they often find themselves relying on financial assistance to support their livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi bazibuwalirwa okweyimirizaawo olw'emisaala emitono n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesanga nga beesigamye ku buyambi bw'ensimbi okusobola okubeezaawo obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol gitye ka canne me nongo jami ma mite pi mucara gi matidi ki wel cente ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi nongo gi jenge I kom kony me lim me gwoko kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu eutasi aijar naarai ikidioko iropito keda aijar naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi ajaut keda agangat na ikapun kanu aidar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo esu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu e'yo musara eyini aa'zu were risi azini aje 'bani aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri si. E'yo 'disi, eyi eyi esu eyini aa'zu atita robianiri ma dria eyini ani ecozu eyi ma edri ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho ahabw'emishaara y'ahansi hamwe n'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwesigama aha buyambi bw'esente okubaisaho amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges of managing a diverse classroom, the educators remained committed to fostering a positive learning environment. Their dedication to each student's growth was evident in their approach.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okusoomoozebwa kw'okuddukanya ebibiina eby'enjawulo, abasomesa baasigala beewaddeyo okutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusomeramu. Okwewaayo kwabwe eri okukula kwa buli muyizi kweyolekera mu ngeri gye beeyisaamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni peko obedo tye me doro lutino kwan ma padi padi, lupwonye gumede ki keto cwiny gi me neno ni lutino tye ka pwonyo maber. Keto cwinygi I dongo pa lutino kwan onen I yoo ma gutiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas atiokisio nuka aidar atukot na egelegela, apotu isisianakinak iswamata kagogongu kanu aitopolor adoketait najokan naka aisisia. Apodokinit kec kanu apol naka esisiak aponi kojenunai kotoma epone loiswamata kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kilasi ndundu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma talasi, imba'ba eyi awi asi 'baza be angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otuzu. Asi 'baza yiniri sukulu mva alu alu ma zota ma dria ri e'da geri yini e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bw'okureeberera ebibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe, abegyesa bakaguma beehayo okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Okwehayo kwabo aha ntunguuka ya buri mwegi, kikarebeka omu muringo ogu barikukoramu ebintu.

eng_prompt: In a recent conference addressing educational challenges, the minister emphasized the importance of collaboration among educators. He highlighted that a cohesive approach would significantly enhance their effectiveness in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana olwaliwo gye buvuddeko ng'ayogera ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenjigiriza, minisita yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukolagana mu basomesa. Yakikkaatirizza nti enkola ey'awamu ejja kwongera nnyo ku busobozi bwabwe mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki ma oloko I kom peko me kwan, minista oloko I kom ber pa winye ikin lupwonye. En owaco ni yoo me tic ma ribe twero medo rwom me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atukonokin napac kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuka asioman, abu eminista kitogogong ajokis naka aiswamanara kiding isisianakinak. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe epone ediope loepedori aitojokar eswamae kec kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani e'yo nzezu e'yo ewaru onita ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, minisita 'da 'ba asi orodri ti icita imba'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Eri ece e'yo kini geri 'bani eyi 'yezu tualu ri nga eyi ma agata kilasia ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane orwabaireho juba, orwabaire nirugamba aha buremeezi bw'eby'obwegyese, minisita akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu beegyesa. Akashoboorora ngu engyenderwaho erikukwatanisa neija kwongyera aha bukugu bwabo omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: Every individual contributes to the success of a company, regardless of their role or background. It is essential to recognize the value of all employees and ensure they are treated with dignity and respect.
lug_prompt: Buli muntu ssekinnoomu ayambako mu buwanguzi bwa kkampuni, awatali kufaayo ku kifo kye oba gye yava. Kya mugaso okutegeera omugaso gw'abakozi bonna n'okukakasa nti bayisibwa n'ekitiibwa n'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Dano weng tye ki gin ma giyubu pi cobo miti pa dul enoni, labongo paro pi ticgi onyo kama gi aa ki iye. Pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa lutic weng ki neno ni kitero gi ki woro.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan iswamai nuipu kanu akerianut naka ekampuni, araida ejaasi keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ajokis naka eswamak kere ka awanyun ebe eyaitai kes keda aibuses keda ayongit.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria yi azi nga amuti ma drile suza ma alia, yini ovuzu pari azini engazu ngua ri ma talasi. Eri orodriru 'bani azi'ba dria ma orodri esuzu azini nezu ra kini 'ba yi 'ye inzita azini inzita si.
nyn_prompt: Buri muntu aine eki arikukora aha businguzi bwa kampuni, oihiremu obujunaanizibwa bwe n'oburugo bwe. N'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'abakozi boona n'okureeba ngu nibatwarwa n'ekitiinisa n'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: As communities face unprecedented challenges, many individuals are realizing the importance of collaboration and support. In the midst of uncertainty, they are beginning to recognize the potential for growth and unity.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo, abantu bangi bakitegedde obukulu bw'okukolagana n'okuwagira. Wakati mu butali bukakafu, batandise okulaba obusobozi bw'okukulaakulana n'obumu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lwak tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal, dano mapol tye ka niang ber pa ribe kacel ki kony. I kare me lworo, gitye ka cako neno kero me dongo ki ribe.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuegelegela, ejenete itunga luipu ajokis naka aimorikikina keda agangat. Kokiding na amamus ajenanut, eutasi kesi ageun ajenun apedor naka apol keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo orodri ti icita ni azini atita ni 'diyi esu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, eyi e'do e'yo angu ezoma ni azini ti ecita ni 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikutunga oburemeezi, abantu baingi nibamanya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'obuhwezi. Ahagati y'obutetegyerezibwa, batandikire kureeba obushoboorozi bw'entunguuka n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a strong sense of community and collaboration, it is essential that everyone contributes their time and effort. To achieve our goals and enhance our collective experience, participation is crucial.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkolagana ey'amaanyi mu kitundu n'okukolagana, kya mugaso buli omu okuwaayo obudde n'amaanyi ge. Okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe n'okutumbula obumanyirivu bwaffe obw'awamu, okwenyigiramu kikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Pi medo rwom me ribbe ikin lwak, pire tek ni dano weng omyero gumi cawa gi ki kero gi. Me cobo miti wa ki medo rwom me ngec ma watye kwede, bedo tye pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda aimorikikina, ejok itunga kere aijaikin apak kec keda agogongu. Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi ka aitojokar amisiarit wok, epolok noi aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu tualu tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba dria ma fe sa'wa eyini ri tualu okpo eyini 'diyi pie. Asisile amani 'diyi esuzu azini e'yo amani 'ye tualu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, e'yo 'yezu ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho enkoragana n'okukwatanisa omu bantu, buri omwe ashemereire kutaho obwire bwe n'amaani. Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu n'okutunguura ebyetegyereirwe byaitu,okwejumbamu n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: As they gathered for the meeting, the group expressed their concerns about the obstacles hindering their progress. Recognizing their struggles, the educational officer offered words of encouragement to inspire resilience.
lug_prompt: Nga bakungaana mu lukiiko, ekibinja kyalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe olw'ebibalemesa okugenda mu maaso. Ng'amanyi ebizibu byabwe, omukungu w'ebyenjigiriza yawa ebigambo ebizzaamu amaanyi okubasikiriza okugumira embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gucokke pi kacokke, gurup ne gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko matye ka gengo wot gi anyim. I nge niang peko gi, ladit ma loyo lok kom pwonye owaco lok me cuku cwiny me cuku cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Neautar kesi atukonokin kanuka airiamunet, apotu egurupu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aitikitik apolokec. Kanu ajenun atiokisio kec, abu eswaman loka asioman ijaik akiro nu isinyikokinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini okuzu mitingi 'da ma alea, amuti 'da eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo eyi atripi eyini muzu drile ri ma dria. Erini e'yo ewaru yini 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, azi'ba onita ni 'da fe e'yo ava engapi 'ba eyidri 'diyi dri okpo fezu.
nyn_prompt: Kubarikuteeranira omu rukiiko, guruupu ekoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'oburemeezi oburikuzibira entunguuka yaabo. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bwabo, ofiisa w'eby'obwegyese akabahereza ebigambo by'okubagaruramu amaani.

eng_prompt: Many individuals seek careers that contribute to the greater good, finding purpose in roles that shape the future. Among these, education stands out as a vital profession that nurtures the minds of the next generation.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya emirimu egiyamba abantu okufuna ekigendererwa mu mirimu egiyamba abantu mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Mu bino, okusoma kweyoleka ng'omulimu omukulu ogukuza ebirowoozo by'omulembe oguddako.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyenyo tic ma kelo ber pa lwak, nongo tyen lok I tic ma yubu anyim gi. I kin jami magi, kwan obedo tic ma pire tek tutwal ma dongo tam pa anywali manyen.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo aswamisinei nu iswamaete ejok, aimo alosikinet kotoma aswamisinei nu itolomete ingaren. Kotoma akiro nu, erai asioman aswam na epol ajokis na isisianakini aomisio nuka ateker na etupakini.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi azi eyini 'diyi nda geri eyini ecozu e'yo muke 'diyi 'yezu, eyini ani e'yo esuzu azi eyini nga ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, onita eri azi orodriru 'ba ewu drusiri ma alia 'diyi ma omi ezopiri ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda emirimo erikureetaho ebirungi ebirikukira obwingi, barikutunga ekigyendererwa omu mirimo erikureetaho ebiro bya nyensya. Omuri ebi, obwegyese nibureebeka nk'omurimo gw'omugasho ogurikubaasa kutendeka abantu b'omurembe ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: Many educators are seeking additional ways to enhance their financial stability. One popular option is to explore entrepreneurial ventures outside of the classroom.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi banoonya engeri endala ey'okutumbula ensimbi zaabwe. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kunoonyereza ku mirimu gy'obusuubuzi ebweru w'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me medo cente gi. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye me nongo yoo me timo biacara I ngee gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Eutasi isisianakinak luipu aimo iponesio lu iyatakina kanu aitojokar ejautene kec loka ikapun. Adiopet aseunet naejenara noi ngesi aingic aswamisinei nuka agwelanar kokinga naka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi geri azi eyi nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma robia ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi 'bani lele 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo tujari 'yezu 'diyi ondazu kilasia amve.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibasherura oburyo obundi bw'okwongyera aha ntatsya yaabo. Ekintu kimwe ekirikumanywa munonga n'okushwijuma eby'obushubuzi aheeru y'eishomero.

eng_prompt: In today's economy, the cost of living has skyrocketed, making it increasingly difficult for families to make ends meet. Many households find themselves struggling to cover essential expenses with just one source of income.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino, ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnye nnyo, ekizibuwaza amaka okweyimirizaawo. Amaka mangi geesanga nga galwana okusobola okukola ku byetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo nga galina ensibuko y'ensimbi emu yokka.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim me kare-ni, wel cente me kwo omede malo tutwal, ma oweko odoko tek tutwal ki gangi me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Gangi mapol nongo tek tutwal me culu pi jami ma gimito ki yoo acel keken me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, apolor etiai loka aijar, ido etionikinit ikalia aijar. Ipu ikalia lu ewanyunitos ebe etiono aitodolikin iboro lu itwasamao keda epone ediope loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do 'diyi ma alea, aje idri nyazaniri tu uru, erini fezu familia eyini aa'zu ewaru. Aku karakara eyi eyi esu eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ofezu geri robia esuzu alu si.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entatsya y'erizooba, ebbeeyi y'ebintu eyeyongyeire munonga, ekirikugumira amaka okureeberera ebyetaago byago. Amaka maingi nigashanga gaine oburemeezi bw'okushashurira ebintu ebikuru n'oburugo bumwe bw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Many educators face financial challenges that can impact their families' well-being. By participating in agricultural activities, they can secure essential resources for their households.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi basanga ebizibu by'ensimbi ebiyinza okukosa embeera y'amaka gaabwe. Nga beenyigira mu byobulimi, basobola okufuna ebyetaago by'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol ginongo peko me lim ma twero balo kwo pa gangi gi. Ka gubedo lupur, ci gi nongo jami ma mite pi gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu ejaas keda atiokisio nuka ikapun nuepedorete aitolitol aijar naka ikalia kec. Kowai lo ajainikin toma akiro nu akoru, epedorete kesi adumun iboro lu itwasamaete ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini ani familia eyivile 'diyini aa'zu muke ku. E'yo agirikica ni 'diyi 'yerisi, eyi eco afa orodriru familia eyivile 'diyini 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente oburikubaasa kuteganisa amaka gaabo. Barikwejumba omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa, nibabaasa kutunga ebintu by'omugasho omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite his confident demeanor and authoritative tone, the team remained skeptical of his leadership. Many had doubts about his experience and questioned his ability to guide them effectively.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yeeyisa bulungi era ng'ayogera mu ddoboozi ery'obuvumu, ttiimu yasigala ebuusabuusa obukulembeze bwe. Bangi baali babuusabuusa obumanyirivu bwe era babuusabuusa obusobozi bwe okubakulembera obulungi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo ki tek cwiny kacel ki dwon ma obedo ki twero, dul tuku ne pud gubedo ki akala-kala I kom tela ne. Dano mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom ngec ma en tye kwede dok bene gubedo ki akala-kala I kom kero ma en tye kwede me telogi maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda iponesio luajokak, apotu itunga kongicata engarenoneke. Ipu itunga lu abuonokin nuikamunitos amisiarit ke ka apedorit ke aingarenikin kes ejok.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro adriza erini asi'baza be azini o'duko okporu be ra ti, amuti 'da awi asi'baza be driceza eriniri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ma agata e'yo erini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria yo dika eyi ga agata e'yo erini ecozu eyi ma dri cezu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire aine obwesigye n'eiraka ry'obushoborozi, tiimu ekaba etarikwikiriza obwebembezi bwe. Baingi bakaba baine okubanganisa ahabw'obumanyirizi bwe kandi bakabanganisa n'obushoboorozi bwe bw'okubahabura kurungi.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents have highlighted the increasing tensions between local communities and forest officials. As a result, forest officers need to be guarded against people's attacks.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko biraga obunkenke obweyongera wakati w'abantu b'omu kitundu n'abakungu b'ebibira. N'ekyavaamu, abakuumi b'ebibira beetaaga okukuumibwa okuva ku bulumbaganyi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki onyuto telle matye I kin lutedero ki lutic me bunga. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me bunga omyero ki gwok gi i kom mony pa dano.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuiswamasi pac itodunitos engunget lo iyata kiding itunga keda eswamak lu amagoron. Kanuka ngun, ekot ayuarite ipolisin luka amagoron kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo erita ako ni tupi 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea azi'ba jere ni 'diyi pie ri ra. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma mba azi'ba jere ni 'diyi ma ta e'yo 'ba eyini ecozu eyi amvuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ebyabaireho obwahati, nibyoreka obunkenke obweyongyeire ahagati y'abantu b'omubyaro hamwe n'abakungu b'ebibira. N'ekyarugiremu,abakuumi b'ebibira bashemereire kurindwa okurumbwa abantu.

eng_prompt: The community has deep roots in this region, with generations of families calling it home. Their connection to the land is woven into their traditions and way of life.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kirina emirandira egy'amaanyi mu kitundu kino, era ab'omu maka mangi bakiyita amaka gaabwe. Enkolagana yaabwe ku ttaka eryo yeesigamiziddwa ku nnono zaabwe n'engeri gye beeyisaamu.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ki tyen mapol tutwal I but lobo man, ma pol pa gangi gi lwongo ni gang gi. Ribbe meggi ki ngom tye I tekwaro gi ki kit me kwogi.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi atutubet ngin keda iraan luepolok noi kotoma aiboisit kana. Ejai arucokina kec keda alupok ngun kotoma inonosio kec keda iponesiokec luka aijar.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ma ola eyi angu 'di ma alea sa'wa driasi, familia eyi ma eselea 'diyi angu 'di omve aku. E'yo yini yi ecipi nyaku be 'diyi e'bi yi ma a'bi yi ma alia azini geri yini aa'zu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kiine emizi y'amaani omu kicweka eki, kandi amaka maingi nigakiyita eka yaabo. Enkoragana yaabo n'eitaka eri omu migyenzo yaabo hamwe n'emitwarize yaabo.

eng_prompt: After much discussion and deliberation, the community leaders gathered to address the ongoing issues with the newcomer. They agreed that any support they offered would come with certain expectations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okuteesa ennyo, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukola ku nsonga ezigenda mu maaso n'omuggya. Bakkiriziganya nti obuyambi bwonna bwe bawa bujja kubaamu ebisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki tam mapol, lutela me kabedo gucokke me lok I kom peko matye I kom ngat manyen ni. Guwinye ni kony mo keken ma gimiyo bino ki gen mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda aomisio nuipu, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos aitemokin atiokisio nuejaas keda itunganan yenitetet. Apotu kesi kocamanaros ebe adio agangat na ijaikinio kes ebuni keda iboro lu eomitai ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini egata ma vutia, drice'ba ongulumu ni 'diyi tra eyi e'yo mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi pie. Eyi ai ra kini atita ci eyini fe ri nga emu e'yo azi eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuteesa munonga, abebembezi b'ekyanga bakateerana kukora aha nshonga ezirikugyenda omu maisho n'omutuura gye. Bakaikirizana ngu obuhwezi bwona obubarikuha nibuza kwija n'ebiteekateeko ebimwe.

eng_prompt: Before finalizing the sale, the buyers requested documentation to verify the property's history. To proceed with the transaction, the sellers were informed that they must provide necessary legal documents.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannamaliriza kutunda, abaguzi baasabye ebiwandiiko okukakasa ebyafaayo by'ettaka. Okusobola okugenda mu maaso n'okutunda, abatunzi baategeezebwa nti balina okuwaayo ebiwandiiko by'amateeka ebyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gutyeko wilo jami ne, luwil ne gupenyo pi karatac me niang kit ma jami ne gubedo kwede con. Pi mede ki biacara enoni, kiwaco ki lucat ni omyero gukel waraga ma mite malube ki cik.
teo_prompt: Erongo engetakina agwelanar, apotu agwelak kilipata apapula kanu ajenun akiro nukolo nuka iboro. Kanu ainyikokin agwelanar, aponi olimokinai agwelanarak ebe ibusakinit kesi aijaikin apapulai nu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eyi awini e'yo afa oziza niri de ku, 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi a'i kokobi eyi e'dazu e'yo angu 'da ni 'diyi ma dria ra. Muzu tujari 'yezu drile, 'ba lu 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi dri kini le eyi ma eji kokobi azita palaa 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatakatandikire kuguza ebintu, abaguzi bakashaba ebihandiiko by'okureeba ebyafaayo by'eitaka. Okugyenda omu maisho n'okuguza ebintu, abashubuzi bakamanyisibwa ngu bashemereire kureeta ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: Recent developments in local governance have sparked intense debates among community leaders. As a result, the upcoming election is drawing significant attention from both residents and political analysts.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana eyaakabaawo mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu ereeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bakulembeze b'ebitundu. N'ekivuddemu, okulonda okujja kusikiriza nnyo abatuuze n'abakugu mu byobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme cokcok-ki I tela me tedero okelo laro lok I kin lutela me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, yer matye kabino ni tye ka kelo miti madit tutwal ki bot lwak kacel ki lutela me cungu iwi bye.
teo_prompt: Apol naka apugan naka atutubena nes eyaunit epeget loepol noi kiding engarenok luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, eutasi aseo na ebunit aitelekaar itunga keda lu engicete akiro nuka politikis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru local governance ma alia 'diyi eji agbatara okporu 'diyi drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, opeta emupi ri ni asi feza angiri eji engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu tualu 'ba e'yo politiki ni ma eti ondapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'obwebembezi bw'ebyaro, ereesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu beebembezi b'ebyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, akaruuru akarikwiija nikareetaho okwetegyereza kw'amaani kuruga omu batuuragye hamwe n'abacencuzi b'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: As the news spread about the impending crisis, many people were left in a state of confusion and fear. Questions began to arise about the government's communication and transparency regarding the situation.
lug_prompt: Amawulire bwe gaasaasaana ku buzibu obwali bujja, abantu bangi baalekebwa mu kusoberwa n'okutya. Ebibuuzo byatandika okuvaayo ku mpuliziganya ya gavumenti n'obwerufu ku bikwata ku mbeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea ne okato I kom peko matye kabino ni, dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng ki lworo. Lapeny ocake I kom kit ma gamente tye ka lok kwede ki ada I kom ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Neakwarata iyemuto nuikamunitos ationis na ebunit, apotu itunga luipu kojalakinos kotoma ationis keda akuriau. Apotu aingiseta kogeutu aibwo kanuikamunitos aineranara keda aica naka apugan kanuikamunitos ejautene.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo ewaru emupi 'diyi ma dria ri ni i erezurisi, 'ba karakara eyi awi asi otiza azini orisi. E'yo eyi e'do efu e'yo gamete ni e'yo nzezu e'yo 'da ma dria kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amakuru g'oburemeezi oburikwija kujanjaara, abantu baingi bakasigara nibabuzabuzibwa n'okutiina. Ebibuuzo bikatandika kubaho aha nshonga y'empurizagana ya gavumenti hamwe n'oburingaaniza aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Despite our repeated questions, he remained evasive and secretive about his findings. We couldn't shake the feeling that he was concealing something important.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twabuuza ebibuuzo enfunda n'enfunda, yasigala nga yeewala era nga yeekweka ku bye yazuula. Twali tetusobola kwewala ndowooza nti alina ekintu ekikulu ky'atukweka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wapenye lapeny mapol, en pe otito gin ma en onongo. Onongo pe watwero weko tam ni en tye ka kano gin mo ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipudasi sio aingiseta nuipu, abu ngesi inyikok aiyeyea keda aiyeyea nu adumunit ngesi. Mam sio apedori alemar aomisioit ebe euta ngesi aingop ibore yen epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Ama ni ta tro e'yo ozizu dika ra ti, eri awi e'yo nze kokoru azini siri e'yo erini esu 'diyi ma dria. Ama econi ndra e'yo egazu kini eri afa azi orodriru ozi ni ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebibuuzo ebyabaire bigumizemu, akaguma ayesherekyeire ebyabaire yaashangire. Tukaba tutarikubasa kwihaho ekiteekateeko ngu akaba ayesherekire ekintu ky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: The investigation has revealed no evidence to support the claims made by the witnesses. It's clear that the allegations are unfounded and misleading.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti tewali bujulizi bukakasa ebyo abajulizi bye baayogera. Kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebigambibwa tebirina musingi era bya kubuzaabuza.
ach_prompt: Kwed pe onyuto caden mo keken ma cwako lok pa lucaden. Nen atyer kamaleng ni adot ne peke ki tyen lok matir dok tye ka bwolo dano.
teo_prompt: Mam aingic itodunit adiokirot na itogogongit akiro nuka ajenak. Ecai cut ebe mam aitoroneta ngun itogogongoritai ido itoroniarete itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'da esuni e'yo azi ecopi e'dapi kini 'ba sadini ru 'diyi 'yo e'yo 'da ra ni yo. Eri e'da kililiru kini e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma vuti yo dika eyi 'ba eyi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kuretsire obujurizi oburikworeka ngu ebi abajurizi bagambire tibirikwesigwa. Nikyoreka butunu ngu ebirikugambwa tibiine musingye kandi nibihabya abantu.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated between the two factions, many began to question the motives driving their animosity. Investigators and community leaders recognized the need for clarity in order to address the growing unrest.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera wakati w'ebiwayi ebibiri, bangi baatandika okubuusabuusa ebigendererwa ebiviirako obulabe bwabwe. Abanoonyereza n'abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalaba obwetaavu bw'obwerufu okusobola okukola ku butabanguko obweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I kin dul aryo egoni, dano mapol gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom tyen lok ma oweko gubedo ki gero I kingi. Lutim kwed kacel ki lutela me kabedo guniang ni omyero gunyut niango maber me tyeko lweny matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinos ingungeta kiding igurupun iarei, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aingit alosikineta nu eyangaunitos amumu kec. Apotu angicak keda engarenok luka atutubet kojenutu eipud loka aica kanu aitemokin amumu na iyata.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu esele iri 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo eyini lezu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi tualu drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie esu ra kini le 'ba ma e'da e'yo eyi kililiru eyini ani ecozu e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire ahagati y'ebibiina bibiri, baingi bakatandika kubuuza ebigyendererwa ebyabaire nibibaretera obwangani. Bambega hamwe n'abebembezi b'ebyaro, bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okureetaho oburemeezi obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions and proposals, the concerns raised by the team have not garnered the attention they deserve. Frustration has grown as attempts to escalate the matter have repeatedly fallen on deaf ears.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi n'ebiteeso, okweraliikirira okwaleetebwa ttiimu tekufunye kufaayo kwe kusaana. Obwennyamivu bweyongedde olw'okugezaako okwongera ku nsonga eno okulemererwa enfunda n'enfunda.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kinywako lok ki tam mapol, peko ma dul enoni okelo pe gunongo tam ma mite pigi. Cwer cwiny tye ka medde pien tute me medo peko ne obedo ka poto atura.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu ineresinei keda aomisio nuipu, mam ationis na abu etimu kitodu apodokinit kwape ibusakinit. Apolor aiyalongong naarai atamakinitai aiyatakin akiro ngun konye mam aponi kopupokinai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini egata karakara 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo asi otiza amuti 'da ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esuni nga e'yo eyini le 'diyi ku. E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'di ma omgbo otuzu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra a'disiku 'ba e'de e'yo 'di ma dria te.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okuhanuura kwingi n'ebiteiso, ebirikuteganisa tiimu tibiratungire okurebererwa oku bishemereire. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'okugira ngu okuteeraho kwongyera amaani omu nshonga egyo kigumire.

eng_prompt: Many people believe they have ownership over the property, but the legal documents tell a different story. After extensive research, it became clear that the land is not privately owned.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti balina obwannannyini ku ttaka, naye ebiwandiiko by'amateeka byogera bya njawulo. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, kyazuulibwa nti ettaka si lya bwannannyini.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni gitye ki twero iwi jami enoni, ento karatac me cik waco lok mapat. Ingee kwed matut, onen atyer kamaleng ni ngom ne pe obedo pa ngat mo.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe eraasi kesi ikulepek alupok, konye akiro nuka ikisila itetemete akiro nuegelegela. Akaulo naka aingic ejok, aponi kojenunai ebe mam alupok ngun eraasi nuka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini eyi ma e'iru angu 'da ma dria ci, te kokobi azita palaa 'diyi ece e'yo nduni. E'yo vuti ondaza angiri ma vutia, eca kililiru kini nyaku 'da ovuni 'ba ngulupisi 'diyi ma e'yosi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu eitaka n'obugabe bwabo, kwonka ebihandiiko by'ebiragiro nibigamba ekindi. Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, kikarebeka butunu ngu eitaka tiriri ery'omuntu buntu.

eng_prompt: In any group dynamic, it's often the most self-serving individuals who manipulate situations to their advantage. Their actions can escalate tensions and create an environment ripe for discord.
lug_prompt: Mu kibiina kyonna, abantu abeeyagaliza bokka be bakozesa embeera mu ngeri ebaganyula. Ebikolwa byabwe bisobola okwongera okusika omuguwa n'okutondawo embeera ejjudde obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, pol kare dano ma paro pigi kengi aye tiyo ki jami me nongo ber pa gi. Timgi twero medo telle ki kelo apoka-poka.
teo_prompt: Kowai kalo egurupu, eraasi duc itunga lu ekotos ikulepek bon lu itwasamaete ejautene kanu ajokis kec. Epedorete aswamisio kec aiyatakin aiyalongong kosodete aitolomun ejautene loepedori aitolomun ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, eri tutuni 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi e'yo eyi 'yepi eyi ma orodri esuzu 'diyi. Yeta yini 'diyi eco e'yo ewaru ma omgbo otu dika eyi eco e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu guruupu yoona, abantu abarikweyendeza nibo barikukoresa embeera kukoresa ebyetengo byabo. Ebikorwa byabo nibibaasa kwongyera obwimukiriro n'obutaikirizana.

eng_prompt: Local authorities conducted an inspection of the area and discovered several safety hazards. As a result, they decided to inform the community about the urgent need for improvements.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo baakola okwekebejja mu kitundu ne bazuula ebintu eby'enjawulo eby'obulabe eri eby'okwerinda. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okutegeeza abantu ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ennongoosereza.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gu ngiyo kabedo eni dok gunongo jami mapol ma twero balo kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tam gi me miyo ngec bot lwak I kom miti me yubu jami I kabedo gi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet ongicata aiboisit ngin kosodete adumun atiokisio nuipu nuka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi ocamutu aitijenikin itunga nuikamunitos eipud loka aitojokaario.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi andri angu 'da ma alea azini eyi esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi angu 'da ma agei tema ni. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai 'ba ongulumu eyi ma dria e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo eyi otuzu mbeleru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakakyebera ekyanga kandi bashanga ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kurabanisamu eby'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu kumanyisa abantu ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In the face of adversity, only the brave remained to defend their home. Those who lacked the courage to stand their ground had long since abandoned their posts.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekaganye n'ebizibu, abazira bokka be baasigalawo okulwanirira amaka gaabwe. Abo abataalina buvumu kuyimirira mu kifo kyabwe baali bavudde dda ku bifo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko, oteka keken aye odong me gwoko gang gi. Jo ma pe gubedo ki tekcwiny me cung I kom lokgi dong guweko ticgi con.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loetiono noi, lu agogong bon kesi apotu kosalakisi aigang ore kec. Ngul lu amamete keda atiting naka aibwo kwap kec apotu kojalakisi aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ma drilea, lu 'ba asi okporu 'diyi awi yi vile aku agei tezu. Ba asi mbapi pa sozu yi ma paria ku 'diyi ku pari yini 'diyi 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abazira bonka nibo bagumire kurinda amaka gaabo. Abo abaabaire batiine bumanzi bw'okuhamira aha nshonga zaabo, bakaba baherize kuruga aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Research has shown a strong correlation between forest cover and local precipitation patterns. By enhancing the green cover in our district, we can potentially influence the climate positively.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'ebibira n'engeri enkuba gy'etonnya mu kitundu. Bwe twongera ku ttaka mu disitulikiti yaffe, tusobola okukyusa embeera y'obudde.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto kubbe matek ikin bunga ki kit ma kot cwer kwede ikabedo moni. Ka wamedo rwom me lum I distrik wa, ci watwero kelo alokaloka I kom kit ma piny tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe ejai arucokina naepol noi kiding amagoron keda epone loetepia edou. Kowai lo aiyatakin aiboisio nu ekirididi ko disitrikt wok, ipedori oni aitojokar ejautene loka ikwamin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece ti ecita okporu oce ma ta mbaza ma eselea geri ozoo eyini 'dizu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Angu amavile distrikitia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, ama eco angu mile ma e'yo oja kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka okukwatanisa kw'amaani ahagati y'ebibira hamwe n'embeera y'enjura omu byaro. Twayongyera eby'obuhangwa omu disiturikiti yaitu, nitubaasa kuhindura embeera y'obwire.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, it is crucial to consider the long-term consequences of our actions. Finding a way to address our differences through dialogue can lead to more sustainable solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano, kikulu okulowooza ku biyinza okuva mu bikolwa byaffe. Okufuna engeri y'okugonjoolamu enjawukana zaffe nga tuyita mu kuteesa kisobola okuleetawo eby'okugonjoola eby'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki me jami ma watimo I kare me anyim. Nongo yoo me tyeko tele matye I kinwa I yoo me laro lok twero kelo yoo me cobo peko matye pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka ingungeta, ejokuna noi aomoom nuepedorete atakanun kotoma aswamisiowok. Aimo epone loka aitemokin atiokisio kosi kopone loka aineranara epedori ayangaun aitemokineta nuka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru e'yo ama 'yeta eyini 'diyi ma e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa ezu ri ma dria. Geri azi esuzu e'yo ama esele cozu 'diyi ma aza kozu geri e'yo onzeza vurisi ri eco fe e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ewu drile ri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutaikirizana, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha birikubaasa kuruga omu bikorwa byaitu. Okushanga omuringo gw'okutereeza obutaikirizana bwaitu kurabira omu kugaaniira, nikibaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, wood has been a fundamental resource for construction and crafting. Its versatility and abundance make it an essential material in various industries.
lug_prompt: Ebyafaayo byonna biraga nti enku zibadde za mugaso nnyo mu kuzimba n'okukola ebintu eby'emikono. Enkola yaayo ey'enjawulo n'obungi bwaayo bigifuula ekintu ekikulu mu makolero ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro pa dano, bao obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic me gedo ki yubu jami. Tye ki jami mapol tutwal ma weko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, erai abawoi ibore yenepol noi kanu adukio keda aitolom iboro. Apedorit ngesi aswam iboro luipu ido epatana aswam kotoma acuman nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, mbawu ebi ovu afa orodriru jo sizu azini afa edele drisi 'diyi edezu. E'yo erini aa'zu afa ndundu eyi be tre ri fe erini aa'zu afa orodriru tu okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, embaho zitwire nizikoresibwa munonga omu kwombeka n'okukora eby'emikono. Okuba erikukoresibwa munonga n'okuba erikukoresibwa munonga nikikureetera kuba eky'omugasho omu makorero gatari gamwe na gamwe.

eng_prompt: After years of conflict and negotiation, the government has finally decided to reclaim the territory for development. The once-thriving community now faces eviction as plans for a new project take precedence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'obukuubagano n'enteeseganya, gavumenti emalirizza okuzzaawo ettaka ly'enkulaakulana. Ekitundu ekyali kikulaakulana kati kyolekedde okusengulwa nga enteekateeka za pulojekiti empya ze zikulembeza.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki winye, gamente dong omoko tamme me gamo ngom eni pi dongo lobo. Kabedo macon ma onongo tye ka dongo I kare-ni dong gitye ki peko me ryemo gi ki I kabedogi pien yub me yubu project manyen obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ingungeta keda ipegeta, adaun apugan aseun ainyakar alupok kanu apol. Ejaas itunga luapol noi kotoma aiboisit ngin keda ariebo naarai itemonokinete ipurojektin luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ngiringiri ni azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma vutia, gamete asizu asi 'du e'yo angu 'da 'duzu angu ezoma ni. Ongulumu andra okorisi drile suzaru 'dayi nga curu'do dri fu e'yo 'bani otita azi o'diru ni 'diyi sizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutabanguko n'okuteesa, gavumenti eshaziremu kugaruraho eitaka ry'entunguuka. Abantu abaabaire nibatunguuka, obwahati nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okubingwa ahabw'okuteekateekyera purogyekiti ensya.

eng_prompt: After weeks of meticulous planning and preparation, the team set out to explore the vast terrain. Their goal was to gather data and assess the resources available in the region.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bategese n'okwetegeka, ttiimu yasitula okunoonyereza ku ttaka eddene. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kukungaanya bubaka n'okwekenneenya eby'obugagga ebiri mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki yubbe maber tutwal, dul pa dano ne gucako tic me ngiyo kabedo man madit tutwal-li. Mitigi obedo me coko ngec ki niang jami ma tye ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, apotu etimu kogeutu airereor aiboisit naepol noi. Alosikinetekec arai aituk akiro ka airereor iboro lu ejaas atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi 'yezu kililiru azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da e'do angu 'da ma ale andrizu. Asisile yiniri ndra e'yo yi trazu azini lonyi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera n'okweteekateekyera kurungi, tiimu ekatandika kurambura eitaka rihango. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikaba kiri okurundaana ebihandiiko n'okushwijuma eby'obugaiga ebiri omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: After years of negotiations and legal disputes, the local authorities finally reached a decision. In a surprising turn of events, the government granted him the rights he had long sought.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa okumala emyaka n'obukuubagano mu mateeka, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baatuuka ku kusalawo. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, gavumenti yamuwa eddembe lye yali amaze ebbanga ng'anoonya.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye pi mwaki mapol ki laro lok me cik, lutela me tedero dong gumoko tamgi. I aloka-loka ma obedo me ngeng tutwal, gamente omiye twero ma en obedo ka yenyo pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ipegeta keda ingungeta luka ikisila, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kodolokisi aseunet. Koipone kalo itegelikina abu apugan koinak ngesi apedorosio nu ekoto ngesi adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza eli karakara eyi ma vutia azini ngiringiri azita palaa 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asizu e'yo 'du ra. E'yo yi ojazu osutasi, gamete fe eri dri drilemgbo erini le sawa ezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteisa hamwe n'obutaikirizana omu biragiro, ab'obushoborozi aha kyaro bakahika aha kusharamu. Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza,gavumenti ekamuha obugabe obuyabaire atwire naasherura.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and community concerns, church leaders decided it was essential to discuss the future of their services. They arranged a meeting with the minister to address the reopening plans.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira kw'abantu, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa baasazeewo nti kikulu nnyo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'okusinza kwabwe eby'omu maaso. Baategese olukungaana ne minisita okwogera ku nteekateeka z'okuggulawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki peko ma lwak tye kwede, lutela me kanica gumoko ni pire tek tutwal me nywako lok I kom anyim pa lega gi. Guyubu kacoke ki minista me lok I kom yub me yabo tic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongongo naka itunga, apotu engarenok lu ekanisa kitutuboto ebe ejokuna aitemitem nuikamunitos ingaren naka aijaanakinio kec. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamunet keda eminisita kanu aitemitem nuka apukor bobo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu asi otiza ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi 'du e'yo kini eri orodriru agbatara gbazu e'yo ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi otu mitingi minisita eyi pie agbatara gbazu otita eyi ma ti zizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, abeebembezi b'ekanisa bakasharamu ngu n'eky'omugasho kuhanuura aha biro by'omumaisho by'okushaba kwabo. Bakatebekanisa orukiiko na minisita kugamba aha nteekateeka y'okwiguraho.

eng_prompt: Many religious organizations seek ways to support their community and sustain their operations. As a result, they often explore various avenues for financial support.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'enzikiriza bingi byenoonya engeri y'okuyambamu ebitundu byabwe n'okuyimirizaawo emirimu gyabyo. N'ekivuddemu, batera okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okufunamu obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Dule me dini mapol giyenyo yoo me konyo kabedo gi ki tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare giyenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo kony me lim.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta lu ediini luipu emoete iponesio lu igangakitos itunga kec ka aidar aswam kec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aimo iponesio luegelegela luka adumun agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma karakara eyi geri nda atita fezu ongulumu eyivile 'diyini dika eyi ma azi eyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi geri ndundu eyini ecozu atita robia niri esuzu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'amadiini ebingi nibisherura oburyo bw'okuhwera abantu baabo n'okureeberera emirimo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kuronda oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe bw'okutunga obuhwezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: In the face of unprecedented adversity, many communities have rallied together to support one another. Their unwavering faith has inspired them to find new ways to share their beliefs and connect with others.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu ebitabangawo, ebitundu bingi bikungaanidde wamu okuyambagana. Okukkiriza kwabwe okunywevu kubawa amaanyi okunoonya engeri empya ez'okugabana enzikiriza zaabwe n'okukwatagana n'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko mapol tutwal, lwak mapol guribbe kacel me konyo luwotgi. Niye gi ma pe lokke okonyogi me nongo yoo manyen me nywako niye gi ki kubbe ki joo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loetiono noi loka atiokisio, apotu itunga luipu kimorikikinos aigangakin yenice. Eyuunikec loepol nes isinyikokit kesi adumun iwaitin luitetiak lu inera keda iyuunikec keda luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'dileri ma drilea, ongulumu karakara eyi tra eyi tualu atita fezu eyi ma eselea. Yi ma a'ita okporu ri fe eyini ava geri o'diru 'diyi esuzu eyi ma a'ita eyi awazu azini eyi ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi obw'omutaano, abantu baingi bakwatanisize kuhwerana. Okwikiriza kwabo okutahinduka, kubaremesereize kuronda emiringo misya y'okugabana eby'okwikiriza kwabo n'okukwatanisa n'abandi.

eng_prompt: In an age where technology connects us like never before, individuals are seeking new ways to express their spirituality. As traditional gatherings become less common, many are turning to digital platforms for communal worship and reflection.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe guno tekinologiya mw'atugatta okusinga bwe kyali kibadde, abantu banoonya engeri empya ez'okwolesa eby'omwoyo byabwe. Enkungaana z'ekinnansi bwe zigenda zikendeera, bangi baddukira ku mikutu gya yintaneeti okusinziza awamu n'okufumiitiriza.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma tet manyen tye ka kubu dano mapol tutwal, dano tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me nyuto cwinygi. Kit ma gure me tekwaro tye ka doko tek, dano mapol tye ka lokke me cito I kabedo me internet me lega kacel ki lwodo lok.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naerucokinitor oni etatai loakwana, eutasi itunga aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aitodiar aijarakec naka aomisio. Kwape ikidioko airiamununeta nuka einono, eutasi itunga luipu aijulakin aiboisio nuka elago kanu ailip keda aomoom.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea tekenologia ni ama eyi ecipi sa'wa driorisi ku ri ma alea, 'ba eyi geri o'diru eyi nda eyini ecozu e'dazu e'yo eyivile 'diyi ma dria. Okuta e'yo a'binisi 'diyi ni ecazu ewaru, 'ba karakara yi yi oja pari olia aliasi 'diyi ma alia inzizu tualu azini e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu tekinorogye erikutukwatanisa, abantu nibaronda emiringo misya y'okworeka eby'omwoyo byabo. Enteerane z'obuhangwa ku zirikuguma nizikyendeera, baingi nibaza aha mikutu ya digito kuramya hamwe n'okuteekateeka.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and struggle, communities often turn to their spiritual leaders for guidance. Recognizing the challenges faced by their congregations, church leaders have stepped forward to offer support.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okulwanagana, ebitundu bitera okudda eri abakulembeze baabwe ab'eby'omwoyo okufuna okulambikibwa. Olw'okumanya ebisoomooza ebibiina byabwe bye bisanga, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa bavuddeyo okuwa obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, lwak pol kare gilokke bot lutela gi pi kony. Pien guniang peko ma kanica gi tye kanongo, lutela me kanica gukati anyim me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka amamus ajenanut ka atiokisio, etapit itunga aijulakin nejaas engarenokokec luka edini kanu aicoreta. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas ikuristayon kec, apotu engarenok lu ekanisa kitolomutu agangat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, ongulumu eyi sa'wa driasi eyi oja eyi ma drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi vu imbata esuzu. E'yo ewaru kanisa eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi efu drile atita fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa hamwe n'oburemeezi, abantu nibahindukirira abebembezi baabo b'eby'omwoyo kutunga obuhabuzi. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu amakanisa gaabo garikurabamu, abeebembezi b'ekanisa baizireyo okugabira obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: As we assess the healthcare infrastructure in Uganda, it's important to understand the distribution of medical facilities across the country. Specifically, we need to identify the number of regional referral hospitals available to serve the population.
lug_prompt: Nga twekenneenya ebyetaago by'ebyobulamu mu Uganda, kikulu okutegeera okugabibwa kw'ebyobujjanjabi okwetooloola eggwanga. Okusingira ddala, twetaaga okuzuula omuwendo gw'amalwaliro agasindikibwa mu bitundu agaliwo okuweereza abantu.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka neno kit ma odi yadi tye kwede I lobo Uganda, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma odi yadi tye kwede I lobo man. Mite ni omyero waniang wel odi yadi madongo ma tye me konyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio airereonor ewai lo amukian ko Uganda, ibusakinit oni amisiikin eipone lo ekorere aiboisio nuka amukian kakwap. Kacut, ekot oni ajenun enaaba loka adekisia nuapolok nu ejaas kanu aijanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Amani geri arojo eyini aa'zu kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri orodriru angu arojo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma awaza kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri vazu. Le ama ma esu arojo ambo angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ci azi ngazu o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitushwijuma ebyombeko by'eby'amagara omu Uganda, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza oku ebyombeko by'eby'amagara birikugaba omu ihanga ryona. Nitwetenga kumanya omuhendo gw'amarwariro amahango agarikuheereza abantu obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in local crime, the city council convened an emergency meeting. After extensive discussions, they decided that drastic measures were necessary to ensure public safety.
lug_prompt: Olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongedde mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, akakiiko k'ekibuga kaayise olukiiko olw'amangu. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bujjuvu, baasazeewo nti ebikolwa eby'amaanyi byetaagibwa okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa tim aranyi ma otime cokcok-ki, kancil me boma madit olwongo kacoke ma opoto atura. Ingee nywako lok mapol, gumoko tamgi ni yoo me tic matek tye pi gwoko kuc pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma atutubet, abu ekansulo loka eibuga konyarau airiamun na engeso. Akaulo naka aineranara noi, apotu kesi kotuboto ebe ibusakinit aitolomun nuepolok kanu ayuwar itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita onyoza ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru risi, kanisulu aku ambu city niri omve mitingi mbeleru ni. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo ra kini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi o'bi eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu kyaro,akakiiko k'orurembo kaketa orukiiko rw'ahonaaho. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, bakasharamu ngu hariho ebirikwetengwa kureebeka ngu abantu baine oburinzi.

eng_prompt: As the semester comes to a close, the pressure is mounting for everyone. It's hard to believe how quickly time has flown by.
lug_prompt: Ng'olusoma lusembera ku nkomerero, buli omu yeeyongera okunyigirizibwa. Kizibu okukkiriza engeri obudde gye buyiseemu amangu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tem me kwan tye ka tum, lyeto tye ka mede I kom dano weng. Tek tutwal me ye kit ma kare okato kwede oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete atamu angetakin, iyata ainingosit mama ejaasi itunga kere. Etiono aiyuun epone loabu apak kotubor katipet.
lgg_prompt: Semesita 'da ni i deria, okpo 'ba dria ma dria ri ni tu uru. Eri ewaru a'izu sawa agazu mbeleru ri.
nyn_prompt: Taamu ku erikuhika aha muheru, oburemeezi nibweyongyera ahari buri omwe. Kigumire kwikiriza oku obwire bwirukiire juba.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent spike in local crime, authorities have increased their presence in the neighborhood. Residents have expressed concerns about safety, prompting the need for heightened security measures.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'obuzzi bw'emisango mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, ab'obuyinza bongedde okubeerawo kwabwe mu kitundu. Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu ku by'okwerinda, ekireetedde obwetaavu bw'okunyweza eby'okwerinda.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa timo bal ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela omedo rwom me bedo tye gi I kabedo eni. Lutedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom ber bedo ma oweko omyero kimed rwom me gwoko kuc.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakinio naka abilibilio naka ikisila, apotu apedorosio iyatakisi ajaut kec katutubet. Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ayuara, ido abu koyangau eipud loka aitikitik ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo onzi angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi ma 'yeta angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otu ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria eyini ani lezu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu byaro, ab'obushoborozi bongyeire amaani omu byaro. Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda, ekirikureetaho ekyetengo ky'okwongyera eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: I've been anxiously waiting for the doctor to call me with the news. Can you please let me know if they have shared any updates?
lug_prompt: Mbadde nnindirira n'obweraliikirivu omusawo okunkubira essimu n'amawulire.
ach_prompt: Abedo kakuru ki miti madit ni daktar ogona cim ki lok angea ne.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aidar noi kanu emuron ainom eong esimu keda iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi te asi driasi dakitari ni ma omvezu e'yo laza be.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire nintegyereza n'obwegyendesereza omushaho kunteerera esimu n'amakuru.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to spread across the globe, health officials are urging the public to remain vigilant. Recent studies indicate a significant rise in cases, highlighting the ongoing threat of the virus.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okusaasaana mu nsi yonna, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abantu okubeera obulindaala. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti omuwendo gw'abalwadde gweyongedde nnyo, ekiraga obulabe bw'akawuka buno obugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye ka nyaa I wilobo lung, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel dano matye ki two omede tutwal, ma nyutu ni peko me two eni tye kamedde anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini adeka aisiarakin kotoma akwap kere, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga asalakin acoikina. Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile i erezu wudrikurusi ndulu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ai aa'zu mile be. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra, e'yo ecepi kini azo 'da ma e'yo onzi ri ma omgbo ni mu drile.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kujanjaara omunsi yoona, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu kuguma beteekateekire. Okucondooza okuhweireho nikworeka okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire, ekirikworeka akabi k'akakooko ka korona akarikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As we navigated the challenges of the past year, we faced numerous unexpected hurdles. The global health crisis has significantly altered the landscape in which we operate.
lug_prompt: Nga tuyita mu kusoomoozebwa kw'omwaka oguwedde, twasanga ebizibu bingi bye tutasuubira. Obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna bukyusizza nnyo embeera mwe tukolera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka kato ki peko me mwaka ma okato, wanongo peko mapol ma onongo pe watye ka byekone. Peko me yot kom ma tye I wilobo olokke tutwal I kabedo ma watiyo ie.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio aitodolikin atiokisio nuka ekaru lo atubor, apotu sio adumutu atiokisio nuipu nu mam iwomit oni. Ationis naka angaleu naka akwap kere ejulaki eipone lo iswamai oni.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ewaru eli ajerisi 'diyi ma alea acizu risi, ama fu dri e'yo ewaru 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi be tre. E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi wudrikurusiri oja angu amani azi ngazu alenia ri ra.

eng_prompt: Could you please provide some information about your household? Specifically, I need to know about any dependants you may have.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, humanity has faced numerous outbreaks that have drastically altered societies. The impact of these health crises is often measured not just in economic terms, but in the profound loss of life they bring.

eng_prompt: In response to the rapidly spreading virus, the government announced a series of strict measures. Citizens were urged to stay indoors to prevent further transmission.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to spread rapidly across the nation, health officials are closely monitoring the situation. Recent reports indicate a significant surge in infections, raising concerns among the public.

eng_prompt: In order to effectively handle our growing caseload, we have expanded our legal department. This strategic decision has allowed us to bring in specialized expertise to better serve our clients.

eng_prompt: I received an invitation to the event, but it didn't specify the location. Can you tell me where the venue is?
lug_prompt: Nafuna ebbaluwa ennyita ku mukolo, naye teyalaga kifo.

eng_prompt: To ensure a fair and transparent voting process, it is crucial that we adhere to established protocols. Compliance with these regulations will help maintain public trust in our electoral system.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, the electoral commission is facing significant financial challenges. Without adequate resources, they will struggle to ensure a smooth and fair electoral process.

eng_prompt: Despite our excitement and anticipation, unforeseen circumstances kept us from attending. We had planned everything perfectly, but life had other ideas.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twali basanyufu era nga tusuubira okubaawo, waliwo ebintu ebitali bimu ebyatulemesa okubaawo. Buli kimu twali tukitegese bulungi naye obulamu bwali bulina ebigendererwa birala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cwiny wa obedo yom tutwal, jami ma pe wangeyo oweko pe wabedo tye. Wabedo ki yub maber tutwal I kom jami weng, ento kwo onongo tye ki miti mukene.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyalamasi sio noi, apotu iboro lumam iwomit sio abu kimik sio ajaikin. Apotu sio etemokisi iboro kere ejok, konye ajaasi aijar keda aomisio ace.
lgg_prompt: Ama ta tro ovuzu ayikosi azini asi 'baza be ra ti, e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi oga amani emuzu 'da ma alea si. Ama otu ndra e'yo dria kililiru, te idri ma egata nduni ci.

eng_prompt: I've heard stories about people who can change the world with just a touch. If you possess such abilities, what incredible feats could you achieve?
lug_prompt: Mpulidde emboozi ezikwata ku bantu abasobola okukyusa ensi nga bakwata ku kintu.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ododo I kom dano ma gitwero loko lobo I yoo acel keken.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong akiro nuikamunitos itunga luepedorete aijulakin akwap kopone lodidi.

eng_prompt: After our peaceful protest turned chaotic, tensions escalated quickly. As we stood our ground, the officers issued a warning that left us feeling vulnerable.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekalakaasa kwaffe okw'emirembe okufuuka okw'akavuyo, obunkenke bwalinnya mangu. Nga bwe tuyimiridde mu kifo kyaffe, abasirikale baalabula ne tuwulira nga tuli mu bulabe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma jemowa me kuc olokke odoko kuku kuku, telle omedde oyot-oyot tutwal. I kare ma wacung matek, abili gumiyo lok me cikowa ma oweko wawinyo agonya.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidiyawok naka ainapakina araun amumu, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos katipet. Neautar sio aibwo kwap wok, apotu ipolisin ikwenyasi sio noi.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri amani 'ye asianzuru ri ni ecazu ngiringiri ru 'bori ma vutia, e'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi tu uru mbeleru. Amani pa sozu ama vile pariari ma alia, azi'ba 'da eyi fe bile ndu liza fepi ama dri aa'zu e'yo ewaru ma alea.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and widespread protests, it's crucial to examine our stance on law enforcement practices. How do we respond to the growing concerns about the treatment of civilians by those sworn to protect them?
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okwekalakaasa okwabaddewo, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya ennyiriri zaffe ku nkola z'okukwasisa amateeka.

eng_prompt: As I delve into the political landscape of Uganda, I'm curious about the diversity of its political representation. Understanding the number of political parties can provide insight into the country's democratic framework.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nneenyigira mu byobufuzi bya Uganda, njagala okumanya engeri abantu abakiikirirwa mu byobufuzi gye bali ab'enjawulo. Okutegeera omuwendo gw'ebibiina by'obufuzi kisobola okuwa okutegeera ku nkola ya demokulasiya mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ka atye ka kwedo lok me cungu iwi bye me lobo Uganda, abedo ki miti me niang kit ma lucungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye kwede. Niang wel dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat twero miyo niang matut I kom tela pa lwak I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aingic akiro nuka epolitikis loko Uganda, akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos abwoikinitok luka epolitikisikec luegelegela. Ajenun enaaba loka ipatei luka politikis ijaikini itunga amisiikin nuka aseo naka itunga kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma ale andriria, ma ava be e'yo 'ba pa tupi eri ma paria 'diyi ma esele cozu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma kalafe ni vazu ri eco fe 'ba eyini e'yo egazu e'yo democracia ni kari 'di ma alea ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ku ndikweyongyera kwega ebirikukwata aha by'obutegyeki bwa Uganda,ninyetenga kumanya oku ebibiina by'obutegyeki birikujwekyerwa. Okwetegyereza omuhendo gw'ebibiina by'obutegyeki nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya enkora ya demokurasiya omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: As we plan for the upcoming event, it's important to know everyone's involvement. Can you share what activities you are participating in?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tuteekateeka omukolo ogujja, kikulu okumanya buli omu ky'akola.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, many voters are eager to know when they will have the opportunity to cast their ballots. Clarity on the schedule is crucial for ensuring everyone can participate in the democratic process.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiseera by'okulonda bisembera, abalonzi bangi baagala nnyo okumanya ddi lwe banaafuna omukisa okulonda. Obwerufu ku nteekateeka kikulu nnyo okulaba nga buli omu yeetaba mu nkola ya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye cok, lubol kwir mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo awene ma gubi bolo kwir. Bedo ki yub matye atir pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng gubedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, ekotosi aseak luipu ajenun apak na ebeitor kesi aicak abootin. Aitijenaret naka ainapeta erai ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere ajainikin toma ainapeta nuka aseo naka itunga.

eng_prompt: The people of Uganda have the right to vote and participate in the political process. Over the years, various reforms have aimed to strengthen democratic institutions in the country.
lug_prompt: Bannayuganda balina eddembe okulonda n'okwenyigira mu byobufuzi. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, enkyukakyuka ez'enjawulo zigendereddwamu okunyweza enkola ya demokulasiya mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Dano me Uganda tye ki twero me bolo kwir ki bedo tye I yub me cung iwibye. I mwaki ma okato angec, aloka-loka mapat-pat obedo ki miti me jingo tela pa lwak I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Itunga luko Uganda ejaas keda apedor naka aise ka ajaikin toma akiro nuka epolitikis. Kokaru lu atuboros, alosikinet naka aijulanakineta nuegelegela erai aitogogong aseo naka itunga kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma drilemgbo voti 'bezu azini fizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alia ci. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, otuta ndundu eyi 'ye okpo fezu amuti democracia ni kari 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the incident unfold, he felt it was his duty to report what he had seen. The officers arrived at the scene and asked him to accompany them for further questioning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebyaliwo, yawulira ng'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe okuwa alipoota ku ebyo bye yali alabye. Abasirikale baatuuka mu kifo we baatuukira ne bamusaba okubeegattako okwongera okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo.

lug_prompt: Nneetaaga okufuna obubaka mu bwangu.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the data and considering all the evidence presented, we need to determine the implications of our findings. Based on our discussion, it's time to summarize our thoughts.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obubaka n'okulowooza ku bujulizi bwonna obwanjuddwa, twetaaga okuzuula ebigobererwa mu bizuuliddwa byaffe. Okusinziira ku bye twogeddeko, kye kiseera okufunza ebirowoozo byaffe.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, various political parties are finalizing their strategies. In a crucial step towards the upcoming elections, the electoral commission is nominating presidential candidates.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiseera by'okulonda bisembera, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo bimaliriza enteekateeka zaabyo. Mu kaweefube ow'amaanyi mu kulonda okujja, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kalonda abesimbyewo ku bukulembeze bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me yer tye cok, dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka tyeko yubgi. I yoo acel ma pire tek tutwal me oo I yer matye kabino anyim, dul ma doro yer tye ka coyo lucungu I yer pa ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, eutasi ipatei luipu aitemonokin iwaitin kec. Kotoma ainapeta nuepolok nuka aseo naebunit, euta ekomision loka aseo aipikakin abwoak kwape lukapolok akwap.

eng_prompt: As people were forced to spend more time together at home, underlying tensions began to surface. Many families struggled to adapt to the new challenges brought on by lockdowns and social distancing measures.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe bawalirizibwa okumala ebiseera bingi nga bali bombi awaka, obunkenke obwaliwo bwatandika okulabika. Amaka mangi gaafubye okumanyiira okusoomoozebwa okupya okwaleetebwa omuggalo n'ebiragiro by'okwewa amabanga.

teo_prompt: Kwape aponi kobuikinai itunga ajaut nepepe ore, apotu ingungeta kogeutu apolor. Apotu ikalia luipu kongetakisi ajenun atiokisio nuitetiak nuelomunitos kanuka agolokinio naka akwap keda alaikina.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka 'ba eyi omi sa'wa angiri eyini aa'zu tualu akuasi, e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi e'do efu. Familia karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru e'yo angu ti opiza ni azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku baagyemesereziibwe kumara obwire bwingi hamwe omuka, obunkenke bukatandika kureebeka. Amaka maingi gakatunga oburemeezi bw'okumanya oburemeezi obusya obwaretsirweho omukingo hamwe n'ebiragiro by'okwetantara abantu.

eng_prompt: In times of hardship, it is essential for individuals to recognize their privilege. By sharing their resources, they can make a significant difference in the lives of others.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu okutegeera enkizo zaabwe. Nga bagabana ebintu byabwe, basobola okukola enjawulo mu bulamu bw'abalala.
