teo_prompt: Kapakio nu etioko, ejokuna itunga aijen arerengusio kec. Kowai lo aimor iborokec, epedorete kesi aijulakin aijar naka luce.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu 'diyini drileba yini 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Afa yini 'diyi awazurisi, eyi eco ojata okporu eji 'ba azi 'diyi ma edri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, nikikuru abantu kumanya emigisha yaabo. Kubarikugabana eby'obugaiga byabo, nibabaasa kukora empindahinduka y'amaani omu magara g'abandi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health crisis, community leaders have been working diligently to find ways to safely resume gatherings. As a result, churches have been opened on strict guidelines.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, abakulembeze b'ekitundu babadde bakola n'obunyiikivu okunoonya engeri y'okuddamu okukuŋŋaana obulungi. N'ekivuddemu, amakanisa gagguddwawo mu mateeka amakakali.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, lutela me tedero gubedo katic matek me nongo yoo me cako gure. Macalo adwogi ne, kiyabo odi lega ki cik matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aswam kagogong kanu adumun iwaitin lu epedoriata itunga aimorikikin. Kanuka ngun, apukor ikanisan keda ainapeta nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu geri 'bani 'ba eyi trazu kililiru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba zi kanisa eyi azita okporu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, abeebembezi b'ebyanga batwire nibakora n'amaani okuronda oburyo bw'okugarukamu enteerane zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, amakanisa gakingwirweho n'ebiragiro by'amaani.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing health concerns, the venue has implemented strict capacity limits. As a result, they have allowed only seventy people per service.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, ekifo kitaddewo ekkomo ku bungi bw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, bakkirizza abantu nsanvu bokka mu buli kusaba.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, kabedo ne oketo kigeng matek tutwal I kom wel dano matwero bedo ie. Macalo adwogi ne, guyee dano pyerabiro keken I lega acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka angaleu na elosi akonye, abu aiboisit ipikak itunga luipu. Kanuka ngun, acamutu kesi itunga akaisakanyarei bon kotoma ailip.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, pari avita ni 'diyi 'ba ongmbo 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai lu 'ba kali aziri eyi inzita alu alu ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho,omwanya gukataho obukwakurizo. N'ekyarugiremu, baikiriza abantu makumi mushanju bonka buri kushaba.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by the community, the cultural leader has been gathering feedback from residents. With a vision for a more efficient and inclusive approach, they are determined to implement meaningful changes.
lug_prompt: Ng'amanyi okusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga, omukulembeze w'ebyobuwangwa abadde akuŋŋaanya endowooza okuva mu batuuze. Olw'okuba balina ekiruubirirwa eky'okukola ebintu mu ngeri esingayo obulungi, bamalirivu okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ez'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye, latela me tekwaro obedo ka gamo tam pa lwak. Gitye ki miti me kelo aloka-loka matye ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas itunga, etukunit engarenon lo atekerin akiro kanejaas itunga. Keda aomisioit naka ewai lo iswamai ejok ido lo imoriarit itunga kere, ekapakina kesi aitodolikin aijulanakineta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma dria risi, drice'ba suruni 'da ebi e'yo eyi tra engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu. E'yo ndreza geri azi ngazu kililiru azini 'ba dria ma eselea 'diyisi, eyi asi 'ba ojata orodriru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu abantu barikurabamu, omwebembezi w'eby'obuhangwa atwire nashorooza ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye. Ahabw'ekigyendererwa ky'okutunga enkora nungi kandi erikutwariramu abantu boona, bamazireyo kuta empindahinduka ez'omugasho omu nkora.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and feedback from residents, we have identified key areas for improvement. As a result, we are excited to introduce a new leadership strategy for the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'ebiteeso okuva mu batuuze, tuzudde ebitundu ebikulu eby'okulongoosaamu. N'ekyavaamu, tuli basanyufu okutongoza enkola empya ey'obukulembeze eri ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol ki tam ma aa ki bot lwak, wanongo kabedo mapigi tego ma omyero wayub. Macalo adwogi ne, cwiny wa yom me kelo yoo manyen me tela pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi keda aomisio nuka itunga, apotu sio ajenutu aiboisio nuibusakinit oni aitojokar. Kanuka ngun, iyalama sio aitolomun epone loitetet loka aingarenikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri azini egata engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu angu okporu 'bani ecozu otuzu ra 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, ama ayikosi geri o'diru driceza ni 'diyi e'dazu o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga hamwe n'okugarukwamu kuruga omu batuuragye, tutungire emyanya mikuru y'okutereera. N'ekyarugiremu, nitushemererwa kureetaho enkora nsya y'obwebembezi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After much discussion about the community's future, he finally gathered the courage to present his ideas. The atmosphere in the room was tense, as everyone awaited the elders' reaction.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'omu maaso eby'ekitundu, yasobola okufuna obuvumu n'awa endowooza ye. Embeera mu kisenge yali ya bunkenke, nga buli omu alindirira eky'okuddamu ky'abakadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom anyim pa lwak, I agiki ne en onongo tekcwiny me miyo tamme. Lweny obedo tye I ot ne pien dano weng obedo kakuru ngo ma ludito omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi nuikamunitos ingaren naka itunga, abu ngesi kodum atitingikinit aitodiar aomisioke. Arai ejautene loejai agola ngin loetiono noi, naarai itunga kere autasi aidar epone loebeitor itunga luapolok aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri ongulumu 'di ma ewu drialeri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asi mba egata ivile 'diyi e'dazu. Angu jo ale aliza 'da ma alea ri ndra e'yere, 'ba dria ni te e'yo 'ba 'wara eyini 'ye ri te.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga aha biro by'omumaisho by'ekyanga, akahendera yaatunga obumanzi bw'okureeta ebiteekateeko bye. Embeera omu kishengye ekaba eri ey'obunkenke, buri omwe arikutegyereza oku abakuru barikwija kutwaza.

eng_prompt: To ensure fairness in our decision-making process, we must consider the diverse perspectives and experiences of every community. By actively including underrepresented voices, we can create a more equitable environment.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obwenkanya mu nkola yaffe ey'okusalawo, tulina okulowooza ku ndowooza n'obumanyirivu bwa buli kitundu. Bwe tukolera awamu n'abo abatakiikirirwa bulungi, tusobola okuleetawo embeera ey'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni watye ki ber bedo ikare me moko tam, omyero watam I kom tam mapat-pat ki jami ma otimme I kabedo acel-acel. Ka wacako tic ki dwon pa dano ma pe ki cungu pigi, watwero yubu kabedo ma opore pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna kotoma ainapeta wok nuka aitolomun aseununeta, ekot oni airereor aomisio nuegelegela ka akiro nuiswamasi kangin atutubet. Kowai lo aimorikikin itunga lu mam ebwoikitai ejok, ipedori oni aitolomun ejautene loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu kililiru e'yo ama ni peta pezu 'diyi ma alea, le ama ma ega e'yo ndundu 'ba dria ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. Geri 'bani o'duko 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria ku 'diyi ma ti pezu indi risi, ama eco angu 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ede kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza omu nkora yaitu y'okusharamu, twine kureeba emiteekateekyere etarikushushana hamwe n'oburemeezi bwa buri kicweka. Nitubaasa kureetaho oburinganiza turikwejunisa amajwi agatarikujwekyerwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: As the challenges facing our neighborhood continue to grow, it has become increasingly clear that fresh perspectives are essential for progress. Many residents feel that the current leadership is out of touch with the community's evolving needs.
lug_prompt: Ng'okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo mu kitundu kyaffe kweyongera okukula, kyeyoleka bulungi nti endowooza empya za mugaso mu nkulaakulana. Abatuuze bangi bawulira nti obukulembeze obuliwo kati tebukwatagana na byetaago by'ekitundu ebikyuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko matye I kabedo wa tye kamede ki dongo, nen atyer kamede ni tam manyen pire tek pi dongo lobo. Lutedero mapol gitye ki tam ni tela matye kombedi pe tye ka timo jami ma mite pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape ainingosia nuetereikina keda idunyet wok iyatakinos, ecai cut ebe aomisio nuitetiak ejokuka kanu apol. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam engarenone loejai kwana ejenete ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amavile angu ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu drile, e'bi eca e'dazaru kini egata o'diru 'diyi orodriru angu ezoma ni. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ega kini driceza curu'do ri econi e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza ko ku.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi oburi omu kicweka kyaitu ku burikuguma nibweyongyera, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu enteekateeka nsya n'ey'omugasho aha ntunguuka. Abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu obwebembezi oburiho hati tiburikuhikaana n'ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: As organizations evolve, the need for fresh perspectives becomes increasingly important. Embracing change often means welcoming individuals who can challenge the status quo.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bwe bikulaakulana, obwetaavu bw'endowooza empya bweyongera okuba obw'omugaso. Okwaniriza enkyukakyuka kitera okutegeeza okwaniriza abantu ssekinnoomu abasobola okusomooza embeera eriwo.
ach_prompt: Ka dul mapat-pat tye ka dongo, miti me neno jami manyen doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Jolo aloka-loka ipol kare te lokke ni jolo dano ma twero pyem ki jami matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kwape itopoloorete iriongeta, epol eipud loka aomisio nuitetiak. Aicam aijulanakineta apolouke aijaun itunga lu epedorete ainingosit ejautene loejai.
lgg_prompt: Amuti yini zoria, lezu egata o'diru 'diyi ma ovu orodriru tu. E'yo ojaza a'izu ri ma efi e'yo 'ba azi ecopi e'yo 'dupi curu'do 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi a'izu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ku birikugyenda nibikura, ekyetengo ky'ebiteekateeko ebisya nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Okwakiira empinduka nikimanyisa okutangirira abantu abarikubaasa kuhakanisa embeera eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges faced by many sectors, officials have recognized the importance of preserving cultural heritage. As a result, they have announced a series of initiatives aimed at bolstering the arts and cultural organizations.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko mu bitongole bingi, abakungu bakitegedde obukulu bw'okukuuma eby'obuwangwa. N'ekivuddemu, balangiridde enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebitongole by'ebyemikono n'ebyobuwangwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma dul mapat-pat tye kanongo cokcok-ki, lutic guniang ber pa gwoko jami me tekwaro. Macalo adwogi ne, gunyuto yub mapol ma tye ki miti me tyelo kor dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok me tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda iriongeta luipu, apotu eswamak kojenutu ajokis naka aidar inonosio. Kanuka ngun, alimoritos kesi ainapeta nuipu nu ekotore aitogogong iriongeta luka inonosio keda inonosio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi esu orodri e'yo suruni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi azi e'yo ndundu eyini lezu amuti e'yo suruni 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma okpo engazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya oburiho ebiro ebi omu bitongore bingi, abakungu bamanyire omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu,barangirire enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'emikono n'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and debates, the members of the committee reviewed various proposals for leadership selection. They recognized the importance of establishing a fair and effective process to ensure the best candidates were chosen.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, bammemba b'akakiiko beetegereza ebiteeso eby'enjawulo eby'okulonda abakulembeze. Baakitegeera obukulu bw'okuteekawo enkola ey'obwenkanya era ennungi okulaba ng'abeesimbyewo abasinga balondebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki laro lok mapol, lumemba me dul ne guneno tam mapat-pat makwako yer pa lutela. Gu niang ber pa yub maber me neno ni kiyero lutino kwan mabeco loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda ipegeta luipu, apotu imeeban luka ekomiti airereonorata aomisio nuegelegela nuka aseun engarenok. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka aitolomun ainapeta nuejokuka kanu awanyun ebe eseunono lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini agbatara angiri ma vutia, memba committee ni 'diyi andri egata ndundu drice'ba eyi opezu 'diyi ma ale ra. Eyi esu orodri 'bani geri kililiru azini kililiru 'diyi e'dozu nezu ra kini 'ba ope 'ba pa tupi muke ndeni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura munonga, ba memba b'akakiiko bakashwijuma ebiteiso bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikukwata aha kutoorana abebembezi. Bakareeba omugasho gw'okutaho enkora nungi n'oburingaaniza okureeba ngu abesimbireho abarikukirayo oburungi batooranwa.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure the smooth operation of the organization, it is essential to establish a clear support structure. This will enable the leaders to focus on their strategic responsibilities while delegating tasks effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti ekitongole kitambula bulungi, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola etegeerekeka obulungi ey'obuyambi. Kino kijja kusobozesa abakulembeze okussa essira ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'amaanyi ate nga bagabira abalala emirimu mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni dul ne tye ka tic maber, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me miyo kony matye atir. Man bikonyo lutela me keto cwinygi I kom tic gi kun bene gi poko tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iswamai erionget ejok, ejokuna aitolomun egangitok lu ecaete. Ebuni ngin aingarakin engarenok apodokinit aswamisineikec kosodete aikor aswamisinei ejok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ma azi ngazu kililiru, eri orodriru geri atita fezu 'diyi e'dozu kililiru. Diri nga fe drice'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma azi okporu 'diyi ma dria eyini azi eyi awazu geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu ekitongore nikikora kurungi, nikikuru kutaho enkora y'obuhwezi erikwetegyerezibwa gye. Eki nikiija kuhwera abebembezi kuta amaani aha bujunanizibwa bwabo oburikwetengwa kandi bakagabira abandi emirimo kurungi.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is crucial in guiding teams and organizations toward their goals. It requires a deep understanding of the needs and aspirations of those being led.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo mu kulambika ttiimu n'ebitongole okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byabwe. Kyetaagisa okutegeera ebyetaago n'ebiruubirirwa by'abo abakulemberwa.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pire tek tutwal I doro team ki dule me cobo miti gi. Mito niang matut tutwal I kom miti ki miti pa joo ma kitelo gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aingarenikin itimun keda iriongeta aitodolikin alosikinetekec. Ekoto amisiikin jokan ipudesia keda apeleikinata luka ngul luingarenikinitai.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru amuti azini amuti yi ma dri cezu e'yo yini lele 'diyi ma dria. Eri le vata kililiru e'yo 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma e'yo lepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho omu kwebembera tiimu n'ebitongore kuhika aha bigyendererwa byabyo. Nikyetenga okwetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo n'ebigyendererwa by'abo abarikutegyekwa.

eng_prompt: By fostering collaboration and open communication, the team has built a strong foundation. This collective strength will empower them to tackle obstacles effectively.
lug_prompt: Nga batumbula enkolagana n'empuliziganya ennungi, ttiimu ezimbye omusingi omunywevu. Amaanyi gano ag'awamu gajja kubawa amaanyi okulwanyisa ebizibu mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I dongo ribe ki lok maber, dul ne guyubu guti matek tutwal. Tek cwiny man bi minigi kero me lweny i kom peko ma tye.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitopolor aiswamanara keda einer, aduku etimu atukot naegogong noi. Agogong na nepepe ijaikini kesi apedor aitikitik atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti icita ni azini e'yo nzeza ngmboru ri ma omgbo otuza si, amuti 'da si e'yo okporu ni. Okpo tualu 'diri nga yi dri okpo fe e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'empurizagana, tiimu eyombekire omusingi gw'amaani. Amaani aga, nigeija kubongyera amaani g'okusingura oburemeezi omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership requires not only vision and strategy but also the ability to navigate interpersonal dynamics. In any organization, conflicts are inevitable, making it crucial for leaders to possess strong conflict resolution skills.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi tebwetaagisa kwolesebwa n'obukodyo byokka wabula n'obusobozi bw'okutambuza entambula y'abantu. Mu kitongole kyonna, obukuubagano tebuyinza kwewalibwa, ekireetera abakulu okubeera n'obukugu obw'amaanyi mu kugonjoola obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: Lutela mabeco pe omyero gubed ki neno ki diro keken ento bene omyero gubed ki kero me tic maber ikin dano. I dul mo keken, kuku-kuku bedo tye, ma weko pire tek tutwal ki lutela me bedo ki diro me tyeko kuku-kuku.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan mam ekoto aomisio keda acoasinei bon konye ekoto apedorit aitodolikin eipone lo itunga. Kotoma oriongeta kere, mam epedorio aisac ingungeta, ido erai ibore yenepol noi kanu engarenok ajaut keda acoa naepol noi naka aitemokin ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri le lu egata azini otita eyi ku te vini okpo e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Amuti dria ma alea, ngiringiri eyi e'yo eyi 'yepi ku 'diyi, e'yoni fezu drice'ba eyini aa'zu ondua okporu ngiringiri eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi, tiburikwetengyesa enteekateeka n'oburyo byonka, kureka n'obushoboorozi bw'okukoragana n'abantu. Omu kitongore kyona, entaro tizirikwetengwa, ekirikureetera abebembezi kugira emyoga y'amaani y'okushoborora entaro.

eng_prompt: In today's society, the intersection of politics and culture often leads to divisive debates. It's essential to recognize the distinct roles each plays in shaping our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, okukwatagana kw'ebyobufuzi n'ebyobuwangwa kitera okuvaako okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwawukana. Kya mugaso okutegeera emirimu egy'enjawulo buli omu gy'akola mu kubumba ebitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, ribbe pa lok me cungu iwi-bye ki tekwaro ipol kare kelo apoka-poka. Pire tek tutwal me niang tic mapat-pat ma ngat acel acel timo I dongo kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, aimorikikin naka epolitikis keda inonosio eyangaununei ipegeta luetiakatiaka. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun aswamisio nuegelegela nu iswamaete kanginitunganan kotoma aitolomun aiboisio wok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie ri ni tutuni e'yo agbatara awazu 'diyi eji. Eri orodriru azi ndu ndu 'ba alu alu ni nga ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma edeta ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, eby'obutegyeki hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa nibitera kureetaho okwahukaana. N'eky'omugasho kumanya emirimo y'omutaano ei buri omwe aine omu kutunguura ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: A leader's influence extends beyond their professional achievements; it is rooted in their personal integrity and values. By embodying principles of excellence and ethical behavior, leaders inspire others to follow suit.
lug_prompt: Obuyinza bw'omukulembeze busukka ku busobozi bwe obw'ekikugu; businziira ku bwesimbu bwe n'empisa ze. Abakulembeze bwe bayigiriza abalala empisa ennungi n'empisa ennungi, bakubiriza abalala okubagoberera.
ach_prompt: Twero pa latela pe aa ki I kom tic ma en otimo, ento aa ki I kom kit ma en timo kwede jami ki kit ma en winyo kwede. Lutela cuku cwiny luwotgi me lubu korgi ka gimiyo pwony me bedo ki kit maber.
teo_prompt: Apolou na engarenon erai naepol adepar aitodolikineta ke nuka aswam; erai naepol noi kotoma amunonoro ke keda iponesioke. Kowai lo aitodun iponesio luajokak ka iponesio luajokak, isinyikokitos engarenok luce atupakinit.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba eyi ma okpo aga e'yo eyini 'ye azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria; eri enga e'yo ada eyi ma ngulupi ni azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea. Drice'ba eyi geri eyini imbata fezu e'yo muke 'diyi ma dria azini adriza muke 'diyi ma dria risi, eyi ava fe 'ba azi 'diyini eyi ma vuti obizu indi.
nyn_prompt: Omugasho gw'omwebembezi, nigukira aha businguzi bwe omu by'emikono, nigwegamira obwesigwa bwe n'emitwarize ye. Abeebembezi ku barikworeka emicwe mirungi n'emitwarize mirungi, nibahiga abandi kukuratira.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the integrity of our democracy is paramount. To achieve this, we must establish guidelines that protect the rights of every citizen.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bwa demokulasiya waffe kye kisinga obukulu. Okutuukiriza kino, tulina okuteekawo ebiragiro ebikuuma eddembe lya buli munnansi.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa loc alwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me cobo man, omyero waket cik ma gwoko twero pa anywali acel-acel.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe ejokuna aseo naka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekot oni aitolomun ikisila lu eyuwarete apedorosio nuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amani lezu e'yo ama vile 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri eri orodriru tu. Di isuzu, le ama ma o'ba azita kari anzi dria eyi ma drilemgbo ma ta mbapi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obutegyeki bwaitu bigumire n'eky'omugasho munonga. Okuhikiiriza eki, twine kutaho ebiragiro ebirikurinda obugabe bwa buri mutuuragye.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the choice of leadership plays a crucial role in shaping the future. Engaging in the electoral process is essential for ensuring that capable individuals are given the opportunity to guide our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okulonda obukulembeze kukola kinene nnyo mu kukola ebiseera by'omu maaso. Okwenyigira mu nkola y'okulonda kya mugaso okulaba nti abantu abalina obusobozi baweebwa omukisa okulungamya ebitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, yer pa lutela obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yubu kwo me anyim. Bedo tye I yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal me neno ni kimiyo kare ki dano matye ki kero me doro kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, aseun engarenone erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomun ingaren. Ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aseo ejok kanu awanyun ebe ijaikitai itunga luepedorete aingarenikin itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba eyi ma peta ni azi okporu 'ye ewu drialeri ma edeta ma alea. Aa'ta e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba drileba fe 'ba ecopi ra 'diyini driceza fezu ongulumu amavile 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki,okutoorana omwebembezi nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutebeekanisa ebiro bya nyensya. Okwejumba omu by'oburuuru n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu abantu abarikubaasa baheebwa omugisha gw'okwebembera ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: True leadership is characterized by integrity and a commitment to the well-being of others. It involves guiding and supporting a team while prioritizing their needs over personal gain.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obutuufu bumanyibwa n'obwesimbu n'okwewaayo eri obulungi bw'abalala. Kizingiramu okulambika n'okuwagira ttiimu nga bakulembeza ebyetaago byayo okusinga okwefunira ebyabwe.
ach_prompt: Tela me ada obedo bedo ki ada ki keto cwiny I kom ber bedo pa joo mukene. Man kwako doro ki cwako dul pa dano kun iketo miti gi bedo mukwongo ma ka nongo magoba pa ngat acel acel.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai lo itodunit ebe ejai amunonoro ka ainakina kanu ajokis naka luce. Imoriarit aingarenikin keda aigangit etimu kopone lo aisingarenit ipudesia kec adepar ameda.
lgg_prompt: Driceza adari ma wura eri e'yo ada be azini asi feza e'yo muke 'ba azi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria. Eri ma alia driceza fezu azini atita fezu amuti yi dri yini afa yini lele 'diyi 'duzu okporu aga orodri yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi obwabuzima nibumanywa ahabw'obwesigwa n'okwehayo ahabw'oburungi bw'abandi. Nikitwariramu okuhabura n'okushagika tiimu obwo orikwebembeza ebyetengo byayo kukira ebyawe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote transparency and open dialogue, the candidate organized a press conference. He aimed to ensure that the media had a platform to voice their concerns and questions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obwerufu n'okuteesa mu lwatu, eyeesimbyewo yategeka olukungaana lwa bannamawulire. Yaluubirira okukakasa nti bannamawulire bafuna omukutu okwogera ebibaluma n'ebibuuzo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me kelo lok ada ki laro lok, lacungu ne oyubu kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya. En obedo ki miti me neno ni lucoo lok angea gubedo ki kabedo me lok I kom peko gi ki lapeny gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor aica ka aineranara, abu abwoan kitemok einer keda lu iyemuto. Alosikinet ke arai awanyun ebe ejaasi arotak iyemuto keda aiboisit na alimun akiro kec keda aingiseta kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo nzezu e'yo ada be azini e'yo nzezu e'yo ada be, 'ba pa sopi 'da otu e'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie. Eri le ndra ne ra kini 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma pari ci e'yo asi otiza yini azini zita yini 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburingaaniza n'empurizagana, oyesimbireho akatebekanisa orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru. Akagyezaho kureeba ngu abanyamakuru baine omwanya gw'okugamba ebirikubateganisa n'ebibuuzo byabo.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the bustling streets, I couldn't help but wonder about the unique characteristics that define urban life today. The blend of technology, culture, and architecture sparked my curiosity about contemporary urban environments.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ntambula mu nguudo ezirimu abantu abangi, nnali sisobola kwebuuza ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebiraga obulamu bw'omu bibuga leero. Okutwalira awamu tekinologiya, obuwangwa, n'ebizimbe byandeetera okwagala okumanya ebibuga ebiriwo mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I teng gudu ma dano dwong iye, pe atwero weko tamo I kom jami mapat-pat matye ka nyutu kwo me boma madongo I kare-ni. Ribbe pa tet manyen, tekwaro ki gedo okelo miti madit tutwal I kom kabedo me boma madongo me kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu, mam eong apedori aingitun nuikamunitos iponesio luitegelikina luitodunitos aijar naka itaunin ilolo. Aimorikikina naka etatai loakwana, inonosio keda aduketait abu koyangau eong eipud loka aingic aiboisio nuka itaunin luka apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria nzila ocuzaru 'diyi ma aliarisi, ma econi ndra e'yo ega e'yo wura ndu ndu o'bi eyini aa'zu aku amboru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo tekenologia ni, e'yo suruni 'diyi, tualu afa jo sizu 'diyi pie ri fe ma dri ava angu tawuni eyini aa'zu ewu curu'do ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto ezirimu abantu baingi, nkaba ntarikubaasa kureka kwebuuza aha bintu by'omutaano ebirikworeka amagara g'omu ndembo obwahati. Okutwarira hamwe tekinorogye, eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'ebyombeko, kikampa amatsiko g'okumanya ebirikukwata aha ndembo eziriho hati.

eng_prompt: Urban development plays a crucial role in economic growth. When cities are designed with foresight and strategic planning, they create an appealing environment for businesses and investors alike.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ebibuga ekola omulimu gwa maanyi mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. Ebibuga bwe bikolebwa n'obwegendereza n'enteekateeka ennungi, bitondawo embeera ennungi eri abasuubuzi n'abasiga nsimbi.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo I boma madongo konyo totwal I dongo lobo. Ka kiyubu citi ki tam matut dok ki yub maber, man kelo kabedo ma yomo cwiny lutim biacara ki luket lim I biyacara.
teo_prompt: Apol naka itaunin erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma apol naka ikapun. Arai kitemokitai isitei keda acoa naepol noi, itolomunenete kesi ejautene loibusakinit agwelanarak keda agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: Angu eyi ma ezota ni azi okporu nga zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea. Ba ka aku ambo eyi ede e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria, eyi angu ndrizaru tujari eyini tualu 'ba angu ezoma ejipi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka y'endembo neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya. Endembo ku zirikukorwa kurugiirira aha nteekateeka nungi, nizituma eby'obushubuzi hamwe n'abashubuzi bashemererwa.

eng_prompt: Establishing a new urban environment presents unique challenges and opportunities. What strategies and frameworks are necessary to effectively manage and nurture a burgeoning community?
lug_prompt: Okutondawo ebibuga ebipya kuleeta okusoomoozebwa n'emikisa egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Cako kabedo manyen I boma madongo kelo peko ki gum mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun aiboisit naitetet na otaun eyangauni atiokisio keda arerengesio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Angu o'diru tawuni ru 'diyi ma sita ni e'yo ewaru azini drileba ndu 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka orurembo orusya, nikireeta oburemeezi n'emigisha etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is crucial for the progress and stability of any country. With the right vision and policies, those in office can significantly influence the direction of their nation.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana n'obutebenkevu bw'eggwanga lyonna. N'endowooza n'enkola entuufu, abo abali mu woofiisi basobola okukyusa ennyo obukulembeze bw'eggwanga lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki kuc. Ki neno ki cik matir, joo matye I gangi tic gi twero kelo alokaloka I lobo gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda ainapakina naka akwap kere. Keda aomisio ka ainapeta nuajokak, epedorete ngul lu ejaas oyapesi aitodolikin eipone lo ebeitor akwap kec alosit.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru tu angu ezoma ni azini asianzu ni kari ciri ni. E'yo ndreza kililiru azini azita kililiru 'diyisi, 'ba opi dria 'diyi eco e'yo 'ye kari yini ma driceza ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'obutebekana bw'eihanga ryona. N'ekigyendererwa n'ebiragiro ebihikire, abo abari omu ofiisi nibabaasa kukora kihango aha ntwaza y'eihanga ryabo.

eng_prompt: When evaluating the potential for a region to elevate its administrative designation, various factors come into play. Understanding the criteria that define a city can help clarify the requirements for such a transition.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obusobozi bw'ekitundu okutumbula enkola yaakyo ey'obukulembeze, ensonga ez'enjawulo ziyingira mu nsonga. Okutegeera emitendera egilambika ekibuga kisobola okuyamba okulambika ebyetaago by'enkyukakyuka ng'eyo.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka niang kero pa twok piny moni me ilo rwom me tela ne, jami mapol tye. Niang kit ma city moni tye kwede twero konyo me niang jami ma mite pi aloka loka enoni.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aanyanar apedor na aiboisit aikeun adoketait na eyaitene ke, ipu akiro nuepedorete aingarakin. Amisikin iwaitin lu itetemete esite ingarakini ajenun iboro lu ekotoi kanu aijulakin kwape kangin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndundu eyi e'do e'yo angu azi ni ecozu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma ale andrizu. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba aku ambo ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo vazu ꞌdiyi eco ꞌba ma aza ko eꞌyo ꞌbani lezu yi ojazu ꞌdile ꞌdiyi ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: In the competitive landscape of politics, the ultimate goal is to secure the support of the electorate. When the results come in, the numbers reveal the stark reality of the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu byobufuzi ebirimu okuvuganya, ekigendererwa ekikulu kwe kufuna obuwagizi bw'abalonzi. Ebyava mu kunoonyereza bwe bifuluma, omuwendo gulaga obutuufu bw'embeera.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me pyem I lok me cungu iwi bye, miti madit en aye me nongo cwak pa lubol kwir. Ka adwogi ne obino, wel ne nyutu ada pa ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka epolitikis, alosikinet erai adumun agangat naka aseak. Karai elomunete akiro, itodunitos inaabai abeit naka ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala politiki ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo asizuri lezu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma atita esuzu. E'yo efupi 'diyi ka emu, kalafe yi e'da e'yo 'da ma e'yo adaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki ebirimu okuhayahayana, ekigyendererwa ky'ahamuheru n'okutunga obushagiki bw'abateezi b'akaruuru. Ebyarugiremu ku birikwija, omuhendo nigworeka amazima g'embeera.

eng_prompt: It's important to stay focused on your goals and not let outside opinions sway your confidence. Remember, every artist faces criticism at some point in their journey.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okussa ebirowoozo byo ku biruubirirwa byo n'obutaleka ndowooza za bweru kukyusa bwesige bwo. Jjukira, buli muyimbi ayolekaganye n'okunenya mu kiseera ekimu mu lugendo lwe.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me keto cwinyi I kom miti ni dok pe iwek tam ma aa ki woko obal gen ma itye kwede. Wii opo ni lugoo wee weng nongo koko ikare mo ikwo gi.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi asalakin itereikina keda apeleikinata kon ido mam icamakinit aomisio nuka akwapin nukokinga aitolitol aiyuunikon. Kiituni ebe edumunenete ayook kere aitoroneta kotoma orot kec.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru mi ma asi 'bazu e'yo mini lele 'diyi ma dria dika le mi ma fe e'yo 'ba amve 'diyi ni 'diyi ma nze mi ma asi ku. E'yo ega, 'ba dria ongo ngopi 'diyi e'yo 'bani eyi edezu 'diyi esu sa'wa azi eyini aa'zu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kuguma oteire amaani aha bigyendererwa byawe, otareka ebiteekateeko by'aheeru kukureetera kweyikiririzamu. Ijuka ngu buri muteezi w'ebishushani aine obu arikuhakanisibwa.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and injustices, it's essential to uphold our values. Remember, your voice can make a difference when you choose to advocate for fairness and integrity.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bwenkanya, kikulu nnyo okunywerera ku mpisa zaffe. Jjukira nti eddoboozi lyo lisobola okuleetawo enjawulo singa osalawo okulwanirira obwenkanya n'obwesimbu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki peko ki ngolo kop alenga, pire tek tutwal me gwoko jami ma pigi tego ma watye kwede. Wii opo ni dwon ni twero kelo aloka-loka kace imoko tammi me lweny pi ber bedo ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda atiokisio keda amumu, ejok aidar iponesio lukajokak. Kiituni ebe epedori eporoto kon aitolomun aijulanakineta arai igangit jo nuikamunitos etube loajokan ka abeit.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo liza kililiru ku 'diyi pie tre, eri orodriru amani e'yo amani 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo egazu, mi ma o'duko eco ojata eji ra eka le a'di 'di e'yo adaru azini e'yo ada be.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi n'obutari buringaaniza, n'eky'omugasho okugumizamu n'emitwarize yaitu. Ijuka, eiraka ryawe niribaasa kureetaho entaaniso waacwamu kurwanirira oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: As we navigate the complexities of modern society, it becomes increasingly clear that our actions and decisions have a profound impact on the future. Each choice we make today shapes the values and opportunities that will define the lives of those who come after us.
lug_prompt: Nga tutambula mu buzibu bw'abantu ab'omulembe guno, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebikolwa byaffe n'okusalawo birina kinene kye bikola ku biseera byaffe eby'omu maaso. Buli kusalawo kwe tukola leero kuteekawo empisa n'emikisa ebijja okusalawo obulamu bw'abo abajja oluvannyuma lwaffe.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka wot I kwo matek tutwal I kare-ni, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami ma watimo ki moko tamwa tye ki adwoki madit tutwal I kom anyim. Tam acel acel ma wamoko tin tye ki adwoki ne I kom jami ma pigi tego ki gum ma bikelo alokaloka I kwo pa jo ma bino ingeewa.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio alosit kotoma aijar naka itunga luakwana, ecai cut ebe aswamisiowok keda aseununeta wok ejaas keda epone loepol noi loepedoriata oni aswam koingaren. Ngin aseunet na iswamai oni ilolo itolomuni iponesio keda arerengesio nuepedorete aitodolikin aijar naka ngul lu epote alomun akaulo wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani e'yo ewaru ongulumu ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo amani 'ye azini peta amani pe 'diyi ma okpo ewu drialeri ma dria angiri. E'yo dria amani 'du andru 'diyi e'da orodri azini drileba 'ba emupi ama ma vutia 'diyi ma edri ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ku turikugyendera omu buremeezi bw'abantu ab'omurembe ogu, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu ebikorwa byaitu n'okucwamu kwaitu biine akakwate kahango aha biro byaitu by'omumaisho. Buri kimwe eki turikucwamu hati nikikora aha migasho n'emigisha erikwija kureetaho amagara g'abo abaraabeho bwanyima yaitu.

eng_prompt: In the small town, economic challenges have become increasingly evident. Many families struggle to make ends meet, leading to difficult choices about their basic needs.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono, okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna kweyongedde. Amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo, ekireetera okusalawo okukaluba ku byetaago byago ebikulu.
ach_prompt: I taun matino, peko me can lim tye ka medde. Gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi, ma oweko moko tam tek tutwal I kom jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi, apolor atiokisio nuka ikapun. Etionikinitos ikalia luipu kanu adumun iboro lu itwasamao, ido einakini ngin kesi aomisio nu etiono noi nuikamunitos ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi e'bi eca e'da saaru. Familia karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu eyini ani e'yo 'duzu e'yo eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ndembo nkye, oburemeezi omu by'entaasya bweyongyeire. Amaka maingi nigakora n'amaani okureeberera ebyetaago byago, ekirikubareetera okucwamu kubi aha bikwatiraine n'ebyetaago byabo eby'omugasho.

eng_prompt: When planning a new construction project, it's crucial to understand the costs involved. One of the significant expenses that often arises is hiring professional land surveyors.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oteekateeka pulojekiti y'okuzimba empya, kikulu okutegeera ssente ezizingirwamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebitera okusaasaanyizibwa kwe kupangisa abapunta b'ettaka abakugu.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yubu yub me gedo manyen, pire tek tutwal me niang wel cente ma mite. Acel me kin cente mapol ma mite obedo coyo lupim ngom ma ludiro.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitemonokin epurojekt lo aduko loitetet, ejokuna noi amisiikin etiai loka ikapun lu itwasamao. Adiopet koboro luitegelikina lu itwasamao erai aipagis itunga lu epirioitin lu engicete alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka otita afa sizu o'diru ni otu, eri orodriru e'yo aje ni 'diyi vazu. Aje azi okporu e'dopi sawa driasi 'diyi ma azi eri 'ba azi ngapi e'yo nyaku ma ale andripi 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka purogyekiti y'okwombeka, n'eky'omugasho kumanya enshohoza erimu. Omwe aha nshohoza y'amaani erikukira kubaho, n'okupangisa abakyebezi b'eitaka abakugu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve representation and address the needs of diverse communities, the Ugandan government has initiated a restructuring of electoral boundaries. This change aims to enhance political engagement and ensure that all voices are heard in the democratic process.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okukiikirira n'okukola ku byetaago by'ebitundu eby'enjawulo, gavumenti ya Uganda etandise okuddamu okutereeza ensalo z'ebyokulonda. Enkyukakyuka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula okwenyigira mu byobufuzi n'okukakasa nti amaloboozi gonna gawulirwa mu nkola ya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo rwom me cung ki tyeko miti pa lwak ma padi padi, gamente me Uganda ocako yubu wang lobo me yer. Aloka-loka man tye ki miti me medo rwom me donyo I lok me cungu iwi-bye ki neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo I yub me tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar abwoikinet ka aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luegelegela, abu apugan nako Uganda kogeu aijulakin ikoruo luka aseo. Alosikinet naka aijulanakineta ngun erai aitojokar epolitikis ka awanyun ebe epupokino iporotoi luka itunga kere kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'ba pa tuzu kililiru dika lezu e'yo lezu ongulumu ndundu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete Uganda niri e'do e'yo boda mile opetaa ni 'diyi ojazu o'diru. Ojata 'diri lezu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obwebembezi n'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe na emwe, gavumenti ya Uganda etandikireho okuhindura ensharo z'eby'oburuuru. Empindahinduka egi neegyenderera okwongyera amaani omu by'obutegyeki n'okureeba ngu amahurire ga buri omwe gahurirwa omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: I'm considering purchasing a property, and I want to ensure I understand all the associated costs. One of the key expenses I need to factor in is the land registration fee.
lug_prompt: Nze ndowooza ku ky'okugula ekizimbe, era njagala okukakasa nti ntegeera byonna ebizingirwamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bye nnina okulowoozaako bye bisale by'okuwandiisa ettaka.
ach_prompt: Atye katamo I kom wilo ot, dok amito niang wel cente weng ma mite. Acata acel ma pire tek ma omyero abed ki tam iye en aye cente me coyo ngom.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aomoom nu agwel aduketait, ido akoto eong aanyun ebe amisiikinit eong ikapun kere luebeit aitwasam. Adiopet koboro luibusakinit eong aomoom ngesi ikapun luka aiwadika alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ma e'yo ega lonyi ma jeza ma dria, ma le ne ra kini ma e'yo dria aje 'dipi 'diyi va ra. Aje azi okporu mani le ma ma 'du e'yo ma alia 'diyi ma azi eri aje nyaku ma ru sizaniri'i.

eng_prompt: Accurate land assessment is crucial for property development and legal purposes. To achieve this, professionals in the field utilize specialized tools and techniques.
lug_prompt: Okukebera obulungi ettaka kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'ebyobugagga n'ebigendererwa by'amateeka. Okutuukiriza kino, abakugu mu nsonga eno bakozesa ebikozesebwa n'obukodyo obw'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain a safe and just society, it is crucial for individuals to take an active role in identifying and addressing misconduct. By doing so, we can help ensure that those who violate laws and ethical standards are held accountable for their actions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma ekitundu ekirimu obwenkanya n'obutebenkevu, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu okwenyigira mu kuzuula n'okukola ku bikolwa ebibi. Mu kukola ekyo, tusobola okukakasa nti abo abatyoboola amateeka n'emitindo gy'empisa bavunaanibwa olw'ebikolwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo I kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal ni dano acel acel omyero gutim tic matek me niang ki lweny i kom tim maraco. I timo meno, watwero neno ni joo ma turu cik ki cik me kwo gi ki ngolo kop iwi gi pi tim gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aiboisit na eyuara ido na ejok, ejokuna noi itunga aswam kagogong kanu ajenun ka aitemokin iponesio luarokok. Kowai lo aswam ngun, ipedori oni aanyun ebe ngul lu ebilibilete ikisila keda iponesio lukajokak itoroniaritai kanu aswamisiokec.

nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kurinda obusingye n'oburinganiza omu bantu, nikikuru munonga abantu okukora omurimo gw'okumanya n'okutereeza emicwe mibi. Omu kukora ekyo, nitubaasa kureeba ngu abo abarikuhenda ebiragiro n'emitindo y'emitwarize, nibajunanizibwa ahabw'ebikorwa byabo.

eng_prompt: Before starting a construction project, it's essential to understand the boundaries and topography of the land. This leads to the question: what requirements are needed for a land survey?
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika pulojekiti y'okuzimba, kikulu okutegeera ensalo n'engeri ettaka gye lifaananamu.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icako yub me gedo, pire tek tutwal me niang wang lobo ki kit ma ngom tye kwede.

lgg_prompt: E'yo angu jeza ma dria 'diyi ma alia, e'yo otuza azini ti ecita ma esele ndu ndu yi indi. E'yo azi 'bani 'ye tualu tujari 'diyi ma alea ri eri drilemgbo 'ba ma ngulupi niri ojazu.

eng_prompt: In many regions, securing property rights is essential for landowners to ensure their investments are protected. To formalize their ownership, they must navigate the registration process.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna eddembe ly'obwannannyini kyetaagisa nnyo eri bannannyini ttaka okukakasa nti eby'obugagga byabwe bikuumibwa. Okukakasa obwannannyini bwabwe mu butongole, balina okuyita mu mitendera gy'okuwandiisa.

lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, drilemgbo nyaku ei eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru eyini ani nezu ra kini eyi ma lonyi lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ma tambaza ci. E'yo yi ma ngulupi niri 'bazu azita palaa, le yi ma aci geri ru siza ni 'diyi ma alea ra.

eng_prompt: In the ever-evolving landscape of education, the role of teachers has become increasingly complex and demanding. As advocates for their profession, educators often seek collective support to address their challenges and concerns.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyenjigiriza ekyukakyuka buli kaseera, omulimu gw'abasomesa gweyongedde okuba omuzibu n'okusaba. Ng'abalwanirizi b'omulimu gwabwe, abasomesa batera okunoonya obuyambi obw'awamu okusobola okukola ku kusoomoozebwa n'okweraliikirira kwabwe.

lug_prompt: Okusalawo kwonna okukulu kukolebwa mu woofiisi enkulu. N'olw'ekyo, okuteekebwa mu nkola kw'obukodyo buno kuddukanyizibwa mu kitundu.

nyn_prompt: Okusharaho kw'amaani kwona nikukorerwa aha ofiisi enkuru. N'ahabw'ekyo, okuta omu nkora enteekateeka ezi, nikukorwa omu byaro.

lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna oba ekitundu, kyetaagisa okumanya nti emirimu egy'enjawulo gyeetaaga obukugu obw'enjawulo n'endowooza ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, okulondebwa kw'abakulembeze kutera okwawukana okusinziira ku buvunaanyizibwa obwenjawulo bwe balina okutuukiriza.

lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde enkyukakyuka ez'amangu n'ebintu ebitasuubirwa, kya mugaso nnyo okutambula mu bizibu by'obulamu. Nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa n'emikisa egy'enjawulo, okwetegekera n'obwegendereza kifuuka kikulu.

eng_prompt: When individuals share similar goals and aspirations, they often seek ways to amplify their voices and strengthen their impact. One effective method of achieving this is through the formation of a union.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe bagabana ebiruubirirwa n'ebiruubirirwa ebifaanagana, banoonya engeri z'okutumbula amaloboozi gaabwe n'okunyweza enkola yaabwe. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kuyita mu kukola omukago.

eng_prompt: As discussions about educational policies and teacher rights continue to evolve, many are questioning the influence of organized labor in schools. Understanding the function and impact of these organizations is crucial for educators and policymakers alike.
lug_prompt: Nga okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mateeka g'ebyenjigiriza n'eddembe ly'abasomesa kweyongera okukula, bangi babuusabuusa amaanyi g'abakozi abategekeddwa mu masomero. Okutegeera emirimu n'ebikosa ebitongole bino kya mugaso nnyo eri abasomesa n'abakola amateeka.

teo_prompt: Kwape ineresinei nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka asioman keda apedorosio nuka isisianakinak inyikokinitos aijulakin, itunga luipu epodokitos nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan kosomeroi. lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara ni azita onita ni azini drilemgbo imba'ba eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ni mu drile, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo 'ba azi ngapi sukulu eyi ma alea 'diyiniri ma dria. lug_prompt: Obulamu bujjudde ebintu bye tutasuubira ebiyinza okukyusa endowooza yaffe. Ebiseera ebisinga, kyetaagisa ekintu eky'omugaso okutuleetera okutegeera obukulu bw'amazima agamu.
ach_prompt: Kwo opong ki jami ma pe wageno ma twero loko kit ma waneno kwede jami. Pol kare, mite ni gin mo otimme ma pire tek wek waniang ber pa lok ada mogo.
teo_prompt: Ileleba aijar keda iboro lumam iwomit oni ebe epedorete aijulakin aomisio wok. Apakio nuipu, eyangaikini ibore yen epol ajokis kanu aisisianakin oni ajokis naka akiro ace nuka abeit.
lgg_prompt: Idri ga e'yo 'bani ega kokoru ecopi ama ma egata ojapi ra 'diyi si tre. Sa'wa driasi, eri 'du e'yo azi okporu ni fezu ama ni e'yo ada azi 'diyi ma orodri isuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amagara gaijwire ebintu ebitarikuteekateekwaho ebirikubaasa kuhindura enteekateeka yaitu. Obwire obwingi, nikitwara ekintu ky'omugasho kutureetera kumanya omugasho gw'amazima agamwe.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing educational landscape, many educators are facing unprecedented challenges that threaten the integrity of their profession. It is crucial for teachers to unite and advocate for their rights and the future of education.
lug_prompt: Mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenjigiriza eya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, abasomesa bangi boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo okuteeka ekitiibwa ky'omulimu gwabwe mu matigga. Kya mugaso nnyo abasomesa okwegatta n'okulwanirira eddembe lyabwe n'ebiseera by'ebyenjigiriza eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok me kwan tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, lupwonye mapol gitye ka nongo peko ma peya otimme ma kelo peko i kom tic gi. Pire tek tutwal ki lupwonye me ribe kacel me lweny pi twero gi ki anyim pa kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka asioman loka lolo, ejaas isisianakinak luipu keda atiokisio nuepedorete aimusung aswamukec. Erai ibore yenepol noi isisianakinak aimorikikin kosodete aigang apedorosio kec keda oingaren naka asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni curu'do oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyini esu ku 'diyi esu eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra. Eri orodriru imba'ba eyini ti ecita ejizu azini a'di 'dizu drilemgbo eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu ewu drialeri ma alea onita ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese ebirikuhinduka juba, abegyesa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi obutarikubaho oburikuteganisa omurimo gwabo. N'eky'omugasho munonga abegyesa okukwatanisa n'okurwanirira obugabe bwabo hamwe n'ebiro bya nyensya by'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In the complex landscape of education, various roles contribute to the development and growth of students. Among these roles, teachers play a crucial part in delivering knowledge and fostering learning experiences.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyenjigiriza enzibu, emirimu egy'enjawulo giyamba ku nkulaakulana n'okukula kw'abayizi. Mu mirimu gino, abasomesa bakola omulimu omukulu mu kubunyisa amagezi n'okutumbula eby'okuyiga.
ach_prompt: I rwom me kwan ma tek tutwal, tic mapat-pat konyo dongo pa lutino kwan. I kin tic magi, lupwonye timo tic mapire tek tutwal I poko ngec ki dongo kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka asioman nuetioko, aswamisinei nuegelegela ingarakinete apol keda apol naka esisiak. Kotoma aswamisinei nu, isisianakinak iswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma aitodolikin acoa ka aitopoloria aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onitani 'diyi ma alea, azi ndundu eyi fe sukulu anzi eyini zozu azini zozu. Azi 'diyi ma eselea, imba'ba eyi azi okporu ni nga ondua fezu azini e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese ebitarikwetegyerezibwa, emirimo etarikushushana neehwera omu kutunguuka n'okukura kw'abeegi. Omu mirimo egi, abegyesa nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhisya obwengye n'okwegyesa abantu.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing labor market, the role of unions has come under scrutiny. It is essential to evaluate their effectiveness in advocating for workers' rights and improving conditions.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'abakozi ak'ennaku zino akakyuka amangu, omulimu gw'ebibiina by'obwegassi guzze mu kwekenneenya. Kya mugaso okwekenneenya obulungi bwabwe mu kulwanirira eddembe ly'abakozi n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok pa lutic tye ka lokke oyot-oyot tutwal, tic pa dul mapat-pat tye ka keng. Pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma tic gi tye ka tic kwede me lweny pi twero pa lutic ki yubu kwo pa lutic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka eswamak lolo, eutai airereor aswam naka atukona nuka itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi airereor eswamae kec kotoma aigang apedorosio nuka eswamak keda aitojokar ejautene lo itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi'ba eyini ojazu mbeleru ewu 'disi ri ma alea, azi amuti eyivile 'diyini ri eca e'yo eti ondaza ma alea. Eri orodriru 'bani ecozu eyi ma okpo onezu e'yo azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma drilemgbo a'di 'dizu azini geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'empinduka y'amaani omu by'emirimo, omurimo gw'ebibiina by'abakozi gugyenzire nigushwijumwa. N'eky'omugasho okushwijuma oburemeezi bwabo omu kurwanirira obugabe bw'abakozi n'okutunguura emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, businesses must adapt to stay relevant. Embracing unconventional ideas can lead to groundbreaking solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, bizinensi zirina okukyusakyusa okusobola okusigala nga za mugaso. Okukkiriza endowooza ez'enjawulo kisobola okuleetawo eby'okugonjoola eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni, biacara omyero olokke wek omedde anyim. Jolo tam ma padi padi twero kelo yoo manyen me cobo peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ekot ibiasaran aijulanakin kanu asalakin epol ajokis. Aingarakin aomisio nuitegelikina epedori ayangaun aitemokineta nuitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, le tujari eyi ma oja eyi ra eyini ani aa'zu orodriru. Egata o'diru 'diyi atizu ri eco fe 'bani e'yo eyi ma aza kozu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, bizinesi zishemereire kukora empindahinduka kwenda kuguma nizikora. Okwakiira ebiteekateeko ebitari bya butoosha nikibaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: With the rising cost of living and stagnant salaries, many educators are finding it increasingly difficult to make ends meet. As a result, diversifying their income streams has become a practical necessity.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya n'emisaala okuyimirira, abasomesa bangi bakisanze nga kizibu okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, okugaziya ensibuko z'ensimbi zaabwe kifuuse kyetaago.
ach_prompt: Ki mede pa wel cente me kwo ki mucara matye kamede, lupwonye mapol tye kanongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, medo yoo gi me nongo cente odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Keda aijar naepol noi keda eropit loepol noi, etionikinit isisianakinak luipu aijar. Kanuka ngun, apolor ewai lo edumunenete kesi ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Aje idri nyazani tuzu uru azini musara yini pa sozuri ma e'yosi, imba'ba karakara yi e'yo esu ewaru yi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi, geri yini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eca curu'do orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera hamwe n'emishaara y'abeegyesa kweyongyera kweyongyera, abegyesa baingi nibashanga oburemeezi bw'okwebaisaho. N'ekyarugiremu, okukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe okutunguura entaasya yaabo, kihindukire ekyetengo ky'amaani.

eng_prompt: As urban living becomes more prevalent, many individuals are seeking ways to connect with nature. One popular trend is the cultivation of personal green spaces within residential areas.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubeera mu bibuga kweyongera, abantu bangi banoonya engeri y'okukwatagana n'obutonde. Omuze ogumanyiddwa ennyo kwe kulima ebifo ebirabika obulungi mu bifo by'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano tye ka kwo i boma, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me kube ki cwec ma orumuwa. Yub acel ma oywek tutwal en aye bedo ki kabedo kama dano bedo iye.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejai aiboi otaun, eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio luka arucokina keda isuban luka Edeke. Idiopebore yen ejenara noi ngesi akoru aiboisio nuka itunga kotoma aiboisio nu iboyei.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ni tu uru, 'ba karakara eyi geri nda eyi ecizu e'yo nyakuni 'diyi pie. E'yo azi 'ba eyini le saaru ri eri angu eyi ma ngulupi eyini 'diyi ezozu angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okutuura omu ndembo kwayeyongyera, abantu baingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okukwatanisa n'obuhangwa. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga n'okuhinga emyanya y'obuhangwa omu myanya y'obutuuro.

eng_prompt: The management and conservation of Uganda's natural resources are crucial for sustainable development. Understanding the responsibilities of various organizations is essential, particularly the National Forest Authority.
lug_prompt: Enkwata n'okukuuma eby'obugagga bya Uganda eby'obutonde bikulu nnyo mu nkulaakulana ey'olubeerera. Okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ebitongole eby'enjawulo kya mugaso naddala ekitongole ky'ebibira mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ki gwoko lonyo ma lobo Uganda tye kwede pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo matye kamede anyim. Niang tic pa dul mapatpat pire tek tutwalle dul me National Forestry Authority.
teo_prompt: Aidar keda aidar isuban luka Edeke eraasi nuepolok noi kanu apol naejok. Amisiikin aswamisinei nuka iriongeta luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kacut erionget loka amagoron.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi nyakuni Ugandaa 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. Azi amuti ndundu eyi ma dria ri ma vata eri orodriru tuni amuti National Forestry Authority niri.
nyn_prompt: Okureeberera n'okurinda eby'obuhangwa bwa Uganda n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka erikugumaho. Okwetegyereza obujunanizibwa bw'ebitongore ebitarikushushana n'eky'omugasho, okukira munonga ekitongore ky'amahamba.

eng_prompt: In discussions about the role of security in society, some argue that its presence can create a sense of order and control. However, this raises an important question about the ethical implications of using security measures as a means of coercion.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mugaso gw'obukuumi mu bantu, abamu bagamba nti okubeerawo kwabwo kusobola okuleetawo entegeka n'obuyinza. Newankubadde, kino kireetawo ekibuuzo ekikulu ku buzibu obuli mu kukozesa ebyokwerinda ng'engeri y'okukaka.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom tic pa gwoko kuc I kabedo wa, jo mukene giwaco ni bedo tye ne twero kelo ber bedo ki twero. Kadi bed kumeno, man kelo lapeny mapire tek tutwal I kom adwoki me tic ki jami me gwoko kuc macalo yoo me diyo dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemitem nuikamunitos aswam naka ayuwara kotoma atutubet, icetunga ebakasi ebe epedori ajaut ke ayangaun ainapakina keda apedor. Konye, eyangauni ngin aingiset naepol noi naikamunit atiokisio nuka aitwasam ayuwara kwape epone loka abuikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza e'yo azi ageitema ni ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azi 'diyi 'yo kini eri ma aa'ta ni e'yo otuza azini okpo fe. Kani si, e'yo 'di eji zita azi orodriru e'yo onzi 'bani e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ayuzu okpo fezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura aha mugasho gw'eby'okwerinda omu bantu, abamwe nibagira ngu okubaho kwabyo nikubaasa kureetaho entebekanisa n'obutegyeki. Kwonka eki nikireetaho ekibuuzo ky'omugasho aha bikwatiraine n'okukoresa eby'okwerinda nk'omuringo gw'okugyemesereza.

eng_prompt: The foundation of human civilization has long relied on the cultivation of crops and the raising of livestock. As a result, the majority of agricultural activities take place on arable land.
lug_prompt: Omusingi gw'empukuuka y'abantu okuva edda gwesigamye ku kulima ebirime n'okulunda ebisolo. N'ekivuddemu, ebyobulimi ebisinga bikolebwa ku ttaka eririme.
ach_prompt: Guti me dongo lobo pa dano ocung pi kare malac tutwal I kom pur ki gwoko lee. Macalo adwogi ne, pol pa tic me pur time I ngom ma opore me pur.
teo_prompt: Ageunet naka aijar naka itunga erai akoru inyamat keda aipit ibaren. Kanuka ngun, aswamisinei nuipu nuka akor iswamao toma alupok nu epedorio akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba ada eyini aa'zu ewu driori ma alea ri e'bi aa e'yo ori ezoza ni azini anyapa ta mbaza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi ma pari yi pari 'du angu ori ezozaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omusingye gw'obuhangwa bw'abantu gutwire nigwegamira okuhinga n'okuriisa amatungo. N'ekyarugiremu,emirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa erikukira obwingi neekorwa ahaitaka eririkubaasa kuhinga.

eng_prompt: Instilling a love for learning in young minds is crucial for their development. One effective way to achieve this is by actively involving them in their educational journey.
lug_prompt: Okussa okwagala okusoma mu birowoozo by'abaana abato kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana yaabwe. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kubayingiza mu by'enjigiriza byabwe.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo lutino me maro kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo gi. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man en aye me bedo tye ikwan gi.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun amin na aisisia kanejaas idwe erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol kec. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aibwaikin kes toma asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo leta onitaniri 'bazu 'ba oderu 'diyi ma omi ma alia ri eri orodriru eyini zozu. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri eyini eyi suzu e'yo onita ni eyini 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa abaana okukunda okwega n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka yaabo. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okubetaba omu kwega kwabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, humans have relied on various sources to sustain themselves. Meeting our nutritional requirements is essential for survival and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu beesigamye ku bintu eby'enjawulo okweyimirizaawo. Okutuukiriza ebyetaago byaffe eby'endya kya nkizo mu kuwangaala n'obulamu obulungi okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, dano gubedo ka jenge I kom jami ma pat pat me gwoko kwo gi. Cobo miti me cam ma wamito pire tek tutwal pi kwo ki bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, ejarete itunga keda iboro luegelegela kanu aijar. Aitodolikin ipudesiawok luka ainyam ejok kanu aijar keda aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driorisi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ebi aa geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ma edri ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria. Nyaka nyaza amani lele 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru aa'zu edriru azini aa'zu muke.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibegamira aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe kugira ngu babaase kwebaisaho. Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo byaitu by'eby'okurya n'eky'omugasho aha magara gaitu.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various governments have implemented policies that prioritize development and infrastructure over individual property rights. This often leads to controversial actions that impact the lives of many citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, gavumenti ez'enjawulo zitadde mu nkola enkola ezikulembeza enkulaakulana n'ebizimbe okusinga eddembe ly'obwannannyini. Kino kitera okuvaako ebikolwa ebirimu enkaayana ebikosa obulamu bwa bannansi bangi.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, gamente mapat-pat oketo cik mapat-pat maketo dongo lobo ki gedo bedo gin ma pire tek loyo twero pa dano me bedo ki jami gi. Man ipol kare kelo tim ma kelo apoka-poka ma balo kwo pa anywali mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, apuganisinei nuegelegela etolomutu ainapeta nu isingarenitos apol keda adukena adepar apedorosio nuka itunga. Eyangauni na duc aswamisio nu engunget nu itolitolete aijar naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, gamete ndundu eyi e'do azita eyi e'yo angu ezoma ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria okporu ndeni aga drilemgbo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe e'yo ngiringiri ru kari anzi karakara eyi ma edri eyi 'yepi ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona,gavumenti ezitarikushushana ziteire omu nkora engyenderwaho erikwebembeza entunguuka n'ebyombeko kukira obugabe bw'ebintu. Eki nikikira kureetaho ebikorwa ebirikuteganisa amagara g'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the involvement of citizens in governance is essential for ensuring accountability and representation. This principle is enshrined in various laws and regulations that promote civic engagement.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okwetaba kwa bannansi mu bukulembeze kwa mugaso nnyo mu kukakasa embalirira n'okukiikirirwa. Omusingi guno guli mu mateeka n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo ebitumbula okwenyigira kw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo tye pa anywali I tela obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng tye ki kor gi. Cik man tye I cik mapat-pat ma cuku cwiny lwak me timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ibusakinit itunga ajaut toma opugae loajokan kanu aanyun ebe ejaasi kesi keda abwoikinitokokec. Ejaasi ainapeta ngun toma okisila luegelegela lu isinyikokitos itunga aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, kari anzi eyi ma pa tuzu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ma dria. Ba e'yo 'di 'ba azita ndundu azini azita o'bale o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, okwejumba kw'abantu omu bwebembezi n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu hariho embaririra n'okujwekyerwa. Omusingye ogu guri omu mateeka gatari gamwe na gamwe agarikuhwera abantu kwejumba omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and promote sustainable practices, local authorities have announced new initiatives. As part of these efforts, they have decided to allocate specific areas for reforestation projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okutumbula enkola eziwangaala, ab'obuyinza mu byalo balangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, basazeewo okuwaayo ebifo eby'enjawulo ku pulojekiti z'okuzzaawo ebibira.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki medo rwom me tic maber, lutela me tedero gucwalo lok angeya manyen. Macalo but yub eni, gumoko tamgi me poko kabedo mogo pi yub me roco bunga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aitopolor iponesio luajokak, alimor apedorosio nuka atutubena nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, aseutu kesi aijaikin aiboisio ace kanu aitikitik ikito.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika lezu 'yeta ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Okpo 'diyi ma azi ru, eyi 'du e'yo angu azi 'diyi 'bazu otita pati saza ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okureetaho enkora nungi, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro batongoize enteekateeka nsya. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, bacwiremu kutaho emyanya y'okutamu emiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect biodiversity and promote sustainable land use, the government has implemented various conservation strategies. One key initiative involves the establishment of protected areas to safeguard natural resources.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obutonde obw'enjawulo n'okutumbula enkola ennungi ey'okukozesa ettaka, gavumenti etaddewo enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okukuuma obutonde. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa kwe kuteekawo ebifo ebikuumibwa okukuuma eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki medo rwom me tic ki ngom, gamente okatti ki yoo mapat-pat me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo yubu kabedo ma ki gwoko pi gwoko jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na ayuarite iboro luegelegela ka aitopolor aitwasam alupok ejok, etolomu apugan iponesio luegelegela luka aidar alupok. Alosikinet adiope naepol noi imoriarit aitolomun aiboisio nu eyuaritai kanu aidar isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini e'yo nyaku ayuza kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'ba geri karakara eyi e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'ye ri ma azi angu ta mbazani 'diyi sizu afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okureetaho enkora nungi y'eitaka, gavumenti eteire omu nkora oburyo bwingi bw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. Ekigyendererwa kimwe ekikuru n'okutandikaho emyanya y'okurinda eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with climate change and urban expansion, the importance of maintaining our natural ecosystems has never been clearer. However, the task of safeguarding these vital resources is fraught with difficulties.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi erwanagana n'enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okugaziwa kw'ebibuga, omugaso gw'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi yaffe tegubangako nga kati. Newankubadde, omulimu gw'okukuuma ebintu bino ebikulu gujjudde obuzibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki alokaloka me piny ki dongo pa boma madongo, ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa tye ka nen maber tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, tic me gwoko jami ma pigi tego magi tye ki peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda apol naka itaunin, mam ajokis naka aidar isuban luka Edeke ejenuna noi. Konye, aswam naka aidar iboro lu epol ajokis ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be tualu angu tawuni eyini tuzu ri be, orodri afa amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria ri e'bi ovu ewakokoru ndeni. Kani si, azi afa orodriru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia e'yo ewaru yi tre.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwanagana n'empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'okutunguuka kw'endembo, omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa byaitu tigurabaireho. Kwonka, omurimo gw'okurinda ebintu ebi ebikuru, gurimu oburemeezi bwingi.

eng_prompt: When community members feel threatened by aggressive behavior, it undermines their sense of safety. This atmosphere of fear can lead to a breakdown in trust among neighbors.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu bwe bawulira nga batiisibwatiisibwa olw'enneeyisa ey'obukambwe, kityoboola obutebenkevu bwabwe. Embeera eno ey'okutya esobola okumalawo obwesige mu baliraanwa.
ach_prompt: Ka dano me kabedo giwinyo lworo pi tim gero, man balo ber bedo gi. Lworo man twero balo gen ikin jirani.
teo_prompt: Arai epupete itunga luka atutubet aitukurian kanu iponesio lu amumu, itolitoli ngin ayuwara kec. Ejautene lo loka akuriau epedori ayangaun amamus amunokina kanejaas idunyeta.
lgg_prompt: Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ka aa orisi adriza e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyisi, eri eyi ma ageitema esi. Angu uri ni 'diri eco fe asi'baza ma ako jo ejele eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omukyanga ku barikwehurira batiinisiibwe engyesho mbi, nikibamaraho oburinzi. Omwanya gw'okutiina ogu nigubaasa kureetaho okwerarikirira omu bataahi.

eng_prompt: Many people recognize the importance of trees in maintaining ecological balance. In addition to their environmental benefits, the cultivation of trees has become a profitable industry.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bakimanyi nti emiti gya mugaso mu kukuuma obutonde. Ng'oggyeko emigaso gyayo eri obutonde bw'ensi, okulima emiti kufuuse mulimu oguleeta amagoba.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gingeyo ber pa yadi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Medo i kom ber pa yadi i kom cwec ma orumuwa, puru yadi dong odoko biacara ma kelo magoba madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejenete itunga luipu ajokis naka ikito kanu aidar aiboisio nu akwap. Kilema ajokis naka ejautene lo akwap, akoru na ikito erai na ejai ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ni orodri pati eyini aa'zu angu eyi ma eselea ri ma tambazu ri ra. Orodri yini angu ama agei ri ma alia 'diyi ma drilea, pati ezoza eca curu'do okalamvu orodriruni ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibamanya omugasho gw'emiti omukureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Okwongyera aha migasho yaabo aha buhangwa bw'ensi, okuhinga emiti kihindukire ekitongore ekirikureeta amagoba.

eng_prompt: As urban areas continue to expand and birth rates rise, communities are experiencing significant demographic shifts. This surge in population density creates a pressing need for essential resources such as food, water, and housing.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okugaziwa n'omuwendo gw'abaana abazaalibwa okulinnya, ebitundu bifuna enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw'abantu. Okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu kuleetawo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ebintu ebikulu ng'emmere, amazzi n'amayumba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kabedo me boma tye ka dongo dok wel lutino ma nywal tye ka medde, wel dano tye ka loke tutwal I kabedo mapatpat. Medde pa wel dano eni kelo miti matek tutwal I kom jami mapigi tego calo cam, pii ki gangi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aiyatakin keda aiboisio nu imukerun aiyatakin, ejaas itunga keda aijulanakineta nuepolok nuka itunga. Apol naka itunga luipu einakini itunga eipud loka iboro kwape nat inyamat, akipi keda itogoi.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni mu drile tuzu azini kalafe anzi osizu ri ni tuzu, ongulumu eyi ojata 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni 'diyi esu. E'yo 'ba eyini tuzu 'dileri ni fe 'ba eyini afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru ekile nyaka le, yi le azini jo le 'diyi le mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Obururembo ku burikugumizamu nibweyongyera kandi n'omuhendo gw'abaana abarikuzaarwa nigweyongyera, ebyanga nibibonabona empindahinduka y'amaani omu bantu. Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu nikureetaho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'ebintu ebikuru nk'eby'okurya, amaizi n'amaju.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and preserve biodiversity, many countries are implementing policies to protect their natural resources. One such country is Uganda, which has recognized the importance of its forest ecosystems.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okukuuma obutonde, ensi nnyingi zissa mu nkola enkola okukuuma eby'obugagga byayo eby'obutonde. Erimu ku mawanga ng'ago ye Uganda, ekitegedde obukulu bw'obutonde bw'ensi bwayo obw'ebibira.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki gwoko jami makwo, lobe mapol tye ka keto cik me gwoko jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo. Lobo acel ma kit meno obedo Uganda, ma oniang ber pa bunga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aidar iboro luegelegela, eutasi akwapin nuipu aitegear ainapeta nu ayuarite iborokec luka Edeke. Adiopet akwap kwape kangin ngesi Uganda, lo ejenunit ajokis naka aiboisio nuka amagoron.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu, kari karakara eyi azita eyi 'ba e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu. Kari alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi kari Uganda niri'I. Kari 'di esu orodri afa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okurinda eby'obuhangwa, amahanga maingi gariyo nigakora ebiragiro by'okurinda eby'obuhangwa bwago. Eihanga rimwe nk'eryo ni Uganda, erikwetegyereza omugasho gw'obuhangwa bw'amahamba gaayo.

eng_prompt: Protecting our natural resources is essential for maintaining biodiversity and ensuring sustainable ecosystems. Therefore, it is crucial to educate citizens about the importance of designated forest reserve areas.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma eby'obugagga byaffe eby'omu ttaka kya nkizo mu kukuuma obutonde bw'ensi. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso nnyo okusomesa bannansi ku mugaso gw'ebifo ebiterekeddwa ebibira.
ach_prompt: Gwoko cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa kabedo ma kiyubu pi gwoko bunga.
teo_prompt: Aidar iboro lu isuban luka Edeke erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iboro lu isuban luka Edeke. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka aiboisio nuka amagoron.
lgg_prompt: Afa amavile nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru kari anzi eyini imbata fezu orodri angu jere eyi ma tambazu 'diyini ci 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda ebintu byaitu eby'obuhangwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kwegyesa abantu omugasho gw'emyanya y'amahamba.

eng_prompt: It is important for the community to respect designated areas for public use. Encroaching on these spaces can lead to legal issues and disrupt local governance.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso abantu mu kitundu okussa ekitiibwa mu bifo ebyateekebwawo okukozesebwa abantu bonna. Okuyingirira ebifo bino kiyinza okuvaako ensonga z'amateeka n'okutaataaganya enfuga y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lwak me woro kabedo ma kiyubu pi tic pa lwak. Donyo I kabedo magi twero kelo peko me cik ki balo tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga ayongite aiboisio nu itwasamao itunga. Aibiror aiboisio nu epedori ayangaun akiro nu ikisila ka aitolitol epugae lo okwap.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru ongulumu eyini inzita fezu angu 'bani ope o'bi eyini 'diyi dri. E'yo fizu angu 'diyi ma alea ri eco e'yo azita palaa 'diyi eji dika eco driceza angu 'da ma alea ri eza ra.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and careful cultivation, the crops have reached their peak growth. It's time for the farmers to gather the fruits of their labor.

ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki poto maber, cam dong odongo maber tutwal. Kare dong oromo pi lupur me coko nyig tic gi.

eng_prompt: Trees play a crucial role in the ecosystem by absorbing carbon dioxide and releasing oxygen. Additionally, they contribute to the water cycle, influencing local weather patterns.

eng_prompt: In light of recent global events, governments are reevaluating their security measures. As a result, they are implementing new strategies to address the growing threat of terrorism.

ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I wilobo, gamente tye ka ngiyo kit ma gwoko kuc tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye katic ki yoo manyen me lweny i kom peko me lweny alibu matye kamede.

lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi o'diru wudrikuru ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete yi geri yini ageyitema ni 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. E'yo 'disi, eyi geri o'diru 'diyi ayu e'yo ori gbaza e'yo uri gbaza ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho omu nsi yoona,gavumenti ziriyo nizitereeza eby'okwerinda byazo. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibateeka omu nkora oburyo busya bw'okurwanisa obutujju obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Forests play a crucial role in maintaining ecological balance and supporting biodiversity. They provide essential resources and services that benefit both the environment and human populations.

nyn_prompt: Ebibira nibikora omurimo gw'amaani, okureeberera eby'obuhangwa n'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Niziheereza ebintu ebikuru n'obuheereza oburikugasira eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, businesses must find effective ways to reach their target audience. One of the most powerful tools at their disposal is advertising.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akalimu okuvuganya, bizinensi zirina okunoonya engeri ennungi okutuuka ku bantu be zigenderera. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okuba eby'amaanyi bye balina kwe kulangirira.

teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni ilolo, ekot ibiasaran adumun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu adolokin itunga lu ekotos kesi. Adiopet kotoma iboro luegogong lu ejaas kesi ngesi alimonoreta.

eng_prompt: In today's unpredictable economy, relying solely on a single source of income can be risky. Exploring various avenues for financial growth can provide greater stability and security.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebitategeerekeka, okwesigama ku nsibuko emu yokka ey'ensimbi kiyinza okuba eky'akabi. Okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukulaakulana mu byenfuna kisobola okuleetawo obutebenkevu n'obutebenkevu obusingako.

teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka ikapun, aitosom epone ediope loka adumun ikapun erai ibore yenetiono noi. Aingic iponesio luegelegela luka apol naka ikapun epedori ayangaun ainapakina keda ayuwara.
